1b1(rgyud):
1b2(rgyud): tan+t+ra dz+nyAnam/ 'od skad du/  lags
1b3(rgyud): dus zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyalapo chen po dpal rdo rje sem
2a1(rgyud): / dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis tho ba dus gcig
2a2(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi sku dang
2a3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i bya ga la bzhugs so// 
2a4(rgyud): brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul
2b1(rgyud): pra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
2b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
2b4(rgyud): po thugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
2b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje dang
3a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
3a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa'
3a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nam ma kha'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dngo' chen po gzugs
3a4(rgyud): rdo rje dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpo' chen po sgra rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
3a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po dri rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
3a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po reg bya rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje dang
3b1(rgyud): de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
3b2(rgyud): rdul phra rab snyed rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod
3b3(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam bar snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin che na dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
3b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin/ gshegs pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba dang / de dgal sogs pa nam mkha'i dbyings
3b5(rgyud): thams cad dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na/ til gyi gang / 
3b6(rgyud): bu bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad shin tu gang bar snang bar gyur to// / 
3b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzod chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen
4a1(rgyud): po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku la
4a2(rgyud): zhugs par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
4a3(rgyud): thugs kyi bdag po yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
4a4(rgyud): snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung / bar gyur to// de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan lta bu// la la ni mA ma ki lta bu/ la la ni
4a5(rgyud): gos dkar mo lta bu/ la la ni dam tshig sgrol ma lta bu/ la la ni gzugs kyi ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni sgra'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni de'i ngo bo lta bu/ 
4a6(rgyud): la la ni ro'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni reg gi ngo bo lta bu/ der yang dag par gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ de bzhin
4a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdul med pa gru bzhir byin gyis
4b1(rgyud): brlabs pa ni / gas pa bde mi ngo bo nyid sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu rgyus// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ gsapa ba la sogs dkyil
4b2(rgyud): 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa
4b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag tu
4b4(rgyud): med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / dede bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la/ 
4b5(rgyud): zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bya/ nga chub kyi sems rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pad+ma mas cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
4b6(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegaso pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas na mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams
4b7(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// de nas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
4b8(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
5a1(rgyud): thugs rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ 
5a2(rgyud): sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa lta bur/ de
5a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kha nas byung ste/ ched
5a4(rgyud): du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams da kyi// byang chub sems ni rab byung ba// de bzhi ni gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rab tu mi rtog gnas med
5a5(rgyud): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'a des de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la/ de
5a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dus pa gas
5a7(rgyud): ba las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje snying po 'dus pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi
5a8(rgyud): sems rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so legs so// 'on kyang 'di ni
5b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
5b2(rgyud): cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang
5b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can du gyur pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
5b4(rgyud): pab ston par mi spro ba de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa/ shegs pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad dri/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig
5b5(rgyud): 'byung ba'i tshig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong ba bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / 
5b6(rgyud): mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir ye nga dag par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
5b7(rgyud): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas/ ye shes kyi sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 
5b8(rgyud): zhe sdang gi rigs kyi sngags mchog gi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
6a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyi/ nag po dkar po dmar po'i tshul du de bzhin
6a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
6a3(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ gti mug gi rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dzi na dzika/ de nas 'di byung ma thag tu/ bcom
6a4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par sna/ dang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ dkar
6a5(rgyud): po nag po dmar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
6a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di
6a7(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rat+na d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs
6a8(rgyud): kyi rig pa'o skyes bu rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya chen por sbyar bas na mkha'i gnas kyis ser po nag po dkar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
6b1(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje'i lho phyogs su bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i rgyun 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom
6b2(rgyud): bar zhugs nas/ 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ro lig/ denaso 'di byung ma thag tu
6b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po'i phyag rgya chen
6b4(rgyud): bor sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ dmar po nag po dkar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad da kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs so// 
6b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca da kyi grub pa gdon mi za ba'i mchog/ dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
6b6(rgyud): zhugs te/ dam tshig 'gug pa'i rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ 
6b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa gdon mi za ba'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis/ ljang gu dang nag po
6b8(rgyud): bo dang dkar po'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogs su bzhugs so// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang // yid bzhin nor bu dam/ 
7a1(rgyud): tshig ste/ rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
7a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin/ rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi
7a3(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dA Sha ra tau/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu
7a4(rgyud): de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom lda ngan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rjes su
7a5(rgyud): mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham/ sa cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang
7a6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mo ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ 
7a7(rgyud): bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ lho phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa/ rjes su chags pa
7a8(rgyud): byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
7b1(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rA ga ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ 
7b2(rgyud): bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs slu ba rdo rje
7b3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang ba'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / 
7b4(rgyud): badz+ra ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ bud med kyi gzug
7b5(rgyud): 'dzin par gyur te/ byang phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog dam tshig phun sum tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom
7b6(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen
7b7(rgyud): po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje los phyung ngo // ya mAn+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
7b8(rgyud): thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsnyengs par byed pa'i tshul du shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
8a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i/ 
8a2(rgyud): khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
8a3(rgyud): dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ rdo rje'i dam tshig bsnyengs pa'i tshul du/ lho phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
8a4(rgyud): rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis
8a5(rgyud): rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang ga sung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pad mAn+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
8a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi tshul du/ nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
8a7(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
8a8(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
8b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi tshul du/ byang phyogs kyi sgong bdu
8b2(rgyud): so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyes par byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
8b3(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ga nga nga drus pams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
8b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadra kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po la/ bco dam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa
8b5(rgyud): byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sku dang gsung dang thugs mchog/ de bzhin gsheg sa pa kun gyi gsang // bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ 
8b6(rgyud): bcom ldan snying po bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
8b7(rgyud): kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa yang thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ce
8b8(rgyud): bka' stsal to// khyed kyis sems lus lta bu dang / lus sems lta bu dang / sems tshig tu brjod pa lta bur bskyed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
9a1(rgyud): dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs na mkha' lta bur sbyar nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi
9a2(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje can// skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis su// skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
9a3(rgyud): rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems
9a4(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// dngos po med pas sgom pa med// bsgom pa ra bya ba sgom pa min// de ltar dngos po dngos med pas // sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das
9a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang
9a6(rgyud): mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po thams cad dang
9a7(rgyud): bral ba// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas// rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// 
9a8(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
9b1(rgyud): mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pa// chos dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam
9b2(rgyud): mkha' lta bur bdag med pa// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
9b3(rgyud): ba rin chen dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams thams/ 
9b4(rgyud): cad dngos med cing // chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// / bdag medo chos las kun tu byung // byang chub tshulho 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
9b5(rgyud): gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyis gsungs so// de nas ba com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer 'bar ba rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
9b6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// ngo bo med de sgom pa'ang med// nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis// dngos po dag
9b7(rgyud): tu rab tu bsgrags// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za ba de bzhin
9b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ 
10a1(rgyud): gdod nas dag pa na mkha' bzhin// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub tshul 'di brtan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
10a2(rgyud): grub pa gdon mi za bas gsungs so// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
10a3(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// a ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos/ chos bshad pa ni/ 
10a4(rgyud): ngo mtshar che// yang dag don ni dag pa'i don// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med pa yi chos las byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa// rnam
10a5(rgyud): par mi rtog dmigs su med// byang chub sems la phyag 'a tshal lo// kun tu bzang po thams cad don// byang chub sems ni rab bskor ba// byang chub spyod pa rdo rje cha
10a6(rgyud): byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tsha lo// 
10a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ byang chub sems kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / 
10a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro ba'i sprin bkod pa rdo rje zhes
10b1(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so// oM shUn+ya tAdz+nyAn badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&// namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa
10b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// 'od zer sprin gyi bkod pa che// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang mnyam// 'od zer sde lngas kun tu khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po ste// 'dod pa'i
10b3(rgyud): yon tan lnga yis khyab// mchod pa rnam pa lngas rgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs kyis
10b4(rgyud): mtshan pa'o// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya// tshogs gnyis dang ni ldan pa yis// spus dang gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mo bskyod pa yi rgya
10b5(rgyud): mchog dang // dkon mchog dpal gyi rgya chen dang // tshad/ bag med pa'i 'od byed dang // thogs med grub pa'i rgyu/ chen rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 
10b6(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnoms// rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs lta// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tshugs
10b7(rgyud): cod pan gyis rgyan pa// rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu 'khrigs
10b8(rgyud): de yi phyag na rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par sgom// marka ta yi 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par rgyan// kun tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab// phyag na rin chen bsnams par sgom// pad+ma rA gA'i
11a1(rgyud): mdog 'dra ba// gtso lo 'dod chags 'bar ba mnga'// rab 'bar phyag na pad+ma bsnams// 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// 'od zer sna lnga'i 'od 'dra'i sku// gdon mi za brjo/ 
11a2(rgyud): can la zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshag
11a3(rgyud): ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rin
11a4(rgyud): chen chen po kha dog lnga// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshad tsam// sna yi mor nan tan du// rnal 'byor gyis ni rtag tu sgom// rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro// brtan par ma gyur yong mi smra
11a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'bar ba 'dra ba'i 'od// mchog rab sprin rnams spro ba ra bya// 'khor la rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri mtshon chen 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams// 
11a6(rgyud): spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ 
11a7(rgyud): par bya/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni// pad+ma sgom pas bsgom par bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni// rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba// 
11a8(rgyud): nam mkha' 'dra bar bri bar bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog/ sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul 'thob pa'o// de bzhin
11b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas
11b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po la/ bstod pa'i rgyal po/ 
11b3(rgyud): 'dis gsol ba btab po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan
11b4(rgyud): rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min thams cad la dag spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dal 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos ni mchog lnga
11b5(rgyud): byung // ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po gsung gi ma chog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma
11b6(rgyud): med/ kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum pa khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje
11b7(rgyud): gtso// 'jig rten gsum mchog ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rab tu
11b8(rgyud): nyams dga' bshad// de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi rdo rje rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// lus ngag sems na/ 
12a1(rgyud): bsgoms pa yis// shes rab can gyis thig ga ba ba// thig srungs rapa legs bkal ba// chad ma rab tu mdzes pa yis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// khrun
12a2(rgyud): bcu gnyis tshad du bya// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// sgo bzhi par ni rab tu brtag/ de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rab tu zlum po bri bar bya// de nas las kyi cho ga ni// mthong bas phyag rgya dgod
12a3(rgyud): bar bya// de'i dbus rdo rje bri ba ni// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// 'bar ba chen po rtsa lnga pa// 'jigs pa dag kyang rab 'jigs byed// 'khor lo chen po shar phyogs su// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par
12a4(rgyud): rgyun// rin chen chen po lho phyogs su// 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs// pad+ma chen po nub phyogs su// pad+ma darA gra'i kha dog 'dra// ral gri chen po byang phyogs su/ 
12a5(rgyud): 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs// dbus na sprin dang 'dra ba'i 'od// spyan ni shar gyi grwa ru gri// mA ma ki yi rigs byung ba'i// rdo rje de bzhin lho phyogs su// pad+ma kha bye sdong
12a6(rgyud): bur bcas// nub phyogs su ni bri bar bya// ud pal mdzes pa byang phyogs su// mthing kha sprin dang 'dra bar bri// tho ba 'bar ba 'od gsal ba// shar phyogs sgor ni bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bar sog/ 
12a7(rgyud): 'od bzang ba// be con lho yi phyogs su bri// pad+ma 'bar ba 'od byed pa// nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje can// byang gi phyogs su rdo rje bri// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de/ 
12a8(rgyud): yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas// lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis// nan tan du ni mchod par bya// bud med rab tu mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni// dri dang me tog drang
12b1(rgyud): rgyan te// yon tan ska rags mA ma kir// shes rab can gyis byin rlabs la// de yi dbus su mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas spros pas// na mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu rgyan// gshang
12b2(rgyud): gci khu ba khrag la sogs// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
12b3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas
12b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa ni// kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po ni// gnas kyi dbang phyug kun mchog gis// spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don// spyod pa'i
12b5(rgyud): mtshan nyid bka' stsal to// rnam par mi rtog don las byung // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rig/ theg pa mchog ni bla med pa'i// dngos grub rab mchog sgrub par byed// rig
12b6(rgyud): ngan smyig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod don don gnyer sems pa rnams// theg chen bla na med pa yi// theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// sems can mtshams med la sogs pa'i// sdig
12b7(rgyud): ba chen po byed pa yang // rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho che// theg pa mchog ni 'di la 'grub// snying nas slob dpon smod bdag/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub par song mi 'gyur// srog gcod pa yi sems can
12b8(rgyud): gang brdzun du sprul dga' ba dang // gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang // rtag tu 'dod pa spyod gang dang // gshing gci zas su za ba ste// de dag sgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur// ma dang sring mo bu mo la/ 
13a1(rgyud): 'dod pa bas ni mnyes byas na// theg chen mchog gi chos nyid kyi// dngos grub rgya che nges 'thob bo// sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la// rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis// 
13a2(rgyud): mnyes par byas kyang mi gos te// da ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar
13a3(rgyud): du gyur rmad du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsung na
13a4(rgyud): gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ sgra dab pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshi ga
13a5(rgyud): gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces pa/ 'astsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams thong de skad marje ro cig/ snying po ye shes can rnams kyi// sangs rgyas chos
13a6(rgyud): nyid dag pa 'di// snying po chos kyi don las byung // byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing // ri rab la sogs pa'i
13a7(rgyud): rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs skrag nas rgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub se pa'i de dag brgya la ba/ 
13a8(rgyud): myur ba gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
13b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ namakha' dang mnyam pa
13b2(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/ 
13b3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur/ dgyes pas khyab par
13b4(rgyud): gyur nas/ chos kyi dbyings 'di skad ces gsungs so// e mchos e ma'o chos/ e ma'o chos kyi don 'byung ba// / chos don dag pa bdag med pa// rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal
13b5(rgyud): 'dud/ sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag/ na mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid gnas// rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med//  rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
13b6(rgyud): gtso dus gsum dag gi lam du byung // na mkha' chen po dbyings gyur pa// na mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud// na mkha'i sku las yang dag byung // namakha'i lam la gnas pa bo// na mkha'i
13b7(rgyud): thugs te chos kyi mchog/ spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal 'dud// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ kun tu spyod pa mchog
13b8(rgyud): gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
14a1(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs byin gyis rlobs pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
14a2(rgyud): brdo rje rnam par snang mdzad/ rdul dang bral ba'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku byin gyis rlobs pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra
14a3(rgyud): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa/ mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs te/ gsung byin gyi
14a4(rgyud): rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka ba dz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he/ rdo rje gsum po de bzhin gshe/ gso pa'i gsang // gnas ni gnas kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// 
14a5(rgyud): sngags kyi mtshan gyis shin tu mtshan byas la// mchog rab 'di yis bsgrub pa nyid du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal// ye shes sgron ma rdo rje
14a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhogs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a na rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa rdo rje gdon mi za/ 
14a7(rgyud): ba/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// sangs rgyas tshul
14a8(rgyud): bzhin mchod par bya// mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje/ 
14b1(rgyud): 'chang bas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug
14b2(rgyud): pa di gsung// sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni// gdang yid kyis bskul nas su// mid ni dga' ding mgru ba yis/ ngos grub ba mchog bsrub par bya// sems lang migs pa bdag pa
14b3(rgyud): ngag dang lus kyang rnam par sgom// na mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas// sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgrub par bya// lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs na// ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// sngags kyi
14b4(rgyud): lugasu sbyor ba la// byang chub med cing sgom pa'ang med// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di ni mdor na rnam dpyad nas// sngags kyis brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzin// byang chub
14b5(rgyud): sbyor bsgom par bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// de dri zhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis// sgom pa'i mchog ni bka'
14b6(rgyud): stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam// sna yi rtse mor
14b7(rgyud): yungs kar bsam// 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar la// ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba// gsang ba'i ye shes kyis brtag sgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par
14b8(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi gnas bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas bzhag go/ hUM/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i
15a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba la// rdo rje pad+ma rnam par sgom// nam pa'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom
15a2(rgyud): par bya mchog gi sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du yongs su sgom// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas tshul ni ni ba spro// 
15a3(rgyud): 'khor yang khyad par dag tu spro// ud pal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du// nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis// sna yi rtse mor rnam por bsam// tse na kra yi 'bru tsam la/ 
15a4(rgyud): 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mor 'di shes da te// bsgoms pas byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// 'kho dar lo la sogs khyad par du// sgom pa der ni brtag par bya// 
15a5(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas// nyams dga' bya/ nga chub gnas 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub gan sa rnams ni// de ru mdor na spro bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyis
15a6(rgyud): mtshan pa yi// chos kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid don kun ston pa pos// spyod pa kun mchog legs dag pa// gsang ba'i dam pa bka' stsal to// gzugs dang
15a7(rgyud): sgra dang ror ldan pa// shes rab can gyis zla drug sgom// gsang ba'i de nyid mchod chen gyis// legs par mchod nas bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// zas su gshang gci
15a8(rgyud): zos na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa// yang dag bla med grub par 'gyur// zas su sha rnams za ba dang // sha chen dag ni rab brtags na// sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba yi// dngos
15b1(rgyud): grub thams cad grub pa gyung // khrang po ga dang rnas pa// de bzhin ngas pa gyi mig/ rdzas kyi kyi ni bza' byur bya// ngas gzhan dganam thos na// byang chub sems dpa' gro can dadu// 
15b2(rgyud): sas rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur// dri ma bu la sbyor ba yis// mu dus sa rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// dod khoms pa byug 'jig rtenan// go 'phang les ni nyed par 'gyur// gci
15b3(rgyud): gzi can stobs dang ldan// mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong // mthong ba tsam gyis bskul med par// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba
15b4(rgyud): byang chub dam pa ste// yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba 'di / lus ngag sems las 'da' ba'o// de bzhin gsheg sa pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba
15b5(rgyud): gsang ba 'dus pa las// sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyi sa rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 
15b6(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos// dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi stong pa'i mchog mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsung so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad
15b7(rgyud): la 'ji ltar 'dod par bsten na ni// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// ji ltar 'dod par bsten bya ste// rang gi lha yi sbyor
15b8(rgyud): yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas// bsten kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// bstan na myur du 'grub par 'gyur
16a1(rgyud): slongs mi za zhing mi bzla ste// slong la'ang dga' bar mi bya'o// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams
16a2(rgyud): nis bde bar gnas na byang chub 'thob// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod rnams// 
16a3(rgyud): chos mchog mi g.yo brnyes pa yang // 'dod pa thams cad bsten pas so// chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga rnams bsten// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes par bya// byang
16a4(rgyud): chub nyi ma chags par bya// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// mchod par byed pas mchod par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad
16a5(rgyud): gizhi sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dril rnam gsum shes byas/ 
16a6(rgyud): nasas sangs rgyas sogs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso// ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid
16a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sna tshogs pas// sangs rgyas thog med rdo rje 'dzin// reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas// bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod pa yi tshul
16a8(rgyud): brnyes pa'o// gzugs sgra ro la sogs pa la// rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya// 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po btus pa'o// gzugs sgra dri sogs sngags pa yis// lha nyi
16b1(rgyud): du ni shin tu sgom// yang na de la sgom pa ni// rigs kyi tshul du rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor// chos ni rjes su dran sgom pa// rdo rje rjes su dran sgom pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs
16b2(rgyud): rnams sgom// rigs ni rjes su dran par sbyor// khro bo rjes su dran sgom pa// lha ni rjes su dran par sbyor// bsgoms na byang chub thob par 'gyur// bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu
16b3(rgyud): drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis
16b4(rgyud): ni mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyurang // yi ge hUM dang oM dag dang // AHdang phaT kyang rab brtag pa/ 'od zer rnam lngas khyab pa yi// pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya// 
16b5(rgyud): 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'ong ba bsgom bar bya// sangs rgyas rjes su dran sbyor la sogs// byang nu ba 'dod pas bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
16b6(rgyud): ji ltar sgom zhe na// b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro// de la chos rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe
16b7(rgyud): na b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag/ rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya// ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas// mkhas pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag
16b8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu gnas// rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya// de la rigs rje su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab tu
17a1(rgyud): sgom 'ab spu rnams kyi bu gnas// mkhas pas rigs kyi sprin rnams spro// de la khro bo rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag/ khro bo'i dbang po rab tu
17a2(rgyud): sgom rab spu rnams kyi bu gnas// mkhas pas khro bo'i sprin rnams spro// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// bdag gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// rang gi khu ba'i
17a3(rgyud): thigs pa yis// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mchod// de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste// mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag/ rnal 'byor pas
17a4(rgyud): ni rtag tu dbyung // dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul du bya// de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// sangs rgyas ku na gyi sku gang yin// phung po lnga yis rab tu rgyas// sangs rgyas
17a5(rgyud): sku yi rang bzhin gyis// bdag kyang de dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// rdo rje chos kyi gsung gang yin// gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs/ 
17a6(rgyud): bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra ste// chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa
17a7(rgyud): lta bur ni// bdag gi sems kyang de 'drar gyur// de la sems can rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// da ni sangs rgyas thams
17a8(rgyud): cad kyi mkha' dang mtshungs par spyod gyur cig/ de la sngags thams cad kyi gzugs dang sku dang gsung dang thugs rjesu dran pa ji ltar sgomazhin// sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin// gsung gi sku yang rnam sgos
17b1(rgyud): pa bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar// sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam gyur cig/ de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhin// 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya// 
17b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad na// dngos grub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rdzasu dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// 
17b3(rgyud): thams cad ma skyes zag pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// khams kyang med cing 'byung ba'ang med// de la ma skyes pa rjesu dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na// thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal
17b4(rgyud): ba'i mtshan med mi 'gyur na mkha'o bzhin// gnyis med ga danyis su med min bzhin// shin tu dri med na mkha' bzhi na// de la zhe sdang gi rigs la sogs pa'i mchod pa rjes su
17b5(rgyud): dran pa ji ltar sgom zhe na/ bud med sems ni rab brtan pa/ lo grangs bcu gnyis lon rnyed pa// rigs kyi sbyor ba/ sa rab bsgoms te// bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis
17b6(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag kyang // tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang 'grub// gang gzhan phra
17b7(rgyud): mor bshad pa rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms te// bzlas pa tsam gyis de 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'das
17b8(rgyud): ba las sngags kyi spyod pa mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
18a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag go dang drug dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol pa btab bo// rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che/ 
18a2(rgyud): na mkha'i spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// rdo rje thag pa rab ston pa// na mkha'i dbyings dang
18a3(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i mchog/ rgyal bzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol// thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa// theg pa gsum gyi lam la gnas// sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag/ mi mchog mchod pa/ 
18a4(rgyud): bshad du gsol// byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan// cho ngas kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje
18a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad na mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad da/ khang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed
18a6(rgyud): gsum gnas pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog/ rgyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba bshad// na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa// gzugs bzang bzhon pas rgyan pa ni// lo grangs nyi shu lnga/ 
18a7(rgyud): lon rnyed// byol song las kyang rab tu brtag/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa 'am// rgyal nyid skyes zhi zhi ba'i gnas rnams su// gshang gci chu la sogs pas byug pa 'am// rgyal ba mtsham
18a8(rgyud): phyir rtag par rab tu bya// nu ma'i dbus par spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar// cho ga shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar// lte ba rked pa gsang bar rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya/ 
18b1(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// bdag nyid zla ba'i dbus gnas par// mkhas pas snying khar bsgom par bya// zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na// bsdu ba
18b2(rgyud): dag kyang rab tu bya// rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la// 'od zer phreng bas rnam par brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyi// gnas de yin par rnam par bsam// bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas// 
18b3(rgyud): mkhas pas mchod pa'i sprin rnams spro// mkhas pas ud pa la ngag dang // pad+ma rnam pa lngar shes bya// dzA ti rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// me tog kar+t+ti kA ra dang
18b4(rgyud): mal+li kA dang yU thi kA// me tog ka ra bI ra bsam// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sgom byas la// rnam par
18b5(rgyud): mkhas pas rtag par ni// rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// de bzhin pad+mo rdo rje dang // ral gri ut+pal mkhas pa sa sgom// dpag tshad bye ba'i khyon tsam du// gru bzhi shin tu/ 
18b6(rgyud): mdzes pa yi// mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams thams cad mchod pa'i phyir// shes rab can gyis gnas su sgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams
18b7(rgyud): kyis de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsam// rin chen na bza' la sogs pas// byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// mchod pa rnam lnga mchog rnams kyis// rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya// rin chen
18b8(rgyud): 'byung gnas na chung mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs mchog gis brgyan// sgrub tshe rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas padag gis
19a1(rgyud): yongs bkang la// dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i phyir// nyin re shes rab can gyis dbul// bdag po'i phyag rgyas mnyam gzhag la// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus ngag tu/ 
19a2(rgyud): 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la// reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lus// bla
19a3(rgyud): ma ga shang dang gcibs mchod// bzhin bzang shin tu mdzes pa yi// na chung skal ba mchog ldan pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas bsams te// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu brtag/ mig bzang
19a4(rgyud): brtan pa'i blo ldan pas// khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi ma chod pa ste// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // sngags rnams dngos
19a5(rgyud): grub byed par gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca/ da kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'du/ sa pa las/ gshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad
19a6(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ dbang phyug dam pa kun don gyis// sku gsung thugs
19a7(rgyud): la longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes can gyi gsang // nyams dga' mchog ni rab tu bshad// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil
19a8(rgyud): 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje mi bskyed rab bsgoms nas// lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams// bsgoms
19b1(rgyud): nas rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni// rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa// bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang ba 'di/ 
19b2(rgyud): lta bus sems can thams cad bsad na ni// mi bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na ste// rigs thams cad
19b3(rgyud): kyi rgya mtsho yin par shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// mi shes thar pa rab sgrub pa// ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med// byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa yi// 
19b4(rgyud): yang dag dam tshig bka' stsal to// na mkha'i dbyings kyi da bus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa/ ra bya// rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas
19b5(rgyud): thams cad rnam par sgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor bas yis// rdo rje'i gzugs ni rab tu brtag/ nor rnams thams cad phrog sa nas su// rdo rje gsum du rnam bsgoms na// nor gyi rgya mtshos
19b6(rgyud): gang ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang // thub pa'i skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las// gti mug gi rigs kyi dam
19b7(rgyud): tshig yang dag pa nyid du shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags thar pa rab sgrub pa// gsang ba dag pa dmigs med pas// dkyil 'khor rab tu bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings
19b8(rgyud): kyi dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// / dpag med tshe ni rab bsgoms te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad dgang // bud med lta bur sbyar ba ni// dam tshig bzhi yi
20a1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// thams cad de ru bsgom par bya// 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog go// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// 
20a2(rgyud): mi phyed sku gsum sgom pa'o// 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste// sngags pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa// bdag
20a3(rgyud): med ye shes las byung bas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgoms par bya// rdo rje thogs med rab bsgoms te// 
20a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra bas// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams dang // rgyal ba thams cad bsku
20a5(rgyud): bar byas 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// na mkha'i gsung ste dri med pa// ye shes blo can kun gyi gsang // sngags kyi dngos grub thob par bshad// 'di ni dam tshig 'gugs
20a6(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de// don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal gnas// rdo rje dngos grub rab ston pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka'
20a7(rgyud): stsal to// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te// gzugs rnams kun gyis 'di dag dgang // rtsub pa'i ngag la
20a8(rgyud): sogs pa ni// bsten na ye shes thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
20b1(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams// ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das de/ 
20b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
20b3(rgyud): cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du/ 'di lta bu'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gi lam/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di ci'i slad du gsung / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ brjod
20b4(rgyud): kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ri rab kyi rdul phra mo rnyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje dbul la sogs pa'i byang
20b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la/ 'di ska/ da ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'dra/ shes dang / smad pa'i 'du shes de lta bu yang ma skyed cig/ 
20b6(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog go/ 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam
20b7(rgyud): mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste/ chos thams cad kyang na mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o// chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gan// 
20b8(rgyud): gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni don gyi
21a1(rgyud): dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs
21a2(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su rigs par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpe sa su shi dgatsu na dang mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba 'byung zhing me 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi/ me de yang gtsub shing la yang
21a3(rgyud): mi gnas// gtsubastan la yang mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa
21a4(rgyud): rjes su rigs par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag do da mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ ngam zhing mig gdangs te tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni/ 
21a5(rgyud): nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang // rnam par mi rtog dag pa las// kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba
21a6(rgyud): 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus te/ bcom
21a7(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to// de nyid sngags
21a8(rgyud): snying kun bsdus pa// sku dang gsung thugs gsang bar bsgrags// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ yang dag bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// nyon mongs kun gyi rgya mtsho
21b1(rgyud): gcol 'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa// gang na'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid// sku gsung
21b2(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rjer sgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ rang bzhin gyis dag pa pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
21b3(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khrag
21b4(rgyud): khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la rol pa ston par mdzad de/ phyogs pa ngacu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthas bkrus pa/ 'dod pa'i yon
21b5(rgyud): tan lnga rnams kyis rol cing / dgyes par yongs su spyod pa yod kyang / de dog sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la/ kye ma 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags
21b6(rgyud): kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi/ chos rdzogs par 'gyur to snyam nas spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ste/ de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag la spyan ras kyis btsa' ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
21b7(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba/ sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun tu bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ rab tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ rdo rje
21b8(rgyud): 'dzin thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la
22a1(rgyud): / tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas sngags bsdus pa 'di lta bu gsungs so// oM a hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas bkun// rab tu 'ang
22a2(rgyud): zhing brgyal bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ dam tshig 'di gsungs so// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 
22a3(rgyud): bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus gnas yi ge hUM// rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag/ rdo rje'i 'od zer cher 'bar ba// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung
22a4(rgyud): thugs 'drangs par de yis rnam bsgoms na// de ma thag tu ngar 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog/ rang gi
22a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rang rdo rjes// bskyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur// / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po rdo rje bsdus ba yin// rang sngags skyes bur bsgoms nas ni// gnas
22a6(rgyud): bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul// zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// kha dog gsum du rab tu sgom// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni rdo rje mchog gi
22a7(rgyud): gsang ba'o// snying kha'i dbus su phra mo yi// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsam par bya// yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i tshig/ de yi dbus su bsam par bya// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom
22a8(rgyud): par byad / rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya// de yis snying khar brdab byas te// lha rnams ji snyed bskul bar bya// 'od ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub ra
22b1(rgyud): sgrub pa'o// rdo rje bad+mo'i rigs la sogs// rdo rje kyo ba rnam sgom zhing // snying kha ru ni bskul bar bshad// 'di ni rol mo'i 'byung ba ste// rdo rje la tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun par du byas na ni// 
22b2(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // sku dang gsung thugs 'grub par 'gyur// mchog stsol bdag rnam par gzigs// yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur pa'i// dngos
22b3(rgyud): grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog sgrub pas// rmongs pas 'da' bar byas na no// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje
22b4(rgyud): 'dzin// rdo rje gsum gyi ston pa mchog/ 'jig rten gsum ma cho ga rdo rje gtses// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sdug sa kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes rdzogs// dbang po/ 
22b5(rgyud): gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad brtag par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig sgra ma pa'o// rig ma'i dbang phyug zhugs pa la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba rab
22b6(rgyud): sgom zhing // chags la chags pas blta bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras// thams cad dbang bskur sangs rgyas gtsos// 
22b7(rgyud): gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ji snyed yod pa kun// phyag rgya che sogs sbyor ba yis// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin// 
22b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas gnas ni der spro bya// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i// byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems
23a1(rgyud): dpa' rgyal rgya mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe nges 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
23a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin
23a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sngags kyi skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi rdo rje rigs pa'i skyes bu'i le'u 'di
23a4(rgyud): gsungs so// rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya chen po rnam sgom pa// byang chub thams cad thob bya'i phyir/ da// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// oM ni ye shes snying po ste// rdo rje'i/ 
23a5(rgyud): sku ni thob byed pa'o// AHni byang chub bdag med pa// rdo rje ga sung ni thob byed pa'o// hUM ni sku gsung thugs nyid de// rje rje mi phyed gsum thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa
23a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags kyi skyes bus de skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun skyes bsam// rdo rje'i sprin ni 'phro bskyed
23a7(rgyud): pa de ru yi ge b+h+rUM bsam mo// de la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying po'o// b+h+rUM/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hUM zhes bya ba rab tu sgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge
23a8(rgyud): oM ni rnam par bsam// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge AHni rab tu sgom// yi ge b+h+rUM gyis gnas bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// snying po dus gsum sangs rgya
23b1(rgyud): se sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa// oM na sangs rgyas sku yi mchog/ oM AHni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam// AHhUM ni ye shes thugs kyi 'jigs// d+hU/ byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te/ 
23b2(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// ye shes rdo rjes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung // 'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste// sngags kyi rig pa zhes
23b3(rgyud): kyang bsgrags// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i// dam tshig dag gis rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje
23b4(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dpe na zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar// sbyor ba 'di ni kun brtsadams na// rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs// zla ba phyed kyis nges par
23b5(rgyud): 'grub// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsams te// rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig ba/ skyed// yi ge oM ni snying khar bzhag/ 'od zer lnga yi sprin chen
23b6(rgyud): po/ rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu sgom// 'di yis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bston na ni// sangs rgyas sku ni 'dra ba'i mdog/ rdo rje skal pa gsum du/ 
23b7(rgyud): gnas/ zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
23b8(rgyud): to chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang gi sngags kyi skyes bu bskyed// AHni ngag gi lam bzhag ste// kha dog lnga yi pad+ma che// 'jig rten dbang mchog bsgoms
24a1(rgyud): pa yis 'dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te// tshig gis dam tshig lnga yi mchog/ chos kyi tshig gi lam gnas pa// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bstan/ 
24a2(rgyud): nani/ rdo rje skal ba gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gsung gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge/ 
24a3(rgyud): 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la// sems la yi ge hUM gnas pa// dam tshig chen po'i 'de nyid ni// kha dog rnam lngar bsgom pa
24a4(rgyud): byab rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya/ ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba// ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor 'a gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje skal ba gsum du
24a5(rgyud): gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i thugs gsang bas de skad/ ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti
24a6(rgyud): 'dzin to// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje chen po bsgo ma par bya// lus rnams kun la kham dmigs na// rdo rje ye shes mkha' mnyam 'gyur// khe sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
24a7(rgyud): yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // skal ba gsum du dam tshig gnas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das na mkha' rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// 
24a8(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs mi snang ba 'byung ba bkod pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rang sngags skyes bu rab bsams nas// snying khar rdo rje hi zhes pa/ bzhag ste
24b1(rgyud): 'od zer rnam par sgom// 6 'jam dpal dam tshig longs spyod la// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpar de 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi/ 
24b2(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'od zer 'bar ba'i yi ge b+h+rU~M// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// mtshon mchog rdo rje'i lus ngag gis// rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// d+hI/ nam
24b3(rgyud): mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bkod pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas mngon/ 
24b4(rgyud): shes mchog sgrub pa'o// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas/ dpar// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje sem sa dpa' rab bsgoms la// ye shes oM ni bsgoms par bya// 
24b5(rgyud): oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ sa de skad ces bka' stsal to// mi bskyod pa yi sku 'dra ngo // 
24b6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod rdo rjes mchod par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i sku dang mnyam par mngon par 'byung ba'i
24b7(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// na mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms la// rin chen oM ni bsam par bya// oM
24b8(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// dkon mchog dpal gyi 'od dang 'dra// de ni bdag med byang chub dang // ye shes gas
25a1(rgyud): ba 'dir gnas 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog dpal gyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// rin po che'i dam tshig longs spyod pa rdo rje'i tshul
25a2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab bsgoms la// chos kyi oM ni bsgom par bya// oMHrdo rje dam
25a3(rgyud): tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum dpag med 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// 'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// thig chen lam ni
25a4(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag tu med pa sa de skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan dpag tu med pa rdo rje 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i
25a5(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa/ bsam// rdo rje pad+ma la bsgoms la// dam tshig oM ni rab tu sgom// oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje
25a6(rgyud): gdon mi za bar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// rdo rje thogs med 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho// se mas can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
25a7(rgyud): gdon mi za bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'od zer gyi ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas
25a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje snang mdzad rab bsgoms la// sku gsum oM ni rab tu sgom// oM rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rnam par snang mdzad mnyam par 'gyur// lus dang
25b1(rgyud): ngag yid rdo rje yi// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub// sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byed 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces bka'
25b2(rgyud): stsal to/ lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par dben pa'i ri bo dang // klung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni// dur gyi khrod la sogs par yang
25b3(rgyud): bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag sgom// mi bskyod ye shes dag la sogs// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su sgom// bcom
25b4(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshige chen po'i rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// 'bar bo lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis/ 
25b5(rgyud): rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// me stag mang po 'khrug pa/ yi// rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje lnga yi/ sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje na mkha'i
25b6(rgyud): dkyil nyid du// 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag gi
25b7(rgyud): lus la snang mdzad bzhag/ snying khar yi ge oM bsams la// sngags pa rnam par shes pa sgom// 'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du// gang tshe de la skye 'gyur na// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin
25b8(rgyud): baT yid bzhin dpal ldan lta bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu sgom// snying khar yi ge hUM bsgoms nas// sems ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/ 
26a1(rgyud): / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom// snying khar yi ge AHbsams te// rdo rje thig ler gyur par bzhag/ 'di ni dam tshig mchog sa
26a2(rgyud): mchog rdo rje mi phyed gsum sgom pa// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje na mkha'i dbyings gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 
26a3(rgyud): lus ngag sems la yi ge oM// bsams na de ni skal par gnas// rdo rje na mkha'i dbyings gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge AH// bsams na
26a4(rgyud): de ni skal bar gnas// rdo rje na mkha'i dbyings gnas par// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge hUM// bsams na de ni skal par gnas// bcom ldan 'das
26a5(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal/ to// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// rnal 'byor 'dir gyu/ re phyin chad ni// klog gam yang na sems kyang rung // de yang
26a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo
26a7(rgyud): rje'i rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// bskyed pa ye shes mchog sgrub pa// dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum// rdo rje gsung gis
26a8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyam gyur pa// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa las// rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs su// me tog/ 
26b1(rgyud): 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan// ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub// maM/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom// lus dang ngag sems/ 
26b2(rgyud): la spros pas// rdo rje 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od dag gis// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur// 
26b3(rgyud): tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas// nams kyang mthong bar mi nus so// rdo rje 'jam pa mchog gi dam tshig mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung // ga shang gci dam tshig
26b4(rgyud): lnga rnams ni// lcags gsum las byung lngar byas te// khar ba dug nas ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi phyed bri'o// thugs ni de ru rab bsgoms na// rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od 'dra
26b5(rgyud): bar/ de ma thag tu der 'gyur ro// 'khor lo 'od 'phro mdangs/ mchog can// rang gi sngags kyis rab bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// bsgoms na
26b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phrin ji snyed yod pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun// de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 
26b7(rgyud): / rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// de
26b8(rgyud): snyed ce bud med rnams// yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur// drag po dag gis phyag byas pa// khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad+ma chen po 'dab
27a1(rgyud): brgyad la// rang sngags rdo rje bsams nas su// chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi// rdul phran ji snyed yod/ 
27a2(rgyud): ba yid sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jog par byed// pad+mo mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ye shes lnga ldan rab bsten na// skal ba gsum du yun
27a3(rgyud): du gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra'i 'od// rang gi sngags kyi ral gri sgom// mig yangs lag na thogs na ni/ 
27a4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur// khams gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing // tshangs dbang lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum na ni gcig pu pa// mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur
27a5(rgyud): gang rnams 'dod dang bsam pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje'i thugs las rab tu byung // de lta bu yi da / sa grub ste// ral gri thams cad kyi dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting
27a6(rgyud): 'dzin to// oM hri ri lu tsan ka'i// 'bru ched tsam du bsams nas no// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rornam bsgoms na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // byang chub sems dpa'i
27a7(rgyud): 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // dzAm+ba chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/ AHni ril bu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar
27a8(rgyud): bcug rnam bsgoms na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // byang chub ye shes 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // dzAm+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/ hUM ni ril bu tsan ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du
27b1(rgyud): bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i sku dang 'ongs ca thams cad ung du sas sa gyi
27b2(rgyud): paradu/ rnam par snang mdzad rab tu sgom// lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// sangs rgyas skur ni rab sbyor zhing / 
27b3(rgyud): ye shes 'di ni rab sgrub pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// ye shes mi bskyod rab bsgoms te// lag tu rdo rje rab bsgoms na// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par
27b4(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// rdo rje'i sku ni rab sbyor zhing // rdo rje'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdorjengag gis bya// mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gnas par// 
27b5(rgyud): rin chen rdo rje rab tu sgom// lag tu rin chen rab bsgoms na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin po che yi rigs/ bsgoms nas// rin tshon skur ni rab sbyor zhing // rin chen
27b6(rgyud): mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// rdo rje ye shes dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sgom// lag tu pad+mo rab bsgoms na// pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+mo'i
27b7(rgyud): rigs chen bsgoms nas su// chos kyi skur ni rab sbyor zhing // pad+mo'i mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// mkha' dbyings dam tshig dbus gnas par// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes sgom/ 
27b8(rgyud): lag tu ral gri rab bsgoms na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po'i rigs bsgoms nas// thogs med dam tshig rab sbyor zhing // dam tshig mchog 'di sgrub pa ni// ye shes
28a1(rgyud): rdo rje dag gis bya// rtse gsum ye shes lcags kyu sogs// rdo rje khyad par gyis bsgrubs na// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yi// bsam gtan des ni 'grub par 'gyur// 
28a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung // mtshan ma gcig dang ni gnas su// rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par
28a3(rgyud): gyis// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams kyi// sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu bsam// sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi kyo ba btang // rlung
28a4(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa// rdo rjes bkug nas nye bar spyod// na mkha'i dbyings kyi rdo rje dam tshig
28a5(rgyud): dgug pa'i cho ga'o// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che// rdo rje/ pad+mo la sogs pas// rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// dam tshig dgug mchog kyo bas bya// khams
28a6(rgyud): gsum gyi dam tshig dgug pa'o// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// lag tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// kyo ba la sogs rab tu sgom// 'di dag lta
28a7(rgyud): bu'i sbyor ba yis// de ni gnas las byed par 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i sku ni rnams bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor bas lce bsgoms na// rdo rje'i gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ 
28a8(rgyud): rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas skur ni rnams bsgoms la// lag tu bsgrub bya bsams na ni// rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur// gsang gsum dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog/ 
28b1(rgyud): mchod pas mchod nas rab tu sgrub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yin// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces gsungs so// 
28b2(rgyud): chen dam tshig mchog gis ni// rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya// gshang gcing ma tshig mchog gis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis// mngon shes lnga
28b3(rgyud): dag thob par 'gyur// rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis// mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur// khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ba lang sha yi dam tshig gis// rdo rje/ 
28b4(rgyud): dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// sha rnams thams cad med na yang // thams cad bsams pas rnam par brtag/ rdo rje sbyor ba 'di byas na// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ 
28b5(rgyud): rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// snying khar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan rdo rje/ mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes gyur pa// 
28b6(rgyud): dam tshig mchog gis bya ba ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog gis rab tu bya// dam tshig thams cad ye shes rdo rjer gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// lU yi
28b7(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje can gyis hUM bsgoms te// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yis// zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur// AHdang oM gyi dam tshig kyang // 'di ni rdo rje'i tshul mchog ste// 'di lta bu
28b8(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mi phyed 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig bdud rtsi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje dam tshig dngas grub mchog/ sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sems can
