29a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi// nor bu yid bzhin rgya mtshor 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje'i bdag nyid snang bar byed// 'khor lo'i dam tshig grub pa'i mchog/ sangs/ 
29a2(rgyud): rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang ga'i bye snyed thams cad du// grub pa kun tu rnam par spyod// dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi// rig pa 'dzin po'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms pas
29a3(rgyud): thams cad dam tshig mchog tu 'grub// mi snang gyur pa thams cad la// stong khams dag ni snang bar byed// sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog pa dang // lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod// gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs
29a4(rgyud): rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa// rang lag s+phu ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje mog gis mthong bar 'gyur// / gang+ga'i bye snyed zhing rnams na// sgra bsgrags pa ni ji snyed pa/ 
29a5(rgyud): mngon shes rna bas thos pa ni// rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin// gang+ga'i bye snyed zhing dag gi/ sems can kun gyi semasarnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan pa yi// rol mo las
29a6(rgyud): byung sems rig 'gyur// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed du// 'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi// sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshig sa rnams// zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi lus// 
29a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas srin la sogs brgyan pa// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// rdo rje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mngon par mkhyen pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la
29a8(rgyud): mngon par shes pa lnga ni// rdo rje'i spyan dang rdo rje'i snyan dang // rdo rje'i thugs dang / rdo rje'i gnas dang / rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas mngon shes lnga don 'grub// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur
29b1(rgyud): gang+gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa'i// 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung thugs kyis// 'jig rten khams kun bgrod par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba dang // nye bar/ 
29b2(rgyud): sgrub par 'byung ba dang // sgrub pa'i don gyi dam tshig dang // sgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi// rdo rje'i bye brag shes byas la// de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// bstan pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba// byang chub
29b3(rgyud): mchog ni bsgom par bya// nye bar sgrub pa grub mchog la// rdo rje skye mched rnam par spyang // sngags kyi bdag po bsgoms pa yis// sgrub pa'i tsheni bskul bar gsungs// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// 
29b4(rgyud): sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam// ye shes rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi dag/ thams cad du ni rtag par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams
29b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid don sgrub pa'o// dgon pa chen/ bo'i sa phyogs dang // rab tu rnam par dben pa dang // ngo bo// nags 'dab chu ngogs su// rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ 
29b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrub pa chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gis// brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen pa bya// sku gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur pa// bsgoms na dngos grub thob
29b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur// dus bzhi dag tu rab sbyor bas// blo dang ldan pas gnas lngar ni// ye shes rdo rje yi ge oM// bsgoms na sdom pa yin par bshad// zhag bdun dang ni zla phyed dang // zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis
29b8(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhag grangs bye brag rab bskul ba// nga yis rgyas par rab tu bstan// gsang ba mchog las byung ba la// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par
30a1(rgyud): gsungs// de la 'di ni nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul lo// sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi byed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas te/ 
30a2(rgyud): sku dang ldan par bya// mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de la sku yis mtshan pa yau// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// de la 'di ni sgrub pa
30a3(rgyud): sdom pa'i yul lo// chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyi gnas byas te// rdo rje gsung dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ 
30a4(rgyud): phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// de la gsung las byung ba yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// de la 'di ni sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa'i yul lo// rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin dpal
30a5(rgyud): dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlabs/ kyis gnas byas te// rdo rje thugs dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcu na bzhugs
30a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams// de la thugs las byung ba yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpe 'a 'am// yang na chos kyi sems dpa'ang rung // rmongs pas 'da'
30a7(rgyud): bar byed na ni// tshal bar 'gas par gdon mi za// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'das pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i
30a8(rgyud): dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs kun// ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sems can kun don yang dag
30b1(rgyud): 'byung du / byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis// thub pa don kun rdo rje can// ston pa che la phyag 'tshal nas// dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la// mchod de rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di gsungs// e ma 'o sangs rgyas
30b2(rgyud): tshul re bzang // e ma'o byang chub tshul gyi mchog/ e ma'o chos kyi tshul re ni// e ma'o sngags kyi tshul re bstan// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams ni// ngo bo nyid kyis khyad par can// rnam par mi rtog/ 
30b3(rgyud): yang dag rig/ ye shes 'byung ba rab tu bshad// yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus pa// rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che// sku gsum mi phyed dkyil 'khor dang // sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba/ 
30b4(rgyud): rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i// rdo rje bzlas pa'i sbyor ba da yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// rigs dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs
30b5(rgyud): kyi mtshan// gsang sngags zlos pa di ring gsungs// ye shes rgya mchogasan pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sa/ ngas rgyas dus gsum las byung rnams// rdo rje sngags ni rab
30b6(rgyud): bsgoms pas// ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// nam mkha' rdo rje ye shes 'byung // byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtsos/ 
30b7(rgyud): rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// sngags kyi don kun bzlas pa ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyis mtshan// rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar// bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas
30b8(rgyud): rnams su// spro ba rnam pa gsum dag bya// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di yis ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsgoms nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag pa/ 
31a1(rgyud): shes nas byas naste// do nags su gas ngag gyu// sas rgyas rnams ug su gas// bas mas nus 'arjod pa'i mchog byu pa// se skyes sa
31a2(rgyud): 'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o// yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis// so so dag tu spro bar bya// sku dang gsung thugs bdag med pa// ye shes sems kyis yang dag spro// brjod nas rdo rje spro ba ni// rdzogs
31a3(rgyud): nas rab tu bsdu bar bya// 'di ni ye shes spyan phye ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni kun gyi yon// sku yi rdo rje rdzogs byang chub// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad pa// sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar bshad// 
31a4(rgyud): de ni sku yi bzlas par bshad// gsung gi dam tshig rdzogs bya chub// sgra dang sgra min rnam dpyad pa// gsung gi rdo rje zhes bshad de// de ni gsung gi bzlas par bshad// thugs kyi
31a5(rgyud): dam tshig rdzogs byang chub// gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam dpyang ba// thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ste// da ni thugs kyi bzlas par/ bshad// don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa ni// ngo bo nyid mang bzang
31a6(rgyud): po yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnam dpyad pa// de ni rin cheni bzlas par bshad// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du// sku yi sprin rnams spro ba dang // bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje'i don// de ni
31a7(rgyud): thogs med bzlas par bshad// khro bo'i dam tshig ye shes kyis// rang gi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grags// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa// de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad// 'dod pa'i don
31a8(rgyud): gyis myos gyur pa// kun tu skyob cing phan par dga'// sems can gti mug gnas la 'jog/ de ni gti mug bzlas par bshad// 'dod chags rdo rje las byung tshig/ lus dang ngag sems la
31b1(rgyud): gnas pa'i// sems can 'dod chags mtshor gnas bzhag/ de ni 'dod chags bzlas par bshad// zhe sdang rdo rje las byung sems// lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i// sems can zhe
31b2(rgyud): sdang gnas la bzhag/ de ni zhe sdang bzlas par bshad// dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum// dbu ma dam tshig rdo rje can// de nyid dam tshig rdo rje yi// bzlas pa ma ning zhes bya'o// 'dod chags de nyid don
31b3(rgyud): sgom pa rdo rje bdag po thams cad ni// sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// 'dod chags byang chub rdzogs par mdzad// rig pa chen mo spyan la sogs// rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa// 'dod pa'i
31b4(rgyud): longs spyod dag gis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bsten na 'grub// gti mug dam tshig las byung ba// rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can// ma ning dag gi gnas grub pa// dngos grub dam pa rab
31b5(rgyud): tu ster/ khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// gsod la rta/ ga tu brtson pa dag/ sgrub pa mchog gi chos can la// gsod pa'i don gyis grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
31b6(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ye shes 'khor lo can rnams kyi// 'khor lo snying kha'i dbus su sgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dbus su
31b7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i don sgom mo// ye shes rdo rje can rnams kyi// rdo rje snying kha'i dbus su sgom// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i sngags don bsgom par bya// rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi
31b8(rgyud): rin chen snying kha'i dbus su sgom// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rin chen sngags don bsgom par bya// pad+mo ye shes can rnams kyi// pad+mo snying kha'i dbus su sgom// chos kyi
32a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bad+mo sngags don bsgom par bya// ral gri ye shes can rnams kyi// ram gri snying kha'i dbus smra skos// dam tshig dkyil 'khor du
32a2(rgyud): gnas par// ral gri'i sngags don bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngo sa rnams su// sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya// 'od zer lnga yi bye brag gis// spos na byang chub thob par 'gyur/ 
32a3(rgyud): sngags rnams thams cad spro ba ni// bye brag rnam pa gnyis su bsgrags// sku gsum rdo rje bye brag gis// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba bya// lus kyis sku yi ngo bo nyid// sems kyis thugs kyi ngo bo nyid// 
32a4(rgyud): ngag gis gsung gi ngo bo nyid// mchod nas mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis/ rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya// dbus su bdag po bsams nas ni/ 
32a5(rgyud): sku gsung rdo rje rang gi gzugs// rang sngags rdo rje'i gzugs/ ngag gis// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu// kha dog/ rnam bzhir kun brtags la// snying khar sngags kyi don bsgos
32a6(rgyud): na/ rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yipa las// bsam gtan rdo rje can dag byed// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu bzang po yin// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul// rgyas la rdo rje pad+mo can// dbang
32a7(rgyud): la rnam par snang mdzad gnas// rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// gsang ba sku gsum las byung ba// sngags rnams kun ni sprul pa ste// bya ba'i rol mos mtshan pa'o// ma dang
32a8(rgyud): smra ba'i sems can dang // rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la'ang // rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po'i 'khor lo rdo rjes de skad
32b1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la// dgra bos bsad par bsams nas su// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// nam/ 
32b2(rgyud): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje rtse lnga kha bzhi pa// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpar rnam par sgom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// sangs rgyas 'khor
32b3(rgyud): lo rnam bsgoms la// sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che// lag pa g.yas pas 'di bya'o// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis// bsdus te gong bu'i
32b4(rgyud): tshul gyis su// rang gi lus la de dag gzung // sangs rgyasaye shes 'khor lo can// slar yang spro bar rab tu bya// khro bas 'khrugs pa'i khro bo rnams// mi sdug 'jigs su rung
32b5(rgyud): ba'i gzugs// mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa// gas dpa'i don gyis don sems pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i ma/ nyid dam// gdug pa chen po gsod par byed// sangs rgyas
32b6(rgyud): sku gsum mchog stsol ba'o// rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnas// nyi ma bdun du 'di bas na// sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// rmongs pas grub pa mi ster na// 'chi bar 'di ni gdon mi za
32b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas rgyan// rnam pa'i mchog ni kun dang ldan// rnam par snang mdzad
32b8(rgyud): rab tu sgom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen ni// rdo rje me stag 'phro ba can// de yi phyag na bsnams par sgom// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can rnams// rdo rje sku
33a1(rgyud): sa kyad bar gyis// 'od ze dus gyis bsgrus sa s+ho/  ga pa ga sa //  rdo mams chud // me shes mchog saganyen gyis smra// zlag / 
33a2(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gsom// bdag ni dngal ldan rdo rjel na// bka' yi 'khor lo ba sbyor ba// gal te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo rje ba ba
33a3(rgyud): moso/ sku gsum las byung dgas par bgyi// zhig par 'gyur bar gdon mi 'tshale// 'khor mo'i dam tshig ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can/ 
33a4(rgyud): namakha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsams// gshin rjeg shed kyil khor lo che// rang gi rdo rje yin par brtag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas sems dpa' rnams// sku gsum dkyil lakhor
33a5(rgyud): bzhugs pa dag/ gshin rje gshed kyi mdog 'dra ba// slar ma nga sangs rgyas spro bar bya// dus gsum la bzhugs sems can dang // gdug sems can gyi dag po rnams/ 
33a6(rgyud): khros pas thams cad gsod par sgom// 'di ni rdo rje bka'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig thams cad las byung ba gshin rje gshed kyi sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// 
33a7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'am// rang sngags don gyi yon tan nam// yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis// bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// sngags kun srung phyir ye shes mchog/ rdo rje can
33a8(rgyud): gyis bya ba ste// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// byang chub bsrung ba'i don chen bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// namakha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// chos kyi snang mdzad
33b1(rgyud): mchog las 'byung ba sdugasum dam chag pa// ma du 'ang sangon 'i dbus gnas da // khasams nas gan du ba lam/ ma par ng+yas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// o swA
33b2(rgyud): gang bar rnam par srom/ rang sdigs yi ge'i gnas ye shes// thugs kyi rnam par bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni sems cam du// bsgoms nas slar yang rab tu bsdu/ thugs kyi/ 
33b3(rgyud): rjer byas pa'i phyir// sku gsum la ni de dag gzung // rdo rje'i sngags rin po cha rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa'
33b4(rgyud): tu nom// sangs rgyas rom bden pad nas ni//  dang du bcug par bye// nga bu mnyam byanag sbyong ba y-is// spyi ba'i steng du rkang ba sgres// bcom ldan 'das
33b5(rgyud): nyid dag pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje rgya mtsho ting / sa gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dbang chen gyi la 'khor bsgoms nas ni// dbus su khro bo rnam bzhag
33b6(rgyud): la/ las kyi rdo rje dang pa yis// de yi spyi bor gnon par sgrom// mu stegs can dang pos kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje gsum mchog khwa
33b7(rgyud): bo'i tshul// ge sar ser po'i mdog 'dra ba// thams cad ri yi rgyal po ltar// bsams nas spyi bor rab tu sgom// sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed na// mi dbang la ni dogs pa med// bcom
33b8(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// dpung thams cad gnon po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// dgra bo skrag pa'i
34a1(rgyud): kun sa sa // sa chus dgags su / gas gyu ma// bam ldan mas
34a2(rgyud): glags de skad ces gasbyangs so// zlums phung bu bsam pastsu// rje lnga pa yi tshad du ste// rdo rje phur bu de yis ni// spying khar de ni rab bsgoms na// khros pas sangs rgyas dang dag kyang / 
34a3(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur ba gdon miza// dgra rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram// ljongs dag tu ni rab sbyor ba// nang kun spong ba'i zhi ba yang // 'dis ni rtag
34a4(rgyud): tu sbyar bar bya// rdo rje rtse mo lnga ba ni// bar snang dag la rab tu sgom// sreg pa'i bskal pa ltar bsams na// skra dar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya// spro ba dag kyang de nas bya// rin
34a5(rgyud): chen yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms/ nas kyang // dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje'i bas ma gtan 'od yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs
34a6(rgyud): sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab tu sgom// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas sprin dang chos chen dang // rdo rje sems dpa' dor spro bya// bskal pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing // sangs rgyas
34a7(rgyud): thams cad byin gyis rlob// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o// nad thams cad med par byed pa rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin to// bsam gnas las byung
34a8(rgyud): dam bcas pas// gnas gang du ni yang dag spyad// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni// gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// rdo rje phur bu rab tu sgom// me stag 'bar ba 'dra/ 
34b1(rgyud): ba yis 'phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya// 'gro ba 'dul bzhi pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// rnam
34b2(rgyud): bar snang mdzad gzugs bsams nas// rang gi thugs khar 'dod pa bzhag/ skyon la sogs pa mchog rnams kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su gang por sgom// bsdus nas thod kyi gong
34b3(rgyud): bu mos// nad pa la ni dbab par bya// ba spu'i bu gnas sangs rgyas// sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro// sangs rgyas sngon rnams de yi che// de la dbang bskur rab tu rtsol/ 
34b4(rgyud): nang pa rdo rje dam tshig gis// skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig bkod pa'i sprin zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// dang
34b5(rgyud): chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// chos 'dzin pa yi ge/ gas bsams nas// snying khar 'dod pa bzhag par bya// / mkha' dbyings gnas ni nyams dga' bar// dkar mo
34b6(rgyud): byas rab tu dgang // 'od kyi gong bur bsdus nas ni// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od// lus dang ngag dang sems gnas la// 'dod pa la de dbab par bya// ba spu'i bu ga nas rin chen// sprin rnam
34b7(rgyud): brtul zhugs can gyis spro// chos kyi sprin rnams bsgoms nas su// dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje
34b8(rgyud): sgrub pa de// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// chos kyi sprin gyi dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// rdo rje'i zla gam dkyil 'khor bsam// rdo rje
35a1(rgyud): sbyo ba sasu// don gas gdung ba ba //  mdag tu spang // sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su byo//  mo pal sbyin mdog dang 'dra// gnas las byed pa 'gyuro// dbang bskur baning sa
35a2(rgyud): ston che/ dang gyes pa'i bdag nyid de rtsol bas// bltas tsam skyed pa nyid kyis kyang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rin po che'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod bo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnam pa' rdorje
35a3(rgyud): smin po ni// drag cing khro la rab gtum dang // wa dang bya'o// sna tshogs dang // khyi rgod khyi yis gang bar sgom// me sa~M dadakyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dgra bo rnams ni skrag par
35a4(rgyud): sgom sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa// bsams nas rna la 'byor sbyar bar bya// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa sa mnan// rgyu ma khrag dang rkang la sogs// thams cad drangs
35a5(rgyud): par rnam bsgoms te// bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur// gal te de ltar rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yang // zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// 
35a6(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa// ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog 'dra bsam// dkar po nag po rab tu dmar// thor tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis
35a7(rgyud): brgyan// rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bsam// nag po dkar po dmar po'i zhal// 'bar ba'i thor tshugs dbu rgyan can// 'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'o// 'dod chags can ni zhal gsum
35b1(rgyud): bsam dmar po nag po dkar po'i zhal// thor tshugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can// bsgoms na nges par 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+mo tshe// g.yas pa'i phyag tu bsnams par sgom// 
35b2(rgyud): rdo rje phyag drug mtshon cha ni// bzang po sna tshogs bsnams par sgom// sems can kun la phan bzhed ma// spyan ni zhal gsum dag tu bsam// dkar po nag po rab dmar ba// mdzes pa'i gzug
35b3(rgyud): su rab tu sgom// mkha' skyes spyan ni rgyal mo che// zhal gsum du ni rtag par sgom// gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba'i tshul// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par sgom// chu skyes spyan ni rgyal mo
35b4(rgyud): che/ zhal gsum du ni rnam par sgom// dmar dang gnagadang dkar ba ste// kha dog mdzes par rnam par sgom/ rig ma rdo rje ud pal bsnams// zhal gsum rab tu gsal
35b5(rgyud): ba'i mdangs// ser dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// bsgom// sa na ye shes thob par 'gyur// khro bo chen po gshin// rje gshed// zhal gsum drag po'i 'od bzang ba// rnon po
35b6(rgyud): 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed// kha dog nag po rab tu sgom// gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che// drag tu bzhad pa'i sgra 'byin po// zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag/ rab tu 'phro ba rnam par bas// 
35b7(rgyud): khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni// skal ba'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs kyis mnan// sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu sgom// rdo rje mi 'chi khro bo che// 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu 'khrug
35b8(rgyud): drag po 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dra// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// 'dod pa'i ye shes khro bo che// zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog/ 
36a1(rgyud): k+ki rgyal po rab tu sgom// stobs po cheni rdo rje che// 'jig rten gsum gyi mun sel ba// gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed// zhal gsum par ni rtag par sgom/ 
36a2(rgyud): khro bo chen po dbyig sngon can// khams gsum dag ni 'jigs par byed// zhal gsum rdo rje gsum las byung // 'bar ba rnon po can du sgom// rdo rje mau g.yo khro bo che// rdo rje las byung mi g.yo ba// 
36a3(rgyud): zhi ba ral gri zhags pa bsnams// brtul zhugs can gyis zhal gsum sgom// gtsug tor chen po yi ge gcig/ 'od zer dag ni kun tu 'phro// zhal gsum 'bar ba 'khor lo can// bsam
36a4(rgyud): gtan dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gnod mdzes ye shes ma chog 'dzin pa// 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho yang dag byed// zhal gsum 'bar ba 'od 'phro can// bsam gtan dkyil
36a5(rgyud): 'khor bsgom par bya// gzi brjid phung po gtsug tor rgyal// ga nga gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can// dam tshig longs spyod 'di rnams kyis// so so dag tu bsgoms par bya// 
36a6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin ni dpag med pa// sngags rnams kyi ni bshad pa yin// khro bo dag ni re re yang // nam mkha'i steng du shin tu 'phags// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil
36a7(rgyud): 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsam// gsal zhing zhi ba zla ba bzhin// 'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'od// ma long lta bur yang dag
36a8(rgyud): byung / khams gsum dag gi dkyil 'khor du// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ bsams na de yis byang chub mthong // bsam gtan rdo rje rab sgom pa// 'di yis sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ 
36b1(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba mdzes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'/ 
36b2(rgyud): dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsam// khros pa gsal ba'i lus dang 'dra// 'bar ba sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od// rnam pa'i
36b3(rgyud): mchog rnams kun dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na// myur du rdo rje nyid thob 'gyur// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul ba// 'dis ni rdo rje'i bdag
36b4(rgyud): nyid che/  sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid la tho dab par 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba mdzes dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor
36b5(rgyud): dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyasagazugs ni rab bsgoms la// chos kyi sems dpa' rna ma par sgom// gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhi ba ni// rgyan rnams
36b6(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 'od zer sprin gyi 'khor lo che// rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom// 'di yis chos kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsum mi phyed las byung ba// ye shes rgya mtshos rnam par rgyan// 
36b7(rgyud): tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// chos kyi sems dpa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs
36b8(rgyud): ni rab bsgoms la// spyan gyi mchog ni rnam par sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// bud med sgyu ma'i mchog/ 
37a1(rgyud): ldan padar khams gsum dag ni dbang byed pa// ye shes thams cad grub par byed// 'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu ster// phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom par bya// spyan gyi
37a2(rgyud): dam tshig phyag gi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'od mchog can// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas/ 
37a3(rgyud): nam pa'i rdo rje rab mchog sgom// zhal bdang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sut+pal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba// mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// na mkha'i rdo rje mchog rab sgom// khams gsum
37a4(rgyud): dag gis phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ dngos grub rdo rje can gyi gsang // ut+pal sdong dmar bya gau na bsnams// namakha' yum gyi rin po che// 'od kyi sprin
37a5(rgyud): rdo rje tshim por byed pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin to// chos kyi la 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bas ni/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje chos ma
37a6(rgyud): rab tu sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i// sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog las byung // 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin sdug pa// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs
37a7(rgyud): / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa// chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje can gyi gsang // ut+pa la dmang po phyag na bsdams
37a8(rgyud): chos kyi dmatshig de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston 'ardo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam kha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs
37b1(rgyud): ni rab bsgoms la// sgrol ba'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// kha dog ljang ser 'dra ba'i 'od// bud med sgyu ma rab tu myos/ 
37b2(rgyud): rdo rje ting 'dzin las byung // sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa// ut+pal ser po'i mdog 'dra ba'i// gsal ba phyag na bsnams par sgom// dam tshig sgrol ma mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
37b3(rgyud): rdonyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam kha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gi shin rje gshed mchog rnam par sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro/ 
37b4(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros// spyan dmar mchebarnam par gtsigs// phyag na ral gri bsnams par sgra ma// snang mdzad dbu rgyan rnams bsgoms na// rdo rje can ni/ 
37b5(rgyud): dgyes par 'gyur// rgan me con/ khro dun gyi dajig yin// gshin rje/ gshed kyi spro ba'i snang ba bkod pa sgom pa zhes bya ba'i/ ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha'i
37b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab sgoms la// gzhan gyis mi thub rab sgom pa// 'bur ba'i 'od zer mang po can// sbrul gyis rgyan zhing ska rags can// rdo rje dgyes
37b7(rgyud): pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// kha dog dkar po rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsams na rdo rje can dag mnyes// 'di ni ye shes blo can gyi// khro bo kun gyi dam tshig go
37b8(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje dani
38a1(rgyud): rab tu sgos// khwa zan 'od par mang po ga/ khams cad du ni rnam par 'gro// dag ba thams cad nabs kyis mnan// khadog dmar po rnam par bsdum// rtogs
38a2(rgyud): sangs dpag med dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rdo rje can dag mnyes// 'di ni rdo rje ye shes can// khro bo kun gyi dam tshig yin// rta skyed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 
38a3(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje mi 'chi rab tu sgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje'i sprin rnams
38a4(rgyud): kun tu 'khrug/ khros shing khro bcas gnag pa dang // mche/ dab rnon po rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na khro bo 'dzin mnyes 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams
38a5(rgyud): cad kyi 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ mi 'chi ba'i da ma tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam
38a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// Tak+ki rgyal po rab tu sgom// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs gtum// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs
38a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'od bzang bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ bsam gtan rdo rje
38a8(rgyud): rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// stobs po che ni rab
38b1(rgyud): tu sgom 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil 'khor// khros shing khros bzhags pa 'dzin// rdo rje stobs chen bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la/ 
38b2(rgyud): bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam
38b3(rgyud): mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sngon po rnam par sgom// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// gzugs
38b4(rgyud): ni rab tu gnag la rno// rgya mtsho nag po skyed par byed// 'bar pa'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje'i dbyig thogs bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab
38b5(rgyud): tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje dbyig pa'i dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil
38b6(rgyud): 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// mi g.yo mchog ni rnam par sgom// khros shing 'jigs pa'i zur gyis lha// 'khrugs pa ral
38b7(rgyud): gri zhags pa bsnams// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// mi g.yo rdo rje can tu sgom// me bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da'
38b8(rgyud): bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje na mkha'i dbyings kyi dam tshig zhabs kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// namakha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas
39a1(rgyud): gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rig pa'i 'khor lo rab tu sgom// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// 'khor lo 'bar bas yongs su bskor// gtsug tor 'khor/ 
39a2(rgyud): lo sgyu dam tshig/ rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ gtsug tor
39a3(rgyud): gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sum+b+ha rab tu
39a4(rgyud): sgom me lce rnon po 'bar ba'i sku// rdo rje'i sprin ni rab tu 'phro// phyag na rdo rje rab 'bar ba// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na
39a5(rgyud): rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 2 da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje'i dam tshig sum+b+ha rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'gog pa khro
39a6(rgyud): bo'i 'khor lo ni// sangs rgyas 'khor lo bsten pa yis// ting 'dzin rdo rje ye shes rnams// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
39a7(rgyud): gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rdo rje dam tshig bkod pa de kho na nyid kyi don sgom pa mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / 
39a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi bdag po// rdo rje 'dzin chen po zhi ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
39b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM ru ru sU ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sing+ga lo tsa na sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyi/ 
39b2(rgyud): 'byor pa kun la dgyes pa rnams// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi 'byung ba// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub cing // rdo rje'i dam
39b3(rgyud): tshig bskul mdzad ma// shi ba sos par byed par gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gyi dam tshig rdo rje khro bo// dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
39b4(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las/ phyung ngo // oM she kA re shAn+ti ka re/ g+hun+da g+huT+Ta g+hun+d+hi ni g+hA ta ya ni
39b5(rgyud): g+ha ta ya g+hun+di nai swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ sku gsum dbyer med rdo rje can// mnyes pa'i spyan ni gdang sa nas su// rdo rje'i thugs ni rjes su dran// rdo rje srung ba'i sbyor ba
39b6(rgyud): la las rnams rtag tu rab sgrub pa// rdo rje chen po 'jigs nyan la// rtag tu stobs ni byed par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting
39b7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// chos kyi sku'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// 
39b8(rgyud): rdo rje chos mchog 'dzin pa rnams// mnyes nas bsam gtan thob gyur nas// rdo rje'i chos ni rjes su dran// rtag tu chos rgyas stobs mdzad pa// rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin/ 
40a1(rgyud): du/ bzlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig
40a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di// nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun bdag che las
40a3(rgyud): skyes / mnyes shing ye shes thob gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang // sems can khams ni ma lus pa// skad cig gis ni bran bzhin du// thams cad gtso/ 
40a4(rgyud): med dbang du byed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
40a5(rgyud): dri ma med pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed de/ chen po rdo rje khro bo 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo/ 
40a6(rgyud): rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta ka ya wa kau tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ au kha ba khA hi khA hi/ sarba du ShA satwa da ma ka/ a si mu sa la pa ra sha/ pA sha hasta/ tsa tu ra b+hu dza/ tsa tu ra mu kha/ Sha TA ra Na/ A gats+tsha A
40a7(rgyud): gats+tshaHsar+b+ba duSh+Ta prA Na a ba hA ri Ne/ ma hA big+h+na g+hA ta ke/ bi kr-i tA nan/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta/ b+ha yaM ki ra/ an+taT+Ta hA sa nA de ni/ b+ha g+h+ra tsar+m+ma nai ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru sarba kar+m+ma NaM/ tshin+da tshin+da sar+b+ba man tAn/ b+hin+da
40a8(rgyud): b+hin+da pa ra su drA ni/ Ak+Sha ya AkaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba b+h+r-i tA ni/ ma tha ma tha/ niR+Sha tha nir+Ya tha sar+b+ba duSh+TAn/ pra be sha ye pra be sha ya meN+Da li ma d+h+ye/ be ba swa ta/ dzI bi tAn+ta ke ra ma ma sar+b+ba kar+yaM ku ru ku ru
40b1(rgyud): da ha da ha/ ba tsa ba tsa/ mA bi laM ba mA bi le ba/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ta sa bi s+pho Ta ya/ sar+b+ba shA pa ri pU ra ka sar+b+ba na nA shA ya ri bAn+ta/ kA ra ka ra he he b+ha ga ban/ kany+tsi rA ya si/ 
40b2(rgyud): ma ma sar+b+ba an+tan/ sa d+ha ya swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// thod pa ma
40b3(rgyud): chag ma gsang ba// gzugs mdzes yid 'ong rnyed pa la// rkang pas mnan pa'i tshul byas nas// sngags 'di rjes su dran par bya// mA ma ki 'am spyan yang rung // rdo rje'i rigs chen las byung ba/ 
40b4(rgyud): lan gsum dag tu brjod na ni// de ma thag tu nges par 'gugs // bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes de skad ces gsungaso// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
40b5(rgyud): snang mdzad// dam tshig gi 'od zer stug po'i mchog ces bya/ ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// khro bo mo'i chu kha'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
40b6(rgyud): phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta ka ya waka tsit+te badz+ra NI/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la ba ra shu bA sha hasta ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ 
40b7(rgyud): ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAn/ bi nA ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi tAn+ta ka rA ya swAhA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun/ 
40b8(rgyud): brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// sngags rnams kun gyis sbyor ba dang // rdo rje bskrad po'i las rnams la// sangs rgyas nyid kyi dpung dag kyang // tshul bzhin byas
41a1(rgyud): na spyod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khrog
41a2(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya waka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM hUM dzi na ri Tin+da hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs
41a3(rgyud): rgyas bdag nyid che skyes kun// 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur te// byang chub sems ni rjes su dran// srin po ma rungs gtum po dang // 'jigs pa chen po khrugs pa dang // rdo rje sems kyis rab sbyar na
41a4(rgyud): las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa dpag tu med pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
41a5(rgyud): pad+mo 'byung ba rdo rje khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang bru/ gas rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya waka tsit+ta/ badz+ra NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka/ 
41a6(rgyud): dz+wa li ta bi s+phu laM ga/ aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/ ke sa ri saT a To ga/ Te kA ro/ badz+ra khu ra nir g+hA ta na tsa li ta ba su d+hA ta la/ ni shwA sa mA ru totak+Sho ba ta d+hA ra NI d+ha ra/ b+hI Sha Na an+d+ran+na hA sa/ a ba ri mai ta ba la/ 
41a7(rgyud): ba rA kra ma/ Ar+ya ga Na/ b+hI ta b+hU ta ga Na/ d+hu Shi ta/ bu d+hu bu d+hA / ha ya grI ba/ khAng khA da/ ba ra man+tan/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ba ri mu dran/ sid+d+hi ma me di sha/ A bai sha ya/ sarba dz+wa ra bi shAn+tu
41a8(rgyud): dIn sarba gra hwe Shu a pra ti ha to b+he ba/ badz+ra deSh+Ta kany+tsi rA ya si/ i da duSh+ma gra he duSh+Ta sarba bA/ d+hu nad+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ mar dmar da/ pA Ta ya pA TA ya/ ma Ta maT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+he/ bud d+ha d+harmA se g+ha a nrid+h+waM
41b1(rgyud): taM karma ku ru/ ha ya grI bA ya phaT/ badz+ra ya phaT/ badz+ra gA tA ya phaT/ badz+ra ne tA ya phaT/ badz+ra daSh+TA ya phaT/ badz+ra khA rA ya phaT/ badz+ra khur nir g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ trai lo kya b+ha yaM ka rA ya phaT/ sarba kaR+She Shu
41b2(rgyud): a pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la san trA sa nA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// chos kyi rdo rje che mchog skyes// 'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar 'gyur// ye shes
41b3(rgyud): rgyal po rjes su dran// mkha' dbyings dug gis yongs gang ba// rdo rje ha la ha la'i 'od// khro bo'i rgyal po bskul ba yis// dug rnams thams cad med par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
41b4(rgyud): gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms parazhugs nas/ rdo rje be con sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi sku
41b5(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya/ wAka tsit+ta badz+rA NAM/ oM i h+ye hi/ b+ha ga ban nI la badz+rad NAM/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu/ hA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA tha
41b6(rgyud): la gu lA ba ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga bAn/ bA yu be ge na/ b+hU tAn sh+lo g+h+raM/ da had ha/ da rengad ra/ kha ha ba ha/ ba tsa ba tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ bA tu ya bA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo nA ba ya mo nI ba saM/ sarba karma NaM/ 
41b7(rgyud): tshin+da tshan+da/ b+hak+Sha ya bAk+Sha ya/ me da ma a s+ya me da madz+nyA ru d+hi r-i/ br-i ya e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban/ sa mas tha ts+tshi na/ sarba man+t+ra ni/ sarba mU la karmA Ni/ kr-i tri ma Ni ShA di nI/ sarba gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ 
41b8(rgyud): mari da ma rang/ oM smeg r+yas dA ya/ hU~M nA~M lA sa/ nA~M lA badz+rad N+Da la/ tu ru tu ru/ bstan bi nA la ka nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hu ru d+ha ru/ dai Sh+Tha tsaN+Da ya/ sarbe sha d+hu tsA hr-id me ni bi Da ya/ tsin+da tsan+da
42a1(rgyud): bid+yA ne ts+tshe ke/ hUM bid+yA na ma shiSh+maka/ sa ma ya nu sma ra/ badz+ra d+ha ra ban+danA tsa/ marmA Ni ni kr-in+na hUM/ ha na ha na/ da ha ha/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phaT phaT/ ts+tsha hUMk+ki/ 
42a2(rgyud): tan+t+ra ya/ de ba ri Shi bi dra ba kA ya/ h+ya na ha na/ badz+ra daN+De na swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// gdug pa'i mchog las byung ba kun// yid ni 'jigs shing rab skrag nas// sems dpa'i
42a3(rgyud): rdo rje rjes su dran// khro bo'i rgyal po grags tshan 'di// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa dang // cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis// gdug pa thams cad gsod par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das
42a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas kun nas sprin dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje stobs po che 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 
42a5(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ phaT/ u gra shU la pA Ni/ hUM hUM hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ti nir nA da/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma ha ba lA ya/ 
42a6(rgyud): swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs ma thag/ stobs po che yis klu rnams kun// yid ni 'jigs shing rab sgeg nas// sku gsum rdo rje rjes su dran// bzlas pa tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams tham
42a7(rgyud): cad sgrub par byed// than pa byung ba'i dus na yang // chu yi dkyil 'khor 'bebs par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
42a8(rgyud): bzhin gi shegs pa thams cad kyi go'i rgyal po khro ba chen po 'di nyid kyi su dang gsung dang thugs rdo rngo las srung ngo // nam \u0f7fsa man+ta kA ya wag tso t+ta badz+ra rje/ tsag sngu \u0f7f de nas 'di ni gsungs
42b1(rgyud): tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po kun// 'jigs shing dam tshig ldan gyur nas// rdo rje sku gsum rjes su dran// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// ling ga rkang pa g.yas pas mnan// 
42b2(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi sngags dag gis// sngags rnams thams cad 'gugs pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi phreng ba'i chu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 
42b3(rgyud): mi g.yo ba'i rdo rje gtum po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya waka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ a tsa la kA Na tsaN+Da/ nan+na naT+Ta maT+Ta man+ta/ moT+Ta mon+da/ 
42b4(rgyud): shan+ta shan+ta/ tan+na tan+t+ra/ ha na ha na/ da had ha/ mo ha mo haM/ moha ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badz+ra hA sa ku ru/ ha sa he sa/ mdzaramadza ra Ta/ garje gardza/ ha na he na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a
42b5(rgyud): bi she A be sha/ ma hA man+ta/ bA la ka/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ big+h+nAn mA ra ye mA ra ya/ duSh+TaM/ b+hak+Sha byA tAM/ sarbaM ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma ha bi Sha Na badz+ra/ s+pho Ta ya
42b6(rgyud): s+pho Ta ya/ hU hUM hUM/ tri ba lI ta re/ ga na rta ka/ AM AM AM/ hA hA hAM/ a tsa la tse Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hUM/ a sa man+ti ka tAT/ ma hA ba la shA ta ya/ ba ra man traM/ AM AM/ hAM hA maM/ b+hU tu
42b7(rgyud): lo ka katu Sh+ya tu badz+ri/ na mo s+t+wa A pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+ye/ dz+wa la ya/ tre Ta e sa ha na na ma swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// lha rnams 'khor du bcas pa kun// brgyal zhing yid ni rab skrag nas/ 
42b8(rgyud): rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// khro bo chen po'i sngags 'di yis// lha tshan dag la sogs pa'i lha// mthu chen dag kyang skrag gyur nas// kha sbyar lus su 'gugs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig
43a1(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam tshig khro bo gnod mdzes 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lnga/ 
43a2(rgyud): phyung ngo // oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na yo b+ha ga waM bi d+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni// skra bshig gos
43a3(rgyud): dang bral gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhibs kyis mnan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// rdo rje lcags kyu zhabs pa yis// bu mo rnams ni 'gugs pa'i
43a4(rgyud): mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyi da 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba gsung gi dam
43a5(rgyud): tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug sa rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas rdo rje sku gsum la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba
43a6(rgyud): 'dzin sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o// sangs rgyas sku gsung sbyor ba yi// 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rtag tu nges par khugs par 'gyur// mi phyed
43a7(rgyud): rdo rje gsum bsgoms pas// 'khor lo pad+mo rdo rje che// rdo rje kyo ba'i khyad par gyis// sngags rnams thams cad dgugs pa'i mchog/ thams cad rdo rje'i dngos zhi ba// rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms
43a8(rgyud): nas ni mi yi bu mo mchog rnams kyi// snying khar rdo rje kyo ba sbyor// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni// rnam par snang
43b1(rgyud): mdzad gzugs chen sgom// de na sha ci gnas par bsam// rdo rje mi 'chi'i sbyor ba yis// lan grangs lnga bcu brjod na ni// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// rdo rje kyo ba gzugs chen
43b2(rgyud): bo 'bar ba rdo rje 'dra ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms na ni// na mkha'i bu mo 'gugs pa'i mchog/ khro bo rdo rje dam tshig ni// rdo rjes 'og gnas pa dag/ shU la rdo rje kyo ba'i gnas/ 
43b3(rgyud): lha min bu mo 'gugs pa'i gnas// btsag gam rdo rgyus dag kyang rung // rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis// zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe// khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lha
43b4(rgyud): rang gi ming rnams bris nas ni// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur// rnam dpa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu sgom
43b5(rgyud): khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// rdo rje kyo ba rnam par bsam // bskal pa'i sreg pa'i 'khor lo tshe// bsgoms nas gnod sbyin mo dag spyad// kun gyi phyag rgya'i khyad par dang / 
43b6(rgyud): yang gsungs pa/ gcer bur phud de skra bshig la// 'jigs pa'i tshul du gtsigs shing 'gyur// rkang pas ling ga mnan na ni// na mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jigs par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam/ 
43b7(rgyud): dur khrod dam// khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // mtshan gcig dang ni shing gcig drung // mngon par spyod pa brtsam par bya// mi rus las byas phur bu ni// sor brgyad pa yi tshad dag la// brgya rtsa
43b8(rgyud): brgyad du bzlas byas te// dgra bo'i sgo khar sbas na ni// sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// shes dang mi shes rnam spangs pa// zla bo phyed ni tshun chad kyis// bskams sam yang na 'chi bar
44a1(rgyud): 'gyur// yang na thong ba gang bdag/ khyad par du ni mkhas pas btsal// der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te// rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas pa bya// dgra yi sgo'am grong dag tu// sbas na
44a2(rgyud): nges par skrod par 'gyur// tA la'i lo ma 'am gzhan la'ang rung // khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la// dgra yi grong ngam sgo dag tu// sbas na 'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig
44a3(rgyud): chen po'i dpal rdo rjes skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs nges par 'ching ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa
44a4(rgyud): zhugs nas/ rdo rje khams gsum pa thams cad kyi sku dang ga sung dang thugs gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya
44a5(rgyud): g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA/ baM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ra Ar+g+haM/ ba ya ti/ ka ya waka tsit+ta badz+ra kI lA hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas
44a6(rgyud): 'di ni gsungs ma thag/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po kun// brgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// nam mkha' rdo rje thugs dran 'gyur// mi rus las byas phur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng rtse las
44a7(rgyud): skyes lcags las byas pa'i phur bu dag/ rdo rje sku gsum 'jigs par byed// 'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs bzang ba'i// rdo rje sems dpar mnyam gzhag la// rdo rje sku ni gsum gyi mthar/ 
44a8(rgyud): gzugs brnyan bsams nas sbyar bar bya// rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen nam// yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can// gshin rje gshed kyi rgya chen dag/ bsams na rdo rje gsum yang gnon// rdo rje bdud rtsi
44b1(rgyud): 'khyil pa yis// gdug cing khro ba tshar bcad la// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas bya ba yin// snying kha nas ni rkang pa'i mthar// rdo rje phur bu rnam par sgom// gong du'ang dam
44b2(rgyud): tshig de nyid bya// 'di ni phur bu'i rnam 'phrul yin// bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'bebs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// phur bus btab na myur du 'chi// 
44b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ sku rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i dam tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid
44b4(rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra tshin+d+ra chen+da ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dip+ta badz+ra tsakra hUM phaT/ phan tshun dkyi/ da pa'i tshul du bya// mthe bong gzhi ni rab tu bsdam// rnam par
44b5(rgyud): snang mdzad tshul gnas te// rdo rje phur bus nges par gdagabatab ma thag tu sems dpa' che// rdo rje sku gsum la sa byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur/ 
44b6(rgyud): yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig tshang ngam gnod pa
44b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hri b+hur b+hu ba/ ye shes pad+ma kha bye ba// rdo rje sor mo nges par bzhag/ 'dod chags rdo rje'i tshul gnas te// rdo rje'i phur bu ngas
44b8(rgyud): par 'debs// btab ma thag tu rdo rje cha// sku gsum dri med las byung ba// btab pa tsam gyis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po
45a1(rgyud): thugs rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs kyi dam tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang / 
45a2(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM badz+ra ra dzA hUM/ rtse me lnga par bcings nas ni// 'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par sgom// rdo rje thugs kyi tshul gnas te// rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab// btab pa
45a3(rgyud): tsam gyis rdo rje che// rdo rje dri med gsum las byung // btab ma thag tu ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga legs par byas nas
45a4(rgyud): ni/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje mthas klas par// phur bus 'deb sra par gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur bu chen sa de skad ces bka' stsal ba to// de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum
45a5(rgyud): mchog sems can khams la phan mdzad pa// mnyes shi nga rab tu dgyes gyur nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsa/ la to// e ma'o gsang ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ e ma'o/ 
45a6(rgyud): snying po kun bsdus pa// e ma'o chos kyi gnas zhi ga/ e ma'o rdo rje rnam par 'joms// phur 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen te// sku gsung thug
45a7(rgyud): kyi rdo rje rnams// phur bus gdab pa yang dag bshad// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// phur gdab de nyid las byung ba// sku gsung thugs ni mchog sbyin pa'i sngags kyi de nyid don bsdus
45a8(rgyud): pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rmad du byung ba'i sngags kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
45b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad na mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur kun
45b2(rgyud): mkhyen pas// rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa// sme sha can gyi bdag nyid che// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub// gshang gtso
45b3(rgyud): dam tshig la sogs pa// de ru cho ga bzhin du ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sgom pa yis// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dag/ rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes
45b4(rgyud): rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// pad mar bzhag de nas rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo da yis// sangs rgyas rnams su rnam par sgom// sngags
45b5(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang // mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' sgom// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// rnam par snang mdzad sku chen po// bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yis
45b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// gtso klag mkhan ni bdag nyid che// bu mo ud pal mthing kha'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid
45b7(rgyud): ni// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// rgyal po// 
45b8(rgyud): chos rnams kun dang mtshungs// 'dod dang thar pa rab sgrub pa// rdo rje chos ni rnam bsgoms pas// gar mkhan bu mo rab mdzes shing // bzhin bzang mig ni dkyus ring ba// sgrub pa pos ni
46a1(rgyud): rtag tu sgrub// de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag/ sa bcu la ni gnas par 'gyur// rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin// mnga' bdag dam pa kun gyi mchog/ bram ze rgyal/ 
46a2(rgyud): rigs rje'u yi rigs// dmang rigs las byung bu mo ni// rdo rje chos bdag bsgrub par bya// 'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// sgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya// skya reng
46a3(rgyud): 'char ba'i dus su ni// sgom pa'i mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// spos dang me tog rnams kyi rgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na/ 
46a4(rgyud): grub pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed// 
46a5(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba thams cad brtsa ma par bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rdo rje can gyi grub 'dod na/ 
46a6(rgyud): gshang gci'i dam tshig bza' bar bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// gshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs
46a7(rgyud): rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba// de nyid bla na med pa 'grub// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo/ 
46a8(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun tu skrag par byed pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hriH
46b1(rgyud): NI wi kro ta A nan/ sarba shatAn na sha sa sta~M b+hA ya hA d+hu phaT phaT swAt+ma// drug ni khrag dang kun tu sbyar// lan cha ske tshe yungs mar te// khro dang cher ma'i me la sreg/ bu mo'i ming dang tshig tu bcas
46b2(rgyud): nyi ma gung ngam nam phyed na// 'di ni yong ye rab tu shis// shes rab can gyi gru gsum du// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul bzhin sreg/ bu mo dag gi don gyi phyir// 'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya// bskal
46b3(rgyud): pa grangs med gsum du yang // de yis rtag tu gnon par 'gyur// sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin pa 'am// yang na rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung // gal te rmongs pas 'das na ni// de yi tshe ni der zad
46b4(rgyud): 'gyur// bcu bzhi 'am yang na tshes brgyad la// dur khrod so dal ba blangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na// de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur// sngags shes pa yis gang rung ba'i
46b5(rgyud): dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su// bsam gtan dag gi/ sa bris na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// tho ba/ bsam gtan sbyor ba yis// phab na nges par ltung bar 'gyur// 
46b6(rgyud): hUM ni rab tu 'bar dang bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu sgom// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs dran te// gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed// rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas// skyes pa 'am bud med gzugs bris
46b7(rgyud): le lag par star bsams nas su// mid pa bcad par rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog/ sems can kun la phan 'dod pa// 'di yis snang bar 'gyur ba 'am// shi bar
46b8(rgyud): 'gyur bar gdon mi za// las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar ba// me stag mang po 'khrigs pa can// dbus su rdo rje bsams na ni// chu rnams mnan pa'i mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor dag ni 'dri ba na/ 
47a1(rgyud): rlung la sogs pa byung na ni// mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// gdug pa'i dgra ni dran par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// gang zhig sprul par gyur/ 
47a2(rgyud): ba yang / mthong ba tsam gyis 'gag 'gyur te// gzhan du byas na 'jigs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag kyang // sngags 'dis skrag par
47a3(rgyud): byas na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o// phaT/ ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags
47a4(rgyud): shes pa yis gnas bzhi ru// bud med rtag tu bzhag par bya da/ rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs// mtshan rnam sa thams cad kyis mtshan cing // pad+mo rab tu rgyas byas nas/ 
47a5(rgyud): sngags 'di rnam par bsgom par bya// hUM 'od zer lnga ni raba'o/ bar ba'i// rdo rje can gyi sbyor ba sgom// rang lus ngag sa mas rdo rje la// phab na byang chub thob par 'gyur// do ni de ma thag
47a6(rgyud): tu yang a rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin// sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// bzhin bzang phan
47a7(rgyud): par 'dod pa yi// bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin// dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya// gsang po blangs nas bza' bar bya// de ni de ma thag tu yang // 'jam dpal dang ni gzi brjid mnyam// mi snang
47a8(rgyud): bdag po dpal dang ldan// 'dzam+bu gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur// gshang ba 'am yang na bza' ba'am// sha dag kyang ni gzhug par bya// cho ga bzhin du bsngags nas ni// zos na sangs rgyas
47b1(rgyud): kyis mi mthong // zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// gshang ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas// kham phor sbyar mar bzhag par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni/ 
47b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo // khyi yi sha dang rta sha dang // sha chen dag ni cho ga bzhin// blangs nas sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ni// zos na de yis mi mthong ngo // gshang dang lhan cig sbyar ba yi// ril
47b3(rgyud): bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor
47b4(rgyud): ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // sha chen dang ni sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong
47b5(rgyud): ba lang sha dang sbyor ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis da kris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // gshang ba las byung srog chags las/ 
47b6(rgyud): brtul zhugs can gyis ril bu bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // ga pur tsan dan sbyar ba yi// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor
47b7(rgyud): ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // gi waM a ga ru sbyar ba'i// ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyuraro// ga pur gur gum sbyar ba yi/ 
47b8(rgyud): ril bu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung // phyag rgya chen por byin rlabs nas// de ni de 'dra'i dpal ldan pa'i/ 
48a1(rgyud): stobs chen pha rol gnon par 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yi// steng du rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// stong gsum bgrod pa'i dpal ldan pa// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra bar
48a2(rgyud): 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang // lha yi longs spyod rigs brtul zhugs// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa la// stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa spyad// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang
48a3(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas rab dgyes bdag/ sems 'khrul yid la dbang ba rnams// ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gdangs nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// a
48a4(rgyud): ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che// e ma'o gsang gnas mi 'gyur ba// e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ e ma'o shin tu dri med chos// da de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// skyed pa byed pa mi 'gyur che// sangs
48a5(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje chos chen pos// rdo rje'i gsung du bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnye sa par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye ba// sangs rgyas rdo rje
48a6(rgyud): can mnyes 'gyur// rdo rje can gyi gzugs la sogs// gtsug tor 'jog par byed par bshad// khro bo'i nang na de mchog ste// sangs rgyas rdo rje rabasgom pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal mo chos mchog rnams// dkon
48a7(rgyud): mchog dpal ni rnam par sgom// rig pa'i rgyal mo sbyor ba la// tshe dpag med parab tu sgom// thams cad las byed sngags rnams la// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes sgom// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni
48a8(rgyud): rdorje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhes gsungs so// gnod sbyin mo yi sngags rgyud la// gshin rje gshed ni brtag par bya// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la ni// spyi bo nas ni bskul ba shis// bcom
48b1(rgyud): ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// bsam gtan 'khor lo de yis ni// sngags mnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag/ dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa// sgrub pa po la phan par gsung // 
48b2(rgyud): de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo chos rnams kun dbang phyug/ sku dang gsung thugs yongs dag pas// ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal to// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // nags tshal rab tu dben par ni// bsam
48b3(rgyud): gtan rdo rje rab bya ba// bzlas dang sngags kyi sbyor bas so// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// sngags kyi bsam gtan gyis bskul bas// gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin du// las rnams sna tshogs
48b4(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje la// gnas gsum du ni rigs brtag go// dbab pa'i cho ga thams cad ni// byas na
48b5(rgyud): gdon mi za bar 'grub// bskul dang rengs dang lha chen po// 'phags lam bzhi po dag kyang ni// rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya// de ltar byas na rtag par 'grub// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis
48b6(rgyud): ma'am 'khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// bzung nas dbab pa rab tu brtag/ cho ga thams cad byas nas ni// las rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya// rnam pa
48b7(rgyud): gzhan du byas na ni// khams gsum skye bos dbyas par 'gyur// de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig 'di rnams so// hUM haHAHdz+haiMHna mkha'i khams ni sems med cing // rtog pa thams cad rnam
48b8(rgyud): spangs dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang // cho ga bzhin du byas na 'bab// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ haHni sku yi rdo rje can// AHni chos 'dzin rgyal po ste// 'di ni gsang tshig bstan pa'o// 
49a1(rgyud): dz+nye ni bskul bar byed par bshad// 'gul ba dang ni g.yo ba yin// 'di ni skul ba thams cad kyi// gsang ba yin par 'di rab bshad// khru gang tsam mam khru do 'am/ 
49a2(rgyud): khra brgyad tsam mam lnga tsam du// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bskul na// 'jigs shing bskrag nas 'phar bar 'gyur// snga ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur// 'di ni gsang ba thob pa'o// de nas rgyal po
49a3(rgyud): / rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sku gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang // brtul zhugs brtan pas 'di dag bya// 
49a4(rgyud): sbyor ba gzhan min pas bya ba// gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhi dag pa'o// dur khrod sol dang phub sogs las// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// skra bshig gcer bur byung
49a5(rgyud): nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'jigs par byed// dur khro da ro bsregs thal ba yis// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// stong rtso brgyad du bzlas pas kyang // 'chi bar 'gyur/ 
49a6(rgyud): bar gdon mi za// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas pa la// ba lang sha 'am rta yi sha/ khyi yi sha 'am sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje 'ong gdon mi za bar 'jig/ sha chen gyis ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje las byung
49a7(rgyud): 'jig par bshad// 'di ni dgra rnams thams cad kyi// 'jigs pa shin tu mi zad yin// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// gshang gci dag gi chos mchog can// tsher ma'i me la khros nas
49a8(rgyud): bsregs// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ chu bo'i 'gram gnyis sa yis kyang // dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun// dug las byung ba'i tsher ma sri/ 
49b1(rgyud): bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pas dgang // sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang // dug dang da dur dag ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsad pa la// 'di dag mchog tu gyur
49b2(rgyud): par bshad// sol khus gsher ba'i gos dag ni// gyon te sems ni khros nas su// rkang pas ling ga mnan nas ni// srin pos khyer bar gdon mi za// rus phye khrag dang dug rnams kyis// gzugs
49b3(rgyud): brnyan rab tu byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang // myur ba dag tu mkhyer bar 'gyur// ske tshe gshang gci sbyar ba yis// ling ga yongs su gang bar ni// blugs la rkang pas rab mnan na// che ba
49b4(rgyud): chen pos btab par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i snying po'o// / na maHsa man+ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM hu lu hu lu/ 
49b5(rgyud): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+hAn bi nA ya kan/ ma hA ga na pa ti dzI bI tAn+ta kA rA ya hUM phaT// sbyin sreg yang
49b6(rgyud): na bsam gtan dag/ lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste// ma yangs pa yi sems kyis bya// 'di ni gsod pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che// rnam par bgrang po 'jigs 'jigs lha/ 
49b7(rgyud): sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams// bsams nas bsam gtan rab tu bya// de la 'di ni drag po chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig go// mkha' dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyis// yongs su gang bar rab tu sgom
49b8(rgyud): gdug pa de yis bsad par ni// bsams na de ma thag tu 'chi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni// gdug pa'i sems pas bsad na ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang
50a1(rgyud): 'ching sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra rnams la// skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs par ni// sngags mkhan gyis ni mdun bsams na// 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// 
50a2(rgyud): srin po khro bo sna tshogs pa// gtum zhing khro ba mi bzad pas// der ni skrag par byas bsams na// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// 'ug pa khwa dang bya rgod dang // mchu ring ba dang wa rnams te// de yis zos/ 
50a3(rgyud): par bsams na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ni// dpral bar bsams na khyad 'phags
50a4(rgyud): pa'i/ sbrul des zos par bsams na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la// yams sam gnod par byed pa rnams// 'jigs pa
50a5(rgyud): nges par 'bebs pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bskul ba'i mchog yin no// tho ba rab tu drag po yis// brtul zhugs can gyis snying khar brdeg/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du// dag
50a6(rgyud): bo'i srog ni med par 'gyur// rdo rje sta re la sogs pas// gsheg cing gtub par bsams na ni// sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang 'chi// srung ba la sogs sngags
50a7(rgyud): rnams dang // lha rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab// 'di ni gsod par byed pa'i mchog/ dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rdo rje'i phung pos ji tsam du// sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// 
50a8(rgyud): bsang bdag nyid gtogs bsams na ni// mnyes par 'gyur te gzhan du min// ston pa sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje chos dang rdo rje can// rdo thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// bsam gtan sbyor bas
50b1(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i'adam tshig khro bos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad na mkha' thub chen po// thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs
50b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas// ye shes rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// e ma'o ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// rgyal ba rnams kyis skye bar bstan// de la 'di ni las phran tshegs/ 
50b3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje gsang ba'o// sbrul ni mi sdug 'jigs byed pa// nag po 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro/ lce gnyis mchi ba'i phreng can ni// rdo rgyus dag gam sol bas br-i// de la 'dzin klu khro bo bskul ba'i snying po'i/ 
50b4(rgyud): kha/ mi bzad par ni 'gyur ba'i dug/ rdo rje'i dbus na 'dug pa dar bsam// dug ni ha la ha la mtshungs// sreg pa'i ma yi kha dog bzhin// bsgoms na 'gul bar gdon mi za// de la
50b5(rgyud): 'di ni dug thams cad 'byin pa'i snying po'o// hrIHrnam pa sna tsho/ gas las byug dug/ khams gsum na ni gnas pa ku/ na// de yis khyer bar bsgoms nas ni// 'bab par gyur par
50b6(rgyud): rnam par bsam// de ni de ma thag tu yang // mi bzad dug gi rgya mtshor 'gyur// reg ma thag tu skye bo kun// 'jig pa 'di la the tshom med// sdig pa rus sbal la sogs dang // sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa
50b7(rgyud): dag kyang // sbyor ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// cho ga bzhin du rab tu bya// de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'pho ba'i snying po'o// oMHlta ba rdo rje'i dug la sogs// gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug/ nam
50b8(rgyud): mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// bsams na ye shes rdo rjes 'dren// bcom ldan 'das dug gi dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje snying po'o// 
51a1(rgyud): hUM/ rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di// kha dog dkar por rnam par bsam// 'od kyi sprin ni shin tu 'bar// zla ba'i 'od zer bzhin du bsil// gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// de
51a2(rgyud): ma thag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// lan gsum legs par sgom pa ni// skyugs pa dag tu rnam bsams na// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang // de ma thag tu dug med 'gyur// zhes de skad bka' stsal
51a3(rgyud): to// de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o// AH'bras dang phol mig 'brum bu dang // gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// bsams pa tsam gyis med/ 
51a4(rgyud): par 'gyur// pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad// zla ba bzhin du dri ma med// de yi dbus na 'dug bsam pa// 'od zer lnga ni rdzogs ba'o// sdud pa na ni dam tshig gnag/ bskul ba na ni dkar po 'dra// 
51a5(rgyud): bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba 'di// ye shes dri med gas nga chen yin// de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nang rnams gso ba'i rdo/ rje snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams so// dzi na dzi ka/ A/ 
51a6(rgyud): / ro li ka/ badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa// dad pas yon tan thob 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya// dam tshig spre'u dang 'dra ba 'am// yang na khyi las/ 
51a7(rgyud): byung ba'ang rung // rang gi lus ngag sems gnas las// byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam// 'khor lo 'am ni rdo rje'ang rung // bsgoms na rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas// lus dang ngag sems dam tshig rnam/ 
51a8(rgyud): des ni phye mar brlag par sgom// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag/ dgyes pa'i spyan gyis rab tu stsol// 'di skad
51b1(rgyud): ces kyang bka' stsal to// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam// rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po// nad las thar par rnam par sgom// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams
51b2(rgyud): cad dang // blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag/ de la khros par bsams na ni// 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin// bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gis// las skyes su yang gang grags pa// brgya rtsa
51b3(rgyud): brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis// nyi ma bdun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur// yang na bdag gis sngags rgyal gyis// rdo rje'i bsam gtan cho ga bsam// 'di ni nad rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu
51b4(rgyud): 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes kyo ba'o/ nga po che// 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje ches// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste// ngo bo nyid kyis
51b5(rgyud): ma skyes shing // rang bzhin dag pa de nyid la// 'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsung // bsam gtan bzlas pa don brtson pa'i// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub
51b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong // de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te/ byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas// sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang por mthong // sangs rgyas rdzogs longs
51b7(rgyud): spyod pa yi// skur yang bdog nyid myur du mthong // sem can chen po khams gsum pas// mchod pa byed par des mthong ngo // ye shes chen po'i 'od 'dra'i gzugs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// 
51b8(rgyud): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu mchod pa byed par mthong // rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang // grags pa chen po rdo rje chos// gsang ba rdo rje grags pa che// rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong // 
52a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i// rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i// 
52a2(rgyud): lha yi bu mo yid 'ong dang // khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na// de ni dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // zhing na bzhugs par nges par mthong // thugs ni dgyes par gyur
52a3(rgyud): nas kyang // chos mdzod yid du 'ong ba stsol// chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lus// sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs bskor ba// bsam gtan rdo rje la gnas pa'i// dam tshig sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur// kun
52a4(rgyud): dga' ra ba skyed mos tshal// lha yi bu mo sogs pas rgyan// sa sangs rgyas kun gyis byin rlabs pas// bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// 
52a5(rgyud): de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong // rigs 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis// mchod pa byas par nges mthong ngo // yang gsung / sa pa/ rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i// rmi lam dri ma med mthong
52a6(rgyud): nas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// skyes pa bla med 'grub par 'gyur// gdol pa khyi yi sbyor la sogs// gal te rdo rje blos mthong na// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ 
52a7(rgyud): de la 'di ni rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o// rang sems rnams ni dmigs pa la// chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas// nam mkha' rdo rje'i gnas sems 'di// chos med chos nyid med
52a8(rgyud): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tsom gcod pa
52b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags// chos rnams ngo bo med pa la// chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa// e ma'o ngo mtshar las byung ba// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom// de nas/ 
52b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan
52b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin no// nam mkha' de nga ni chos thams cad du gtogs la/ thams cad kyi rjes su blta'o snyam du
52b4(rgyud): yang mi sems so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa/ shegs pa thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / rmi lam gyi dam tshig las byung bar rjes su rtogs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
52b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nam/ mkha' brtag tu med cing bltar mi snang ba thogs pa me/ da ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
52b6(rgyud): thams cad chos thams cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na lus dang ngag dang sems dang chos thams cad rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam
52b7(rgyud): tshig ni/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir te 'di lta ste sems kyi ngo bo nyid do// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams de dag gnyis su med cing
52b8(rgyud): gnyis su byar med do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams la gnas te/ nam mkha'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams
53a1(rgyud): na gnas pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams na gnas pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas pa yang ma yin te/ chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa
53a2(rgyud): de ni skye ba med do// gang la skye ba med pa 'di ni chos gang gis kyang brtag par mi nus so// de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'o// kye bcom
53a3(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas byed pa ste/ byang chub kyi sems de yang lus
53a4(rgyud): la mi gnas ngag la mi gnas sems la mi gnas so// chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med do// 'di ni ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas yin no// kye bcom
53a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rmi lam de ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam mthong bar bya'o// // snyam du mi sems so// mi yang bdag gis rmi lam mthong
53a6(rgyud): ngo snyam du mi sems so// khams gsum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang / rmi lam lta bu/ rmi lam dang 'dra ba/ rmi lam las byung ba'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
53a7(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang / sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang / rmi lam bdag med pa'i gnas su rjes su rtogs par
53a8(rgyud): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 'di lta ste/ dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po
53b1(rgyud): che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la/ sems can gang dag gis gser ram rin po che'am dngul yang rung ste/ gang bslangs pa de dag thams cad bsams
53b2(rgyud): pa tsam gyis 'byor par byed de/ rin po che la sogs pa de dag kyang sems la yang mi gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la yang gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
53b3(rgyud): pa thams cad chos thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan gdangs
53b4(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang dathugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di skad ces gso dal to// bcom ldan 'das gang na mkha'i khams kyi rjes su
53b5(rgyud): 'brang ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'brang ba de ngo mtshar to// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chu ba sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
