53b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub mdor bsdus te gsungs pa/ 
53b7(rgyud): sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje mdor bsdus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la legs so// 
53b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad ni/ sku dang gsung
54a1(rgyud): dang thugs la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi
54a2(rgyud): chos thams cad ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la ni gnas so// lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje de dag kyang / 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas gzugs med
54a3(rgyud): pa'i khams na mi gnas/ sems kyang lus la mi gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas/ ngag kyang sems la mi gnas/ sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'
54a4(rgyud): ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
54a5(rgyud): cad kyi chos gang la gnas gnas byung / dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ rang gi lus dang ngag dang sem/ sa las byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
54a6(rgyud): thams cad kyis gsol ba/ sems gang na gnas bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' la gnas so gsol pa/ nam mkha' gang na gnas bka' stsal pa/ gang na yang mi gnas so// de nas sangs rgyas dang
54a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/ rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la gnas nas sems shing cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
54a8(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// 
54b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ 
54b2(rgyud): pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i tshogs kyis
54b3(rgyud): mchod pa byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
54b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas thams cad sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // de nas sku yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil
54b5(rgyud): 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad pa/ ra bya// khru ni bcu drug tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor ste// sku yi
54b6(rgyud): rdo rje rab tu gnas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// rdo rje'i cho gas bri bar bya// sngags rnams kun gyi gsang ba mchog/ phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas su bya// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas// mi bskyed pa
54b7(rgyud): la sogs pa'ang bri// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ grwa rnams kun tu dgod par bya// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa yi// khro bo rnams kyang sgor bri'o// rdo rje gsang ba rab bsgoms pas// mchod pa
54b8(rgyud): sngags shes pa yis bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// gshang dang gci ba la sogs pa// bye brag tu ni nges par dbul// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad
55a1(rgyud): kyi sku mi rdo rje las dam tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsung rdo rje tham
55a2(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor
55a3(rgyud): mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya// gru bzhi lham pa cho ga bzhin// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa
55a4(rgyud): rdo rje bsgoms pas thig gdab bo// de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni// zlum por kun tu bri bar bya// mdo ru phyag rgya thams cad ni// cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// tshe dpag med kyi phyag rgya che
55a5(rgyud): de yi dbus su bzhag par bya// rdo rje gnas mchog de nyid du// thams cad yongs su dgod par bya// yongs su gas la bar cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni// de nas
55a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa bya// 'on tang rdo rje can dag mnyes// gshang gci khu ba'i dam tshig gis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// 
55a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas sprin gyi tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na// 
55a8(rgyud): rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i// gzugs ni dbus su legs bris pa// de yi dkyil 'khor gnas su
55b1(rgyud): 'gyur la sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung // 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gnas ye shes gsang ba yin te rab tu gsang ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje
55b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang
55b3(rgyud): ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi snying po'i thig gdab pa'i yi ge'i gnas rnams so// oM AHhUM/ rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang / 
55b4(rgyud): tshon rtsi dag ni dgye ba dag/ sngags kyi sems pas mi bya ste// dbyas na byang chub rnyed par dka'// de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas// sngags kyi lha rnams phab nas su// byin gyis
55b5(rgyud): brlabs kyis gnas bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam pa ro brtag/ rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad dang / yang na spyan ni dbab par bya// sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas
55b6(rgyud): yid 'ong // rdo rje sku yi yon tan 'thob// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// rang gi chos mas dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu rtag pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che
55b7(rgyud): mA ma kI yang dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o// de ltar byas na byin rlob cing // yid la dbang nyid gshegs te// rab tu dgyes par gyur nas ni// gsang ba
55b8(rgyud): dag gis mchog kyang stsol// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags kyi sems pas bya ba ni// rdo rje gsang ba rmad po che// khro bo'i rgyal pos bkugs nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// 
56a1(rgyud): rdo rje dri med gsum dag gi/ dam tshig mchod pa dus gsum pa// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya// sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags
56a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad nyid la yang // rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dbul// gshang gci sha dang 'bru mar dang // sems las byung ba'i tsan dan dang // khu bdag gis sngags rnams kun// tshim par 'gyur bar
56a3(rgyud): kun tu bshad// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o// thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di// bdag nyid gang tshe spyod pa na// rnam par snang mdzad bsgoms nas su// rdo rje
56a4(rgyud): sems dpa' rab tu sgom// yang na rdo rje mi 'chir grags// slob ma da rdo rje 'od po che// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yi// la/ das kyi go 'phang bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga
56a5(rgyud): rnams ni// rdo rje'i thig srung dag la dgod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni// tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par sgom// 'di na
56a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa yin// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang // rdo rje hU~M ni bsgom par bya// sku dang gsung dang dam tshig mchog/ gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par
56a7(rgyud): bya// de ltar rtag tu byas na ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las skyes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa// 'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlob mdzad// rdo rje bum pa bzhag pa ni// sngags rgyud bdag pos shes bya ste/ 
56a8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'dod pa'i// sngags shes pa ni sbyin bsreg bya// gshang gci 'bru mar sha la sogs// sbyin bsreg tu/ 
56b1(rgyud): ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dag la// rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te nal du dbab par bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// dbang po gnyis
56b2(rgyud): kyi dam tshig gos// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'ang 'a dka' ba'o// rnam snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba yis// slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung // AnA
56b3(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems la// bsgoms nas rdo rje bzung bar bya// rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang // grags chen rnam par snang mdzad dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi dmatshig tu// byin gyis brlabs ni rab tugs
56b4(rgyud): de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i dmachog dgo/ AHkhaM bir hUM/ 'di ni dmachog thams cad lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i snying po'o// de la 'dri ni rdo rdzun
56b5(rgyud): po'i dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba'o// sa sa rgyas kun gyis na mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rab tu sgom// rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin pa yis// sil snyan dri/ 
56b6(rgyud): yi sprin rnams sgom// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// rdo rje sku gsum sngags kyis ni// nyung dkar dag gis brdeg par bya// de la de yi tshe na ni// bdag nyid dbang bskur rab tu stsol// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
56b7(rgyud): gyis// yang na sangs rgyas bsgom par bya// bum pa dam tshig mchog rnams kyis// bzung bar mkhas pa dag gis sgom// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsam// slob ma rtag tu blo brtan la// lus dang
56b8(rgyud): ngag sems rdo rje can// sngags shes pas ni dgod par bya// de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi gsang ba slob dpon thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi// 
57a1(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung // khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa// rdo rje dbang bskur chen po sbyin// de la 'di ni slob ma thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol babya/ 
57a2(rgyud): ba'i cho ga gsang ba'o// byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar stsal pa bzhin// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje dang bdag stsol// de tshe de la dbang bskur ba// rab tu
57a3(rgyud): dgyes nas stsol bar mdzad// lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis// snying khar bdag po bzhag par bya// rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la// dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya// 
57a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// dam tshig gsang ba dbasgrags par bya// khyod kyis srog chags bsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin par yang khyod kyis
57a5(rgyud): long / bud med dag kyang bsten par bya// rdo rje'i lam ni 'did/ ga gos// sems can thams cad bskul bar bya/ 'di skad kyang gsungs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 
57a6(rgyud): dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o// sngags kyis bskul ba smras pa yis// de la sngags kyang sbyin par bya// sngags kyi rgyal po'i ting 'dzin dang // gsang ba sbyin pa brtsam par bya// khu ba 'am yang na gshang ba
57a7(rgyud): 'ang rung // cho ga bzhin du bsngags nas ni// rdo rje'i blos ni bza' bar bya// 'on tang dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te// rdo rje can ni kun gyi gsang // sngags kyi 'khor lo bud med
57a8(rgyud): gzugs// sems can don spyod phyir gnas pa'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang sngags kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'o// glang po'i shi dang rta yi sha/ she chen dag kyang bzang bya zhing // 
57b1(rgyud): sngags rnams kun la dbul bar bya// de ltar byas na mgon po mnyes// nyin re rdo rje slob ma la// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// gshang gci sha yi bya ba dang // rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig/ 
57b2(rgyud): dag gis// sngags rnams kun gyi yi ge oM// bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'bar// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// dngos grub thams cad
57b3(rgyud): sgrub pa dang // dam tshig chen po sgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas byang chub nyid dag kyang // nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya// mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog dag kyang // rdo rje sku yi
57b4(rgyud): bka' bzhin du// dkyil 'khor dag gis thams cad 'grub// gshang gci dang ni sha chen rnams// cha ni mnyam par byas nas su// kham phor sbyar mar bzhag na ni// sangs rgyas
57b5(rgyud): kun dang lhan cig 'khod// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs te/ de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag bzhug pa rab tu sgrub pa'i tshig gi mchog go/ hrIHni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang
57b6(rgyud): bo// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyis na mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rnam par sgom// de yi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// der ni sngags kyi dbab par bya// de la 'di
57b7(rgyud): ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sngags rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i snying po'o// AHkhaM d+hI/ phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen dang // phyag na pad+mo 'od chen dang // gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dag/ bsgoms na
57b8(rgyud): gsang ba'i gnas bzhag go// de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// mi bskyod pa ni rab tu rtag/ tshe dpag med pa'i 'khor lo che// rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin
58a1(rgyud): te/ 'od chen sdug bsngal chen po yis// thams cad snying pos bskul bar bya// de la 'dzin rdo rje'i snying po thams cad bskul pa'o// A mdu rtse che dang rjo che// lcags / 
58a2(rgyud): sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje cho ga bzhin bskul na// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs so// nyams dga' ba yi ri dag dang // chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su// zla ba
58a3(rgyud): phyid ni tshun chad kyis// sangs rgyas thob pa gdon mi ze// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// de yi 'khor tshogs lhan cig tu// 'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub// phyogs bcu'i
58a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// / zab mo'i chos kyang thos 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje
58a5(rgyud): bzhad pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni mngag gan ga pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'o// rdo sems dpa' ye shes che// de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin/ 
58a6(rgyud): rdo rje sku yi dgod pa ches// mngag gzhug pa dag rtag tu bskul// de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor lo sngags kyi dam tshig gi gnas so// dam tshig bskul ba dang / dam tshig gtong ba dang / dam tshig bod
58a7(rgyud): ba dang / dam tshig bcing ba'o// mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa ni// chos rnams thams cad rnam par spangs// gong bu'i tshul gyis byed pa ni// rdo rje rmad byung gzugs can no// bcom ldan 'das sangs
58a8(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung // gal te dbang du bya 'dod na// rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che// gsang
58b1(rgyud): bachen po 'di bsam mo// rdo rje 'jam pa stobs po che// na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// mda' lnga'i sbyor bdag gis ni// dbu rgyan rtse mo yang dag spro// gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas// rdo rje
58b2(rgyud): khro bos rab tu dbab// sngangs shing brgyal bar sgom pa ni// byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis// bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed du// gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gis sgom// sngags rnams kun gyis rab
58b3(rgyud): gsang ba// rdo rje'i don gyis blo yis gsungs// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni// na mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsam pa// sngags kyi rdo rje hUM la sogs// rdo rje gsum la sogs par sgom// oM ni
58b4(rgyud): mig gi dbus bsams nas// 'di dag cho ga bzhin du bstan// sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni// sku gsung can du mthong // bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs che/ 
58b5(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di ni rnam bsam na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po// bsam na don rnams thams
58b6(rgyud): cad 'byor// baM ni kha yi nang du sgom// oM ni lce la 'dug par bsam// bza' bar bya ba kun gyi gnas// yid bzhin nor bus rgyan pa ste// zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad sel// ye shes rdo rje la
58b7(rgyud): byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyis nor bus de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ rdo
58b8(rgyud): sgom pa'i tshig gi mchog/ rdo rje'i gsung las phyung ngo // bIH sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis// bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam/ 
59a1(rgyud): rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// cung zad ser ba rdo rje 'gying // zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can// bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya// rdo rje dpa' bo rlabs/ 
59a2(rgyud): kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje chen po sgom pa'i tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
59a3(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // tsu/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas sprin gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje gsum gyi grags chen ni// lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab// bskul
59a4(rgyud): byed rdo rje ma sgom mo// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// kha dog dkar mor rab tu sgom// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// bsams la sngags kyi tshig dgod do// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye
59a5(rgyud): shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'des phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ bsam pa thams cad rdo rje longs spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
59a6(rgyud): nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo'i tshul 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dzeHsangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa dag/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe
59a7(rgyud): ga yis/ rdo rje sgom pas dbab par bya// dzam+b+ha la ni nor sgrub pa// gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya// zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'dzin pa// thor tshugs dbu rgyan rdo rje can// sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga yis/ 
59a8(rgyud): gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu de yis// bsam gtan gnas la 'dug la dbul// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis// dbu rgyan de la rnam par bsam// de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang // 
59b1(rgyud): gnod gnas dbang po 'od chen gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdzas sgrub pa'i tog gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje 'dod pa nye bas
59b2(rgyud): longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// gnod sbyin mo'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // k+Shi/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus
59b3(rgyud): gnas par// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu bzang // thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas// me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs// gnod sbyin mo ni thams cad kyis// na mkha'i dbyings ni gang bar bsam// gzugs
59b4(rgyud): kyi sprin dag rnam bsams la// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab// gzugs ni gcig tu bsam par bya// lus gsum rdo bye brag gis// de yi bsam gtan bsgom par bya// rdo rje 'jam
59b5(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas// dbu rgyan la ni khro bo sgom// snying ra sngags kyi tshig bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor ba brtsam ra bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa
59b6(rgyud): sgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ rdo rje'i sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
59b7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub phra mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku dang gsung thugs yang dag 'grub// sangs rgyas gzugs 'dzin 'od bzang po// 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser
59b8(rgyud): 'od 'dra// dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas// mi snang la sogs yang dag grub// 'jam pa'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin rgyal po grub pa che// rig 'dzin dag gi dbang por 'gyur// de la 'di ni
60a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i dngos grub thams cad kyi gzugs gsang ba'i dngos grub rnams so// sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi// mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni// 
60a2(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// mthong ba nyid kyis dga' bar 'gyur// gtsug tor thams cad grub pa ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ 
60a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje rab sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
60a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang / dedag par len pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
60a5(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// lus da nga ngag sems sgom pa ni// rang tshul nyid kyis de byas te/ da ltar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sru dang
60a6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i rig pa'i brtul zhugs so// thor tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs// chen po kha dog dkar po 'dra// sngags kyi sdom pas kun tu bsdams// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya/ 
60a7(rgyud): lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// bzhin sdug mig gi dkyus ring ba// rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// spyan gyi go 'phang longs spyod cing // rdo rje'i mtshan
60a8(rgyud): mas bsgoms par bya// phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes// sngags kyi rgyud rnams legs par bslabs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mor bya// sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas// brtul zhugs
60b1(rgyud): chen po dus bzhir ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya// sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yi// bza' dang bca' ba spyad par bya// 'on tang myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur// bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che// zla/ 
60b2(rgyud): ba drug gis de dag kun// gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu gzhan gyi nor rku zhing // bsad pa'ang rmad du byung ba dang // 'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas spyad pa// sdom pa 'dis ni kun tu bsdams/ 
60b3(rgyud): 'dod chags rdo rje lcags kyu mo// yon tan lug rgyud mA ma kI// gsung gi rdo rje thugs mchog la// 'di ni rnam pa kun tu rigs// bsam gtan yig gsum rdo rje can// rang gi phyag rgya sems kyi
60b4(rgyud): bsam// de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen pa// mnyes par 'gyur ba'i don mi za// sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas// nag/ sa tshal dag tu bsod snyoms bslang // kha zas bzang po
60b5(rgyud): bltar bdag/ de dag skrag nas ster bar 'gyur/ rdo rje'i bdaganyid gsum 'das nas// rdo rje'i yi ge 'jig para'/ gyur// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lA ma yin nam mi mo'ang/ 
60b6(rgyud): rung rnyed nas rigs pa'i brtul zhugs bya// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bstan// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul chen yin// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes 'byung // sangs
60b7(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs
60b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// 
61a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ 
61a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// gsang ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par
61a3(rgyud): snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje na mkha' dri ma med// rang bzhin dag pagos pa
61a4(rgyud): ming rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che// dmi rtog na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin rab brnyed// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// don yod rdo rdzog
61a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun gyis bskul ba yi// bstod tshig zhi ba 'di
61a6(rgyud): rnams kyis// rdo rje longs spyod bstod na ni// de yang sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun la rjes brtse ba// rdo rje gsang ba gsung dag pa// rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal
61a7(rgyud): to// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge che// rang bzhin 'od gsal yongs su dag/ nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
61a8(rgyud): cad kyi bdag pos/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yi// dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bar bya// sha chen
61b1(rgyud): rtag tu bza' bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang
61b2(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya// gsung gi rdo rje yi ge ches// gshang gci dag ni rtag tu bza'// 'di ni gsang ba rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
61b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ches// dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar
61b4(rgyud): bya khrag dang khu bsgyur ba dag/ brtul zhugs bstan pas rtag tu bza'// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dmatshig/ 'di ni rmang po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi brtag pa 'di// rdo rje
61b5(rgyud): 'dzin gyis bsrung bar bya// gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// de yi sku gsung thugs rto/ gas pa'o// de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas phyag na
61b6(rgyud): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rang sangs rgyas kyi don gyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de yi lus kyi ston pa ni// rdo rje'i sku la rab tu gnas// 
61b7(rgyud): sems can gzung ba'i ngang tshul te// dam tshig mchog tu rtag pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang
61b8(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ba'o// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam// byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams// dman par mos pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de
62a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gti mug las kyi lam gang rnams// 
62a2(rgyud): byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste// sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ drag po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang
62a3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khams gsum dag na gnas pa yi// bud med rdo rje las byung rnams// sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni// dam tshig mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje
62a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sems can las byung ji snyed pa// dbyer med sku
62a5(rgyud): gsum la gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang // ba sam gtan rdo rjes bsad par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rang gi dam
62a6(rgyud): tshig rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur// gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che// thugs kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che// de nas
62a7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khrag dang sha ni za ba dang // rtag tu gzhan
62a8(rgyud): gyi bud med spyod// dam tshig dga' ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje chen po mnyes par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di
62b1(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 'o ma 'thung ba phra ma can// de dag 'dod dang dril 'bad// dam tshig 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur// de nas phyag na rnga rje/ 
62b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ lha ma srin gyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khro zhing nga rgyal gsod pas non// spos dang me tog spyod la
62b3(rgyud): dgyes/ rdo rjes 'og dam tshig ste// gdul dka' rdo rje 'jigs byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
62b4(rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // thod rus bdug pa'i 'bru mar dang // zhag gris rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyi dam ni ngag ste// dag byed 'di ni don chen byed// de nas phyag na rdo rje de
62b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje mkha/ 'a 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang ga/ sung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gshang gci dang ni khrag
62b6(rgyud): dag bza'// chang la sogs pa'ang rtag tu btung // rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis// gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis bsang bya// ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba// khams gsum dag na rnam par spyod/ 
62b7(rgyud): sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya// khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
62b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ lus kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad ni// rdo rje las ni byung bar bya/ 
63a1(rgyud): sems can khams ni thams cad du// rtag par sangs rgyas sku byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ ngag gi dngos grub kyi
63a2(rgyud): dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tshig gi las lam ma lus par// khams gsum dri med dkyil 'khor te// tshig gi dngos grub yid 'ong 'di// dam tshig shin tu 'ang
63a3(rgyud): dka' ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sems rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dngos grub 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thug rdo rje las phyung ngo // yid kyi rdo rje'i rang
63a4(rgyud): bzhin kun// rdo rje brtan pa 'dzin pas sgom// rdo rje mi phye garasum ldan gyi// dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no// bcom da ldan 'das kun tu mdzes dga' rdo rje sems dpa'adi skad ces
63a5(rgyud): bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha/ mas cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje 'i snying po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
63a6(rgyud): las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal nyan thos de bzhin te// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba na// phyag 'tshal na ni ma rung 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
63a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bsam gtan gyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung/ 
63a8(rgyud): kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// sngags zlos pas ni bsam gtan bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
63b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags sgrub pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mdor na sems can khams rnams ni// bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul bar/ 
63b2(rgyud): bya/ rdo rje gsum gyi phyag 'tshal mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje las byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa dang / nye bar sgrub/ 
63b3(rgyud): ba dang sgrub pa chen po'i sdom pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje gshang gcis na mkha'i dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam// dus gsum rdo rje dag la dbul// 
63b4(rgyud): dam tshig rab tu rtag pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshe/ gas pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje mi snang ba tham sa cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
63b5(rgyud): las phyung ngo // dus bzhir ji ltar mchog bzhin du// rdo rje ma ni nyin re spyad// yang na rdzas kyang rtag tu dbrog/ dam tshig rdo rje rdzogs byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
63b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin gyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dbu rgyan dag la bsam gtan bsam
63b7(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste// khros pa rnams kyis mi thub bo// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags 'chang las dang po pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di
63b8(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku yi rdo rje kha zas la// phyi rol rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // mdo gdon cho ga'i bya ba la// rtag par rdo rje chos su bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa
64a1(rgyud): rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi / 
64a2(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab kyi rdul rab tu phra ba dang / mnyam pa'i byang chub sems
64a3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ci'i
64a4(rgyud): slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sem sra dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
64a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka/ 'a stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po 'di/ sku dang gsung
64a6(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i yi ge'i tshig la/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams
64a7(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po 'di sems pa ni 'di snyam du gyur to// sku ni mi 'gyur ma skyes pa// gsung dang thugs kyang mtshan ma med// nam mkha' rdo rje rtog las byung // log par bzung bas zin pa yin/ 
64a8(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
64b1(rgyud): thams cad/ gsung rdorje tshig la phyin ci log kun 'byung bar mi brtag tu gsol/ de ci'i srad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'dzin/ de bzhin gshegs pa
64b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyang ba tod/ spyod par 'gyur ba gshegs pa dang byon pa'i rjes su 'gro'i// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ tshangs pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
64b3(rgyud): chen po mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes thob pa rnams chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid mi shes nas 'di snyam du rnam par rtog ste/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid 'di de bzhin gshes
64b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi rdo rje'i de kho na nyid yongs dasum shes nas/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnams 'chang ngas de snyam du sems pa yang mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
64b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams lta ci smos te/ nged de bzhin
64b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba mi 'gyur ba rnyed pa'ang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi byang chub mau shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon
64b7(rgyud): bar byang chub pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'o// rigs kyi bu sems can chen po'i khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub la gnas pa
64b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye ma sems can de dag ni sku gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid kyi phyir/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes thob pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin ga
65a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs/ 
65a2(rgyud): so rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas med pa// rtog pa rdo rje las byung ba// smra bar byed pa smra ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
65a3(rgyud): cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / 
65a4(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub ji ltar yang dag par 'jug/ gang na gnas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje/ dzin pas gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ 
65a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad dang thams ca/ da mkhyen pa dang khams gsum ji snyed pa dag/ rang gi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud kyi rdo rje la gnas so// 
65a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang / khams gsum thams
65a7(rgyud): cad gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ye shes rdo rje'i bdag pos gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
65a8(rgyud): kyi dngos grub dang / khams gsum pa thams cad ni nam mkha' la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ na mkha' gang na gnas de bzhin gshegs pa
65b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa/ gang na yang ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du skur rmad du gyur nas/ e ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje// e ma rdo rje mi bshad pa/ 
65b2(rgyud): gang du lus dang ngag sems med// de ru gzugs ni rnam par sgom// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas nas// rdo rje gsum mchog mchog chen mchog/ rdo rje gsum rgyu/ 
65b3(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog/ rig pa'i skyes bu sgom pa yi// dngos grub kun ni bshad par mdzad// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i sku ni/ 
65b4(rgyud): rab bsgoms nas// spyi bor rdo rje rab tu sgom// zhal gas dem sku gsum las byung ba// rnam par 'gro ba bsam pa dar bya// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsams na// byang chub myur du
65b5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis/ gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam// gzhan du rnam par bsgoms na ni// de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur// bcom
65b6(rgyud): ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum las byung rgyal mo che// mnyes par byed ma rnam bsams nas// rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa/ 
65b7(rgyud): khyu mchog des ni mnyes par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di dag sgom pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// zhag bdun gyis ni gzi che ba'i// sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ 
65b8(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya chen
66a1(rgyud): po'i don rtogs pa// cho ga bzhin du kun bsgoms na// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'thob// de nas phyag na rdo rjes sgrub po thams cad kyi lus dang ngagadang sems gas/ 
66a2(rgyud): ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo // sngags rnams kun gyi dam tshig 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyang mi
66a3(rgyud): 'da'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // ge shang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni// smang bdag du yong mi bya/ 
66a4(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du rtag tu bza'// gsang 'di rdo rje gsum byung yinang // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
66a5(rgyud): phyung ngo // khams gsum dag gi lam mchog na// bud med/ ji snyed yod pa rnams// thams cad cho ga bzhin du spyad// // gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes thugs
66a6(rgyud): kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje sku gsung la gnas pa// dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis// mgu zhing tshim pa dag tu bya// thugs
66a7(rgyud): kyi rdo rje mi rmad do// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin
66a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni// sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags// rdo rje'i skye mched nyid dag kyang // 
66b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes khams gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// chu yi khams/ 
66b2(rgyud): ni mA ma kI// dkar dang sgrol ma zhes bya ba// me dang rlung du rab tu bsgrags// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dam tshig ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
66b3(rgyud): gnas kyi dbang phyug rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin
66b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms/ par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
66b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po byams pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
66b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba gsang ba 'dus par/ mngon par dbang bskur ba'i
66b7(rgyud): slob dpon la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
66b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bzhin du blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ slob dpon ni byang chub kyi sems dang mnyam zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med do// 
67a1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mdor bstan na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'khod cing 'chol skyong ba de dag thams
67a2(rgyud): cad dus gsum du byon nas/ slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang 'gro zhing ngag rdo rje'i yi ge yang
67a3(rgyud): 'di skad du 'byin to// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma'o zhes bya ba nas/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa
67a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi ston pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na ji snyed bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas
67a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo/ rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po/ ji skad/ pa de bas kyang slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi
67a6(rgyud): bsod nams khyad par du 'phags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'o// skye ba'i gnas su gyur pa nas thams
67a7(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi
67a8(rgyud): bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa
67b1(rgyud): snang mdzad rnams/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka'
67b2(rgyud): stsal ba byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi rdo rje'i ye shes las byung ba de rnams kyang / gsang ba
67b3(rgyud): 'dus pa'i slob dpon dang drang na/ mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid ston pa yin bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi pa/ 
67b4(rgyud): po yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dedag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
67b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub rnams ci la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha/ mas cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsum gsang ba'i sku
67b6(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs ni/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol ba/ lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje gang la gnas/ 
67b7(rgyud): gang la yang mi gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang
67b8(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje'i ting 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos te bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
68a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' khyed thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor nyon cig/ de
68a2(rgyud): nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bshad
68a3(rgyud): du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam pa// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan rdo rje rab
68a4(rgyud): bskul bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// 'khor de lo can kun bzhugs par bya// mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid kyi nas// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya// slob dpon snying khar rab
68a5(rgyud): bsgoms nas// dbang bskur ba ni brtsam par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgoms la// dbang bskur ba yi gnas gsum gyis// 
68a6(rgyud): thams cad cho ga bzhin du dbab// sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// byang chub 'di yis 'bab 'gyur zhing // ngo mtshar chen po'i dngos grub kun// sku gsung thugs ni 'grub par 'gyur// sangs
68a7(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba
68a8(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // hUM hrI khaM/ sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam/ 
68b1(rgyud): sku dang gsung thugs gsum snying po// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// drag po mi sdug khros pa ni// ud pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra// phyag bzhi pa yi cho ga yi// phyag na thong ba bsnams
68b2(rgyud): par sgom// 'od zer lnga rnams yang dag byung // rang lce brtul zhugs can gyis sgom// bsam gtan rdo rje sbyor ba yis// khrag drang ba ni mchog yin no// rtse gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang // bur bu drag
68b3(rgyud): po mchog dag gis// sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas gdab par bya// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i kha zas kyi dam tshig gi bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 
68b4(rgyud): bza' ba 'am btung ba gang cung zad// brtul zhugs can gyis gang bza' ba// gshang gtso sha yi sbyor ba yis// cho gabazhin du yongs su brtag/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
68b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ma chod pa'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ las phyung ngo // mchod pa'i yo byad mchog lnga yi// mchod pas
68b6(rgyud): de dag mchod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba 'di
68b7(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi khu ba la sogs pa// cho ga bzhin du kun mchod na// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas
68b8(rgyud): yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdom pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sems can khams rnams mtha'
69a1(rgyud): yas kyi// dam tshig 'dzin pa'i ma rnams la// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje spyang // sdom pa 'di ni rmang po che// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i/ 
69a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // lus dang ngag sems longs spyod kyi// gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyes// bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya// 'dir ni yong ye
69a3(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mtho gang tsam gyi dpags par ni/ 
69a4(rgyud): spyi bor dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// oM ni dbus su gnas bsams nas// bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya// rdo rjesbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig dag gis gzi can 'gyur// 
69a5(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems bder gnas par// 'gyur bar 'don do/ gas pa med// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sngags 'dzin ba thams cad kyi/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba 'di
69a6(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mchod rten dag gi las mi bya// glegs bam klag pa'ang mi bye zhing // dkyil 'khor dag kyang yong mi bya// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya'o// 
69a7(rgyud): de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ dug thams cad 'byin pa 'am gnon pa dang 'dren pa'i gsang ba 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las
69a8(rgyud): phyung ngo // oM/ 'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba can// 'khor lo'i dbus su chud par bzhag/ 'od zer ser po 'khrigs pa ni// ser po lta bur bsgom par bya// rdor gsum 'od zer dam tshig gis// 
69b1(rgyud): sa bon gsang gsum las byung ba'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ lus dang ngag dang sems srung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa 'di
69b2(rgyud): nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ gro ga la sogs 'khor lo ni// las kyi rdo rje la gnas par
69b3(rgyud): ha ni dbus su bzhag nas su// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis// rgyan te rtag tu bzhag par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum gyi
69b4(rgyud): gnas bsdus pa'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshedags pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje any+dza na'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 
69b5(rgyud): lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung // ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// de ru rdo rje any+dza na// thod par rtag tu dbab par bya// tshil chen po dang khrag dang gshang ba dang // pad+mo'i
69b6(rgyud): skud pa dang / arga'i skud pas me mar gyi snying po byas la/ tshes nyi shu dgu'i nam phyed na// rdo rje any+dza na dbab par bya'o// de nyid la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab na// dngos grub rnam pa gsum du/ 
69b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
69b8(rgyud): bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge du dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
70a1(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad cing sgom par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di
70a2(rgyud): skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje/ 
70a3(rgyud): gang yin pa de la dad cing sgom par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
70a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ste gsum mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs
70a5(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdzo/ rje la phyag 'tshal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
70a6(rgyud): pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang
70a7(rgyud): ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang g+hi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa yang 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
70a8(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas mar ma mdzad 'das pa nas/ thub pa chen po 'od srung mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
70b1(rgyud): chen po'i gnas kyi don bshad pa de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir ro// 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus
70b2(rgyud): ba 'di la/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing brtsal
70b3(rgyud): kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba de gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su
70b4(rgyud): 'gro'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu ngus so// de na das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub
70b5(rgyud): sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma du shig/ sdug bsngal gsum la ma sgom shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
70b6(rgyud): pa thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/ ji ltar sdug
70b7(rgyud): bsngal gsum mi sgom par bgyi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge'i ming tsam thos pa'i skal ba yang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skad
70b8(rgyud): ma zer cig/ yi ge ni thun mong ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
71a1(rgyud): kyis kyang / rigs kyi thugasang ba'i yi ge 'di dag ma thos shing mngon par sangs ma rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// 
71a2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / 
71a3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
71a4(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la dga' bas bstod pa sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la
71a5(rgyud): bskyab tu gsol// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson pa mchis bzhad na// sems can yab chen gnyen ma cho ga bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin
71a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mor mA ma kIs/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ rdo rje 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i
71a7(rgyud): mchod pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i tshig 'dis yang dag par bstod do// rdo rje'i sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can lU phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rjes su phan ston pa// mgon
71a8(rgyud): po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshog chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
71b1(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po la/ 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i dam tshig gis yang dag par bstod pa/ 
71b2(rgyud): khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten dag gis dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// rab dga'i
71b3(rgyud): spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
71b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod do// khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig
71b5(rgyud): mchog gi phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa// mgon po gal te/ de ring bdag ni gson par bzhed na/ yon tan rin chen mang
71b6(rgyud): nas kyis mang du pas u ga gas pa sa pa sa sna 'phrul
72a1(rgyud): gyur to// de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku gsum gyi dam tshig las/ yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje'i dpal gyis reg nas/ thams cad de/ 
72a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur to// de nas brtsams te sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po kun tu bzang po zhes
72a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes dbang bskur bar gyur to// de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka'
72a4(rgyud): stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje de
72a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces pa/ sol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so// 
72a6(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par byung nas/ bcom
72a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs pa da ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// 
72a8(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan
72b1(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ gzugs kyi phung po ma yin tshor ba'i
72b2(rgyud): phung po ma yin/ 'du shes kyi phung po ma yin 'du byed kyi phung po ma yin rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma yin/ khams ma yin skye mched ma yin/ de bzhin du 'dir 'dod chags ma yin zhe sdang
72b3(rgyud): ma yin gti mug ma yin/ chos ma yin chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
72b4(rgyud): gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la ba dka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
72b5(rgyud): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsu nga dang thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
72b6(rgyud): de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin
72b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di zung shig/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
72b8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes gsol nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi gau gsum la rang gi
73a1(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs zhugs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing
73a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing / 
73a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la
73a4(rgyud): gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug ma nyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa
73a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams dkyi dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyal po
73a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang zhing rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po
73a7(rgyud): rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha ka ra waR+Ya dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shri dz+nyA na ka rabs
73a8(rgyud): bshad nas/ zhu rkyen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas bcas kyis nus gtugs gsar khrel du 'tshal ba'o// 'dus pa'i rnga rgyud la lo chen gyis bsgyur ba ma du snang na'ang / 'gos kyis 'gyur bcos mang
73b1(rgyud): pa nyung bar snang la/ 'grel pa'i bshad pa 'gos 'gyur gyi steng nas byed pa la rgyud kyi 'gos 'gyur gal che bar mthong nas bris pa'o// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
73b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kyis ji lta ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin
73b3(rgyud): du mthong zhing thos la khong du chud nas chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa dag
73b4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum gyis kun tu ni// rdo rje gsum la kun tu bzhugs// sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi// rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung // sangs rgyas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub
73b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o// e ma'o 'di rab ngo mtshar che// a ma'o zhi ba dbang po 'das// e ma'o 'khor ba dag gi rgyun/ e ma'o mchog tu mya ngan 'das// de nas de bzhin gshegs
73b6(rgyud): pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin no// sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin no// de nas
73b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad yang 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang / phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par
73b8(rgyud): mchod nas phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o shin tu rnyed dka' ba// byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs 'di yin// rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes
74a1(rgyud): bya'i rgyud// sbas pa de ni rtogs phyir dang // sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// yang dag gsung bas gang bshad pa// mgon po khyed la gsol bar 'tshal// 
74a2(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang zhig sbas pa'i rgyud tshig de// de dag thams cad 'dri 'dod pa/ 
74a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// yon tan 'byung gnas legs so legs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun// rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs te// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas
74a4(rgyud): 'di yi som nyi zhus par gyur// gsang ba zhes 'di gang la ba dgyi// 'dus pa zhes ni gang la brjod// rgyud kyi 'brel ba ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rgyud 'dir ci la bgyi// de nyid rnam pa
74a5(rgyud): duru bshad// de bzhin gsang ba rnam pa du// gsang chen zhe sa ni gang la bgyi// dam pa rnam pa du zhig mchis// byang chub sems zhes gang la bgyi// de bzhin rig pa'i skyes
74a6(rgyud): bu tsi badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces ci la bgyi// de bzhin dzi na dzi ka ni gang // de la rat+na d+h+r-i ka ni gang // de bzhin A ro li ka ni ci// prad+d+he d+h+r-ika ces gang la bgyi// rigs 'dir de bzhin gang zhig lags/ 
74a7(rgyud): mo ha zhes ni gang la bgyi// dweSha zhes 'dir gang la bgyi// rAg zhes ni ci la bgyi// badz+ra sngags ni gang la bgyi// ra te zhes 'dir gang la bgyi// phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig lags/ 
74a8(rgyud): ya mAn+ta krita don ni gang // de bzhin pradz+nyAn+ta krita tsi// pad mAn+ta krita ming ci lta// de bzhin big+h+nAn+ta krita tsi// kun tu spyod pa gang ci lags// de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang // 'dir ni bzlas pa gang zhig/ 
74b1(rgyud): lags/ rgyas btab pa zhes gang la bgyi// chos 'thung ba ni ji ltar sgom// de bzhin sdom pa ci lta bu// zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags ches// sems can don mdzad ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor zhes
74b2(rgyud): ni gang la bgyi// phyag rgya'i dgod pa ci ltar lags// 'dir ni me tog ci zhig lags// mchod rten zhes ni gang la bshad// ye shes 'khor lo ji ltar shes// 'dir ni gnas shes gang la
74b3(rgyud): bshad// mgon po bskul ba ji lta bu// gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu// ji ltar de rnams spyan drang bgyi// bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu// dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar stsal// de bzhin rig pa'i brtul
74b4(rgyud): zhugs gang // bdud rtsi lnga rnams ji ltar bza'// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang lags// dngos grub tha mal ji lta bu // de bzhin mchog kyang ji lta bu// de la thabs ni rnam pa du/ 
74b5(rgyud): de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi// bka' ni ji ltar bsgo bar bgyi// las kyi mchog gi chog sa rnams ni// sna tshogs ji ltar byed par 'gyur// de nas de bzhin
74b6(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la dmigs par mdzad nas
74b7(rgyud): skad cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// snying rje'i bdag nyid rab dga' nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs// mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul
74b8(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lus ngag yid ni rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// 
75a1(rgyud): sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// bzhag nas byang chub sems dbang po// nus pa rgya chen mnyan par gyis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad/ 
75a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rjes su gsungs pa'i bka' spyi bos rab tu mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so legs so zhes
75a3(rgyud): gsol nas/ rang rang lus dang ngag dang yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
75a4(rgyud): de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs rdo rje chen po la dmigs par/ byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsungs gcig gis bka' stsal pa/ 
75a5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum// gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba// tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par bshad// lnga pa dang ni dgu pa dang / 
75a6(rgyud): bcu bdun pa dang bcu gsum pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyis// bstan pa dag ni sgrub chen yin// bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa// brgyad pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa// slob dpon spyi yi
75a7(rgyud): las dang ni// dngos grub brtul zhugs sdom pa yin// drug pa dang ni gnyis pa dang // bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa// drag spyod rjes su chags pa dang // nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// bdun pa dang ni gsum pa
75a8(rgyud): dang // bcu gcig pa dang bco lnga pa// dngos grub zhing dang mtshan ma ni// bsnyen pa sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las// tsher gcod pan 'dogs spyod pa dag/ dul dang gdul
75b1(rgyud): dka' zhi ba yi// sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim dang 'brel pa yi// bsnyen pa rdo rje cho ga bzhi// thun mong dngos grub 'brel pa yin// mchog tu gyur pa'i gzhung nyid do// 
75b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs 'brel pa yi// gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o// bla mas sngags kyi lam gyis ni// slob ma yongs su smin bya ba// brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bskur ba/ 
75b3(rgyud): rang gi slob ma bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// ston pas yongs su grol ba yin// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang zhig
75b4(rgyud): dngos med shes rab ste// thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do// // rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grags// rgyun de rnam pa gsum// 'gyur te// gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang // mi 'phrogs
75b5(rgyud): pa yis rab phye ba// bzhi dang rang bzhin rgyu yin te// de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o// bzhi ni thabs zhes bya ba ste// gsum gyis rgyud kyi don bsdus pa'o// rigs ni lnga dang gsum
75b6(rgyud): dag dang // ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya'o// byang chub rdo rje bcas gsungs pa// de ni phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod// de nyid rnam pa lnga ru bshad// gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// lhag pa'i lha ni gsang chen
75b7(rgyud): te// dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// dngos dang dngos mod mi zad gtso// stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa// byang chub sems zhes bya ba yin// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ 
75b8(rgyud): mi phyed phye ba'i dngos po nyid// rig dang lhan cig ldan pas na// rig pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do// rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga// rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// 'chang ba 'dzin zhes grags pa ste/ 
76a1(rgyud): rnam shes rdo rje 'dzin du 'dod// badz+ra d+h+rika ni rnam shes yin// yod dang med dang dbus las 'das// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur las byung // sems can kun gyi
76a2(rgyud): lus yin te// skye las rgyal bas dzi na dzika/ don rnams thams cad 'byung bas na// sems ni rin po che zhes bya// tshor ba pos ni nges tshor bas// tshor ba rat+na d+h+r-ika tu brjod// mtshan gzhi mtshan
76a3(rgyud): nyid dngos po yis// kun la kun gyis thams cad du// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi ni// A ro lika ces bshad pa yin// rnam shes rab mthar phyin byedade pa// gang yin de ni shes rab ste// 
76a4(rgyud): 'du byed sems pas 'dzin pas na// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces bya bar ba shrad// rigs kyi rgyud ces bya bar bshad// rgyud ni thog ma zhes brjod de// mi 'jigs skye ba med gang yin// mgon
76a5(rgyud): bo de ni yin par bshad// rgyu 'bras gnyis le sdang bas na// / rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad// bems po bcings/ pa'i rang bzhin pas// gzugs ni gti mug ces byar
76a6(rgyud): bshad/ bdag tu rlob pa'i ngo bo bas// tshor ba dregs pa yin par bshad// dngos la chags pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'du shes yang dag tshogs bdag nyid// rkyen gyis drangs pa'i bdag nyid can/ 
76a7(rgyud): 'du byed rtag tu phrag dog yin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid// srid pa kun 'byung thams cad du// 'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'i// sems ni 'dod pa zhes byar bshad// dam tshig sna tshogs
76a8(rgyud): 'dra ba yi// mngon phyogs las las skyes 'bras bu// gnyis med ye shes chos rnams la// nga rgyal byed pa rmongs zhes bshad// de la phan tshun 'dzer ba ni// zhe sdang zhes ni bya bar bshad// mtshan
76b1(rgyud): nyid 'dod chags zhen pa yin// ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshad// dga' ba rdzogs pa'i longs spyod mchog/ bud med bde mchog phun sum tshogs// gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang / 
76b2(rgyud): rdo rje la dga' rtag par gnas// des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs// rdo rje thegs pa zhes bshad do// mi 'jig bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid// dngos po kun gyi dam
76b3(rgyud): tshig ste/ de nyid gshin rje mthar byed do// rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni// don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur nyid// sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste// des na rgyal ba shes mthar byed// brjod med
76b4(rgyud): bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ming dang gzugs blo dngos po med// / chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ste// des na khyab bdag pa da mthar byed// mi rtog bdag nyid chos rnams ni// rang bzhin
76b5(rgyud): gyis ni zhi ba'i dngos// rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ste// des na gtsu kho bgegs mthar byed// mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa// brjod du med dang rtog 'bral ba// sangs rgyas byang chub ye/ 
76b6(rgyud): shes 'di// shes na bde ba thob par 'gyur// gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas// gauta mug zad phyir gshin rje gshed// des na lus mthar byed pa ste// des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur/ 
76b7(rgyud): nyes pa nyes pa longs spyod pas// nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed// des na sems ni mthar byed de// des na nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur// 'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas// 'dod chags
76b8(rgyud): zad pas pad mthar byed// des na 'dod chags mthar byed te// de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed 'gyur// nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang // de bzhin las ni thams cad zad// sgrib pa
77a1(rgyud): kun zad ye shes ni// bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrib dag na// las rnams thams cad rnam par dag/ las rnams thams
77a2(rgyud): cad rnam dag pas// las skyes 'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur// gzung dang chags pa nyid dang ni// rnam pa de bzhin mi g.yo dang // rgyu nyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste// drug las thugs ni kun tu 'byung // 
77a3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs drug/ khro bo'i dbang por rnam par grags// dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug/ sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags// rig pa'i rgyal po zhes
77a4(rgyud): bshad do// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug/ rdo rje bdag po zhes bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// bdag nyid chen po kun tu 'byung // thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// phung / 
77a5(rgyud): bo khams dang skye mched gzugs// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sngags pas sbyor ba nges byas la// thams cad/ dag par mos pa yis// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs nas su/ 
77a6(rgyud): dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di la mi bya ci yang med// de bzhin mi bza' yod ma yin// smra bar mi ba cung zad med// rtag tu mi bsam ci yang med// 
77a7(rgyud): mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du mnyam par 'jog/ gang gis sems kun la spyod pa// kun tu spyod pa zhes bshad do// dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi// rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung yid
77a8(rgyud): yid de mAn zhes bya bar bshad// tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don// 'jig rten spyod las rnam grol bar// gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste// rdo rje kun gyis bsrungs pa ni// sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do// 
77b1(rgyud): rang rang gi ni ngo bo nyid// snying po yid kyis rnam bsams te// gsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye ba yis// zlos par byed cing spro zhing bsdu// sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag/ ye shes sa bon dag gis bsdu// 
77b2(rgyud): byang chub bdag med sa bon gyis// brtul zhugs can gyis bdag med gzung // sna tshogs bzhin du sna tshogs spro// dus gsum sa bon dag gis bzla// bzlas pa smra bar grags pas na// ngag
77b3(rgyud): kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la// sngags kun 'bod pa zhes bshad de// de nyid bskul bar smra ba'o// ji ltar thugs sogs byin rlob pa// ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no// de rnams spyi bor dbang
77b4(rgyud): bskur dang // de bzhin kun tu mchod pa'o// rdo rje 'chang ba gang yin pa'i// rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang // bdag byin rlab sogs de bzhin te// de yi longs spyod bzhir shes bya// 
77b5(rgyud): dpa' bo rdo rje gcig pu yi// spyi bor dbang bskur re re ste/ snying po phyag rgya sngags tsam dag/ rang rigs rims kyis rgyas gdab po// 'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas gdab cing // rgyu yis
77b6(rgyud): 'bras bu rgyas gdab par// sgom gyi gzhan du dngos grub ni// bskal pa bye bar 'byung mi 'gyur// longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ 
77b7(rgyud): gru gsum du ni rnam par sgom// kun nas ser ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu de dbus rnam par sgom// rtsibs kun la ni khro bo bcu// ye shes bdag nyid bcu las byung // 'gog pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya// 
77b8(rgyud): zhing // mchog tu mdzes pa bsgrub par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin spros pas// mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor// de ltar chos 'byung ye shes ni// rang bzhin dri ma med zhi ba// bsgoms pas skad
78a1(rgyud): cig nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas spyan ni rab tu 'byung // rdo rje can gyis chos bstan pa// rim pa gnyis la yang dag bsten// bskyed pa yi ni rim nyid dang // de bzhin rdzogs
78a2(rgyud): pa'i rim pa'o// sgrub pa dang ni nan tan dang // dam tshig de bzhin sdom pa rnams// sngar ni de kun rgyas par ni// rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin// gzugs dang sgra sogs 'dod pa ni// bde sdug gnyis
78a3(rgyud): ka'i bdag nyid can// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// rtag tu snying las skye bar 'gyur// chags la 'dod chags rdo rje can// rdo rje 'dra bar rin chen 'byung // rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes// 
78a4(rgyud): 'dod pa de rnams dam tshig mtshungs// rnam bcas dang ni rnam dpa med// kun 'gro yi ge gsum bdag nyid// bya ba dang ni du brog pa dang // spro dang rang gi bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar zhe sdang gti
78a5(rgyud): mug dag/ sa gsum du ni bskyed par bya// gsang ba dag la rgyas gdab cing // rdo rje can gyi don byed do// zhe sdang sbyor ba/ 'i rnal 'byor pas// zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed nas su// rdo rje drag
78a6(rgyud): pos bcom nas ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyis bsdu// de ni spro bas bsdu byas la// de bzhin slar yang bsdu bar bya'o// 'di lta'i sbyor ba goms byas na// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// khams gsum
78a7(rgyud): po ni ma lus pa// bsad dang de bzhin gso ba dang // skad cig tsam gyis byed par ni// mngon du nus par the tsom med// gti mug sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// gti mug 'khor lo bskyed nas ni// rgyan
78a8(rgyud): la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung // de dag thams cad rtag tu sku// gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho sgom// rin chen kun gyis rab tu dgang // gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyis// sbyin pa'i char ni rab tu 'bebras/ 
78b1(rgyud): rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus par// rab tu sbyin dang dbrog pa nyid// sems kyi rdo rje brtan po yis// skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// 'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// 'dod chags
78b2(rgyud): 'khor lo bskyed nas ni// lha mo thams cad phrogs nas su// 'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa spyod// dga' sdug bde ba rangs pa yis// 'dod pa'i rtsed mor rnam par 'phrul// de nas 'khor lo can
78b3(rgyud): kun la/ lha mo rab tu dbul bar bya// khams gsum dag tu byung ba yi// lha dang lha min chung ma yang // skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyod na// mi yi bud med smos ci dgos// dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang
78b4(rgyud): bskur dang // las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dag/ nyamasang su len cing byin rlob pa// grub pa'i bgrod pa gzhan yin no// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes grags dang // byang chub sems
78b5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor dang // lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa/ gsum po dkyil 'khor yin par gsungs// phung po skye mched khams rnams ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas
78b6(rgyud): btab pa'o// de ni rtag par rgya dgod pa// dkyil 'khor zhes ni bstan pa yin// 'dod rgyal dbyig sngon stobs mi g.yo// lcags kyu dbyig pa rtse gsum dang // ral gri mtshams su rnam par dgod/ 
78b7(rgyud): steng du 'khod lo 'og gnod mdzes// rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi// 'khor los bsgyur ba drug gi rgya// sa la sogs pa'i sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya rang gi dkyil 'khor ba// me long pi wang
78b8(rgyud): dung dang ni// de bzhin smod dang sna tshogs ras// chos 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug/ rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje can// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab po// de nas
79a1(rgyud): gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig/ rigs ni kha dog dag gis brtag/ lha mo dgu dang na mkha'i khams// me tog ces ni bshad pa yin// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis
79a2(rgyud): rigs kyi rims kyis dgod par bya// mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bzhugs gnas pho brang yin par bshad// ye shes sems dpas gang reg pa// ye shes 'khor lo zhes bshad do//
