79a3(rgyud): mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge/ sa bon yi ge gnas zhes bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid ni// sad par byas pas bskul bar bshad// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su/ 
79a4(rgyud): 'od zer 'gyed pa gtong ba'o// rdo rje can kun spyan 'dren pas// rdo rje can kun spyan drang ba'o// rdo rje can gyi gnas de yi// 'od dazer gyis ni rdo rje kun// bsdus nas gong bu'i tshul gyis su// bcing
79a5(rgyud): pa bcing ba yin par bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi sa// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsu/ nga thugs kyi rgyas btab ste// ri mo'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// 
79a6(rgyud): dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du// rgyud 'di la ni rab tu brtag/ bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste// bzhi pa de yang de bzhin// 
79a7(rgyud): mig yangs sngags kyi snod du rung // me tog bcas shing sa bon byung // blangs nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// sngags pas slob ma dag la sbyin// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dri chu
79a8(rgyud): rkang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje pad+ma'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// de dag thams cad snying kar bsdu// rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas su// slob ma'i khar ni dpab
79b1(rgyud): bar bya// 'di ni gsang sngags de kun gyi// dbang bskur ba yi go 'phang mchog/ las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// mchog tu dad cing shes rab che/ 
79b2(rgyud): gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'// sbyor ba gcig gis bya ba goms// dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can// bla ma la ni slob ma yis// yon rnams rab tu phul nas ni// bla mas de ni byin rlabs te/ 
79b3(rgyud): sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya// rmongs pas gti mug bdag nyid sbyor// gti mug dga' dang yang dag ldan// gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhe sdang sdang
79b4(rgyud): bi'i bdag nyid sbyor// zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan// zhe sdang rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// chags la 'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor// 'dod
79b5(rgyud): chags dga' dang yang dag ldan// 'dod chags rgyun gyis dang nga bskur na// 'dod chags rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor// rdo rje dga' dang yang dag ldan
79b6(rgyud): ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur// rigs pa'i lha mo de nyid ni// rdo rje can gyi slob mas blang // lag par lag pa bzhag nas ni// de bzhin gshegs
79b7(rgyud): rnams dbang byas la// slob ma'i mgo bor lag bzhag ste// bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsgo// thabs gzhan gyis ni 'tshang mi rgya// de bas rig pa 'di mchog yin// chos kun gnyis su med pa la// 
79b8(rgyud): dngos po gnyis su brtags pa yin// de bas 'khor ba rnam bral ba// rtag tu khyed kyis mi bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pa'o// rmongs pa gang zhig 'das
80a1(rgyud): gyur na/ de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'grub// tha mal lus kyi chos la ni// dri ma lnga rnams snang ba ni// ye shes lnga yis byin rlabs pas// bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya
80a2(rgyud): bar bshad// sbar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang // snang bar bya dang gzugs snang ba// sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya// rdo rje hUM las byung ba ni// bar snang la gnas
80a3(rgyud): bsam par bya// AHlas byung ba'i pad+ma ni// de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya// oM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni// de yi dbus su bzhag par bya// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bya// 'bar bas rnal 'byor tshim
80a4(rgyud): par bya// shos dang mtshungs par snang gyur cing // ye shes nyi ma gnyis par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni// bdud rtsid
80a5(rgyud): ru phab nas kyang // bza' ba'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya// ba sgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza'// yig gsum sa bon las bskyed bya// gzhan
80a6(rgyud): dude ni 'grub mi 'grub// mi snang la sogs dngos grub ni// tha mal ba zhes bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas nyid sgrub sangs rgyas kyis// dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin// thabs ni rnam pa bzhi
80a7(rgyud): po dag/ byang chub rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsngags// bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste// nye bar sgrub pa gnyis pa yin// sgrub pa yang ni
80a8(rgyud): gsum pa yin// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// thun mong mchog gi bye brag gis// bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// rdo rje bzhi po thun mong ste// ye shes bdud rtsi mchog yin no// dang po stong nyid byang chub
80b1(rgyud): ma na // sa ma na pa dang / rjes su na te// smyo ba'i lan la la drug tu // nga po cupa rnams kyi nga//  ga la ga gnas thams cadas
80b2(rgyud): ni da pa so sor sdung bas na// seM sau srung ba zhes bshad / 'dod ba lnga ni mdor bsdus nas// sangs rgyas wA ru sayis// brtag pa bsam gtan zhes bshad de// bsam gtan
80b3(rgyud): de ni rnam lngar 'gyur// rtog dang pyod dang dga' ba dang // de zhin bde ba nyid dang yang // sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dag/ ste// lnga po dar ni bsam gtan bsdu// gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams
80b4(rgyud): cad du// rnam pa du mar yongs poshad pa// gsang ba gsum byung rtog pa ste// de yi longs spyod dpyod pa'o// dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// bde bsdus pa ni bzhi pa'o// shes dang shes bya byung zad pa'i/ 
80b5(rgyud): rang sems lnga par shes par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba ni// 'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs// 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid// gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni// sna
80b6(rgyud): yi rtse mor rab tu brtag/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad// rang sngags snying kar bsams nas ni// srog ni thig ler gyur par bzhag/ rang dbang rin chen dgag pa yi// gzung ba
81a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa yin par bshad// sems ni 'gog pa'i rdo rjer gyur// mtshan ma nyer 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lngar// byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin/ 
81a2(rgyud): smig rgyu 'dra ba dang po ste// du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin// mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa'o// sprin med nam mkha' lta bur ni// rtag tu snang ba lnga pa'o// brtan 'gyur rdo rje'i lam
81a3(rgyud): nas ni// nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya// rjes dran gang zhig rnam sgom pa// de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya// rjes su dran pa zhes bshad de// so sor snang ba de la skye// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas// 
81a4(rgyud): dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa// gong bu'i tshul gyis pa sdus nas ni// dbus su gzugs ni rnam par sgom// yid dkyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa// ting 'dzin ces bya bar gnas// 
81a5(rgyud): so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na// sngags rnams thams cad bri ni gyis rlob// bsam gtan ye shes snyoms 'jug na// mngon shes lnga po thob par 'gyur// srog dang rtsol bas nges
81a6(rgyud): par ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs// rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug/ rdzas dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur// 
81a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni// sgrib pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur// snying po de ni thugs ka ru// zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta// mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni// sems ni sngags kyi dngos bya ste// 
81a8(rgyud): sngags kyi gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni// byang chub tshigs bcad brjod par bya// cho ga yang dag sbyor sgom pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te// sems de ye shes gzugs kyis ni// sgom pa
81b1(rgyud): nye bar sgrub pa'o// ji srid mthong ba de srid du// rnam gnyis zla ba drug tu sgom// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas// thams cad du ni rtag tu bya// gal te zla ba drug gis ni// ji skad gsungs pa ma mthong na/ 
81b2(rgyud): ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang // sdom pas lan gsum brtsam par bya// de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa pos// mthong bar 'byung bar ma gyur cing // gang tshe byang chub ma grub na// drag shul sbyor bas bsgrub par/ 
81b3(rgyud): bya// de'i tshe de yi ye shes ni// 'grub pa nges par nye bar 'byung // rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje phur bus phur bu gdab// de nas dbang du bye ba dang // bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya// 
81b4(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ni// ye shes 'khor lo can rna mas bsdu// lha mo dgu ni spros nas su// bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dgod// yongs su gyur las phyag rgya bzhi// dkyil
81b5(rgyud): 'khor der ni brtag par bya// bdag nyid dbus su gnas bya la// 'khor lo can kun bsdu bar bya// thams cad rdo rje'i dngos byas la// de 'og byang chub bsgom par bya// bskul
81b6(rgyud): ba'i klu dbyangs bzhi yis ni// lha mos snying po bskul ba yis// dus gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin sems// ye shes lta bur lus sgom mo// bzhi yi sau kha dog rnam par da bye// de bzhin nyams kyi snying po ste
81b7(rgyud): dbang bskur bas ni rang gi rgyu// bzhi yis 'bras bu phye ba yin// sngags kyis chos ni byed 'gyur la// rig pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po drug/ gtsug tor zhes ni
81b8(rgyud): rnam par grags// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i longs spyod bzhi// rig pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags// de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag po rnams// 'dod pa thams cad ces byar bshad// bsam gtan rdo rjes thams cad
82a1(rgyud): la// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu bsngags// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// gnyis su med par byed
82a2(rgyud): sgrub pa// sngar bshad pa yi rim gyis ni// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// bdag dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bskyed// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// bsnyen pa'i dus su gtsug tor che// sbyor ba nyid
82a3(rgyud): kyi gzugs su dmigs// nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs kyi bar// sngags pa cho ga shes pa yis// sgrub pa rang lha'i sbyor bas bya// sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni/ 
82a4(rgyud): gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku// 'di ni rdo rje can kun dang / rnal 'byor mchog gi gsang ba che// de lha'i rnam phyes shes byas nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// 
82a5(rgyud): gzhan du bskal pa bye bas ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams kyis kyang // dngos grub mchog ni zhi ba dag/ nges par 'byung khar mi 'gyur ro// bsgrub bya sgrub par yang dag sbyor// gang
82a6(rgyud): yin da ni bsnyen par bshad// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do// yi ge hUM dang phaT ldan pa// bskyod pa sgrub pa zhes bshad la// ngo bo nyid ni zhi bde ba// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad
82a7(rgyud): do/ bcom ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs las byung // de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do// las dang rjes 'thun gang gang gis// rnal
82a8(rgyud): 'byor pa yis sbyor ba dmigs// dkyil 'khor da dang de bskyed nas// dam tshig mi zad bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig dang po bsrung bar bya// de nas gtsug tor dam tshig ni/ 
82b1(rgyud): cho ga ji skad gsungs las byung // las dang gang gang rjes 'thun pas// rang gi 'khor la bka' yang bsgo// bsgrub bya'i lus gang yin pa la'ang // dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su
82b2(rgyud): de yi lus gnas 'khor lo la// de yi nyes pa bsgrag par bya// de nas de rnams de bcom nas// byung bar gyur par rnam par bsgom// dngos po kun gyis rnam bsgoms nas// dngos po kun gyis drangs nas
82b3(rgyud): ni// de ni rang gi 'khor lor gzhug/ ji skad gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis// de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// khro bas khyab pa'i sems kyis ni// rkang pas mtshan ma mnan par bya// de nas bka'
82b4(rgyud): mnos khro bo ni// sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams// sgrub pa rdo rje can gyis ni// bsgrub bya bsad phyir btang bar bya// khro bo'i rgyal po des bskor nas// de ni bcings shing brdeg pa dang // 
82b5(rgyud): de nas brdungs shing skrag gyur pa// sgrub pa pos ni dgug par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni// de yi gzugs brnyan la phab nas// sngags pas rdo rje dag gis ni// spyi bo mgrin
82b6(rgyud): pa snying kha ru// phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bu gdab// yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun// sna tshogs yul las byung ba rnams// gzugs de la ni phab nas su// de rnams kyi ni phur bus gdab/ 
82b7(rgyud): de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis// cho ga ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyor la sogs// las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya// mtshan ma mnan nas bzlas pa pa 'am// 
82b8(rgyud): khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gam// bsgoms pas gdugs pa'i sems can ni// zos par gyur par rab tu brtag/ zhi la zhi bo'i sems kyis bya// rgyas la dga' ba'i yid kyis te/ 
83a1(rgyud): dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya// khro ba gtum pas rab tu sgrub// zhes pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byung / 
83a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi the tsom thams cad bcad par mdzad nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs te/ de nyid kyi
83a3(rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
83a4(rgyud): cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do// thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsung la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thams cad thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams/ 
83a5(rgyud): cad mdzad la phyag 'dud// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// sdug sung thugs ni thob 'gyur bas// sems can sangs rgya sa mi mnyam mnyam// bsgrub bya su yin sgrub po gang // 
83a6(rgyud): sgrub pa'i dbang po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis// ji ltar sdig pas gos mi 'gyur// gal te gos 'gyur 'bras bu gang // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
83a7(rgyud): cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// bdag nyid chen po legs so legs// gsung
83a8(rgyud): dbyangs chen po legs so legs// mchod pa chen po legs so legs// slob dpon byang chub rdo rje can// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ dngos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin// bskyed dang
83b1(rgyud): sdud par mdzad pa bo// des na de yi sdig mi 'byung // bsod nams ngag kyang de bzhin te// gang la srog dang bsod nams med// de ni byang chub yin par gsungs// mgon po de yi slu ba yis// lus
83b2(rgyud): can thams cad 'jig mdzad kyang // ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur zhing // byang chub kyang ni rnyed mi dka'// sngon ni mi bzad las byas pas// gal te dmyal ba rnams su ni// skye bo skye 'gyur de rnams kyi// 
83b3(rgyud): dmyal ba rnams kyi 'bras bu che// byang chub rdo rjes bsgrub bya 'di// ye shes kyis ni rgyas btab pas// sems can rnams kyis sbyor ba des// mchog tu phan btags shes par bya// tshar gcod
83b4(rgyud): pa dang rjes bzung las// bdag nyi chen po de yis bya// sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thugs par// byas nas las rnamasab rtsam par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
83b5(rgyud): chen po de rnams rdo rje can gyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyis chos zla/ sa pas dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis legs zhes gsol to// mgon po chen po legs so lags// thub
83b6(rgyud): pa chen po legs so legs// chos rnams chen po lags so legs// thugs rje chen po legs so legs// e ma'o kun tu bzang po yi// thugs rje chen po dri ma med// gdug pa mi bzad las
83b7(rgyud): kyis kyang // sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
83b8(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing skrag par yang mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
84a1(rgyud): byang chub rdo rje las byung ba// zhe sdang rdo rje che la sogs// sngags kyi rgyud ni bsdus bdag/ yongs su spang bar mi bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
84a2(rgyud): po de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su gcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// dus gsum rdo rje'i thugs yin srid thar gyur gang // zhi zhing
84a3(rgyud): sgrib med nam mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas rnam rgyas byang chub dbang phyug rdo rje can// de la lus ngag yid kyi rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang / 
84a4(rgyud): rnam par shes dang skye mched drug dang dbang po drug/ sa chu me dang / rlung dang nam mkha' thams cad ni// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags
84a5(rgyud): rdo rje chos bcas gang // rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'brel bar// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas myos pa'i dang sa gyur pa// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// 
84a6(rgyud): spro dang dga' dang rnam pa de bzhin mi 'gyur dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems su rjes thogs chos// rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chags sgrib pa rdo rje ste// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshalo// / 
84a7(rgyud): gang zhig thog med dngos po rnam dag 'di sgom pa// thabs dang shes rab las byung spros dang rnam par bral// gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyor ba rtag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag
84a8(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'di sgom zhing // bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang // sgrub pa chen pos blo mi 'gyur ba'i sgrub dbang po// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag
84b1(rgyud): 'tshal/ gang shig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrub byed pa// mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang dman 'grub cing // bla ma'i drin gyis 'di nam nor lam rtogs pa// byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba lta de la rtag phyag
84b2(rgyud): 'tshal// gang zhig rab gsang 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di nyan pa dang // 'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni sems pa dang // mchod par byed pa dang ni 'dri 'am 'drir 'jug pa// byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag
84b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// gang du zhi sogs las tshogs shin tu brtags pa yis// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi cho ga de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i// bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po ni// byang chub rdo rje
84b4(rgyud): 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang gis gtso bo sgrub pa po/ mthong reg pa dang // legs par dran dang ming tsam ngas/ bar thos pa dang // dad par byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig
84b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa dag/ byang chub rdo rje 'drar blta de la rtag phyag 'tshal/ bstod pa'i tshig ni zhi ba 'dis// 'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod chen la// mgon po de dag
84b6(rgyud): rjes yi rang // 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yi// rgyud 'di legs par gsungs pa yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
84b7(rgyud): de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sku dang gsung
84b8(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cing mi gsung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung deng thugs kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dus pa las/ gsang ba thams cad ston pa rdo rje'i
85a1(rgyud): ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsar+ya shu kar barma dang // 
85a2(rgyud): zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ san d+hi byA ka ra Na nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dgongs pa lung
85a3(rgyud): bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos// shin tu gsang ba'i dus gcig na// gsang gtso rdo rje bcom ldan
85a4(rgyud): 'das// dam tshig mchog ni rdo rje gsum// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// yon tan phun tshogs bsam mi khyab// yod med mtha' gnyis las 'das pas// gnas med pa lagan
85a5(rgyud): zhes bya// nam mkha' rang bzhin gcig pa 'dir// kun ma lce ni ye shes rnam sgom pa// 'gro snying rnam dag ces bya la// thub pa chen po bzhugs pa yin// ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang // 
85a6(rgyud): rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs// skye mched drug dang reg pa dang // tshor ba dang ni sred pa dang // nyer len srid pa skye ba dang // rga shi zhes bya rig ma yin// nga rgyal che ba'i nga rgyal dang // nga'o snyam pa
85a7(rgyud): rgyal mngon nga rgyal// gzhan yang nga rgyal las nga rgyal// cung zad nga rgyal log par bcas// 'di dag rdo rje mtha' can mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de rnams brjod mi
85a8(rgyud): lang ba'i grangs// brjod kyis mi lang nyid du gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med pa'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs mnyam pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen// til gyi gang bu mtshungs pa dang // 
85b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang // na mkha'i khams kun gang bar snang // de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ 
85b2(rgyud): de nyid gsum skyes skur mdzad do// tshangs pa khyab 'jug lha chen dang // 'dod dang rig byed de bzhin zung // tshangs lha de bzhin zla ba ste// phung po la sogs grangs dang mnyam// sgra sgrogs de bzhin
85b3(rgyud): dga' byed dang // skye bseng skem byed thub pa dang // sna yon dang ni dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs kun gcig pu nyid// de tshe phyung la gsol ba yi// gsang sngags gsungs pa dang po
85b4(rgyud): nyid// thub chen byang chub sems tshul du// mdzad pa gnyis ba yin par bshad// rnam lnga mngon par byang chub pa'i// phra mo rnal 'byor gsum pa yin// dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa
85b5(rgyud): bzhi// gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid bzhi pa// srung ba'i/ bslab bzhi rnam bzhi dang // spyod pa'ang 'dir ni lnga pa ste drug pa rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi// ting 'dzin phra mo'i rnal 'byor
85b6(rgyud): ro/ bdun pa de nyid mchod par bshad// gsang ba'i dbang du gtso bos mdzad// phyag rgyas dbang bskur brgyad pa bstan// dam tshig bzhi po dgu pa yin// rnam pa bcur phye yang dag rtog/ bzlas
85b7(rgyud): pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa yin// bcu gcig ming du byung ba ni// phyag rgya gcig par bshad dkyil 'khor// bcu gnyis pa yi bdag nyid sku// nyan thos byang chub ston par mdzad// de bzhin rig
85b8(rgyud): ba spyod grub pa// mngon shes lnga ni bcu gsum pa// bcu dang bzhi par bzhi po dang // phreng sngags bla ma ston par mdzad// phyogs dang skya bseng nyid gyur pa// dngos grub dkyil 'khor bla med pa'o// sgra
86a1(rgyud): sgrogs dus dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor rdul tshon ldan pa'o// slob ma dbang bskur nyi zla dag/ chags bral sna tshogs nyid gyur pa// sna tshogs tshig gi don gyi brda'// swa/ 
86a2(rgyud): tshogs ming can ming gcig pu// de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// so sor sdud pa rab tu bstan// gcig dang du ma las grol ba// yang dag mthong nas yongs su sgom// yongs su bsgoms par gyur/ 
86a3(rgyud): ba'i bdag/ rten 'brel du yang bstan par bya// de nas ma skyes sbyor ba la// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad che// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i// ting 'dzin de 'og ston par mdzad// 'dod pa'i yan
86a4(rgyud): lag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gnyis pa thams cad de bzhin ga/ gshegs// 'dod chags che tshul zhes bya ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin gshegs kun gtso bo yi// 
86a5(rgyud): rang gi sku la zhugs par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' che// rgyun de ni sbyor bar gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 
86a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs bdag mnyes bya'i phyir// de rnams zhugs nas byung gyur pa// srog dang gyen rgyu thur sel dang // mnyam gnas khyab byed ces bya dang // klu dang rul sbal rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin
86a7(rgyud): gzhu rgyal zhes bya ba// 'di dag tu ni nyid sku mdzad// bud med gzugs su slar sprul te// rang gi ngo bo ji bzhin du// de yi sku las byung bar gyur// de nyid gsum ni mnyam sbyor las// rang gi gsang sngags de dag
86a8(rgyud): sgom// yan lag kun las nges grol zhing // shin tu phra ba nyid du gyur// dbu dgos ming las byung ba ni// zhi gnas dang ni lhag mthong ste/ dngos med ngo bo nyid yin pas// rang nyid kyang ni mi sheso// 'on kyang 'di ltar
86b1(rgyud): thub pa la// de bzhin gshegs rnams gsol ba 'debs// bcom ldan dgongs pa lung bstan pa// chos kyi mchog ni bstan du gsol// khyab bdag khyed ni chos 'di rnams// dngos med nyid ni thug/ 
86b2(rgyud): su chud// 'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mdzes// gang zhig yang dag shes gyur na// 'jig rten pa dang rtsod med cing // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dang // 'jig rten shin tu
86b3(rgyud): 'das de bzhin// gang 'di zhi ba nyid kyi chos// zhi gnas shin tu sngon 'gro ba// byang chub sems dpas thos na yang // de bzhin nyid kyi bde ba byed// de nas sa snying la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'
86b4(rgyud): sems dpa' che// mgon po rnam snang chen po la// de dag gis ni zhus gyur pa// gang shes bla med byang chub ni// ma 'ongs skye pos thos 'gyur ba'i// gsang sngags de nyid don 'byung ba// rnal
86b5(rgyud): 'byor bcom ldan bshad du gsol// lan gnyis gsol// yang mgon po ni// mi gsung b.ro ni rnam par bzhugs// rdo rje can gyis de shes nas// de nas slar yang zhus par 'gyur// 
86b6(rgyud): gang 'di zhi gnas la sogs pa'i// rnal 'byor zab mo bla med pa// de ni 'di ltar bsngags pas bsngags// 'tshal 'gyur de ni gtso bos gsungs// bya ba dag bya'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor 'ba' zhig
86b7(rgyud): pa nyid dang // lung ni yang dag gang yin pa// de ni bstan par mdzad pa'i rigs// zhus pa'i don ni mkhyen nas ni// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// gsang sngags tshul ni mchog gyur 'di// gsang ba/ 
86b8(rgyud): khyod la bstan par bya// 'di skad ces bya'i gsang sngags che// gsang sngags kun don sngar ster ba'o// der ni lnga yi bdag gyur cing // sbyor ba bzhi dang bcu yi bdag/ lnga pa lnga po'i ming 'di ni// 
87a1(rgyud): gsal dang mi gsal dag tu sbyar// rgya mngon phyogs pa'i sbyor bshad pa// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan pa yin// bcu bdun zhes ni bshad pa 'di'i// gsungs pa'i don de/ 
87a2(rgyud): ma shes pas// sngags pas gsang sngags sbyor ba dag/ de tshe ji ltar byed par 'gyur// don 'di rtogs par gyur nas ni// sna tshogs don ni ston pa dang // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// gsang sngags rig
87a3(rgyud): ba mchog rnams byed// bdag ni stong dang yang dag sbyar// yi ge a ni steng du gnas// phye ma zhes bya gnas byas ga/ sngags pas sems can don rnams bya// yi ge a gnyis sbyar ba gang // a sgo las
87a4(rgyud): skyes nyid du 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs kyi rnam pa de// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid// gang zhig 'di las gsungs pa ni// / bsam mi khyab pa'i thabs chos nyid// bdag gis zhe
87a5(rgyud): rtogs de 'gyur ba// thogs med rtogs pa 'di gan so// ston pa po dang bstan dang gnas// phra rab tsam gyi ngo bo med// kun rdzob dus gsum sbyor gcig la// sngags pa rnams
87a6(rgyud): kyis thos de 'gyur// shin tu grangs med bskal pa ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang mkhyen pa// sngags pa rnams kyis dus gcig na// skad cig la rdzogs byang chub thob// kun mkhyen kun rig
87a7(rgyud): thugs chud pa// gsang sngags ston pa'i chos can te// de nyid kho na bcom ldan mchog/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las skyes// mi rtog na mkha' ji bzhin de// gsang sngags thams cad nyi ma 'dra// sa
87a8(rgyud): la rlung bzhin sngags pa ni// 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod// thams cad 'gyur ba gang gang yin// de de stong pa nyid du 'gyur// de bzhin sbyor ba de mthong bas// kun rig de ni de bzhin gshegs
87b1(rgyud): de bzhin nyid gzugs brnyan gyur pa// de ni sku yi rdo rjer gyur// 'gro ba yang dag tshim par 'byung // mi phyed gsung gi rdo rjer gyur// na mkha'i gnas kyi sbyor ba gang // bsam mi khyab par spro bdag nyid// 
87b2(rgyud): de nyid ye shes rgya mtsho la// thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag 'byung // sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// nam mkha' yongs su brtags pa ste// de yang de ru kun gnas pas// bud med chos gcig pu yi
87b3(rgyud): gzugs// sangs rgyas kun gyis gang brten pa// sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa// de ni bud med ces bshad de// de bas chos de b+ha ga yin// bya ba la sogs ji skad bshad// dam tshig gsum po
87b4(rgyud): gcig tu gyur// dngos med chos nyid gcig pu ru// 'di ni de/ dag mnyam par 'gyur// dam tshig sku gsung thugs da dang ni// ting 'dzin de bzhin rgyal ba dang // sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ 
87b5(rgyud): rlung dang na mkha' nyid dag dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// rag dang de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'di rnams rdo rje'i mtha' can byung // byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// de ltar brjod
87b6(rgyud): mi yang zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba nyid gyur rnams// sangs rgyas zhing gi ri rab kyi// rdul phran gyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang // nam mkha' mnyam pa'i de bzhin
87b7(rgyud): gshegs// mi bskyod rnam snang mdzad rin chen// dpag med tshe dang gdon mi za// 'di dag na mkha'i khams mnyam pa'i// rdo rje snying po de bzhin gshegs// dper na til 'bru mtshungs pa yi// de
87b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i khams ni yongs khengs pa// de rnams der ni yang dag snang // de nas mgon po rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin nyid dang gcig tu gyur// gang yang dam/ 
88a1(rgyud): tshig sngon 'gro dang // sku rdo rje sogs ming can gyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang // don yod thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'di rnams sku yi yan lag
88a2(rgyud): grags// zhi gnas bsam mi khyab las byung // ma skyes gcig pu gzigs pa ni// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul du gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog gi/ ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// 
88a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi tshogs// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun// de ni rnam par snang mdzad che// 'di nyid mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// nyid sku bud med nyid du mdzad// de nas mgon po bsam yas
88a4(rgyud): las/ bud med gzugs su byung bar gyur// de ni sangs rgyas/ spyan 'dra dang // mA ma kI 'dra sbyor ba dang // gos dkar mo 'a dra'i gzugs dang ni// sgrol ma'i gzugasu yang dag gnas/ 
88a5(rgyud): sgra yi ngo bo'i gzugs can dang // dri yi ngo bo'i gzugs dang ni// de bzhin ro yi ngo bo'i gzugs// reg gi ngo bo'i gzugs ca na dang // la la gzugs kyi ngo bo yis// de bzhin gshegs
88a6(rgyud): pa de rnams bzhugs// de nas tshul gsum don gcig dang // mi bskyod pa yang bstan phyir dang // 'jig rten rgyang pan gdul don du// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul byung ngo // gnyis med mnyam pa nyid
88a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor// rdo rje bud med b+ha ga mchog/ dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// de ni mi bskyod yang dag bri// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbyor bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba nyid// dri ma med par byin rlabs pa/ 
88a8(rgyud): kun nas shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab// 'bar ba mang pos rnam par 'khrug/ gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// 
88b1(rgyud): de nas de ni bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su yang // rnam par bzhag ste bzhugs par gyur// mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang // don grub rna/ 
88b2(rgyud): snang de bzhin gshegs// de rnams byang chub sems rdo rje'i// thugs la rnam par bzhugs par gyur// de rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems// dngos med ngo bor
88b3(rgyud): gcig par ni// mkha' 'dra rdo rje las byung gzigs// shes rab ting 'dzin gzhi gcig pu// de ni grib ma ltar thugs chud// rdo rje'i rang bzhin skur mdzad nas// 'gro don mnyam dang mi mnyam mdzad/ 
88b4(rgyud): ji ltar mtshams gnas nyi ma yis// 'gro ba gnyid log sad dpar byed// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa kun// byang chub sems kyis sad par byed// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje gcig/ 
88b5(rgyud): de rnams skye bar bzhed pa yis// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo yis// rdo rje'i sngags su mdzad par gyur// rig pa skyes bu'i gzu gas dag ni// sngags kyis byin rlabs bla na med// der ni
88b6(rgyud): zhal gsum pa lta bur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gzigs// de nas mgon po bcom ldan gyi// thugs rdzas bzhugs pa las byung ste// byang chub sems ni rab bskor la// lan gsum ched du
88b7(rgyud): brjod pa mdzad// bsam mi khyab cing dpag med gang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje byang chub sems gcig las// spyod yul der ni gyur pa yin// de nas gsang tshul thos pa dang // de 'og
88b8(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad la// ji bzhin tshul du de btud zhus// phung po khams la sogs pa'i chos// 'dus la gang zhig gnas pa'i rnams// rten 'brel las skyes yin
89a1(rgyud): par ni// khyed chos ston par mdzad pas khums// dman pa'i chos rnams 'di dag ni// zhe sdang la sogs rkyen dang ldan// 'di dag ji ltar bde gshegs dang // rdzu 'phrul
89a2(rgyud): chen po rigs ma lags// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen de// lus la sogs pa ji ltar 'gyur// gang zhig phyi dus skye bo yis// 'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// / 
89a3(rgyud): 'od chen ldan pas bka' stsal pa// ma 'ongs skye bo mthong nas ni// gang zhig khyod kyis 'dris pa// legs so legs so sems dpa' che// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so// smras don ji lta ji lta
89a4(rgyud): bar de ltar khyod la lung bstan bya// ma 'ongs dus na mi rnams ni// 'jig rten rgyang pan mchog gzhol 'gyur// log par lta ba la gnas te// ci dga' bar yang spyod par byed// la la
89a5(rgyud): glu dang gar la dga'// dgod dang sgrig la mchog tu gzhol// dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing // de bzhin 'khrig pa la dag/ ra 'gyur// rmongs pa la la sdang ba dang // de bzhin gti mug la
89a6(rgyud): rab gzhol// la la de bzhin 'dod chags zhe na// shes pa gzhan dag 'dod par 'gyur// nya dang sha dang de bzhin chang // gshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni// skyes bu glen pa za byed cing // med par smra ba
89a7(rgyud): chos su sgrogs// ma dang sring mo la sogs pa// bgrod min la ni bgrod pa dang // pha dang ma yang gsod pa dang // de bzhin srog chags gzhan rnams gsod// brdzun gyi tshig nyid smra ba dang // khyad par du
89a8(rgyud): yang brku ba dang // gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing // smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur// la la dam chos spong ba dang // de bzhin mtshams med byed pa ste// sna tshogs sdig pa byas nas kyang // sngags
89b1(rgyud): pa dngos grub 'dod par 'gyur// gzer nang dug dang sbyar ba'i drug/ sna tshogs nad ni mi bzad pa// 'di rnams kyis ni gzir gyur nas// ni ba nyid ni 'dod par 'gyur// 'dor bar byed pa rmongs pa de/ 
89b2(rgyud): mi bzad sdig pa byas pa dang // log par lta la mchog gzhol rnams// ngan song gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur// de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// gsang ba 'di ltar bstan pa yin// gang zhig yang
89b3(rgyud): dag thob pa nyid// 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i bdag po mkhas rnams kyis// tshul mchog 'di ni rnyed gyur nas// don gsal yang dag rnyed pa dang // de yang nga rgyal dag tu ltung
89b4(rgyud): de rnams ting 'dzin zhi nyid dang // shes rab nyid kyang shin tu ring // rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor pa ni bdag nyi dra ces// mngon pa'i nga rgyal la rtag dga'// rgyu dang bcos
89b5(rgyud): ma'i chos dang ldan// mya ngan 'das dang gzhan 'gro ba// phan/ tshun dag ni sun yang 'byin// gsang sngags smra ba la brte/ na nas// gcig la gcig ni rtsod par 'gyur// de rnams
89b6(rgyud): bdud kyi byin rlabs kyis// gal te dngos grub phra thob na// des ni mngon par nga rgyal bas// mkhas pa snyam du shes par 'gyur// tshogs pa'i nang du rtsod pa dang // khyi bzhin kha zas la spyod yul// 
89b7(rgyud): rang las 'bras las byung ba yi// phan pa la ni gnod pa byed// de rnams dge dang mi dge rnams// bdag cag rnams kyi stobs yin zer// mngon sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi// slob dpon smod cing
89b8(rgyud): bsnyen bkur med// skad cig gcig gis sdang byed cing // de la skad cig gis rjes chags// khyi dang phag dang khwa rnams kyi// spyod pa dag ni ston par byed// de rnams phan tshun rnam 'tshe bar// 
90a1(rgyud): mngon par dga' bar byed par 'gyur// gsang ba 'dus pa mi shes par// dam tshig la sogs byed par 'gyur// gsang ba srung bar mi byed par// thams cad du ni ston
90a2(rgyud): par byed// 'jig rten la ni smad byas nas// gzhan dag la yang rab gsal byed// bdag nyid rtsa ba med par ni// dam tshig 'das par byed par 'gyur// sgra bcas spror ldan gyis bskur bas// rang la rang / 
90a3(rgyud): gi glags rnyed med// de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi// ting 'dzin de yis shes mi 'gyur// nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir// mngon spyod rab tu byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor rab sbyor dman pa yi// sngags pa
90a4(rgyud): rnams ni 'grub mi 'gyur// phyi rol bstan bcos la rtag dag da'// de yi sbyor la gcig tu mkhas// rang gi dam tshig yo ngas spangs nas// lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod// sngags
90a5(rgyud): dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams 'tsho ba sgrub par 'gyur// gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar// dam pa'i chos ni ston par/ byed// de rnams yang dag sdud byed pa'i// gsang ba dgongs
90a6(rgyud): pas bshad pa yin// dam tshig nyams te gnas pa rnams// 'di yis thams cad dgug par bya// rang gi rjes rig mi shes na// de rnams zhi bar ga la 'gyur// de bas rjes su gzung don du// tshul
90a7(rgyud): 'di dag ni gyur pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs// gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas su// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// rang mchod de nyid dam tshig sprin// yang dag 'byung
90a8(rgyud): bas legs mchod de// phyag 'tshal nas ni 'di skad gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun bsdus pa// 'dus pa gnyis med rnal 'byor pa'i// nyams dga'
90b1(rgyud): rdo rje snying po di // de nyid bsdus pa rnams kyi mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun la// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsus pa// gang yang 'di ltar gsom/ 
90b2(rgyud): 'debs pa// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs so legs// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rnams kyang // the tsom skye bar byed yin na// byang chub sems gzhan ci smos shes// de bzhin gshegs de
90b3(rgyud): rnams la gsungs// de nas ngo mtshar rmad byung nas// the tsom thams cad gcod mdzad pa'i// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyiso// bdag po la ni 'di skad zhus// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs
90b4(rgyud): kun gyis// yon tan kun gyis phul phyung yang // gtso bo 'di/ da ni ston mdzad par// ji ltar spro ba mnga' ma gyur// byin gyi/ sa brlab pa'i gnas mdzad de// de bzhin gshegs yid bde/ 
90b5(rgyud): la sogs// ye shes rgyu 'bras thob pa'i phyir// da ni yang dag / bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po na // de rnams zhu bar mkhyen nas su// ye shes sgron ma rdo rje grag
90b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin ni sdang rigs 'byung ba// gtso bos mi bskyod snying po ni// sku gsung thugs ni dpal ldan pas// de nas yang dag phyung ba ni// badz+ra d+h+r-ig ces bya ba'i sngags// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis
90b7(rgyud): zhe sdang rigs byung las skyes pa// de ni rig pa skyes bur 'gyur// mi bskyod rgya chen thabs kyis sbyor// zhal gsum gnag dang dkar dang dmar// bdag nyid chen po de zhal yin// rdo rje gsum 'dir
90b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// bzhugs pa ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// dam tshig 'byung rdor zhes bya yi// ting 'dzin la gtso bo ni// snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzod// 
91a1(rgyud): de nas dzi na jig ces pa'i// snying po de bzhin yang dag phyung // de nas gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang // gti mug rigs byung las skyes pa// rig bcas skyes bur gyur pa ni/ 
91a2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs// dkar dang gnag dang dmar bcas pa'i// zhal gyis mdun du bzhugs par gyur// de nas rin chen byung ba yi// dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms par
91a3(rgyud): zhugs nas bde gshegs kun// bde dang yid bder gyur pa'i phyir// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rigs// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po 'di// de nas rat+na d+h+r-ika ces bya'i// snying po dpal ldan
91a4(rgyud): de che phyung // de ni phyung ba tsam gyis ni// rig dang bcas pa'i skye/ sa bur gyur// ser dang dkar dang gnag pa yi// zhal/ dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni// rdo rje gsum gyi bdag po yi// 
91a5(rgyud): lho phyogs logs su bzhugs par gyur// de yang byad du gzi gas gyur te// mnyam nyid ye shes zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan bdag po de// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig bdag/ 
91a6(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po'i las byung ba// rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yi// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// 'dod chags chen po'i rigs las byung // A ro li ka ces bya snying po// rdo rje gsum las de nas phyung // 
91a7(rgyud): de nas phyung ba tsam gyis ni// de 'og bcom ldan gtso bo ni// rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// 'jig rten dbang po 'od dang mtshungs// dmar dang dkar dang gnag pa'i zhal// dpal ldan rigs
91a8(rgyud): chen po yi bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdeg po yi// nub phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod dmatshig ces bya ba'i// ting 'dzin rdo rje yang dag byung / 
91b1(rgyud): gtso bo de la snyoms zhugs nas// snying po mchog gi mchog ces bya'o// dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i rigs// snying po pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces pa// rdo rje gsum zhes bya las 'byung // de nas phyung ba tsam
91b2(rgyud): gyis ni// don yod rdo rje sbyor ba yi// de nyid mgon po bcom ldan 'das// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// rig dang bcas pa'i skyes bur gyur// ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal// de bzhin ga
91b3(rgyud): pa'i bdag po yi// byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par gyur// zhe sdang gti mug rigs dang ni// de bzhin yid bzhin rin chen dang // 'dod chags dam tshig ces bya ba// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrubs pa'o// / 
91b4(rgyud): de nas khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags dam tshig 'byung ba yi/  / ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// rdo rje 'dzin pa btsun mo ma chog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// dam pa dag ni phyung ba
91b5(rgyud): 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gcig pa// yum zhes bya ba/ ra yang dag bshad// de ni de bzhin gshegs bdag po// gang phyir lha mo btsun mo mchog/ sku dang gsung dang thugs lnga
91b6(rgyud): byung // dwe Sha ra ti zhes par grags// rig pa sras bu zhes bya ba'i// de ni bud med gzugs 'dzin nam// zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs kyis ni// me yi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas rjes mnyes
91b7(rgyud): rdo rje grags// sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung // ting 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste// rdo rje gsum las byung ba ni// de ni mo ha ra ti ste// gang phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang // rig pa skyes bu byung ba ste/ 
91b8(rgyud): zhal gsum lta bu'i rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sangs rgyas kun gyis yid 'ong cig/ gsang ba bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yis// bden bral phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// 
92a1(rgyud): de nas rjes chags rdo rje zhes// bya ba rdo rje gsum las skyes// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// bde ba chen po phyung ba ni// 'di ltar rA ga ra ti byung // zhal gsum pa mi
92a2(rgyud): gzugs can de// gtso bo bud med gzugs 'dzin pa// de ni rig pa skyes bur gyur// gos med ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo ste// 
92a3(rgyud): rlung gi phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag po// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig can// slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun btsun
92a4(rgyud): mo mchog/ zhal gsum lta bu'i gzugs can ma// badz+ra ra ti/ zhes bya ba// rdo rje gsum las phyung bar gyur// de ni phyung ma thag tu yang // gtso bo rig pa skyes bur gyur// bud med kyi ni
92a5(rgyud): gzugs 'dzin te// dbang ldan phyogs su rnam par bzhugs// / de nas bcom ldan mgon po de// rnam snang rdo rje las byung / ba'i// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// sku gsung thugs
92a6(rgyud): kyi rdo rje la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gshin rje gshed// khro bo chen po phyung ba dang // phyung nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// bsnyengs par bya bar shar phyogs bzhugs// de nas bdag po bcom ldan
92a7(rgyud): 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mngon byang rdo rje zhes pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// khro bo chen po phyung ba ni// pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita rdo rje can// de nas dpal ldan phyung ba ni// rig pa
92a8(rgyud): skyes bur yang dag phyung // dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba las// 'od chen phur bu'i gzugs lta bu// rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs byed pa// lho yi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// de nas rin chen 'byung
92b1(rgyud): gnas grags// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor// rdo rje gsum las khro bo che// pad+mAn+ta kr-ita 'ong po che// bdag po de nas byung bar gyur// de nas phyung ba
92b2(rgyud): gyis 'dir// gtso bo'i rig pa skyes bur bcas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ang // gsung gi tshul du rnam sprul zhing // gos med ye shes bla med pa// nub kyi sgor ni zhugs par gyur// 
92b3(rgyud): bcom ldan de nyid sna tshogs pa// thugs kyi rdo rje ting 'dzin la// kun nas snyoms par zhugs nas ni// de nas gtso bos phyung bar gyur// khro bo chen po rnam phyung ba// kun nas bgegs mthar byed pa ste/ 
92b4(rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// byang gi sgor ni rnam parabazhugs// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khodar mchog 'di thos pa dang // mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che// 
92b5(rgyud): de la slar yang zhus gyur pa// mkha' dang dbyer med sbyor gcig cing // dngos med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dga' kha'i mchog sogs bgyis nas ni// ji ltar de rnams zhu bar
92b6(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'di dag thog mtha' yod min na// 'di yi gtso bo ji ltar 'gyur// phyogs kyi cha rnams bzhag pa la// 'di ni gang gis rnam par sbyang // gsang ba 'di ni mi srid ces// theg pa gsum po
92b7(rgyud): rtog pa dang // so so'i skye bo'i tshig gis kyang // spang ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// gang zhig nyan thos rnams dang ni// de bzhin mdo sde las spangs pa'i// zhe sdang sogs dang 'dod lnga sogs// de bzhin
92b8(rgyud): gshegs rnams bsten mdzad pa// rjes su spyod dang thun mong ba'i// bya ba de dag phyin ci log/ dga' mtha'i spyod pa de rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs de rnams mdzad pa// tshig gcig la ni dpag med// 
93a1(rgyud): don// gsang ba dam pa 'di dag ni// mgon po gang zhig ma 'ongs pa'i// skye bos ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje tshul 'di ni/ 
93a2(rgyud): dgongs pa gsang ba bla med pa// dris pa rnams ni bshad par bya// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags// lus la sogs pa'i phung po lnga// 'di dag bdag med rtogs nas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas ni tshul
93a3(rgyud): gsum gnas// pha ni zhi gnas yin zhes bya// ma ni lhag mthong yin par bshad// de bzhin nyid shes lus su gyur// zhi ba rnal 'byor pa yi zas// ji ltar bzo bos bdar gshegs kyi// sku yi
93a4(rgyud): gzugs brnyan byas pa ltar// gang zhig sku lta bu yi sku// de de bzhin gsung gi rnam pas gsung // thugs kyi rnam pas thu gsu ni// zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung // phung po la
93a5(rgyud): sogs chos rnams ni// stong zhing rten 'brel las byung mthong // ye shes nyi ma shar ba'i gzugs// zhi las rnal 'byor pa rnams byed// de bas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// grib ma lta bu/ 
93a6(rgyud): byung ba yin// de bzhin phung po khams la sogs// dam tshig gcig la rnam par gnas// de nas tshul gsum don gcig pa// zhi gnas la sogs pa las byung // de nas rdo rje tshul yid 'ong // gsang
93a7(rgyud): ba'i bdag po mnyan par gyis// stong pa rten 'brel las byung bar// rnal 'byor pa yi rdo rje zhes// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni// phung po la sogs chos byung ba// lus dang ngag sems kun
93a8(rgyud): rtog ni// phung po sogs byung 'byung las gyur// 'di dag dngos med yang dag sbyar// de las ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur// 'di dag ting 'dzin gnyis med sbyor// mi phyed rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// zab dang rgya
93b1(rgyud): chen rtog byang chub// de rtogs pas ni sems par gyur// 'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs gyur pa// chen po zhes bya shes byed pa'o// de la rtogs pa mtha' yas pa// rdo rje theg par ston pa yin// ting 'dzin ni/ 
93b2(rgyud): de nyid las// rdo rje'i thethag pa byung ba yin// 'di las 'jig rten 'das 'gyur zhing // de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das// dgongs don de bzhin nyid gcig pu// gsang ba 'jig rten pa zhes bshad// ma
93b3(rgyud): skyes pa las byung ba ni// kun rdzob dang ni don dam yin// bdud gyur lha yi bur bshad de// phung po nyon mongs 'chi bdag bcas// 'di las dngos med pas rgyal bas// rgyal ba'i rdo rjer rnam par bshad// 
93b4(rgyud): lus sogs phyi yi phung por bshad// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur bshad gang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// / 'di dag rdo rje'i rigs can 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang
93b5(rgyud): dag gis// phung po lnga po brtags 'gyur ba// de rnams de bani na yang dag dmigs// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su'/ gyur// ji ltar me long mtshungs gsal ba// dngos po kun gyi
93b6(rgyud): bdag nyid can// der ni bdag gis bdag nyid mthong // dkyil 'khor mchog 'gyur rnal 'byor pa// phung po de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin nyid las spros byas pa// chos kyi sku can
93b7(rgyud): rgyal ba yi// mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro// 'di ni spros dang bsdus pa dag/ de ni dga' bar yongs su grags// sems can gang zhig longs spyod cig/ de ni gsol 'debs zhes bshad
93b8(rgyud): do// yang dag shes rab thabs gnyis te// mkha' dbyings dbyer meng rab sbyor ba'i// de ni 'dod chags che tshul 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa ni mngon bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje theg pa rnal 'byor cher/ 
94a1(rgyud): bdag nyid nges par sbyor ba gang // dbang po thams cad bde skyed pa'i// yid bde ba ni skye bar 'gyur// zhal gsum rnam thar gsum du gang // mthong zhing de la phu
94a2(rgyud): po sogs// lha yi bdag nyid rig 'gyur ba// de nyid gsum du bshad pa yin// dngos med pa ni lam gyi mchog/ mya ngan 'das par gnyis med 'jug/ 'on kyang so sor 'gyur ba ste// rmo/ 
94a3(rgyud): kyi sku las zhe sdang gyur// bcom ldan bdag po de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung zhing // mya ngan 'das tshul rdo rje can// de nyid bdag po kun byed pa'o// dam tshig la sogs 'byung
94a4(rgyud): ba'i chos// rang gis rig par ma gyur kyang // der ni gnas pa ya rang dag bshad// de ni gti mug de bzhin sems// gang gi ji ltar brtags chos kyis// longs spyod rdzogs zhes pa byed
94a5(rgyud): ga 'de ni yid bzhin rin chen 'byung // rin chen chen po'i rin// sa kyi gtso// de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags ni// / kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba// gnas med gnas pa'i
94a6(rgyud): sbyor gyur pa// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ ji ltar 'dom dbus pad+ma ni// de yi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// de bzhin rnal 'byor rig pa mchog/ 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod// 
94a7(rgyud): 'gro ba gcig tu 'dod pa khyab// de nyid rdo rje rigs mchog yin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste// gsum po de dag mdor bsdus pa'o// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin chags// rdo rje dga' ba'i
94a8(rgyud): mtha' can gtso// ngan 'gro gsum 'don pas bud med// gcig pu yin yang du mar gyur// gsum po yang dang 'dug gyur pa// gshin rje shes rab gyur de bzhin// pad+ma bgegs 'gyur khrob sa
94b1(rgyud): mthar byed mtha' yi ming can no// 'jug pa la sogs gsum nyid la// phung por grags te de bzhin gshegs// skrag byed gshin rje gshed kyis kyang // thams cad 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro
94b2(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig skrag par byed// de bzhin shes rab mthar byed gtso// pad+mo'ang gsung zhes bya bar gyur// 'chi bral rnal 'byor grub pa yin// bgegs mthar byed kyang thugs kyi gtso// rags pa'i
94b3(rgyud): bdag nyid can bdag po// 'di ltar rtag spyod rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba'i lus kyis rnam par spyod// dgongs pa lung ston la gnas par// gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa// des ni de bzhin bya ba dang // de
94b4(rgyud): nas gsang ba yang dag 'byung // nu no zas kyis bu bso bzhin // srid pa gsum na bcom ldan gtso// sems can ba das ma dbang ji bzhin du// chos kyi bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad/ 
94b5(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yis// sku gsum gcig tu sbyor/ ba las// bcom ldan gsang ba dgongs mdzad pa// bde/ na pa ma yin brdzun pa'ang min// zhe sdang gti mug rin chen dang / 
94b6(rgyud): 'dod chags sna tshogs rigs byung ba// dgongs pa'i rigs kyi brdar gyur pas// gleng gzhi yin te dang po'o// / de nas
94b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs bdag la// slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun// lhag par mchod pa byas nas ni// thub chen de la 'di skad gsol// dgongs pa'i rdo rje dam pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa
94b8(rgyud): kun ye shes// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// gsang ba bcom ldan bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi// zhu ba yang dag thugs chud cing // byang chub sems dpa'
95a1(rgyud): yongs rtog pa// thub nyid kyi ni rnam mkhyen pa// de nas byang chub sems kun la// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs// lus sems de dang 'dra ba dang // de bzhin
95a2(rgyud): ngag ni tshig brjod blta'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// khyed kun gyis ni bskyed par bya// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la// ston pas ji bzhin ston par mdzad// de nas de bzhin gshegs rnams
95a3(rgyud): kyis// sku dang thugs dang de bzhin gsung // de 'dra'i tshul du sbyar nas ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sku gsung thugs rdo rje can la// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// e ma kun tu bzang
95a4(rgyud): po yi// rten cing 'brel 'byung las skyes pa// skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis ni// skye ba 'dir ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas de bya bzhin gshegs bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gsu
95a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mngon rdzogs byang chub rdo rdza yi// ting 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// dpal ldan byang chub sems 'di gsungs// dngos po med pa'i dngos gan
95a6(rgyud): na// dngos dang dngos med gnyi ga'ang min// de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// sgom pa dngos por yod ma yin// de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gnyis med
95a7(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje grags// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchog/ gsang ba dgongs pa rdo rje can// byang chub sems ni thams cad nas// de ni yang dag bka' stsal to// 
95a8(rgyud): dag pa de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// phung po khams sogs rnam spangs shing // gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba// chos bdag med pa'i stong nyid can// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs pa// rten cing
95b1(rgyud): 'brel 'byung ming can te// thog ma med nas ma skyes bdag/ rang sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin// de nas mi bskyod de bzhin sems// kun gyi gnyis med mi bzad pa'i// ye shes ting 'dzin snyoms
95b2(rgyud): zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di dag ma skyes pas// phung por grags pa'i chos nyid med// nam mkha' lta bur blta dka' ba'i// bdag med byang chub ces bya'o// 
95b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal// bdag med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// byang chub sems 'di rab tu gsungs// chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing / 
95b4(rgyud): chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa// bdag med chos las yang dag 'byung // byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// de nas da 'od dpag med mtshan can// ye shes 'bar ba sgron rdo rje'i// 
95b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsu ngas so// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// dngos po ma da cing sgom pa'ang med// nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis// 
95b6(rgyud): dngos po zhes ni rab tu bshad// de nas de bzhin gdon mi za// zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje yi// tingange 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// byang chub sems ni 'di gsungs so// chos 'di rang bzhin 'od gsal/ 
95b7(rgyud): zhing // bzod nas dag pas mkha' dang mtshungs// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub sems ni yin par bshad// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// byang chub sems ni thos pa dang / 
95b8(rgyud): dgongs pa'i don ni rab bshad par// rnam par snang mdzad che la gsungs// dngos po med cing dmigs med pa// byang chub sems dpa' mkha' dang mtshungs// gsong ba'i tshul ni 'di thos nas/ 
96a1(rgyud): dang po yi ni rtog pa skye// lus la sogs pa gsung sbyor bas// sems ni de rnams skyed par byed// yang dag byang chub du ma'i mthar// 'di la so so skye bo smra// thub pa'i
96a2(rgyud): gsung ni de rnams la// rang gi sgra bzhin 'dzin par byed// bsam pa'i dbang ni ji bzhin du// 'gro ba'i don du bka' stsol cig/ de nas pocom ldan bdag po 'di// rnam par snang mdzad thub pa che/ 
96a3(rgyud): legs shes lan gsum gsungs nas ni// lag na rdo rje la 'di gsungs// rnam par mi rtog don de nyid// rab tu phye ste bshad par bya// tshig tu brjod pa dmigs par bshad// brda' dang don dam pa yin no// 
96a4(rgyud): rkyen dang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang // mdo dang gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yi// / byang chub sems 'di bla na med// de bzhin yang dag sbyor ba 'di
96a5(rgyud): dgongs pa'i gsang ba bla na med// gnyis med dam tshig rdo rjed / pad+ma de las skyed par byed// tshig tu brjod pa thun mo s+ho// sangs rgyas sku ni dmigs can yin// gsang sngags de/ 
96a6(rgyud): nyid ces bya brda'// de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa'o// dang po gcig ni dgu dbus na// gang zhig bcu yis ma bcings pa// de ni bcings med zhes bya ste// de shes pa ni mchog gi gnas// dbyangs dang
96a7(rgyud): gsal byed yi ge ste// grangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa// as bcings phan tshun sbyor ba las// gang gis shes te 'gro ba'i bla// gang zhig shes pa rnam grol ba// 'bras bu phun tshogs grub
96a8(rgyud): 'dod pa// de ni de nyid grub 'dod pa// gzugs med pas ni gzugs spangs pa// 'byung ba'i mtha' ni yang dag ldan// cha la sogs pa bcu drug gnas// lnga pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// bzhi ni gsum
96b1(rgyud): dunges par sbyar// yi ge e bcas ring por bcas// yon tan sbyor sogs byis dang mtshungs// thung ngu ma lus ngag tu 'gyur// gcig min du ma ma yin no// ya yi don gyis gang yang rung // 
96b2(rgyud): bya ba'i dngos grub 'dod gyur pa// ral sogs pa gsum nyid kyis// 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug/ yi ge gang zhig sngar bshad dang // gang yang mngon du phyogs pa rnams// bud med skyes pa ma
96b3(rgyud): nong ste// khams la sogs par rab tu brtag/ 'og nas steng du bcas par ni// shes nas blos ni nges par sbyar// drug bshad bzhi dang gsum dang gcig/ dngos med ngo bo gcig las byung / 
96b4(rgyud): de ni ya sogs don sbyar na// dus gsum shes pa'ang 'byung ba 8ra 'gyur// mkhas pas sgyu ma mig 'phrul bzhin// 'gro ba rnams ni sgyu mtha' bya// brjod pa yi ni sngags 'di dag
96b5(rgyud): dngos med ngo bo las byung ba// de ni yongs su gyur pa'i gzugs // lha ru nye bar mtshon pa gang // brda' yis de nyid gsu/ ma gnas pa// rang bzhin bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do// ming
96b6(rgyud): med brjod du med pa ste// byang chub sems mchog 'di yin no// gsum po de nyid gcig gyur pa// 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med// 'gag med rab tu zhi ba ste// rtag dang chad pa rnam spangs pa// dus gsum
96b7(rgyud): mkhyen pas ma byas pa'i// rtog pa nam mkha' dbyer med mtshan// 'di nyid kho na don dam ste// so sor rang rig mtshan nyid do// de 'di sems can kun zhes bya'i// sangs rgyas byang chub ngo bo nyid// byang chub
96b8(rgyud): sems gcig yang dag 'byung // rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin can// gang 'di byang chub sems dag nyid// rnal 'byor pa ni nyi 'drar 'gyur// 'di ni rnam rtog kun bral yang // rigs kun la ni
97a1(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur// sreg dang skems dang bde can dang // kun zar 'jug pa'i me bzhin no// 'di ni lhas kyang mchod bya bar// sems can kun la rnam par gnas/ 
97a2(rgyud): byang chub sems 'dod bdag nyid de// 'dra ba bu gcig bzhin lta zhing // gang zhig bdag dang mnyam gnas pa// byams pa chen po de bskyed pa// phyin ci ma log 'di mthong nas// byang chub sems ni
97a3(rgyud): yang dag 'byung // des ni snying rje cher gyur nas// des ni 'khor ba nges par 'joms// sems can kun dang de bzhin bdag/ byang chub sems las ma mthong na// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i don byed pa// de las
97a4(rgyud): dga' ba skye bar 'gyur// 'khor ba dngos po yod min la// sem ngas can rnams kyang de dang 'dra// byang chub sems ni mtho dra nas ni// btang snyoms chen por gyur pa yin// de nas rdo rje 'dzin
97a5(rgyud): ba yis// thos pa'i byang chub sems dran zhing // rnam par snang / mdzad cha la zhus// 'khor dang gcig shos zhes bya ba// 'di kun byang chub sems yin na// ji ltar so sor gyur nas ni// 
97a6(rgyud): phan tshun 'gal bar rab tu gnas// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid la// gnyis su 'gog byed gang yang med// gang zhig nor bu gcig las byung // mi mthun phyogasu ji ltar snang // dman dang bar ma/ 
97a7(rgyud): de bzhin mchog/ 'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad pas// sems can kha cig gzir ba dang // byang chub sems la'ang sbyar bar 'gyur// de lta'i rnam rtog kun rtog par// ma 'ongs skye bo bgyid 'gyur gyi
97a8(rgyud): rten cing 'brel 'byung las byung ba// 'di dag 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la// byis pa rnams ni rtsod par 'gyur// de rnams rtsod pa med pa'i phyir// dgongs pa bshad par
97b1(rgyud): mdzad du gsol// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje can la gsang dgongs pa// shin tu rnyed dka' byang chub sems// de ni yang dag bka' stsal to// phyi ma'i mtha' gang stong pa gcig
97b2(rgyud): sngon gyi mtha' thug de bzhin te// sems de mngon du byas nas ni// ci dga' bar ni bya ba yin// sems ni de yis ma mthong bas// lta ba so sor gyur pa yin// de bas de rnams 'khor ba ru/ 
97b3(rgyud): 'gro ba drug gi ming du gyur// des na tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang // dbang phyug che la kun tu rten// zla ba nyi ma bya ba yi// kun tu spyod pa de rnams byed// sum cu rtsa gsum par bshad dang // dga' ldan
97b4(rgyud): gyi ni gnas dag dang // de bzhin gzhan dag dmyal bar yang // lte bas skad cig dag gis 'gro// yi dgas suyang 'gro ba dang // 'gro ba sna tshogs dag tu 'gro// gang tshem
97b5(rgyud): rig kun brten pas// bdag nyid kyang ni mi shes so// 'du she sa can dang 'du shes med// sems can du brtags 'di gnas pa// de rnams rlung las byung ba ste// rlung las slar
97b6(rgyud): yang 'gag pa yin// nyin dang mtshan mo'i cha yis kyang // rang gi rnam par rtog par ltung // de nas 'khor bar skrag bzhin du// sna tshogs 'gro bar de dag 'gro/ mi rtog pa yi sems de ni// 'khor
97b7(rgyud): ba'i rgya mtshor gnas gyur kyang // de ni phyin ci log gyur pas// khyi dang lce spyang glang po dang // sems de ltar yang 'gro bar 'gyur// de bzhin du ni phag nyid dang // mi yi rigs ni smig mkhan dang // 
97b8(rgyud): sme sha can dang rigs ngan dang // bza' dang mi bza' bya kun tu// byang chub sems de skye bar 'gyur// bram ze la sogs 'jig rten shes// byang chub sems las 'byung bar 'gyur// phung sogs
98a1(rgyud): dngos po med 'gyur las// rang gi myong ba shes par 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten shes zhes bshad// 'jig rten pa ni byang chub sems// nye bar dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis// 
98a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku ru 'di 'byung ste// sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid// tshig gis brjod pa tsam du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje snying po'i don gsungs pa// 'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu la// phyag 'tshal
98a3(rgyud): nas ni slar gsol pa// 'jig rten pa yi lung nyid ni// byang chub sems ni rab gsungs nas// ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa// ma 'ongs pa yis ji ltar rtogs// lta ba thams cad rab spang phyir// 
98a4(rgyud): khyed kyi chos rnams ston mdzad na// ji ltar byang chub sems de nyid// lta ba de ni rab bstan 'gyur// dgongs pa'i tshig la rmongs pra rnams// gsungs pa'i don ni ma rtogs sa// gsungs pa 'di
98a5(rgyud): las gzhan min zhes// de ni ji bzhin sgrar 'dzin to// de nas btso ma ldan sna tshogs pas// lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa// khye/ da gsung dgongs pa ma rtogs pa// 'dri bar byed pa legs so/ 
98a6(rgyud): zhes// byang chub sems ni rlung gyur cing // nam mkha' la ni rnam gnas pa// sems can kun gyi srog gyur gang // lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can// rten 'brel bcu gnyis zhes grags pa// ngo bo nyid rnam
98a7(rgyud): gsum du 'gyur// rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems// dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin// ji ltar mi mngon phra ba las// rtag tu gsal bar brjod pa yin// 'gro ba yu la sogs las byed pa// 'dir ni
98a8(rgyud): de la brten pa yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang de bzhin mngon spyod rnams// de nyid gsum gnas la rten nas// de kun byang chub sems kyis byed// ji srid 'jig rten brtags pa dang // de bzhin/ 
98b1(rgyud): btags pa sna tshogs rnams// rnam rtog byang chub sems zhes pa'i// rlung las drug tu 'byung ba yin// bde sdug la sogs chos rnams kyi// sa bon lta bur ba shad ba yin// byang chub sems kyi
98b2(rgyud): 'di pung sogs gnyis med mkha' dang mnyam// shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni 'gro bar 'gyur// klog dang bsam gtan rnam spangs par// bdag por bdag nyid bzlos/ 
98b3(rgyud): bde/ nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// nyi zla rab tu sbyor ba yis// dngos po med par 'gro khyab pa// byang chub sems kyi rlung gcig pu// dge dang mi dge 'bras spangs nas// na mkha' 'dra bar
98b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin// 'gro ba'i don ni shes pas kyang // ming ni de ba bzhin nyid ces bya// dbyings kyi thung ngu nyin mor bshad// ring po mtshan mo yin par bshad// dbyangs dang gsal byed
98b5(rgyud): dbye ba las// de nyid ming las sbyar bar bya// e ma'o 'gro ba'i bya ba byung // de nyid gzhan las nga nyid gsal// de lasa'i jig rten pa yi brda'// myur du mngon par shes par 'gyur// 
98b6(rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos ni// byang chub sems 'di thos pa dang // gtso bo rnam smang chen po las// khyab bdag la ni slar gsol pa// sems can thams cad skyed pa po// sna tshogs gzugs can sem
98b7(rgyud): 'di ni/ de bas dngos po med gyur kyang // srid pa dag tu rab tu grags/ byang chub sems ni mkha' mnyam pa// legs par rje su myong mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po// skye bo mchog la de bstan
98b8(rgyud): gsol /  sgrub pa yi ni thabs tsam zhig/ shes nas rgyud la rgyab kyis phyogs// 'di ltar bdag ni slob dpon zhes// ma 'ongs pa na smra bar 'gyur// bdag gi tshig ni 'di nyid dag/ yin zhes smra zhing
99a1(rgyud): byas pa 'jig/ des ni dgongs pa'i byang chub sems// ji bzhin don du mi shes so// de bzhin 'jig rten pa rnams ni// skal med chos kun rnam spangs la// rig pa yang ni mi mthong
99a2(rgyud): bas// da rnams la yang gnas med 'gyur// de bas byang chub sems bdud rtsi// de ni smra bar rigs pa yin// 'brel pa'i nyi ma thob pa ni// ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs
99a3(rgyud): pas/ grags ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa las// byang chub sems kyi nges pa'i don// slar yang de nyid la gsungs pa// nang na ma yin phyi rol min// gnyi ga ming du'ang 'gyur ma yin// rtag pa ma yin skad cig min// 
99a4(rgyud): de ni so so rang rig yin// mi rtog na mkha' ji bzhin du// byang chu bu sems ni rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba'i don// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur byung // 'das dang ma 'ongs pa nyid dang / 
99a5(rgyud): da ltar zhes ni bya ba dang // sangs rgyas sku yang 'byung 'gyur ba// don dam gcig ni kun rdzob yin// rig byed dus dang me yi/ sgra// nyi zla rlung gi gzugs can te// bzhi phyed gsum pa dag lnga
99a6(rgyud): byung /  byang chub sems gcig dbye ba nyid// de ni shes rab thabs zung 'brel// de bzhin bde byed 'dzin pa dang // ha ni so la gnas pa yang // gnas skabs ji snyed de bzhin du// ming ni yod pa ma yin pa// 
99a7(rgyud): de 'di byang chub sems su 'gyur// rdo rje nang du zhugs gyur pa// bsam bya'i snying po'ang de nyid yin// lhod pa gnas zhes bya ba ni// tsheg drag bcas pa'i rlung yin no// rang nyid lhod par byed pa'i mchog/ de ni
99a8(rgyud): srog dbang yid kyang yin// nga rgyal dang ni de bzhin blo// de dang ldan pa byang chub sems// bzhir grags cha las yang dag byung // yod med rab tu zhi ba can// dngos po med pa'i sems 'di ni// rang rig gcig
99b1(rgyud): bu'i spyod yul yin// de nyid don ni rig byed pa// dgongs pas yang dag bshad pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa 'di// chos kyi yi ge mchog thos nas// byams pa zhes la sogs pa yi// 
99b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar smad 'byung legs skyes nas// ched du brjod pa tshad du brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas e ma'o chos// e ma'o tshos ni ston mdzad pa// dngos kun
99b3(rgyud): dag pa'i don gcig pu// dag pa'i de nyid don dag ster// rnam par mi rtog mkha' mtshungs bshad// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med chos las yang dag byung // byang chub tshogs
99b4(rgyud): ni rdzogs byed pa// ngo bo med cing dmigs su med// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// kun bzang gcig las ya dang dag byung // dgongs don byang chub ster ba po// byang chub spyod
99b5(rgyud): mchog rdo rje mchog/ byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs// sangs rgyas pa nga chub rab sgrub pa// rdo rje gsum ni rang bzhin gcig
99b6(rgyud): byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// dgongs pa lung ston la dad par// gang gis yid ni bzod gyur pa// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las// des ni de bzhin bya ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
99b7(rgyud): cad kyi/ rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las// yang dag byang chub sems bshad pa// le'u gnyis pa yin par bshad// / de nas de nyid gsang rdo rje// gsum dang
99b8(rgyud): tshul gsum lam gsum mchog/ rnam thar gsum dang dkon mchog gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bkod pa// 'phro ba'i sprin gyi rdo rje dang // ting nge 'dzin
100a1(rgyud): la snyoms zhugs te// de nas rdo rje 'dzin la gsungs// rdo rje bkod pa mchog 'di yi// le'u brtul zhugs bzang po nyon// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun// phra mo rnal 'byor
100a2(rgyud): dag pa zhugs// oM ni gcig dang yang dag ldan// shU n+ya tA ni gnyis pa ste// dz+nyA na zhes ni gsum pa yin// badz+ra zhes bya bzhi pa'o// swa b+hA ba At+ma koHlnga par grags// a haM zhes pa drug par brjod// de
100a3(rgyud): ltar bder gshegs drug pa ni// skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin// oM shU n+ya tA zung dang po'o// dz+nyA na badz+ra gnyis pa yin// swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he gyur// de nyid gsum ni 'dir brtags pa'o// de nyid gsum ni/ 
100a4(rgyud): gcig gyur par// mi gsal gsal ba'i ming can no// mkha' dbus sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ni// 'od zer sprin gyi tshe dgas chen po// yi ge ma yi 'od kyis khyab// kun nas yongasu
100a5(rgyud): zlum po'o// 'dod yon lnga yis kun tu khyab// mchod pa rnam pa/ lngas rgyan pa// mdor na de ltar bsgoms nas su// dbu/ sa su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad pag/ 
100a6(rgyud): rgya mchog/ de nyid gsum gyi rdo rjes mtshan// yang na rdo rje gsum mgon gyi// phyag rgya yang ni rnam par sgom// mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya che// tshogs ni gnyis med sbyor ba dang // dkon mchog dpal gyi
100a7(rgyud): rgya chen dang // tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // de bzhin don yod gzugs can rgya// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dag tu sgom// rdo rje gsum gcig rdo rje can// in+d+ra ni la'i mdog 'dra ba// rab 'bar/ 
100a8(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gtsigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lha// 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab tu 'khrigs// de ni phyag na rdo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par sgom
100b1(rgyud): shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tshugs cod pan dag gis rgyan// rab 'bar lag na 'khor lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mar gad ta yi 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par
100b2(rgyud): rgyan 'bar zhing 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis khyab// rin chen de la rnam par sgrom// 'dod chags chen po rdo rje can// pad+ma ra ga'i mdog 'dra zhing // thor tshugs cod pan dag gis rgyan// phyag na pad+ma bsnam
100b3(rgyud): bar sgom// sna tshogs rdo rje gdon mi za// 'od chen sna lnga'i 'od 'dra ba// zhi ba sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du// phyag ni ral gri bsnams par sgom// de ltar rnal 'byor bshad bdag/ gsang ba'i bdag sgra
100b4(rgyud): thos nas ni// phra mo'i rnal 'byor cha dag kyang // de bzhin gsheg/ sa bdag la zhus pa// phung po khams sogs sbyor ba yi/ das// de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal na// mkha' dbus
100b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor du// de rnams kyang ni ji ltar 'gyur// gcig shos phyi rol du sgom pa// dkyil 'khor sa/ ngas rgyas ming can ni// dngos po med pa'i dngos po la// sgom
100b6(rgyud): papapo rnams ji ltar brtag/ mgon po phra mo'i rnal 'byor 'di// dkyil 'khor gang zhig bka' stsol ces// gang zhig ma 'ongs pa rnams ni// 'di ltar mchog du'ang som nyi 'tshal// lag na rdo rje grags
100b7(rgyud): ldan pa// phra mo'i rnal 'byor de nyid skyes// 'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis// phra ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// rnam lnga mngon par byang chub 'di// ma 'ongs skye bo'i rgyur gyur te// chos ni yang dag
100b8(rgyud): sdud 'gyur gang // ji lta ji ltar ston par byed// phung po nyid ni sangs rgyas gyur// byang chub don gyi rkyen las byung // de yang de bzhin gshegs bshad pa// de nyid gnyis med sbyor bas so// ston dang
101a1(rgyud): 'jog pa po 'di ni// blo yi dngos grub ston pa 'o// thog mtha' med pa rnal 'byor ni// phra mo nas ni bya bar brtag/ migs la gsal bar yang dag sbyor// dngos med ngo bo lnga
101a2(rgyud): skyes pa'o// bzod ma nyid nas rang grub pa// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa// rten 'brel chos zhes grags pa ste// dngos po thams cad gcig tu byung // bdag nyid 'di 'drar byas nas ni// chos kyi
101a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// dmar dang gnag dang de bzhin sar// dkar po nyid ni mdo ru ste// bzhi bzhi gcig tu sbyor ba yang // gos dkar la sogs yang dag bri// de rnams dbus su lha mor bcas
101a4(rgyud): zhi sbyor mchog dang mchog min dang // steng dang thad ka mnyam dang da 'og/ ji lta ji ltar gos dkar sogs// maM dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ste so so'i dkyil 'khor la// bco brgyad
101a5(rgyud): dag tu yang dag bshad// de yang 'di nyid dag la bshad // NI ltar 'o ma khyad par ni// mar sar gnas par gyur pa/ yin// de bzhin gos dkar la sogs la// zhi ba nyid ni dgan+d+ha
101a6(rgyud): so// gzugs la sogs pa nang gi chos// mthong ba de ni lhag mthong yin// mi bskyod la sogs grangs ji bzhin// rtog pa dag ni zhi gnas yin// 'di gnyis dngos po med pa'i bdag/ de bzhin nyid ni
101a7(rgyud): zhi zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngubang byung // sbyor ba de nyid gcig pa nyid// shes rab thabs la gnas nas ni/ 
101a8(rgyud): sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// bya ba thams cad nyid du yang // rnal 'byor rig pas nyal sogs la// ming med brjod du med pa dang // dus gsum 'das pa rtag tu bzla// gos dkar
101b1(rgyud): la sogs bzlas bshad pa// brgya phrag gnyis dang nyi shu lnga// bzhi pa legs par bsgres pa yi// sbyor bzhis bsdus pas brgya phrag dgu/ dgu brgya dag tu gang bstan pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rim gyis
101b2(rgyud): ni// de ni so sor 'byung ba las// nyi khri gcig stong drug brgya'o// de 'dir gsang ba dgongs pa yis// phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin// klog dang bsam gtan med mod kyi// 'on kyang bzlas pa yin
101b3(rgyud): par bshad// de ltar rnam pa mang po yi// 'gro la phan pa'i gsung thos nas// de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po la// rdo rje can gyis slar yang zhus// gang zhig bsgoms na ma 'ongs 'gro/ thams cad mi
101b4(rgyud): rtog par 'gyur ba// rdo rje gsum gyi snying po mchog/ snying po bco dam ldan bshad du gsol// de nyid gsum gnyis med spro dar ba// de ni phra mo'i rdo rje sgom// myur ba la sogs gsum spangs
101b5(rgyud): pa'i// rnal 'byor par yang bdag cag 'gyur// de ni bdag rigayid ches shing // zhi ba nyid ni mi shes 'gyur// phra mo'i rnal 'byor ga tso spangs te// log pa'i rnal 'byor kun tu bstan
101b6(rgyud): ston pa po yi sbyor ba zhing // phra mo zhes bya de nyid ni// ma 'ongs dus na spongs 'gyur ba// de nyid de ni nges par byed// de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra ba'i// lung bstan pa ni gsan pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag
101b7(rgyud): po// chos nyid ngo bo nyid ces bya'i// ting nge 'dzin de kun nas ni// snyoms par zhugs pa nyid du mdzad// dpal ldan snyoms par zhugs mdzad nas// gsang sngags 'di ni bka' stsal to// sku gsung thugs ni
101b8(rgyud): rdo rjer bshad// khyad par du ni byin rlob pa// gnyis med rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// de ni yang dag bshad par bya// oM ni dang por shes par bya// d+harma zhes bya gnyis pa'o// d+hA rbA zhes bya gsum par bshad/ 
102a1(rgyud): swa b+hA bar grags bzhi pa'o// ut+ma ko ni lnga pa yin// a he du gyur drug par 'dod// sngags 'di brjod nas de 'og tu// sgom pa bdag nyid can gyis sgom// rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// 
102a2(rgyud): yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam// nyams dga'i ri rab rtse mo ru// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par sgom// rin chen mi g.yor gyur nas spro// mi g.yor ma gyur spro mi bya// sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od 'dra ba// 
102a3(rgyud): mchog rab sprin rnams spro bar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje sprin chen dang // pad+ma rol gri mtshon cha mchog/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi spro// phra me'i dkyil 'khor dbus
102a4(rgyud): gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms par bya// bzlas dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba yang // pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu sgom// rin chen lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du// dngos la brtson pa/ 
102a5(rgyud): rin chen sgom// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las byung po// nam mkha'i da kyil 'khor du bri bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab mchog/ gi/ phra mo rdo rje gsum sgrub pa'o// rdo rje dkyil 'khor las
102a6(rgyud): byung ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul thob pa'o// dgongs pa gsang ba zhes pa yi// lung ston dam pa 'di la ni// gang gis sems ni bzod gyur pa// de ni de bzhin byed pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun
102a7(rgyud): gyi gsang // rdo rje phra mo de nyid las// 'di ni rdo rje bkod pa'i mchog/ le'u gsum pa nyid yin no// / de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad// gnyi su med par gyur nas ni
102a8(rgyud): slar yang rdo rje gsum bdag la// bstod pas de rnams gsol ba 'debs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// zhi ba gnas rnams mchog gyur pa// chos kun gcig tu bdag med pa// dkyil 'khor
102b1(rgyud): mchog 'di bshad du gsol// yongs su rdzogs par yang dag rgyan// mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa'o// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// ye shes spyod/ 
102b2(rgyud): ba'i don las byung // zhi ba'i chos ni sbyong ba po// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dngos mchog dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// rang bzhin gyis ni dri med dag sems ni kun tu bzang po nyid// sems
102b3(rgyud): can kun gcig che ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// khams gcig khams ni gsum pa'o// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje mchog/ 'jig rten
102b4(rgyud): gsum gyis ston pa'o// nyams dga' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun dag la// thugs de dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor dam pa bka' stsal to// de nas/ 
102b5(rgyud): sems kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ rdo rje ye shes rab 'dra ba// skud nga gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor rab tu ba/ shad par bya// 'di ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid mchog/ legs
102b6(rgyud): sgril de bzhin nyid bstan pa'o// sna tshogs lung gi mtshan ma ni// mtshan ma bzang por de bshad do// kun rdzob dang ni don dam ngag/ gnyis su mang ba mdzes po yin// shes rab 'di ni thig yin te// thabs ni
102b7(rgyud): de yi rjes su 'jug pa'o// shes rab thabs kyi thig gcig gis// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs mchog ni// sems kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab ste// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis pa// 'phags pa'i
102b8(rgyud): bden bzhi ngos bzhi ste// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi grwa bzhi yin// bsdu dngos bzhi grags sgo yin te// re re'ang bzhi yi ming can no// chos kyi de nyid don gyi brda' 'khor lo'i nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// mi
103a1(rgyud): phyed ye shes mtshan ma ste/ rdo rje in+d+ra nI la rgya// rnam pa lnga yis rab phye ba'i// rtse mo 'khor ba 'jig byed pa'o// shar nas me long ngo bo ni// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i 'od kyis rgyan// lho/ 
103a2(rgyud): rukun mnyam ye shes yin// gcig gi ming can rin po che// nub tu so sor rtog pad+ma// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba// byang du gong ma'i sems gang yin// 'gro ba'i rnam rtog 'joms byed pa// bya ba sgrub pa
103a3(rgyud): ral grir 'gyur// 'od 'phro 'bar ba 'dra ba'i mdog/ shar lho byams pa'ang spyan yin te// sprin sngon dang ni mnyam po'i 'od// lho nub snying rje zhes bya ba// mA ma kI ni rigs rdo rje// nub byang pad+ma zhes bya ba// 
103a4(rgyud): dga' ba legs par gnas pa bzhin// byang shar ud pal lta/ snang ba'i// btang snyoms bcas pa sngon po 'dra// de bzhi dan shar sgor sbyin pa ni// tho ba mdangs ldan 'od dang bcas// 
103a5(rgyud): bzhin snyan smra zhes grags pa// dbyig po 'od bzang rdo rje 'bar// nub du don spyod ces bya ba// rta mgrin gyi ni pad+ma'o// don 'thun pa ni rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'khyil ba'i rdo rje can// phyag rgya dgod
103a6(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid de// 'di ni legaso par bshad pa yin// ji ltar dbyibs kyis mchod pa ni// rnam gsum bsgoms pas 'gyur ba yin// dang por chen po yod pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin
103a7(rgyud): par bshad// de ltar mkha' dang mtshungs gyur dang // shes nas 'gro la phan par 'gyur// rdo rje gsum dang lhan cig 'byung // de tshe zla gzer phreng ba yi// skad cig la sogs dus dbye bas// lo grang
103a8(rgyud): bcu drug pa yi ming // ma skyes par 'byung zhi ba ni// bud med zhes ni nges par bshad// zhi ba'i chos dang rjes dran pa// mdangs bzang 'od ni yin par gsungs// rten 'brel bag chags dri yin te// 
103b1(rgyud): ye shes kha phye me tog go// dngos po med pa rigs yin te// kun mkhyen ye shes dbus nyid do// chos dbyings nyid kyi bud med ni// shes rab 'di 'dras mnyes par byas// nang na ma yin phyi ma yin// 
103b2(rgyud): gnyi gar ma yin gzhan nas min// gnas med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyur// de bas mA ma kir bshad do// de yi ngo bo nyid gcig pa// byin gyis brlabs pas de bshad do// na mkha'i dang ni gcig
103b3(rgyud): tu gnas// sangs rgyas zhi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// da bas yul du rnam brtags pa// bsdu ba dag ni gshang ba yin// ye shes dbang po stong pa gcin// rnam dag chos nyid khu ba yin// thams cad
103b4(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes khrag/ rang bzhin chos su yongs brtags dpa// de nyid lha rnams zhes bya ste// dngos med pa ni dbul ba da yin/ de byas sangs rgyas sras po rnams// khyad par du ni mnyes
103b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// nga yang 'jig rten pas brtags pa// de rnams ji ska da bshad pa nyid// mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms pa// sa rab nyid du bkal legs dang // shin tu tshad ldan mdzes pa
103b6(rgyud): yi// thig gi mkhas pas thig gdab bo// blo ldan dkyil 'khor brtag bya ba// khra ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam la// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// rta babs kyis ni mdzes par bya// de yi dbus su 'khor
103b7(rgyud): lo ni// dgongs pas dang po bshad pa ste// de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams rtog/ gang zhig 'jig rten 'das la gnas// de ni gzungs kyis dbang bskur ba// dngos med pa ni 'dzin
103b8(rgyud): bdag/ yid ni rtag tu mkha' dang mtshungs// dam pa 'jig rten shin tu 'das// 'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spang // len pa ma yin gtong ba min// med ba ma yin gnas ma yin// blo ldan kun tu 'di
104a1(rgyud): shes pa/ rnal 'byor thams cad rig pa mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor le'u 'di ni// nges pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bshad// dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la/ 
104a2(rgyud): gang zhig yid ni bzod gyur pa// de rnams shes rab thabs dag ni// ji ltar gnas pa da ltar byed// gsang ba'i dgongs pa lung bstan las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
