104a3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ rdo rje gsum bdag 'gro ba'i bla// slar yang rdo rje 'dzin pa la// sngags spyod don gyis de nyid zhus// sngags kyi brtul zhugs spyod pa cig/ khyad par du ni srang
104a4(rgyud): bslab pa// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung // spyod pa bcom da ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bdag po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa dag gi tshig/ gson nas 'gro ba'i
104a5(rgyud): don gcig pu// gsungs pa'i don can bka' stsal to// mi rto/ ga don las yang dag byung // zhe sdang la 'jug mtshan nyid yin// dngos med la gnas gti mug ste// 'dod chags
104a6(rgyud): 'dod chags las byung ba// 'dod chags ldan pa'i ming can yin// thog pa mchog ni bla med pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag rigs su yang dag bshad// dngos grub de ni 'di sgrub po/ 
104a7(rgyud): rigs ngan myur bar shes par bya// smig mkhan dag ni dal ba yin// mtshams med byed pa gnyi ga ste// gsod pa don gnyer sems pa po// theg pa chen po bla med pa'i// theg pa mchog 'di 'grub par
104a8(rgyud): 'gyur/  sems can sdig tshon byas pa dang // gzhan yang mtshams med byed pa po// gang yang slob dpon smod pa yis// bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyur ro// 'di nyid dad pas myur du ni// zhe sdang
104b1(rgyud): dag la gnas pas gnas// gang gis phung sogs dngos med par// zhi gnas las byung sems kyis byas// de ni srog gcod byed pa ste// theg pa mchog la gnas pa yin// nang dang de bzhin gyi/ 
104b2(rgyud): rol dag/ rten 'brel gnyis su ston pa ni// de ni brdzun smra dga' ba ste// gnas med la gnas rnal 'byor pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang // de ni rdzas su shes bya ste// de 'phrog pa
104b3(rgyud): tshul gang yin pa// gzhan gyi nor la chags par 'dod// gang zhig de nyid dngos gcig pa// de bzhin nyid la rtag sbyor ba// sems can de de 'dod la dga'// sgrub pa mchog la dam par 'gyur// 
104b4(rgyud): de yi stong nyid gti mug la// yul ni bshang ba zhes grags// / dbang po gci ba zhes bya la// de dag zhi ba za ba yin// theg pa chen po chos mchog 'dir// de dag sgrub pa'i snod
104b5(rgyud): du 'gyur// de che brdzun de 'dod pa dang // gshang gci zas su skye/ dab po// shes rab pha rol phyin shes rab// chos kyi sku ni ma gcig pu// gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// dngos
104b6(rgyud): med ces bya 'dod spyad pa// longs spyod rdzogs dang mnyam gang yin// de nyid sring mo yin par 'dod// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// gsang sngags lus kyis mnyes par bya// gshang gci
104b7(rgyud): zas su byed pa yi// sprul sku'i gzugs can bu mo de// sgrub pa pos ni bsgom par bya// ma dang sring mo bu mo ni// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas mnyes byas// theg pa mchog gi chos nyid la// dngos grub rgya
104b8(rgyud): chen des thob bo// ji ltar mi rtog na mkha' ni// kun tu khyab par gnas gyur pa// 'di ni sgom pa zhes bshad de/ ting 'dzin bsam mi khyab ces bya// de nyid 'jig rten par byung ba// rtog pa dga' ba'i ming can// 
105a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas yul gyi ye shes la// 'dod spyod gos par mi 'gyur te// rnam par mi rtog sbyor cig gis// myur du sangs rgyas des thob 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
105a2(rgyud): 'das gsung ni// sgrib kun sel ba la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches// thos nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur// 'di ni bdag po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
105a3(rgyud): bdag nga ci yi slad du tshig ngan pa// de bzhin gshegs 'khor nang du gsung // 'dod chags bral dang chags bcas dang // gti mug bral ba rmongs bcas dang // zhe sdang bral ba sdang bcas pa'i// rig
105a4(rgyud): kyi dngos grub ston mdzad cing // gang gzhan sdig pa'i nyes pa da dang // 'tshe ba la sogs yongs spangs pa// 'di ni de byed de sems can rnams// snod yin zhes ni thub gsung ngam// de nas
105a5(rgyud): mgon po thugs rje can// sems can kun la phan gdags pa sa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' la gsungs pa// 'di ni sa khams dang mnyam pa// 
105a6(rgyud): sems can kun 'dzin gcig pu pa// chu khams rtog dang bral ba po// sna tshogs gsal bar 'gyur ba yin// bdag po me yi gzugs can te// thams cad za bar nye bar sbyor// de bzhin pi nang
105a7(rgyud): bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro la gos pa'i dri gcig pu// bcom ldan sna tshogs na mkha' mtshungs// thams cad snang zhing za ba po// de nyid bdag nyid bdag yin par// bsgoms na rkang gnyis ma tshig
105a8(rgyud): tu 'gyur// snying po zhes bya sangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid dag pa 'di yin zhing // sngags kyi spyod don spyod rnams kyi// byang chub spyod pa'i mchog 'di yin// de nas brjod mi lang zhes pa// brjod mi lang ba
105b1(rgyud): nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas zhing rdul grangs mnyan de// sgrib pa thams cad sel la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// kun nas 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khon
105b2(rgyud): de thams cad// gcig tu brgyal ba nyid gyur to// de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsung // gnyis med de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// byang chub sems dpa' brgyal ba ru// gzigs nas gco la 'di skad
105b3(rgyud): gsol// mgon po sgrib kun sel la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rang bzhin chos nyid ji lta bur// 'di rnams bslang bar mdzad du gsol// mi g.yo ba 'di gsang ba ste// zhi ba
105b4(rgyud): gcig pu bde ba'i mchog/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob byed pa // 'di ni dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// dngos po med cing 'khrug pa med// yid 'ong rdo rje tshig gcig pu// 'gro ba'i bsam
105b5(rgyud): pa'i dbye ba yis// bye brag mang por gyur pa yin// na mkha'/ mtha' yas sbyor ba yis// gzugs la sogs pa ma tha' yas te// de yang de bzhin gshegs mchog dang // byang chub
105b6(rgyud): sems dpa' nyid du gyur// de las spro zhing bsdu ba dang // zhi ba nyid las rab sbyor bas// ye shes lus can ye shes can// brgyal lo zhes ni shes pa ni// yan lag dbye ba gang dang gang // 'gro bzhis ni/ 
105b7(rgyud): grags bdag pa// de de rang lha'i sbyor ba las// dkyil 'khor mchog ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rang lus gang yin pa// de nyid bsdus pa 'di lta bu// 'di ni 'jig tshogs lus rtog la// byang
105b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' brgyal bar gyur// des ni bden 'di ma shes pas// dbyangs bcas brgyal la bskul ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// brgyal ba zhes ni bshad ba yin// de nas
106a1(rgyud): gsang ba rdo rje gsum// dgongs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa dag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshig gsan nas// ting nge 'dzin ni mngon du mdzad// gnyis su med par mnyam rdo rje// 'gro la
106a2(rgyud): gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i// 'di nyid gsum yul 'jig pa po// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// mgon po snyoms par zhugs pa yi// 'od gang chen por gyur pa yin// byang chub sems dang 'dis reg/ 
106a3(rgyud): pas// rang gi stan la gnas par gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// ngo mtshar rmad du gyur spyan dang // dgyes shing mgu ba skyes gyur nas// chos kyi dbyangs ni 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o chos
106a4(rgyud): e ma'o chos// e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba// bdag med chos ni yang dag dag/ chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// rdo rje gsung gcig dag pa'i don// dri med mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// 
106a5(rgyud): mi 'gyur don las yang dag byung // rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo// // thub mchog gcig pu de bzhin gshegs// dus gsu/ ma dag gi lam du byung // rdo rje dbyings gcig rdzogs long spyod/ 
106a6(rgyud): nam mkha'i lam gcig phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung thugs ni na mkha' ste// spyod pa'i mchog ste chos gcig ldan// de nyid gsum ston sna tshogs pa// spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// dgongs pa
106a7(rgyud): lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig spyod mchog 'di rten pa// gsang ba yang dag srung ba dag/ da ni ci dga' bar yang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje mchog/ sngags
106a8(rgyud): rnams kun gyi dam pa yi// spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa yin// de nas dpal chen mi bskyod pa// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba can// ting nge 'dzin la/ 
106b1(rgyud): snyoms zhugs nas// thugs byin rlabs pa zhes bya ba'i// gsang sngags 'di ni gsungs pa yin// oM zhes bya ba dang po yin// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// tsit+pa gsum par yongs su brtag/ badz+ra bani
106b2(rgyud): pa'i gong mar ldan// swa b+hA wa At+ma ko lnga pa// a he dus kyi ming can yin// sku drug gsum pa'i ming can no// de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// rdul phran rdo rje zhes bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
106b3(rgyud): zhugs nas// sku ni byin gyis brlab pa gsung // oM zhes bya ba tshangs par bshad// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// ka ya chags thogs dbang phyug ste// badz+ra rig byed yin par bsgrags// swa b+hA wa
106b4(rgyud): AMt+ma ko 'dod lha// oM haM skem byed ces brjod de// dgongs po nga yis ni yang dag brtags// shes rab dbye bas dbye bar bya// de nas tshe dpag med ces pa'i// kun tu mi gnyis rdo rje cen// 
106b5(rgyud): tingange 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// gsung ni byin gyis rlob pa/ gsung // oM ni dang por bsgrags pa yin// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// bAka ces bya ba gsum pa yin// badz+re dus kyi ming du 'gyur
106b6(rgyud): swa b+hA rba At+ma ko lnga pa// a haM zhes pa drug pa ste// gsum po 'di dag bshad pa rnams// re re zhing drug gsum du bshad// thugs dang sku dang de bzhin gsung // rim dang rim pa min pas gsung // bdag po las/ 
106b7(rgyud): ni gcig pu las// rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba 'byung // yon tan chos 'di rdo rje gsung // de nyid gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ da bas 'di ni sgom pa mchog/ g.yel ba med par rdzogs par bya// 'di bshad pa/ 
106b8(rgyud): yi blo ldan pa// rab mchog rdo rje gsum byung bas// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyur cing // sngags kyi mtshan nyid mtshan mar bya// de nas dkon mchog dpal 'di yang // sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge/ 
107a1(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// de nas gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM ni zung gi dang por ldan// sarba ta thA ga ta zung // de bzhin nyid ni ye shes tshogs// thams cad me long / 
107a2(rgyud): ming can no// a nu rA ga skye med de// de ni gsum pa yin par gsungs// rkyen dang nyan thos kyis bshig dka'i// badz+ra yang ni bzhi par gyur// dngos med bdag nyid can ye shes// swa b+hA At+ma ko zhes bshad
107a3(rgyud): ye shes lnga po nyid kyi ming // chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// a he so so na rdzogs longs spyod// dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin can// bde ba chen po'i ming gyur pa// mchod pa drug pa'i ming can no// dngos med
107a4(rgyud): gnas pa'i bdag nyid can// de yi rjes su mnyes bya'i mchog/ de lta'i chags pa'i de bzhin gshegs// mgon po tham/ sa cad mnyes par bya// de nas dpal chen gdon mi za// don yod
107a5(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// des ni ga sang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM zhes bya ba dang por ldan// sarba ta thA ga ta gnyis// pU dzaM rnam par thar pa'i ming // badz+ra sems
107a6(rgyud): ni rnam sgom pa// swa b+hA At+ma ko zhes bshad// a haM pha rol phyin zhes bya// lnga po drug dang gsum du bshad// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg bya dang ni chos kyi dbyings// de dag dngos med gyur byas pa/ 
107a7(rgyud): de ni sangs rgyas mchod mchog yin// mig sogs zhes las yang dag byung // mngon shes lnga yis nye bar mdzes// mchod pa lnga bshad 'di rnams kyis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// de nas
107a8(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // so sor byang chub ston mdzad pa// rdo rje gsum rig gsang dbang po// thub pa chen pos yang gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs la dmigs pa la// gang tshe yid ni mgu gyur pa// de nyid
107b1(rgyud): gsum la nye sbyor ba// dngos grub rab mchog de thob 'gyur// bdag med par ni sems dmigs shing // lus dang ngag kyang rnam par sgom// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gnas sgom zhing // sbyor ba rnam
107b2(rgyud): gsum rdzogs par bya// rdo rje de nyid gsum dmigs ni// shin tu phra ba'ang yod ma yin// sngags kyi rang bzhin sbyor ba yis// sgom pa med cing byang chub med// rdo rje gsum gcig mtshan nyid du// mdor
107b3(rgyud): na rnam par brtags nas su// sngags la sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin// gnas la gnas med bsgom par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs dbang po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod// kun mkhyen sang
107b4(rgyud): rgyas kun mchog gis// sgom pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal to// / na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms
107b5(rgyud): nas// phra mo'i rnal 'byor ba rtsam par bya// yungs kar gyi ni' bru tshod tsam// sna yi rtse mo'i bdag nyid can// rgyu dang mi rgyur yang dag ldan// de ru gnas par mkhas pas bsam// blo ldan
107b6(rgyud): ye shes kyis brtags pa'i// gsang ba'i ye shes gnas sgom mo// gsang ba mchog ces bshad pa ste// de nyid gsum ni dam tshig mchog/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// nyi ma zhes pa'i dkyil
107b7(rgyud): 'khor sgom// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas bzhag go// dbang phyug chen po skam byed de// gzhi phyed na mkha' mtshon pa dag/ bdud rtsi zhes ni brtags pa gang // de ni hUM zhes bya bar 'gyur
107b8(rgyud): namamakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor yid 'ong sgom// spyan gyi gzugs su yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad+mo gnyis pa'o// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil
108a1(rgyud): 'khor bsgom par bya// dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi steng du rnam par sgom// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid sgom// sangs rgyas ni/ 
108a2(rgyud): ba'i gnas dgod pa// 'khor rnams kyis ni kun nas bskor// ut+pal mthon ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga pa 'od po che// nas kyi 'bru tsam nan tan gyis// ri rab rtse mor rnam par bsam// tsa na ka yi 'bru tshong
108a3(rgyud): tsam// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mo ri rab rtse// byang chub 'dod pas 'di bsgom bya// 'khor lo la sogs sgom pa ni// de yi khyad par dag tu brtag/ yid 'ong dngos grub kun gyi gnas// byang
108a4(rgyud): chub gnas mchog bla med pa'o// sangs rgyas yang dag byang chub pa zhugs// mdor na de ni spro bar bya// gang tshe chos ni legs da mtshan pa// rdo rje gcig ni bsgom par bya// de nas de bzhin
108a5(rgyud): gshegs dbang po// dag pa chos rnams kun gyi mchog/ 'gro kun don tu ston pa pos// gsang ba mchog ni bka' stsal to// skad cig thang gcig yud tsam dang // zla phyed zla ba lo yi dus
108a6(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med gsum po ni// skad cig gcig tu mnyam par bshad// zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin// dngos med rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o// skad cig gcig tu bsngags pa ste// dus gsuM
108a7(rgyud): las 'das yin par dgongs// gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa// rnal 'byor pas ni zla drug sgom// mchod chen de ni byas nas su// gsang ba'i de nyid rnam par sgom// yul dang dbang po sems pa ni// 
108a8(rgyud): gshang gci zas su byed pa'o// byas nA de 'dra'i dngos grub ni// bza' ba rnam rtog med pa'o// de nyid 'di ni bla mod pa// byang chub sems gcig las byung ba'o// rtog med 'dus ni ma byas shing // mi/ 
108b1(rgyud): rtog don ni 'grub par 'gyur// ma ni mA ma kir bshad de// sa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o// bsam gtan de ni dga' spyod pa// sha zhes bya bar de bshad do// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor ni// 
108b2(rgyud): chen de ni yin par bshad// gsang ba pa yi go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje gsum ni myur du 'grub// dam tshig chen po glang chen rta// de bzhin khyi la sogs pa'i sha/ phung po la sogs rigs dbye bas// gang gsung
108b3(rgyud): mnyam pa'i grangs kyis so// gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis med zas// bsam gtan dga' ba'i ming gcig pu// 'jig rten rgyang pan 'jig rten pa// bza' ba'i rang gi ngo bor gyur// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
108b4(rgyud): brtag pa dang // de bzhin drod gsher las skyes pa// 'jig rten 'ad sa dang 'jig rten pa'i// 'di dag zas su kun tu bshad// de nas rdo rje gsum dgongs pa// bcom ldan 'das las thos
108b5(rgyud): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag po// lag na rdo rjes tshi ga gsol pa// nyan thos rnams kyi dam tshig kyang // phra mo'i rnal 'byor ston mdzad cing // mgon khyod 'jig rten pa
108b6(rgyud): dang ni/ 'jig rten 'das pa dag kyang gsungs// chu dang 'o ma gcig 'gyur bzhin// khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad// 'jig rten 'ga' las yang dag pa// ngang pas 'o ma ji bzhin len// ji ltar sgom/ 
108b7(rgyud): pas gdungs pa yi// skyes bu la la de bsres 'thung // de bzhin 'jig rten shin tu 'das// chos kyi bdud rtsi de rnams 'thung // dgongs pas sngags kyi de nyid du// gang zhig gsum du gsungs pa 'di// 
108b8(rgyud): ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs// mgon po gsal bar bshad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gis// grags ldan lag na rdo rje la// bu khyed legs so cher legs te// be brag
109a1(rgyud): gsum khyod la bshad bya// rkyen dang nyan thos zhes grags dang // de bzhin mdo sde la spyod rnams// 'di dag 'jig rten pa rnams te// bya ba sbyor ba'i bya bar gnas// rnal 'byor
109a2(rgyud): grub nas 'jig rten gnas// 'jig rten 'das por gyur pa yin// de ni ting 'dzin rnal 'byor yang // de dang 'dra bar byed ma yin// gang yang 'jig rten shin tu 'das// rnam par mi rtog 'jigs med pa/ 
109a3(rgyud): de ni de bzhin nyid dngos gcig/ 'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spangs// brtul zhugs bzang po'i rnal 'byor 'dis// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes 'gyur zhing // blo ldan byang chub sems rnams kyis
109a4(rgyud): byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dod khams kyi ni dbang phyu dag dang // rnal 'byor go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur// gzi lnga da na stobs kyis phyug pa dang // mdangs bzang mthong na dga'
109a5(rgyud): ba dang // mthong ngam tshig gis bskul ba yis// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du byed// gsang ba 'di ni mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa yin// de nyid sngags kyi gas
109a6(rgyud): ba 'di// rdo rje gsum las 'das pa'i mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan yid 'ong la// skyes bu gang zhig gnas gyur pa// gsang ba yang dag spang ba po// de rnams ci dgar byed par 'gyur// de bzhin
109a7(rgyud): gshegs kun dam pa ste// dam tshig las ni dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlabs pa'i// le'u drug pa yin par bshad// / de nas rdo rje gsum gsang dbang // 
109a8(rgyud): dam tshig chen po de nyid gcig/ ting 'dzin gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog/ mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di gsungs so// de nyid dam tshig bzhi pa gang // 'dod pa thams cad ces te bshad// de rnams los
109b1(rgyud): spyod ldan pa yis// ci 'dod par ni bsten par bya// rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor bas// bdag dang gzhan ni mchod par bya// de ni 'jig rten mchod 'gyur ba// 'jig rten 'das pa zhi ba nyid// dka' thub myur
109b2(rgyud): de yin la// sdom pa dam pa yin par 'dod// mi zad pa ni gnyi ga ste// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyang // gzungs sogs lha rnams yin par 'dod// de dag bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgrub papo/ 
109b3(rgyud): rnams myur du 'grub// tha dad yi ge slong mo yin// de 'don pa ni za ba ste// gang zhig zlos la dga' ba de// de dag slongs mo za bar 'dod// dka' thub dag ni mi bya zhing // sdom pa mi bzang nyid kyang min// 'dod/ 
109b4(rgyud): gsum de nyid longs spyod cing // sngags kyi de nyid ma nyams pa zlas// rdo rje gsum dbye ba de gnas na// sngags rig bya// nga chub thob par 'gyur// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / 
109b5(rgyud): shi nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sem sa dpa' dang // gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog rnams gang // mi 'gyur chos ni brnyes pa yang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
109b6(rgyud): rkang gnyis mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes chags ldan pas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams bsten// byang chub sems dpa' mnyes bya zhing // byang chub pha rol phyin chags bya// de ltar gzugs la/ 
109b7(rgyud): gsum shes nas// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// de nyid gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// sna tshogs rnam par snang mdzad che// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// 'di
109b8(rgyud): ni bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dril rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags rlo/ 
110a1(rgyud): ni 'dzin pa'i gtso// rol rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid don yod rdo rje grags// sna tshogs gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// reg la
110a2(rgyud): rnam gsum shes byas nas// rang gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod me long gzugs can no// nang dang de bzhin phyi rol dang // gnyi ga rje su mi dmigs pa// gzugs
110a3(rgyud): la sogs gsum do yin te// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// gzugs sgra rol sogs pa la// sems ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// gsang ba bsdus par gyur pa ni// snying po sangs rgyas kun skyed de// mkhru
110a4(rgyud): pas gzugs sgral sogs po// lha nyid du ni rtag tu sgom// de de bzhin rigs su sgom pa ni// sgom pas dar ni bsgom par dbya// na mkha'i rdo rje sbyor ba ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bsha
110a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor bas kyang // chos ni rjes su dran pa sgo// rdo rje gsum sgom rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje rjes dran sgom pa'i/ rigs dbye ji skad bshad pas kyang // chos dang longs spyod
110a6(rgyud): sprul skur byung // rigs ni rjes dran sbyor gyur pa// de bzhin khro bo rjes dran pa'o// de nyid gsum yongs gyur pa gcig/ rdo rje gsum nyid med chos nyid// lha rnams rjes dran sbyor ba ste// de sgom byang chub
110a7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// bzhi po dag ni re re bzhi// ji lta ji ltar mgu bcas sogs// de nyid lo yi grangs yin te// bcu drug par ni yongasu brtag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa yin// bud med lo grangs bcu
110a8(rgyud): drug pa/ gzugs bzang bra dang mchod pa ni// dben pa zhes byar brtsams par bya// byin gyis brlabs nas yid 'ong ba// khyang par gsum zhes bya ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo che// spyan sogs
110b1(rgyud): nyid ni bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya de nyid yang dag sbyor// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// dang por sbyor ba 'di bsgoms na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yi ge hUM dang de bzhin oM// phaT kyang
110b2(rgyud): der ni bsgom par bya// de nyid gsum tshul gsum bdag nyid// ci rigs par ni rnam par spro// 'od zer rnam pa lngas khyab pa'i// rdo rje pad+ma 'di mchog ste// gsang dang snying kha sna rtse ru// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di
110b3(rgyud): bsgom bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin dkar bar// shes rab de ni rtag tu sgom// gang phyi yid ni dgar gyur pas// de bas de nang yid 'ong ba'o// gnas med gnas par lags sbyor bar// bzhi mtshungs// 
110b4(rgyud): gcig tu sbyor ba rig/ sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// / byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// nyams dga' sad das rgyas kun gyis bsten// b+ha ga zhi ba gcig pu'i ming // rang gi de
110b5(rgyud): nyid gnyis med byung // rdo rje de bdag nyid du sbyor// sangs rgya sa rjes dran sbyor ba ste// b+ha ga ling ga yin par bsgrags// gzhug pa gnyis med sbyor ba ste// sangs rgyas gzugs sgom
110b6(rgyud): pa'o// de las blo ldan gyis spro ba// ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mor gnas// mnyam pa med pas khyad par du// sangs rgyas sprin rnams der spro'o// chos rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // rdo rje chos kyi rab sbyor bas/ 
110b7(rgyud): pad+ma yang dag sbyar// b+ha ga'i long gar brtag pa'o// de nas pa spu'i bu ga las// 'bad pas chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de nyid bsam kun rdzogs byed pa'i// 'di ni chos kyi bdag po yin// rdo rje rje su dran pa sgo/ 
110b8(rgyud): dngos med gcig pu la sbyor ba// stong la rdo rje rab sbyor 'gyur// b+ha ga ling gnas bshad do// de nas pa spu'i bu gnas// rdo rje sprin rnams kun tu spro// rdo rje byang chub sems sgom nyid// myur du dngos grub
111a1(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur// rigs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas stong nyid rdo rje las// de bzhin rnal 'byor pas spros nas// rigs kyi dngos grung 'thob par 'gyur// khro bo rdzas/ 
111a2(rgyud): dran sbyor ba la'ang // stong dang rdo rje gnyis ldan pa'i// khro bo'i ba spu'i bu gnas// khro bo'i sprin rnams spro bar bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// khyab bdag rnam snang mdzod chen la// rjes dran sbyor ba'i
111a3(rgyud): dgongs pa ni// thub pa chal slar zhus pa// thub khyod kyis ni gang gsungs pa// b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba ni// 'jig rten 'das pa'i sbyor 'di las// sangs rgyas la sogs spro gyur pa// tshul 'di ma 'ongs
111a4(rgyud): skye bo la// byings kun rmongs skyed pa ste// 'deg shegs rnams da kyi bdagu bos ni// ci phyi gsungs zhes de rnams smra// dgro bas namakha' mtshan ma can// rnon 'byung khyed nyid mi shes
111a5(rgyud): shing 'de rnams shin rmongs dbye bas// ji bzhin par ni dz+ha/ sa par byed// mgon khyod bde ba chen po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi sngon gcig pu// sku med sring gsum bdag nyid can/ 
111a6(rgyud): dgongs pa gnyis ka'i mtshan dang ldan// de bas khyod ni chos kun gyi// yon tan gsum bdag de nyid gsum// dgongs pa bya ba dri med gsum// sangs rgyas kyi ni bdud rtsi 'thung // khyod 'dir blas/ 
111a7(rgyud): khyab 'jug ste// ling ga drag po'i ming can nyid// khyod ni sa bon tshangs la brtags// khyod ni rten 'byung 'gro ba 'byung // dus gsum las 'das rnal 'byor che// dus dang rtsis su gyur pa nyid// shes
111a8(rgyud): dang shes bya rnam par grol// de bas khyod ni 'gro ba'i blo// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// de la sogs pa'i cho ga gsan nas// dam tshig rjes su dran sbom po// bcom ldan 'das ni ston par mdzad/ 
111b1(rgyud): rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor las// rang gi khu ba'i thigs skyes pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' sgom// dkyil 'khor rjes su dran bdag nyid// dbang po gnyis nyid spyo
111b2(rgyud): ba las// rang gi tshangs pa rtag dngas te// rnal 'byor pas ni dkyil 'khor bya// sku rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba yang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi phung po lnga// sangs rgyas de nyid sogs brtag pa// bdag kyang // 
111b3(rgyud): de dang 'dra bar rig/ gsung rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba lnga// rdo rje chos gsung phun sum tshogs// de yi gsung ci 'dra bar 'gyur// bdag kyang de dang 'drar chos 'dzin// thugs rjes dran pa'i sbyor ba gang
111b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang da yin// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sems can rje/ da sa dran sbyor ba gang // sems can rjes dran rdo rje nyid// spyod pa
111b5(rgyud): mkha' mtshungs ji bzhin du// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyurar// sngags sku rdo rje gsum zhes pa// de sbyor dran pa sgom pa ni// rdo rje sngags kyi sku gang yin// gsung dang sku ni rnamasgo
111b6(rgyud): pal de nyid gsum mnyam gcig pa nyid// rtag tu gsum 'das gyur pa yi// sngags 'dzin mchog ni ci 'dra ba// bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dam tshig rjes dran rnams kyis ni// de bas tshangs
111b7(rgyud): pa shin tung byung // dngos med gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du gsung // de bzhin gshegs mchog che ba ni// dngos med ces bya bsad pa ste// blo dang ldan pas 'di bsad na// 
111b8(rgyud): dngos grub sngags mchog thob par 'gyur// shes rab dam tshig sbyor gyur pa// rjes su dran pa zhes bshad do// pha rol phyin pa zhes grags pa// yod medo gnyis dang bral ba'o// thams cad rang bzhin
112a1(rgyud): dri ma med// ma skyes pa dang zad pa med// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// khams med 'byung ba'ang med pa'o// ma skyes rjesu sbyor ba gang // der ni ci yang brjod min zhing // 
112a2(rgyud): ma skyes ming ni gcig pu ba// dran pa de ni yin par bshad// ji ltar na mkha' 'od gsal ba// mtshan ma med cing 'gyur ba med// rang bzhin mkha' dang 'drar gyur cing // gnyis med gnyis su yod min
112a3(rgyud): zhing // yan lag bcu gnyis sbyor gcig gang // zhe sdang rdzogs logs spyod pa'i ming // sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten gyur cing // da ni rigs rjes dran zhes bya// rten 'byung las skyes rdzogs sangs te// 
112a4(rgyud): bud med lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// brtan pa'i sems ni thob da pa las// rang gi khu bas mchod par bya// dngos med pa dag nyid dag pa gang // de ni dag par bshad pa yin// de nyid kyis ni
112a5(rgyud): mchod par bsngags// shes rab pha rol phyin pas 'gro// 'di yis lus la mchod pa dang // khyad par du ni de bzhin gshe gas// rdo rje 'dzin bshad de bzhin thugs// chos 'dzin pa yi sku
112a6(rgyud): gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs ni gang dag grub// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// gang bshad rigs ni dman bshad pa// de la'ang tshul de grub par 'gyur// de nyid mchod par bshad pa nyid// de bzhin sa sa
112a7(rgyud): rab tu brtag/ mi phyed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yang // gsung gi dbang bskur ba nyid gsal// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gang zhig sems ni ma rmongs pa// mkha' la gnas pa'i nyi ma bzhin// de ni ci dgar
112a8(rgyud): spyod par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba ste// sngags spyod pa yi mchog gyur pa// le'u bdun pa rab tu bstan// / de nas dpal ldan de bzhin ga
112b1(rgyud): dkon mchog dpal ni 'od chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bla ma rdo rje gsum gyi bdag/ mgon po rdo rje 'dzin chen po// dbang phyug dbang phyug dam pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi ston pa
112b2(rgyud): la/ bstod pa 'di yis gsol ba btab// nam mkha'i spyod pa rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' thub pa che// theg pa chen po'i rnam snang ba// kun tu bzang po brtul zhugs bzang // dngos kun dngos po gcig
112b3(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ rigs mchog thams cad yang dag 'byung // rgyal ba'i dam pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ mchod pa kun mchog bshad du gsol// 'dod chags chen po zhe sdang che// gti mug chen po blo gros che
112b4(rgyud): theg pa gsum po rab ston cing // rdo rje theg pa ston pa po// nam kha' gcig pu dngos po'i mchog/ ye shes rgya mtsho bla ma che// rdo rje gsum po chags med pa// rgyal gnas mchod par
112b5(rgyud): bshad du gsol// rdo rje gsum po lam gyi mchog/ thar lam gcig pu ston pa po// sangs rgyas skal mchog shin tu dag/ mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// dngos po kun gcig
112b6(rgyud): shin tu dag/ byang chub sems ni rgya mtsho cha// chos kyi 'khor lo gcig bskor ba// rten 'brel ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje gsum gcig rnam dag don// sna tshogs sangs rgyas bya ba mdzad// 
112b7(rgyud): bdag med med chos shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// thams cad na mkha' mi 'gyur cha// thams cad dbang bskur kun dbang po// kun don rin chen
112b8(rgyud): mchog 'dzin pa'ang // na chung mig yangs btsal nas ni// gzugs dang na tshod rnams kyis rgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa// rnyed nas mi yi skye gnas brtag/ rnam par dben nam gtsang
113a1(rgyud): ba yi/ nas phyogs su ni rgyal bdag nyid// zhi ba zhi pa'i gnas yid 'ong // gshang gci chu yis byugs nas ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster ba'o// rtag tu mchod pa nyid bya'o// 
113a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yi// phung po zhes bya sna tshogs skyes// rdo rje gsum po mi phyed khams// rgyal ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// kun mkhyen ye shes lang tsho ste// len pa mi gsal la sbyor la// 
113a3(rgyud): de nyid na chung yin par brtag/ 'jig rten pa rnams 'thob byed rgya// 'gro ba'i don ni rab grub pa// gang zhig dngos med ce so bshad pa// mtha' skyes bzhin du brtag pa yin// gtsang ba rnam dag sems yin/ 
113a4(rgyud): te/ rnam par dben pa dngos med pa// sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// sa phyogs rgyal ba 'byung ba yin// zhi ba sna tshogs nges 'byung ba// zhi ba'i gnas ni myur la sogs// bshang gci yul
113a5(rgyud): dang dbang por grags// chu ni shes rab la sogs drug/ 'di dag gis gang blugs gyur pa// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i 'dod/ 'byung ba// de dag rgyal ba'i chos bshad pa// dgongs pa sbyor
113a6(rgyud): bachos nyid do// mchod pa'i yan lag gnyis pa yi// bkod pa'i yan lag mtshan nyid bshad// 'jig rten shin tu 'das spyi'o// 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying kha ru// rkang pa'i bar dang lte ba dang // rked pa
113a7(rgyud): gsang ba 'jig rten pa// rgyal sras rnams kyi bkod pa ni// rigs ni lnga po bya ba yin// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par sgom// bdag nyid zla ba'i nang gnas par// brtul
113a8(rgyud): zhugs can gyis snying kar sgom// chu de sbyor bar gyur pa ni// mA ma kir ni yongs su brtag/ zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod pas// bsdu ba de yang rab tu bya// rin chen rang bzhin mchod rten ni// 'od zer sna tshogs nyid kyis
113b1(rgyud): rgyan ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum pa// gnas de ru ni bsam bya ba// blo ldan pa spu'i bu ga las// ji lta ji ltar spro bar bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog gzhol bas// mchod pa'i sprin ni des spro bya// 
113b2(rgyud): gos dkar pad+mar yang dag dgod// rnam lnga gcig la rnal 'byor ma// me yi sbyor ba bshad pa ni// de yang mi gsal zhi lo gnas// sgron mar ud pal nyid gyur pa// rlung ste sbyor ba lnga pa'o// 'jug dang
113b3(rgyud): gnas dang skye ba dang // de bzhin sdang ba'i ming can no// de nyid rnam pa gsum byas pas// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gnas// de nas blo ldan gyis dbul ba// lha rnams kyi yang dngos med nyid// de nas de
113b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ khyab bdag rnam snang chen po las// me tog dgongs pa thos nas ni// rdo rje can gyis thub chen zhus // me dang rlung dang dbang chen dang // chu ru yongasu brtags pa yin// 
113b5(rgyud): re re'ang dang po sbyor zhes bya// me tog de lnga gsum du bshad// bya/ rgod me tog za ba dang // bung ba sha za zhes zer zhing // me ta ga 'di yi dgongs pa ni// ma 'ongs skye bos mi shes so// ma rtog
113b6(rgyud): pas ni de rnams kyi// dngos grub ring du gnas par 'gyur// 'di ltar bdag ni skal min zhes// smra zhing de rnams bdag nyid kyis smod// de ltar bdag nyid kyis spang bas// sangs rgyas thams
113b7(rgyud): cad smad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad smad gyur pas// mi las 'das nas gzhan du 'gro// gtso bo sangs rgyas nang na min// phyi rol na min gnyi gar min// tshogs pa las ni ma yin te// rkyen gyis 'gro ba dag
113b8(rgyud): la gnas// de bzhin de bzhin gshegs sangs rgyas// lus la gsang sngags 'di nyid las// gsang sngags 'grub par dka' ba'i rgyus// des ni bdag dang de dag smod// de rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// 
114a1(rgyud): dgongs pas de ni bshad du gsol// rang gi ngo bo ma 'tshal na// mkhas pa dag ni nyams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// gsang ba'i bdag po la gsungs pa// nyin
114a2(rgyud): dang mtshan mo dbye ba yis// me tog don ni bshad par bya// pad+ma ud pal nyin mor bshad// dza ti mtshan mo yin zhes bshad// lnga yi bdag nyid gsum dang gcig/ gnyis lnga gcig dang gsum du
114a3(rgyud): 'gyur la de yi thabs ni nyin mor bshad// mtshan mo shes rab ces bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba yis// 'jug du 'byung ba nyid du 'gyur// de gnyis dbus kyi sbyor ba gang // dgongs pas/ 
114a4(rgyud): yongs su brtags pa yin// de ni sangs rgyas snying por 'gyur dar// dbas lha tshogs kyis de min// rnal 'byor pa dang / sngags pa rnams// dgongs pa'i chos la rab brtson pa// dgongs pa
114a5(rgyud): byin rlabs rgyu yis ni// de rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig rlung ni bcur grags pa// de ni pad+ma ud pal mi / de nyid ces grags rdo rje gsum// dze ti gcig pu gsum du 'dod/ 
114a6(rgyud): kar ni ka dang ma li ka/ yug ti ka ra bi ra ni// go rims bzhin du spyan sogs te// sa la sogs par 'dir sbyar ro// dngos med go 'phang la bkod pas// lha rnams kyi ni skur sbyor bas// gcig tu sadra
114a7(rgyud): rgyas kun mnyes pa'i// mchod pa chen por de 'gyur ro// lnga po'i bdag nyid yang dag bzhag/ lnga bcu dag ni gnyis 'gyur byas// de nyid gsum sbyor 'khor lo ni// dpag tshad brgya yi dkyil 'khor ro// der
114a8(rgyud): ni mkhas pas rtag par ni// rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje dang // de bzhin ud pal rtag tu sgom// dpag tshad bzhi po sbyor gcig pa// dpag tshad rgya khyon de nyid gsum// byams
114b1(rgyud): ba la sogs gru ba nir 'gyur// mdzes pa phung pos rgyan pa yin// gru bzhi de ni rigs su gyur// zhi ba sbyor ba gcig ming can// mchod rten ye shes sems rang bzhin// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma
114b2(rgyud): med// rigs rnams mchod phyir de nyid ni// shes rab can gyis gnas sgom mo// mngon shes lnga yi gnas 'dod rnams// de yi mchod pa rgya mtshogs la// rin chen ye shes spro bdag nyid// gos ni bsdu
114b3(rgyud): ba zhes bya'o// mchod pa mchog rnams de dag gis// byang chub 'dod pas mchod par bya// shes rab can gyis mchod mchog las// lha rnams rtag tu mnyes par bya// sbyor gcig de las yang dag
114b4(rgyud): byung rin chen 'byung gnas na chung yin// dga' mgo yang dag ldan pa yin// dngos grub shin tu grub pa'i phyi dar// nga rgyal la sogs bdun zhes bya// rin chen thams cad dbul
114b5(rgyud): bar bya/ chos dang rdzogs longs spyod las byung // rin chen bdun gyi nor de ni// des bkang po yi zhing 'di ni// shes ra ba thabs gcig las byung ba'i// dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin pa'i
114b6(rgyud): phyirazhing de nyin re dbul bar ni// nam mkha' mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa'i// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin 'dir 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus su de// phyag rgya'i bdag por mnyam gzhag ste// 
114b7(rgyud): 'dod chags blo ldan sangs rgyas la// rag par yang dag sbyor ba dbul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa sgom// bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// yul
114b8(rgyud): dang dbang po sun 'byin pa// dngos med gcig par yang dag 'byung // yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba'i// bshang gci ji lta ji lta bar// de nyid mchod pa rnams kyis mchod// bskal bzang bzhin ni mdzes pa
115a1(rgyud): yi/ dbud med gzugs bzang rnyed pa dang // gsang sngags yi ge'i gnas 'gyur bas// rnal 'byor ma de byin rlabs la// byas nas gnyis med sbyor gcig pu// rang gi / 
115a2(rgyud): ni nang du gzhug/ spyan sogs ji lta ji lta bar// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas bkod de// mig bzang dag pa'i bya ba yi// dag byung khu ba blangs nas mchod// gang zhig de ltar rtogs pa de// blangs pas rdo rje
115a3(rgyud): 'tshang bar 'gyur// sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gang // spyan la sogs par rab brtags pa// de ni 'jug sogs sbyor ba yang // de ni khu ba za bar 'gyur// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku
115a4(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste// rdo rje ye shes can gsang gis// / gsang sngags dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/ rin chen ka/ na gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas/ 
115a5(rgyud): gang zhig sems ni bzod gyur pa// de ni ji bzhin nyid du'ang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje gsung ni/ gsang ba las// gshang gci'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i// le'u
115a6(rgyud): brgyad pa yin par bshad// / de nas de bzhin gshegs mchog gtso// thams cad na mkha' mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ gzugs don dbang phyug
115a7(rgyud): dam pa yin// rdo rje gsum nyid longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes sbyor gcig pa'o// gsang ba nyams ni dga' bar bshad// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa
115a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// rdo rtse gtsog rdo rje yang // sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgos// 'od 'phro mang po 'bar ba dang // 'od ber sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag 'jug
115b1(rgyud): bsgoms la rdo rjes phye mar brlag// rdo rje gsum gcig longs spyod ni// rdo rjes phyer brlags med gyur pa'i// thugs kyi dngos grub byed bsam gtan// bsgoms na myur du thob par 'gyur// rje
115b2(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bu// rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// sems can thams cad bsad na ni// de ni myur bar mi bskyod pa'i// rgyal ba'i sras su skye bar 'gyur// zhe sdang rigs chen
115b3(rgyud): de nyid kyis// zhing de 'gengs par byed par 'gyur// de nas dgongs pa chos gcig pu// gtso bo kun mkhyen thams cad rig/ dam tshig de nyid gsungs pa yi// mgon la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// 'di
115b4(rgyud): ltar dngos med mchog gyur pa// khyod ni chos rnams ston mdzad pa// 'jig rten pa dang 'gal tshig gis// mgo na khyod ci phyir ston par mdzad// gang zhig de bzhin nyid dngos gcig
115b5(rgyud): dus gsum byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// chos sku gcig bu las 'khrungs pa// ji ltar rdo rjes phye mar brlag/ de ni phyir brlags gyur pa las// ji ltar yang dag sems 'grub
115b6(rgyud): 'gyur// chos sku gcig pu las byung las// lhag pa zhes bya gyur nas su// dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams// phye mar brlag par ji ltar nus// phyir brlag byed pas dngos med pas/ 
115b7(rgyud): phye ma nyid kyang khyad par du// sangs rgyas sngags don rnal 'byor pa// nus pa bsam mi khyab ldan la// de 'dra bar ni phyir brlag par// sngags pa gzhan gyis mi nus so// sems can gyis ni sems can
115b8(rgyud): bzhin// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas phyer brlags pas// 'di gnyis khyad par med do zhes// ma 'ongs skye bo smra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas gcig pu mthar thug pa// min zhes mi rnams nges smra zhing // gang
116a1(rgyud): zhig sangs rgyas kyi gsungs bzhin// rab tu spong bar byed par 'gyur// theg bzang bsgrubs na 'tshang rgya ba// dgongs pa'i bum pa bzang po mchog/ de ni bcom ldan myur
116a2(rgyud): sbyor bas// mi bskyod zhing du skyes 'gyur ram// sems can 'khor bar 'khor gyur pa// de tshe zhe sdang che skye 'am// snying rjes bsad par bya'o zhes// sngags pa rnams ni de mi spong // 'das tshe ston par/ 
116a3(rgyud): gyur pa dang // da ltar rjes su ston mdzad dang // mnyes bya ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol ba'o// mi bskyod gzugs can rdo rje yis// de rnams ji ltar gzhom par bgyi// de nyid
116a4(rgyud): sna tshogs don ldan tshig/ de rnams kyis ni ji ltar rtog so// / gang zhig shes pas rgyal sras rnams// dgongs pa'i don la rtog med 'gyur// ma 'ongs skye bo'i don du ni// de nyid bcom
116a5(rgyud): ldan bshad du gsol// de nas rdo rje 'dzin smra yi// 'gro la phan ba'i tshig gsan nas// de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang // khyab bdag gis ni slar gsungs pa// legs so bu khyod cher
116a6(rgyud): legs te// kun tu bzang po khyod legs so// dgongs pas bshad pa'i don du ni// khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa// gsungs don ji lta ji lta bar// de ni nga yis bshad par bya// phung sogs yan lag/ 
116a7(rgyud): gang gyur pa// sangs rgyas sems can rab brtan zhing // sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yang // dbye ba sna tshogs rab tu brtan// 'khor ba mi bskyod ming can te// de'i sngags rdo rje zhes bya ba// mi gsal rdo rjen
116a8(rgyud): bshad // dngos med gcig pu rdo rje nyid// nges bshig pa ni bsad pa ste// sangs rgyas sems can khyad par du// sna ni tshogs kyi dbang po yi// kha ni rang bzhin nyid du g.yo// rnal 'byor pa yi lag gyur// 
116b1(rgyud): 'gro ba rlung gi ming can no// mi bskyod rdo rje'i sbyor ba nyid// lag tu rdo rje bzhag nas ni// de tshe myur la sogs bya ba// klu yi rang bzhin sna tshogs nyid// phung sogs brtags pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// sku
116b2(rgyud): gsung thugs las yang dag byung // de yi yan lag phung por bshad// de ni phyir 'gyur bsad pa yin// 'di ni zhe sdang rigs yid 'ong // mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje nyid// de'i zhing skyed dam pa yin// dngos
116b3(rgyud): grub chen po des 'thob 'gyur// de nas dpal ldan bde chen po// ye shes thar pa rab sgrub pa// rang bzhin dag gis gos med pa// byang chub spyod pa rab sgrub pas// phyag na rdo rje 'od chen po// gsang
116b4(rgyud): ba gsum gyi gtso bo la// bos nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// sgrub pa'i dam tshig de nyid gsungs// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa la/ 
116b5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad bsgom bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje ga zugs ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis/ 
116b6(rgyud): rdzas rnams thams cad dbrog par bya// shes dang dbang po ldog par 'gyur// rnam smin dngos po med pa gang // de nyid dbrog pa'i rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub po// rin chen rdo rje mchog
116b7(rgyud): sbyor ba kha rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur ba dang // nor gyi rgya mtshos gang ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni gti mug rigs de nyid// dam tshig yin par yongs su bsgrags/ 
116b8(rgyud): rigs kun rgya mtsho zhes bya ste// de las thub pa'i skyes mchog 'gyur// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags thar par rab 'jug pa// gsang ba dag pa gnas med pa// dkyil
117a1(rgyud): 'khor mchog ni bka' stsal to// namakha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dpag med chos ni rnam bsgoms te// sangs rgyas
117a2(rgyud): kun gyis rab tu dgang // bud med lta bu'i sbyor ba yang // ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor ba yis// thams cad da ru bsgom par bya// 'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog yin// dngos med bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis// 
117a3(rgyud): gsal mi gsal la yang dag sbyar// chos dang rdzogs longs spyod sbyor ba// gsang sngags kyis sprul dbang po gnyis// sbyor ba bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor pa'i// snyoms/ 
117a4(rgyud): zhugs sbyor ba de yis ni// de dag thams cad nye bar spyod// sku gsu dam mi phyed sngags rnams kyis// 'di ni sgom pa mchog de yin// de nyid dam tshig sbyor ba 'di// 'dod chags
117a5(rgyud): rigs gcig sgom pa'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ 'dod chags chen po'i tshul mchog ste// sngags pa rna mas kyis nyin re zhing // rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par
117a6(rgyud): bya// de nas gsang dbang rdo rje gsum// rdo rje sngags don sgrub pa'o// bdag med ye shes las byung bas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ 
117a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// don yod rdo rje rnam bsgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// rdo rje tshig gi brdzun smra ba// rgyal ba thams cad slu ba ste// 'di ni
117a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// nam mkha'i gsung ni dri med pa'o// gang zhig brdzun du smra bshad pa// brdzun de nyid ni dam pa ste// dpa' bo gang zhig sgom byed pa// de ni rgyal ba'i mchog du 'gyur
117b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i ye shes dam pa ste// sangs rgyas dngos grub byed pa'i mchog/ dam tshig 'gugs par gang gyur pa'i// rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'o// kun tu kun nas 'bad ba yis// ji
117b2(rgyud): bzhin don du drang byas te// so sor rtog pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni dngos grub rgya chen 'thob// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// mi phyed rdo rje gsum rgyal bdag/ rdo rje'i dngos grub rab ston
117b3(rgyud): pas/ gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// der ni dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku ru rab brtags pa'i// dam tshig de ni yang dag
117b4(rgyud): bshad// dkon mchog dpal ni rab bsgoms te// gzugs rnams kun gyis sa 'di gang // phung po la sogs grangs mnya mu pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis thams cad du/ 
117b5(rgyud): rngub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// sa rnams dman pa zhes bya ba'i// bsgoms na dngos grub thob 'gyur zhes// bcom lda na thub pas de skad gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa
117b6(rgyud): kun bkod pa// sna tshogs gzugs can 'od po che// bsam bsad dpal ldan gcig pu nyid// dpag tu med par gyur pa yin// de nas gang zhig dam tshig sogs// chos dbyings rdo rje
117b7(rgyud): gsum nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// dam tshig rdo rje dpal la sogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas ni// tshig lam rdo rje zhes bya 'di
117b8(rgyud): de ni de rnams brjod par byed// ci 'di mgon po bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ gang zhig khams gsum las 'das shing // 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa// 
118a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen gyi// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ngo mtshar che ba'i tshig gi lam// gtso
118a2(rgyud): de'i yang dag rdo rje'i tshig/ dgongs pas ci slad gang gsungs shes// brjod kyis mi lang ba yi yang // brjod mi lang ba rnams kyis gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyis// brjod
118a3(rgyud): kyis mi lang ba yi yang// brjod kyis mi lang grangs kyi ni// ri rab rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // dam tshig rdo rje dpal sogs pa'i// byang chub sems
118a4(rgyud): dpa' sems chen la// dngos med las byung gsal ba gsungs// dman dang dmad pa'i 'du shes ni// rgyal ra ba'i sras rnams ma skyed cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs/ 
118a5(rgyud): 'byung ba gang 'di spyod mchog yin// 'di ltar sngags kyi/ spyod mchog 'di// rnam par dag yin rigs kyi bu// sangs rgyas mnyam med 'byung 'gyur 'di// gsang ba'i sngags
118a6(rgyud): don spyod pa nyid// 'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu// nam mkha' kun tu song ba ste// chos rnams kun kyang der rtogs shing // rab dbye'i sbyor bar gyur pa nyid// 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas shing // 
118a7(rgyud): de ni gzugs kyi khams mi gnas// de bzhin gzugs med khams na'ang min// 'byung ba bzhi la de mi gnas// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang // de ltar rje su rig par bya// de lta'i don gyi dang mkhyen nas/ 
118a8(rgyud): dgongs pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams// de bzhin gshegs rnams dgongs nyid kyis// chos rnams ston par mdzad pa yin// de bzhin du ni khyed rnams kyis// mdor na khong du chud par bya// yang dag
118b1(rgyud): byang chub don rnams kyis// nam mkha'i nges tshig sbyor bas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba byung // dam tshig rjes su rig par bya// 'di ltar dper na rigs kyi bu// gtsub shing gtsub stan
118b2(rgyud): bcas pa dang // skyes bu'i lag pa bskyod pa yi// rkyen las du ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas me yang 'byung mod kyi// gnub shing la sogs re ra nas// 'di ltar so sor brtags na go/ ma de gang
118b3(rgyud): na'ang mi gnas so// brag cha dang ni gzugs brnyan dang // sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // de bzhin chu zla rmi lam ste// chos rnams thams cad de dang 'dra// mgon po pi bang sgra lta bu// rkyen don las
118b4(rgyud): tshig yang dag byung // de bzhin 'gro'ang gnas pa rnams// cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// gnas pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin// 
118b5(rgyud): des na khyed kyis rdo rje yi// dam tshig rjes su rig par bya// de ltar chos rnams dngos med ces// gsang ba'i de nyid don mkhas pas// rnam par smin pa ldog bya'i phyir// phung
118b6(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// ngo mtshar smad du byung nas ni// rngams pa yis ni mig gdangs te// tshig ni 'di skad ces gsol to// chos 'di
118b7(rgyud): ngo mtshar rmad byung ste// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa yi// mi rtog rnam par dag pa yang // kun rdzob du ni bshad par mdzad// dam tshig chen po yang dag gnas// dgongs pa lung ston
118b8(rgyud): mchog la ni// gang zhig yid 'ong bzod gyur pa// de ni de bzhin spyod pa yin// mchog tu dag pa'i de nyid don// gsang ba chen po zhes bya ba// dam tshig tshul ni yang dag bshad// le'u dgu
119a1(rgyud): brdzogs pa sim// de nas de bzhin gshegs pakun// rdo rje gsum 'byung bcom ldan 'das// slar yang dgos
119a2(rgyud): pa 'dus nas ni// bla ma chen po bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig rdo rje de nyid gnas// mngon par byang chub dang dpon nyid// sku dang gsung thugs gtsang gtse la// btud de de bzhin gshegs pas
119a3(rgyud): gsol// snying po sngags ni kun bsdus pas// gsang ba yang dag rdo rje gsum// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ye
119a4(rgyud): shes/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// gsung gcig du ma'i rnam par rtog/ yang dag bsdus don dang zhi na gsungs// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// nyon
119a5(rgyud): mongs kun gyi rgya mchog co// 'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje gsum// sku dang gsung thugs sgom pa ni/ 
119a6(rgyud): mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog pa// dmigs pa med cing gnas med pa'o// de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das// rang bzhin dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs// pha rol phyin pa sngags tshul gyi// 
119a7(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya'i ting 'dzin la// dpa' bo chen po snyoms zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs kun la gsungs pa// gang phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'di na// 
119a8(rgyud): mgon po mi bskyod la sogs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa du ma dang // rig pa bye ba khrag khrig ni// brgya stong du ma zhes pa dang // sems can don pa la rol dang // mchog ni de rnams ston par
119b1(rgyud): mdzad// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams mchog tu// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan pas// rol cing dgyes par gyur pa dang // yongs su spyod pa yod kyang ni// sngags spyod pa la brtson rnams/ 
119b2(rgyud): la kye ma dpa' bo de bzhin gshegs// rang gtsogasang sngags spyod tshul mchog/ chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin can// 'di dag rdzogs par gyur mnyam nas// spyan ras kyi ni 'tsho mi mdzad
119b3(rgyud): de ltar rnam par spyad pa'i don// gsang sngags brtul zhugs spyod rnams la// yang dag par ni byin rlabs phyir// de ni ston par mdzad 'di yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog
119b4(rgyud): thub la phyag na rdo rjes gsol// mgon po de bzhin ga/ shegs de rnams// so so skye bar gyur pa la// dngo // sa po med cing dmigs su med// nam mkha'i khams dang / 
119b5(rgyud): mnyam gyur nas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngar ldan nas// ji ltar de rnams rol par mdzad// de rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// nges par gyur pa'i 'khor rnams dang // 
119b6(rgyud): sems can don gyi bya ba kun// 'dod pas ston par mdzad pa yin// mgon po 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams// sbyin sogs drug ces bya bar 'byung // thams cad dag kyang de nyid 'byung // pha rol/ 
119b7(rgyud): phyin par mnyam gzhag nyid// de ltar pha rol phyin 'byung ba'i// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan// 'gro ba'i don gyi bya ba yang // 'dod pa lnga po 'di yis mdzad// 'di rnams kyis ni mgon
119b8(rgyud): po 'di// mi bskyod la sogs rgyal ba rnams// rol cing dgyes par mdzad pa dang // 'gro ba'i don kyang mdzad gyur cing // 'jig rten pa dang 'gal bya rnams// de yang de bzhin mdzad gyur pa
120a1(rgyud): dag pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog 'di// de rnams kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur// phyag byar 'os pa'i rig pa ni// nges par ldan pa nges par 'dong // yod med la sogs
120a2(rgyud): byed pa ni// gnyis 'gyur mtshan ma can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu lam du chos gsungs pa// gang zhig 'jig rten phung po lnga// khams la sogs par mtshon pa gang // gzugs sogs/ 
120a3(rgyud): zhes bya'i ming can yin// 'di ni yan lag thams cad ni// bya ba nyan thos theg pa'o// de nyid rkyen gyi theg pa ste// tshig de ston par mdzad pa 'di// gang zhig rdo rje theg par gnas// de bzhin
120a4(rgyud): ji bzhin sgra ru 'dzin// shes rab pha rol phyin pa la// nges par 'byung ba'i tshul gsum po// chos sku ngo bo la sog/ das pa// mkha' dbyings mtha' yas rnal 'byor pa// gnas/ 
120a5(rgyud): med gnas par sbyor ba yis// 'gro ba'i snying du rnam rol pa// zhi ba gcig la gnas pa'i mgon// 'khor ba dang ni gcig shos spangs// sngags las yang dag 'byung
120a6(rgyud): bde/ mi bskyod la sogs par brtags rnams// dngos med gnas la gnas pas na// sgrub pa po rnams gzigs mi 'gyur// gsang sngags rkyen gyi sbyor ba yis// de ni rdzogs longs
120a7(rgyud): spyod gzigs 'gyur// bcom ldan gsang ba gsungs pa 'di// don de 'tshal bar ma gyur pas// rnam rtog du ma'i kun rtog las// chos nyid de yis shes mi 'gyur// ji skad gsungs pa
120a8(rgyud): mi shes pas// phyi dus skye bo la la smra// 'jig rten pa rnams drang bya'i phyir// gsang bar gyur pa bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs pas// lag na rdo rje grags pa che// dgongs
120b1(rgyud): pa'i don ni rtogs gyur pa// bu khyod shes rab chen po legs// gang zhig shes pas ma 'ongs pa'i// skye bo rnam par mi rtog 'gyur// tshig gcig la yang sna tshogs don// yang dag bsdus nas
120b2(rgyud): khyod kyis bshad// de nas dam pa bcom ldan 'das// bla ma kun mkhyen thams cad rig/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la// spyan ras kyis ni 'tsho bya'i phyir// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di// de bzhin/ 
120b3(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// gsang ba yi ni mchog gi gnas// snying po sngags rnams thams cad kyi// bskul ba gcig pu zhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs
120b4(rgyud): kun gsang gcig pu// mchig las mchog tu gsungs gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi yang dag rtogs// dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs// 
120b5(rgyud): dam tshig la ni dmigs pa dang // chos 'dzin pa yi sku gsu thugs// dam tshig la dmigs de bzhin no// nyid sku gsung thugs rdo rje las// tshig lam nges par brjod pa ni// 
120b6(rgyud): de nyid sngags su yang dag bsdus// sna tshogs gsung ba gzugs gcig pu// yi ge hUM ni sku gsungs la// de nas yi ge oM gsungs te// de bzhin mgon pos yi ge AH// sA ni de bzhin
120b7(rgyud): bzhi pa yin// hA yang 'dod lhar gyur pa ste// de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas lnga// hUM oM AHswA de bzhin hA// 'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// rab tu 'ang
120b8(rgyud): zhing brgyal bar gyur// de rnams gnyis med sbyor la gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// ni ba'i sbyor bar chos gcig pa'i// rnam par mi rtog chos gcig skyes// de nas bcom ldan 'a/ 
121a1(rgyud): de yang / de bzhin gshegs kun bdag po yis// de yi byin rlabs sbyor don du// dam tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ dkyil
121a2(rgyud): 'khor bkod pa zhes bya ba// re re'ang gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// sgom par sbyor ba bsgom par bya// bye brag gsum po gcig brtags pa'ang // bkod pa mi gsal ba nyid do// zla ba'i dbus gnas
121a3(rgyud): yi ge hUM/ rang gi gzugs gcig rab tu brtag/ rdo rje 'od zer rab 'bar ba// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// snying la de yis rnam bsgoms nas/ 
121a4(rgyud): dpal ldan de nyid skad cig der// rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje na// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang chen gtso// 'di ni kun ma chog chen por skye// rang gi sngags kyis bskyed bya ba/ 
121a5(rgyud): sngags kyi cho ga dam pa'o// snying po rang gi rdo rje sngags/ rdo rje bsdus pa zhes bshad do// rang sngags tshul las b+hu nga ba'o// skyes bu'i gzugs su bsgom par bya// sbyor ba
121a6(rgyud): bzhi po sbyor gcig pus// gnas bzhi dag tu de dgod do// kha dog gsum po zhal gsum lta'i// de nyid gsum gcig rnam sgom zhes// bcom ldan 'das mchog nam mkha' ni// rdo rje dam
121a7(rgyud): tshig gtso bos gsungs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid thub pa che// gcol phyag na rdo rje yis// gsang ba 'di ni slar zhus pa// hUM oM AHdang sA hA zhes// de nas
121a8(rgyud): 'di ni gsungs gyur pas// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// de nas rab 'dar brgyal gyur cing // rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pa// thub chen de 'dir ji lta bur// mgon bo ni byings na// 
121b1(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa mi rtogs la// gcig pu mkha' mnyam sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen rnams// rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal 'gyur ces// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtog so// 
121b2(rgyud): lan brgya stong dang bye ba yi// grangs dag tu ni ston mdzad cing // ston pa sna tshogs ston mdzad kyang // 'dar zhing brgyal bar de ma gyur// ma 'ongs dus na'ang 'byung 'gyur ba// mi ni mkhas
121b3(rgyud): papa'i nga rgyal can// bla ma'i lung ni blangs nas su// rtags ni rang nyid 'dzin par byed// da ni sngags don gsungs pa yi// mtshan nyid gsang 'di mi shes par// sngags don de nyid mkhas pa
121b4(rgyud): yis// gzhan rnams la ni mi snyan sgrogs// 'khrul dab cung zad tsam mthong na// gzhang gang dag ni byed para'agyur// reg na dug dang mtshungs pa yi// mi de zhi bar mi 'gyur
121b5(rgyud): gang zhig yid ni rin chen 'dra'i// 'gro la phan pa'i sngags pa rnams// 'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang // dngos gru/ kha mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de rnams yang dag bsdu ba'i phyir
121b6(rgyud): skad cig rjes gsung grub don du// sbyar bar dgongs pa'i bsam pa can// bcom ldan 'di ni bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// 'gro phan phyag na rdo rje la// de ltar sbyar ba
121b7(rgyud): yang dag sbyor// sgom pa'i dngos po rtog byed pa// dbang po nyi ma thub pa nyid// gang zhig phyogs bcur gnas pa rnams// sras bcas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa
121b8(rgyud): thams cad gyur// phung po la sogs grangs mnyam pa'i// lus las skyes te yod pa 'di// stong pa'i rkyen du sbyor ba las// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas gyur 'dod// sngags de sngags pa
122a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas de// bdag nyid de sras yang dag sbyor// zhi sogs mnyam pa'i sbyor ba las// zhi ba'i bde bde nas brtsam// bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis dag cing // rang
122a2(rgyud): bzhin drin med byas la// dal dang myur dang gnas pa yi// sna tshogs de gcig dag la gzhug/ yid dman rim la sogs pas kyang // sbyor ba de nyid dag la gnas// de nas dbang po med gyur pa// 
122a3(rgyud): gang tshe zhi ba'i bde gcig pu// rang bzhin dag pa'i sbyor ba ste// de yi chos ni lta ba po// de nas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sngags// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jam las byung // gang phyir rang ni zlo
122a4(rgyud): gyur pa// yi ge hUM gi gsang sngags lnga// de tshe snying las rab 'dar cing // dbang po thams cad brgyal bar gyur// gang yang phung sogs yan lag ni// sras bcas
122a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad de// de nyid kyi ni grangs mnyam pa'i// rnal 'byor pa yi lus rab 'dar// nye bar mtshon sogs tshig rnams ni// phung po la sogs bshad pa gang // sangs
122a6(rgyud): rgyas sras bcas par gyur te// de ni brgyal zhing 'dar bar 'gyur// de gnyis la ni snyoms 'jug pa// sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang bcas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid dran te// de sngags
122a7(rgyud): bdag nyid dngos las byung // de 'dir mchog tu bshad pa yin// rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba// phra mo'i snying gong dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam pa'o// de yi dbus gnas zhi
122a8(rgyud): ba yi 'go 'phang mchog ni bsam par bya// de hUM nas bya'i 'od po che// de yongs gyur pa'i rdo rje ni// 'di ni mchog grur rtse ldan// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu sgom// rdo rje lcags su'i sbyor
122b1(rgyud): yis// rdo rje gsum ni bsam par bya// de yi snying khar bsnams nas ni// lha rnams rab tu bskul bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// 'khor ma
122b2(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs sogs pa'ang // rol mo 'di ni dag pa ste// rdo rje lcags kyu rnam bsgoms nas// snying kha ru ni bskul bar 'gyur// rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun par du byas nas
122b3(rgyud): ni ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // rdo rje gsum po yang dag sdug/ phung po la sogs sangs rgyas gang // do ni dngos po med lta ba// de nyid mchog go gsang sngags kyis// skrag po rnam
122b4(rgyud): smin mthong ba la// skrag pa mi rnams 'di dag ste// gas sngags gnyis med sbyor cig zung // mthong bas skrag ste mchog ster cing // 'di dag 'di nyid brtags pa yin// 
122b5(rgyud): zhi ba gcig pu'i sbyor ba las// sngags lus rdzogs pa nyid da gyur nas// yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur pa'i// dngos grub rgya cher ster bar 'gyur// phung po la btags
122b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i don sgrub pas// rmongs pas 'da' ba byas nas ni// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor gcig
122b7(rgyud): las// 'di ni 'jig rten 'das pa mchog/ de las bzlog pa 'jig rten pa'o// de nas bdag po bcom ldan 'das// 'jig rten gsum gtso ston pa po// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso
122b8(rgyud): gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang zhig sngags kyi skyes bur bshad// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes gzugs// de ni dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i// gcig par sgom pa rtag tu byed// 
123a1(rgyud): bdag dmigs sems can yong min pa'i// sngags kyi dbang po rnam sgom pa// dbang po gnyis sbyor bzang po ste// dngos po thams cad rnam brtags pa'o// 
123a2(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig mchog sgom pa'o// rang gzugs rdo rje yang dag sbyor// rig ma dbang phyug bdag kyang sgom// gnyis med gnyis su med chags pa/ 
123a3(rgyud): lta bdam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// gsang ba zhes bya der sbyar ba// de nyid mnyam pa'i bdag nyid do// de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// thams cad dbang bskur dam pa ni// mi phyed rdo rje gsum
123a4(rgyud): grub pa// gsang ba'i dgongs pa bka' stsal to// na mkha' mtha' yas sbyor ba yis// phung po bdag nyid mi dmig das pa// chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rim// bud med de/ 
123a5(rgyud): ni rgya chen 'gyur// rab tu sbyor ba 'di yis ni// 'gro ba'i bud med ces bya ba// gsang sngags de nyid don gas nyi // de ni gsang bar nye bar spyod// der ni yid 'ong sangs
123a6(rgyud): rgyas rnams// bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin// sngags rig dam pa spro'o zhes// der ni bcom ldan gtso bos gsungs// byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig ni// ston pa 'dir ni bla mcher// 'jig
123a7(rgyud): rten pa la 'dir bshad de// 'jig rten 'das pa bzlog pa'o// nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub ni// 'di yis shin tu 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi yon tan mtsho// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog
123a8(rgyud): des 'thob// dgongs pa lung bstan gsang ba la// gang zhig sems ni dad gyur po// gsang ba 'bad de yang dag srung // de ni rtag tu logs par byed// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba las// de bzhin
123b1(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi yang // de nyid bskul ba zhes bya ba// le'u bcu pa yin par bshad// / de nas ston pa bcom ldan 'das// 
123b2(rgyud): rdo rje gsum mchog mchog gsang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun mchog gcig/ nyi shu rtsa lnga mchog zhes bya'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje yis/ 
123b3(rgyud): sngags rig skyes bu zhes bya ba'i// le'u 'di ni bka' stsal te// sngags mchog de ni phyag rgya che// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes sgom// rtogs dang bri ba 'thob pa'i phyir// rdo rje ye shes dag gis kyang // 
123b4(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs yang dag bshad// ye shes snying po dam pa ste// rdo rje gsum sogs bshad gyur pa/ sku yi rdo rje 'thob byed pa'o// a dang zung ni gsung rdo rje/ 
123b5(rgyud): byang chub bdag med 'thob byed pa'o// hUM ni rdo rje gsum mtha 'a nyid// sku gsung thugs ni 'thob byed pa'o// de ni 'jug sogs gnas nyid dang // ldang ba dag tu rab tu bshad
123b6(rgyud): nyi shu lnga sogs ming can gyi// skyes bu'i gzugs su 'di 'gyur ro// de bas re re'ang gsum nyid de// rdo rje gsang sngags nyid du gyur// brjod med sa bon brgyad pa las// de ni nam mkha' las brgyal
123b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ brgya phyed rlung ni gcig pu la// de las nges par nyi shu lnga// skyes bu nyid du byung ba na// mgrin bcu zhes bya'i ming can dang // sgra sgrogs gsod pa'i dga' byed 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa
123b8(rgyud): gcig nyid gyur// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po ste// 'jug pa la sogs rim du bshad// 'di dag bsnyengs med de gcig pu// de ni zhi ba dngos med nyid// de las kyang ni yang dag 'byung // 
124a1(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs sku dam pa'o// de nas sngags gcig sprul pa las// 'gro ba'i don gyi bya bar 'gyur// mtshams dang skye mchod nor lha'o// zla ba zung cig rig
124a2(rgyud): byed de// de la sogs pa'i grangs gyur rnams// de ni rig pa'i skyes bur gnas/ 'di rnams las gcig gzung nas ni// sangs rgyas rol mo bstan par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid 'di// 
124a3(rgyud): na mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa zhes bshad pa// yi ge b+h+rUM ni des bsam mo// rdo rje sprin ni spro bskyed pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi sku// de dbus gnas pa'i rnal 'byor
124a4(rgyud): par sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgom// sngags rnamadas kun gyi gtsug tor ni// sngags kyi skyes bu gsang ba dab// gcig pu nyid ni bdag por gyur// sngags spyod don na
124a5(rgyud): sgrub pa po// chos 'khor lo gcig 'khor lo mchog/ rgyal dang rmad byung che gtsug to// lus dang rnam par rgya/ la de bzhin// bya ba mchog tu yang dag bshad// sbyor dang bya
124a6(rgyud): ba gnyis med bzhin// sbyor ba 'ba' shig nyid la 'di// b+h+rUM ni gtsug tor yin par bstan// ye shes rdo rje snying po 'di// dus sbyor gcig gi ming can no// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam
124a7(rgyud): nyid ldan// sngags kyi skyes bu dngos grub stsol// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// oM zhes bya ba de ru sgom// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge AHni rnam par sgom
124a8(rgyud): chos kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la'ang // yi ge hUM ni de ru sgom// yi ge bru ni gnas ming can// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid de// rdo rje gsum 'byung bka' stsal/ 
124b1(rgyud): to// snying po dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje gsum ni mnyes byed mchog/ sku dang gsung thugs thog ma mtha'// oM AHhUM gi grangs dang mnyam// sangs rgyas sku mchog gsung gi lam// 
124b2(rgyud): thugs kyi ye shes 'dzings su bya// rang nyid 'don pa nyid du ni// re re zhing ni yang dag bshad// sngags kyi skyes bu'i sbyor ba yang // rgyu yi bdag nyid ming can yin// byang chub tshul mchog
124b3(rgyud): 'di yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// rdo rje ye shes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob byed pa'o// sngags kyi rig pa zhes bsgrags pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas skyes bu yin/ 
124b4(rgyud): rdo rje gsum mnyam mi phyed po// rdzogs pa la sogs sgom/ pa yi// de bzhin gshegs kun rdo rje ni// gsum po ye/ shes rdo rje stsol// byin rlabs dpal chen zhes bya ba'i// dam
124b5(rgyud): tshig ting 'dzin gyur pa yin// rnam par dben dang ci rigs pa'i / bstan dag la ni sbyor ba bzhi// rig pa'i skyes bur ya nga dag sbyor// brtul zhugs can gyis kun tu brtsam// thabs
124b6(rgyud): dang shes rab nyin zla phyed// thun gcig du ni rab tu brtag/ de yi phyed nyid zla phyed kyis// rdo rje gsum ni nges par 'grub// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid// 'jig rten pa'i yang phyin ci log/ 
124b7(rgyud): rdo rje gsum sbyor stsol dngos grub// grub par 'gyur ba the tsom med// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// phra mo'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig dus// bskyed/ 
124b8(rgyud): pa yi ge oM bsgom bya// sbyor ba bzhi yo gtan tshigs gang // snying por yongs su brtags pa yin// sna rtse dang ni rtsa ba nyid// spyi bo mtha' ni dga' ldan gnas// gcig dang gsum gyi dngos
125a1(rgyud): bor 'gyur// dag pa'i gnas kyi grong khyer ba// phyed pa gsum gyi ming can ni// rigs kyi dbye ba rdo rje gsum// sna yi rtse mo sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum sbyor brtul
125a2(rgyud): zhugs can// mA ma kI dang gos dkar mo// sgrol ma gtogs pa sangs rgyas spyan// 'od zer snga yi sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad gnyis med gnas// rdo rje rnam snang de las ni// dngos grub
125a3(rgyud): rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku yi 'od 'dra ba// skad cig der 'grub rnal 'byor pa// ye shes lnga po bsten nas ni// rdo rje bskal ba gsum du gnas// ye shes 'das dang ma 'o
125a4(rgyud): dang / da ltar byung ba rdo rje gsum// de 'dir bskal par brtags gyur pa// grangs med ces pa de nyid do// sku yi gas bu de nyid 'di// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rim par gsungs// 
125a5(rgyud): zhi ba'i bde las shes bya ba// rang myong sbyor ba gcig las de// sku yi gsang ba mchog 'di ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs// rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa yi// 
125a6(rgyud): ting 'dzin yang dag bka' stsal to// a dang u ni lkog ma'i dbus// rkan gyi stong gi ming can no// i dang tsa ni lag g.yon nyid// u dang mu ni g.yas par brtag/ ri dzu 'di ni gsang bar dgod/ 
125a7(rgyud): li ti rkang pa gcig shos la// dkyil 'khor gcig ni de nyid do// dkyil 'khor lnga las rgyal gyur pa// ha ni lus skyes gtsug tor dang // gcod ni gsum po gcod pa can// yon tan bzhi
125a8(rgyud): yi bzhi po de// lnga po'i lnga par de 'gyur ro// na mkha'i rdo rje gcig phyed sbyor// de ni 'od zer lngar 'gyur ro// rig pa chen po de nyid 'di// cha zhes bya bar de yongs bsgrags// dus can bdag nyid
125b1(rgyud): sbyor dbang po// de yi rang sbyor gzugs can gcig/ a ni thabs 'gyur sbyor ba ni// dbang po gnyis po gcig tu'o// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor mchog bsam pa
125b2(rgyud): rang sngags skyes bu bsams nas ni// AHni ngag gi lam du bzhag/ kha dog lnga yis kun nas ni// rgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po dag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sgom pas// dam tshig ye shes bsgom
125b3(rgyud): par bya// gsung gi dam tshig spros par bshad// khyab bdag mi zad rtag pa ste// thog mtha' med pa'i mthar thug pa// zhi ba mya ngan 'das zhes bya// chos kyi gsung las rnal 'byor dbang // rdo rje
125b4(rgyud): chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bstan na ni// rdo rje gsum gyi bskal par gnas// gsung gi gsang ba 'di de nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsungs/ 
125b5(rgyud): dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin du yongs su bsgrags // nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas mchog/ rdo rje'i dkyi/ la 'khor dam pa ni// der ni rang sngags skyes bu dag/ 
125b6(rgyud): hUM ni sems la gnas rdzogs bya// dam tshig chen po de nyid can// kha dog rnam lnga bsgom par bya// rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs 'dra ba// yang
125b7(rgyud): dag ye shes yon tan mtsho// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskul ba gsum du gnas// lkog ma rkan dang de nas mchu// spyi bo sa yi ming can te// rdo rje gsum thugs gsang ba
125b8(rgyud): gcig/ de nas haM las zhugs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba// rdo rje ye shes gcig las byung // ting 'dzin gsang bar bshad pa yin/ 
126a1(rgyud): ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje chen por bsams nas ni// lus kun la ni kha dmigs ni// rdo rje ye shes skye bar 'gyur// dngos po mngon gsal byed pa
126a2(rgyud): khaM nyid kyis ni thams cad bshad// rlung gi rkyen dang kun sbyor las// khaM du'ang 'gro bar gyur pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // rdo rje gsum gyi dam
126a3(rgyud): tshig gnas// gnyis med lhun gyi ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid sbyor ba// so so ru ni yang dag gnas// na mkha'i rdo rje dam tshig che// chos rnams des ni mi gzig so// sangs rgyas kun
126a4(rgyud): ni gnyis med rang // mi snang 'di yi dam tshig yin// dngos po med pa'i gnas thob na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs so// sku gsung thugs las yang dag byung // mi snang
126a5(rgyud): rdo rje gsum 'di yin// de yi bkod phreng zhes bya ba// ting nga 'dzin ni yang dag gsungs// ma 'dres pa yi chos bad gnyid// sku dang ldan pa'i 'od po che// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus
126a6(rgyud): gnas pa'i// rang sngags skyes bu bsam par bya// haM ni rdo rje bzhir bshad pa// snying kha ru ni yaM mdzes pa// rtag tu sbyor bas gzhug pa ni// 'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi
126a7(rgyud): longs spyod ni// 'jam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje can// sa bcur rab tu gnas na ni// dgongs don de tshe kun tu byung // ye shes nyid ni zla ba 'di// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can// snang ba can zhes bya ba yi/ 
126a8(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus kan+da pA// b+h+rUM ni 'bar ba'i 'od bzang ba// mtshon cha mchog ni rdo rje yis// rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'dra sbyor// dam
126b1(rgyud): tshig bkod pa'i gnas gyur pa// ting 'dzin dam tshig mi snang ba'i// b+hI ni yang dag 'byung ba bshad// sangs rgyas mngon par shes gnas pa// dam tshig tu ni yang dag bshad// mngon shes lnga dang
126b2(rgyud): 'dra ba 'di// de ni skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog sgrub pa// 'di ni dam pa yin par bshad// de yi dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i mchog
126b3(rgyud): na mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsame// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i mchog bsgoms la// yi ge oM ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi gsang ba 'di/ 
126b4(rgyud): yi ge oM nau mi zad gtso// 'di ni mi phyed sbyor ba yis// bsgo dmas pas mi bskyod 'dra bar 'gyur// mi bskyod pa yid dam tshig mchog/ de sku byang chub rdo rje can// ting nge 'dzin du yang
126b5(rgyud): dag bshad// de ni skyes bu dam pa yin// mi bskyod mtshungs pa'i sku dang ni// gsung thugs rtsa gcig 'dzin pa las// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje can
126b6(rgyud): gyis mchod par 'gyur// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan pa bsam// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgoms te// de nas rdo rje rnam par sgom// rdo rje dam tshig
126b7(rgyud): gsum bsgoms pas// dkon mchog dpal dang 'od 'dra zhing // dkon mchog gsum dpal mtshungs pa yi// bcom ldan dkon mchog dpal 'dra zhing // sku gsung thugs sbyor rdo rje yis/ 
126b8(rgyud): ye shes gsang ba'i gnas su 'gyur// ting 'dzin dpag med las byung ba// rdo rje ye shes 'dzin de 'gyur// longs spyod dam tshig ces bya ba// rin chen rdo rje gcig tu 'byung // de nyid gsum
127a1(rgyud): gsang dgongs pa las// rin rdo rje de gnas 'gyur// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug rab
127a2(rgyud): bsgoms la// der ni chos kyi oM sgom mo// chos kyi oM ni de tshe yang // rdo rje gsum mnyam sbyor ba yis// rdo rje dpag med 'dra ba ni// bcom ldan dpag med rdo rje can// lus dang ngag sems rdo
127a3(rgyud): rje yis// dpag med tshe dang 'dra bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po lam gyi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// ye shes rgya mtsho dpal dang ldan// 'gro don gcig tu 'byung bar 'gyur// don yod
127a4(rgyud): pa yi dam tshig mchog/ sems can don ni sgrub gyur pa/ da'od zer ye shes mchog ces bya'i// ting nge 'dzin du yang dag bshad// sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i
127a5(rgyud): longs spyod kun tu 'gyur ba yi// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// de ni rnam snang rdo rjer bshad// 'od zer der ni rab tu
127a6(rgyud): sgom// rnam par rgyal ba'i yi ge oM// 'od chen der ni rab tu sgom// de nas 'di ni rdo rje gsum// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra bar 'gyur// da ni bcom ldan mgon pos bshad// rnam snang rdo rje
127a7(rgyud): can de yin// rdo rje gsum gnyis med sbyor las// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od// de nyid ye shes rdzogs byang chub// rdo rje sku gsum sgrub pa po// sku dang gsung thugs rdzogs byang chub// 
127a8(rgyud): de la dmigs pa'i rdo rje can// ting 'dzin zhi ba nyid sbyor ba// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// tshig gcig la ni sna tshogs don// sngags kyi de nyid gsal gyur pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs
127b1(rgyud): mchog la// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po ni// gsang dgongs rdo rje zhes bya ba// thub pa che la slar yang zhus// oM A hUM ni gsum la sogs// b+h+rUM sogs thog mar gnas pa yis// sku gsung
127b2(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje can// sngags kyi skyes bur da 'gyur ro// oM ni rnam snang rdo rjer 'gyur// AHni 'jig rten dbang phyug gtso// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpar bshad// skyes bu rdo rje can du 'gyur// 
127b3(rgyud): b+h+rUM ni gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// khaM ni nges par mi snang ba// haM ni 'jam dpal yang dag bshad// klu ni rdo rje bkod ces bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rin po che// 'jig rten dbang phyug dngos grub
127b4(rgyud): si la// de bzhin mgon po rnam snang mdzad// oM la sogs pa lnga las skyes// oM AHhUM ni de nyid gsum// rnam snodardo rje can gyur pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje grags/ 
127b5(rgyud): shin tu rnam par nges par bshad// gsang sngags dkyil 'a khor rnal 'byor pa// lnga po bco lngar yang dag bshad// khrag gi sbyor ba las byung ba// gsang sngags skyes bu zhes
127b6(rgyud): bya ba// gsang sngags chen po'i sbyor ba yang // ting 'dzin skyes bu dam pa yin// sna tshogs sngags don de nyid 'gyur// phyag rgya gcig par dkyil 'khor te// de dag gsang bar bshad pa ni// 
127b7(rgyud): dgongs pa gcig las yang dag 'byung // dga' ba gcig cing dga' ba'i ming // de dag ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur// mgon po rkyen dang bral ba'i mi// pi bang sgra ni mchis ma lags// de bzhin phyag/ 
127b8(rgyud): rgya med pa ni// gsang sngags dngos grub mi 'byung ngo // brda' gsum gyi ni de nyid 'di// gang gi don du rab gsungs pa// lag pa'i sbyor bas rab sgrub pa'i// phyag rgya ji ltar gnas par mdzad/ 
128a1(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba ni// phyag rgya gcig pu'i sbyor ba dang // gsang sngags gcig pus mi 'grub ces// khyod ni chos rnams ston par mdzad// 'dir ni sngags skyo
128a2(rgyud): gcig pu las// phyag rgya bstan par ma mdzad na// gsang sngags gcig skyes dngos grub ni// 'jig rten pa rnams ji ltar sgrub// sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor gyur pa// lha rnams kyi yang/ 
128a3(rgyud): sbyor las byung // 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa zhes bya dang // yang na shin tu 'jig rten 'das// mgon po 'jig rten pa rnams kyi// ji ltar 'gro
128a4(rgyud): la de phan 'gyur// spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol// 'dir ni ji ltar legs par brjod// gang gis 'dir ni dngos grub 'grub// lha rnams mngon phyogs ji lta bu// 'di dag ma
128a5(rgyud): 'ongs skye bo yis// gang zhig shes na yang dag par// nges par rnam rtog med 'gyur ba// mi yi skyes bu 'di dgag/ sungs// de nas mgon po bcom ldan 'das// dgongs pa'i
128a6(rgyud): gsang ba dam pa ste// phyag rgya'i nges par 'jig rten pa'i// phyag ni rdo rje la gsungs so// rnam rtog sna tshogs lugs zhes bya// nyes pa gsum tshogs bdag nyid las// gsang sngags skyes bu'i
128a7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// de ni mchog dag tu 'gyur// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa yis// lcags ni gser du byed pa yin// de bzhin sngags kyi de nyid kyis// mi ni bder gshegs byed pa yin// nges byas
128a8(rgyud): sbyor ba'i gsang sngags ni// zhi bde dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// phyag rgya med pa'i sngags gcig pus// sngags kyi skyes bur 'gyur ba yin// dngos med pa las yang dag skye// sngags kyi skyes/ 
128b1(rgyud): bu 'byung ba ste// 'di ni phyag rgya chen po ste// 'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub pa'o// spyan drang bar ni bzhugs pa yis// myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol// gnas pa yis ni de sgrub pa'o// yid/ 
128b2(rgyud): ston dngos grub dam pa yin// de ni skyes bu'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya che dang gcig sgrub las// myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa// de ni phyag rgya yi bar bshad// 'bad de bla mas slob ma yi// 
128b3(rgyud): rna ba'i drung du bshad par bya// myur ba dang ni 'jug pa dang // gnas pa'i rjes su sbyor ba rnams// spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol// 'di dag phyag rgyar yang dag gyur// sgrub pa la ni myur la sogs/ 
128b4(rgyud): ci rigs pa ni nges par sbyar// phung po la sogs chos rnams kun// stong shing rten 'brel las byung ba// mthong zhi de bzhin sbyor ba las// chos kyi skur ni de gnas 'gyur// 'di
128b5(rgyud): ni gsang sngags sbyor 'gyur med// phyag rgya'ang chos sku 'di nyid yin// de lta na yang 'gro ba'i don// yid bzhin nor/ bu lta bur byed// 'on te rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig/ sbyor ba gsum
128b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i mi// spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol// de bzhin du ni gnas gyur pa'o// nye ba'i tshig ni spyan drang ba// ring nas lag par rab tu sbyor// de bzhin gsang sngags de nyid kyang // gnyi
128b7(rgyud): ga la ni yang dag sbyor// rigs kyi dbye ba sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya bud med yin par bshad// sems kyi rkyen sbyor bdag nyid ni// 'jig rten par ni rab tu brtag/ rang gi mtshan mar yang dag sbyor// 
128b8(rgyud): rigs kyi dbye ba'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgyas sa gsum la gnas pa// sa 'og klu yi bu mo yang // brtul zhugs can gyi sems kyis dgug/ gzhug pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni// de rnams gnas pa'i// 
129a1(rgyud): sbyor ba nyid// dngos med de nyid gcig pu yis// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// gzhan yang gsang ba pa yi mchog/ sems kyi rkyen ni nyid ltos dang // dngos med
129a2(rgyud): byang chub 'thob pa la// gsang sngags med cing phyag rgya med// 'jig rten na ni rtog ci rnyed// dus gsum du ni kun 'byung ba// de ni dngos med sems gcig las// rnal 'byor pas ni skad cig/ 
129a3(rgyud): rtogs// byang chub kun rdzob ma yin la// de las gzhan du'ang rnyed mi 'gyur// gnyi ga las min gzhan las mini// mun pa'i sgron ma mtshungs par 'gyur// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gi sngags// 
129a4(rgyud): gsang ba 'di ni rab ston te// de ni sgrub dang bsgrub bya dang // rnam par mi rtog brtags pa'o// sems can kun gyilo/ ngas spyod du// sngags kyi skyes bu rab tu gnas// nam mkha'
