129a5(rgyud): mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam par dben par rab tu brtag/ gsal dang mi gsal yang dag ldan// klung dang 'bab chu/ la sogs yin// mya ngan 'das pa gnas sbyor ba// dur khrod
129a6(rgyud): la sogs pa yi ming // 'di ni sngags rigs cho ga rnams kyi// bsam gtan bsdus las spyod pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa de nyid 'diro// 'jig rten pa ni bzlog pa'o// mi bskyod ye shes la sogs pa/ 
129a7(rgyud): rdo rje na mkha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su sgom// rdo rje mngon shes rdo rje che// dam tshig mchog tu bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rab mdzes
129a8(rgyud): pa/ rtse lnga pa la de bzhin 'bar// rang bzhin lnga ru sbyor ba yis// mngon shes lnga por 'gyur ba yin// mngon shes lnga yi ting 'dzin la// gnas nas bla na med pa brtag/ gtso bo me tog mang
129b1(rgyud): 'khrug rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje la rab dgod byas pas// rdo rje mngon shes skye bar 'gyur// namakha' rdo rje dbus gnas par// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar 'od dru// sangs rgyas
129b2(rgyud): 'jug par rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lus la rnam par snang mdzad pazhag/ snying khar yi ge oM bsams na/ 
129b3(rgyud): sngags la mngon shes sgom par 'gyur// 'gog pa rdo rje gyur pa'i sems// nam zhig bdag nyid bdag las skyes// sangs rgyas kun mchog 'byung ba yi// dpal ldan yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur// 
129b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// der ni mi skyod rab tu sgom// hUM ni snying kha'i zla gnas par// bsam ngas la sems ni de ru bzhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus
129b5(rgyud): gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu sbyor// AHni snying khwa/ 'i thig ler gnas// bsams la rdo rje'ang yang dag pa zhag/ 'di ni dgongs pa'i mchog gi mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed
129b6(rgyud): gsum sbyor skyes// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub cher 'byung ba'o// na mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku gsung
129b7(rgyud): thugs kyi yi ge oM// bsams na bskal pa gcig tu gnas// na mkha'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus dang ngag sems yi ge AH/ 
129b8(rgyud): bsams na bskal pa dag du gnas// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus dang ngag sems yi gau hUM// bsams na de ni bskal par gnas/ 
130a1(rgyud): bcom ldan bdag po rdo rje gsum// dam tshig rtog pas de skad gsungs// dgu mtha' can gyi yi ge 'di// sngags kyi skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// brjod du med cing ming
130a2(rgyud): med la// shes dang shes bya rnam spangs pa'ang // kun rdzob la ni legs gnas na// tshig gi sngags su 'di brjod do// rdo rje gsum gyi rdo rje can// rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin cad ni// gang zhig
130a3(rgyud): klog gam sems kyang rung // rdo rje ye shes lta bur 'gyur// ji ltar gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po// dgongs pa lung ston 'di gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis de lung bstan// khyad par du yang byin gyis
130a4(rgyud): rlob// klog cing sgom dang ldan par ni// bris nas gang du 'jog/ gyur pa// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rigs skyes nga rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// khams gsum thams cad
130a5(rgyud): bcom nas ni// myur ba de bzhin gshegs 'gyur zhing // 2khor los bsgyur ba'i bu bzhin du// byang chub myur du des 'thob bo// khams gsum sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ 
130a6(rgyud): sngags pa'i yan lag gyur pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dus la brten pa yis// de ni dngos po med par 'joms// dngos med gcig pu rdzogs longs spyod// phung sogs yan lag don las byung // 
130a7(rgyud): bde gshegs sems can spangs pa ni// sngags bsngags las gyur pa yin// ji ltar na mkha' rang mtshan nyid// skad cig kyang ni 'dor mi byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas thams cad cag/ rigs lnga
130a8(rgyud): skyes la byin gyis rlob// dgongs pa lung ston la gnas nas// gsang ba'i rin chen yang dag srung // mig gzugs rang gi ngo bo nyid// spyod pa ci dga' byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kun ye/ 
130b1(rgyud): shes ni gsang ba'i dgongs pa'i ming can te// sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba dang // gsang sngags dam tshig de nyid byung // de ni rigs pa skyes bu mchog/ bcu gcig par ni yang dag bsha
130b2(rgyud): ras ni bris dang mtshungs par 'byung // 'thob pa'i phyir ni le'ur gyur// de nas dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad// bskyed pa ye shes bla ma gtso// de nyid dam tshig mchog gyur pa// rdo rje gsung
130b3(rgyud): gis bka' stsal to// mkha' dang mtshungs shing mi rtog la// rang bzhin gyis ni dam chos can// dngos med shin tu dri med la// dam tshig gcig tu gyur kyang ni// gar dang klu dang rol mo dang / 
130b4(rgyud): dgod dang sgregs pas rab mdzes pas// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gar mkhan gyi// rol mo 'di dag rab tu sgom/ gzhon nus bsgrubs pa'i sems can no// ji lta ji ltar
130b5(rgyud): ston pa bzhin// gar sogs rtsed mos byang chub ni// myur du de nyid las 'thob 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ra ldan pa// de yi ming ni yid ldan pa// dkon mchog gsu
130b6(rgyud): la skyabs su gnas// lhun gyis grub po'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// sems can gang 'di mthong ba dang // thos shing reg par gyur pa ni// de ni u dum ba ra yi// me tog 'dra bar gyur pa yin/ 
130b7(rgyud): sems can kun gyi gtso ba 'di// gsung gi rdo rje chos nyid skyes// gcig dang du ma las grol ba// rten 'byung gsal bar byed pa yin// de nas gsang ba'i bdag mchog de// chos kyi de nyid rab
130b8(rgyud): ston pa// thub chen rnam par snang mdzad la// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus// mgon po de nyid bsdus pa la// rol mo 'dir ni gyur pa dang // 'jig rten pa de gar byed pa// gsungs te ma 'ongs skye bo ni
131a1(rgyud): chos dbyings de ni gar min na// gtso bo ji ltar gar bgyid lags// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan gar// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba yin// chos dbyings de
131a2(rgyud): ni glu min na// gtso bo ji ltar glu len 'gyur// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang pan glu// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags// chos dbyings de ni rol mo min// gtso bo ji ltar rol mor
131a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'jig rten rgyang pan rmongs rol mo// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags// chos dbyings de dgod me lags na// gtso bo ji ltar rgod par 'gyur// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten
131a4(rgyud): rgyang pan rgod// gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags / chos dbyings de sgeg ma lags na// gtso bo ji ltar skrag par 'gyur// rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rgyang ban sgeg
131a5(rgyud): gsang mthon myos pas bskul ba lags// de ltar rnam pa mang po la// gzhan rnams kyang ni sbyor byed cing // bza' dang min las sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor pa ni bdag yin
131a6(rgyud): snyam// rdo rje yi ni tshig mchog 'di// yod med rab tu zhi ba nyid// de yi rang bzhin gcig sbyor ba dag/ yang dag mchog bsdus de nyid mchog/ de nas de nyid yang dag bzung // rnal 'byor rigs
131a7(rgyud): mchog rnal 'byor pa// de nyid gsum mnyam nyid sbyor ba// sangs rgyas kyi ni rol mo ston// sna tshogs tshul gyis rnam dgod pas// nor can ming ni nyams la sogs// gcig pu'ang dpag med dngos
131a8(rgyud): bshad pa'i// gar gyis skyes dgu dga' bar byed// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sogs dngos grub// sna tshogs khyed kyis gsungs pa rnams// sems zhi ba yi rnal 'byor pa// de rnams lhun gyis grub
131b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// mgon po shes rab 'di srid du// thabs kyis mchil par nye bar sbyor// sngags kyi gzan gyi sbyor ba yis// khyed ni 'jig rten pa rnams 'dzin// bshad du zin kyang mi rig pa/ 
131b2(rgyud): dgongs pa'i gsang ba dam pa ni// gzhan rnams la ni ston mdzad pa// ngo bo nyid ni gzhan min pa'o// phyi rol sngags don dngos grub ni// de nyid du ni chol mod kyi// 'gal ba'i rjes 'jug chos nyid can
131b3(rgyud): der yang 'grub par 'gyur ma yin// de rnams gsang ba mi srung zhing // sred pa yi ni ston par byed// bcom ldan 'das gsung gsang ba ni// gsang mchog tshig gis sgrogs par byed// khyod bka'
131b4(rgyud): las 'das dman pa rnams// sngags kyi nus pa rnam spangs pa // 'jig rten pa rnams sdang 'gyur zhing // de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ma yin// sred pa'am dang bdag gis kyang // 
131b5(rgyud): rkyen dang de bzhin nyan thos rnams// gsang ba la ni smig rgyu bzhin // rigs skyes gzhan yang ltung bar 'gyur// mgon po de ni der gnas shing // nyams shing blo gros dman par gan
131b6(rgyud): de nas tshig min gyur par 'byung // tshig gi bdud rtsi sbyor ba las// chos kyi tshul 'di thos pa dang // phyi nas 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' lhung 'gyur bar// bdag
131b7(rgyud): nyid che de byed par 'gyur// de bzhin byang chub 'gyur ba dang // sngags pa rnams kyang gsang ba lags/ shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// gsang ba mdo sde rnam smra ba// gdong g.yogs pa yi sbyor ba yis
131b8(rgyud): de tshe tshig gis rig skyes pa// gsong sngags la sogs chos rnams la// dad pa rnams ni skyed mi byed// log pas mkhas pa'i nga rgyal ni// byis pa phyi nas byed par 'gyur// a yi dog pa'i
132a1(rgyud): ras 'di ni// sbyor shes rnams kyi 'di ma yin// de rnams dad pas rjes 'jug pa// gtam ngag yang ni byed par 'gyur// sgyu ni g.yo yi tshul gyis na// rgyal po rnams ni spu hA/ 
132a2(rgyud): byed// steng du g.yogs pa dag gis ni// brgyad gnyis pa la tshul du byed// de ni ma skyes pa yi bdag/ ras kyi rgyu med pa nyid ni// AHyi dog ras nyid rgyal po'i// yang dag dngos grub byed pa'i
132a3(rgyud): mchog/ dam pa'i skye ba nyid mthong na// de ni longs spyod lam skyed min// de bas skye bo med gcig pu// bya ba'i sems ni rab tu 'jug/ der ni mche ba can mi 'gro// de la brtsal ba 'ba' shig yin/ 
132a4(rgyud): rgyal po dngos grub chen po'i ras// bar chad shin tu mang po// / bya ba de ni rnam par 'joms// sgrib pa med pa'i rnal 'byor can// de ni tshig de thos pa dang // rgyal po'i bar du yid dag
132a5(rgyud): zhing // dngos grub chen po'i rigs mchog las// su zhig bdag ni zlog par byed// ras kyi bar chad byed pa dag/ de la chad pas bcad par bya// 'di la 'jigs pa'i sems bor la/ 
132a6(rgyud): skye bo med par khyed kyis ni// rgyal rigs dag gam rigs bzangs ma// gang zhig mi srun rigs can rnams// dog pa med pa ras 'jig pa// de dag thams cad brlag par bya// de nas rgyal po sbyin
132a7(rgyud): pa ni// rgyud kyi slob dpon bdag nyid che// rin chen rin thang med lnga sogs// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu'o// 'di yis gdong ni g.yogs nas su// rgyal po 'bras bu longs spyod cig/ AHli
132a8(rgyud): dog pa ras de byin// ji ltar skye bzhin rgyal po byas// rin chen rin thang med blangs rnams// 'di ni ji ltar bzhag nas su// de nas de ni mi snang ba// rgyun can des ni de tshe byas// de la sogs pa'i
132b1(rgyud): sna tshogs tshig/ rigs skyes ba la de rnams smra// rang nyid 'jigs shing gzhan rnams kyang // skrag par byed cing the tsom med// de nas de bzhin gshegs bdag po// 'byin pa ston pa mang
132b2(rgyud): bdag gtso// phyag na rdo rje gau byed pa// snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rje rje chen po legs// rdo rje thal mo bstan byas te// rdo rje 'di ni nus gyur pa// de nyid bsdus pa dam pa'o// rdo rje thal/ 
132b3(rgyud): mo de nyid 'di// lung bstan bya yis de nyon cig/ de nyid gsum du gyur pa de// rdo rje thal mor yongs su brtag/ de nyid gsum ni lha gsum ste// tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// de rung ni
132b4(rgyud): lha gsum 'gyur// oM oMHhUM dang grangs mnyam pa'i// / gsang sngags 'jug pa thams cad ni// sna tshogs la/ sa can gcig ming can// zhi ba nyid ni gang du ston// der ning
132b5(rgyud): yang gnas pa yin// dpral yo na de la bzhin mi sdugade yis skyes bu ming ldan ming // de rnams lag pa'i dbus nas ni// mtheb sogs ji bzhin grangs su bshad// lag pa
132b6(rgyud): g.yon ni drag por 'gyur// g.yas pa de bzhin khyab 'jug ste// gnyis po sbyor ba tshangs pa yin// de bas yon tan gsum bdag dang // rig dang mchod sbyin snyan tshig ste// rig byed der gyur
132b7(rgyud): gsum du bshad// sred bsrungs zhi ba nga yin te// mthar ni 'gro ba gnas pa yin// lag pa gnyis pa 'di dag ni// bzhi po'i phyed phyed rnam brgyad pa// phyed po'i tsham gyi ha mcho ga ni// rab tu ni
132b8(rgyud): bar rab tu bsgrags// nyi ma zla ba mi rnams der// so sor yongs su bsgrags pa yin// yi ge phyed tsam mchog gyur dang // shes pa zhi ba skyon med pa// yon tan oM dang yi ge phyed// oM zhes
133a1(rgyud): gsal bar brjod pa yin// sna yi rtse mor yang dag ldan// gtsug mtha' dang ni lag par gnas// nyi ma zla ba'i sbyor ba las// ye shes me ni nges par skye// lce dang / 
133a2(rgyud): rkan gyi mtshan ma ni// sbyor las thar bar de bshad de// AH'og tu a dang yang dag ldan// de steng yi ge AHnyid de// thad ka ru ni ma bshad de// khyod ni yig phyed zhi ba nyid// yi ge oM ni tsha
133a3(rgyud): pa ste/ AHni khyab 'jojug yin par bshad// hUM ni rlung du gyur pa yin// de nyid drag po zhes bya'o// zhi ba'i phyed phyed zhes bya ba// der ni bdag yongs bsgrags pa yin// gnas dang 'pho
133a4(rgyud): dang skye ba dang // gzhan gyi lus las yang dag 'phro// ye she sa rang nyid me yin te// khyab par 'dzin pa de bzhin no// / ral gri la sogs dngos grub der// byang chub phyi rol
133a5(rgyud): nyid 'grub 'gyur// gnyis po 'di dag gnas pa yi// rnam dag 'di dag rab tu brtag/ tshangs pa la sogs pa rnam sa der// ma 'ongs pa rnams sgom par 'gyur// de ni mtho
133a6(rgyud): ris sogs 'gags pas// de bzhin 'byung ba sel ba yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams srog spangs nas// gnyis spyad par ni rnam par gnas// shin tu sbyor gcig gyur song bas// 'jug
133a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni drag po yin// nam dgag pa yi sbyor ba yang // tshangs par gzhol ba'i bdag nyid can// mngal gyi gzugs gyur khyab 'jug ste// de yi dbus na dbus bzung ba// spu yi cha ni
133a8(rgyud): stong las gcig/ zhing rnam par mi rtog nyid// thar pa gcig par de ston bya// thar pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin// de lta bas na 'di legs pa// zhi ba nyid ni sgrogs pa'o// ston pa de rnams phye nas ni/ 
133b1(rgyud): zhi ba'i chos rnams smra bar 'gyur// thabs chen de bzhin shes rab dag/ 'di 'dra mthong bar mi 'gyuraro// tshangs la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun// khyed kyi thal mo dag la gnas// de rnams phyag rgya ston/ 
133b2(rgyud): byed cing // sngags ni bye ba mtha' yas pa// 'di nyid du ni ni zla dang // sbyin sreg las can me dang ni// lo dang zla ba'i sbyor ba dang // rtag tu 'char dang 'phel 'grib dang // de nyid gsum gyi sbyor skyes 'di// 
133b3(rgyud): de nyid gcig pu rnam por gnas// zhi ba nyid kyi sbyor chos la// de yang gcig dang du ma spangs// khyed kyi thal mo las byung ba// de bas de ni 'da' mi bya// de bzhin gshegs kun spangs 'gyur bas// / 
133b4(rgyud): de ni spong bar mi bya zhing // 'di dag dngos med la ltos pas// rnal 'byor pa ni mchog tu 'dod// gzhan du rnam rtog nyi da las ni// dngos grub 'bras bu'i snod mi 'gyur// de bas
133b5(rgyud): thal mo sbyor ba 'di// sems can rjes bzung dam pa yin/ ma bsdus pa yi sems can rnams// bsdu ba'i don du khyod da kyis bya// smad bya 'on pa lkug pa dang // de bzhin long bar
133b6(rgyud): gyur pa dang // gang zhig 'phye bo la sogs gyur// de rnams la ni phan phyir bya// de la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa// de ni khyed kyi thal mor gnas// de ni 'jig rten 'das gtsor gyur// de nyid bsdus pa'i
133b7(rgyud): rgyu can no// de ni nang min phyi ma yin// gnyis min gzhan gyi rgyu las min// phyag rgya tshogs pa las skyes min// 'jig rten rkyen las byung ba min// rdo rje thal mo bsdams pas na// ming ni rdo rje thal
133b8(rgyud): mor gyur// sems can rnams kyis rtogs dka' ba'i// snying po brtag par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag rgya 'di lta bu 'di yin// phyi nang gnyis kyi ming can no// mi bskyod rin chen dpag med de// dngos
134a1(rgyud): grub rnam snang de bzhin gshegs// 'di dag lag pa g.yas pa yi// mthe'u chung la sogs rnams la gnas// gnyis pos gcig gyur dge 'dun te// de ni skyabs ni
134a2(rgyud): gsum yin te// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams// gcig dang gsum du brtags pa yin// phan tshun bcings pa'i rdo rje nyid// shes rab thabs kyi gnas mchog yin// thal mo bcings
134a3(rgyud): ba tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad nyid thob 'gyur// skya bas mchog gsum dang de nyid gsum// rdo rje gsum dang rnam thar gsum// zhal gsum mdog gsum spyan gsum dang / 
134a4(rgyud): lha gsum dang ni khams gsum dang // dus gsum dmatsho dag mchog gyur gsum// tshul gsum dkyil 'khor ga sum du 'gyur// sbyor ba gsum dang lam gsum ste/ 
134a5(rgyud): ji srid rtogs pas brjod pa rnams// de ni thal mo sbyor 'di yin// 'dod nor yon tan gsum gyi mchog/ rim dang bslab pa ster ba dag/ ma 'ongs skye bos 'thob par 'gyur// 
134a6(rgyud): de nyid du ni der 'gyur na// gcig dang du mar rnam par spangs// chos bshad bshad pa dngos med pa// 'gro ba rkyen gyis yang dag sdud// 'di ni mkha' ltar rang bzhin gcig/ gnas med gnas
134a7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba// bsdu ba byas par gyur pas kyang // sku gsung don gyi chos nyid do// 'di ni thog mtha' med pa ste// dngos po med cing gnas med pa// mtha' med zad pa med par 'byung // 
134a8(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rkyen las ni// rnam pa'i 'jug pa'i ye shes te// de las sangs rgyas snying por gyur// hUM gis sems can yang dag 'byin// sangs rgyas skur ni rab tu brtag/ oM ni thams
134b1(rgyud): cad sdud pa ste// AHni gnas pa par 'gyuraro// gcig pu rnam gsum de bzhin lnga// gsal dang migasal sbyor ba ni// rten 'brel chos nyid 'di yin te// de nyid kyi ni sngags bshad pa'o// 
134b2(rgyud): zlos na bsam gtan rnam bral bar// de yi lhun grub 'bras bu ster// rang bzhin grub pa 'di yin te// 'dod pa'i bzlas par de bshad do// rnal 'byor pa la de gsal te/ khyis rnams de la
134b3(rgyud): phyin ci log/ rkyen las byung ba de nyid gsum// dngos po med par de bshad do// de nyid bsdus pa bshad pa ni// yid min pa yi bzlas par 'gyur// yid ston gcig ni mdor bsdus las
134b4(rgyud): rings dang dal dang gnas pa rnams// zhi ba'i chos nyid la/ skye ste// namakha'i dbyings dang mnyam par thim/ dngos po med pa'i de nyid 'di// rten 'byung chos zhes bya ba yin// 
134b5(rgyud): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bsdus te gyur// sprul pa bsam mau khyab ces dben// sdud pa por ni gang gyur pa// de ya nga phul du gyur pa'i ming // rdo rje la sogs yang dag sbyar// 
134b6(rgyud): sems can rnams ni de sbyor byed// dam tshig la sogs sngon de ni// de nyid kyis ni rdo rje sbyor// sems can dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis// de yi chos rnams ston par byed// rnam pa dgu po thog
134b7(rgyud): mtha' can// sdud pa po rnams byas pa yin// gsang sngags de nyid gnas dgod pas// sems can rnams ni der 'jog ste// gsol ba 'debs dang phyag 'tshal dang // 'jig rten rnams
134b8(rgyud): la gsol ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams mnyes byed de// khyod kyi thal mor gnas pa yin// gang zhig sems can sangs rgyas gyur// de bzhin gnyis med chos nyid can// gnas med/ 
135a1(rgyud): gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad sangs rgyas rnams gnas so// sna tshogs mtshon pa de nyid do// mthong ba gsal byed thal mo yin// de bas de rnams mgu gyur pa/ 
135a2(rgyud): chos kyi de nyid rkyen las so// rgyu med rang gi de nyid 'di// khyed kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor las byung // gang zhig shes pas 'dod 'grub pa'i// dngos grub des ni 'thob par 'gyur// AHnyid dor no ma
135a3(rgyud): gsal ba'i// rgyu las sbyor bar gyur pa yin// dog par de ni yong bshad do// dngos po med par ras kyi ming // 'phags pa gshin rje gshed bsgoms la// gzhon nu'i gzugs su'ang bsgo/ 
135a4(rgyud): par bya// dog pa de yi ras don las// mi snang ba la sogs grub cing // yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba nga'i don gcig yang dag byung // AHyi dog ras mtshon pas
135a5(rgyud): ni// 'jig rten pa la dgongs pas bshad// 'di ni chos da nga rdzogs longs spyod// sprul pas de ni gsum du 'gyur// byis pa rtog par bya ba'i phyir// de ni rnam pa lngar yang
135a6(rgyud): 'gyur// tha mal byis pa'i chos rnams gang // rnam lnga gcig pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de yang shin tu ldan sems can// sems can sogs la rnam par gnas// rtag pa ltar ni so sor snang
135a7(rgyud): 'gro ba dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig/ skye ba med las skyes pas na// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa'o// shes 'dod de tshe sngags pa ni// 'gro ba byis pa de tshe spyod// de nas gsang snga ga/ 
135a8(rgyud): grub 'gyur ba// rnam par mi rtog gcig shos nyid// ya yi sde sogs gnas byas te// sngags ni na ri bri bar bya// rang gi sde bcas gnas dag ni// yi ge a bzhin sngon 'gro ba// 
135b1(rgyud): so so gzhan pa'i bzhi pa ni// i u dang ni ring por bcas// a ai oM u ya ste mtha'// bzhi po dang bcas zlum por bri// bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ldan pa'i// 'gro ba mnyam gzhag
135b2(rgyud): bskyed pa yin// 'di dag rang skyes gnas gzugs kyi// chu yi yi ger zhugs par 'gyur// de nas gzhon nu'i gzugs nyid kyang // rnam par bsgoms pas skye bar 'gyur// cha bcas dbang
135b3(rgyud): gnas sngags pa ni// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// na ga yo ni grangs bzhin du// skud sogs sbyor la gang gnas pa// nyi shu yi ni sngon ma yang // de ni ras te bzhi pa'ang yin// 
135b4(rgyud): sngon med cha lugs gzugs kyis ni// khams gsum/ dag ni lta bar 'dod// 'gro ba'i don ni byed gyur pa'am// / mnyam nyid ye shes de nyid las// yon tan gsum ni// 
135b5(rgyud): brdar byas pa// yon tan med pa'i yon tan ming // gnon nu'i spyod pa'i lus kyi ming // lta ba 'di ni bar skyes/ de ni sgo glegs mtha'i yin te// e u dang ni ring pos bcwa
135b6(rgyud): yi ge gsum bcas thig ler ldan// tsheg drag mtha' yi ring sde can// yi ge a ni yig sbyor ba'ang // bcu gcig par yang gyur pa yin// de nyid ring po ring po'i mthas// bcu gnyis
135b7(rgyud): pa yi grangs su 'gyur// de nyid yi ga ur sbyor las// yi ge oM zhes brjod pa yin// snga ma'i ri mo'i sbyor ba yis// ming ni bcu bzhi par 'gyuraro// ci ste a las sngags pa ni// AH
135b8(rgyud): nyid du ni blta bas bya// de bzhin A yi sbyor ba las// yi ge a ni ci 'dod par// ji bzhin grangs kyis yang dag blta// re re'ang a yi sbyor bas bsgo// i r-i l-i u'i tshogs las
136a1(rgyud): kyang sngags pa ya ra la wa'i gzugs// lkog ma mkha' dang bar dang ni// rkan dang spyi bor gang gnas pa// gang tshe a ka'i sde grangs las// A yi
136a2(rgyud): yi rgyab na gnas// i tshan phrag pa lag pa dang // tshigs rnams la ni de bzhin no// dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang // lag pa g.yon par rab tu brtag/ dpyi dang brla dang byin pa dang // rkang pa
136a3(rgyud): g.yas g.yon de bzhin no// gzugs de yi ni grangs mnyam pas// ta mtshan shin tu dngos grub ster// u tshan de bzhin dbus dang ni// lag pa ru ni yongs su bshad// rkang pa yang
136a4(rgyud): ni ri ti'i tshan// 'das pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa yin// de bzhin nyid kyi sbyor ldan pa'i// sngags pa rnams kyis shin tu mthong // lhun gyis grub pas dngos grub pa/ 
136a5(rgyud): me tog gis mdzes phreng ba bzhin// rang rgyud kyi ni nang nyi da du// lha mchog dag ni bya ba yin// dgongs pa la sogs rnam pa kun// de nyid las ni bdag 'grub 'gyur// 
136a6(rgyud): tsha ba'i bzhi bzhi sde sbyor bas// mkhas pa yi ni sgo rnams bya// ka tsa Ta ta pa tshan yang // dbus dang shar la sogs sngon 'gro// 'gro la phan pa'i 'dod pa yang // ma spel bar ni mthong
136a7(rgyud): ba yin// thams cad kyang ni rdzogs yi ge/ yi ge hA yis mchod par bya// sna tshogs pa ni 'byin byed cing // 'gro ba dus gsum gcig pa'i dngos// yi ge a ni lus su bya// lhag ma
136a8(rgyud): rnam pa dang bcas pa// mtshams med lnga yi sbyor ba las// sngags pa 'gro ba phan par ston// sha thog mthar gnas sngags las skyes// dbang bskur gsum po spyilas skye// gzugs
136b1(rgyud): med rtogs pa'i chos rnams ni// skad cig gcig gis nges sbyor gyur// de tshe dkyil 'khor med byas pas// 'jig rten pa rnams chos dgar 'gyur// a ku ha gnas byang phyogs
136b2(rgyud): gnas// yod pa nyid kyang dus gsum 'das// gang dang gang nas byung ba yis// gsang sngags bsam pas mi khyab gsungs// de dang de ni bzhugs gyur pa// rang gi mtshan mo gcig shos
136b3(rgyud): nyid// gzugs med 'di la gnas yod pa// cha ni gsum zhes bya bar 'gyur// steng 'og phyogs kyi cha rnams su// dngos med pa ni rnam par gnas// dngos po gcig gyur mthong ba dang
136b4(rgyud): 'gro bcas tshangs pa 'gro bdag nyid// tshangs pa'i gan das pa bzhi po las// smon lam la sogs bsgom pa dpa'o// 'gro ba don gtogs 'dod pa'i yon tan gyur rnams
136b5(rgyud): la/ dgyes pa'i bde mchog dga' ba'i 'dod pa mdzod/ sngon chad mdzad pa'i smon lam rab mchog dgongs nas ni thub pa rdo rje'i tshig mchog rnam par dbye bar gsol/ 
136b6(rgyud): nor bu rin chen dag gis rnam rgyan skra yi mchog/ 'gro ba'i don byed sring mo bdag la brtan par mdzad// lhag pa'i snying rje las byung rab mchog ldan pa'i sku// bdag ni yongs su bzung la tshwa
136b7(rgyud): rnams don yod mdzod// sring mos kyang ni khyad par du// de ltar bskul ba tsam gyis ni// de nas yongs su 'dzin mdzad de// rig pa'i pad+ma dpal du mdzad// shin tu snyan cing yid 'ong dbyangs
136b8(rgyud): kyis ni// phan pas myur du 'gro ba gnyis med 'dir snod gyur// bla mi bdag ni gal te gson par mchis bzhed na// dga' ba las byung chos dga' bdag la dgyes par mdzod// 'gro ba/ 
137a1(rgyud): spyan sa // rnams stong bar mus gnyis rang gas nga ma ma gnos// nga lamam
137a2(rgyud): dang byed bdag 'dod pa mdzod// dgongs pa'i ye shes rdo rnaMms// sangs rgyas yon tan gcig la bzhugs// 'anas brjod sbyin stegade bzhin khrus// dkyil la khom mongs su las pa mang/ 
137a3(rgyud): 'dod med cing chags pa'i// desang don dam dag sung mim// slong dus de bzhin sngags pa ni// bzlas brjod ngos po med pa yin// bstangs pa 'idzin med bzang ldan// mang 'drang rig byed man
137a4(rgyud): tan dang// rlung da bla kyil rnam 'byo// ng+ya sa kyisadage banag par bya// tsam sde chen// sde nga // btsunadas byed bye dag tu sbyar// ga shin rjegashed kyi gzugs
137a5(rgyud): ma 'kho ga pa spyong // donas sdunabamadun dugaste// dgo se dzin gyis pang ga khams la sogs sag// rnams
137a6(rgyud): yin bzhin// ma byin len pa byang chub sems// kun rdzokhri bstan pa brdzun smra ga// phung po sogs chags gyur pa ste// tshangs pa'i gnas pa ni bud med yin// mi sbyin cig dang nang ba ste/ 
137a7(rgyud): bzhi na pa nying rtsong ni// dus gsum sbyang ba gcig pur// sngags pa yis ni de 'gro/ shang bzhis ni sumal bshad// gci bzhes ni dbang ma tshan// de dag za' sa sha na/ 
137a8(rgyud): gcig su ma 'o// lda gas pa meng // sa na rkye nas byamachis// na ni sengs su pa/  'dim meng gyu /  papa
137b1(rgyud): 'di rnams ni// bi mu ra sha pas 'di// lha rnams sbyor ba'i chos nyid du// bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin// dgongs pa yis ni bshad pa la// byis pa rnams ni yi ger rtog/ rdo rje theg la
137b2(rgyud): gnas khyod kyang // chos nyid de yang mi shes so// rtog pa kun las rnam 'das pas// chos kyi dbyings te mkha' dang mtshungs// de 'dra 'jig rten rgyang pan pa// mthon po'i gsang gis rtog/ 
137b3(rgyud): par byed// yi ge gang gis mi gang zhig/ 'gro la gsal bar rtog byed pa// 'gro ngan gcig pa'i sbyor ba las// de nyid kyis ni de nyid mthong // gang zhig rnam smin smin pa yi// sems ni/ 
137b4(rgyud): dngos grub la gzhol ba// rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skur sbyor las// dngos po med pa nyid du byung // bdag nyid pa sam gyis mi khyab gzugs// kun rdzob don gyi gnyen por/ 
137b5(rgyud): 'byung / sprul pa'i lus las bsngags pas ni// sgyu ma bzhin du ston par byed// gsang ba'i dgongs pa de nyid 'di// 'jam dpal ye shes dam pa'o// rdo rje gsum gan
137b6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// sgom pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sgom// na mkhar brtags pa'i rnal 'byor la// phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid gnas/ 
137b7(rgyud): so phyogs yin// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dpag bsams shing // dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan// sprul pa'i 'bras bu shin tu mdzes// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri// dngos
137b8(rgyud): med dben pa nyams dga' ba// rdo rje zhes bya des bsgrub bya// phung sogs yan lag thams cad de// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dngos grub gyur// sngags 'don par ni gang gyur ro pa// bsdus bsngas/ 
138a1(rgyud): ni gcig pu pa// lus sogs rdo rje gsum la ni// rdo rje 'jam pa bsgom par bya// lus la sogs pa rdo rje gsum// de nyid gsum nas spro bar bya// rdo rje gsum dang / 
138a2(rgyud): legs sbyor las// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// na mkha' mtha' yas yang dag rtog/ sems sbyor ba ni dpag tshad yin// lnga bcu gnyis gyur gang yin pa// brgya po rgyab nas mngon phyog
138a3(rgyud): la/ ci rigs gcig pa'i yang dag rtogs// sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar cig stsol// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'bar ba'i rdo rje snang ba yis// sa la sogs brgyan pa ni// de ni snang ba
138a4(rgyud): zhes bshad do// tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha// dad pa/ des de la phyag kyang byed// 'di ni mi snang byed pa ste// ting / 'dzin 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid// rnam par smin pa ldog gyur cing // 
138a5(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa 'grub par 'gyur// phung po la sogs grangs mnyam par// mi bskyod la sogs rab tu brtagabashang gci spyang las der gyur pa// gang zhig dam tshig rje
138a6(rgyud): bya'o// dam tshig ces bya de dag mchog/ mi phyed rdo rje gsum 'byung bas// dkon mchog gsum ni mnyam byas te// bdag med pa yang bsgom par bya// dkon mchog gsum ni lcags gsum
138a7(rgyud): yin// bdag med ces bya kha yin te// gang 'di rnam rtog gcig nyid du// bcug pa ril bu yin par 'dod// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi phyed pa'i// sgom pa sems kyi dam pa'o// de ltar
138a8(rgyud): de nyid shes bsgoms nas// skad cig gis 'jam rdo rjer 'gyur// 'khor lo 'od 'phro mtshungs par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyis rnam bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas kun gyis gnas bsgoms
138b1(rgyud): nas/ sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur bar bshad// sum cu rtsa drug gnas sbyor ba'i// ri rab kyi ni rdul phran rnams// de snyed de yi rjes 'brang rnams// dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'o// gnas ni lha/ 
138b2(rgyud): yi sbyor ba ste// sna ni ri rab ces bya'o// bdag nyid chen po sum cu bdun// nam mkhar spro ba bsam mi khyab// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bdag po ste// 'di dag 'khor du gyur pa yin// 'jig rten pa yi
138b3(rgyud): ngo bo ru// phyi yi ri rab brtag pa yin// dam tshig rdo rje nas bya ba'i// 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya// 'khor lo dngos grub rnyed sla ba// skad cig sbyor bas sgrub pa'o// rdo rje chen po rang sngags
138b4(rgyud): kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms pa// rdo rje kun dgyi gnas mchog ste// thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// dari rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// de
138b5(rgyud): snyed bud med de yi ni// gsum 'gyur gnas su 'gyur ba yi na// khams gsum gyi ni rdo rje che// drag po yis ni pha/ ga byas 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i// ting 'dzin
138b6(rgyud): 'di ni yang dag bshad// pad+ma chen po mdab brgyad pa// rang sngags rdo rje las byung ba// chos rnams kun gyi gnas bsgoms na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa drug gnas/ 
138b7(rgyud): sbyor ba'i// ri rab rdul phran grangs snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gi ni// dkyil 'khor la ni bdag nyid 'jog/ gos med mnyam nyid ye shes kyi// rdo rje pad+mo grub cas sbyin// so
138b8(rgyud): sor rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin ni yang dag bshad// shin tu grangs med bskal par ni// grangs kyi ming gis gnas par ni// gnas shing bsgoms par byed pa yin// de yi ye
139a1(rgyud): lngar ldan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni// 'jig rten phan phyir gsungs pa rnams// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i// yon tan gsum ni yongs su
139a2(rgyud): bsten// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra ba'i// rang sngags las byung ral gri ni// blo ldan lag par de bzhag na// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rang gi sngags kyi khongs chud 'di// ho ho hUM de khams
139a3(rgyud): gsum pa// pad+ma spangs pa'i tshangs pa cher// rnal 'byor bde 'gyur ba yin// khams gsum kun gyis cher mchod cing // tshangs dang lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum mi yi mchog gcig
139a4(rgyud): pubu/ dbang chen po yi tshangs par 'gyur// thugs kyi rdo rje ma cho ga bsgoms pas// dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// de ni de ma thag tu 'thob// ra
139a5(rgyud): gi rdo rje ting 'dzin 'di// dngos med gcig pu yang dag byung // byang grol la yang de mi gnas// ral gri kha dang 'dud/ 'gyur// oM ni ril bu tsa na ka'i// 'bru chad tsam du bsamra/ 
139a6(rgyud): nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes 'od po che// blo ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gsar mdog gam// 
139a7(rgyud): nyi ma 'char ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i// tsan ka yi 'bru tshod tsam// yi ge'i dam pa AHbsam mo// de yi dbus su lha yi gzugs// khar bcug nas ni rnam bsgoms na// byang chub ye shes
139a8(rgyud): 'od po che// de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gsar mdog dang // nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// na mkha'i dbus na gnas pa yi// can ka yi 'bru chod tsam// yi ge hUM ni rnam
139b1(rgyud): bsams te// dbus su rang gi lha bsams nas// khar bcug nas ni rnam bsams na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'dzum+bu chu bo'i gser mdog dang
139b2(rgyud): nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// rnam par snang mdzad mkha' dbyings kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la// lag tu 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na// 'khor lo'i reg pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ 
139b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku mdog sbyor ba yang // 'di ni ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o// 'khor lo chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser mdog gam// nyi ma 'char ka'i/ 
139b4(rgyud): 'od 'dra ba'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi phyed rab bsgoms te// lag du rdo rje bsgoms don ni// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje mchog gi
139b5(rgyud): sgrub pa 'di// rdo rje sku yi sbyor ba las// rdo rje rigs kyi mtsho ga bsgoms pas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// nam mkha' khams kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen la ni rin chen
139b6(rgyud): sgom// de nyid lag tu legs bzhag na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rin chen mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// rin chen sku yi sbyor ba las// rin chen rigs kyi mchog sgom pa// ye shes
139b7(rgyud): rdo rje dag gis bya// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab bsgoms la// lag tu pad+ma bsgoms na ni// pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+ma mchog gi sgrub pa 'di// 
139b8(rgyud): pad+ma'i skur ni sbyor ba las// pad+ma'i rigs chen bsgoms pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// don yod mchog ni rab bsgoms la// lag tu/ 
140a1(rgyud): ral gri rab bsgoms na// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog ni 'di sgrub pa'i// sku yi dam tshig sbyor ba las// dam tshig rdo rje rigs bsgoms pa/ 
140a2(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// bsgrub bya rdo rje'i dbye ba yis// mdung thung rdo rje lcags kyu sogs// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis// bsam gtan nyid kyis sgrub par 'gyur// dam tshig/ 
140a3(rgyud): chen po 'byung ba yi// dam tshig dngos grub ces bya ba'i// mi phyed rdo rje gsum dbang phyug/ sna tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung nyid// 'gog dang la
140a4(rgyud): ste bzhi po ni// lam gyi bzhi mdor yang dag bshad// sgrub pa po ni gnas ming can// shing gcig drung du yang de dag rtog/ chos dang rdzogs longs spyod ming can// sna chog
140a5(rgyud): mtshan gcig yang dag dgod// mtshan ma rkyen gyi gzu gas can no// 'byin dang rngub pa nyid dang ni// gnas ba yis ni nyer mdzes pa// yid ston pa yi mnyam sbyor la// 
140a6(rgyud): rab tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas su// dus gsum rtog pa gcig las 'das// rdo rje lcags kyu khyad par dang // sgrub pa po ni rtag tu sgrub// sbyor gsum sngags kyi skyes bu ni// sbyor gsum rdo rje
140a7(rgyud): can bsam pa// sku gsung thugs kyi lcags kyu'o// sangs rgyas ye shes blo can gyi// mi gsal gsal bar yang dag ldan// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo las// 'gro ba thams cad dgug
140a8(rgyud): par bya// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mchog gnas pa// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de nyid sngags don rnal 'byor pas// 'gro ba 'dod pa'i la
140b1(rgyud): spyod kyang // mi gsal sbyor bas sbyor bar byed// gang yang dam tshig phyogs rnams ni// mkha' byings dbye bas gnas pa rnams// de nyid rdo rje bkug nas ni// sngags rig pas ni spyad par
140b2(rgyud): bya// namakha'i khams ni dgug pa 'di// dam tshig chen po rdo rje can// sngags kyi de nyid gcig sbyor las// lcags kyu de rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig rnams ni dgug pa'i mchog
140b3(rgyud): rgyal gnas lcags kyu bsams nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo che// rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bya// me long lta bu'i sngags pas ni// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par sgom// lag tu sku dang
140b4(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi// lcags kyul sogs rab tu sgom// de ni sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis// de nyid las ni lha rnams dgod// de ni de ma thag tu yang // dngos grub kun ster las
140b5(rgyud): byed 'gyur// sku dang gsung thugs thams cad ni/ mtshan nyid gcig par bsgom par bya// lce yi rdo rje skye ra ba yis// gsung gi rdo rjer de mnyam sgom// brtul zhugs
140b6(rgyud): can gyis phyi nang gnyis// gsang ba'i rdo rje mchog mchod do// dngos med dam tshig sbyor ba yis// ji lta ji ltar rab sgrub pa// dam tshig gsum gyi rnal 'byor pa'i// de ni yang dag yin/ 
140b7(rgyud): bar bshad// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yi// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'dod// bcom ldan dam tshig chen po yi// rnal 'byor pas ni da skad gsungs// de nas phyag na rdo rje ni/ 
140b8(rgyud): go byed gsang ba yang dag gsungs// gang zhig shes na rnal 'byor ba'i// mnyam gzhag mchog ni thob 'gyur ba'i// gsang dbang de nyid dam pa yi// de ni de yis yang dag po shang/ 
141a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po gcig bdag nyid// na mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas// byas na dam tshig yang dag pa// sha chen la ni yang dag sbyar// dngos med pa yi sha chen
141a2(rgyud): gyi/ dam tshig mchog la gnas nas ni// blo ldan bdag nyid sgom pa ni// rdo rje dngos grub longs spyod sur// rdzogs longs spyod yul bshang ba yin// de nyid mi shes dbang po gci// dam
141a3(rgyud): tshig 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs phung las byung ba// glang po'i shar ni de rab brtag/ dam tshig gcig tu legs sbyor las// mngon
141a4(rgyud): shes lnga dag thob par 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rta sha ste// / dngos med de nyid las sbyor las// dam tshig ga dag tu legs sbyor na// mi snang gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur// 
141a5(rgyud): dgongs pas gcig shos bzlog pa yin// phung sogs yan lag gang gyur pa// dngos med de ni khyi sha yin// dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor// dngos grub thams cad
141a6(rgyud): rab sgrub pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas can ba lang sha/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig gcig tu yang dag sbyor// rdo rje dgug pa'i dam pa'o// 'di ni 'jig rten par gyur las/ 
141a7(rgyud): dgongs pas gcig shos bzlog pa yis// sha chen dang ni bshang gtso dang // glang po rta khyi ba lang dag/ mi rtog gcig pa'i sgrub pa yis// dam tshig gcig tu de 'grub 'gyur/ 
141a8(rgyud): bstan pas 'di ni sgrub pa ni// sngags kyi longs spyod rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje sbyor ba'i gsang ba yis// sgrub pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas byin rlob cing // rnam kun rdorje
141b1(rgyud): can gsum dang // snying kar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas thams cad tshim 'gyur ba'i// 'di ni dam tshig sdom pa'o// dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i
141b2(rgyud): mchog dam tshig mchog 'dis rab tu bya// dam tshig kun gyi dam pa ste// rdo rje zas kyi ting 'dzin no// de nas 'gro la phan pa'i mgon// gtso bo rnam snang chen po la// gsang ba'i dgongs pa dam/ 
141b3(rgyud): pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pas slar yang zhus// gang zhig spyi bor brtags pa ni// gcig pu nyid du gyur pa des// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug tu// mu stegs rnams kyis 'tshal mi 'gyur// rang gi
141b4(rgyud): bstan bcos brda' yis ni// phyi rol pa de rnam rtog la// ting 'dzin brtags pa 'di dag kyang // 'di la rang gi/ dngo bo med// tshangs sgo mdzod kyi rgyud la ni// ri rab gcig
141b5(rgyud): dang bcas par bshad// byis pa mchog ni rmongs byed pa// gsung 'di skye bo ltung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan bdag po 'dis// rdo rje can la slar gsungs pa// legs so// 
141b6(rgyud): rdo rje legs pa che// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs pa// rkyen dang nyan thos theg pa dang // 'dir ni nga yis gsal bshad pa// sangs rgyas kyis bshad ye shes dag/ theg pa chen po mi
141b7(rgyud): mthong ngo // tshad yod dang ni yongs chad pa'i// rang gi lus la gang bshad de// ye shes de rnams dri med 'dod// khron pa'i rus sbal zhes bya'o// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam ye shes// 
141b8(rgyud): rdo rje theg pa bla med pa// mchog sbyin nga ni khyed bzhin du// rgya chen de yis mi mthong ngo // rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho ste// de yis yang dag ma mthong bas// rang gi lung ni tshad ma yis// gzhan
142a1(rgyud): yod pa ni min zhes smra// theg pa chen la gsang ba rnams// srang la btsal te de smra ba// de rnams sngon bzhin gsal min zhes// nga yi tshig las bltas te smra/ 
142a2(rgyud): de nyid rjes su gzung ba'i phyir// rdzogs sangs rgyas la sgom pa rnams// gang gis shes na rtog med 'gyur// gsang ba dgongs pas gsungs pa yin// sngags kyi de nyid don byang chub
142a3(rgyud): sna tshogs dngos grub 'bras bu ster// dgongs don ji lta ji lta bar// de ni nga yis yang dag bshad// dam tshig rdo rje lce la ni// rdo rje can gyis hUM bsams te// rnal 'byor pas ni bdud rtsi lnga
142a4(rgyud): bris na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur// AHdang oM gyi gas dadag/ 'di ni rdo rje gsum mchog ste// 'di lta bu yi sbyor pra yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'od chen 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje'i bdud rtsi
142a5(rgyud): yid phreng 'gyur dam tshig rdo rjer bshad// rdo rje sems bar yang dag 'brung // ting nge 'dzin ni bshad pa yin// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig mchog/ sku gsung rdo rje can du 'gyu
142a6(rgyud): de nyid sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgya mtshom// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig dngos grub mchog/ rdo rjerje sa/ 
142a7(rgyud): nyid de snang byed// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed// sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad du// grub nas 'di ni der sbyor ba'i// rig pa 'dzin par de 'gyur ro// sku yi rdo rje sgom bdag nyid// grub mchog
142a8(rgyud): dam tshig lo gnas pa// mi snang gyur pa kun gyi mchog/ stong gsum dag ni snang bar byed// lha yi bu mo mchog phrogs nas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor mar legs sbyor// gang+gA'i bye snyed
142b1(rgyud): ces bya ba'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus kun// dpe de dang ni grangs gcig pa// sangs rgyas dus gsum rnam spangs pa// lag tu skyu ru bzhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gis de mthong 'gyur
142b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing ni gang dag tu// sgra grag pa ni ji snyed pa// rnam pa la gnas ma nor bar// skad cig gis ni de kun thos// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag dang // sku la sogs pa gsum gyis mtshan// 
142b3(rgyud): sems zhes bshad pa'i sgom pa mchog/ sems can rnams kyi de nyid rig/ bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog gis 'gengs// rdo rje bsam mi khyab sngon 'gro// rang gi rnam
142b4(rgyud): sems bcas pa// gang+gA'i bye ma'i ming can gyi// gnas gyi dngos po bshad pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon shes gnas// 'di ni yang dag bka' stsal to// mngon
142b5(rgyud): shes drug ni don grub po// de ni sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// 'khor rnams kyis ni rab mdzes pas// sku sogs rdo rje gsum 'di ni// 'jig rten khams
142b6(rgyud): rnams kun tu spyod// yid rton bden gcig bsnyen pa ste// de nyid gsum mnyamo gnyis med pa// brten te dam tshig gcig gyur pa// ye shes nye bar sgrub pa'o// yid rton mnyam pa'i sbyor
142b7(rgyud): ba las// sgrub pa yi ni dam tshig 'gyur// 'bras bu mngon sum byas sbyor ba// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// rkyen dang nyan thos mdo sde pa// 'di dang ldan pa rab tu bsngags// sems la dmigs
142b8(rgyud): dang 'dir sbyor ba// skad cig gis kyang de 'grub 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor gcig dang // nye bar bsgrub par gang gyur dang // sgrub pa'i dam tshig nyid dang ni// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa yin// 
143a1(rgyud): 'di la yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba// ji lta ji ltar 'jig rten sogs// sa dang shing gi rin chen sogs// lha nyid du ni rab tu brtag/ chos kyi dbye bas shes par bya// rdo rje
143a2(rgyud): shes sgrub pa po// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig yang dag sbyor// byang chub mchog ni rnam par sgom// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang rag bya chos rnams la// dngos grub mchog ni rnam dopyad pa// 
143a3(rgyud): de ni nye bar sgrub par 'gyur// sngags bdag gang yin bsgoms nas ni// bskul ba sgrub par 'gyur ba yin// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// de ni sgrub pa chen por 'dod// bsnyen pa rdo rje
143a4(rgyud): bdud rtsi dag/ sngags pas kun tu brtag par bya// dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni// dbu rgyan la ni mchog gang ba sam// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// de nyid gsum
143a5(rgyud): gsang yang dag 'byung // sngags kyi de nyid don gnyer ba'i// sgrub pa pos ni dben pa bsten// sna tshogs lung gi yang dag rtog/ sngags ni dgon pa chen por 'dod// de yid pa
143a6(rgyud): bsam shing longs spyod// sa phyogs zhes ni yongs su bsgrags// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor ba ni// rnam pa'i dben pa chen por bshad// ro 'or rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de rigs dngos med
143a7(rgyud): las byung ba'o// de 'dra'i dben pa'i mtshon pa ru// der ni 'od chen rnam gnas te// gnas med pa yi sbyor ba yis// rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni// chen pos
143a8(rgyud): de skad bka' stsal to// dgon po chen po'is phyogs sogs// 'jig rten pa rnams smra ba gsal// bsnyen bsku yi brtul zhugs mchog/ blo dang ldan pas rdo rje bzhis// rdo rje gsum gnyis
143b1(rgyud): med sbyor bas// bsgoms na dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// me long zhes bya dgon pa che// rin chen zhes bya dben pa'o// chen po zhes bya 'od dpag med// don yod pa ni ri 'or yin// chu ngogs
143b2(rgyud): dag pa'i chos kyi cha// gnas lnga dag tu rab tu brtag/ ji srid don ni sbyor ba bzhis// yi ge oM ni sdom par 'gyur// ji ltar na mkha'i mtshan nyid gcig/ rang gi mtshan nyid 'dor mi byed/ 
143b3(rgyud): de bzhin de nyid gsum bzhi'i phyed// yi ge oM gcig sdom pa'o// gnas med gnas pa zhes bya ba'i// oM gcig gis ni 'gro la khyab// de nyid mi gsal sbyor dbang po// gtso bo rang nyid
143b4(rgyud): zlog pa yin// la la glang po spangs nas ni// rjes la dbyibs/ dani tshol bar byed// de bzhin ma 'ongs sngags pa ni// oM las sdom pa bzhin du 'dod// gcig gnyis gsum
143b5(rgyud): dang bzhi dang lnga// dus thub de bzhin nor can dang // phan tshun sgra ra gnas brjod pa las// bsam mi khyab pa'i grangs su 'gyur// bcom ldan gcig kyang du ma ste// tshig tu
143b6(rgyud): brjod pa rnam par spangs// brda' tsam du ni oM zhes bya// dngos med sbyor ba'i chos nyid yin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa ste// sku gsum du ni yang dag bshad// gsum po yang dag 'dzin
143b7(rgyud): bas ni/ des na oM ni sdom pa yin// dang po gtsog pu mi bskyod dgod// de nyid sdom par gyur pa yin// brda' ru brjod pa sna tshogs pa// bsams nas sdom pa kun tu bshad// mi phyed nam
143b8(rgyud): mkha'i sbyor ba yis// bes ma dang gdon dang rnam par bral// rten 'brel rigs les yang dag 'thung // rjes bcas zhes byed de bsgom bya// rtag tu 'byung ba'i ye shes bzhag/ mig lo sog/ 
144a1(rgyud): pa bdun brgyal// g.yas dang gcig shos zla phyed de// shes rab thabs kyang sgrub pa'o// 'di dag zung glur zla ba ste// rdo rje ming can phyed dang gnyis// de ni sbyor/ 
144a2(rgyud): ba 'di nyid kyis// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhag ni thub pa zla phyed dang // zla gcig zla ba phyed gnyis pas// 'jig rten pa yi zhag dbye bas// rgya che rangs ni bshad pa yin// gsang ba
144a3(rgyud): mchog las byung ba ni// zla ba phyed kyis sgrub par gsungs// de nyid nye bar 'grub bshad pa'i// sdom pa'i yul ni dam pa yin// gang tshe shes rab thabs ye shes// de bzhin nyid shes las
144a4(rgyud): byung ba// sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi daphyed gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje byin rlabs mdzad par 'gyur// 'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas dang // gang zhig
144a5(rgyud): phyogs bcur bzhugs pa rnams// chos sku mchogagi rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas de rnams byin gyis rlob// 'das pa rnams ni chos sku yis// bsam mi khyab pa'i phyogs
144a6(rgyud): na bzhugs// sngags mchog bsam gyis mi khyab pas// ma 'ongs rnams kyis byin gyis rlob// sangs rgyas gsum la dbye ba ni// cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin// 'on kyang dngos med lnga
144a7(rgyud): byung ba'i// sngags pa rnams la byin gyis rlob// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// mi phyed rdo rje gsum bsgoms la// sku ni ji lta bar 'tsham pa// de ltar byin gyis rlob
144a8(rgyud): par mdzad// rig dang ma rig yong dag ldan// srog la sogs te bcu gnyis bshad// dus kyi nyis 'gyur lam la sogs// de nyid zla ba la sogs 'gyur// zla ba la sogs grangs sa/ 
144b1(rgyud): pas// nyi ma bcu gnyis ming can yin// khyab 'jug de nyid dbye ba yis// lam rtsom pa'i ni brtags pa yis// de nyid du ni sgrub pa mchog/ sdom pa yul zhes bshad pa yin// sngags
144b2(rgyud): dang dngos med de byed pa// mgal me 'khor lo bskor dang mtshungs// rtog pa las byung de 'di ni// dngos med pa ni sgom pas so// ma 'ongs pa yi skye bo ni// lha yi gzugs la 'dud par
144b3(rgyud): byed// mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang // lce dang de bzhin lus dag dang // lpags pa rkang par yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa dag ni mi nus pa// lta dang nyan dang dri dang ro// reg bya rnams ni dngos
144b4(rgyud): med pa// rang bzhin sems med gyur pa yi// 'jim gzugs sangs rgyas sku can te// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i bla ma'i sku// sangs rgyas byin gyis byin rlabs kyis// de
144b5(rgyud): bzhin sngags sbyor bdag nyid can// dngos med rdo rje'i sku nyid yin// shing dang sa dang rin chen sogs// rang gi lha yi gzugs byas la// rang gi chos ni spangs nas su// 
144b6(rgyud): tshig gi lam de ston par byed// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa mchog/ cho 'phrul de la ga las byung // de nas dang sogs yang dag pas// slar yang de la gsol 'debs kyang // gsol ba 'debs
144b7(rgyud): ba tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra bar ga la 'gyur// phyi rol chos la gang zhig dga'// lha rnams thams cad spong ba yin// de ltar sku las sku byung ba// dpal ldan chos 'di'ang gsum gyi laM// 
144b8(rgyud): byin rlabs bdag longs spyod na// gsung gi rdo rje can du byed// 'das dang ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// phyogs bsun ni gang bzhugs pa// rlung dang 'brung 'gyur de rnams ni// mi phyed gsum gyi lan
145a1(rgyud): du 'gyur// yid rton bde bzhi bdag nyid// de bzhin nyid shes las byung ba// yi ge gcig ni gsum drug 'di// rang nyid 'gro ba'i khar brjod do// de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i
145a2(rgyud): gnas// rdo rje mi phyed rdo rje can// gang gzhan sangs rgyas kyis gsungs dang // 'gro ba'i sgrar ni 'di gyur te// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum rnal 'byor/ 
145a3(rgyud): gsung gi rdo rje mi phyed pa// rdo rje can mchog de byin rlob// 'jug pa gnas pa'i sbyor ba dang // ldang ba dang ni yang dag ldan// gsung gi rdo rje dngos med pa// de ni sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// ji ltar 'khor
145a4(rgyud): los bsgyur rgyal ni// tshig gi lam gyil byed 'jug/ gsu dang byin rlabs pas sngags pa ni// de bzhin don yod nyid du byed// der ni yang dag bshad pa 'di// sgrub pa chen po zhe
145a5(rgyud): bya ba'o// sangs rgyas de rnams byin rlob pa// sdom pa yul nau dam pa'o// rdo rje thugs ni 'dzin rgyal po// da ni bdag la byin rlob mdzad// mi phyed rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// na mkha'
145a6(rgyud): khams dang mnyam pa'i gnas// gang zhig byung dang 'byur 'gyur ba'i// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de yi byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas// lan gsum las ni byung ba mdzad
145a7(rgyud): sku yis ston pa'i mdzad pa mchog/ rang sangs rgyas ni sgom pa yin// mdo sde pa dang nyan thos kyi'ang // smra ba sgrub pa por gyur yin// sems ni rnal 'byor ldan mchog gis// 'gro ba'i don ni/ 
145a8(rgyud): rab sgrub pa'o// 'gro 'ong gnas dang bral ba ni// rdo dang sa dang dbyig byed pa// lus la sogs pa mtshon pa yis// 'on kyang de ni gsung du 'gyur// sems dang lus dang mi ldan pa'i// de bzhin
145b1(rgyud): nyid ni 'gro na can// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjegacig/ gyur kyang so sor bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas rdorje chos dag gas// de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa'ang rung // sku gsung thugs kyi sangs rgya
145b2(rgyud): sogs/ rdo rje gsum po mi phyed brtag/ de 'das rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can// so sor rtog pa 'gas par 'gyur// sku la sogs pa'i grangs mnyam par// sangs rgyas kyang ni gang rtog gyur// 
145b3(rgyud): pa shin tu sbyor ba yang // de ni gsal bar the tsom med// sna tshogs sbyor gyur sngags rnams ni// gang zhig stong par mngon sum byed// 'das pa dag ni de thams cad// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid de 'gas
145b4(rgyud): 'gyur/ nyan thos rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi// byang chub bsdus nas bshad pa yin// 'jig rten pa yi gang bshad pa/ dor bsdus pa ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas yang rdo rje chos// yangan
145b5(rgyud): sems dpa'ang rung // rmongs pas 'di las 'daso na no// do na/ gas par the tshom med// dgongs pa lung bstan la gnas nas// gsang bdam pa yang dag srung // lhun gyis grub pa'i
145b6(rgyud): ba yis// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// sku la sogs pa'o gsang ba mchog/ rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i// dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i// le'u bcu gnyis gsungs pa yin// dgongs pa
145b7(rgyud): lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+m+ma shrI b+ha dra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos
145b8(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te gautan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra mA la a b+hi d+hA na ma hA yo ga tan+ta sarba tan+t+ra hr-id ya ra ha s+ya b+he da ka ma i ti bod skad du/ 
146a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par brjod pa rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
146a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
146a3(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la tshad med pa'i phyag rgya chen pos mngon par rtogs phra/ 
146a4(rgyud): bzhugs te/ dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i rigs dang 'bre dal pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po mngon pa
146a5(rgyud): rtog pa la mngon du bya ba la bzhugs pa/ gnyis su med ba'i bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas/ dgyes pas/ mchog tu pad+ma dgyes pa/ chos thams cad kyang ji lta ba bzhin
146a6(rgyud): nyams su myong ba mthong bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi de kho na nyid la mngon du phyogs pa/ rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dmachog bla na med pa'i dbang du gyur pa la rab tu mkhas pa 'di lta ste
146a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe sdang rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / 
146a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje dang
146b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang / de lta bu rnams
146b2(rgyud): ga tso bor gyur pa dam tshig chen po'i rigs dang 'brel pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang / gzhan yang rigs chen po dang 'brel pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya
146b3(rgyud): stong la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha' rnam par rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
146b4(rgyud): chen po na mkha'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i gtsug tor dang / byang chub semangs dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshoms rnams kyis nges par grol
146b5(rgyud): ba dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes/ mas dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
146b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa
146b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje longs spyod dang / byang chub
146b8(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyi bong ngo / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsol gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
147a1(rgyud): rnam rtog med pa'i spyi gtsug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog/ 
147a2(rgyud): med pa'i chos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam rtog med pa'i dam tshig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
147a3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhan cig skyes/ 
147a4(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje dang / gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje'i theg pas da lhag par grol ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// bcom
147a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de yang chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor sangs rgyas mdzad pa shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su
147a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa de 'khor la zhal rab tu 'dzum par bcas pas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po rnams la gzigs nas/ 
147a7(rgyud): de nas snod du rung bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje theg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bkye/ 
147a8(rgyud): ste bzhugs so// 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la reg par mchog tu dga' ba thob pa ni gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bcom
147b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ji lta ba bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag nyid dga' ba dang bde ba dang / mchog tu mgu ba skyes nas brgyal bar gyur to// de na
147b2(rgyud): yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bsdus par gyur to// bsdus pa de yang rdo rje'i lam nas lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyi 'od zer chen po nye bar phyung bar gyur/ 
147b3(rgyud): ba des brgyal ba de dag la reg nas rdo rje phreng ba lta bu nyid rdo rje'i lam nas gtsug tor gyi 'khor lo la zhugs nas gnas so// slar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bde ba
147b4(rgyud): chen po rjes su myong bar gyur to// rdo rje'i yi ge hUM brjod pa de nyi dad kyis bde ba chen po de nyid nyams su myong ba nyid kyi thu dgas ka'i lte ba'i rtsa sbugs nas 'od zer chen po phyung ste rang
147b5(rgyud): gi stan la 'khod par gyur to// de nas de rnams chu'i gting na sa 'thon pa lta bur sems dga' ba skye ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo mtshar chen po'i cho 'phrul mthong nas shin
147b6(rgyud): tu mig gdangs te bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs gcig gis yang dag par bstod do// bcom ldan ro gcig gyur pa yi// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rgyas// bcom ldan mchog
147b7(rgyud): tu ngal bso kye// ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul 'das// bcom ldan nyid kyi dgyes nyams star// 'gro ba gsum po yang dag bde// e ma'o lhan cig skyes bdud rtsi// ro bsten thugs rje/ 
147b8(rgyud): chen po ste// bcom ldan sems can thams cad kyi// sems can don kun gsal bar mdzad// de nyid gsum gyi ro gcig pa// phyag rgya chen po rab dbye ba// bcom ldan rnal 'byor che/ 
148a1(rgyud): la dgyes// 'ching ba thams cad gcod mdzad kyi// bcom ldan dgyes pa cher mdzad cing // 'gro ba skal bzang nges par mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje theg pa bde// rab tu da/ 
148a2(rgyud): zhing mgu ba stsol// e ma'o sngags ni rab rgyas pa// rang 'byung go 'phang sgrub pa bo// e mtsho shin tu zab mo'i chos// dmigs pa med par ston par mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje 'chang chen ga
148a3(rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang po shin tu gsang // e ma'o mchog tu byang chub pa// oM me'o spros pa rnam spangs shing // bden pa'i don ni gsal mdzad pa// theg pa'i sgron mas snang bar mdzad// 
148a4(rgyud): mgon po bdag cag khyed drin gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgo 'phang thob// mgon po bdag cag lam log zhu dgas// khyed kyis yang dag lam la bkod// mgon po
148a5(rgyud): bdag cag mun par 'joms// ye shes snang ba thob par ma dzad// dam tshig rdo rje nyi ma kye// phyag rgya chen po'i don ston mdzad// bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ 
148a6(rgyud): thugs rje'i phyag rgya che bdag nyid// phyag 'tshal gnyis med dga' ba'i mkha'// dga' ba'i zla ba khyed la 'dud ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshogs su bcad pas bcom ldan 'das la
148a7(rgyud): bstod pa mdzad nas slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ rdo rje'i phreng ba mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba shin tu phra ba'i sa ji lta ba'i ngo bo 'dri bar 'dod nas yid la byed pa gcig pa dang / 
148a8(rgyud): sems rtse gcig gis dga' bar byed pa'i gsung nyan par 'dod nas ba spu ldang ba dang dbugs g.yo ba dang bcas pas yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing rang gi stan la 'khod
148b1(rgyud): nas sems re dogs dang bcas pas gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi de lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas slar yang rdo rje'i phreng ba mngon par byang chub pa zhes
148b2(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang ba'i rdo rje las rang gi rig ma phyung ste/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa bdag nyid kyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gzugs
148b3(rgyud): spangs nas sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i gzugs blangs nas rang rang gi rig ma la 'khyud de phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor la rjes su zhugs nas slar yang de dag de lta bu'i gzugs
148b4(rgyud): nyid du mthong ste/ ngo mtshar skyes nas mig gdangs tre ri mo'i bkod pa lta bur mthong ba nyid kyis ci yang mi smra bar gyur pas de la 'khor rnams yang dag par 'khod par gyur to// 
148b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rang gi rig ma yang dag par bskul/ te/ phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor dor nas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las btsun mo rdo rje rigs kyi snying po
148b6(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM AHhUM/ de nas de skad du gsungs ma thag bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rig ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro
148b7(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po rnams phyung bar gyur to// phyung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su rang rang gi stan la gnas par gyur te/ kha cig ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs kyis
148b8(rgyud): kha cig ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs kyis so// kha cig ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i gzugs kyis so// ji srid gnod mdzes rgyal po dang // gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba yi// 
149a1(rgyud): rgyal po'i bar gyi gzugs kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das cung zad cig ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi/ 
149a2(rgyud): dbyangs cig gis ched du brjod nas smras pa ni/ e ma'o rdo rje rigs chen po// rdo rje phreng ba'i don ston mdzad// e ma'o rdo rje theg gsal ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi don ston mdzad ces lan gsum brjod
149a3(rgyud): nanos de dag gis rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rgya chen po 'dus pa de
149a4(rgyud): dag mthong nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan ye shes rdor dbang phyug/ gsang ba'i pad+ma'i nang bzhugs pa// dam tshig chen
149a5(rgyud): po'i rnal 'byor dbang // thugs rjes bdag gi tshig gson/ cig/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje theg pa mngon 'dod pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
149a6(rgyud): che// 'di dag lus kyis phyag 'tshal 'khod// snyigs ma lnga yi dus na ni// ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams// brtson 'gras chung zhing bsod nams chung // lta ba ngan pa mang po dang // tshe thung ba
149a7(rgyud): yi sems can rnams// go 'phang mchog ni thob phyir zhu// rgyal ba'i sras ni de dag dang // ma 'ongs pa yi sems can rnams// 'khor ba las ni pha rol tu// gang gis myur du gyur bar 'gyur// 
149a8(rgyud): gtso bo rdo rje 'chang chen la// 'di ltar bdag ni gsol ba 'debs// 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyod drin gyis// de nyid mchog ni bdag gis 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba yi// rgyud rnams kun gyi/ 
149b1(rgyud): don bsdus pa// bla na med pa'i rim pa gnyis// rdo rje phreng ba mngon rtogs pa// cung zad 'dri bar 'tshal lags kyis// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor na// khyod kyis bdag la bstan du gas
149b2(rgyud): dpal ldan 'dus par brda' tsam gang // rnal 'byor bla na med rgyud du// thub pa chen pos chos phung po// brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong ngo // de skad smras nas mdun 'dug ste// lus kyi phyag ni byas
149b3(rgyud): nas kyang // ye shes chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gro ba'i bla// rdo rje gsum ni ro gcig don// de nyid gsum gyi go 'phang thob// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi sbas pa'i don// bdas
149b4(rgyud): la bstan par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje phreng ba'i ming ni ci// / 'dus pa ci zhig stong ba ci// thig le'i dbye ba dang ni dasmra// gsang ba dang ni dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni sgra
149b5(rgyud): tsam dang // rlung gi de nyid bde chen ci// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor dang // sngags kyi de nyid rnal 'byor pa// rlung rnams dang ni 'khor lo dang // grangs ni ci tsam gang du gnas// rnam
149b6(rgyud): 'byor lus la rtsa gang lags// rnam pa sna tshogs sogs skad cig/ dga' ba bzhi dang rdzas dang ni// sngags dang rlung dang thig le zhes// yi ge gsum gang de nyid gsum// de bzhin
149b7(rgyud): sno yi rtse mo gsum// lus kyi stong nyid ye shes dang // lha rnams kyang ni ji ltar gnas// de rnams kyi ni ming ni ci// 'char ba dang ni nub pa ci// mgon po dga' rnams ji ltar ni// yang
149b8(rgyud): dag skye ba gsal bar gsungs// sngar bshad rtsa rnams rtag tu ni// rdo rje'i lus la ji ltar rgyu// mtshams kyi rtsa gsum de dag ni// gtso bo ru ni ji ltar gsungs// rlung rnams ji ltar
150a1(rgyud): ldang ba dang // gtso bong rnams ji ltar thim// de ni mkha' 'gro mar sdud pa// gtso bo ji ltar yang dag 'thob// rnam rtog rlung gi rab bcad nas// rnam rtog med par
150a2(rgyud): ltar 'char// rtsa rnams ji ltar nub pa dang // sbyor ba drug gis ji ltar rtsom// dus kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// gsang ba'i yang ni 'bras bu ci// chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang // rigs kyi dbye ba ji
150a3(rgyud): lta bu phyag rgya'i dbye ba ji tsam zhig/ phung po la sogs skye mched dang // phyag rgya chen po'i ming ni ci// ro rnams kyi ni dbye ba dang // bdag gi sgra ni gang la gnas// stong nyid dbye bsdus pa dang / 
150a4(rgyud): stong pa nyid ni gang du sgyo// nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo gang // a li ka li brda' dang ni// mtshams kyi mtshar ba ji lta bu// rgyud gsungs sngon ni bsnyen pa sogs// cho ga nyi shu'i las
150a5(rgyud): dang ni rgyu mtshan ci zhig 'bras bu'ang ci// mchod pa'i cho ga/ ji ltar gsungs// de bzhin lha mo'i rang bzhin dang // lha mo'i ming ni ji ltar gsungs// rgyud du thog mar gsungs
150a6(rgyud): pa yi/ 'di skad bdag sogs ji lta bu// 'di skad ces sogs dang po'i ngag/ don rgyas par ni ji ltar 'gyur// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg ci// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba dang // rnal 'byor ma
150a7(rgyud): tshogs 'dus pa dang // de bzhin gsang ba'i brda' dang ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor rnams ni ji ltar gsungs// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun gyi// ming rnams bshad
150a8(rgyud): pa ji lta bu// bla ma ston pa slob dpon dang // rdo rje 'chang ni bshad pa ci// slob ma'i yon tan gang ldan na// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi snod du 'gyur// de yi spyod pa'i dbye ba du// de yi 'bras bu ji lta bu/ 
150b1(rgyud): zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang ni// de bzhin bsad dang bskrad pa dang // rengs par byed pa nyid dang ni// mams myo ga ma lta bachung 'ang // sngags kyi tshig ni ci zhig dang // mgon po khro bo'i bzlab ni// 
150b2(rgyud): dngos grub brgyad ni thob pa dang // mngon shes lnga ni ji ltar thob// rnal 'byor rnams kyis de nyid mthang // skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub// lus brtan pa dang rgas med// bcus kyi
150b3(rgyud): len gyis sbyor ba dang // gser 'gyur sogs kyi sbyor ba dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya dngos grub che// 'gro ba'i bla ma ji ltar 'thob// lus kyi rang bzhin gzhal yas khang // de ni rang bzhin ji lta bu/ 
150b4(rgyud): 'dis ni gnas sogs ji ltar gnas// thim dang longs spyod bdag po dang // rlung ni gang gi mtshan nyid ci// de dag 'jig par ji ltar 'gyur// de ltar dri chog rdzogs pa dang // 
150b5(rgyud): lag na rdo rje thal sbyar te// 'gro ba'i bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas/ lus kyis phyag byas de nas ni// gtso bos rdo sems dpa' la// legaso bya ba byas nas ni// tshangs dbya
150b6(rgyud): zab mo snyan pa yis// 'gro ba'i mgon pos gsungs pa yin// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las gsol ba gdab pa dang / dri ba dang / slob ma'i las nyid
150b7(rgyud): la sogs pa rgyud kyi gleng bzhi'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// de nyid gsung gi 'gro mgon gyis/ 
150b8(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la bos te// yang dag dris pa rings bshad pa// snying po'i don ni don bsdus pa// dbye bar dka' ba'i dngos po kun// khyed kyis dri bar byas pa rnams// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang chen / 
151a1(rgyud): bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud rnams dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni gang du yang // mchog tu gsang ba ma gsungs pa// rdo rje'i dbang phyug de nyid mchog/ dris pa'i lan rnams gsal
151a2(rgyud): por ni// nges par nga yis rab bshad pa// skad cig gis ni spyan phye la// mchog tu rmad byung ston mdzad la// thugs rjes khyab par de skad gsungs// de phyir khyod ni legs par nyon// de nas
151a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thugs rjes thugs baurlan cing the tshom thams cad gcod pa la phyag na rdo rjes gsol ba btab ste mchog tu gsang ba'i tshig gis bshad pa gsungs pa ni/ dbang bskur ba ni gtsobo
151a4(rgyud): ste/ dngos grub thams cad rtag tu gnas// nga yis ji bzhi na don bshad kyis// de phyir thog mar yang dag nyon/ thog mar slob ma gang gi tshe// blo ldan yang dag dbang bskur na/ 
151a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la// de yi tshen snod du 'gyur / yang dag dbang bskur gyis dben na// sgrub pos rgyud kyi don shes kyang // slob dpon slob mar mtshungs par ni/ 
151a6(rgyud): mi bzad dmyal ba chen por 'gro/ de phyir yang dag bla ma ni// rab tu gus pas bsnyen bkur bya// dbang bskur thob cing de nyid shes// blo ldan snying rje'i bdag nyid can// zab cing rgya che dri ma med
151a7(rgyud): gnod dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs// skol bzang lus ni rdzogs pa dang // mtshan dang dpe byad rnam par rgyan// chags pa che la gcig tu dga'// yul la phrag dog rnam par spangs// 
151a8(rgyud): bag yod rtag tu dga' ba dang // rnal 'byor ma yi mngal nas skyes// rdo rje theg la gcog tu mos// theg pa dam nal rgyab kyis phyogs// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// blam nga
151b1(rgyud): mas bsnyen bkur bya// yang dag bla ma rnyed nas ni// slob ma'i rang bzhin dri ma rnams// dag dang rtogs dang smin byas nas// ji bzhin ye shes bzang dang ldan// ji ltar rin chen bdar ba dang // 
151b2(rgyud): gser ni bsregs dang bcad pas brtag/ de bzhin du ni slob ma yang // lo ni bcu gnyis bar du brtag/ de phyir phan tshun de lta bus// dus kun tu ni de ltar brtag/ gzhan du bgegs ni/ 
151b3(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur te// dngos grub 'joms shing sdug bsngal che// dug ni sngags kyis 'joms pa bzhin// sngags kyis dge byas bcud len byed// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sngags
151b4(rgyud): kyi slob ma rtogs byas nas// bla ma dbang bskur la sogs kyi sa// dngos grub phyir ni ji lta'i don// de phyir dbang ba skur slob mo ni// ma dag pa yang dag par 'gyur// rdo rje
151b5(rgyud): sems dpa' bde chen la// de la lag na rdo rjes zhus// dab nga bskur ji ltar rgyud du ni// gtso bo ru ni gsungs pa la gas// rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen// the tsom
151b6(rgyud): thams cad gcod mdzad pa// de kho na nyid mkhyen pas ni// lag na rdo rje la gsungs pa// don de ji lta ba bzhin du// nga yis yang dag bshad kyis nyon// dbang bskur ba yi dbye ba ni// dang
151b7(rgyud): po'i dbang ni gtso bo ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i ming can no// gsum pa kun nas sbyor ba ste// bzhi pa'i don ni dam pa'o// gtso bo dbye ba bcu gcig ste// bcu gnyis pa ni gsang ba'o// 
151b8(rgyud): bcu gsum pa ni yang dag sbyor// bcu bzhi pa ni don dam ste// dbang bskur re res re'o// rnam pa gsum ni rgyu yi dbang // bzhi pa 'bras bur shes par bya// dga' ba la sogs rim pa yis/ 
152a1(rgyud): thams cad la ni nga yis khyag gamar ngo yi ni ches gsum dang // de bzhin tshes bcu ches bcu bzhi// yon tan bzang ldan slob ma la// bla mas chog bzhin dang / 
152a2(rgyud): bskur// lus bra lo ni bcu drug lon// gzugs dang skal ba dag gis rgyan// sngo bsangs mig ni yangs pa dang // snying rje'i bsam ldan yang dge mos// ngag snyan dbang bskur thob ba / 
152a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor rgyud la lhag par mos// yang na lo ni nyi shu lon// nyams dga' bde bar byed pa ste// de las lhag paskal mad 'gyur// de ni dngos grub ring du byed// lhag par 'jam pa'i
152a4(rgyud): bu mo lo// chung ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am// yang na bu mo 'ang dad pa yis// bla ma la ni dbul bar bya// gser dang da rin chen gos dang ni// me tog phreng ba sna tshogs pas/ 
152a5(rgyud): mchod nas bla ma'i mdun 'dug nas// slob ma yis ni 'di skad brjod// deng nas brtsams te bdag bran du/ gtso bos bdag ni mchod pa bzhes// de lta'i rnam pas
152a6(rgyud): mnyes nas ni// bdag nyid kun gyis bla ma mchod// bla ma'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang // da phyir yang dag bla ma mchod// de nas bcom ldan yum phyag rgya// yang dag mchod nas bsten par bya// bsten
152a7(rgyud): pa las ni gang byung ba// ltung ba skal bzang kha la ni// sbom po tha stag sbyor ba yis// yang dag par ni longs spyad bya// de las skyes pa'i ye shes ni// bde ba chen po rang rig pa// 'byung
152a8(rgyud): rngub pa ni ro gcig cing // rab tu dga' bas mchod par bya// hUM phaT sngags ni nor bu'i sgor// bkod de rdo rje rab bskyod bya// dga' rnams ji lta ba bzhin du// skad cig de la skyes gyur pa/ 
152b1(rgyud): dga' ba'i sems kyis bde ba la// rdo rje btsun mo'i kha nas brjod// de yang slob ma'i lag tu ni// gtad nas gsal bar 'di skad brjod// ji ltar bang mchod bya ba ni// byos la e baM mchog gi ga
152b2(rgyud): gang phyir rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ rang nyid 'di yi snying la zhugs// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi 'gyur// shin tu phra ba'i dngos de yang // bde chen rnal 'byor/ 
152b3(rgyud): pa yis rtogs// rab tu 'bad pas bsten par gyis// lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid ni// dbang bskur gtso bor gyur pas na// thams cad ji lta ba bzhin thob// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal
152b4(rgyud): rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las slob dpon dang slob ma/ brtag pa dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas de nyid
152b5(rgyud): gzhan yang nyon// rdo rje phreng ba'i don gsal ba// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ni// dri ba gzhan la brjod mi bya// rdo rje phra nga ba zhes bya'i ming // de yang sa ni bcu gsum pa// dga' ba
152b6(rgyud): bzhi yi don gyis gnas// thams cad stong pa dga' ba ste// ngag gi spyod yul rnams las 'das// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// skal bzang rnal 'byor kun gyi mtha'// rnal 'byor
152b7(rgyud): ma yi ngag gi yul// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang // rdo rje phreng ba zhes bshad do// stong nyid rdo rje gsang pad+ma// rtsa ni rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ ye shes mchog tu bde ba che// lhan cig skyes dga'
152b8(rgyud): rmad byung ba// rdo rje dayang rnam rtog rnams// 'bigs par byed par yongs su grags// phreng ba de rnams kyi yang rgyun// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje rnams// mi phyed pas ni rdo rjer gsungs// 
153a1(rgyud): rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa ni// gang yang rung bas brjod mi bya// de ni dbugs su yongs su grags// phreng ba rgyun ni mi 'chad par// dga' ba rab 'bab bdag nyid kyis// 
153a2(rgyud): rnam rtog rlung kun 'bigs par byed// rlung la 'bigs par mi nus so// nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni// brgya dang brgyad lhag gsal bar yang // rnam rtog rang bzhin rlung rnams ni// 'char ba
153a3(rgyud): dang ni 'joms pa dag/ ji lta ba bzhin rab dbye yis// rlung rnams kyi ni ming nyon cig/ btang bzung dang ni dung phyur dang // myos pa dang ni blo ngan dang // bsil byed dang ni ga ya' ba dang // nga ra
153a4(rgyud): rnams dang ni sta re dang // gzigs pa chu srin dzaM sha dang // rnam par gtsigs dang myos pa'i dus// 'dod myos chub da chu srin dang // sna tshogs skyed dang 'dud pa dang // snyems
153a5(rgyud): dang rnga dang sgra sgrogs dang // rlung lha dang ni gnad 'bigs dang / ma dang dus dang ci bgyi dang // rdo rje mchog sbyin cu ta dang / sbrang ma dang ni zla ba'i 'od// kam po dzaM dang ral pa can/ 
153a6(rgyud): yungs nag rab bkram dus 'gugs dang // sdig pa dang ni g.yon can rten// grims mo dang ni mgrin pa dang // kun sal mchog ster smyo byed dang // nga rgyal mtsho dang tshogs bdag dang / 
153a7(rgyud): rtsangs pa dang ni sa yi blo// theg pa bzang dang mchog tu skyes// dri med phrag gu nyi ma dang // gsal byed dang ni nyi ma gnon// stobs bzhin nga ro dang ni dus// sdom pa dang ni mchongs nas 'gro
153a8(rgyud): spang ma khyi dang mtshan ma dang // thod dang sku bo drang po dang // sa dang sa la 'gro ma dang // bram ze dang nau sna 'gyur gnas// ma mo'i rigs dang lce bskyod pa// mi sme dang ni rnga sgra'i sprin// dga' bar
153b1(rgyud): byed dang mig yangs dang // dri med 'od srung ne tso dang // sna tshogs mchu dang mig mnyam dang // mdzes dang chos kyi dbyig pa dang // 'gro kun snying stobs bstan pa dang // za phong bung bu snyom las
153b2(rgyud): dang // kha gdangs sgra chen stobs kyis rtse// rtsa bran dpa'i byed g.yo sgyu can// gtso bo che dang rtag tu dga'// glog phreng dang ni dga' byed dang // dbugs 'thung rag lce dang ni// bde mchog u
153b3(rgyud): dum par rmongs// pad+ma'i dra ba pad+ma bskor// dgra sta rma ba rlung dang ni// rdo rje dbang phyug rlung gi ming // de ltar nga yis bstan pa yin// bcom ldan dris pa'i rlung rnams kyi// gnas rnams kyi ning bye
153b4(rgyud): ba yis// de dag gang yis ldang ba dang // mched pa rnams su bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs // rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'khor lo drug la khyab
153b5(rgyud): pa'i rlung // chos kyi 'khor lo rtag tu gnas// srog ces bya bas 'gro la khyab// rnam rtog med pa mtshan phyed na/ na mkha' mchog las shar nas ni// rlung gi rang bzhin 'jom
153b6(rgyud): par byed// rlung de dgu yi rnam par rgyu// chos kyi 'khor lo'i chan gnas// mtshan phyed dus nas brtsams nas ni// 'khor lo drug la dgu bdag nyid// nyi ma phyed kyi mtha' ru ni// rlung rnams
153b7(rgyud): kyang ni ldang bar byed// nyi ma phyed nas brtsams nas ni// 'khor lo drug las dgu bdag nyid// mtshan phyed kyi ni dus kyi mthar// rlung rnams gsal bar rgyu ba dang // de nyid gnas kyi dbye ba yi
153b8(rgyud): sna tshogs pa yi rtog par 'gro/ rnam par rtog pa rnam phye nas// de dag ming rnams bshad par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // rgyags dang nga rgyal mngon pa zhe na// phrag dog khro dang / 
154a1(rgyud): dang ser sna dang // g.yo dang rgyul cha lugs ngan// blo rgod brkam chags gnyid dang ni// the tshom dang ni ngar 'dzin dang // dga' dang chags bral dregs pa dang // 'chab
154a2(rgyud): dang sred dang bag chags dang // sgyu dang rmongs dang 'dod chen dang // rtsod dang rtse 'jo spyi brtol dang // tshul 'chos reg dang kun nas gdungs// rnam 'gyur ma zhi shes bzhin med// bems po log bri
154a3(rgyud): nga rgyal dang // 'gyod dang khrel ni med pa dang // gus pa med dang ches pa med// blo dman ngo tsha med dang 'chang // ngo tsha shes dang ngo tsha dang // mi ster ba dang mya ngan dang // yid gnyis dang ni rlom sems
154a4(rgyud): med/ bsgrims dang the tsom ngal ba dang // dbang dang 'khrul pa'i snying stobs dang // snyam sems pa dang brgyal ba da dang // thim pa dang ni mi srun dang // gya gyu snyom dang mos pa dang / 
154a5(rgyud): rig byed min dang bag yod dang // gnas ngan len dang nyam chu nga nyid// yid mi bde dang lhag par rtog/ skrag dang rmug sa dang gnyid dang ni// brkam chags rol pa khrung khrung dang // 'tshe/ 
154a6(rgyud): ba le lo yon po nyid// bsam dang spyod dang zhum pa dang // kun rdzob de nyid don yod dang // ster dang dga' ba'i 'dod pa dang // 'jigs dang 'dar dang phra bdag nyid// gsal dang rnam gsal lhad 'jug dang / 
154a7(rgyud): 'brel dang rtag pa'i de nyid dang // ru sbal ngoms med gnod pa dang // mi gsal ba dang yid du 'ong // gnas med mang du smra ba dang // bdag nyid skyes bu nyid dang ni// ya mtshan dga' dang skye bo ngan// dman
154a8(rgyud): pa'i de nyid sdug bsngal gsum// 'khor ba la ni chags pa dang // rtag tu brgya dang brgyad lhags pa// nyin dang mtshan mor rtag tu ni// rlung gi rang bzhin rgyu ba yin// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal
154b1(rgyud): rdorje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rdo rje phreng ba'i tshig gis dbye ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje gsum nyi ma// gsang ba'i pad+ma kha 'byed pa// bde ba chen po'i
154b2(rgyud): go 'phang bzhugs// 'dus pa'i mchog don rab gsungs pa// 'dus pa 'dres pa zhes ni bshad// 'dres pa nga yis khyod la bshad// 'khor lo bzhi dang tha mi dang // sngags ni lhan cig cho ga bzhin// dpa
154b3(rgyud): bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba// gang tshe gsang ba'i rtsa gnyis ni// yang dag sbyor ba reg gyur pa// de tshe na mkha' rnam rgyas nyid// nam mkha' las ni skyes pa'i rlung // de yis ma ni rab tu 'bar// rtsa ni stong phrag
154b4(rgyud): bdun cu gnyis// rtsa rnams rab sad gzi brjid kyis// bde ba kun gyi go 'phang mchog/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor khyab/ bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems// rnam par zhu nas rtsar gnas pa
154b5(rgyud): rdor gsum rang bzhin gcig 'gyur phyir// khams rnams rma gcig gyur pa dang // phung po rnams ni yongs zad dang // ngal bso ba la rlung rnams ni// dga' ba rnams ni yang dag skye/ 
154b6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems kyang ni// gnas kun nas ni zhu gyur nas// ngo bo gcig tu gyur pa dang // rtsa ni gcig gi 'bras bu ni// ro gcig tu ni gyur pa la// 'dres pa zhes ni de la gsungs// phung po khams dang
154b7(rgyud): dbang po dang // yul rnams su ni sbas pa rnams// rnam rtog kun nas zad pa las// bde ba chen po yang dag skye// ro gcig pa ni ngal bso ba// de ni 'dus pa 'dres pa ste// de kho na nyid mchog gsang ba/
