154b8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gsungs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las 'dus pa'i tshig lhag par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
155a1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// stong nyid don ni rab rgyas pa// stong pa nyid ni chos rnams kun// nang du khyab pa'ang chos nyid de// de nyid yang dag shes pa ni// de bzhin nyid dang rnam mi/ 
155a2(rgyud): rtog bdag dang gang zag chos rnams ni// bdag med rang bzhin gcig pa nyid// stong pa nyid dang rang rig dang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs pa// rnal 'byor gcig pus rtogs pa ste// rtog
155a3(rgyud): ge ba yi spyod yul min// chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdus pa// 'khor lo drug du rnam par brjod// de nas nang du'ang khyab pa ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo legs rgyas pa// de ni na mkha' khyab cing pra// 
155a4(rgyud): khyab byed zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can// dmigs pa med cing rten pa med// gzugs med nyon mongs med pa dang // rnam parami rtog mchog tu zhi// rang bzhin med cing dri ma med// gnyis su
155a5(rgyud): med cing bya ba med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// du sa dang dpe las 'das pa ste// ngag gi lam gyi spyod yul bral// chos nyid chos ni thams cad kyis// ji lta ba bzhin
155a6(rgyud): mngon par brjod// dngos dang dngos med rnam par bral// dge dang mi dge'i srid las grol// de ni kun nas bsgribs pa med// nam mkha' lta bur mchog tu khyab// chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin ste// de ni de
155a7(rgyud): bzhin nyid ces brjod// gang nas kyang ni ma 'ongs shing // gang du yang ni 'gro ba med// rmongs dang 'khrul ba gcig pu las// da ni rab tu spro bar snang // bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal spangs// 'dod chags zhe
155a8(rgyud): sdang sogs mi gos// 'khrul dang rnam par 'khrul par 'brel// rtog pa dang bral dri ma med// bdag dang sreg dang skye ba po// skyes bu de bzhin gang zag dang // shed las skyes dang shed bu dang // byed pa po dang tshor ba'o// 
155b1(rgyud): shes pa pod dngadu mthong ba po// smyo 'dogs pa yi rnam par spangs// phung po skye mched khams la sogs// rnam shes dang ni gzungs pa yis// sgrib pa med cing mchog tu phra// nu mkha' mchog la yang / 
155b2(rgyud): dag gnas// de ltar ma lus stong nyid don// brjod dang brjod pa'i don dang bral// ming tsam gcig pu kho na yang // rang byung mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// brjod pa yi ni kun rdzob du// de ni yis yang dag ba
155b3(rgyud): rang rig shin tu phra ba'i phyir// de kho na nyid mthong ba med// bdag nyid rang gi ngo bor rig/ pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min// de ni rang rig par bshad do// chos kun gnas ni zhi ba'o// rnam rtog gis 'khrul
155b4(rgyud): rtog ge gang // mi shes pa yi rmongs pa rnams// don dam par ni mi shes shing // kun rdzob dgra yi mdzod 'dzin pa// ye shes mchog ni mi shes shing // rtog ge stong nyid smra bar byed// rnal
155b5(rgyud): 'byor bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas// de ni mchog tu phra bar // / stong nyid yang dag na mkha'i tshe// shes dang shes bya/ ma par spangs// rtog pa'i rnam pa rnams dang bral// stong pa nyid kyi
155b6(rgyud): 'khor lor brjod// phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus// 'khor lo drug gi phug nang na// zla ba byed pa'i cha lta bu// stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas// phyed min gang ba med pa dang // ji ltar bag chags
155b7(rgyud): chu zla bzhin// rlung gi 'khor lo sog du bshad// mtshan phyed skad cig ma la 'char// de ltar yang dag sgom pa ni// 'di ni stong nyid sgom byed pa'o// don dam gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// yang
155b8(rgyud): na rgyu 'bras sbyor ba'i phyir// de ni rang bzhin 'grub par sgom// don dam rang gi ngo bor ni// kun rdzob kyang ni de bzhin du// bsgoms pas 'khor ba 'joms par 'gyur// ji ltar til la til mar ni
156a1(rgyud): gnas pa nyid la mthong mi 'gyur// de bzhin lus la stong pa nyid// gnas kyang bsgribs pas mthong ba med// bla ma'i zhal las 'di shes par// yang dag rig pas kun rdzob spangs
156a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje brang ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon
156a3(rgyud): thig le'i dbye ba bla na med// 'jig rten thig le dbye bas dben// 'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor// mdzod spu'i dbus na gnas pa ni// thig le rlung du yang dag bshad// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'byed
156a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor mdud pa bkrol nas ni// rlung gi de nyid rig pa de// mchog tu 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba de yang mi she/ nges par// rlung dang sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis// brjod dang brjod
156a5(rgyud): bya'i dpe las 'das// mi gsal log par mthong rnams kyis// bsam gtan bsgom bya dang bral ba'i// sangs/ rgyas rnams ni thob pa dka'// rnal 'byor ma yi drin gyis ni// 
156a6(rgyud): zhal nas zhal du brgyud nas gnas// bcom ldan bde ba chen po la// rdo rje sems dpas slar zhus pa// 'gro ba'i mgon gyis bstan du gsol// thig le'i dbye ba rig bcas pa// rnal
156a7(rgyud): 'byor mchog ni gang gis shes// sbyor bas mdud par 'byed par byed// khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba 'di// myur du dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// de skad zhus nas rdo rje can// rdo rje dbang
156a8(rgyud): byug la gsungs pa// mchog tu gsal ba 'di nyid ni// gang du'ang gsal bar ma gsungs pa// thig le'i dbye ba de yang ni// nga yis bshad kyis de nyid nyon// snying gi bad sbugs na mkha' la
156b1(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje rtag tu bzhugs// steng dang 'og la bsten nas ni// srog dang thur sel rlung chen gnas// de la'ang dbye bar dka' ba yi// dbus su mdud pa gsum gyis dkri// de yis mchog dang / 
156b2(rgyud): bcom byas pas// steng du 'gro ba thob mi byed// des bcom slar yang rnam lnga rgyu// srog dang thur sel gyen rgyu dang // khyab byed dang ni mnyam gnas nyid// rtse mo lnga las rgyun du ni// rtsa lnga
156b3(rgyud): ni yang dag brten// rgyags dang rnam par rgyas pa dang // myos dang gtung dang 'dza' bo ste// de dag rtsar ni lngar shes bya// rdo rje'i 'og tu gsal bar khyab// steng gi srog gi dbus na yang // rdo rje'i
156b4(rgyud): lte ba'i mkha' dbyings 'gro// srog ces bya ba'i rlung chen po // lte ba mdud pa dang phrad pas// bcom nas kyang nidam lngar rgyu// rtse mo rnams la rwa lngar ni// zla ba'i cha dang sna dang
156b5(rgyud): ni bsnyen bkur lkog shal mchin paste// tsuni mA mr-i/ ming yin no// tsani lnga las rgyu ba'i rlung // klu dang ru swA/ la rtsangs pa dang // lha sbyin dang ni gzhu las rgyal// de ltar
156b6(rgyud): de dang bcas pa// lus kyi thur du 'gro bas na// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams ni// yang dang yang du bskul byas nas// bskul bas kyang ni rgyas pa na// gti mug chen pos dbang du byed// ngaste
156b7(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo ni// gnas pa'i rtsa ni bskul byas nas// de rnams lhan cig rtsad dag/ zhe sdang gis ni dbang du byed// yang dag bskul nas de steng gi/ longs spyod mchog tu ngo mtshar skye// 
156b8(rgyud): rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu// chags pa chen pos dbang byas nas// bskul ba dang ni de steng gi/ spyi bo'i 'khor lo'i bde chen du// rtsa de rnams dang lhan cig tu// byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed/ 
157a1(rgyud): rnam rtog rnam par rgyu byed cing // sna tshogs dbye ba thams cad las// steng ma rnams kyang thur du 'gro// srog gi rab tu bcom nas ni// de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rtser// zhugs / 
157a2(rgyud): thur du kha bltas pa'o// de yang thur du mi 'gro ste// ma rig mdung pa'i 'khor lo ni// rnam par shes pa'i shing rta'i rlung // de ni bag chags dang 'dres pas// mig dang rna ba de bzhin sna// lde ste rnam
157a3(rgyud): par shes pa bzhi// rtse mo bzhi nas phyung nas ni// bag chags rnam shes dang 'dres nas// rnam shes dbang po lhan cig tu// don ni rab tu rgyas par byed// slar yang lam de nyid nas ni// ji lta ba
157a4(rgyud): yi rim pas 'jug/ de yi dngos nyid de sbyor bas// rnam shes bsten pa'i skad cig la// de yi chags bcas kyis slar 'phye wa// 'khrul byas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las// de ltar bag
157a5(rgyud): chags kyis bslad pa'i// rnam shes las kyi ngo bor 'gro// de nyid kyang ni srog sbyor bas// khams gsum par ni 'a// khral po'o// byed po las kyi 'bras bur myong // gzhan nyid du
157a6(rgyud): ni 'khor ba med// de phyir 'khor ba gzhom don du// thig le go 'phangs gsal bar dbye// sgom pa la ni 'bad par byed// ma rig ge zhan ni mi shes pa// dbus kyi mdud pa de yang ni// de phyed na ni dngos
157a7(rgyud): grub 'gyur// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor grub pa ste// ye shes lnga ni thob nas ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob pa dang // mchog tu gsal ba thob nas ni// blo bzang ji lta ba bzhin gnas// phreng ba mi dgos sgom mi
157a8(rgyud): dgos/ khyab mi dgos dgag mi dgos// sngags kyi de nyid gcig pu yis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob// las chos dam tshig phyag rgya ni// dbye ba 'di ni ma gsung so// 'khor lo'i dbye bas ma yin zhing
157b1(rgyud): de bzhin dga' ba sogs kyis min// phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phangs gsal// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni thob// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje dang // gnyis med bde ba de nyid dang // gsang ba'i thig le'i dbye ba dang / 
157b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor grub pa'i bde chen po// ma rig sgo nga'i sngags 'byed cing // 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo 'joms// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang // rab tu byed pa mchog tu bshad// sngags kyi de nyid
157b3(rgyud): nges sbyor bas// rigs shing yan lag gsal ba gang // rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin dang // bla ma'i zhal las nges rtogs 'gyur// man ngag med pa'i bzlas pa ni// sngags kyi rgyal po blo rmongs byed
157b4(rgyud): de yi dka' ba gcig pa dang // chu bsrubs mar ni mi 'gyur ltar nga // de bzhin man ngag dang bral sngags// skyes bus ji srid 'tsho yi bar// bzlas kyang de yi 'bras bu yi// cha ce ma thob pa/ 
157b5(rgyud): mi 'gyuraro// mi shes pa yi mi 'ga' zhig/ rgya mtsho'i gzhi yi mtha' yi// sa la shin tu 'gro 'dod pa// lam ni gang rje/ na mi 'dri gang // de ltar bdag nyid 'gro bar byed// de bzhin dag
157b6(rgyud): ba cher byed pa'i// man ngag dang bral sgrub pa po// 'bras bu med cing mkhas pa yang // sgrub pa po ni khong khro skye// khong khro skyes pa'i skad cig la// 'bras bu med cing ngu 'bod 'gro/ de phyir 'bad pa
157b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis// dad pas bla ma brgyad pa las// man ngag dag ni bslab par bya// gang phyir brgyud pa'i lung gis khyab// brgyud pa'i rim pas gnas par byed// de ni rnal 'byor ma zhal dang // 
157b8(rgyud): bla ma'i zhal las 'bad pa yis// de nyid mchog ni bslab par bya// sngags kyi man ngag brgyud pa'i lung // de thos lag na rdo rjes kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// the tshom thams cad gcod pa la/ 
158a1(rgyud): phyag byas nas ni nus pa ni// khyed kyis bstan pa de nyid mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ni// sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med// gang bslabs skad cig dngos grub 'gyur// 
158a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba// de nyid mchog tu gsang ba ni// gang du'ang nga yis ma bshad pa// skal ba med pa bsam pa'i rgyus// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas
158a3(rgyud): byas la/ de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// sngags kyi rgyal po bla na med// sngags kyi spyad pa spyod pa yis// gang gi myur du dngos grub 'gyur// thog mar uSh+ma'i tha ma dri// dbyangs yig drug pas rnam pa
158a4(rgyud): rgyan// sde tshan tha ma'i mtha' dang ldan// dbyangs med pa yi cha dang bcas// uSh+ma'i mtha' la dbyangs yig 'di// dgu pa dang ni yang dag ldan// mthar ni tsheg drag mchog gi sgra// sngags kyi
158a5(rgyud): gtso bo btu bar bya// de ltar yi ge gnyis kyi ming // sdug/ sa kyi brda' ni rmad byung ba// 'dzin pa thams cad spangs/ ba'i phyir// sgra dang thig le'i ming du byas// rlung gnyis kyis ni
158a6(rgyud): phye nas ni// ma rig mdud pa 'byed par byed// phyag rgya chen po mchog gi rgyu// mchog tu zhi ba'i yi ge gnyis// man ngag thob pa'i 'dod pa'i don// gang gis zla ba drug bzlas na// theg le'i
158a7(rgyud): sgra yi go 'phang gsal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub par byed// skye bos dben pa lha yi gnas// sgra yi tsher ma rnams dang bral// bgegs med skal bzang nyams dga' ba// bskyed mos tshal ni
158a8(rgyud): bde ba che// 'dod pa lnga la yongs spyod pas// sngags kyi gtso bo 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// khyim du bde ba'i phyag rgyas gnas// gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// sgrub po/ 
158b1(rgyud): bde ba'i stan 'dug nas// mig gnyis sna rtser gtad byas nas// sna ni lte ba'i tshad du bzhag/ phrag gong bsnyams la lce rkan sbyar// so dang mchu ni bde bar gzhag/ dbugs kyi 'byung rngub klod nas ni// 
158b2(rgyud): cung zad cung zad rtsol bral nas// ji lta ba bzhin 'byung rngub ni// rdo rje skyil krung legs gnas pas// de ltar phyag rgya dang ldan pas// yi ge gnyis ni rtag tu bzlas// thig le'i dbye bas bde ba che// zla ba
158b3(rgyud): drug gis rnal 'byor mchog/ thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rtsa ba'i rgyun ni dang po 'di// a pra d+hU ti dri med gnas// rlung gi de nyid ye shes che// rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni rgyu// ri lu ral gri ro langs dang / 
158b4(rgyud): rgyal po mig sman bcud kyis len// dmag dpung rengs dang rtsig pa 'bigs// rig 'dzin gyi ni go 'phang mchog/ mi snang ba dang gter mthong ba// 'dod dgur sgyur dang gzugs mthong
158b5(rgyud): dang / gser 'gyur dang ni dug las rgyal// me yi nang du' jug pa dang // mngon shes lnga yi go 'phang dang // ye sha sa lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de ltar skad cig gcig la ni// 
158b6(rgyud): byang chub mtshan nyid go 'phang ngo // dka' ba spyod pa spangs nas ni// shes rab snying rje yang dag ldan// bshad pa'i bde ba chen po ster// sdom pa mi dgos sbyin sreg min// phreng ba mi dgos bgrang mi dgos// 
158b7(rgyud): 'di ni bskyed rim dbye mi dgos// gsungs pa'i dka' thub sogs mi dgos// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gcig pu yis// bla ma'i zhal las brgyud pa dang // zla ba drug gis mngon sbyor bas// go
158b8(rgyud): 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las thig le'i dbye ba dang / rnal 'byor mchog thob par byed pa'i le'u ste
159a1(rgyud): drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// bla na med pa nada'i don// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub 'gyur// sgras
159a2(rgyud): mi shigs par ni bshad// rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med// rnam pa kun las rnam par grol// lte ba sprul pa yang dag gnas// sbrul gyi lce ltar phra ba ni// gnyis med ye shes rmad byung ba// tshangs
159a3(rgyud): pa khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug dang ni rtag zhi ba// de dag de ltar rin po che// skyed pa po yi pha dang mas// yi ge med cing gong bu med// 'byung ba chen po rnam par spangs// dus dang rtog pa rnams las
159a4(rgyud): grol/ skye med zad med rmad du byung // 'dzin pa kun la zhen la so dgas// spangs shing lhag ma med pa dang // mchog gi mtsho dag ste zhi ba med// dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas// rnam rtog med/ 
159a5(rgyud): cing rten pa med// kun gzhi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// nyon mo/ ngas can gyi yid kyis ni// bems po rnams kyis sad par byed// mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis// thob pa'i go
159a6(rgyud): 'phang bla na med// gnyis med mchog tu gsal ba dang // rlung gi de nyid yang dag rten// yi ge hoHyis bskul nas ni// me yi 'khor lo sad par byed// de lta'i na da'i go 'phang don// bla ma'i zhal la yang
159a7(rgyud): dag gnas// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las na de'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan
159a8(rgyud): yang gsang ba'i don// bla na med pa bshad kyis nyon// gsang ba b+ha ga zhes su gsungs// b+ha ga de bzhin chos 'byung ba// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rten// dga' ba bskyed par byed pa'i rgyu// rdo rje sems
159b1(rgyud): dpa' yi ni gnas// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal// ye shes chen po spros pa med// rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs// bral dga'i mtha' ste mchog tu phra// lhan cig skyes dga' kun
159b2(rgyud): bdag gnas// dga' bral la sogs skad cig gnas// phra ba yang dag byang chub sems// srog la phan par 'tsho ba ste// srang mda'i 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas// dus bral rnam rtog med pa ste/ 
159b3(rgyud): stong nyid skye med 'chi ba med// sprul pa'i 'khor lor thim pa dang // bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo sgyu// bsam gyis mi khyab zhi ba ste// chags bral 'gro kun skye ba med// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/ 
159b4(rgyud): bad ba thams cad ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis// rtsa yi dbus su 'dzin par byed// gang de skye ba nyams myong bur// gsang ba zhes ni bya bar grags// de nyid gsang ba yi ni
159b5(rgyud): mchog/ bla ma'i zhal la lhag par gnas// phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim pa yis// bla ma bzang po'i zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
159b6(rgyud): pa las gsang ba chen po'i tshogs ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhon yang sdom pa'i don// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// sdom pa srung
159b7(rgyud): bar byed pa gang // de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod// rdo rje'i rtse mor sems 'dzin pa// de ni srung ba zhes ni grags// dbang po rnams ni yul rnams la// 'jug cing rtag tu gang gnas pa// de ni sdom bsrung
159b8(rgyud): ba dang // dam tshig srung bar bshad pa yin// gdul dka' tshul 'chos g.yo rgyu can// rmongs dang sems khros g.yo can dang // dad med rtog ge ba lhan cig/ rtags kyi nye bar 'tsho ba dang // nyan thos nor
160a1(rgyud): la brkam chags can// de kho na nyid sun 'byin cing // don dam pa ni mi shes pa// med par lta dang tshul khrims 'chal// gtam dang tshig ni rgyal ba dang // 'dri ba la sogs mi bya zhing / 
160a2(rgyud): se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang // de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya// las kyi phyag rgya nyams dga' ba// gal te byas pa'i skye bo dang // de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni// mi bya rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// skye
160a3(rgyud): nadam tshig dbus zhugs dang // pad snod phyag rgya sogs brtan dang // brkam dang 'brel pas 'jug pa dang // dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya// snod dang cang te'u gri gug dang // glegs bam dang ni bgrang phreng
160a4(rgyud): dang // dam tshig med pa gzhan dag la// gang du'ang bstan par da mi bya'o// dge slong sdom la gnas pa la// rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba dang // man ngag rnams ni bstan mi bya// ras ris
160a5(rgyud): la sogs mi bstan cing // gang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu// ji ltar spyod pa yang dge spyong// bla ma la yang smra min na// gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos// dbang po yul la spyod pa ni// ga
160a6(rgyud): nas de ni bsdams nas ni// stong nyid gnyis med sgyu ma las// sogs pas kun rdzob lhag spyad na// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur sogs// nyam su myong ba'i bde ba yis// bde ba chen po'i dran pa yis// 
160a7(rgyud): dbang po rnams ni yul las ldog/ bdag stod gzhan la smod pa dang // ye shes snyems sogs nges spangs pa// blo ldan rdo rje dbang phyug gi/ yang dag sdom pa bshad pa yin// de lta bu sogs dam tshig/ 
160a8(rgyud): ni/ rnal 'byor pa yis rtag bsrung bya// gzhan du rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ldan pa rdo rje can// bgrang phreng dang ni dbu rgyan dang // rus pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya dang // glegs bam bsam gtan
160b1(rgyud): ras ris dang // zod pa la sogs rnal 'byor ma// thams cad du ni dngos grub phyir// bla ma la yang sba bar bya// sngags ni tshig du brjod mi bya// mchu 'gul bar yang mi mngon zhing // cung zad mgrin pa
160b2(rgyud): brjod pa yis// sngags kyi rgyal po de ltar bzlas// gsang las dngos grub mtshungs pa med// gang phyir de ni sdom par bshad// snod min nor ni chen po dang // ldan yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs// bla mu
160b3(rgyud): bla medo dngos grub phyir// 'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya// bza' btung gos la sogs pa dang // nor ni chen po la chags shing // snod min slob ma man ngag mchog/ rmad du byung ba smra ba gang // rnal 'byor
160b4(rgyud): pa tshe 'di la// da ni dmyal ba ngu 'bod 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sdom pa'i/ tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// 
160b5(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// dam tshig don ni bla na med// nga/ za' ba yi ni dam tshig gang // de ni de yi don bshad bya// bza' ba ru ni bshad pa gang // de ni bdud rtsi lnga ru brjod// rlung gi
160b6(rgyud): de nyid sbyor ba yis// zhu nas ro cig slar yang ni// rdo rje lam nas stong song ste// gcig tu gyur pa bza' ba'o// dam tshig lus dang ngag yid kyis// de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang // 'khor lo bzhi pa
160b7(rgyud): rnams la yang // bde ba nyamasu myong ba gang // de dang ro gcig rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu spyod pa bza' ba'o// byang chub sems kyi de nyid mchog/ bde ba chen po'i go 'phang thim// zhu ba rlung gi de nyid kyis// bza' ba
160b8(rgyud): bsam gtan bza' bo'o// spyi bo thod pa'i slad nas ni// de tsam rnal 'byor pas rtag tu// de la snying rje btung ba ni// byang chub sems dpa' bde ba che// snod mchog gsang ba'i pad+ma blugs// rten ni bza'
161a1(rgyud): b.rab rtogs byed// sems kyis bdud rtsi 'thung byed na// bdud rtsi lnga yi ro rdzas 'thung // de za ba ni rdo rje 'chang // glang po rta khyi ba glang mi// byang chub sems dang bcas pa'i khrag
161a2(rgyud): bsres nas skad cig de la bza'// de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes brjod// rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis// stong pa nyid du gsal ba'i snod// rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'// stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro/ dga' ba
161a3(rgyud): gsum pa'i bde ba ni// lhan skyes lhan cig snod du ni// rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas// rnam rtog rlung rnams thams cad ni// zhi ba'i di nyid snod bzang por// rlung gi de nyid
161a4(rgyud): pas bza'// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang gnas// phyag rgya ga/ sum dang yang dag sbyor// phyag rgya chen por bshad snod du/ rnal 'byor de nyid shes pas bza'// srog dang rtsol ba'i go 'phang
161a5(rgyud): gnas// rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis// sgom dang sgom min sa gas 'khrul pa// srog chen po yi snod du ni// rnam rtog ba'i sa bon tshogs// phung po'i bud shing snod bzang por// ye / 
161a6(rgyud): chen po'i me yis min// sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas bza'// bdud bzhi khro bo chen po yi// stobs kyi rig pas sgrub pa po// sgrub bos legs par mnyam gzhag nas// rtag tu rnal 'byor snod du bza'// rlung dang
161a7(rgyud): sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi// thig le gsum ste bla na med// mi shigs go 'phang snod du ni// zos na rnal 'byor pha rol 'gro// stong nyid ye shes mtshungs med pa// snying rje'i snod kyis mchog tu ni// ye shes chen po
161a8(rgyud): mnyam gzhag nas// btung zhing rtag tu btung ba'o// phyag rgya'i dam tshig zhes su bshad// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag sbyor// de kho na nyid mchog skyes gang // de ni skal ldan snod la ni// rnal 'byor pas 'thungs nyams dga' ba// 
161b1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ba'i de nyid mchog/ nyon mongs dang bral lhan cig skyes// phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya// de lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs// gzhan ni gang drungs ma bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang
161b2(rgyud): mchog bla ma'i zhal las gsal bar rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las dam tshig gi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// 
161b3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// sgra tsam don ni bshad par bya// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'pho ba med pa'i go 'phang 'thob// chos kyi 'khor lo'i bang sngags su// sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni/ 
161b4(rgyud): chags med snang ba med pa dang // gnyis su med cing dri ma med/ dab bral g.yo ba med pa dang // gzhi med bla gab med pa dang / lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ 'byung dang rngub pa rnam par spangs
161b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor rnams kyi lha dbang phyug/ de lta bu ni rnyed par dka'// / mchog tu zhi ba bde ba che// gzugs mchog 'chi ba me/ dpa'i mchog/ rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis// rgun chang
161b6(rgyud): ro yis myos pa ltar// mchog tu nang du song gyur nas// de bzhin rnam po kun gyi gnas// sngags kyi de nyid rig pa'i rten// rang gi nyams myong rtog pa'i gnas// de nas ston pa bla med pa// rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa/ 
161b7(rgyud): ni/ bcom ldan de nyid zhi ba mkhyen// sngags kyi de nyid rab dbye ba// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// de kho na nyid 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs// sngags kyi de nyid bla na med// mchog dang
161b8(rgyud): rab mchog phra ba dang // ye shes chen po mchog chen po// snying po yi yang snying po mchog/ yang dag bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa rnams// gsang ba'i go 'phang 'pho ba med// lte ba'i 'khor
162a1(rgyud): mad nyid mchog/ sgra tsam du ni yang dag gnas// stong nyid chen po'i dbus su thim// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal// gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang // snang ba med cing kun
162a2(rgyud): rdzob med// gnyis med ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba// thog ma med cing zhi ba dang // dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub sems kyis/ 
162a3(rgyud): bzhin ni// de tshe thog mar stong nyid sgom// snang ba med pa'i go 'angang zhing // rang bzhin med gnas nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog med la mchog tu rten// stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med// byang chub sems
162a4(rgyud): kyi rgyud dang ni// yi ge hUM las yang dag byung // rnal 'byor shes pa rmad byung che// de nyid gsum ni ro gcig don// a bad+hA ti'i go 'phang gnas// slar yang dga' ba'i sbyor ba yis// 
162a5(rgyud): 'jug pa la sogs rnam par spangs// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang ni// byang chub sems ni dri ma med// sna tshogs skad cig dang/ ra med pa// brjod pa'i bdag nyid dbyangs bral ba// rtag tu gan
162a6(rgyud): ba'i rgyun gyis kyang // byang chub sems ni 'bab pa ni// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni thob// skye med zhi ba'i thig le tsam// sngags kyi spyod pas spyad pas na// ye shes mchog ni rang rig pa'o// rnal 'byor/ 
162a7(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sgra tsam gyi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rlung gi de nyid mchog/ don dam pa ni
162a8(rgyud): bshad kyis nyon// rnal 'byor pa yis rlung bsgoms na// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rlung gi thig le ye shes che// phra zhing de gnyis go 'phang gsal// dngos grub kun byed nyams dga' ba// gnyis
162b1(rgyud): med rnal 'byor mi zad pa// skye med kun 'gro zhi ba dang // lus rnams kun la khyab pa dang // ma pham stong pa bsam mi khyab// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sgom dang bsam gtan rnal
162b2(rgyud): 'byor gyis// thig le rang gi ngo bo shes// chos rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i gnas// sngags kyi de nyid kyi ni rgyu// bag chags kun las rnam par grol// kun mkhyen bde ba kun gsol ba// sna yi
162b3(rgyud): mor de nyid mchog/ 'od zer thig le bsam par bya// srog dang rtsol ba yang dag sbyor// rtog pa rnams kyi grangs ster ba// bskal bzang ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga ni// rin chen lnga
162b4(rgyud): yi sbyor ba'i gzugs// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid tsam// thog ma lus kyi phyag rgya'i dngos// ngag gi grangs kyi zlos mtshan nyi dad// yid kyi rnal 'byor che la zhe na// sgom pa'i go 'phang mi bzad
162b5(rgyud): pa/ dbugs kyi tshogs ni bgrang ba dang // rlung gi rnam par dpyad pa dang // gnas kyi dbye ba rtsa rnams kyi// dus kyi dbye ba rto// sa pa dang // rlung rnams kyi ni bzlog pa dang // rtog pa dang bcas
162b6(rgyud): spangs pa ste// de ltar mdor bsdus rnams drug gis// 'byung dang rngub pa zhes su brjod// thog mar 'byung dang rngub pa rnams// nyi khri dang ni tshig stong dang // de bzhin grangs ni brgya phrag drug/ nyin dang mtshan mo/ 
162b7(rgyud): nges pa ni// ji srid grangs ni thob pa'i gnas// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun du// grangs kyi rjes su sbyor ba yis// grangs ni yang dang yang du brtag/ dus mtshams kyi ni rab dbye bas// de nas rjesu zlos par 'gyur// 
162b8(rgyud): thun tshod so sor srog rnams dang // rtsol ba ru ni brtag pa ste// nyis stong bdun brgya'i grangs kyis ni// yang dag par ni nges bzung med// yongs su gsal bar bcad nas ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// 
163a1(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin dang mtshan du nges par ni// de rjes gnas ni rtsol ba yis// tha dad du ni rab tu brtag/ rtsa yi 'khor lo rgyu ba yis// 'byung dang rngub pa nges par ni/ 
163a2(rgyud): nges par gzung ba'i sbyor ba las// rtsa yi 'khor lo spyad par bya// de yi 'khor lo'i rtsa dbye bas// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun las// rdo rjes gnas kyi spol ba'i sa// gnas kyi dbye bas brtag par bya// gnas nis so/ 
163a3(rgyud): brtags pa yis// brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// rnam rtog med pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ rtog pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid can// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ brgya dang brgyad ni lhag par rgyu// 'di ni yang dag
163a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor mchog/ nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis// mtshan nyid sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar gnas par rang ngo bo// / rtog dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de nas rnal 'byor log/ 
163a5(rgyud): nas ni/ rtog pa dang bral rlung chen po// rtsa yi 'khor lo rnam par rgyu / de thob nas ni log pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs na la 'byor pas// nges pa la ni don dam pa// nyin zhag nyi shu
163a6(rgyud): bdun las// las dang po pa'i sbyor ba yis// blo dang ldan pa log pa las// de nas dgag pa de dag kyang // yang dag rnal 'byor stobs kyis ni// srog dang rtsol ba'i rnam rtog rnams// kun nas rab tu
163a7(rgyud): spangs nas ni// rlung gi de kho na nyid rgyu// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgoms par bya// gnyis med mchog gi rnal 'byor gyis// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun la// rlung gi de kho na nyid rten// 'khrul pa'i rnal 'byor
163a8(rgyud): dag pa ni// de la rtse gcig sems kyis ni// rtog med de kho na nyid kyis// rlung gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ yang dag rtsol la byas pa gsal// khang bzang byed pa bzhin du ni// thog mar sa ni yongasu
163b1(rgyud): sbyang/ de stengs bgegs dang bral byas la// gnas ni legs par dag par bya// khang bzang skal pa nyams dga' ba// blo ldan ji ltar 'dod par bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor spyod pas mchog/ rlung gi / 
163b2(rgyud): nyid rnam par sgom// snga ma bzhin du mnyam gzhag nas// srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba dang // rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes che// rnal 'byor rig pa bsgom par bya// thog mar rlung gi de nyid dang // de nas sngar
163b3(rgyud): kyi de nyid gsal// de la rlung gi 'od zer mchog/ gsal ba chen po'i kha dog lnga// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rang bzhin// phung po lnga yi rang ngo bo// de ni ye shes lnga dag pa// rlung lnga ru ni rgyu bar byed/ 
163b4(rgyud): mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga'i// de nyid mtshan nyid go 'phang mchog/ sna yi rtse mo de nyid mchog/ rlung lnga dang ni rang ngo'o// rlung dgi thig le zhes ni bshad// yang dag de nyid gsal ba yang / 
163b5(rgyud): sna rtse yungs kar da yang ni// rgyud gzhan rnams su gsungs pa ni/ sna rtser yungs kar de yang ni// srog dang rtsol ba'i brtag ba ste// srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa// 'od lnga sangs rgyas
163b6(rgyud): rnams su sgom// steng gi sna las nges 'byung ba// g.yas dang g.yon dang gnyi ga yang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam bzhir 'gyur// nang gi dus ni yin par bshad// lkog ma snying kha lta ba dang // gsang ba'i pad+mar
163b7(rgyud): 'gro 'ong ston// thun phyed kyi ni dus dag tu// go rims ji bzhin gnas pas bstan// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba nyid// pad+ma'i mgon
163b8(rgyud): bo rgyu ba'o// g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// las kyi mgon po rgyu ba'o// gnyis ka las ni 'byung ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog tu snang ba ste// 
164a1(rgyud): dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o// 
164a2(rgyud): lus kun la ni gnas pa'i rlung // bya ba kun la 'jug pa'o// 'di ni rnam snang ngo bo ste// 'chi ba'i lus la 'byung bar 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid gsal ba 'di// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor byis pa'i
164a3(rgyud): yul min zhing // rtog ge ba yis mi shes so// dngos grub thams cad gsal byed pa// rnal 'byor kun gyi dngos grub pa// de nyid kun gyi go 'phang gsal// rnal 'byor kun gyi don bsdus pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i
164a4(rgyud): go 'phang gsal// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de nyid dmachog ni shin tu phra// bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par 'gyur// / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
164a5(rgyud): las rlung gi de kho na nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon/ bde ba chen po'i gsal ba'i tshig/ rdor sems go 'phang mi phyed pa
164a6(rgyud): rang rig pas ni mchog gi mchog/ kun rtog gis brtags kyis stong pa// bde ba chen po zhes 'di brjod// lhan cig skyes pa'i dus su ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par
164a7(rgyud): spangs// zhi ba gnyis med rnam par bral// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ bde chen zhes ni 'di la brjod// rdo rje ye shes lnga yi dngos// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin can// lnga ni rtsa nas 'bab pa'i rgyun// 
164a8(rgyud): stong nyid rdo rje'i go 'phang gsal// rang bzhin med cing rten pa med// gnyis med dngos po rnam bral zhing // cha med cha ni rnam par spangs// rtag tu rtog pa kun las grol// 'pho ba med cing zhi ba dang // zad
164b1(rgyud): med bde ba thams cad gsas// nyon mongs kun las rnam grol ba// bde ba thams cad la 'jug pa// stong ba stong pa chen po dang // shin tu sbyong ba mchog gi mchog/ slong ba gzhan stong ba'i gnas/ 
164b2(rgyud): namakha' lnga yi ngo bo nyid// mi chod mi 'gyur ba nyid// mi tshig pa dang mchog tu 'bigs// sangs rgyas lnga yi ye shes mchog/ rang bzhin rdo rje zhes ni brjod// snying rje rnal 'byor yang dag 'dres// mchog
164b3(rgyud): tu skye ba'i bde ba 'di// de nyid gsum po ro gcig pa// brjod dang brjod bya rnam par spangs// bde chen zhes bya'i 'khor lor gnas// dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul min// mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis
164b4(rgyud): zhi ba dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rim gyi sa thob// rnal 'byor bzhi yi go 'phang gsal// stong nyid lnga yis kun nas gang // cha bzhi yi ni rnam bkag pa// rdo rje
164b5(rgyud): mor 'dzin pa ni// sems dpa' zhes byar gtan la dbab// na mkha' lnga yi cha yis gang // 'di ni rdo rje sems dpar ba/ rjod// de nyid bde chen go 'phang ste// bzhi pa dga' ba kun la
164b6(rgyud): khyab// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor skyes// mi phyed dbye ba rnam par spangs// de yi ngo bo de nyid de// rang nyid tshor ba rig pa'o// pha rol gzhan gyi spyod yul min// dpe bral mtshon par dka' ba dang / 
164b7(rgyud): rang gi blo la yang dag gnas// rang rig pa zhes bshad pa'o// gzhon nu ma yi rab dga' bzhin// mchog tu gsal bar nyams su myong // de nyid mchog dang pha rol 'gro// mchog ni thub pa kun la sogs
164b8(rgyud): rtog pa gsal ba'i go 'phang ni// de ni mchog dang bde ba che// de nyid gsum du mtshan nyid gcig/ dngos dang dngos med las grol bde ba'i bdag nyid 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las ni grol bar rtogs// 
165a1(rgyud): gnyis dang gnyis med rnam dpyod rang bzhin dang bral blon na pa'i bdag nyid can gsungs pa tshan mongs gcod cing 'jig rten kun tog dang ni bral ba zhes
165a2(rgyud): shes dang shes bya'i rnam rtog dben pa spangs shing bden pa'i rang bzhin dang / mthar gyur kun khya bzhi pa mchog dang mchog rab de nyid 'gro ba bde la stsol/ dus ni dus kyi mtha' zhes brjod// 
165a3(rgyud): bzhi pa'i dus sbyor zhes bya ba// 'khor ba 'khrul pa'i rtogs spangs shing // mya ngan 'das pa thob pa spangs// mnyam pa'i nyams ni chen por myos// mnyam nyid ye shes mtshan nyid can// gzung ba
165a4(rgyud): rnams kyi yul rnams nas// kun nas gzugs la sogs pa lus// 'dzin pa dbang po rnam shes rnams// mig la sog/ ngas pa'i rang bzhin gyis// de dang bral zhing mchog tu phra// ye shes
165a5(rgyud): bde ba kun gyi bdag/ sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// / gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// bde ba sems ni ni ba nyid// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid des// de las
165a6(rgyud): rnam grol 'jigs pa med// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po// stong nyid ye shes chen po'i bdag/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing // thugs rje zhi bar mdzad pa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das pa'i bad mi/ 
165a7(rgyud): gnas// nyan thos ye shes zhi ba nyid// gnyis med mchog dang bse ru'o// de dag bde ba stobs pa yi// de dang bral ba'i bde chen po// dgang phyir mchog tu dga' ba'i dus// nyan thos ye shes zhes
165a8(rgyud): brjod do// de mtha' bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rang rgyal mya ngan 'das pa dang // de ni gnyis med ye shes zhi// bde ba yis ni bye brag byas// dngos po mkhyen pa'i ye shes che// byang chub sems kyang 'dzin
165b1(rgyud): bar byed// rtsa rnams kun la bde bani// bde ba chen po go 'bang gnas// de mi bdag nyid de nyid na// bde ba chen po nas ni brjod// rnal 'byor gcig pus de nyid ni// rtog pa rnam tochog bdag nyid
165b2(rgyud): min// bsnyen nas bzlas pa sbyin sreg min// bsam gtan rlung ni bgegs pas min// bya ba ma yin phreng bas min// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgoms pas min// cung zad bzhi pa'i dbang bskur gyi
165b3(rgyud): bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas 'thob// rnal 'byor ma kun kun spyod ni// mchog gi ye shes bde ba che// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyu dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las bde ba chen po'i tshig rnam par
165b4(rgyud): bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis denyon// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor// gang gis yang dag dngos grub
165b5(rgyud): 'gyur// tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor pa// mi phyed rdo rje zhes ni brjod// de ni rlung du yang dag grags// yi ge a ni phye yis// rnal 'byor shes pas rtag mchog stsol// de rten snying
165b6(rgyud): kha'i pad+ma yis// 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// chos kyi 'khor lo skal ba bzang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de yi 'dab ma la skyes pa// rnam shes brgyad ni kun rdzob bo// 
165b7(rgyud): mig la sogs pa yang dag rten// 'gro ba gsum du rnam par spyod// de dag 'joms pa rlung rdo rje// bgegs mthar byed pa zhes ni brjod// rnam shes rnams dang gang de la// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams su
165b8(rgyud): brjod/ 'jig rten gsum du kun nas khyab// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams gnas// skyong ba yang ni thams cad kyis// yul la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gnas// de la rlung gi yang dag sbyor// rdo rje pad+ma/ 
166a1(rgyud): zhes ni brjod// rdorje snyed rjes shes par bya// pad+ma mang ni stong pa nyid// de dag sbyor ba'i mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje nyim zhes ni gsungs// 'od zer tshogs kyu/ 
166a2(rgyud): bdag nyid can// de rnams kyi ni 'byed pa gang // de ni pad+ma zhes su brjod// de yi rnal 'byor mchog tu shes// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// byang chub sems kyang rdo rjer 'gyur// bde chen 'khor lo pad+ma'o// 
166a3(rgyud): de la'ang de yi sbyor ba gang // sbyor ba mchog de rmad du byung // bla ma'i gsungs ni rdo rje ste// slob ma bzang gis thos pa'i snod// pad+ma de yi gnas de la// de yi sbyor ba'ang mchog tu gsal// zhi gnas
166a4(rgyud): pad+ma zhes gsungs la// de la lhag mthong rdo rje'o// de gnyis ga cig gyur rnal 'byor ni// sgom pa yis ni de nyid mthong // // rnal 'byor ma zhal pad+mar gnas// rdo rje bde chen bla na med/ 
166a5(rgyud): pad+ma slob ma bzang gi kha// man ngag gi ni don gyi snod// de gnyis rnal 'byor kun bdag nyid// yang dag de nyid don mthong // da// blo ldan rnam rtog bral ba yi// rdo rje ling ga zhes ni bshad
166a6(rgyud): rnam rtog bral ba'i blo ldan gyis// b+ha ga pad+ma zhes ni brjod// dam tshig gis brlan rnal 'byor ma// de gnyis dngos gcig yang dag sbyor// gnyis med ye shes mthong bar byed// stong phrag gnyis
166a7(rgyud): dang bdun khri yi// rtsa rnams rdo rje zhes ni brjod// byang chub sems ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// pad+ma zhes ni yongs su grags// de ni kun tu sbyor ba des// dga' ba skyed par byed pa yi// rdo rje yi yang nyams dga'i stan// 
166a8(rgyud): rang gi rdo rje'i chang badra// de la de gnyis mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas ye shes go 'phang gsal// dbang bskur mchog ni rdo rje ste// pad+ma slob ma snod babang po// de gnyis mchog tu yang dag sbyor/ 
166b1(rgyud): yang dag de gnyis kyi ni rgyu// e ni pad+ma zhes su brjod// yi ge ba ni rdo rje nyid// thig le de nyid mi shigs pa// de gnyis sbyor ba'i ngo mtshar ni// de ltar sbyor ba mchog tu shes// rdo rje ba stong sa/ 
166b2(rgyud): ba ni/ rnal 'byor ma mi min dag dang / bla ma dren gyis yongs su shes// nal 'byor chen pa rgyu pal rdorje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rdong badra lang dag par myur bab shed pa'i
166b3(rgyud): le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / sngags kyi nyid ye shes mchog/ bshad kyis rdo rje can na nyon// sngags kyi spyod pa spyad pa yis// !
166b4(rgyud): gis dngos grub myur 'grub 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rnams// sngags ni gzungs bzhin bzlas brjod bya// de yis myu du dngos grub 'gyur// rlung gi de nyid pha mthar phyin/ 
166b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgya go 'phang zhing // phyag rgya chen po'i sdom pa'i don/ mchog gi de nyid ye shes che// sngags kyi de nyid bsdu na pa yin// dmigs med pa'i go 'phang gsal// rdo rje sems
166b6(rgyud): dadapa' nges pa'i rgyu// sngags ni yon tan kun gyis gsal// lus ngag yid kyi sdom pa'o// de nyid de skyes ye shes mchog/ de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa// snying kha'i pad+mar mchog tu gsal
166b7(rgyud): de nyid ye shes bla na med// zla drug bzlas pas 'grub par ni// 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no// rnal 'byor mchog gi thabs dang ni// rnal 'byor pas ni yongs su grags// dmigs mang zhes ni gang
166b8(rgyud): gsungs pa// de ni don dam par ni brjod// sbrul sogs pa yi dbye ba yis// sngags ni bzlos pa gnyis su med// 'on kyang mi phyed de nyid gsum// sngags kyi don bsdus pa'o// bzlas pa'i dngos grub
167a1(rgyud): mtshungs pa med// yang dag mnyam par gzhag bzlas na// dngos grub mtshungs pa med par 'gro// rnam dag go 'phang bzang po gsal// gang shes de ni 'gro ba'i bla// sngags don
167a2(rgyud): sngags de nyid dang ni// sngags kyi man ngag kha brgyud pa// sngags kyi man ngag mi gsal ba// gang shas de ni 'gro ba'i bla// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni// kun mkhyen 'gro ba'i bla ma la// rdo rje sems dpas yang
167a3(rgyud): nas yang // phyag byas nas ni yongs su zhus// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyi ming dang don// rang bzhin ci zhig rab gsal ba// sngags kyi de nyid man ngag ni// sngags kyi sdom don
167a4(rgyud): ji lta bu// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rnal 'byor gsum gyi 'bras bdag nyid// sngags kyi don dang ming mchog dang // gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid can// de kho na nyid bshad kyis
167a5(rgyud): nyon la snying po snying po'i don bsdus pa// thog ma med cing zhi ba dang // / dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// sngags don rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// nyon mong
167a6(rgyud): med cing mi gsal ba// rang bzhin med pa'i mchog gi mchog/ ming med rang bzhin med pa dang // rnam pa med pa'i chen po'i mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// bde ba yang dag 'phel bar
167a7(rgyud): byed// skal bzang bde ba 'phel bar byed// thams cad shes shing cha dang bral// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor skyes// de nyid de ni don dam yang // de nyid de bzhin nyid gzhan min// de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i
167a8(rgyud): dngos// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid// khyab pa kun 'gro stong pa nyid// nyon mongs thams cad rab tu 'joms// dri med dri bral dga' ba dang // rang rig pa yi go 'phang mchog/ dang po'i lha ste nyams
167b1(rgyud): dga' bzang // cha yis tshogs rnams rgyas par byed// man ngag gnas kyi bye brag gis// 'khor lo'i dbye bas btu bar bya// rtsa dang mgrin pa snying kha rkan// rtsol ba ji bzhin brjod pa yi// 
167b2(rgyud): bzhin du ni las bya ba// zhi ba la sogs go rims bzhin// ji bzhin dngos grub ye shes dang // ji bzhin nyams su myong mtshan nyid// rang bzhin rdzogs pa ji lta bu// rgyun gyi dbye ba ji lta bu// rig pa/ 
167b3(rgyud): ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin gnas// yang dag bsam gtan phyag rgya'i rim// gzugs rdzogs pa la sogs pa yi// bla ma brgyud pas yang dag gnas// rab tu 'bad pas
167b4(rgyud): bslab par bya// gser dang do shal gos dang ni// rin chen sna tsho gas yon tan mchog/ bran dang las byed grangs med dang // dad cing gus pa la sogs kyis// ji ltar bzhed pa ston pa la// 
167b5(rgyud): rnyed par dka' ba'i dngos rnams kyis// sngags kyi don ston bla ma ni// / dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya// phyag byas de rjes sngags pa yis// yang dag gzungs nas 'bras bu'i don// 
167b6(rgyud): mi yi rus pa'i smug gu dang // sa gzhi rin chen rab 'bar ba// yang na dur khrod thal ba ni// rab brdal dngos grub ster bar byed// thog mar dbang bskur blangs byas nas// mdun du dkyil 'khor
167b7(rgyud): la sogs bya// begs mthar byed la gtor ma ni// chen po gtsug lag khang du sbyin// sku gsung thugs ni sgrub byed pa'i// mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya// dang po'i yi ge thog mar bri// dbyangs
167b8(rgyud): yig lnga pa yang dag ldan// sde chen tha ma'i mtha' cha ldan// sku yi sa bon du ni brjod// thog ma'i yi ge nyis 'gyur la// uSh+ma Sha yi cha dang ldan// mtshungs pa med pa'i sngags btu bya// gsung gi/ 
168a1(rgyud): rdo rje snying po mchog/ uSh+ma Sha yi cha dang bcas// dbyangs yig drug par yang dag ldan// sde chen mtha' yi mtha' char bcas// thugs kyi rdo rje go 'phang gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi/ 
168a2(rgyud): dam tshig gsum// 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub par byed// rnal 'byor pa yi de nyid mchog/ sngags btu ba ni bla na med// de nyid dngos grub thams cad byed// sngags rnams kun gyi don bsdus pa// sngag
168a3(rgyud): kyi theg pa kun yin no// rgyu dang mi rgyu sa nyid la// dngos grub rnams kyi rnal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor ye shes bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po ni// ye shes bla na med pa'i mchog/ man ngag ji bzhin
168a4(rgyud): sngags zlos pa// dngos grub phyir ni lung bzhin gyis// de yi dngos grub rgya chen 'gro/ tshe 'di nyid la sngags shes pas// ye she sra chen po zhes bshad pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor che// 
168a5(rgyud): rab gsal sngags ni mtshungs pa med// 'dod pa kun la longs spro/ da byed// gang zhig sngags ni mgul pa ru// rtag 'cha/ nga de kho na nyid shes// rtog pa kun yang 'grub par byed// dkyil
168a6(rgyud): 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang // dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang // blo bzang 'jig rten gsum yang 'grub// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sngags kyi de kho na nyid gsungs
168a7(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// grangs kyi rim pa bla na med// ji ltar gnas pa'i rlung rnams kyi// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 
168a8(rgyud): gang gis thob pa skal pa bzang // srog ni thams cad bdag nyid gnas// gang gis yang dag yongs su shes// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par byed// rlung gi mtshan nyid mi shes pa// 'jig rten gsum du rnam
168b1(rgyud): bar 'khor// goms pa thob pa de yang ni// bla ma rnal 'byor de shes brgyud// rlung gi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// lo tshigs kyi ni mtshan nyid ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// sprin gyi dpal las
168b2(rgyud): gsal ba gang // mdor bsdus nas ni dus ni drug/ lo tshigs su ni yongs su grags// sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te// dus de nyin zhag drug cu'o// nyin dang mtshan du nges pa la// nyin zhag gcig ces
168b3(rgyud): yongs su grags// nyin mtshan chu tshod drug cu ste// de bzhin dbyug gu rtsa sha'o// 'byung dang rngub pa'i dus drug la// tsa sha zhes ni yongs su grags// skad cig ma drug la ni dbugs// de nyid se gol
168b4(rgyud): gtogs pa'i tshad// thang cig gsum la skad cig go/ de la yung sa kar bskor ba tsam// dbugs gsum ni thang cig go// thang cig de ni yud tsam mo// thang cig gsum la mig btsums
168b5(rgyud): te// de yang mig ni 'dzums pa yi// tsam gsum la ni mig bcu mas te// tsam ni thal mo brdabs pa'o// bde ba 'char/ kha de gsum tsam// de ni thig le 'pho ba'o// sngangs pa gsum/ 
168b6(rgyud): la bde bar gnas// de ni rab 'gyed 'jigs pa brjod// dus gsum la ni 'jigs par bshad// dus ni phra ba skad cig bdag/ 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa yi mtshan nyid do// 'das pa'i
168b7(rgyud): skad cig gsum du gsungs// da ltar yang ni skad cig gsum// ma 'ongs skad cig gsum du bshad// de las slar yang skad cig gsum// de ltar skad cig gsum gyi cha// de las cha gsum de las
168b8(rgyud): / de srid grangs ni ji srid du// rtog pa stong pa gnyis su med// rnal 'byor mchog ni thob par 'gyur// srog gi gnas ni bla na med// phyogs dang dus kyi rtog pa bral// rigs pa'i mtshan nyid
169a1(rgyud): spangs pa dang // de yi srog ni shar nas thim// gnyis med de ni bsdus pa'o// gzhan yang bshad par bya yis nyon// srog ni thim dang 'char ba yi// gang tshe skad cig la sogs/ 
169a2(rgyud): rtogs/ kun nas rab tu ma zhi ba// de srid srog ni rlung gi gnas// grol ba'i gnas ni mi shes so// bshang sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas// ming ni ma skyes cha chen po// de yang rnam shes dang bral ba// 
169a3(rgyud): ye shes lus ni bdag med pa// der ni skye ba mchog gi mchog/ srog chags rnams kyi mchog tu brjod// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo stan// thog mar 'byung ba bzhi po la// sgro 'dogs skyed pa'i ngo bor byed/ 
169a4(rgyud): de tshe rang gi gnas su thim// rnam shes las ni skye ba rlung // de la sa me ni skye bar 'gyur// me las chu ni 'byung bar byed// de lus sa ni yang dag skye// de dag rnams las phung por 'byung // de
169a5(rgyud): phyir skye mched rnams dang ni// de las rnam shes rang bzhin me/ da// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim// ji ltar skye bo de yi gnas// thim nas 'gro ba'i rang bzhin du// rgyags pa
169a6(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rlung chen po// nyon mongs yi ni 'das nas ni// sngags thob nas ni rnam rgyas te// skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed// de las rgyags pas chu yi rlung // rgyags pa bskyed pa za ba'i phyir// 
169a7(rgyud): phung po rnams kyang sdud byed nyid// rim gyis lus chen sgra sgrogs byed// de las rgyags pa'i mni 'byung // rgyags po'i chu ni sdud par byed// 'thung ba rnams kyis bsdus nas kyang // go rims ji
169a8(rgyud): babazhin du// de'i tshuni btang bdung 'asrung // rgyags pa'i mnim par byed// de nas kyang ni chu ni srung // khyab cing phra ba sgrib par byed// de las mi bzad btang badrung dang // rnam shes skang cig/ 
169b1(rgyud): sgrib par byed// bsgribs nas de las rnam shes kyang // bems por song nas brgyal bar 'gyur// skye mched ma ni sgrib par byed// dag pa'i ye shes mchog gi mchog/ de las thim par/ 
169b2(rgyud): gyur pa'i srog/ rnam shes dang ni mtshungs par ldan// de nyid mchog ni de ltar bshad// srog ni thim zhing 'char ba dang // ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes// bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa 'byung // rigs
169b3(rgyud): pa gzhan yang bshad par bya// rdo rje'i sku ni sgrub pa'i phyir// 'chi ba med pa'i sgrub pa ni// gang gis 'chi med lus mchog ni// thob pa yon tan rnams kyi rten// gang phyir sems can tshe thung bas// 
169b4(rgyud): 'chi med go 'bang sgrub mi nus// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyi sa// 'chib med par rab bsgrub bya// bcom ldan mgon po ye shes mchog/ rnal 'byor de nyid pha rol byon// rdo rje sems
169b5(rgyud): dpas phyag byas zhus// 'chi ba med nyid rigs par ni// ji lta ra yang dag thim pa lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bya ba kun sgrub go 'phang ni// 'chi ba med pa'i rnal
169b6(rgyud): 'byor tsho// yang dag de nyid rnam nges pa// sems can tshe ni thung ba yis// dngos grub 'grub pa gang yang med// de bas rnal 'byor bzang po rnams// tshe ring ba ni dge ba'o// de la thog mar rnal 'byor
169b7(rgyud): mchog/ blo bzang nang gi bdag nyid sgrub// lce ni rkan gyi dbus sbyar ba// byas nas de kho nyid tshim bzla// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// yang dag rnal 'byor rjes dran bya// sna rtser dbug/ 
169b8(rgyud): ni rgyu bya zhing // kha ni gsal bar dgag par bya// skad kyi gnas son zla ba ni// sngags kyi rnal 'byor gyis ni zhu// zhu ba rlung gi rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos btung / 
170a1(rgyud): mtshan phyed kyi ni dus chod mthar// ji srid thun gcig ma chad par// de srid rnal 'byor pas sngags bzla// rdo rje'i lus ni byed par 'gyur// sde mtshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa
170a2(rgyud): la// dbyangs bcas pa dang yang dag ldan// yan lag ma nyams rtag tu bzla// sgrub pa po yi srog ni 'gugs// rdzas kyang rtag tu bsten par bya// de nyid lnga yi rims pas skye// bzlas pa rdzogs nas rtag
170a3(rgyud): tu ni// lus la 'byung ba'i dri ma med// lcags lnga'i rang bzhin snod du ni// bzhag nas ji srid nyi ma ni// 'char ka ra de nas de la yang // yo Shi rak+ShaM bde ba ni// blugs nas rtag tu rdzas kyi mchog/ bdud
170a4(rgyud): rtsi bdun pa'i ming can no// nyal kar yang ni de 'thungs na// rdzas kyi su tshe ni 'phel bar byed// sngags kyi rgyal po oM AHhUM// de nas lan bdun bzla bar bya// lag g.yas ba dan gyis
170a5(rgyud): mtshan la// snod bzang de la bkab nas su// yi ge brgya pa'i snga/ gas kyi ni// lan gsum du ni dag par bya// de phyir bu/ da med gzhon nu ni// rtag tu 'khur ba bkang zhing btung // 
170a6(rgyud): de ni bza' ba sbyin pa yang // mar la bstegs pa'i 'bras dang ni// ma sha dang ni nyi dga' dang // ra yi 'o ma kha ra kar// til rnams cha mnyam byas nas ni// myos pa yis ni sbyin bsreg bya/ 
170a7(rgyud): nyal kar de la bza' ba sbyin// bla na med pa'i bza' ba po// de ltar rigs pas chog shes nas// su la'ang smra bar mi bya'o// thams cad sngon bzhin zhi ba ni// myur du dngos grub ster bar byed// zla ba
170a8(rgyud): drus tu'ang gang bsten pa// de ni rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur// bcud kyis len dang gser 'gyur sogs// tshe dgug pa ni bla na med// rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya// phyag rgya che don sgrub pa pos// rgas pa
170b1(rgyud): med cing srin nad med// snyoms las med cing lkugs pa med// glo skams rlung mkhris nad sogs med// nad dang 'bras dang 'brum bu dang // shu ba g.yan pa 'brum phran med// mdze nad mtshan par
170b2(rgyud): rdol ba med// dud dang pad dkar dpal lus ldan// 'dzam+bu chu bo gser ltar 'bar// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ de ni rtag tu 'gugs par byed// de yi mdza' chen lha rnams te// rnal 'byor/ 
170b3(rgyud): ma rnams sems par byed// lus kyi rang bzhin rtag tu ni// phyag bya ba dang mchod par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi grangs kyi rim pa'i gnas
170b4(rgyud): bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang rtsa rnams ni// grangs dang gnas ni bsdus pa nyon// 'khor lo'i grangs kyi dbye ba sri
170b5(rgyud): ji bzhin rmad du byung ba'i mchog/ 'khor lo drug la rten bcu drugalus la lha yi gzhal yas khang // rnal 'byor ji ba zhin gnas ji bzhin// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ 
170b6(rgyud): rlung gi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// 'dab drug rlung ni mkha' la spyod// 'dab gsum me yi 'khor lor bshad// rtsa gsum gnas ni rim gyis 'char// de bzhin longs spyod 'khor lo yang // rtsa ni bcu
170b7(rgyud): drug yang dag brjod// chos kyi 'khor lor gnas pa'i rtsa// brgyad ni kun la khyab pa'o// de bzhin sprul pa'i 'khor lo yang // drug cu rtsa bzhir 'char bar bshad// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// rtsa ni
170b8(rgyud): sum cu gnyis su bshad// de ltar mdor bsdus rim pa yang // brgya dang sum cu gcig lhag par// rtsa rnams su ni yang dag bshad// gzhan dag tu ni rgyas par yang // rtsa ni bdun khri nyis stong du/ 
171a1(rgyud): gnas kyi dbye bas phye ba ni// nges par brjod pa 'bum sder gsungs// rgyud ni chung ngu'ang 'di nyid du// snying po las ni snying por gsungs// smin ma'i dbus nas rlung 'khor lo
171a2(rgyud): bye ba 'khyil ba mi bzad pa// mi bzang brtan dang mtshan nyid can// rtsa thung drug gi mtshan nyid do// 'dzin pa rtog med gang ba ni// rtsa gsum gru gsum me dkyil 'khor// mgrin pa'i 'og tu bshad
171a3(rgyud): pa yin// dri ma dang bral gsal ba dang // drag po dang ni gsum yin no// yang dag zhugs dang shin tu zhugs// shin tu bzang dang bzang po 'gro/ stobs chen dang ni mi bzad che// mdzes chen mdun du
171a4(rgyud): skyes pa che// rgyags pa'i rtags dang rgyags pa'i cha// rgyags dpa'i chu dang rgyags smyo byed// rgyags dang rgyags pa'i rgyu 'thun dang // rgyags pa'i rlan dang rgyags pa chang // rtsub
171a5(rgyud): dang mkha' dang 'byung ba rlang dang // dbugs mi bde dang g.ya' ma/ kha' 'gro// 'dab cha gos yan lag khwa yi gdong // za phod mi bzang sgra sgrogs dang // dri ldan rdeg dang rdul ba dang
171a6(rgyud): dbyangs dang dbyangs skyes dang ni sprin// chub mthong dang rgyan ltar sngo// yud tsam gtso bo yud mi skyes// rgyag tu kha bltas dbyug pa dang // dbyug snyems dang ni snying pa dang // tshigs kyi lto dang tshigs kyi
171a7(rgyud): tshig/ tshigs kyi tshad dang brtul ba dang // tshigs kyi gnas dang tshigs kyi gdong // tshigs 'od tshigs kyi lu gu rgyud// dul byed dud 'gro gzi brjid dang // dri med dul ba'i snyems pa dang // chu 'phyang
171a8(rgyud): lto dang chu 'phyang chags// rgun 'byang chun 'phyang phyed sbrang bu// phru gu phru gu ster dri ba// lo ma lo ma'i mgrin pa dang // rab mchog ma dang rab gsal te// de ltar drug cu bzhir bshad// lte ba sprul pa'i
171b1(rgyud): 'khor lo gnas// bdud rtsi mchog gis yongs su gang // rin chen chen po pad+ma dang // rdo rje chen po stobs po che// mgo bo che dang sgra che dang // nyes dga' chen po myos pa che// 'di brgyad chos kyi 'khor mar/ 
171b2(rgyud): dbus/ snying kha'i pad+mar yang dag gnas// longs spyod longs spyod ster ldan dang // nyi 'gro gsal dang skal ba dang // sgom pa dang ni thal ba'i gdong // bzang ster bzang dang bkres pa dang // bcud len
171b3(rgyud): ro ni sgyur ba dang // ro 'jigs pa dang ro dang ni// khrung khrung longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// grangs ni bcu drug tu ni brjod// de steng rim rigs 'dod pa can// 'dod can ma dang srog gi lus// zla 'thung zla
171b4(rgyud): ster mdzod dang ni// 'dod chags min sma ku sha dang // sha bi spo dag pa dang // mi dang mi ron tse dang // gang pa gnyis ro ldan pra dang // kis ring chang steng bdud rtsi dang // dung can dang ni dung na/ 
171b5(rgyud): dang / dug gi mig dang dug gi sna// rgyags dbang rgyags pa ba rkam pa dang // rgyags pas brgyal dang ngo mtshar rgyags / snyems pa dang ni tshogs kyi rten// sum cu rtsa gnyis zhwa/ 
171b6(rgyud): ni brjod// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// mchog tu dga' ba ster bar byed// phra dang reg pa mchog tu phra// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// rang nyid bde chen rang bzhin dang // gzhan dag la sa
171b7(rgyud): ster bar byed// de ltar yang dag rtsa yi rim// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rtsa yi ri mo med nges par ni// phung po la sogs mi 'byung ngo // phung po med na ye shes che// rnal 'byor pa yis thob mi
171b8(rgyud): 'gyur/ phung po lnga yi bdag nyid lus// mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags// de nyid 'byung ba lnga yis ni// ye shes lngar ni rnam par gnas// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rtsa yi 'khor lo
172a1(rgyud): shes par bya// ji ltar chu yi dbus kyi shing // myur du yang ni 'phel bar 'gro// de las 'bras bu sogs ldan pa// ster ba 'di la the tshom med// de bzhin phung po shing zhes bya/ 
172a2(rgyud): rtsa yi chu yis 'phel nas ni// 'phel bas yang dag 'bras bu ni// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ster byed// lha yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yis// rtsa rnams rang bzhin bsgom par bya// gnyis phrad pa las reg bya
172a3(rgyud): gnyis// gal te rdo rje lhag gyur na// de tshe me ni yang dag 'bar// de rjes me yi 'khor lo'i dbus// 'khor lo'i ming can pad+ma rnams// rim gyis rim gyis bye bar 'gyur// 'di ni rtsa las 'bab de las
172a4(rgyud): byang chub sems ni bde ba che// sprul pa'i snying po yang dag thob// ngo bo gcig gyur bsdus nas ni// 'bab pa nyi ma zla ba'o// / mi dbang dkyil 'khor dbus su yang // gang phyir srad bu'i
172a5(rgyud): rnam par gnas// rgyu gcig tu yang shes nas ni// de nyid 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis// g.yas pa nyi ma'i rnam pa dang / g.yon pa zla ba'i rnam par 'byung // gang tshe g.yas pa'i nyi ma ni
172a6(rgyud): de tshe khrag 'gyur bde ba'o// gang tshe g.yon pa'i zla ba gsal// bde ba kun kyang de lta bu'o// de gnyis khongs su chud pa'i me// yan lag bdun nyid yang dag gnas// sngon la rlung gi rnam shes ni/ 
172a7(rgyud): brgya lam gang tshe 'khrul gyur na// pha yi mkha' la mtshungs par gnas// de tshe chags pa'i dbang du 'gyur// gsang gnas zla mtshan ldan pa'i rtsa// me dang nyi ma 'char ba na// da tshe lhag par
172a8(rgyud): chags pas non// chags pa mchog tu 'dod par 'gyur// rdo rje pad+ma 'dres pa'i gdong // 'jug pa pa yi kha yi rlung // de tshe sa bon du ni 'gyur// sa bon las ni sems can 'byung // de phyir rtsa las
172b1(rgyud): yang dag 'char// 'bras bu ngo mtshar can ni skye// de nyid byang chub sems kyang ni// 'dzin pa srog ni bsdus pa'o// ye shes mchog dang de nyid mchog/ mchog tu bde ba rmad byung che// ye shes rnal
172b2(rgyud): 'byor thob pa yis// mchog tu bde ba bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa'i 'khor lo'i gnas kyi rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun
172b3(rgyud): pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor lus la rim ji bzhin// rtsa rnams rtag tu yang dag ni// brgyud pa yi ni rigs kyis skye// 
172b4(rgyud): gsal ba ru ni ma gsungs pa// dad pa'i bsam pa rnam spangs pa// skye bo skal ba med don du// gang du'ang gsal bar ma ga sungs pa// snyigs ma lnga zhes bya ba'i dus// sems can myur
172b5(rgyud): du dngos grub don// snod du bya bar 'dod pa yis// rang byung ye she/ sarmad byung ba// rnal 'byor lus kyi bde chen po'i// 'o Sha ra lo'i rtsa ni sum cu gnyis// byang chub sems ni gsal 'bab/ 
172b6(rgyud): pa'i rtsa rnams yang dag rnam bshad bya// de ni bde ba chen po'i gnas// de ni mtshan nyid bshad par bya// ka tsa Ta ta ba'i sde tshan// ya ral wa Sha sha sa// de dag rim par shes par bya// slar yang de
172b7(rgyud): dag bsdus nas ni// sde tshan tsam ni gcig tu 'gro/ de yang zhi ba'i ye shes mchog/ byang chub sems la thim nas 'gro// kun rtog thams cad spangs nas ni// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog
172b8(rgyud): shes dang shes bya rnam par spangs// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// de las 'khor lo gsum dbye bas// rtsa ni brgyad kyi dbye ba las// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis ni// gsum phyed
173a1(rgyud): bdun cu rtsa gnyis gsal// de ni stong du rab phye ba// so sor 'phros pa'i bdag nyid can// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis// rtsa rnams kyi ni grangs zhes bya// rlung dang mkhris
173a2(rgyud): ba bad kan ni// khams gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni// 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi ni// nges pa'i man ngag rjes 'brang nas// phyag
173a3(rgyud): rgya'i rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ lha yi rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa ni so sor dbye ba yis// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// de las yang ni sdom sbyor bar// song nas phan tshun nas rten pa/ slar
173a4(rgyud): yang bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gro// bde chen 'khor lo rtsa yi gnas // rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis las// de yang 'khor lo sngo dam par 'gyur// 'khor lo re re'i gtso bo'i rtsa// brgyad
173a5(rgyud): brgyad du ni 'gyur bar gsal// rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa mtsho gces// rmad byung sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// yi ge sum cu gnyis dbye bas// rtag tu rnal 'byor gtso bos thob/ 
173a6(rgyud): phung po khams dang don yul nyid// dbang po'i sgo ni srung ba'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis dbye bdag nyid// gsal ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ lus kyi gzhal yas khang du yang // de nyid kyi ni na
173a7(rgyud): bzhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang // gzugs la sogs dang rgyal sras rnams// khro bo bcu zhes bya ba yi// de nyid mchog ni yang dag bzhugs// slar yang khro bo rgyal sras la/ 
173a8(rgyud): nang du mi snang bar ni 'gro// rgyal sras rnams ni gzugs la sogs// lha mo rnams la bsdus nas ni// de rnams kyang ni sa sogs 'gro// de dag de bzhin gshegs lnga la// sku gsung thug
173b1(rgyud): kyi rdo rje la// de dag la yang bsdus nas 'gro// de kho na nyid bde gcig pu// de la yang ni thim nas 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams las grol// bde ba kun rten pa'i mchog/ de yang nyams myong
173b2(rgyud): las slar// de ni yi ge tsam la thim// yi ge tsam ni thig lar thim// thig la yang ni sgra la thim// sgra tsam 'od gsal ba la'o// 'od gsal go 'phang yang dag par// spro dang bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid do// 
173b3(rgyud): rnam par shes dang chos dbyings dang // don dam pa dang bde ba che// gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba// byang chub sems ni dri ma med// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba che// gnyis med ye shes rmad du byung // dbang / 
173b4(rgyud): bskur bzhi pa bde ba dang // bzhi pa'i dga' ba go 'phang mchog/ de la sogs ming bye brag gis// go 'phang mchog ni ga sungs pa yin// spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye ba yis// rim pa ji
173b5(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du// de ltar bskyed dang rdzogs pa yi// rim don bla ma brgyud las shes// zhi ba gnyis med mtshan nyid// can// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon
173b6(rgyud): par rtogs pa las rnal 'byor pa'i lus kyi rtsa bsdus pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs la sogs skad cig
173b7(rgyud): bdag/ yang dag gzhung lugs mtshan nyid ni// de nyid ji lta ba bzhin nyon// rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin// rnam par 'joms dang mtshan nyid bral// skad cig ma ni bzhi zhes gsungs// rnam par phye/ 
173b8(rgyud): nas slar bshad bya// rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'dod// da yi skad cig dbye bar bya// a lig ga dang / nu m+ba na dang / nu ma sha na dang / ku tsa gra ha dang / bu la ta ta ha na dang / da shan dang / da kha dan dang / 
174a1(rgyud): / dol dang // bu tsi tsi dang / kur ba la sogs pa'i ka ra na dang / rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig go/ na li stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// lus ni bde ba rgyas pa ni// mgrin bdag tu gang
174a2(rgyud): phyin pa// rnam smin zhes bya skad cig go/ lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni// rdo rje phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can// thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i// rnam pa med pa'i skad cigo/ na li las byung shA kra
174a3(rgyud): 'das/ rnam pa dang bral skad cig go// ye shes bzhi dang stong pa bzhi// skad cig ma ni bzhi las rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las skad cig me'i mchen
174a4(rgyud): nyid rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dga' rab bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yi// 
174a5(rgyud): dga' ba'i bde ba dang po ste// mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa dang // dga' bral zhes pa gsum pa dang // bzhi po lhan cig/ skyes par bshad// sprul pa'i 'khor lor dga' ba dang // mchog
174a6(rgyud): dga' chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// long spyod bral ba'i dga' ba dang // lhan cig skyes dang bde ba che// lugs bzlog rim pa zhes ni gsungs// de rjes lugs 'byung bshad bya ste// bde chen
174a7(rgyud): 'khor lo spyi bo la// de ni dga' bar bshad pa yin// longs spyod 'khor lor mchog dga' dang // dga' bral chos kyi 'khor lor gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lor lhan cig skyes// dga' ba nyams
174a8(rgyud): su myong bar byed// blta dang dgug dang de bzhin brda'// kha la tsum pa byed pa yi// dga' ba nyams su myong bar shes// rnam pa sna tshogs mtshan nyid do// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma mchog tu// de
174b1(rgyud): bzhin sgra la 'dzin pa dang // rdo rje pad+mar bzhag nas ni// nyams myongs ni skad cig mchog/ rnam smin zhes bya skad cig nyid// de nyid rgyur ni rnam par shes// rtsa yi dbus na rab gsal gnas// 
174b2(rgyud): gtum mo yang ni rnam rtog 'joms// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo tshe// mchog gi cha ni zhu bar byed// bral dga'i gnas su myong ba na// rnam rtog skad cig mtshan nyid do// de la ro gcig rang bzhin ni// 
174b3(rgyud): rtsa ni gcig gi rgyun la rten// bde ba chen po'i go 'bang zhi// lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs skad cig gsungs// stong nyid kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de las
174b4(rgyud): steng la rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub bya ba// nyams su myong ba ma cho ga dga' ste// rnam smin skad cig mtshan nyid do// long das spyod 'khor lo de las ni// steng du byed pa'i skad cig la/ 
174b5(rgyud): nyams myong bral ba'i dga' ba ni// rnam 'joms mtshan nyi da skad cig go/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// de thob ma tshan nyid skad cig ma// lhan cig skyes dga'i nyams myong ba
174b6(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go/ rtsa gsum kun gyi nam mkha' che// rnal 'byor mtshogs yang dag gzung // de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid dang bral skad cig go/ rtsa gsum kun gyi
174b7(rgyud): namakha' che// rnal 'byor ma tshogs yang dag gzugs// de las rab sad nyams myong ba// mtshan nyid gcig par ro mtshungs pa// rnal 'byor chen pos nyams su myong // slar yang mtshan nyid med
174b8(rgyud): par 'gro/ rab tu sad pa nyams su myong // stong phrag bcu drug bdag nyid do// bde chen go 'phang mi phyed pa// gnyis med rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// de ltar 'di ni dga' dbye ba// gzhan du gsal bar ma
175a1(rgyud): gsungs so// rnal 'byor ma yi bka' drin gyis// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dga' ba'i mtshan nyid rnam/ 
175a2(rgyud): par dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// thig le gsum ni bla na med// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub
175a3(rgyud): 'gyur// rtsa rnams kun tu 'bab pa dang // byang chub sems ni zhu byas pa// rdo rje'am ni pad+ma'i rtse// rlung ni bzung ba'i skad cig la// rkan dgugs pa yi sbyor ba dang // b+h+rUM gyi sngags kyi sbyor ba yis// rnal
175a4(rgyud): 'byor mchog ni thob par byed// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo de nyid mchog/ snying kha'i pad+ma'i lte ba la// dbus su hUM ni bkod nas ni// thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid
175a5(rgyud): ni/ dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// de kho na nyid lus skyob ba// phyogs yul dus dang rnam par bral// steng dang 'og/ ni rnam par spangs// sems bral rang gi ngo bor gnas// ngag gi/ 
175a6(rgyud): dra ba yongs su spangs// rgyud dang mtshan ma dang bral zhing // rtog pa'i spyod yul rnams dang bral// gnyis pa kun las rnam par grol// mchog tu rtag cing zhi ba'o// rlung gi thig le rnal 'byor mchog/ kha
175a7(rgyud): dog lnga pa gsal ba che// sna rtser sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// kun nas kyang ni bsgoms par bya// yi ge oM ni sngags kyi mchog/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzla bar bya// snga ma bzhin du ye shes lnga// zhi ba la
175a8(rgyud): sogs de bzhin sgrub// bag chags rim pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// rtsa ni gsum po 'di ni mchog/ bsdus nas slar yang dbye ba ni// phan tshun du ni so sor 'gro// rdzas kyi thig le kho
175b1(rgyud): chung pa// thig le gnyis te sngags dang rlung // sngags kyi thig le de nyid mchog/ thig le gnyis ni 'od dang rdzas// slar yang rlung gi thig le yang // thig le gnyis kyi nang du 'gro// sngags dang rdzas kyi/ 
175b2(rgyud): bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag shes// zla ba nyi ma me yi rtsa// gsum zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid do// la la na dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU ti zhes bya'i ming // sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang // de
175b3(rgyud): nyid du ni yongs su grags// steng dang 'og du khyab pa nyid// so sor lu gu brgyud tshul du// rtsa rnams kun la khyab nas ni// yang dge man ngag rim pas gnas// de ltar rnal 'byor mchog tu phra// shes
175b4(rgyud): dang shes bya rnam par spangs// dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gzhi// rnal 'byor chen po'i rmad byung che// gso sbyong gis min pa zlas pas min// phreng bas ma yin 'gog pas min// grangs min
175b5(rgyud): dus min gyi sreg min// 'byin byed 'gog byed kyis ni min// ye shes chen po'i go 'phang ni// rnal 'byor gcig pu/ sa rtogs par byed// mngon par shes dang ldan dang ni// de bzhin
175b6(rgyud): me shes lnga yi mchog/ thig le gsum ni rnam sgom pa// ni sogs bya ba yang dag ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi 'grub par 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid ni// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems/ 
175b7(rgyud): dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya gsungs// gnas kyi grangs kyi dbye ba yis// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ thig le gsum rnam par
175b8(rgyud): dbye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gtsog pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon// de nyid gsum gyi ga 'phang mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po bdag nyid dam tshig ni/ 
176a1(rgyud): yi ge gsum ni sku gsung thugs// snying po yang ni bshad par bya// de ni rnam phyed khyod nyon cig/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin bshad// oM ni sku yi rdo rje yi// snying po ru ni yang dag bshad/ 
176a2(rgyud): yi ge a dang yi ge u// yi ge ma zhes bya ba gsum// AHni chos 'khor pad+ma la// rlung gi 'khor lo la ni khyab// sgrib mad sgrib pa'i rlung chen po// srog tu gsungs pa thams cad bsdus// cha med cha dang
176a3(rgyud): bral ba dang // dngos po dngos med dbus na gnas// thig le 'khor lo'i cha la khyab// na mkha'i khams kyi yi ge mchog/ sngags rnams kun gyi don gyi gnas// sngags rnams thams cad rab sad byed/ 
176a4(rgyud): sngags rnams kun gyi phan byed cing // ngag gi 'khor lo rab sad byed// dngos su lan gsum gyi ni gzhi// 'byung ba thams cad dbang du byed// zad med 'phel ba med pa'i gnas// byang
176a5(rgyud): chub sa bon bde ba che// gzugs med khams su yang dag pa de// 'khor lo bzhi sa don bsdus pa'i// u ni longs rgyu/ da 'khor lor gnas// me dang nyi ma 'dra ba yi// mgrin pa'i
176a6(rgyud): mtha' nas spyi gtsug mtha'// khyab pa gzi brjid kyi ni lus// gzugs kyi khams shes bya bar shes// gnas ris bcu bdun bdag nyid can// bde chen 'khor lo zhes byar bshad// yi ges
176a7(rgyud): ni thig le tsam// gdong tshad mtha' yis sor bzhi tsam// dga' ba'i gtsug tor gnas na gnas// zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba yi// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang zhi// rtsa ni kun la khyab pa po// mi phyed
176a8(rgyud): lus kyi go 'phang ni// 'dod pa'i khams zhes bshad pa yin// bsdus na gnas ris nyi shu'o// de ltar rlung ni gnas gsum gyi// cha gsum gyi ni gnas su 'dus// yi ge oM gyi brda' shes na// khama?/ 
176b1(rgyud): gsum rnam par sad par byed// rnam par snang mdzad 'gro ba'i gzugs// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rgyu// rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis ni// sna yi bu ga nas ni byung // yang dag nyi ma zla ba gnyis// sbas
176b2(rgyud): pa nang nas rgyu bar byed// mau ni 'bar ba rtse mo li// smin ma'i dbus su srog gi rlung // de ltar gcig pu'ang gsum du bshad// gtan la phab te de nyid gsum// zhi ba khams gsum la khyab pa// skye ba'i/ 
176b3(rgyud): sa bon rgyas pa'o// yi ge a ni ye shes mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje snying po mchog/ a ni gnyis dang yi ge haM// ring por byas te dbye ba gsum// chos kyi dbyings kyi don bsdus pa// yi ge AHni sngar
176b4(rgyud): bshad zin// gnyis pa yang ni srog gi rlung // stong nyid ye she das ming can te// srog dang rtsol ba gnyis su rigs// yul dang dbang po bsdus pa'o// kun gzhi dang ni nyon mongs yid// 
176b5(rgyud): gzung dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo nyid// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// ga/ sung gi rdo rje brjod pa'i mchog/ AHni chos 'khor pad+ma/ las// mgrin par yig AHnyid 'gyur// srog nyid dang ni
176b6(rgyud): thur sel dang // yi ge ha yis kun nas ni// mgrin pa'i dbus na gnas pa bcings// A haM kha nas gsal bar brjod// ro 'bab pa yi khrung khrang ni// ro sgyur ba zhes bya bar gsungs// bkug nas rtag tu
176b7(rgyud): khyab par byed// gzugs kyi khams ni 'bar ba'o// ha dang de bzhin yi ge u// de ni yi ge ma dang gsum// rkang pa nas ni mgo mtha'i bar// 'khor lo bzhi yi don bsdus pa// ha ni thur sel ming can
176b8(rgyud): rlung kha shong sgo gsang ba'i dbus na gnas// yig U ni khyab byed rlung // mgrin pa pad+ma'i dbus na gnas// yige ma ni srog rlung yin// dpral ba rlung gi 'khor lo la// de dag gcig gyur snying kha nas/ 
177a1(rgyud): thugs kyi sa bon du ni brjod// mi bskyod snying po kha dog gnag/ gzugs med khams kyi ming can no// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// snying po gsum du rab tu bshad// lag
177a2(rgyud): na rdo rjes thal sbyar nas// slar yang thams cad mkhyen la zhus// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags don dang // gnas kyi dbye ba 'tshal lags na// 'di rnams dbus na bdag po gang // ji lta bu zhig gtso bos gsung
177a3(rgyud): gtso bo rdo rje 'chang ba che// bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gsungs pa// gsang ba'i mchog pa gsungs pa yi// sbas pa'i don ni khyod 'dri ba// rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsungs pa// rab tu bshad kyis
177a4(rgyud): mnyan par gyis// thugs kyi sa bon bdag po ste// kun gyi nang na rnam rtog med// gang phyir gtso bos gzhan rnams ni// sgrib dang de bzhin 'phrog pa dang // rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gnyis
177a5(rgyud): ni lus kun la ni khyab par byed// sna yi bu ga las ni rgyu// lus la rtag tu 'byung bar byed// 'gro ba drag gi 'kho/ ra lo'i lam// gang gi stobs kyis khyad par byed// gsum pa
177a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs// rnam rtog med par rmad byung che// rlung rnams thams cad 'gags pas na// skyes pa de nyid rtogs pa'o// rlung ni thams cad 'gog pa yang // yang dag rigs pa rang yi
177a7(rgyud): bshad// sprul pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus// rgyud 'di pad+ma gnyis su gsungs// drug cu rtsa bzhi brgyad 'dab gnyis// steng dang 'og tu kha ltas nas// slar yang kha sbyor tshul du gnas// 
177a8(rgyud): srog dang thur sil rgyu bar byed// de nyid rtog pa dang bcas pa// rlung gnyis su ni gsal bar gsungs// sku dang gsungs gi snying po gnyis// la la na dang ras nA// a bad+hU tI mchog gi gnas// de gnyis
177b1(rgyud): dbus ma mchog gi mchog/ rnam rtog med pa rlung gi rlung // rtag tu rgyu zhing kun la khyab// rnam rtog gang thob rtag tu ni// las kun byed cing mkhas par 'gyur// rlung gi rang bzhin bye brag ni// brgya dang / 
177b2(rgyud): brgyad la gang rgyal ba// dus kun tu ni 'phel bar rigs// rnal 'byor byis pas mi shes pa// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub// de yis thob par rgyud 'dir gsungs// do ni gang tshe skad cig/ 
177b3(rgyud): thob// de ni skad cig mchog tu gsungs// de yang ji ltar thob par byed// de la rigs pa ru ni brjod// thog mar rnal 'byor pa chen po// blo bzang gis ni zhi gnas sgom// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ 
177b4(rgyud): khro bo'i phyag rgya byas nas kyang // dbang po yi ni sgo dgu la// tham ngas cad du ni kun rdzob pa// hUM bzlas pa ni mtshungs pa med// mchog tu rgyun mi 'chad par ni// zla ba gcig tu bzlas byas
177b5(rgyud): na/ de rjes skad gcig de la thob// gang phyir de ni bzlas bya/ sa na// snying kha'i pad+ma'i 'ang steng bltas 'gro// de nas ga/ sang ba'i pad+ma las// kha sbyor ba ni dbas kyang // rnam par rtog
177b6(rgyud): rlung gnyis ni// de las rnam par bcas nas 'gro// rnam rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// sku gsung rdo rje bcad nas ni// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba ste// sngags kyi de nyid kyis ni 'thob// a ba d+hU ti'i rgyun la
177b7(rgyud): gnas// smin dbus rlung ni phye byas pa// de thob byas pa'i dga' ba ni// rgyun tu 'chang zhing mi zad pa// chags sogs bral zhing zhi ba dang // rang rig bde ba chen po'o// 'dir ni rgyu mtshan bshad par bya/ 
177b8(rgyud): sngags grub pa yi rnal 'byor pas// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs// rtag tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang // gdong ni zangs mdog yid du 'ong // kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang // gra lhags chad pa
178a1(rgyud): la sogs dang // 'jig rten chos dang de bzhin gnas// rnal 'byor sngags kyi de nyid ni// gnod pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
178a2(rgyud): las sku gsum gyi snying po bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// de nyid gsum gyi tshig bstan pa// bdag nyid sngags
178a3(rgyud): sogs byed pa yis// ji lta ba bzhin rim pa rnams// bdag gi de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi rgyu// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa// kun
178a4(rgyud): mkhyen go 'phang mi gsal byed// rigs kyi dbye bas rab gas la byed// rigs ni lnga yi rnam pa gang // de ni phung po'i mtshan nyid do// phra rags la sogs dbye ba yis// thogs bcas thogs
178a5(rgyud): med mtshan nyid dang // 'byung ba chen po bzhi yi dngos// 'di ni/ gzugs kyi phung por gsungs// der ni rnam snang ngo bo dang // thams cad spros par byed pa'i rgyu// bde dang sdug bsngal
178a6(rgyud): mchog tu zhi// grang dang dro ba mchog gi mchog/ gang gis shin tu rig pa ni// de ni tshor ba'i phung por bshad// rin chen 'byung ldan nyid kyi mtshan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spros bdag nyid// glang po
178a7(rgyud): bong bu lce spyang dang // rta dang ri dgas dang ni phag/ pha dang ma dang pha yi sman// mdza' bo snag gi gnyen tshan sogs// gang gis yang dag shes pa ni// 'du shes phung po'i mtshan nyid ni// de bzhin gshegs
178a8(rgyud): pa 'od dpag med// de ni spros pa kun nas gsal// 'gro ba khyab par yongs su shes// dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras bu// gzhan yang lung du ma bstan min// de yi 'du byed du ni bshad// don yong/ 
178b1(rgyud): spro ba'i rang bzhin can// 'khor ba dngos dang dngos med sogs// kun rtog 'byung ba'i bdag nyid can// rnam shes zhes ni rnam par shes// mi bskyod spro ba'i bdag nyid can// de ltar phung po yongs
178b2(rgyud): shes na// lung dang rigs pa'i shes pa skye// dzi na dzi ka dang rat+na d+hika/ a ro li ka dang pradz+nyA d+hika/ badz+ra d+h+rika ces bya ba'i sngags// ci rigs par ni rim bzhin shes// spyan la sogs pa bzhi po gang // de ni/ 
178b3(rgyud): khams gsum yongs su brtag/ sra ba la sogs bzhir phye bas// sa yi khams su yongs su brtag/ gti mug dga' bas mngon par brjod// de yi spyan du yongs su grags// zhu ba ci mchi khu ba
178b4(rgyud): sogs// rdzas kyi bye brag yang dag bsten// chu yi khams su rnam par shes// mA ma kI yi bdag nyid can// dro ba bza' btung smin pa dang // gzi brjid 'phro ba nyid thams cad// me yi
178b5(rgyud): khams su shes par bya// gos dkar spro ba'i bdag nyid can / 'byung ba rngub pa rab tu 'phel// rlung rnams kyi ni tshe/ gas kyi mchog/ brkyang ba dang ni bskum pa dang // steng dang 'og
178b6(rgyud): tu byed pa dag/ de ni rlung gi khams su shes// sgrol ma spro ba'i bdag nyid can// de ltar 'byung ba bzhi po yang // rnal 'byor mchog nyid rnam par shes// mo ha ra ti dwe Sha ra ti// rA ga ra ti badz+ra ra ti// de ltar
178b7(rgyud): rim pas sngags rnams ni// de dag mngon sum chog yis// gzugs la sog pa yul gyi tshogs// lha mo'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du// rnal 'byor mchog gis rnam par shes// stong nyid gcig/ 
178b8(rgyud): bu rgyu gcig pu// sngo ser sogs kyi dbye ba dang // ring dang thung ba'i rnam pa yis// lha mo de gzugs rdo rje ma// phyi rol gzung ba'i rang bzhin can// mkhar rnga sel snyan sdugs rol mo// de bzhin rnga snyan
179a1(rgyud): bi bang dang // bstod dang smad sogs sgra dag ni// sgra yi rdo rje ma zhes bya// gzung ba dang ni rang bzhin mchog/ rnam par shes pa sad par byed// dring ba dang dri bzang dang // sbyar ba'i drim
179a2(rgyud): mchog rnams ni// dri yi rdo rje mar shes bya// gzung ba'i rnam shes cher dmar ba// ro drug mchog tu ldan pa ni// lan tshwa sbyar la sogs dbye yis// rdo rje ro mar de shes bya// kun kyang gzung ba'i rnam pa'o//
