179a3(rgyud): mig sogs dbang po la brten pa// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad du shes// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// mig gnyis sa yi snying
179a4(rgyud): / bopor gsungs// gzugs la sogs pa ci rigs par// rang gi ngo dbo spro bar byed// sgra yi rnam pa thams cad nas// bye brag so so co rigs par// sgra yi rnam par shes pa ni// phyag na rdo rje
179a5(rgyud): yang dag bshad// dri yi bye brag la spyod pa// so sor ji ltar rig pa ni// sna yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// na mkha'i snying por rnam par shes// ro yi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rims
179a6(rgyud): bzhin// lce yi rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug tu ni shes// reg bya'i bye brag la spyod pa// bye brag so'i go rims bzhin// reg bya'i rnam shes mtshan nyid ni// sgrib pa rnam par sel bar shre
179a7(rgyud): yid kyi bye brag la spyod pa// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin// yid kyi rnam shes zhes gsungs pa// 'jam dpal zhes bya'i ming can no// rgyus pa kun la yang dag sbyor// dbye ba so so'i go rims bzhin
179a8(rgyud): bag chags yul gyi bdag nyid can// byams pa ru ni rnam par shes// rtsa rnams so so'i mtshan nyid can// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can// 'di ni kun tu bzang por bshad/ 
179b1(rgyud): de ltar rnam shes tshogs brgyad mchog/ yang dag de nyid bla na med// mig sogs dbang po'i rnam shes ni// gzugs sogs mthong ba'i rang bzhin no// rje rang dpung pa brla thal gong // sgo gnyis dang ni thams
179b2(rgyud): cad kyi// shes pa bcu yi mtshan nyid ni// khyab pa rnams su yongs su shes// gshin rje mthar byed shes mthar byed// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba// dbyug sngon dang ni
179b3(rgyud): stobs po che// gnod mdzes gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur// de ltar de rnams gnas dbye bas// ye shes gsum gyis yongs su gsal// ngo bo gcig tu gyur nas ni// yang dag de kho na nyid rten// gang gis
179b4(rgyud): de nyid cho ga bzhin// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// sngags kyi nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ ye shes chen po lags rgyas pa// skye med zad med mi gsal dang // 'gyur ba med cing sgrib pa
179b5(rgyud): med/ gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang // bde ba chen po'i go 'a phang mchog/ sprul dang btus dang mtha' med dang / mgo med yongs su dbye ba yis// oM dang hUM phaT swA hA'i mtha'
179b6(rgyud): sbrul zhes bya ba mngon par brjod// rang ming yon tan dang ni gzugs// btus pa'i mtshan nyid ming can no// oM la sogs pa zhabs med pa// mtha' med ces bya'i ming can no// sku'i mtha' can oM
179b7(rgyud): med pa// mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin// thams cad yod la oM med pa// mgo med ces ni bshad pa yin// de ltar mtshan nyid shes nas ni// sngags kyi de nyid bla na med// rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brang/ 
179b8(rgyud): nas// 'di yi rgya chen don shes bya// ye shes de nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dbang po thams cad mnyam par sbyor// dngos po thams cad gcig pu'i lus// 
180a1(rgyud): ngag gi rnam rtog kun tu spangs// snang ba thams cad rnam par spangs// bdag byin rlab pa'i rang bzhin can// kun la khyab pa rmad du byung // rang rig pa yi rnal 'byor mchog
180a2(rgyud): skad cig bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni// cha bral kun 'gro khyab pa dang // rnal 'byor byis pa mi shes shing // kun rdzob yongs su mi shes pa// don dam rang gi ngo bo ni// rdzogs pa'i rims pas dbye ba dang // sngags
180a3(rgyud): de nyid ni rab tu gsal// a na de nyid mtha' thig ler// yang dag thim par rnam par sgom// thig le yang ni a la thim// a ni mtha' yi ha tsam la'o// ha yang yi ge hUM la'o// yi ge u ni haM la'o// yi ge ha yang
180a4(rgyud): oM la thim// yi ge a ni thig le tsam// thig le yang ni sgra la thim8// sgra yang sgra tsam la ni'o// sgra tsam mchog ni na mkha' la khro// de yang 'od gsal ba la thim// 'od gsal go 'phang
180a5(rgyud): gsal ba ni// shin tu rnam dag chos dbyings te// gnyis su med ba'i ye shes mchog/ rab tu sad cing rab tu 'char// ngag gi spyod pa rnams dang bral// gnyis pa thams cad rnam pa
180a6(rgyud): spangs// phung po lnga ni gcig pu'i gzhi// 'byung ba lnga ni yang dag bsten// rnam shes brgyad ni tshogs dben pa// phyi yi yul drug bsngos pa ni// rlung bcus shes pa bcu bsdus pa// de ltar mtshan
180a7(rgyud): nyid kun bsdus pa'o// kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang gis bzhugs gnas srid pa gsum// dngos grub kun byed dpal dang ldan// skal ba bzang po kun 'phel ba// rdo rje de ni rdo rje sems// rdo
180a8(rgyud): 'jigs byed dbang phyug dang // ha ru ka dang dus 'khor lo// dang po'i sangs rgyas thub pa che// kun tu bzang po 'jam dpal dang // sna tshogs spro ba'i bdag nyid can// sna tshogs yon tan tshogs kyi gzhi
180b1(rgyud): kun nas spro ba'i rnal 'byor ni// rnal 'byor chen po dri ma med// ye shes de nyid gsal ba ni// rtog pa med cing gnas pa med// chos dbyings 'pho ba zhes bshad do// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid/ 
180b2(rgyud): dag/ skra yi rtse mo brgyad stong 'dra// shin tu gsal zhing 'od gsal ba// lung dang rigs pa'i dbye ba yis// bla ma brgyud pa las ni shes// de ltar de nyid gsum dam tshig/ zhal nas brgyud pa'i rim
180b3(rgyud): ba skye/ gsang ba yi ni ye shes mchog/ bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid skad cig mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las de kho na nyid gsum gyi dam tshig gtan la dpa
180b4(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyen// sna rtse gsum gyi man nyid ni// gsang ba snying kha gdong sna'i ming // gsum po rgyud/ 
180b5(rgyud): las gsal ba ni// 'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor pa yi sgom pa'i rim// shin tu chags pa'i dbang song ba'i// sems kyi bde ba ster bar byed// rlung gi de nyid
180b6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rtsa yi 'khor lo sad par byed// bde ba chen po kun nas skye// khams gsum ro gcig gyur nas ni// dgug dbang cho ga bzhin du bya// byang chub sems ni bde ba che// lhan skyes skad cig mtshwa
180b7(rgyud): nyid ni// rdo rje rtse mor bzung bar bya// de nyid bde ba chen po ste// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs// gsang ba'i sna rtser rdzas thig le// yang dag gzung ba'i bdag nyid
180b8(rgyud): can// chags chen sems ni gcig pa yis// rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la// rtsa yi 'khor lo rim bzhin 'char// de yi lte bsnar ni bshad// gsang bar bde ba thams cad
181a1(rgyud): ster// snying kha'i pad+ma mdab ma brgyad// de yang lte ba snar ni brjod// zhe sdang nyid kyi sems ni sgom// gsang sngags 'bar ba'i ye shes sems// yang dag spro bar byed pa'i rgyu/ 
181a2(rgyud): ngag ni rtog pa kun spangs pa// rmad byung chen po ye shes mchog/ rtag tu sngags ni nad 'byung // rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// bsam gtan la sbyor bde ba'i mchog/ man ngag thob pas bde ba/ 
181a3(rgyud): rgyal// zhe sdang myur du dbang byas nas// zhi ba'i de nyid rgyu gcig ni// zla ba nyi ma me dang gsum// lam gsum gyi ni dbus nas khyab// gdong gi sna ni zhes byar bshad// rlung rnams gnas kyi
181a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang // de la gnas pa'i ye shes che// thig la mu tig gis gnon yin// bsam gtan gti mug ma dacho ga las rgyal// dngos po thams cad rnam par spangs// ye shre
181a5(rgyud): lnga yi bdag nyid gsal// de kho na nyid lnga brten mchogad yi 'od zer thig le tsam// gdong gi sna rtser yang dag/ brten// rnal 'byor mchog ni bsgom par bya// gti mug rgya
181a6(rgyud): mtsho las ni rgyal// de nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi// ming can du ni yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid can// rnal 'byor mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/ 
181a7(rgyud): gti mug mun pa rnams 'joms pa// kun mkhyen rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi rigs gnas na// sna rtse bu ga las byung zhing // rlung lnga stang du yang dag rgyu// kun rdzob lngar ni rgyu ba yi// 
181a8(rgyud): sgod las ni rnam par byung // g.yon dang g.yas dang gnyis ka dang // dal bar rgyu dang rnam pa bzhi// g.yas pa las ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar ba bzang po/ 
181b1(rgyud): 'dil pad+ma mgon po rgyu ba'o// g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dres pa// ljang ser dag tu snang ba ste// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor nyid// rin chen mgon po rgyu ba'o// 
181b2(rgyud): dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni// 'di ni chu yi dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje mgon po rgyu ba'o// khams gsum las ni yang dag byung // rten dang brtan par bzung ba ni// 
181b3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rang bzhin te// 'chi ba'i mthar ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag ni// mnyam par gzhag pas rtag tu zlos// sngags bzlas pa yis grangs kyis ni// nyin
181b4(rgyud): mtshan rtag tu zlos pa yin// de ltar rlung ni sna rtser ni// kha do// ga lnga par rnam par sgom// gnyis med mchog gi rnal// 'byor gyis// 'od zer tshogs ni dri ma med// de yis zhi sogs
181b5(rgyud): bya ba ni// rim gyis sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sem sa dang 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar 'gro mgon la// de nas lag na rdo rjes zhus// thig le gsum gyi gzhung
181b6(rgyud): lugs ni// khyod zhabs bsnyen bkur gyis 'tshal na// 'di la cung zad the tsom mchis// srid pa mthar mdzad gsal bar mdzad// rdzas dang sngags dang de bzhin rlung // thig le gsum ni bsgom
181b7(rgyud): pa na/ rnal 'byor pa gcig nyid dam ni// yang na rnal 'byor so sor sgom// de la the tshom kun gcod gtso// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// yun ring chags chen dbang song bas// srid
181b8(rgyud): pa gsum du skyob pa rnams// de dag 'gro ba'i don du ni// rdzas kyi thig la gsungs pa yin// zhe sdang chen po dbang song ba// mi gang mi srun pa yi lus// de rnams myur du grol don du// sngags kyi thig
182a1(rgyud): ler gsungs pa yin// gti mug chen pos kun nas 'khrul// srid pa'i rgya mtsho las skyob gang // de dag dngos grub brgyad 'bras bu// thob phyir ye shes rgya mtsho ni// rlung gi thig le
182a2(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// yang dag de nyid spros pa ni// de ltar yang dag thig le gsum// bsam pa ji bzhin sbyor ji bzhin// tshe 'di nyid la grub don du// sgrib pa thams cad dag pa'i phyir// rtse gcig pa yi sems kyi
182a3(rgyud): ni// ye shes gsum gnas nyams dga' ba// me tog 'bras bu chu yis rgyan// skye bos dben pa'i ri yi rtser// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
182a4(rgyud): dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sna'i rtse mo gsum ga/ tan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad kyis nyon// stong nyid ye shes
182a5(rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// lus la gnas pa de nyid mchog/ thams cad bad gnyid rtag tu bzhugs// chos rnams thams cad snang bar khyed// mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'dod// de las ye shes bde
182a6(rgyud): ba che/ 'od gsal ba ni rnam dag pa// gang phyir a ba d+hU tIr zhugs// yang dag stong pa nyid du 'dod// chos rnams rnam rtog snang ba mched// rtog pa thams cad gcod par byed// rnam rtog rlung gi ngal bso ba// 
182a7(rgyud): de ni stong pa nyid du bshad// gtso bo chen po mi bskyod pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni de nyid do// der ni rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sa// srog gi ye shes ming can te// gzugs med drag po chen po yi// zhi ba'i rang
182a8(rgyud): bzhin mtshan nyid can// de la ye shes bde ba che// byang chub sems kyis gang nyid// de nyid bde chen go 'phang gnas// ye shes yang dag byang chub sems// de la sogs pa ming gi sgras// brjod pa gcig/ 
182b1(rgyud): bu bde ba che// dngos po gcig dang ldan pa nyid// stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod// bde ba can zhes de la bshad// bde ba dge ba'i thob mtshan nyid// gang de bde bar gnas pa ni// de ni bde ba can zhes
182b2(rgyud): brjod// tshe dpag med pa'i zhing khams na// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi mchog/ byang chub sems ni tshe dpag med// de las byung ba'i skye ba'i 'od// de phyir 'od dpag med du shes// bde ba kun gyi gzhi yi
182b3(rgyud): mchog stong nyid rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ de nyid mnyam par sbyor ba ni// stong nyid ye shes zhes ni brjod// shes rab pad+ma la la na// zla mtshan nyi ma 'bab pa na// de yang stong par rnam par shes// gnyis pa
182b4(rgyud): / thams cad rnam par spangs// thabs kyi rdo rje ras na// zla ba shu dkra rab tu 'bab// de ni ye shes mchog tu gsungs// ba de pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ de gnyis sbyor ba mchog tu
182b5(rgyud): stong nyid ye shes mi zad pa// zla ba nya dang de nyid yin// rnal 'byor/ ma yi zhal las shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi tshig
182b6(rgyud): bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// lus ni stong pa nyid kyi gnas// lus ni gang gis shes pa ni// lha rnams kun gyi
182b7(rgyud): pho brang mchog/ longs spyod chos dang sprul pa dang // bde ba chen po yi ni rten// 'khor lo yang ni gang bshad pa// rim pa ji bzhin ma lus pa// de ltar rtag tu yang dag bzhugs// thi ma dang longs spyod
182b8(rgyud): bdag po ni// lha nyid mchog tu gnyis su med// yang dag ngo bo'i go 'phang rten// ye shes chen po'i go 'phang phyir// bde ba chen po'i yang dag rten// zhe sdang che dang gti mug che// phra dog tshe dang chags
183a1(rgyud): dngos kyis// khro bo che dang rnam pa'i mchog/ 'khor ba'i mdud pa nges gcod pa// sa dang chudang de bzhin me// rlung dang na mkha'i dbye ba yis// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ 
183a2(rgyud): ro dang reg bya nyid dang ni// chos kyi dbyings dang mig bzang dang // rna ba sna dang lce dang ni// lus kyi rnam shes chos dang ni// kun gzhi nyon mongs can gyi ying // dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin/ 
183a3(rgyud): shes rab dbang po'i dbye ba yis// da stobs brtson 'grus stobs dang ni// dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzin stobs// shes rab stobs ni bla na med// ji bzhin gnas su yang dag shes// lus kyi lhar
183a4(rgyud): gsal ba yin// sngon bzhin ming gi dbye ba yis// sngags kyi dbye bas rim pa dang // sngags dgod pa yi rnal 'byor gyis // rim bzhin gnas kyi dbye ba yis// lung gis rnam par nges
183a5(rgyud): byas pa'i// yang dag gnas kyi dbye ba dang // lha mo rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// bdag la byin rlabs go 'phang gnas// 'jo kha lnga la longs spyod cing // rab tu 'bad te mchod pa byas// 
183a6(rgyud): rdo shing sa yi rang bzhin gyi// phyi rol lha la phyag mi bya// bdag la byin rlabs rim de nyid// gzhan du srid pa gsum na med// de kho na nyid rnal 'byor mchog/ bdag la byin rlabs sgrib med pa// sngags
183a7(rgyud): dang phyag rgya'i rim pa sogs// phyi yi dngos po mi bsgreng ste// de nyid thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu ni// 'bad pas byin gyis brlab par 'dod// bdag byin rlob thabs mtshan/ 
183a8(rgyud): nyid do// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las lus kyi lha ye shes kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang lhan
183b1(rgyud): yi// de rnams kyi ni ming bshad bya// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// rtsa yi rim pa'i grangs kyis ni// las dang rdo rje pad+ma dang // 'khor lo la sogs rigs dbye bas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba sri/ 
183b2(rgyud): rtsa yi rim pas yang dag bzhugs// 'dir ni rigs ni lnga par yang // de kho na nyid nyams myong mchog/ tshor ba nyams su myong ba yi// thams cad la ni khyab par gnas// sprul pa rang gi rigs
183b3(rgyud): las skyes// lha mo 'di dag yang dag zhugs// mkhyen ma gtum mo dpa' mo ma// las sgrol ba dang yid btsugs ma// 'khrul 'khor ma dang 'bud ma dang // snying stobs yang dag sangs rgyas ma// 
183b4(rgyud): rab dang ma dang yid 'ong ma// grub ma sprul 'tsho sgra ma dang // ga ter 'dzin lha yi dbang phyug ma// ge sar pad+ma dri med ma// rlung gi lu gu brgyud byed ma// bzang mo dang ni khra yi gdong // gnyid
183b5(rgyud): log ma dang mi 'phel ma// 'phar ma sngo sangs dus mtshan ma// rtse 'joms ma dang skal bzang 'phel// na ga dze na byi gdong / ma// chags mi dga' ma rnam sgeg ma// brtson 'grus dang / 
183b6(rgyud): 'phel dkar mo dang // bdud rtsi lnga ni 'phel ba ma// dngos 'bebs shin tu dpa' mo dang // pad+ma lnga dang 'dod ma dang // sgyu ma yid 'ong mdza mo dang // skyur dang chang gi dbang phyug ma// mi bzad che dang lba
183b7(rgyud): skal bzang // me tog bzang mo gdug rmongs ma// steng gzigs zhal dang rtse gsum mtshan// mdzes ma dang ni ldang ba skyod ma// rtag bam ma dang gar ma dang // ri dgas mig dang chags dga' ma// 
183b8(rgyud): sna tshogs rmongs par rol pa mo// dkar mo 'jig rten gsum pa mo// ro bla na dri med 'gro bstun ma// ral ga rnams ni yang dag bzhugs// rtag tu brgyad dang spel ba'i grangs// zhal gsum phyag drug dri
184a1(rgyud): ma med// rigs kyi phyag rgya dbye ba yis// mtshon cha rnams kyis yang dag brgyad// de dag sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas// g.yon pa 'gying bas ud pa la// g.yas na 'khor lo rin chen
184a2(rgyud): dang // de bzhin ral gri chos 'byung ni// g.yon gyi phyag gnyis la ni 'gyur// sems dpa'i skyil drung gis legs bzhugs// zhal ni ljang kun spyan gsum pa// don yod grub pa'i cod pan can// zhal
184a3(rgyud): rnams bzhad par sgom pa dang // bde ba thams cad 'phel bar byed// rang gi ming gi dbye ba yis// yi ge gsum dang rnam par spel// sngags kyis kyang ni yang dag mchod// 'dod pa'i de nyid rab stsol
184a4(rgyud): mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa brgyad dbus// lha 'di dag ni yang da dag bzhugs// rdor dbyings dbang phyug lA ma dang // rdo rje phya ga rgya stobs chen mo// rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje gdong // rdo rje chos ma rdo rje
184a5(rgyud): bzang // rdo rje rol mor shes par bya// chos kyi 'khor lor dag/ bdag nyid// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa dang // saM/ mas dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// rdo rje 'khor
184a6(rgyud): rin chen dang // g.yas pa yi ni phyag na 'dzin// g.yon na ral gri pad+ma dang // dril bu 'dzin pa bla na med// sku mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// rang ming yi ge gsum
184a7(rgyud): dang spel// sngags kyis de dag rab tu mchod// longs spyod mdab ma bcu drug la// pad+ma'i dbus na lha rnams bzhugs// pad+ma'i sgrol ma pad dkar mo// pad+ma ku mu da 'phel ma// pad+ma'i spyan dang pad
184a8(rgyud): gtsug bud// pad+ma'i phreng ba pad skyes ma// bad gdan pad+ma'i dra ba ma// de bzhin pad+ma'i 'od dang ni// pad+ma'i spyan dang bad bzang ma// pad+ma'i nang bzhugs par skyes ma// pad+ma'i ge sar pad+ma ma// de ltar 'di ni
184b1(rgyud): yang dag bshad// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// g.yas na pad+ma 'khor lo dang // rdo rje yang ni 'debs par mdzad// g.yon na ral gri
184b2(rgyud): dril bu dang // rin po che yi rnam par sgeg/ spyan gsum rnam par 'char ba dang // pad+ma dmar po'i mdog ltar dmar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyer bzhugs shing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhug
184b3(rgyud): rang ming yi ge gsum dang bcas// 'di rnams sngags ni bla na med// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo tshe// pad 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis la// rtag tu lha mo rnams ni bzhugs// rab tu sad pa 'bad pa can// 'khor
184b4(rgyud): le'i shugs ma rdo rje ldan// rin chen sgrol ma bar zhugs ma// tshogs las ma gti mug dga'// zhe sdang rdo rje dga' chagadas ma// rdo rje las chags gzugs rdo rje// sgra yi rdo rje re rdo rje/ 
184b5(rgyud): reg bya rdo rje chos dbyings ma// spyan 'od ma dang thod dbyangs ma// sna/ yi snang ba ro dga' ma// sku yi rgya mtshan yid dga' ma// khams bcas ma dang rgyu 'bab ma// gshin rje 'joms
184b6(rgyud): pa'i blo yi ni// bye brag rnam par rgyas ma dang // pad+ma'i ral pa gyen du brdzes// bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo// sbas pa'i mthil dang dbyug sngon ma// shin tu bstan ma stobs chen ma
184b7(rgyud): rang byung ma dang 'khor lo'i gtsug/ de ltar rtsa yi dbus nas shar// slar yang lha mo zhal gsum dang // phyag drug bde ba 'phel ba can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang bzhugs// dri med pad+ma dkar
184b8(rgyud): mo'i mdog/ zhi ba zhal gsum spyan gsum pa// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa ni// 'khor lo lcags kyu rdo rje rim// de bzhin g.yon pa'i phyag gsum la// pad+ma zhags pa rin po che// 'char dang
185a1(rgyud): 'debs dang sgeg par mdzad// pad+ma dkar po 'dra ba'i 'od// spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad 'chang // rang gi ming dang yig gsum ming // 'di dag sngags ni go rims bzhin// de nyid
185a2(rgyud): mchog ni rab tu gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa ni// de lta bu yi sdom pa mchog/ lha mo rnams kyi de nyid mchog/ rtag tu gnyid log lus la gnas// 'dod pa lnga yi longs spyod bsten// 
185a3(rgyud): mchod pa nyid kyis yang dag mnyes// rdo rje pad+ma'i bde bas myos// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog/ mnyes nas slar yang gso bar byed// de yi zhi sogs bya ba rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med
185a4(rgyud): bsam gtan rnal 'byor sogs spyod dang // sngags dbyibs la sogs bya ba ni// dgos med mchog tu cung zad ni// bla ma'i lung las yang dag skyes// de phyir rdo rje slob dpon ni// 'bad pas
185a5(rgyud): dngos grub kyis mnyes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las 'khor lo bzhi'i lha mo/ bzhi rim pa rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// 
185a6(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'char dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa rnams kyis ni rnal 'byor mchog/ dngos grub thams cad kyi ni gnas// mdun gnas pa yi yul rnams las// yid la byed pa/ 
185a7(rgyud): der mi 'gro/ sngon gyi bgo chags nang gnas pa// de tshe dbang po rab tu gsal// de yis da ni rab tu sad// de rnams rtsal rim bzhin gnas// rab sad de yis sad byas nas// lha mo rang yang 'khor lo las/ 
185a8(rgyud): de yis 'char ba'i rim par gsungs// nub pa yang ni bshad par bya// yul rnams kyang ni dngos bral med// yid la byed nas gzhan du gnas// bag chags kyang ni sad mi sad// rtsa rnams 'char bar mi 'gyur
185b1(rgyud): zhing // lha rnams yang dag sang par ni// de yi phyir ni mi 'gyur te// snying gi dbus nas bde ba'i dngos// sangs rgyas nyi ma gsal ba'i 'od// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis kyang // de ni 'od zer bcu/ 
185b2(rgyud): gnyis te// 'od 'phel 'od zer gzi brjid ma// gsal ba 'bar ma 'od 'bar ma// mig la sogs pa la brten nas// phyi rol gzugs sogs 'dzin pa'o// mun sel 'od ma snang ba mo// gsal mdzes
185b3(rgyud): gsal 'od nyi ma gsal// phyi rol gzugs sogs rnam pa'o// drug pa 'di dag 'og tu 'dod// lha mo rnams ni gang 'char ba 'ang // ye shes nyi ma 'char ba yin// de yang yang dag nub pa ni// de yang mchog tu
185b4(rgyud): nub pa'o// 'char ba nub pa rnams 'chad pa// go 'phang mchog/  tu shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po legs par sad// sa dngas rgyas nyi ma sdom pa'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor de nyid mchog/ 'cha
185b5(rgyud): dang nub pa'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje gsang ba'i rjes 'brangs nas// rA ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las 'char ba dang nub pa'i le'u
185b6(rgyud): ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// dga' ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' go 'phang mchog
185b7(rgyud): de ni rtsa yi 'khor lo la// slar yang rgyas dang bsdus pa yis// 'khor lo bzhi yi yang dag sbyor// rtsa rnams brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa// mtshams kyi rtsa yi rim pa yang // rtsa ni bcu drug la yang brten// bzhi
185b8(rgyud): dang bzhi yis rtag tu khyab// de rnams dga' bo'i rim pa'o// chu khams khong du chud pa can// pad+ma'i rnal ma lta bu yis// de ni de yis khyab byas shing // bde ba chen po phan par byed// 'khor lo so so ngas
186a1(rgyud): ba yis// cha bzhi pa yi yi ge ha// shin tu phra ba'i cha rtag tu// khyab pa brten gyi tshul du gnas// rim pa bzhi yi dbye ba las// rim pa bcu drug dbye bas 'thob// 'phro ba'i bdag nyid rmad
186a2(rgyud): byung ba'o// ro cig pa'i go 'phang 'thob// rim gyis so sor nyams myong las// sna tshogs chu yi sbyor ba las// rims gyis rgya mtsho chu bzhin du// sbyor ba bzhi yi 'khor lo'i dus// dga' ba bzhi ni de la
186a3(rgyud): brjod// rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod pa las// go 'bang mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dga' ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu
186a4(rgyud): pa'o// // de nas gzhan ya dang yang dag nyon// rdo rje bstan pa'i lus kyis ni// rtag tu rtsan mas kyi ni rgyun// de kho na nyid ngas bshad bya// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa
186a5(rgyud): bzhi ni// rtsa ni rtag tu rmad byung ba// byang chub sems ni 'bab pa shes// bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel// rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// khrag 'bab par ni shes
186a6(rgyud): pabar bya// nyi ma 'pho ba'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu rmad du byung ba'i rtsa// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// rlung rgyu bar ni shes par bya// rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyud las ni// lus kyi gnas ni dbye ba yis// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhir
186a7(rgyud): brjod/ thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyid// grangs ni bdun cu rtsa gnyis brjod// re re'ang 'khor lo stong stong ngo // thim pa longs spyod bdag 'dor ba// gtso bo yang ni bsdus pa las// gnas rnams kyi ni grangasu 'gyur/ 
186a8(rgyud): slar yang bsdus nas 'gro ba ni// gsum po brgyad brgya dbye ba'ang ni// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbye ba dang // thun tshod skad cig sbyor ba yis// rtsa rnams gong nas gong du ni// nang du 'gro bar shes par bya// g.yon pa
186b1(rgyud): byang chub zla ba 'bab// g.yas pa khrag dang nyi ma 'bab// dbus na rlung rgyu ba yis ni// me sad byed par shes par bya// la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU ti zhes bya'i ming // de rnams spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// re re'i
186b2(rgyud): rim gyis thun brgyad brgyad// gsum po nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gro// thim dang longs spyod bdag po'i phyir// rims kyis grangs ni bdun cu gnyis// slar yang de spro sbyor ba yis// re re'ang stong stong dbye ba yis// 
186b3(rgyud): rtag tu grangs nyid 'gyur ba ni// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis so// gtso bo gsum po slar yang ni// sbyor bar gcig pa nyid du 'gro// dang po las ni rnal 'byor pas// phra ba de ni shes par dka'// bsam gyis mi/ 
186b4(rgyud): khyab mchog tu ni// thig le nA da rnam par spangs// bde ba kun gyi gzhi gsang ba// srog gi rten gyi mtshan nyid dang // rdo rje dbyings dkyi dbang phyug dang // dus kyi rtsa ni rnam par bshad// ro cig go 'a/ 
186b5(rgyud): bdag nyid can// rnal 'byor ma si rgyud las shes// rnal 'a ra chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa la sa rba'i 'bab pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum/ 
186b6(rgyud): cu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// mtshams kyi rtsa yi ngo bo nyid// rtsa rnams sdom pa 'char ba ni// gang gis shes na rtag tu ni// mchog tu dga' ba nyams
186b7(rgyud): myong ba// lha yi ye shes gsal bar byed// lha yi sngags su yang dag sbyor// lha yi rnal 'byor don nges pa// de nyid gsum sbyor dri ma med// de gsum gcig car bdag nyid sdom// 'jig rten gsum du khyab cing
186b8(rgyud): pra/ lus kun la ni yang dag brten// ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems// gang phyir dam tshig sems dpa' bde// rnal 'byor mchog tu shes par bya// khyab pa'i de nyid rmad byung ba// mchog rab mchog dang phra ba dang
187a1(rgyud): rang byung ye shes mi zad pa// byang chub sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab// rtsa ni thams cad mchog tu rgyas// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas// cha kun bdag nyid rtsu ba ni// de yi dbus su/ 
187a2(rgyud): rtsa gsum ste// gtso bo yang ni yang dag bshad// zla ba nyi ma me rgyu ba// 'byung ba thams cad la ni khyab// ji ltar shing rtsa cung zad cig/ sa la brtan par gnas pa na// sdong bu yal ga 'dab phre'u// sogs pa yis/ 
187a3(rgyud): ni kun nas khyab// de bzhin skyes bu mgor ldan pas// phung po khams la sogs tshogs la// mchog tu kun nas khyab pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dngos// de kho na nyid gsum sdom pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang
187a4(rgyud): gti mug dang // rang bzhin mtshan nyid dbye ba gsum// mtshan mo nyi don mo mtshams kyis kyang // dam tshig mtshan nyid rnam pa ga sum// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun ni// gsum phyed dam tshig
187a5(rgyud): mtshan nyid dang // stong nyid ye shes rdo rje ni// rnam gsum de nyid ma chen nyid do// rgyu dang 'bras bu nye 'khor ni// rnal 'byor gsum gyi mtshan nyid do// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa ni// gsum phye
187a6(rgyud): khams gsum bsdus pa'o// 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams// 'jig rten gsum po'i mtshan nyid do// rtsa ba gsum dang 'bras bu gcig/ rim bzhin gyur nas chos 'khor 'gro// de ni
187a7(rgyud): sprul pa gsum du gsal// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis// gang tshe de la rab sbyor ba// de ni gzas zin mtshan nyid do// gang tshe cung zad sbyor ba na// de tshe phyed 'dzin mtshan nyid do// gang phyir srog ni rlung
187a8(rgyud): bcom na// de tshe 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid yin// rtsa yi gtso bo'ang nyid rnams ni// gsum po nges pa zhes ni bya// rgyas par rnal 'byor ma rgyud las// rnal 'byor pa yis gsal por shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud/ 
187b1(rgyud): dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi rtsa gsum gyi nges pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// rlung skye ba yi man+ta/ 
187b2(rgyud): nyid ni// dus kyi glags ni brtsal ba na// ji ltar dngos su yang dag shes// bag chags nyon mongs can gyi yid// rang gi ngo bo gzugs gzhan mthong // don ni shes par mi shes shing // rlung tsam gcig
187b3(rgyud): pus rmongs pa'o// kun gzhi rnam shes bkug nas ni// bag chags nang du rnam par spyod// bag chags kyis ni rnam shes bzung // bag chags dang 'dres rim pa las// nang gi bag chags bgos pa yis// de
187b4(rgyud): rnams zla mtshan dus su ni// mngal gyi rtsal 'jug pa na// rdo rje khu khrag zhu thig le// 'dres pa ru ni gyur pa dang // kun gzhi las ni rnam shes skye// ji ltar chang ros myos pa bzhin// kun gzhi rnam
187b5(rgyud): shes bag chags las// rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni skye// nyon mo/ ngas can ni srog rlung nyid// skad cig gcig la yang dag 'a gro/ thog mar 'phro ba'i dus su ni// nya yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur/ 
187b6(rgyud): 'pho ba gnyis pa'i dus su ni// slar yang khrag dang 'dres pa ni// steng dang 'og gi dbye ba yis// srog gi rlung ni gnyis su 'gro// thur sel rlung gi 'gro 'ong la// ru sbal rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas 'phog
187b7(rgyud): gsupa la// khrag dang khu ba zos pa na// thur du sel ba'i rlung gi tshogs// bskams nas gyen du rlung ni 'byung // steng du kha bltas nas ni gnas// phag rgod 'dra ba'i lus 'chang 'gyur// slar yang 'pho ba bzhi
187b8(rgyud): pab la// khrag dang khu ba bsgos pa ni// gyen tu rgyu ba'i rlung bkug nas// 'og tu kha bltas nas ni 'gro// seng ge'i rnam pa yis kyang ni// khyab byed rlung ni spro bar byed// de nas 'pho ba lnga pa la// khrag dang khu ba
188a1(rgyud): // 'phel nas ni// mnyam gnas rlung ni 'dar nas ni// me yi gzugs red rim bzhin 'gro// mnyam gnas rlung gi khyab byed spro// gang gis 'gul dang 'dar bar 'gyur// phung po
188a2(rgyud): ni rdzogs pa na// de ltar gsungs pa de las slar// 'pho ba drug pa'i dus chod la// sa yi khams dang mig gnyis dang // khyab byed rlung gis klu rlung spro// rlung gi dngos po 'phel bar byed// de nas 'pho ba
188a3(rgyud): bdun pa la// chu yi khams dang sA bug dod// klu yi rlung gis rul sbal rlung // spros nas gnyis su med pa'i spyod// de nas 'pho ba brgyad pa la// me dang sA yi bu kha 'byed// ru sbal rlung gi rtsangs rlung spro// 
188a4(rgyud): rang gi rang bzhin shes par byed// de nas 'pho ba dgu pa la// rlung dgi khams dang ro ni tshor// rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung chen pos // lha sbyin rlung ni spro bar byed// de rjes 'pho ba bcu pa la// lha sbyin
188a5(rgyud): rlung gis gzhu rgyal spro// rlung kun bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid can// dgu pa'i dbus na khyab pa'i khams// phra zhing thogs med mtshan nyid can// rtsa dang sgyu ma rgyus pa'i sbubs// sgo ni dgu pa
188a6(rgyud): rgyas par byed// lus kyi mchog tu tshor ba dang // gcig tu reg pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin// rab sad mchog ni nam mkha' la// 'od gsal bzang po yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa bcu/ 
188a7(rgyud): de lta bu nyid bshad par bya// 'pho ba bcu ni sa bcu ste// rim pa yis ni rnam par shes// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// b+ha ga phyag rgya chen por brjod// byis pa yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad
188a8(rgyud): mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// mgo bo'i sgra ni bregs pa dang // phru ma'i chos gos dmar po bgos// dpal dang ldan pa thal mo sbyar// spyi bo sa la gtugs pa phyag/ mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis 'chang // 
188b1(rgyud): dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus rgyan// ye shes chen po legs par sad// 'du byed thob pa grol dang bcas// dpa' bo chen po rnam rtog med// bskyed byed sha ni 'jigs par byed// bdud rtsi lnga ni ye shes
188b2(rgyud): che/ rtag tu bdud rtsi lnga myang byed// dngos po thams cad rnam spangs la// rnal 'byor seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di gnyis mchog ni gsang ba ste// gang du yang ni ma gsungs so// rlung skyes pa yi nges pa ni// bla ma
188b3(rgyud): brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gis bskyed pa skyes bu skye ba 'jug pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// / 
188b4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rlung rnams mchog tu nub pa ni// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// 'chi ba'i skad cig man don nyid ni// phan tshun du ni yang dag sdud// skye ba'i rim ltar thim pa
188b5(rgyud): 'gyur// rlung rnams yang dag skye ba ni// phan tshun nub pa'i nyi ma bzhin// thog mar lo bcu lon nas ni// rgyags pa'i myo sa pa'i rlung skyes nas// gzhu las rgyal ba'i rlung zos te// rim/ 
188b6(rgyud): gyis sgra gcan zla ba bzhin// de rjes lo bcu phyin pa ni// rgyags chu rlung gis yang dag skye// lha sbyin zhes bya'i rlung ni za// rlung gi rim pa lnga ma bzhin// gzhan yang lo bcu phyin pa ni// rgyags pa'i chu
188b7(rgyud): rlung skyes par 'gyur// rtsangs pa zhes bya'i rlung ni za// de nas gzhan yang lo bcu phyin// lo las skyes pa'i rim pa yis// btang bzung rlung ni chen po yis// ru sbal rlung ni za bar byed// klu yi rlung dang btang bzung rlub
188b8(rgyud): stobs dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa'i phyir// dus gzhan lo bcur phyin pa na// gnod pa byed par mi nus te// stobs dang nus pa mtshungs pa'i phyir// gang gis gang la gnod pa ni// byed pa nyid du mi nuso// bcu bgan/ 
189a1(rgyud): du byin pa'o// long ba btang bzung stobs chen thob// klu yi rlung ni rim gyis za// de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin na// khrag dang shi ni rnam par 'phel// rgyags shing myos pa'i rim pa yis
189a2(rgyud): btang bzung rlung ni za bar byed// de rjes lo bcu lon pa na// myos chu rlung ni bkun nas ni// tshil dang kha chu rnam par 'phel// de yis btang bzung klu za byed// de nas bcu pa gzhan phyin pa// lo la btang bzung chu
189a3(rgyud): stobs skyes// myos pa'i dus rlung za bar byed// me dang rlung ni 'phel bar byed// btang bzung rlung nyid rnam gyur nas// longs spyod chen po 'phel gyur nas// de nas lo bcu gzhan lon nas// rlung gis lus rgyu
189a4(rgyud): lci bar 'gyur// chu dang rlung ni 'dres pa ni// khyab cing sgrib byas rim pa las// de las lo bcu gzhan du phyin// chu shing 'bras bu gnyin du med// rtsa ba dang bcas med par 'gyur// las kyi rnam smin
189a5(rgyud): mtha' yis ni// de ltar rim pa bcu pa yis// zla ba'am ni nyon// ga gzhan// tshe ni nyang ngur byas nas ni// srog zad par ni/ shes par bya// mkha' gro sdud pa'i rgyud las ni// shin tu rgyu/ 
189a6(rgyud): par shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rlung gi rim pas srog zad pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o// 
189a7(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon// chen po'i chen po ye shes mchog/ bsdu ba'i mkha 'gro rnal 'byor mchog/ snying pos snying po'i don bsdus pa// gang phyir mkha' gro mas bsdus pa// de phyir bsdus pa'i
189a8(rgyud): mkha 'gro brjod// lte ba'i dbus na rtag bzhugs pa// nyi ma stong dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// kun rtog thams cad 'joms par byed// char pas phung po'i rnam rtog ni// bsregs byas bar chad med pa'i lus// 
189b1(rgyud): /  mi gas rdzas na// dal byo sa byed pa // rnal byu 'i ma ba gas pa pa mam gros pa
189b2(rgyud): 'an // nus gnon ya bshid kyis chon// rnaMs tsug tshunanas/ ba ga chod// nyin du mtshan shes // 'argya / 
189b3(rgyud): // rgyun pas ngon nas/ kA byu sa gcod byed// rnal bya na mchog can// khams da/ nga nga bar byed// the tsom pa ma sna na// rnam
189b4(rgyud): rig pas mchog tu sgrub// de nas dbyangs med migo ta// shin tu rgya che bzlas par bya// gang phyir ma du ba 'joms byed cing // bde ba skye ba ster bar byed// demis rnam tog thams cad ni// skad cig gi ni
189b5(rgyud): gcod par byed// rnal 'byor rje su rnal 'byor dang / shin durna la 'byor rnal 'byor mo// de song bye ba ba co brgyad kyis// dang sa sbyor ba bsgom par bya// bcu bdun rjes su rnal 'byor sogs/ de las dkyis
189b6(rgyud): 'khor rgya lo mchog ni// rnol 'byor mchog la dbye ba lnga/ de las kyong ni las rgyal mchog rnal 'byor dbye ba 'acu gnyis// de nyid dbye ba bzhi bsrung gu/ bskyed pa jom bsdus pa yis/ mngon sum
190a1(rgyud): byed pa'i rnal 'byor ro// de la rdo rje bzlas rim mchog/ rdzogs rims rnal 'byor yan lag ni// rnam par rtog pa 'joms byed pa// phra ba'i de nyid bla na med// cho ga ji bzhin rnal 'byor pa/ 
190a2(rgyud): blo dang ldan pas sngon bzhin sgom// srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par byed// rnal 'byor chen po ye shes che// nges par bsgoms pas yang dag ni// rnam rtog rlung ni 'joms par byed// don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa/ 
190a3(rgyud): yis// dngos med ngo bo gcig pa dang // stong nyid brten pa mngon par zhe na// sgom pa nges par brtan par byed// sgrub pos yang dag sgom byas na// rdo rje bzlas rim bla na med// de mi rim bzhin ye shes mchog
190a4(rgyud): thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyu dang / dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rnam par rtog/ dpa'i rlung gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga
190a5(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gzhan ma bshad kyis nyon// rnam rtog med pa'i rlu shar na// gang shes rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rang dngos go 'phang bzang po 'thob// rnam
190a6(rgyud): rtog med pa'i rlung chen po// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ sgom dang sgom min go 'phang bral// rnal 'byor chen po'i ye shes che// gnas pa med cing dri ma med// 
190a7(rgyud): phra ba'i cha kun dbus na gnas// thig lend rnam par spangs// kun la khyab cing zhi ba dang // bdag byin rlabs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig/ mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnams las grol// bag chags rnam rtog/ 
190a8(rgyud): rnam par spangs// tshigs dang mdud pa'i cha yi lam// sgom dang sgom bya rnam par spangs// stong nyid ye shes mtshan nyid do// sngags dang phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i cha// rnam pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// bya ba
190b1(rgyud): spyod pa rnal 'byor gyi// rlung rnams la yang bklag mi bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud chen po// bshad par bya ba dam tshig mchog/ man ngan rdzi bzhin chog bzhin// thog ma nyid du bshad par rigs// 
190b2(rgyud): de yi rim pa rjes 'gro shas// bla ma brgyud pa'i go 'phang mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rnam rtog med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// 
190b3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rtsa rnams nub pa'i rnal 'byor ni// de kho na nyid bshad kyis nyon// yul dang dbang po yang dag sbyor// rtsa rnams kyang ni 'char bar 'gyur// shar nas sngon bzhin song
190b4(rgyud): mig bskyed pa'i rim pa bla na med// rnam rtog skye ba de yi phy-i// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag pa'i rim// de las skyed dang na dang na// 'chi zhing slar yang ldog par 'gyur// yul rnams da
190b5(rgyud): bo med pa yis// sbyangs pa'i ye shes de nyid phyir// de nyid dal spyod pa'i phyir// dngos su yul rnams dngos med byi ra// dbang po rnams ni skye ba min// de las gnyis gnyis
190b6(rgyud): yang dag sbyor// dngos dang dngos med stong pa nyid// de nas rtsa rnams nub 'gyur te// 'khor lo'i rim pa la yang rten// de rnams bsdus pa las ni zhi// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni// kun kyang
190b7(rgyud): rtsa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// de nyid kun chas nang du khyab// stong nyid sgom pa rnal 'byor las// yul rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid// nges pa ru ni shes pa zhes// rigs pa'i rdo rjes rnam par 'joms// rnal 'byor
190b8(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rtsa rnams nub pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// 
191a1(rgyud): sbyor drug go 'phang mtshan nyid ni// ji lta ji lta ba bzhin sbyor// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yan lag brten// rnam pa drug po de las phyed// de bzhin brgyad brgyad de las lhag/ brgyad gnyis
191a2(rgyud): brgyad phrag bzhi dang ni// de ltar grangs kyis sbyor ba gsal// zla ba byed pa'i cha lta bu// stong nyid rlung gi 'khor lor gnas// phyed pa ma yin rdzogs pa min// chu yi zla ba lta bur snang // sgyu ma chen po 'gro/ 
191a3(rgyud): ba'i ma// thams cad rten pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rlung gi 'khor lo srog ces bshad// mkhas pa rnams kyi spyod yul min// me yi 'khor lo stong nyid khyab// dbus na thig le lta bu ni// mi 'gyur kun
191a4(rgyud): tu 'gro ba dang // rang byung kun la khyab pa dang // bde ba yang dga' daphel bar byed// dbyangs dang gsal byed rnam par spangs// 'jig rten gsum ni ma lus pa// gcig tu byas na bskyed pa
191a5(rgyud): byed/ mi shigs na da'i go 'phang can// rnam pa thams cad rna ma par spangs// sbrul gyi lce ltar g.yo ba dang // tshangs par sogs pha mas dang // 'jigs pa ma yin g.yo ba min// mi
191a6(rgyud): ge dang ni tshig ma yin// 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rnam par spangs// grangs bral zad med skye ba med// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dbus gnas pa// sgra tsam dri ma dang bral ba// chag
191a7(rgyud): bral chags pa med pa dang // bya ba byed dang gnas med pa// dpe med gnas pa med pa dang // srog dang rtsol ba rnam par spangs// lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog/ de lta bu sang rnyed par dka'// long spyod/ 
191a8(rgyud): 'khor lo mchog tu gnas// 'tshong ba med pa'i rnam pa mchog/ mchog tu khong du chud gyur pa// rnam pa kun gyis yang dag bzhugs// rten cing 'brel 'byung rang bzhin gyis// mang gi ro mis myos po
191b1(rgyud): bzhin// mchog ni dang po ma lus pa// dngos po kun gyi nang na gnas// thog ma tha ma lhag par gnas// mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs// zhi ba mi 'jigs brjod
191b2(rgyud): du med// rang bzhin nyams myong rang ngo bo// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor gnas// bla ma brgyud pa las ni thob// de ltar ye shes bye brag che// rang gi ngo bo rnam shes drug/ steng dang 'og tu yang dag sbyor// rnal
191b3(rgyud): 'byor zhes ni rab tu grags// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las 'khor lo drug sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / 
191b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// dus kyi mtshan nyid sdom pa ni // rnal 'byor gang gis rnam par shes// grangs kyi rnal 'byo dar bla na med// dus ni dus chod zhes ni bshad// bsam dang bas
191b5(rgyud): bral rang dngos ni// dus bzang dang ni dus ngan dang // rnam pa gnyi sa la yang dag gnas// sna yi bu ga las byung nas// phyi yi sgo las rtag tu 'char// nang du sdud par dus bzang gsungs// 
191b6(rgyud): 'byung ba yang ni dus ngan 'dod// dus ngan las ni gzhan pa mchog/ dus bzang mchog ste rang nyid ni// rdzogs ldan dang ni gsum ldan dang // gnyis ldan dang ni dus bzang po// rtsod pa'i dus ni ngan pa ste// de ltar
191b7(rgyud): gsungs pa'i dus mtshan nyid// dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang // lhan cig skyes pa dus bzang ste// dga' dang bral ba ngan dus so// dus kyi mtshan nyid da ltar bshad// 'jug pa dang ni gnas pa'i dus// dus/ 
191b8(rgyud): bzang por ni yongs su grags// ldang ba yang ni dus ngan te// de ltar dus kyi mtshan nyid do// dus ni khams rnams thams cad de// mnyam pa ro gcig go 'bang mchog/ ye shes rnam shes rnam spangs te// dus
192a1(rgyud): ni gcig ni brjod pa yin// dngos dang dngos med spros bral ba// bzhi pa'i skad cig mtshan nyid ni// brjod pa brjod byed las grol ba// dus gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin// chags dang
192a2(rgyud): chags bral nges grol ba// bde ba chen po go 'phang spangs// phyag rgya chen po'i don gyi gzhi// dus gcig zhes ni brjod pa yin// mtshan nyid med cing snang ba med// grangs ni rnal 'byor rnam par spang
192a3(rgyud): de nyid dus su ngas bshad de// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dus dang dus tshad rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu
192a4(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i 'bras bu mchog nyon cig/ gang gis dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// phyag rgya chen po yang dag bstan
192a5(rgyud): gsang ba sbas pa zhes ni bshad// rnal 'byor byis pas mi she sa shing // bzhi pa'i dbang zhes bya ba'i ming // zhal nas pa rgyud pa'i rim pa rnams// mchog tu zhi ba'i ye shes che/ 
192a6(rgyud): rnam rtog thams cad rnam par spangs// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che// rnal 'byor chen po'i don bsdus pa// rnal 'byor ma rgyud las bslab pa// mchog tu rmad byung ngo bo nyid// ye shes chen po'i ro
192a7(rgyud): 'bebs pa// de nyid chen po'i yon tan ldan// nam mkha' mchog la gnas pa'i sa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo// bde ba rnams ni 'phel bar byed// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang 'das// shes dang shes pa
192a8(rgyud): rnam par bral// sgom dang bsgom bya rnam par spangs// sngags dang rgyud kyi bya bas stong // kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// dngos po kun gyi go 'phang gsal// 'jig rten gsum gyi rnam pa'i mi/ 
192b1(rgyud): chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// dam tshig chen po la gnas pa// grangs med 'jig rten gsum gcig dngos// dngos grub de kho na yi rgyud// de ltar gsang ba'i 'bras bu gsal// gzhan ni gang
192b2(rgyud): du'angam gsungs pa// rnal 'byor mchog gi ye shes mchog/ rnal 'byor ma rgyud las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las gsang ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'i
192b3(rgyud): le'u skye bzhi bcuba'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// chos kyi dbyigyis kyi go bang mchog/ chos kyi dbyings nas khyab pa'i khams// chos kyi dbyis
192b4(rgyud): kyis de la brjod// kun khyab mchog tu phra ba dang // kun 'gro na dag tu 'char ba dang // phung po lnga nyid 'byung ba lnga// yul dang skye mched rnam shes dang // de dag yang dag ldan chos kun// 
192b5(rgyud): bshad de gsang ba'i dbang phyug skye// de dag dbus na gnas pa'i/  mas// khyab cing spyod yul ma yin pa// ji ltar til gyi ting mar dang // ji ltar shing la me bzhin du// de bzhin chos rnams
192b6(rgyud): thams cad la// khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no// na mkha' bzhin du dri ma med// chos kun gyi ni gzhi yi mchog/ gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog gis// khyab kyang mthong ba ma yin no// stong nyid ye shes
192b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor pa yis gsal bar mthong // chos dbyings b+ha ga zhes ni brjod// b+ha ga rin chen za ma tog/ gang phyir dbang phyug sogs yon tan// ldan pa de phyir b+ha ga brjod// b+ha ga tshwa/ 
192b8(rgyud): rnams su yang bshad// dbyings ni byang chub sems su gsungs// khams gsum pa yi 'gro ba yis// rgyu ni b+ha ga zhes byar bshad// dbyings ni yang dag sbyor dngos kyis// chu zla bzhin du yang dag gan
193a1(rgyud): don dam gcig du 'di nyid shes// lag mthil sku ru bzhag pa bzhin// mchog gi de nyid ltar ni snang // rang rig shin 'dri ma med// dngos dang dngos med zang nas ni// ga tud nyid
193a2(rgyud): 'thong shing snang // chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'bang gsal// de ltar shin tu rgyas par bshad// gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral bas// sbyor bri ba shes barmad du byung // rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon pa
193a3(rgyud): rtogs pa las chos kyi dbyings kyi don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ de yi don du bshad
193a4(rgyud): kyis nyon// ji lta ba bzhin bshad par bya// rdo rje mi phyed zhes ni gsung das// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid mchog/ rtsa lnga yi ni nas kha re rten// rtse mo lnga yi rang ngo bo// sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam
193a5(rgyud): mkha' nyid dang ni// rtsa yi na mkha'i cha yi gzugs// bla ma brgyud lnga shes par bya// a raM laM baM yaM sa bon// brjod pa ru ni ldanam sa te// 'bad pa yis ni shes par bya// rdo rjes skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni// 
193a6(rgyud): pad+ma lte ba'i dbus gnas pa// thig ler bshad pa 'gro ba med// dam tshig gnas ni shes pa dang // bdud rtsi mchog gis rab tu gang // rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med// de ni rdo rjer yongasu grags// me long mnyam nyid ye shes/ 
193a7(rgyud): dang // so sor rtog dang bya nan tan// rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin no// de yi bo yongasu shes// rdo rje rang nyid nyams myong mchog/ na mkha' cher gnas zhi ba dang // rtog pa med cing nyon mong
193a8(rgyud): med// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag gzhi// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rdo rje bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// 
193b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rigs kyi dbye ba don bsdus pa// de tshe rigs ni rnam pa lnga// rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsal bar gsungs// rnal 'byor spros pa dbye ba yis// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig go// 
193b2(rgyud): rgyud du grags par dbye ba yi// mthar thugs de ni yang dag gsungs// de nyid las ni bsdus nas kyang // rigs kyi dbye ba brgya ru gsungs// sna tshogs spros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes
193b3(rgyud): ni brjod// gang gis de yi rnam pa mthong // sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no// sems can mos pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs nyon mongs mnan nas ni// 'gro ba'i bla mas
193b4(rgyud): grol ba'i phyir// gzhung nas gang gis de yis ni// sna tshogs spro ba 'i ngo bo nyid// grangs med pa yi dbye ba yis// dbye ba grangs med sbyor ba yis// don dam rigs kyi dbye ba nyid// rgyud gzhan
193b5(rgyud): rnams su gsungs pa yis// sems can bsam pa'i bye brag gi/ de ni bsdus na dbye bar 'gyur// rtswa yi 'khor lo'i rim ba yis// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de la stong phrag
193b6(rgyud): sum cu drug/ lus kyi rdzas dang gnas sogs kyis// rim pa'i dbye ba de las kyang // stong phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// de rjes brgya yis mchog tu gang // bdun cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// sum cu rtsa drug bsdus pa lnga// 
193b7(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi de las kyang // sum cu dang ni dgu yang ngo // de las lnga dang de phyir gsum// gsum yang bsdus na gcig nyid do// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// gzhan yang gzhan du 'dres nas 'gro// des
193b8(rgyud): 'od gsal go 'phang la'o// rnam rtog med pa'i bde ba che// gnyis med ye shes dri ma med// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las rig
194a1(rgyud): kyi dbye ba'i don bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na me/ 
194a2(rgyud): chos dang las dang dam tshig dang // phyag rgya chen po mngon par rjod// las kyi rnam smin nges pa yis// kun nas rgyas btab lta bur gnas// gang yang 'di ni las gang gi/ de 'bras ji lta ba bzhin
194a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid// rang bzhin gyis ni rgyas btab nas// dam tshig rang gi yon tan dngos// rgyal sras rnams kyis rgyas btab pa// stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa// sangs rgyas zhing
194a4(rgyud): ni rnam sbyong ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ni// yongasu dag pa'i mdzad pa yis// de yi rang bzhin rang bzhin med// phyag rgya chen po zhes ni brjod// las kyi phyag rgya yongs shes na/ 
194a5(rgyud): sngags pa las ni thob par skye// bla mas shes rab dbang bskur na / ji ltar mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rang dngos don// snying rje'i bsam pas bsal ba ni// de las tre
194a6(rgyud): par thob nas ni// chos nyid sgo nas nges par byed// de ltar de nyid de ye shes// de ltar rnal 'byor ma mtshan nyid// dam tshig la zhen mkhas pa dang // rlung gi de nyid pha rol son// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i
194a7(rgyud): don bslabs pa// ngag 'jam shes rab ldan ma dang // mig yangs ma yi bu mo rnyed// gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par rgyan// ji bzhin rnal 'byor dam tshig la// phyag rgyas lhan cig sgrub par byed// 
194a8(rgyud): de nas de nyid thob pa na// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do// de nyid bde chen go 'phang ni// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// stong nyid ye shes dri ma mod// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang gsal// de nas gzhan
194b1(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dbye ba bla na med// rigs dang pha rol phyin dbye bas// phyag rgya drug tu yang dag bshad// yaM raM laM baM e he dang // lha mo rnams kyi rim pa las// mchod pa'i rim pa rog ci/ 
194b2(rgyud): ba// rtag tu yang ni mchod par bya// gdol pa mo dang khrus mkhan mo// smi sha can dang gar mkhan ma// ro bsregs mo dang bram ze mo// grub 'gyur don du rnal 'byor pas// bdag nyid rol cing gnas pa
194b3(rgyud): bya'akhrus mkhan rin chen rigs las skyes// gdol pa pad+ma'i rigs las skyes// de bzhin gar mkhan las kyi rigs// ro sreg ma ni 'khor lo'i rigs// sme sha can ni rdo rje'i rigs// ye shes phyag
194b4(rgyud): rgya bram ze mo// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigasu brjod// 'di ni rigs ni drug tu 'gyur// bram ze mo ni ma yin te// khrus mkhan mo ni sring mor brjod// gar mkhan mo ni bu mor shes// rme sha can
194b5(rgyud): ni chung mar grags// ro bsregs mo ni mna' ma ste// sgyug mo ga dol pa ma zhes bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ rnam rtog med pas brjod par bya// gang phyir rnam rtog med gyur na/ 
194b6(rgyud): dngos grub kun la dus kun tu// sems ni ma ru gyur nas ni// sring mo dag tu yang dag bshad// lus ni bu mor shes par bya// srog ni chung mar rab tu gsal// mna' ma thur du sel ba'i rlung // dbu ma
194b7(rgyud): rlung ni sgyug mor brjod// ma ni rgyags pa'i rtsa yi cha// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma rtog/ sring mo khu ba 'bab pa'i rtsa// spyi bo'i gnas na yang dag gnas// bu mo khrag rgyu ba yi rtsa// de ni phyed phyed lhag par gnA
194b8(rgyud): chung ma gcin ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// de nyid kyi ni dbus na gnas// mna' ma mchi ma 'dzag pa'i rtsa// mgrin pa'i gnas su lhag par gnas// ma ni sa ru yang dag bshad// chu yi khams ni sring mor brjod// me ni
195a1(rgyud): bu mor shes par bya// rlung ni chung mar rab tu grags// mna' ma na mkha' ru ni bshad// stug mo na mkha' chen po'o// mngar bar gyur pas na mkha' ni// sgyur bsring mo ru ni brjod// 
195a2(rgyud): kha ba rang gi bu mo dang // lan tshwa chung mar yongs su grags// skab smug mor shes par bya// chu ba mna' mar yongs su grags// de dag 'bad pas 'dod pazhing // dngos grub 'dod pas bsten par bya// las kyi
195a3(rgyud): phyag rgya dbye ba 'di// de yi yon tan bsten pa'i mchog/ dam tshig de dang rtog par 'jug/ phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang zhi// ye shes mchog ni bla na med// de ltar phyag rgya'i go 'phang
195a4(rgyud): gsal/ rnal 'byor ma rgyud spyod yul lo// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyu dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las phyag rgya'i dbye ba rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// 
195a5(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang yang dag bshad// phung sogs skye mched mtsha na nyid ni// rgyal ba rgyal ni gzugs zhes bshad// rdo rje/ 'dzin ni rnam shes dang // rin chen 'dzin la tshor bar gsungs// 
195a6(rgyud): 'khor ba las rgal 'du shes gsungs// shes rab 'dzin ni 'du byed dang // de ltar phung por rab tu gsungs// sa ni gti mug dga' mar bshad// de bzhin chu ni zhe sdang dga'// me ni chags gsal dga'
195a7(rgyud): ba dang // de bzhin rlung ni rdo rje dga'// na mkha' rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rdo rje dang // sgra ni sgra yi rdo rje ste// dri ni dri yi rdo rje dang // ro ni ro yi rdo rjer bshad// reg bya'i rdo rje reg byar 'gyur
195a8(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// mig gnyis sa yi snying po dang // rna ba phyag na rdo rje dang // sna ni na mkha'i snying po dang // lce ni 'jig rten mgon po dang // lus ni sgrib pa rnams sel brjod// yid ni kun tu
195b1(rgyud): bzang po dang // rtsa ni byams pa ru ni brjod// ye shes mchog ni 'jam dpal nyid// khyab pa ru ni yang dag bshad// de bzhin lus kyi chos rnams ni// khro bo bcur ni yang dag bshad// de ltar lus kyi
195b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsungaso// phung po la sogs skye mched sogs// rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog gis ni// bla ma rgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa lnga/ 
195b3(rgyud): phung po la sogs pa dang skye mched kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya chen po'i don mtshan nyid// rnam/ 
195b4(rgyud): 'byor chen po'i 'bras bu zhi// ye shes chen po'i don bsdus pa// ba de ba chen po'i skal ba che// ro mchog chen po'i bdag nyid can // sgyu ma chen mo mchog tu phra// chen po'i chen po na mkha' che// phyag
195b5(rgyud): rgya de bzhin gshegs ye shes// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang sten/ mi phyed rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// rnam rtog med pa'i bde kha che// nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// rang bzhin med cing gzhi
195b6(rgyud): dang bral// gnyis med bdag med brjod du med// rnal 'byor rnams ni rang rig pa// phung po khams dang skye mched cha'i// kun rtog chos ni yongs su spangs// sgom dang bsgom bya snyom 'jug dang // rim pa gnyis
195b7(rgyud): ni rnam par spangs// rnam shes ye shes dang bral ba// sngags dang bzlas brjod bsnyen pa spangs// dngos po kun gyi gnas las rgal// ye shes chen po rab gsol pa// dngos grub chen po 'dir shes bya// phyag rgya
195b8(rgyud): chen po bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las phyag rgya chen po'i don rnam par nges pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / 
196a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// nyams kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba ni// gang gis yongs shes rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor chen po dag shes par// gyur nas kyang ni ye shes che// de nyid rnal
196a2(rgyud): 'byor kun las bsgyings// ljang dang rdul dang ba spu langs// dbyangs 'gyur ba dang ldibs pa dang // mdog 'gyur mchi 'dzag thim pa dang // snying stobs can gyis 'di brgyad nyams// dga' ba rgyas pa'i rtsa yi cha/ 
196a3(rgyud): rgyags pa'i cha yi rtsa dga' na// khong stong 'dar bar bskyed par byed// rgyags pa'i chu yi rtsa sad na// rab tu rdul byed bskyed par byed// de bzhin rgyags pas g.yengs pa'i rtsa// khong stong pa spu ldang bar byed// de bzhin
196a4(rgyud): nas ra yi rtsa// khong stong tshig ni ldib par byed// rus sbal chen po'i cu rgyus na// kha dog 'gyur ba skye bar byed// mgo bo chen po'i rtsa rgyas na// brgyal zhing sdug bsngal bcas par byed// 'ur 'ur chen
196a5(rgyud): po'i rtsa bye na// ba spu langs pa bskyed par byed// dga' ba chen po/ 'i rtsa rgyas na// khong stong mchi ma 'jig par byed// myos/ pa chen po'i rtsa bye na// srog gi rlung ni thim par byed// brgyal dang
196a6(rgyud): sems med bde ba che// de nas dran pa nyams par 'gyur// sgeg pa la sogs nyams su shes// sngar bshad rims pa sad par byed// dzaHhUM ba hoHde bzhin du// a la la la la ho sngags// rab tu bskul bas rgyas na
196a7(rgyud): su// nyams ni so so'i dbye bas shes// de ltar de ni dpe rgyud pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las nyams kyi dbye ba bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtse bdun
196a8(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bdag ces bya ba sgra yi rten// gang gis yang dag shes pa yis// srid pa'i 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid ni// a he 'khor lo'i 'ching bdag/ 
196b1(rgyud): de ni yongs zad grol ba'o// a ni dngos po kun gyi mchog/ lus rnams kun la lhag par gnas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan// kun khyab kun mkhyen zad pa med// thogs med snying stobs zhes bya ba// 
196b2(rgyud): thabs cig du ni skye bar byed// srid dang srid rtse ba rtse ba med// sprul pa'i sku yi mchog dang ni// don kun byed pa la mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba'o// haM ni dngos po dang bral ba// lus la gan
196b3(rgyud): kyang lus bskyed min// dbang po las 'das mi gsal ba// rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs// dngos dang dngos med las grol zhing // gang la'ang lhag par gang gnas pa// dngos po thams cad nub pa dang / 
196b4(rgyud): chos kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid// sems ni rdo rje 'chang dbugs phyung // don kun byed pa dang bral ba// stong pa'i rang bzhin mya ngan 'das/ 8/ ye shes sku yi rang bzhin nyid// rjod dang brjod pa rnam par grol/ 
196b5(rgyud): de yang yi ge haM du grags// thams cad a haM kun la khyab// tham sa cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// a haM dngos po thams cad la// khyab pa'i sa ni lhag par gnas// oM he dang bral skyes bu/ 
196b6(rgyud): ni// rtsa ba bcad pa'i shing bzhin no// haM ni dpral ba'i skra mtshams na// a ni lte bar yang dag gnas// 'dir ni a las zla bar bshad// 'od zer stong 'gyed pa yi haM// 'dir yang a yi ming la brten// brten pa'i
196b7(rgyud): haM du rab tu grags// a ni srog gi rlung du bshad// de bzhin thur sel he du brjod// de gnyis gcig gyur 'khor ba ste// des na a haM zhes par grags// rnam rtog bral ba'i gnas pa ni// a haM gang du gan+da
196b8(rgyud): pa med// gzhan ni 'ga' zhig 'di la yang // don dam par ni dmigs su med// de ltar a he nga yis bshad// rgyud rnams kun tu rnyed par dka'// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
197a1(rgyud): las a haM gi sgra'i don bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// stong nyid dbye ba bsdus pa ni/ 
197a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis shes// stong nyid de ni shes par 'gyur// mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyir// stong nyid sgom par yongs su gsungs// nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams ni// kun tu rtog pa'i gnyen po dang / 
197a3(rgyud): phyin ci log ni rnam dag pa// phyi nas stong pa nyid du 'dod// phyi rol dmigs pa dang bral ba// nang gi bdag nyid chos rnams dang // phyi rol du yang mi rtog pa// 'dir ni phyi dang nang gi ni// stong pa nyid du yang dag bshad/ 
197a4(rgyud): snod kyi 'jig rten dang bral ba// chen po stong pa nyid du brjod// ye/ shes gang gis de stong par// mthong ba de yang stong par ba rjod// me long ye shes rdzogs pa la// rjes su dmigs par byed phyi ro// 
197a5(rgyud): de yi mi mthun phyogs stong pa// dngos med stong pa nyid stong nyid// don dam par ni brdzun pa'i dngos// shes pa don dam stong pa nyid// 'dus byas sbyin pa la sogs kyi// dge ba dmigs su med
197a6(rgyud): pa'i phyir// nang gi rnam rtog mtshan nyid spyod// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du bshad// yang dag byang chub 'das ma byas// rgyu mtshan yang ni dmigs su med// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// 'dus ma byas pa/ 
197a7(rgyud): stong nyid gsungs// sems can don du smon lam sogs// rang dga' sogs pa dmigs pa med// shin tu stong pa nyid du bshad// kun rtog thams cad rnam par spangs// mtha' las 'das pa'i stong nyid gsungs// 
197a8(rgyud): thog mtha' med pa'i 'jig rten gyi// 'gro ba'i phyir ni smon lam nyid// rlom sems med par de brjod de// thog mtha' med pa'i stong pa nyid// mya ngan 'das la dmigs pa med// dge ba'i bdag nyid mi stong pa// 
197b1(rgyud): rlom sems med pa zhes bshad do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid// 'dod chags la sogs dri ma ni// bdag ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i// de ltar rlom sems med gsungs pa// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du gsal/ 
197b2(rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa// sku gzugs de yi yon tan ni// gzhan rnams la yang mi dmigs pa// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid// spyod pa la yang rlom sems med
197b3(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad stong par bshad// bdag dang skyes pa'i chos rnams ni// sgro gtags dngos po med pa'i mchog/ 'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod// dngos med stong pa nyid du gsungs// ji ltar ston
197b4(rgyud): gsungs stong pa nyid// da ltar dngos po med shes pa// slar yang mi dmigs pa nyid ni// dngos po med pa stong nyid 'dod// de ltar stong nyid dbye ba yang // bag chags rnams kyi gnyen po'i phyir// sgyu yi
197b5(rgyud): gnyen po mi mthun phyogs// bla ma brgyud pa las shes bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtog sa las stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcurtsa
197b6(rgyud): dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// stong pa nyid ni skye ba'i rgyu// rnam pa med pa'i nyams myong dngos// lus rnams la ni khyab pa dang // phung po lnga ni rang bzhin
197b7(rgyud): lus// 'khor lo drug la khyab pa dang // chos rnams kun gyi dbus gnas phyir// ring ba ma yin nye ba min// de ni kun rdzob dang dbyer med// stong pa nyid ni don dam mo// rdo rje phreng ba de ltar bshad// srog gi rten gyi
197b8(rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// sku mdog sngon po zhal gsum pa// spyan gsum po la phyag drug mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo nor bu g.yas// g.yon pa dril bu pad+ma dang // ral gri shin tu rnon po dang // phyar ba go rims bzhin du bsnam
198a1(rgyud): a li ka li las byung ba// zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs pad rgyas gdan la ni// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// hUM gi sa bon rdzogs pa dang // rdo rje chen po'i
198a2(rgyud): rigs las byung // kun rtog rnams ni bskyed pa'i rlung // rnam par gcod cing thim par byed// gnod byed de dag sel bar byed// gnyis pa thams cad rnam par gcod// sgyu ma chen mo stong pa che// sangs rgyu
198a3(rgyud): sa ni rmad du byung // sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras ster ba'o// 'di yi sngags ni brjod par bya// oM dang badz+ra mA le dang // de bzhin AHdang tsA dang gnyis// phaT dang swA hA yang dag ldan// sngags mchog btus pa
198a4(rgyud): bla na med// rlung 'phrog de kho na nyid kyis// yid kyi rnam rtog sa dal bar byed// zhi ba'i gnas dang chu 'gram dang // shing ga da cig lam gyi bzhi mdo dang // yang na sum mdo 'bum phrag bcu
198a5(rgyud): gsal bar yang ni bzlas par bya// de ni dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// de yi yo na tan gsal bar 'byung // zhi ba la sogs 'bad mi dgos// 
198a6(rgyud): skad cig gcig la mngon par rtogs// de ni de nyid rigs mchog shes// dpa' bo gcig pu'i cho ga 'di// dpa' mo gcig pu nyid sgrub pa// de yi mtshan nyid sgom pa gang // rnam rtog spangs pa'i rnal 'byor
198a7(rgyud): ba// shin tu rnam dag na mkha'i dngos// rang gi dngos grub mchog tu 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i phreng ba bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u
198a8(rgyud): ste lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// mtshan mo shes rab shes par bya// 'byung po thams cad thim nas 'gro// mtshan mo'i cha ni zla bar 'gyur// zla ba mya
198b1(rgyud): ngan 'das mtshan nyid// kun rdzob dang ni don dam gyi// shes rab rnam pa gnyis zhes bya// kun rdzob shes byar shes par bya// don dam reg bya rnam par spangs// reg bya dang bral bde ba gang // bde ba
198b2(rgyud): mchog de thob par dka'// nyin mo slar yang thabs su bshad// thabs ni nyin mor gyur pa dang // gang tshe dngos las skyes nyi ma// rtag tu b+ha ga'i bdag por 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rnam pa nyi mar 'gyur// 
198b3(rgyud): ma las ni zla ba skyes// de las gnyis med ngo bor bshad// 'bar ba'i phyir ni nyi mar 'gyur// rnam par dpyad pa'i don dam dang // chags bral mchog tu phra ba dang // mi snang ba dang stong pa'i lus// 'od gas// 
198b4(rgyud): ba yi go 'phang zhi// gang du yang dag mi gnas so// rnal 'byor che/ na po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las mtshan mo nyin mo rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig/ 
198b5(rgyud): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan/ rdo rjes gsungs// a li ka li'i dam tshig ni// rgyud rna mas gzhan du ma gsungs pa'i// rgyal sras rnams la dgongs pa
198b6(rgyud): / yi// 'od gsal go 'phang las skyes pa'i// snang ba mched pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gsal byed sum cu rtsa gsum ldan// ka li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o// snang ba mched pa'i go 'phang ni// snang ba lnga
198b7(rgyud): byung zad pa med// dbyangs ni bcu drug dang ldan pa// a li'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'o// de gnyis gsang ba'i sbyor ba las// dbus su skyes pa'i bde ba che// a li ka li'i dam tshig ces// dgongs bI/ 
198b8(rgyud): tshig gis bye brag byas// shin tu phra ba'i ye shes mchog/ bla ma brgyud las shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las a li ka li rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u
199a1(rgyud): ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// mtshams kyi mtshan nyid bla na med// snang dang mi snang bral ba'i mtshams/ 
199a2(rgyud): shes rab rdo rje las byung ba// gnyis med 'dres pa'i dbus na gnas// 'bags shing gos pa rnam par spangs// rdo rje pad+ma 'chi med skyes// zla ba nyi ma yang dag 'dres// mthar ni yang dag mi 'gro gang // mtshams
199a3(rgyud): med 'khor ba dag par byed// rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog/ phra ba'i mtshan nyid bsam mi khyab// sems can kun gyi mtshams kyi ni// rdo rje 'chang gi btsun mo dang // 'char ba mchog tu dag par bshad// 
199a4(rgyud): dga' bral la sogs rnam par spangs// mdud pa'i rtser gnas mchog tu zhi// tsa na ka yi tshig gu tsam// mtshan mo bdag po de shar ba// gang phyir steng gi go 'phang gnas// la la thig le'i/ 
199a5(rgyud): rang ngo bor// rnam pa bzhi yis yang dag gnas// la lar thog/ ma la sogs spangs// la lar de yang dmigasu med// gang phyir rang gi bdag nyid can// de phyir brjod du med pa'o// rnal 'byo
199a6(rgyud): chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las mtshams kyi 'char ba'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// rnam pa
199a7(rgyud): nyi shu'i ming tsam ni// slob dpon las su yongs su bshad// sngags kyi rnal 'byor legs rgyas pa// sngon du snyan pas sbyang dang // 'byung po bskrad pa nyid dang ni// sa bzung nyid dang thig skud ni// spyan dang lhag par/ 
199a8(rgyud): gnas pa dang // bgegs bskrad de bzhin dkyil 'khor gyi// thig ni rab tu gsal ba dang // phur bus yang dag gdab pa dang // bum pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi lhag gnas dang / 
199b1(rgyud): khrus dang rab tu sbyang ba dang // mchod pa rab gnas gtor ma dang // slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang // me la sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin// dbang bskur ba dang gshegs su gsol// de ltar cho ga nyi shu'i las// gang gis
199b2(rgyud): de shes 'gro ba'i bla// dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pas bya// bdud las bsdigs mdzub de ni mchog/ yi ge gsum bzlos pa la zhen// rdo rje theg pa lhag par grol// zhi ba la sogs las gang gis// rtag tu lag pa'i
199b3(rgyud): mthil la gnas// de yi yang dag cho ga yis// cho ga mchog ni bya ba yin// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor sogs// cho ga la sogs brtsam par bya// bgegs mthar byed pa'i snying po'i sngags// yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi
199b4(rgyud): mchog stong phrag bcu ni yongs su bzla// thog mar mkhas pa ji bzhin du// bgegs rnams thams cad gsal ba'i phyir// sngon du bsnyen pa zhes ni bshad// de 'og yi ge gsum khrir ni// bsam
199b5(rgyud): ba kun gyis bzlas byas na// yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster// slob ma rnams kyi dngos grub rgyur// skye bos dben pa'i phyi/ ra bcas// sa bzung chu ni nye bar bcas// grong dang ha cang mi
199b6(rgyud): nye zhing // ring por yang ni brtsams mi bya// shin tu 'jam zhing srog chags med// rgyal po'i pho brang shin tu ring // gang khyim tshong dus las rgyang ring // yang na bde gshegs rten la ni// thog mar sor mo
199b7(rgyud): rnams la ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags dgod pa// khwa gang sor ni bzhi pa yis// seng ldeng phur pa byas nas ni// yi ge gsum sngags chu yis bkru// yige brgya pa lan bdun dang // yi ge gsum
199b8(rgyud): gyi sngags kyis brko// sa ni chu yi mthar thug pa// yang na khru ni phyed dang gsum// yang ni sems kyis sbyang bar bya// de la gnas pa'i 'byung po ni// yang dag 'gror ni 'jug par bya// oM ma hA kro d+ha dzA lArka/ 
200a1(rgyud): / hUM phaT mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de ltar lag mthil sngags bkod la// 'byung po rnams ni bskrang par bya// sa la thal mo lan gsum du// brdab pa byas nas sngag 'anas te/ u gats+tsha
200a2(rgyud): dalan gnyis brjod// sarba b+hU ta gra ha ud gats+tsha// yi ge gsum ni mtha' ru brjod// badz+ra sa twa ba bshad de// las ni thams cad par gsungs pa'i// gtor ma byin nas 'gro ru gzhug/ sa ni yongs su
200a3(rgyud): bzung rjes la// rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtsam bya// tsha rgo med cing ma gsal// mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa dang // me long lta bur 'jam pa dang // mnyam pa yang ni mkhas pas bya// ba yi lci ba la sogs
200a4(rgyud): pa// rnam pa lnga yis byug par bya// byugs nas de rjes khrus byas la// slob dpon khro bo'i sku dang ni// dkyil 'khor/ dajam pa'i rdo rje yis// mchog tu mi g.yo gzugs kyis ni/ 
200a5(rgyud): 'jam pa dang ni sum sgril gyis// ras sam yang na gsom yis// yi ge gsum gyis rnam par sbyang // thig skud kyis ni kun nas mnyam// gru bzhi par ni byas nas kyang // rdo rje can gyi/ 
200a6(rgyud): khru gsum gsum// gru bzhi par ni bzung bar bya// de yi dbus su lte ba'i cha// sgrib pa'i skyon ni spang bar bya// sku gdung dang ni rin chen bzhugs// lags par bsangs nas byin gyis brlab// yi ge gsu
200a7(rgyud): yang swA hA'i mtha'// phaT kyi dbus su yang dag sbyar// sngags 'di yang ni bzlas par bya// brgya dang brgyad kyis lhag par gsal// tshangs pa'i thig ni btab nas ni// yig brgya pa bzla bar bya// de rjes de
200a8(rgyud): la me tig char// sngags ni brjod nas gtor bar bya// oM dang a mo g+ha pad+mo// de bzhin du ni phyi nas su// ba su d+ha ri d+ha ra gnyis// d+ha ra Ni maN+Da li hUM// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags dang ni// lan gsum bar du/ 
200b1(rgyud): thig skud la// zhabs bsil chu yis bsang bar bya// yi ge gsum gyis thig gdab bya// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje can gyis mtshams bzhi pa// thog mar shar dang byang dang ni// ji srid lho dang nub
200b2(rgyud): dag dang // mtshams su yang dag thig skud dang // slar yang yang dag gdab par bya// shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni// nub dang byang gi mtshams su ni// thig skud kyis ni tshad gzhal bya// zur bzhi dang ni
200b3(rgyud): thig skud bya// bskor thig gsum ni sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje phreng ba gsum gyis mdzes// tshangs pa'i thig gnyis btab nas ni// de las dbang po'i pho brang ni// rnam pa kun gyis yang dag thig/ rgyal ba kun gyi
200b4(rgyud): bzhugs gnas gsal// de la rigs pa 'dzin pa bri// slar yang rin chen phye ma 'am// tshon sna lnga rnams me tog dang // rdzas sa ma las kyi sbyor ba las// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du// mtshan mI/ 
200b5(rgyud): phyag rgya la sogs bri// mi bskyod sku mdog phyag rgya sogs// rigs ni dbus su dgod par bya// rgyal ba rgyal dang rin chen 'chang // 'khor ba 'das dang shes rab 'chang // rim
200b6(rgyud): bzhin sku mdog dbye ba yis// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su dgod// gti mug zhe sdang chags pa dang // rdo rje dga' sogs rim pa bzhin// me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su// ji lta ba bzhin dgod par bya/ 
200b7(rgyud): sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba yi// gdan bdun gzhan gyi nyi ma gnyis// 'khor dga' zhe sdang dga' bar bcas// ka yis phreng gis rnam par rgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// g.yon na shes rab ral gri
200b8(rgyud): bsnams// gzugs dang dbyibs rnams ji bzhin du// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// mtshams kyi char ni rnam par dgod// shar la sogs pa'i snam bu la// 
201a1(rgyud): byams pa sa yi snying po shar// 'jam dpal phyag na rdo rje lhor// mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug ni// kun nas nub tu bsgom par bya// sgrib par rnam par sel ba dang // kun tu bzang
201a2(rgyud): po byang du dgod// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// geyon na ral gri dgod pa dang // phyag na rdo rje dri med pa'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni gdan// lha mo rnams la zla ba'i gdan// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng na
201a3(rgyud): gsal / rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya la sogs dgod// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa dgod// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can
201a4(rgyud): de bzhin ral gri g.yon na 'dzin// mi g.yo la sogs mtshams na mas su// gshin rje gshed kyi rang ngo bo// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// g.yon na ral gri rnam par bsam// 
201a5(rgyud): gang phyir shes rab rang bzhin g.yon// de bzhin g.yon na ral gri brjod// gnod mdzes de bzhin gtsug tor ni// 'og dang steng du rnam par dgod// khro bo rnams ni nyi mar bzhugs// de bzhin sna
201a6(rgyud): tshogs pad+ma'i gdan// de bzhin phyag rgya byug la sogs// nye bar mtshon nas dgod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam dag pa'i// ri mo lnga ni rnam par dgod// de la rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng // ra ba gnyis ni
201a7(rgyud): yongs su bskor// rin chen dra ba rngo ma dang // lha mo rnams kyi snam bu yis// ka ba rta babs 'khor lor mtshan// ri dgas rnams kyi mtshan pas rgyan// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan sogs// rnga yab me long la
201a8(rgyud): sogs kyis// rgyan pa ru ni rnam par bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag brten// slob dpon mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni// rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan no// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba// bgegs
201b1(rgyud): bskrad pas ni sngon song bas// suM b+ha'i sgra dang ni suM b+ha// thog mar oM dang ngo mtshar che// hUM gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan// shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya// oM dang gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na zhes// hUM gnyi la dang yang dag ldan
201b2(rgyud): blo dang ldan pas lho ru dgod// oM dang gr-ih+NA pa ya gnyis hUM gnyis phaT kyi mtha' dang ldan// nub tu yang dag spro bar bya// oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn dang bi d+yA ra dzA dang // hUM gnyis dang ni phaT mtha' dgod// de rje
201b3(rgyud): yang ni byang du dgod// 'di yis gdugs pa bkug nas ni// de nas sngags pas phur pa gdab// seng ldeng las ni byas pa yis// phur bu sor ni bcu gnyis tshad// zur gsum yi ge gsum gyis
201b4(rgyud): mtshan// yi ge brgyapa so sor bzlas// sngags kyi chu yis bsangs nas ni// phyogs dang mtshams su dgod par bya// oM dang yi ge g+ha lan gnyis// de bzhin g+hA ta ya ni gnyis// sar+b+ba duSh+TAM phaT we
201b5(rgyud): dang / de bzhin kI la ya gnyis dang // sarba pA paM phaT dang ni// hUMgasu/ ma badz+ra kI la ya// badz+ra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti// kA ya wAgatsit+ta badz+ra dang // kI la ya hUM phaT yi ge'i// mtha' can gyi ni phu
201b6(rgyud): bus gdab// oM dang badri sud gar// badz+ra kI la ya A ko Ta// sa dang hUM gnyis phaT mtha' dang // sngag dang phur dus brdung ba brjod// rdo rjes bgegs ni 'jug la sogs// bslang don rdo rje rab dang // steng du mad
201b7(rgyud): yi dra ba dang // 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje dang // gtsug tor gnod mdzes sngags kyis ni// byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga yis// bum pa bcu'am yang na drug/ rin chen las byas rnam dag pa// sman lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga
201b8(rgyud): 'bru lnga la sogs kyis gang ba// rin chen lnga dang snam sogs// lo ma lnga yis rnam par rgyan// gur gum gla rtsig pur dang // tsan dan chu yis gang bar bya// me tog la sogs kyis mchod bya// rang rang sngag/ 
202a1(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlag/ badz+ra drug dang dzin dzi// rat+na d+h+r-i kadang A rol ka/ de bzhin pAd+hU d+h+r-ig sngags dang // lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis// 'og min 'jig rten khams nas na
202a2(rgyud): bum pa rang gis bskur byas pa// de nas spyan drangs nas ni gzhugs// de nas lha mo'i gzugs spros nas// de rjes gzhan la dgod par bya// oM dang ru ru s+phu ru dang // de las dz+wa la tiSh+Tha gsal de bzhin sid+d+ha
202a3(rgyud): lo tsa ne// sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ne// swA hA zhes ni da la bzlas// spyan gyi rnam pa rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang sho ka re dang yang // de las shan ti ku ru dang // de bzhin g+hu tag+hA ti dang // hUM/ 
202a4(rgyud): tini dang g+hu ti ne// g+hA ta ya ni lan gnyis brjod// swA hA'i mtha' casngags brjod pa// mA ma kI yi rnam pa rdzogs// bum pa'i dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang ka Te bi ka Te// ni ka Ta ka Ta ka Te/ kara~M
202a5(rgyud): Ta bIr+ye swA hA// gos dkar rnam par rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i/ dbus su mchod par bya// oM dang tA re tut+tA re// tu re swA hAd/ gong par bya// sgrol ma'i rnam pa rdzogs nas ni// bum pa'i dbus
202a6(rgyud): su mchod par bya// gshin rje gshed sogs gzhan rnams la// gcig la las ni thams cad pa// oM na maHsa man+ta ka ya wAka tsi t+ta badz+ra NAM// na maHbadz+ra kro d+ha ya// ma hA Sh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA la// a si rba/ 
202a7(rgyud): sal// par shu pA sha has+t+ra la// oM a mr-i ta ku N+Da la// kha ga dA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ han ha na/ dahad he/ gar+b+he gar+dz+dza/ bi swai Te sa bi s+pho Ta sa/ ser+b+ba big+h+na pa~M na me kAn/ ma hA ga Na dza d+hi/ 
202a8(rgyud): ta an+ta ka rA ya hUM phaT swA te// sngags 'di lan bdun par du ni// las ni thams cad pa yin te// snying po'i sngags ni bzlas byas la// rigs kyi dbang phyug mchod par bya// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyis ni// 
202b1(rgyud): bdun par du bsgom par bya// brgya dang rtsa brgyad rim pa yis// yi ge gsum yang bzlas pa ni// de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// mchod yon snod du mchod par bya// de nas du gu la ras ni// ga pur a ga rus
202b2(rgyud): gdugs pa// bkab nas rang rang sngags dang ni// de la rim bzhin lhag gnas bya// zhal gsum phyag drug rnam pa can// sprin bral na mkha' lta bu'o// de lta bu yi sku mdog phyag/ rang snang ba yi sku la 'khyud// 
202b3(rgyud): a li ka li las byung ba// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// gzhal yas khang dbus nyams dga' ba'i// 'og min nang khams na bzhugs pa'i// dkyil 'khor 'khor dang bcas pa ni// sangs rgyas
202b4(rgyud): lnga yi cod pan can// bsgoms nas de las 'od zer spro// kha dog lnga dang lcags kyu yi// de yis spyan drang slob dpon gyis// snga/ gas brjod nas ni spyan dang bya// e h+ye hi dang b+ha ga bAn// sa ma
202b5(rgyud): ya ma nu sma ra// tiSh+Tha gnyis dang sa ma ya// de la a nu sma ra gnyi sa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // swA hA yi mtha' lan gsu ma brjod// 'jam pa'i rdo rje spyan drang bya// dkyil 'khor ba dang yA
202b6(rgyud): dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dbus su spyan drang ba// rang gi gdan gyi dbye ba la// bzhugs shing yang dag mchod par bya// rang rang sngags dang rim ji bzhin// lha yi me tog sogs kyis mchod// 'khor lo
202b7(rgyud): mchog ni mchod par bya// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin grong // yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni// dkyil 'khor mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal// thugs ni brtse bar nye dgongs te// 
202b8(rgyud): mgon pos mchod pa 'di bzhes shig/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta na/ pU dzo ba s+than ya A t+ma na nir+yA ta yA me// bla mas yi ge gsum ni brjod// lha yi rnam par byas nas ni// de rjes bdag la mchod par bya// oM sar+b+ba
