203a1(rgyud): ta thA ga ta/ pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba/ At+ma ko ho zhes ni brjod// rang lha'i nga rgyal byas nas ni// ji ltar bskyed pa'i yum rnams dang // gnod byed kha na ma tho med// zhe sdang chen po'i rigs wa
203a2(rgyud): byung // dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchod pa zhing // de las lha rnams lhag gnas bya// yid 'phrog sna tshogs lha yi gos// ga pur a ga ru yis bdug/ sngags kyis dag byas dgab par bya// oM dang tilA
203a3(rgyud): badz+ra hoH// brjod nas dkyil 'khor lhag gnas bya'o// oM dang s+pha ra badz+ra hoH// blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di brjod// me tog spar bas gtor nas ni// lhag gnas der ni gshegs par bya// rnam pa kun dang
203a4(rgyud): yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong bar bya// rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bzang po yis// bcom ldan gzugs brnyan bsgom sa nas ni// me long sogs la khras bya zhing // de bzhin rdzas dang 'o ma
203a5(rgyud): sogs// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang // de bzhin gsheg/ kun khrus gsol ba// de bzhin bdag gi sku khras gso/ la// cod pan dbang phyug rdo rje sems// dbus su yi ge gsum
203a6(rgyud): dang spel// swA hA'i mtha' can brjod par bya// las kyi de nyid cho ga shes// de rjes sbyar ba'i gtor ma bya// oM sar+b+ba A ba ra Na/ shud+d+ha sar+b+ba pA paM dang // bi shud+d+ha badz+ra hUM phaT// swA hA mtha' can sngags brjod bya// 
203a7(rgyud): pad+ma bskor ba'i phyag rgya dang // yungs kar dkar po bsregs byas nas// nyon mongs pa ni sel bar byed// 'khyud cing bskor bas dor bar bya// de nas cho ga bzhin legs mchog/ sil snyan glu la sogs pa dang / 
203a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya// rang rang sngags dang go rims bzhin// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// pu Sh+pa pU dza me gA dang // sa mu dra dang spar ba// sa ma ya dang shri ye aH// hUM gi sngags ni rje su brjod// rdzas rnams kun
203b1(rgyud): la rang ming ni// gzugs la sogs pa snga ma bzhin// cho ga bzhin du yang dag brjod// rdo rje sems dpa' legs bsgyings pa// rdo rje slob dpon chog shes// sngags 'di yis ni rab gnas bya// oM dang su pra/ 
203b2(rgyud): tiSh+Tha dang // badz+ra swA hA'i mtha' can bzlas// yi ge gsum gyi snying po ni// sku gsung thugs la bkod nas ni// me tog char ni dbab par bya// slob dpon slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas// glu yis yang dag
203b3(rgyud): bskul nas ni// sad pa na ni phyag kyang byas// las kun bdag nyid rnal 'byor bdag/ gtor mngon kun grub par byed// las la byang shing mkhas pa dang // cho ga bzhin du bsgyings bcas dang // chang dang sna
203b4(rgyud): tshogs sha dang ni// de bzhin la du 'o ma dang // 'bras can phyi yi khur ba dang // sran khur bye ba mang po dang // mchod yon me tog sogs gyis mchod// snod bcu chu yis gang ba la'o// 
203b5(rgyud): gsungs pa'i khro bo bcu sngags kyis// snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis// de dbus 'byung po kun la ni// ngo mtshar chen po'i gtor ma sbyi na// snga ma bzhin du cho ga yis// til bsregs bza' bas khyad
203b6(rgyud): bapar du// blo dang ldan pas sngags bzlas bya// 'di ni don kun sgrub byed pa// oM brad+d+ha de ba tA sar+b+ba/ in+d+ra da sha lo ka rak+Sha ka/ nA ga gan d+har+m+ma ku b+hUN+Da/ yak+Sha b+hU ta ga NA/ ta thA pyA ta ut+ma ta/ bi shA tsa a pa sA re/ DA ki nI/ 
203b7(rgyud): gri haHbi g+haM mA ti ga NAH/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ag+ni ma ra gra hA/ oM dzaM b+hak+Sha ma hA ta dza/ ma nu ShA nam/ bi hiM sa ka/ mu dra man+ta a d+hi d+ho b+hUHtsa/ gra hA nak+Sha ta ma nu ShaM/ i me ba laM/ pra gr-ih+na n+tu/ sid+d+him+me pra yats+tshan+tu me san+na/ 
203b8(rgyud): sa t+ya ma ne/ ruM ka ra me lu/ sa ta sa ha ya b+ha ban+tu tse/ dAn d+he na/ su pa ra Nany+tse/ d+ha DAn+ta ma ma to shI ta/ i ti u pA tra Na tro Sha Ni/ satwA nA ma na sha yan+ne tse/ thog mar oM dang AHhUM phaT/ sA hA'i mtha' can las kun
204a1(rgyud): byed// de ltar sngags 'di snod la bzlas// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par rol// slob ma lhag par gnas par byed// mtshan nyid yon tan gyis rgyan pa// tsan dan ga pur gla rtsi yi// chu sri
204a2(rgyud): kyang ni khrus byas te// dad pa'i chu ni 'chang ba yi// sems kyi dri ma rnam par 'khrud// bdog pa thams cad gtong bar byed// gos gtsang ba ni mchog tu bgo/ khang pa brtsegs ma byas nas ni// ras kyi yol/ 
204a3(rgyud): ba kun nas bri// yi ge gsum dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje can gyis sngags chu ni// lan bdun gdong la gtor ba yis// las skyes dri ma sbyong bar byed// de nas sa yi snying po sogs// mig la sogs la rnam/ 
204a4(rgyud): bar dgod// sor mo dbu ma gnyis kyis ni// dbang po so so la re dag pas// sngags brjod pa zhing byin gyis brlab// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor gyis// oM dang tsak+Sha tsak+ShaHdang / 
204a5(rgyud): sa man+ta dang tsuk+ShaHbzlas// me ti sa twa lo tsa na/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ swA hA'i mtha' dang sngags 'di brjod// mthe bo gung mo ya/ nga dag sbyar// zhabs bsil chu dang mnyes nas ni// sngags
204a6(rgyud): de lan gsum bzla bar bya// slob ma'i mig la so sor ni// mthe bo'i phyag rgyas rig par bya// khru gang ba la sor bzhi pa'i// skud ba zhags pa 'dra ba la// yi ge brgya pa'i sngags lan gsum// bzlas nas
204a7(rgyud): zhabs bsil chus bsang bya// skud pa lan gsum dkris pa ni// rdo rje gsum ni mdud par ldan// dpung pa g.yon par bcings pa ni// sngags 'di lan gsum brjod par bya// oM dang lo tsa ne yi sgra// ya ta
204a8(rgyud): tAta ta se pra taM/ maM b+ha bi Sh+yan+ta li sgra// ra dang rat+na ra mA ya// sid+d+ha na ni dar dang // ya swA hA yi sngags 'di ni// theg pa bla med lan bdun bzlas// slob ma la ni me tog gtor// de nas rdo rje 'chang gis ni// sor
204b1(rgyud): ni bcu gnyis gzhal ba yis// zur ni gsum du yongs su bya// yi ge gsum gyis byin rlab sgom// slob ma'i lag tu gtad par bya// oM dang pra ti badz+ra dang // sa man+ta dang I shwa ri// AHhUM swA hA'i
204b2(rgyud): mtha' can sngags// bzlas nas slob mas dor bar bya// sar bab pa yi phur bu ste// phyogs ni gang du lta ba nyid// slob dpon dang ni slob ma yis// de yi phyogs bltas nyal bar bya// nam nangs yang dge bla ma
204b3(rgyud): la ji ltar mthong ba'i don kun zhu// de la dmigs nas spyan sreg ni// zhi ba la sogs rab dbye bas// las ni thams cad pa nyid dam// bgegs zhi ba'i don du bya// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings bcas pas// 
204b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor ji bzhin cho ga bzhin// sngar bzhin 'dir yang gtor ma ni// bgegs rnams zhi phyir sbyin par bya// de nas gsol 'dab ngas slob ma ni// rdo rje slob dpon thugs rjes khyab// thal mo sbyar ba
204b5(rgyud): byas nas ni// mdun du 'dug nas phyag byas te// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsom// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag
204b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid srul du gsol// sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de nas bla mas de la yang // bya dang mi bya
204b7(rgyud): gsungs pa ni// sems can las kyi srad bus gdab// rdul tshon bkye ba'i rim pa dgye// 'gro ba 'di dag dkyil 'khor te// rang bzhin dag pa gnyis med pa'o// thog mar dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor bdag/ rdo rje
204b8(rgyud): slob dpon rang nyid sgom// slob ma bdag nyid 'dar dmigs nas// de 'og thams cad rab bsgrub bya// bla ma bzang la dbang bskur phyir// slob mas de rjes gsol ba gdab// 'di nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la// 
205a1(rgyud): / nyon mongs chu srin na kras khyab// las kyi rlung gis dpa' glong 'khrugs// bdag bying thugs rje'i rgya mtshor skye// mi shes ling tog gis bsgribs mig/ nyon mongs dbang du bya ba ni/ 
205a2(rgyud): bde ba sdug bsngal 'jigs las skyob// thugs rje'i rgya mtshos bdag skyabs mdzod// de 'dra tshig gsan rdo rje can// thugs rje'i thugs ni yongs su gang // slob ma la ni yongs su gsungs// bu khyed dus 'di na
205a3(rgyud): bzung ste// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs bstan// rnal 'byor mchog ni khyod kyis bzung // rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas// bu khyod 'di ni bdud rtsi ste// bsrungs shig ma bsrungs na ni bsreg/ bsrungs na dngos
205a4(rgyud): grub kun grub 'gyur// nyon mongs thams cad sel ba'i rlung // oM dang pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ u da ka dang AHhUM dza// slob mas pa dud rtsi lnga btung bya// rdo rje ye shes rmad byung ba'o// gsang ba dran na/ 
205a5(rgyud): skyon 'gyur phyir// rdo rje slob ma la ni dbab// dri chen dri tshul sogs pa// 'tshal 'bab pa yi bu mo'i gos// khrag dang khu bas yang dag bsgos// gu gul dang ni rnam par bsres// yi dgas/ 
205a6(rgyud): me ni blangs nas su// pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni// der ni thams cad gzhug par bya// khro bo rdo rje gsum bdag nyid// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas// rdo rje 'chang dbang slob ma la// rmad byung chen po
205a7(rgyud): bdug pas bdug/ 'bab par 'gyur ba the tsom med// oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha// de bzhin A be sha ya hUM// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags 'di brjod// slob ma la ni gsal bar dbab// badz+ra satwa hi ma he/ bid+yA rA
205a8(rgyud): dzaya bid+yA ma he// de ltar sngags ni 'od yis kyang // slar yang slob ma dbang bskur nas// rang bzhin gyis dag rang gi lus// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di mthong ba na// de bzhin gshegs dang lha mo dang // rgyal ban
205b1(rgyud): sras kyis yang dag gzhi// khro bo khyab pa'i gsang ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' rten dang ni// phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor ni// gnyis po de la bstan par bya// slar yang slob mas gsol ba gdab// bdag
205b2(rgyud): la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol// rnam rgyal bum pa blangs nas ni// pad+ma'i snod ni bzang po la// de yis dbus su blo bzang po// hUM rdor las byung mi bskyod sgom// rang nyid ye shes sa bon gyi// 'od zer yang
205b3(rgyud): dag bskul bas byung // slar yang ye shes sems dpa' sgom// mi bskyod pa yi rnam pa mchog/ mi bskyod ngo bo de nyid kyis// rnam par shes pa'i phung po sgom// slob ma'i mgo bor lag pa bzhag/ rdo rje slob
205b4(rgyud): dpon thugs rjes khyab// oM dang ma hA sa ma ya// de bzhin I shwar tra dang // a b+hi ShIny+tsA mi swA hA// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// a b+hi She ka sa ma ya// shri ye AHhUM de nas bzla// chu mi gting nas
205b5(rgyud): slob ma la// dbu rgyan dbang bskur don du ni// cod pan 'jig rte/ na gsum rgyal po// se ni kun gyi don sgrub pa// snying rje/ sa khyab pa ngas byin gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i yon tan gnas/ 
205b6(rgyud): sa bon tra las byung ba yi// rin chen 'byung ldan bsgoms nas ni// ri mo dar sogs cod pan dang // slob ma'i mgo la sbyin par bya// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta sgra dang // de bzhin sgra dang pU dza ya// a
205b7(rgyud): tiSh+Tha dang AHhUM dang // sngags 'di dag ni brjod nas ni// me tog mgo la sbyin par bya// slob ma rdo rje dbang bskur phyir// slar yang bla ma la gsol gdab// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dngos// rdo rje brtul zhugs dra
205b8(rgyud): byin gyis// gang gis ma rig sgo nga 'byed// ye shes thob par 'gyur nga yis byas// hrIHlas pad+ma rdzogs par ni// 'od dpag med du rnam par sgom// rdo rje lag pa g.yas par sbyin// slob ma la ni 'di skad
206a1(rgyud): brjod// ngas khyod de ring dbang bskur bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// kun tu bzang po'i brtul zhugs brtan// dngos grub bzang phyir rdo rje long // kham las byung ba'i ra
206a2(rgyud): gri 'am/ don yod grub pa'i rang ngo bo// rdzogs par lag pa g.yon pa ni// slob ma bsgyings pa'i phyag rgya 'dzin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dril bu sgra yi rjes 'gror brjod// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag
206a3(rgyud): tu bcang // byang chub mchog ni rgyal ba'i gzhi// rdo rje dril bu bzung rjes la// rdo rje sems dpa' rang ngo bo// rang bzhin yon tan rnams kyis gang // bdag po yi ni rnal 'byor 'gyur// rnam par snang
206a4(rgyud): mdzad rang ngo bo// slob ma'i mgo la lag bzhag ste// rdo rje can gyi sa ming dbang bskur// gzugs kyi phung po rnam par sgom// / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ che ge mo zhes badz+ra sa twa// a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi swahA
206a5(rgyud): phung po lnga yi rnam dag pa// thog mar chu nas ming gi mthar// dbang bskur ba ni mchog tu shes// rmad byung chen po bsha/ da bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga ni dag pa 'di// dbang bskur lnga ni
206a6(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// ma rig pa ni gsal nas ni// ye shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// slob ma 'dod don sngags dbang sbyin// sngags kyi dbang bskur ye shes mchog/ ngas byin/ 
206a7(rgyud): dngos grub ster bar byed// de nas yi ge drug sngags phaT// swA hA'i mtha' can yi ge gsum// kha ni dam tshig gis bkang nas// sngags kyi sku yis dag pa dang // bla ma'i zhal las yang dag brjod// 
206a8(rgyud): bla mas dngos grub sbyin bya'i phyir// 'od ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po yi ni ye shes mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa ni// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de nas slob ma
206b1(rgyud): spyod brtu la zhugs// sna tshogs bsam pa'i bye brag gis// gang gi spyod pa rnam dag pa// 'dod pa la thugs rje'i gtso ba yis// sems can don ni byed pa'i thabs// nga yis spyod pa'i brtul zhug sbyin/ 
206b2(rgyud): de nas glegs pam dung la sogs// mda' gzhural gri 'khor lo dang // sngon bzhin sngags kyis dag par byed// slob ma'i lag tu rim bzhin sbyin// 'di ni kun badzang spyod bcu zhugs// bsam pa tshe
206b3(rgyud): rnam dag byed// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // sems can kun gyi don gyis byos// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta// de bzhin d+hi Ta ra tA dang // de ltar sngags 'di dgod par bya// de nas lung bstan thob don du/ 
206b4(rgyud): bsam pa dang bas bla ma la// da ltar sangs rgyas rigs su 'jug/ khyed kyis bdag la lung bstan gsol// do na yod do// rdza zhes bya khyod// rigs kyi dbang phyug lung bstan pa// de nas
206b5(rgyud): slob ma dbugs dbyung 'dod// bla ma'i zhal snga nas ni skye// ma gon po yang dag bdag dbugs phyung // byang chub spyod pa'i brtul zhugs brtan// de nas rdo rje chos gos mtha'
206b6(rgyud): g.yon pa'i lag pas bzung nas ni// g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byas la// dbugs dbyung ba yi mchog bya ba// ngo yis rdo rje gsung bdag khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje
206b7(rgyud): sems dpa' mngon par brjod// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che// dpal ldan yon tan 'byung gnas bdag/ bdud kyi stobs ni kun las rgyal// grong khyer mchog tu khyod zhug so// de nas
206b8(rgyud): slob ma don 'dod la// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bya// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la stsol// de nas ye shes rdor dbang phyug/ ye shes sems dpa'i 'od zer
207a1(rgyud): / gyis 'a spyan drangs sangs rgyas lnga la sogs// lha mo'i 'khor lo rim bzhin 'byung // de yis ye shes chus bkang ba'i// bum pa phyag bsnams de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 
207a2(rgyud): rgyal brgya la// rin chen 'dzin dang 'khor ba sgrol// shes rab 'chang ni rim pa bzhin// gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags la// de bzhin rdo rje dga' ma sogs// gshin rje mthar byed shes rab byed// pad+ma
207a3(rgyud): mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// 'di yis kun nas dbang bskur bas// rdo rje slob ma rnam par bsam// dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas
207a4(rgyud): las byung // sangs rgyas kun gyi nga yis sbyin// de nas de bzhin ga shegs lha mo// khro bo rang gi gnas su dgod// 'jam dpal rnam par bsgoms nas ni// ye shes rdo rjes rnam par rgyan// 
207a5(rgyud): oM dang su pra tiSh+Tha dang // badz+ra swA hA zhes ni dgod// blo bzang gyis ni sngags brjod nas// slob ma la ni me tog gtor// de nas me tog sogs kyis mchod// slob ma'i dkyil 'khor 'khro/ 
207a6(rgyud): lo 'dra' thugs rjes khyab pa'i bla ma yis// de nas slob ma rjes gnang bya// de nyid shes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mi bya ba ni ci yang med// dpa' chen khyod kyis bka' drin gyis// da ni 'dod yon lnga la spyod// 
207a7(rgyud): sgyu ma rmi lam 'drar shes nas// rten 'brel las byung chos rnams ni// gzugs brnyan lta bur shes nas ni// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// bya ba byas pa'i slob ma ni// ci bde bar ni sgrub
207a8(rgyud): par bgyis// de nas bla ma la yon dbul// bstod cing kun nas phyag kyang bya// skye bo bzang dang lhan cig tu// de nas bla ma gsang don gnyer// thur du kha bltas kha sbyar te// ji ltar bdag nyid can
207b1(rgyud): bo khyad/ bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mdzod// de nas rigs lnga las byung ba'i// las dang chos sogs dbye ba yi// sngags kyi theg pas lhag par grol// skal ldan bud med phyag rgyar bshad// skye bos
207b2(rgyud): dben pa'i mtshan phyed na// ro yi gzhi yi gnas song nas// thugs rje chen pos khyab pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon yon tan 'byung // de ltar ji ltar rnyed phyag rgya// snyoms 'jug la ni gang byung ba'i// bla na med/ 
207b3(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin gyi// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ni// rnal 'byor ma yi yang dag lhung // kun rdzob byang chub sems gang yin// gsung ba de yi dbang bskur bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
207b4(rgyud): dam tshig chen po rnam byung ba// khams lnga las byung bcud kyis len// bde ba chen pos myang bar gyis// slob ma rtog/ pa dang bral bas// pad+ma la gnas de myang gyis// 'das pa'i rdo rje
207b5(rgyud): 'chang ba yis// rgyal sras ji ltar dbang bskur bya// byang chub se mas kyi chu yis ni// bu khyod de bzhin dbang bskur bya// / de nas shes rab dbang bskur phyir// bla mas don 'dod slob ma
207b6(rgyud): la dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// bdag la khyed kyis dbang bskur stsol// de nas slob dpon bdag nyid che// phyag rgya yang dag byin gyis rlob// mchog ni thob par bya ba'i phyir// de 'og slob ma
207b7(rgyud): la ni sbyin// lha mo phyag rgya chen po 'di// dpag med bde ba rab ster ba// bu yis kun nas blangs nas ni// bla na med pa'i mchod pa gyis// de nas shes rab ye shes de'i// sgrub pa'i mchog tu 'dod pa'i don
207b8(rgyud): lha mo'i ye shes de nyid mchog/ dngos grub don du nga yis sbyin// lha mos de la bka' bsgo ba// dpa' bo'i bu ni bla na med// dpa' bo khyod ni spro 'am ci// byang chub sems ni za nus sam// yang dag de ni/ 
208a1(rgyud): nges par ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du smros// ji ltar gsungs pa'i dam tshig mchog/ lha mo ci phyir bdag mi nus// de nas lha mo do dgyes nas// skra bkrol gos ni bor nas kyang // pad+ma dag
208a2(rgyud): ni 'byed byed cing // badz+ra mo k+Sha ho zhes gsungs// b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa// bde ba kun tu rgyu ba'i rtsa// sor mos bskul nas dga' bar bya// ji hAs kyang ni rol par bya// lhan cig skyes pa'i bde/ 
208a3(rgyud): byed pa// 'di nyid rig pa bzang bsten na// mchog tu dga' bas nyams myong nas// lhung ba'i bde bas de myang bya// de nas bcom ldan ma dgyes nas// b+hany+dza mo k+Sha'i sngags gsung zhing // rkang pa g.yon pa
208a4(rgyud): mgo la bzhag/ bka' yis de nyid yang dag bstan// de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis// ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// darmi lam bzhin du sems can gyi// bla na med pa'i don byos shig/ 
208a5(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa yi// 'di la man ngag la mi shes// ri/ ga pa 'di ni dor byas nas// thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs mi rgya// brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog/ rig ma'i
208a6(rgyud): brtul zhugs bu yis spyod// de ltar 'di ni byang chub mchog/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma// rim pa bzhin du yongs shes bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang brten// bdag la go 'phang mchog stsal lags
208a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin kun gyis 'bras bu gsal// sems can kun la ci 'dod par// dngos grub bla na med par gsol// slar yang gshegs par mdzad pa'i phyir// rang gi gnas gshegs badz+ra muH// de nas/ 
208a8(rgyud): lhag ma'i gtor ma sbyin// 'khor lo lhag par 'byung ba'i rim// u tsiSh+ma k+She tra pa la// a ti tsakra u tsiSh+Ta// su b+ho dzi nI bi ba gnyis// b+hak+Sha gnyis dang sar+b+ba dang // sid+d+hi pras sme ma dang // oM sngon AHhA/ 
208b1(rgyud): phaT swA hA// de yi rjes la brjod par bya// rdo rje dril bu 'chang 'gyur ba// g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pas gnas// khams gsum rnam rgyal rang bzhin dang // rdo rje slob dpon rang bzhin ni// khams gsum
208b2(rgyud): rnam rgyal rang bzhin 'chang // de ltar cho ga nyi shu las// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid bstan// de nyid mang du shes pa yis// bla ma dge ba'i las bzang po// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng
208b3(rgyud): ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu pa'i las rgyas po'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// de yi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu ni// las ni cho ga nyi
208b4(rgyud): shur bshad// dbang phyug chen po'i rgyu mtshan ci// de yi 'bras bu zhig 'gyur// chen po'i chen po ji skad gsungs// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// las kyi rgyu mtshan 'bras bu dang // sngon
208b5(rgyud): du bsnyen pa'i las kyis ni// rgyu mtshan 'jig rten dngos grub brgyad / ser sna la sogs bsal ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnam sgom zhing // sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang // bco
208b6(rgyud): 'grus bsam gtan rab tu rdzogs// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur gyis// shes rab pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// gsang ba la sogs la gnas pa// skye bo chags pa'i rgyu mtshan no// kun tu spyod pa'i chos
208b7(rgyud): rnams kyis// mnyam nyid ye shes rgyu yis ni// bla ma dad pas mchod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang don// chu sogs ming ni mthar thug pa// ye shes lnga yi rnam dag phyir// spyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i
208b8(rgyud): mtha' sems can bsam pa rnam dag phyir// shes rab brtul zhugs sogs kyi mtha'// dpe yis bde ba bstan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor sa tshon phra rab dang // mtshungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
209a1(rgyud): kun la mchod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang // de ltar 'bras bu 'khor lo 'jug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa ni// las kyi sgrib pa dag par 'gyur// shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyi
209a2(rgyud): dbang bskur ba ni thob pa dang // dngos po'i ngo bo ji bzhin du// shes rab ye shes kyis ni thob// bla ma yis ni bsgrub pa yang // mchod pa de yi go 'phang mchog/ de ltar yun mi ring bar 'thob// dag pa'i spyod
209a3(rgyud): pa brtul zhugs mchog/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las cho ga nyi shu pa'i rgyu mtshan dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// 
209a4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// mchod pa'i cho ga bla na med // gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// lus la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim// rdo shing sa dang gser gyi ni// sku
209a5(rgyud): gzugs la ni phyag mi bya// rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // rab gnas nam yang mi bya'o// dri chen rdor chung kon mchog sogs// bdag nyid lnga ni rtag tu mchod// de phyir/ 
209a6(rgyud): de la mngon zhugs pa'o// thugs kyi rdo rje rang nyid gtso// sems de yang ni de dngos med// gang phyir stong nyid mtshan nyid ni// stong nyid kyang ni rnam pa med// de phyir thams cad na mkha' 'dra// de ltar na/ 
209a7(rgyud): dag rnam shes bya// rtsa ni gsum la'ang mchod par bya// gang phyir sems kyi rang bzhin kun// sems las gzhan pa yod ma yin// rang nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dang // sems kyi rang bzhin la ni gan
209a8(rgyud): lha yi gzugs ni bla med pa// sems ma gtogs pa gzhan ni med// de phyir de ltar rnam dpyod pa// rang lus gcig pu rtag tu mchod// rigs lnga dag tu rtag spyod pas// rigs gcig tu na rnam
209b1(rgyud): ba dag 'dod dpa mi 'dod dbye ba dang // btung nga mi 'atung rnam par smras// rnam 'byongan la yod ska la med ces/ nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// phyag rgya'i rnam pa stan pa sogs/ de bzhin ga rgyas
209b2(rgyud): lang dbye ba gsum// gzugs rdo rjem bzhuganas sa// sa snying la ni dbul bar bya// yang dag klu dang brjod bra la dbyas// de bzhin skula'ang dbye ba gsum// sgra rdo rjes yang dag gu// phyag na
209b3(rgyud): ni dbu'o// ga pur a ga dza ti sogs// de bzhin dri yang dbye ba gsum// dri rdo rje ma yang dag dgug/ nam kha'i snying po la yang dbul// 'o byed pa dong 'jib pa dang // ro drug de bzhin dbye ba gsum// 
209b4(rgyud): ngom yang dag dgug// 'jig rten dang drug la ni dbul// dza// rje bad+ma yang dag sbyor// gos dang 'khrung pa'i dbye ba gas ma// reg bya rdo rje yang dag dgug/ sgrib se la la ni dayul ba
209b5(rgyud): phyi yi chos rnams 'di dag kun// brtags pa dang ni ma brtags pa'ang // chos dbyings rdo rje yang dag dgug/ 'jam pa la ni dbul// de bzhin phyi dang ning dang ni// gnyis ka yang ni ma
209b6(rgyud): dmigs pa// gzugs la gsum du byas nas ni// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// yul ni lnga ni nges gnas te// rgyud lngar nges par 'byung ba ni// rmi lam rlung dang ldan pa ru// 'dod pa lnga rnams spyod par byed
209b7(rgyud): dbang po gang dang gang lam gyis// sgrub pa po ni yul 'thob bo// de dag thams cad thugs rje che// mnyes pa'i phyir ni dbul bar bya// yang dag dga' ba'i me tog gis// rdo rje nyi ma pad+ma 'byung // me tog bdag
209b8(rgyud): nyid la mchod pa// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshi ge mchog/ rnam rtog tshul yul ma yin zhing // de ltar gtum mo'i me yis ni// nges par bsregs pa de ni spos// thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul// rdo rje pad+ma yang dag par// nug+sa
210a1(rgyud): pa la sogs rim las byung // rnal 'byor pa yi mi shigs sgra// thugs rdo rje la dbul bar bya// yi ge hUM las yang dag byung // sngags kyi 'od zer shin tu gsal// mar me' bar
210a2(rgyud): ba'i yang dag 'od// thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya// bde ba chen po na mkhar gnas// byang chub sems ni sad pa dang // de nyid kyis kyang byugs pa ni// thugs kyi rdo rje la dbul bya// 'dir ni gang dang gang
210a3(rgyud): longs spyod// dbang po thams cad yang dag brten// de dag thams cad thugs rdo rje// bza' ba'i snod du mchod par bya// dgod dang sgeg dang rtse 'jo ni// sna tshogs kyis ni sems dga' byed// rnam par thA/ 
210a4(rgyud): pa'i sgo ga dang // thugs kyi rdo rje la ni dbul// rnal 'byor che na po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las nang gi bdag nyid mchod pa'i cho ga'i rnam par dbye ba'i le'u stelnga
210a5(rgyud): bcu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// lha mo yi ni mtshan nyi/ da mchog/ rnal 'byor bde la rtogs pa rnams// rtsa dbye ba yi
210a6(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu lus kyi rtse 'jo bya// de yi lha rnams su ni bshad// rtag tu bde ba kun gyis dga'// kun nas rnam par sgeg pa'i lus// bde ba chen pos kun tu khyab// lha nyid du ni yang dag brjod// 
210a7(rgyud): dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba dang // bral ba lhan cig skyes skad cig/ 'char ba dang ni rtse 'jo dang // kun nas lhag par sgeg pa dang // brgya la dang sad par gyur pa dang // de rnams lha mo ru ni bshad// 
210a8(rgyud): dun zung ban// gang phyir yang dag sbyor bar 'gyur// lus kyi rtsa rnams yang dag sang // depyir rnal 'byor mi ni bshad// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las lha mong sa nan
210b1(rgyud): kyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// e baM zhes bya yi ge gnyis// e ni stong pa nyid du bshad// de bzhin po ni thugs rje dang / 
210b2(rgyud): thig le de gnyis sbyor las byung // de ni rnal 'byor rmad mchog byung // e baM gnyis ni sangs rgyas dang // mdor bsdus chos kyi phyag rgya'o// rgyal po chen po phyag rgya gnyis// rgyud rnams su ni thogs
210b3(rgyud): gsungs// e ni b+ha ga'i mtshan nyid do// pad+ma'i rten du shes par bya// rten pa rdo rje zhes ni gsungs// brtan pa rdo rje 'chang ba yi// de la gnas pa'i thig le'i gzugs// sna tshogs sprul pa ston par byed// bde/ 
210b4(rgyud): ba kun gyi gzhi yi gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// e ni gsang ba'i mkha' dbyings sam// b+ha ga chos 'byung pad+ma la// / rnal 'byor seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// mchog tu rmad byung / 
210b5(rgyud): ston par mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' bo rdo rje// rdo rje 'jigs byed/ dbang phyug dang // he ru ka dang dus 'khor lo// dang po sang / sa rgyas la sogs mtshan// e ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya
210b6(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i bde mchog dang // stong nyid snying rje dbyer med dang // gang la de nyid mngon par brjod// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya// gnyis med ye shes mtshan ma ni// rgyud kun gyi ni gleng gzhir
210b7(rgyud): gsungs// rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa// stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa// gang la de nyid mngon par brjod// a baM zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis// gang la 'di nyid med pa ni// de la de kho na nyid med// gang la de nyid yong/ 
210b8(rgyud): shes pa kha tses ma'i gser ltar gsal bor ni// rgyud ni legs bshad de nyid shes// sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas par// de ltar 'di ni de nyid mchog/ e baM don ni rnam par nges// chos kyi phyag rgya yige/ 
211a1(rgyud): cu brgya // nus ga na nga ga kyis // 9 lagags rgyas pa/ gangogs pa dag so shes rnam gyi
211a2(rgyud): rgyus/  ni ga ste/ 'od chags pal sogs pa drug 'a / nga pa gsuman ma sa shes pa/ dzin cha par rnam pa ma/  ngas ma / 
211a3(rgyud): skyed / nga gas ma das ma sa bya / su na/ ma ga na dug /  la
211a4(rgyud): la/ gro sa shes gsu // so snang zhugs pa bste/ de ni nga 'gyu /  sa dgas pa pa grog// zu
211a5(rgyud): gsum gyi mtshan nyid can// gang dza rnam shes gsum thob be// sems cam khams ni ma lus pa'i// rang bzhin rtsa ba'i ngamanano//  de ni ri'i 'don srung ba// rlung gis blangs nas 'a
211a6(rgyud): byed pa/ yang rgyu dang ldan pa'i rnam shes mi// kun tu 'grol gnas par 'gyur// ed 'di ni chung khams chen po ste// rnam shes gsum gyi bzhan pa yin// de yis rang bzhin dag tu ni/ 'i wA sam tshwaH
211a7(rgyud): 'gyur ka sra nga'is khams chu nyid dang // de bzhin me dang rlung dag ni// rnam par shes par blangs nas su// srid gsum gnas su skye bar 'gyur// sI 'din phung po lnga rnams su// thung sa dus byas mtshan
211b1(rgyud): nyid ni// gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed dang // rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa'o// sa/ mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang // bya ba sgrub pa nyid dang ni// me long dang ni chos kyi dbyings// 'di ni ye shes lnga po yin// ma
211b2(rgyud): yid kyi skye mched nyid dang ni// mig dang de bzhin na pa dang // sna dang l+le dang lus rnams te// 'di ni skye mched rnams 'byung ba'o// sa gang yang khams gsum sems can rnams// srog dang stsol ba la brten pa
211b3(rgyud): gsang sngags rgyal po bzlos bzhin du// mi shes bsam gtan klog pa spangs// b+ha/ 'di las rang bzhin chags pa dang // chags med la sogs par yang 'gyur// de las dge dang mi dge'i las/ 
211b4(rgyud): de las skye ba byung ba yin// gang 'gro ba 'byung ba'i phung po rnams/ sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid de// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga zhes// ming gis rab tu bskul ba yin// bAn/ rlung
211b5(rgyud): chu dang me dngas// spyan la sogs pa bzhi po ste// ye shes bdag nyid can gsum du// shes bya sangs rgyas byang chub ster// sa/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur// phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas
211b6(rgyud): btab cing // mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid der// sa snying la sogs rgyal sras so// rba/ rol pas dga' ba gang yin pa'i// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen rnams// de yi phyogs mtshams ngo bo ru// dpung pa
211b7(rgyud): yan lag rnams su brtag/ ta/ de dang de yi rigs las byung // lha dang lha mo tha dad pa// de ni yod min de dag kyang // 'gro ba'i don phyir ston pa yin// thA/ 'di las gnyis med mthong ba yi// rnal 'byor pa ni ye/ 
211b8(rgyud): shes gsum// mthong phyir dman dang bar ma dang // dam pa'i yul la bzhag par bya// ga/ dbang po rang nyid rang yul la// 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dang de// dbang po'i spyod yul gang dang gang // de dang de snang tsam
212a1(rgyud): nyid do// ta dbang pod yis lam nas ni// sgrub pa pos ni yul thob pa// de bzhin de las ma gsungs par// tshim par bya phyir dbul bar bya// kA sku gsum dag ni tha dad par// skyob pa
212a2(rgyud): yis ni yang dag bstan// rdzogs pa'i rim gyis sbyor ba yis// gcig tu yang ni 'gyur ba yin// ya/ gang zhig sangs rgyas sku mtshan nyid// kun rdzob bden par gsungs pa ni// de nyid rdzogs rims sbyor/ 
212a3(rgyud): ba yis// 'od gsal bar ni rnam dag 'gyur// bA ka tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid// gtso bo ye shes sku rang bzhin// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// 'ja' tshon bzhin du snang ba yin// tsi ta
212a4(rgyud): sems dang sems byung ma rig pa// shes rab thabs dang nyer thob nga dang // stong dang shin tu stong pa dang // stong chen zhes kyang rab tu ba brjod// ta/ rang bzhin snang ba'i dbye shes na// de nas spyod pa rab tu bya
212a5(rgyud): las kyi lus ni yongs spangs nas// rdo rje sku nyid thob par 'gyur// // hri/ thugs la 'jig rten pa rnams kyi// don spyod bzhi gnas de bzhin gshegs// kun rdzob du ni sprul skur gnas// 
212a6(rgyud): ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa spyod// da/ yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin du// 'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun tshogs kyang // stobs kyis blangs nas spyod par 'gyur// ya rnal
212a7(rgyud): 'byor dbang po gang yang 'dod// de ni sgrib pa med par bya// mnyam par ma gzhag rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur// ba/ rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// ye shes gsum gyi cha rig
212a8(rgyud): pa blo la gos dang ma gos pa// dar ni bde bas rtag tu gnas// rjer sbru ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// dngos dag kun las rnam par rol// sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed bzhin du// gtan la phab pa'i
212b1(rgyud): gzhi la gnas// yod rnal 'byor lhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor chen po rang nyid 'gyur// rdo rje can dang mkha 'gro ma// gang yang rnal 'byor de rang nyid// ShI/ dgag pa dag kyang byed pas na// 
212b2(rgyud): bya dang bya min rnam spangs te// pad+ma la ni 'dam gyis bzhin// ngo bo nyid zhes gos mi 'gyur// b+ha/ yon tan brgyad dang nyer ldan pas// sems can thams cad rigs 'gyur zhing // 'jig rten khams
212b3(rgyud): ni ma lus par// bdag nyid ye shes lus kyis spyod// ga/ gtso bo gang du spyod pa yi// de yi khyim ni na mkha' nyid// bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// de nyid du ni rtag tu rol// lu/ 'di la snang ba bye
212b4(rgyud): ba la 'thun mtshams nyin mo mtshan mo yi// 'jig rten tha snyad byas pa yis// ye shes gsum ni mthong phyir ro// bi/ sna tshogs pa yi tha snyad dag/ 'jig rten pas ni yongs brtags pa/ 
212b5(rgyud): lan gsum gyi ni dbye ba yis// ye shes gsum las 'byung / 'o// dza/ skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dang // srid pa bar ma gnas pa ste// ji snyed 'jig rten gyis brtags pa// sems kyi
212b6(rgyud): rlung ni rnam 'phrul lo// ha/ rgo dang rtse mo byed pa dang // gar gyi nyams dgur ldan pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya rnam rtog pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa'o// ra/ bdag byin rlabs chen ma gtogs pa// rin chen
212b7(rgyud): gzhan dag 'di na med// me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin// rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam pa'o// 'di skad la sogs dang po'i ngag/ mchog tu gsungs pa'i don rgyas pa// gsang ba 'dus pa'i rtsa ba'i mdo/ 
212b8(rgyud): de nyid bshad pa bsdus pa ni// rim pa ji lta ba bzhin shes// sgrub po 'de nyid shes pa ni// ye shes mchog gi mtshan nyid kyis// gang du gsal bar ma gsungs so// rim pa 'di yis rnal 'byor/ 
213a1(rgyud): dpal ldan 'dus pa rgyas btab pa// de ltar rim pa 'di yis shes// sems can kun la phan bskyed pa'o// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa
213a2(rgyud): las e baM ma yA zhes bya ba dang po'i ngag bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// nang gi bdag nyid sbyin sreg mchog
213a3(rgyud): nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung ba rnams// gang gis thim par gyur pa dang // rnam rtog bag chags sa bon ni// phung po lnga yi bud shing dang // rnal 'byor ye shes chen po'i mas// rtag tu sbyin sreg rmad byung bya
213a4(rgyud): lte dbus gnas pa'i sgra tsam ni// sgra tsam phyi rol gas dpad+ma// de la rang rgyud rlung gis ni// yongs su bskul ba'i dam yis ni// dbang po gnyis ni yang dag sbyor// gzi brjid gas
213a5(rgyud): bar rab tu 'bar// gang tshe mar gang gsang pad+ma// de la 'di ni smod du brjod// ha ni blugs gzar zhes byar gsungs/ rdo rje dgang gzar du ni brjod// b+ha ga thab khung zhes ni bshad// 
213a6(rgyud): dbang po lnga yi sreg rdzas dang // phung po yam shing du ni gyur// mar ni byang chub sems su bshad// gnam stong nas brtsams nya'i bar// ji srid byed pa gshegasu gsol// me thab thig le tsam du
213a7(rgyud): gsungs// blugs gzar nam yang mi 'pho ba// sangs rgyas gti mug dga' la sogs// gzugs rdo rje sogs rgyal sras rnams// khro bo'i rgyal po bcu la ni// rtag tu sbyin sreg gis tshim bya// rdo rje sems
213a8(rgyud): dpa' mchod pa gang // de yang dgang blugs su ni brjod// hUM phaT yang dag ldan sngags kyis// cho ga bzhin du sreg blugs dbul// de yis lus gnas mnyes 'gyur na// lha yi dam tshig bla na med// yid la
213b1(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa rnams// de ltar dngos grub stsal nas ni// sbyin sreg 'di ni mchog tu gsungs// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bu stsol// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs
213b2(rgyud): las nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi le'u ste drug cu tham pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' ba ni// dngos grub kun byed/ 
213b3(rgyud): de nyid mchog/ ji ltar rigs pa'i rim pa bzhin// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang // don yod grub dang 'od dpag med// rin chen rgyal mtshan lnga po ni// bdud rtsi lnga yi mtshan nyid do// khrag ni
213b4(rgyud): rin chen dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems ni 'od dpag med/ de bzhin don yod grub pa sha/ mi bskyod de bzhin rdo rje na / dri chen rnam snang mdzad du bshad// de dag bdud rtsi lnga ni mchog
213b5(rgyud): bas mtha' nyams dga' skye bos dben// sgra yi tsher ma rnam pa/ ra spangs// de la khang pa bya ba ni// khang pa nyis brtseg sgo da nga bcas// sa 'og khang pa gcig bya zhing // gzhan dag de yi
213b6(rgyud): steng du bya// gzhan ni gsangs nas bya ba ste// 'jig rten pa ni gcig tu shes// sgrub pos de nyid kun shes shing // sngags shes bsam pa rgya che ba// brtan zhing snying rje mkhas pa dang // yul la phra dog rna
213b7(rgyud): par spongs// sgrub po gtso bo'i yon tan gang // de lta bu nyid sgrub grogs mchog/ chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// brtson zhing brkam chags med pa dang // khro med dang bcas dpa' ba dang // 
213b8(rgyud): mdu bris shing sod par blta// thogs gnyis gsoni lus// 'bras bu sogs kyis dag byag// gnod sachis bskul byed 'bum drag gcig/ de ngas sngags pas bslab bya// mi su ldan su pa gyu/ 
214a1(rgyud): / oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT// de nas zla gcig yige gsum// sgrub bos mi smra bzlas par bya// kun tu bzang
214a2(rgyud): po 'gro ba'i gtso// da ni skad cig rmi lam mthong // des ni bka' yis bsgo ba ni// ka n+ya mchog ni rten gyis la// sems can don ni mtshungs med byos// ji ltar de nyid rdo rje 'chang // bu mo skal ldan mig
214a3(rgyud): yangs ma// gzugs dang lang chos rnam par rgyan// brkam chags med cing chags bcas sems// sgeg pas myos shing bsgyings dang bcas// nu rgyas sngo bsangs nyams dga' ba// rnam rtog/ 
214a4(rgyud): med cing mang du thos// sgrub pos de srid 'dod par bya// ji sri da khu ba dang bcas gyur// de nas gdong ni pad+ma gnyis// gnyis ka'abyung ba blangs nas ni// pad+ma'i snod der bzhag par bya// 
214a5(rgyud): mtshan nyid bzang por zhag bdun du// glang po rta khyi ba lang / mi// dpyid zla tha chungs gnyis ka shar// skye gnas nas ni blangs nas ni// de bzhin da ru rim pa bzhin// pad snod de nyid la/ 
214a6(rgyud): ni der/ zhag bdun par du bzhag par bya// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// yi ge gsum ni sngags bzlas bya// 'du 'dzi med cing dben pa'i gnas// tsan dan bzang po byugs nas ni// dzaHhUM baM hoHyi sngags
214a7(rgyud): bkod pa'i// pad+mo'i snod la bzhag par bya// ra yi 'o ma til gyi mar// mar dang li kha dkar po dang // cha bsnyams bskol ba byas nas ni// de dang lhan cig snod bzhag bsre// rgya shug tshig gu ched tsam gyi/ 
214a8(rgyud): blo dang ldan pas ril bu bya// grib ma la ni brkam byas nas// rim gyis bskyed cing bza' bar bya// rdo rje ming sring spun dang ni// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'// zla ba gcig nas de nas lhag
214b1(rgyud): mdza' bo rnams dang yang dag bsgo// mar ngo'i ches brgyad tshes bcu'am// yang na bcu bzhi nas brtsams te// de la gtor ma bya ba ni// las kun la ni bla na med// de las kyang ni dngos grub ste// phyug rgya
214b2(rgyud): chen po mngon rdzogs dang // dngos grub rgyas dang ni bsogs// de yis 'bad mi dgos par thob// rlung gi de nyid yang dag slob// mkha' spyod nyid ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje nga
214b3(rgyud): ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i chog
214b4(rgyud): mchog gang gis mchod pa las byung ba// rgyal sras rnams dngos grub mchog/ rnal 'byor tshe dang lhan cig tu// sgrub pa 'i phyir ni yang dag gnas// phyag rgya brda ni yongs shes shing // de dang
214b5(rgyud): dam tshig la ni 'jug/ de rnams tshogs ni rab mchog dang // rdza gas kyi 'khor lo zhes ni brjod// kun kyang dam tshig lag/ nas pa// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// bla ma la dang dmatshig
214b6(rgyud): gnas// gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis rgyan// thabs shes bya ba bgegs med na// tshogs kyi 'khor lo la ni 'jug/ gzhan du skyon ni 'byung 'gyur te// 'khor lo la yang 'grub mi 'gyur// 
214b7(rgyud): rab kyang ni thabs dang mtshungs// mdza' bo bzang dang rab tu mkhas// lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon// lhag pa yongs su spangs nas ni// thabs dang so sor shes rab dang // kun la gcig ni phan yon med// thog ma
214b8(rgyud): yid 'ong nyams dga' bar// me tog gi ni dkyil 'khor bya// de nyid sna tshogs mchod pa ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag nas mchod// gtso bo dngos po kun gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mchod
215a1(rgyud): / tshogs kyi mchod pa byas rjes la// dkyil 'khor lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pas// dad pa dngos pos kun nas ni// mnyam pas blta bas bsgoms nas ni// bstan bcos nyams myong 'jig
215a2(rgyud): rten dang // 'gal ba de ni gzhug mi bya// gzhan yang bstan bcos las gsungs pa// mtshan phyed na ni dgag par bya// slob dpon mgon la yang dag mchod// ji ltar gdan stangs bzhugs gsol nas// 
215a3(rgyud): gdan ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po yang dag ldan// rdo rje slob dpon de nyid kyang // mkhyen pa 'khor lo'i dbus na bzhugs// dkyil 'khor ba ni gzhan rnams dang // de bzhin 'khor lo gnas pa bzhag
215a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor pa bzhin shes par bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lor gtam smra dang // rtsod dang de bzhin sgrub pa dang // mchil snabs dor zhing dgod pa dang // rkang pa la sogs skyong ba dang // yang dang yang
215a5(rgyud): du ldang ba ni// de la dus kun du mi bya// phyag rgya brda'i tshogs rnams kyi/ sa// bya zhing bya bar shes par bya// shes bzhin du ni gar da nga glu// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du mi bya// gtso bo la ni snod kyi
215a6(rgyud): mchog/ dum bu gcig pa mtshan nyid bzang // de med dum bu gsum pa la// me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod// lha yi chang la sogs pa gang // legs par mnyam par gzhag ste dbul// tshogs rnams
215a7(rgyud): la yang so sor snod // me tog tshogs kyis yongs gang ba// thog mar gtor ma chen po sbyin// sngon bzhin bzang la sogs ldan// gang gis dga' ba rnams nyams pa// de 'dra btung bar mi bya'o// yang dang yang / 
215a8(rgyud): du phyag byas nas// phyag rgya bcings nas btung bar bya// de nas bza' ba thams cad ni// sbyang bya sogs kyis yang dag sbyang // oM dang aHdang hUM gis ni// spyang dang sad dang rtogs par bya// gur gum can
215b1(rgyud): dan dpa' bo dang // gangs dang ri dgas lte ba dang // 'di ni dag byed bdud rtsi lnga// bza' ba 'di rnams rab tu spyod// sbom po ming med sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rim bzhin// gang gis lce rtses myang / 
215b2(rgyud): bar bya// pad+ma'i dbus su dus kun tu// kha la sems ni rnam par bkod// bla na med pa'i mchod pa bya// pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus la ni// dpa' bo rnams kyi gdan du brjod// dpa' bo'i don gyis mtshan nyid rnams
215b3(rgyud): gal te dpa' bo mi shes na// dngos grub thams cad gsol pa yi// 'khor lod mi 'bras bu med // de lta'i rim pa cung zad gang // phyi nang bdag nyid yang dge spong // de cis yang dag dngos grub 'gyur// 
215b4(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i 'bras bu ste// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig/ 'dres// rab tu bshad kyis de nyon cig/ gdug pa'i ma'agro ma 'ga' zhig/ sems rtogs pa yi phyir 'ongs nas/ 
215b5(rgyud): del de tshe smra ba yang // sgrub pa pos ni mi bya zhing // tshig tsam gyis kya nga lan mi gdab// bde bar 'ongs sam phyag rgya bya// de la cu nga zad pa smra gang // slob dpon rang nyid kyis ni bya// yang na ba
215b6(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi// las kyi rdo rje yang dag spyad// gang phyir gang nyid rdo rje sems// las kyi rdo rje gzhan 'ga' med// sna tshogs kyi ni rnal 'byor ma// yang dang yang du dgug par bya// de la g.yo ba'i spyod pa maud
215b7(rgyud): slob dpon dpa' bo bzhin du spyod// gang yang skyon gyi spyod pa ni// de yi lus ni ltung bar 'gyur// shin tu dga' ba yang dag skyes// bka' bsgo gar gyi spyod pa bya// rdo rje bcing bas de yang bya// lha rnams
215b8(rgyud): ji ltar mnyes pa nyid// ma 'am sring mo bu mo 'am// gal te mchod par 'dod pa na// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// rtog pa med par bstan par bya//  mchog de yi dngos grub ni// thob par 'di la the tso
216a1(rgyud): med// lhag ma gtor ma blangs nas ni// dgon pa chen por song nas dor// k+Sh+mI uts+tshiSh+Tak+She tra pA lA ya swAhA// sngags brjod bya/ gal te de la rab byed pa'i// rnal 'byor ma ni sla
216a2(rgyud): mthong // de ltar de ni yongs shes nas// rnal 'byor pa yi mtshan nyid mchog/ gang gi gdong na 'bar ba'i 'od// zlum zhing 'jam la mdzes po dang // smin ma ring bde shes bya// 'od dpag med kyi rigs
216a3(rgyud): las byung // de la pad+ma'i phyag rgya bstan// rus sbal phyag rgya lan yin no// mchu slo mig dkyus ring ba dang // kha dog ser po yid 'phrog pa// 'di yi dpral bar yi ge gsum// ji srid skra mtshams bar du
216a4(rgyud): gnas// g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyis ni// 'dzum dag la ni/ dag tu nyan// 'di 'dra'i mkha'agro mthong na ni// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa dang // de yi bar
216a5(rgyud): byed rab tu ston// g.yon pas yongs su bskor nas ni// phyag rgya lan gyis bstan par bya// sna tshogs pa yi gos la 'a nga dga'// rin chen 'byung ldan rigs las byung // kha dog
216a6(rgyud): gnag cing gos kyang gnag/ skra ni 'khyil cing dar gyis bcings// dpral bar gzhu yi rnam pa yis// de 'dra'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni// rtag tu de ni sems g.yo ba// ma mo zhes ni rab tu grags// dril bu'i
216a7(rgyud): phyag rgya bstan par bya// de yi g.yon pas phyag rgya ston// mi bskyod rigs las byung bar shes// mtshan mo'i sa nas 'gro ba'i mchog/ thung ngu lto sbom kha dog dkar// byin pa sbom zhing shin tu mdzes// sa
216a8(rgyud): spyod mar ni shes par bya// dung gi phyag rgya lan yin no// rnam par snang mdzad rigs las byung // mig yangs rdzi ma sdug pa dang // yan lag kun la ba spus rgyan// sngo bsangs mig ni dmar ba dang // man
216b1(rgyud): lag phra zhing dpung pa ring // de ni mkha'agro ma ru grags// don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung // de 'dra ba yi rab mthong nas// ba dan gyi ni phyag rgya dang // g.yon pa'i phyag rgya'i lan yin no// de ltar
216b2(rgyud): 'bad pas shes nas ni// mkhas pas mtshan mo song nas ni// de la cung zhig 'jigs mi bya// gang phyir de nyid gang mchod bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa lnga/ 
216b3(rgyud): tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang / rnal 'byor ma dang 'dre ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// gsang ba'i tshig gi bshad pa dang
216b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i gnas sogs gnas rnams su// rigs kun las byung rnal 'byor ma// mtshan mo 'dra ba'i dam tshig ni// 'di 'dra ba da yi tshig rnams dang // de lta bu yi gsang ba ni// bshad kyis
216b5(rgyud): dang ba'i sems kyis nyon// saM bo ta kaM chang 'thung ba// bi ra sha rA mngon par brjod// na li ni pa ti thod dang // kun laM laM ma'i rus pa'i rgyan// kun dar 'dod yang dag sbyor// tsa ro ro drug
216b6(rgyud): bza' ba'o// saM pu taM dbang po gnyis sbyor ba// a li gang yod pa yi ming // shang rim ga kaM skal yod shes// tsi tra ka ni skal med shes// ru sha raM ni zhu bar shes// mr-i ga ma dam bla rtsir brjod// can
216b7(rgyud): dra ma ni khrag tu bshad// ga ne bshang bar yongasu grags// g+ha ne sha chen du ni bshad// ni dzid dur ru brjod// b+ha ha na ni chu ru bshad// bak+She yan lag rab tu bshad// shu baM bzang po zhes ni brjod// 
216b8(rgyud): hon tshim pa zhes ni grags// marga ltogs pa ru ni brjod// g+h+r-i ti la du bshad pa dang // byo ma ga na pha rol dpung // ka ma yan gyis shig brjod// na ga ra ni bdag lus brjod// ba tag ni nyos shes brjod// 
217a1(rgyud): / a dza la ni me zhes brjod// sha kha za ba zhes ni brjod// rag ma 'dor na chog brjod// sha ta ka mi bza' bar brjod// ci 'dra ba ni sngags zhes brjod// shar khyi 'tshed sha zhes brjod
217a2(rgyud): rab ka ni bla mar bshad// ka ya 'drir ni rgyal rigs brjod// rag rje rigs zhes ni bshad// be ra rgya ni dmangs rigs brjod// tsa bo rigs ngan zhes ni brjod// sha re smai sha can du brjod// b+ha bcu
217a3(rgyud): kol lpags mkhan// khad ko ma ro sreg ma ru bshad// sa man tra ni rgyal por brjod// mi ra ma'i ring du brjod// b+ha ra ha gang zhes ni bshad// bim+mu phag ces brjod par bya// pa laM sha ni nya zhes brjod// de na
217a4(rgyud): ra skyes bu ni bshad// nag tu sbyin sreg tu ni bshad// maN+Da dahA 'dab chags brjod// hi ra pU ni me tog brjod// sha drul de la ni spos su bshad// mA la ti ni dri ru bshad// sha ku ni/ 
217a5(rgyud): mar mer bshad// ka shi ka ni gos su bshad// ke sa ra ni ga n+da ngadu brjod// baM traM dpral ba zhes su bshad// ma la smin ma yang dag grags// ko ba la yo ni mig tu shes// a da ra na so
217a6(rgyud): ru brjod// bal la bo ni mchu ru shes// pa sha mgrin pa ru ni grags// hUM so phrag pa ru ni bshad// a gu ro ni dpung par brjod// so so ru ni lag par bshad// shri pang le ni nu mar brjod// dza ti pha la
217a7(rgyud): rkang par brjod// da la naM ni lte bar brjod// pad+ma dza lam gsang ba'i gnas// ka taM ba kaM brla gnyis so// ba sa rje ngar du ni bshad// tshA ga na ni rkang par brjod// ba ra a ka ke sa ra// sen mo zhes ni yang dag
217a8(rgyud): bshad// pad+ma gar ni ga ni snang // sha kra ku su li mal bstan// shag tu bu shes bya bar brjod// na la ni nAl ston med// go bag la ma thams cad brjod// sa ga re ni rgas par bshad// a la ron nas/ 
217b1(rgyud): bor brjod// um+WAr rim mi nim bshad// mI gu si smra ba ni bshad// bgol lung glu len// mi thag zhes bya bar brjod// sha rdul 'chos su ni bshang // skar gzhags par rab tugs
217b2(rgyud): rangs sgeg mo so ro 'bebs ma// ru ba ri yo rtse mi'o// trin ha ni bsad par bshad// pA rA ba ta 'chi bar brjod// to ma lA ko sa ma yul// phal grong khyer du ni brjod// dran grong du bshad pa yin// khyAn+d+ha
217b3(rgyud): srog ces bya bar bshad// ku ru ta ra mkhas par bshad // na yan ni rnam shes brjod// a b+hin be dgod par bshad// ru d+hi ra ni 'chang bar brjod// ku mu ra ni nyin mor bshad// kan nya mtshan mo
217b4(rgyud): rab tu grag so// des nyi ma phyed du bshad// da pe mtshan gyi mgrags// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon pa ngar rtogs pa las gsang ba'i tshig bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu
217b5(rgyud): rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// sku gsung thugs kyis dkyil 'khor ni// sku ni mgo bor gnas pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis
217b6(rgyud): byang sems 'bab// de ni so sor rab phye bas// sku yi 'khor lo ru zhes bya// yi ge phyi mo'i dbye ba yis// gsung la gnas par rab tu shos// chags sogs bag chags dbye ba yis// thugs kyi 'khor lo
217b7(rgyud): ru ni shes// sku gsung thugs kyi bshad pa ni// sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/ rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la// rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas// dang po sku yi rdo rje ni// gzugs phung la ni yang dag bzhug
217b8(rgyud): de rjes na mkha'i rdo rje ni// tshor ba yi ni phung por bzhugs// bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni// 'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs// las rnams kyi ni rdo rje ni// 'du byed ci ni phung por bzhugs// bcom ldan
218a1(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje ni// rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs// yang 'di'i sha sogs sa khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum spyan bzhugs so// khrag sogs chu yi khams la ni// bcom
218a2(rgyud): ldan 'das yum mA ma bzhugs// dro ba la sogs me khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum gos dkar bzhugs// mi bskyod la sogs rlung khams la// bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs// de
218a3(rgyud): mig dbang po gnyis la ni// de bzhin gshegs pas snying po// de yi rna ba'i dbang gnyis la// bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o// de yi sna bug gnyis la ni// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i mdzod// de yi lce
218a4(rgyud): yi dbang la bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang // / de yi yid kyi dbang po la// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs// khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni// lus
218a5(rgyud): shes bya bar brtags pa la// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs so// lus kyi tshigs ni tha mas cad la// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'o// lag pag
218a6(rgyud): pa'i rtsa bar ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed// lag pa g.yon pa'i rtsa bar ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan mi thub// kha yi pad+mar bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no// gas
218a7(rgyud): ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil// dpung pa g.yas par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba// dpung pa g.yon par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs
218a8(rgyud): pa 'dod pa'i rgyal// dbus mo g.yas par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dbyug pa sngo// dbus mo g.yon par bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che// rang gi mgo stangs bzhugs pa ni/ 
218b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los bsgyur// rkang pa'i 'og tu bzhugs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa gnod mdzes te// lus ni 'di nyid kun la 'dir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs
218b2(rgyud): sku yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbye ba yis// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus 'di// lus pa med pa sangs rgyas sku// skye ba 'di la rnal 'byor pa/ 
218b3(rgyud): mya ngan 'das pa myur du 'thob// khyod kyi dge ba yongs sbyin pa// de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyi// lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs// mthong na don ni yod pa kye// phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa' che// de bas
218b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi// lha yi mchod pa'i yo byad kyis// rab tu 'bad de bla ma bsten// de nas mthong ba don yod bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che// dga' zhing mgu bas phyag
218b5(rgyud): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchi ma blags// gsung dang thu/ gas kyi dkyil 'khor bzhugs// legs so bya ba byin/ nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs// a A
218b6(rgyud): i I u U dang // ra r-I l-i l-I e ai// o au aM aHdbyangs zhes bya// ka tsa Ta ta pa sde tshan// ya ra la wa sha Sha sa// ha dang gsungs gi dkyil 'khor shes// ngag kun rab tu spro dang ldan// 'dod
218b7(rgyud): chags la sogs bag chags kyang // grangs ni nyi shu brgyad kyis so// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor legs rgyas pa// dpal mchog las ni shes par bya// de ltar 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// rdo rje gas
218b8(rgyud): ni dam tshig mchog/ mchog tu rmad byung rgyas pa ni// sgrub pa'i dbang pos yang dag shes// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
219a1(rgyud): bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// sangs rgyas dam chos dge 'dun dang // bla ma ston pa slob dpon pa
219a2(rgyud): / rdorje 'chang dang slob ma yi// mtshan nyid thams cad bsdus pa ni// dri med sems ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// chos ni ngag tu yang dag gsungs// sku ni dge 'dun zhes bya ste// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi gan/ 
219a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas yi ga hA du bshad// gsung ni yi ge AHru brjod// dge 'dun zhes bya yig o// kun nas 'phro ba'i bdag nyid do// sangs rgyas oM ba d+hU tIr 'gyur// chos kyang la la nA ru brjod// dge 'dun
219a4(rgyud): ra sa nA ru brjod// 'di ni gsum po'i mtshan nyid do// gzugs me dra khams ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// gzugs kyi khams ni chos drang ni// 'dod khams de bzhin dge 'dun te// de ltar khams gsu
219a5(rgyud): mtshan nyid mchog/ snying por gyur pa rang srog las// kham/ sa gsum na ni gzhan med de// sgyu ma rlung gi khams ga/ sum pa// rmi lam rmi lam bzhin du mthong // khams gsum bdag
219a6(rgyud): nyid de bzhin du// gcig pur myur ba mthong bar 'gyur// byin gyis brlabs nas de bzhin nyid// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// dam pa'i chos dang chos kyi
219a7(rgyud): sku// dge 'dun sprul pa'i skur ni 'gyur// de ni sku gsung bdag nyid can// snang ba sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs// chos ni snang ba thob pa'o// dge 'dun snang ba mchod par 'gyur// de ni snang ba gsum mtshan
219a8(rgyud): nyid// zhi ba la sogs las la bya// sngags dang rnal 'byor cha rnams shes// tshig nyi shu bya ba bslabs// de ni bla mar mngon par brjod// tshul khrims dag cing sbyin pa gtong // bzod dang brtson 'grus
219b1(rgyud): mchog tu ldan// nyin dang mtshan du sgom la zhen// shes rab ldan zhing bzol mkhas// bla ma'i spyir ni yon tan tshogs// dpal ldan slob dpon zhes ni brjod// nang gi gsang 'dus la rab dga'// 
219b2(rgyud): phyi rol nyan thos la spyod pa// de lta'i man ngag rim pa yis// slob ma rnams la rjes su bslab// de ni ston par yongs su gdungs// de skad smras pa de bzhin byed// rtog pa rnams dang dkyil 'khor
219b3(rgyud): tshogs// dam pa'i don gyis bya ba dang // slar yang snang ba gsum dang ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi spyod pa la// slob cing gzhan yang slob tu 'jug/ da ni slob dpon zhes bya'o// de nyid bcu ni yongs
219b4(rgyud): nas// dkyil 'khor la sogs bya ba shes// slob ma rjes sdud nus pa dang // gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba dang // she/ sa rab ji snyed yang dag ldan// rgyud kyi man ngag la mi 'jigs// 
219b5(rgyud): zab cing rgya cher yang dag ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa me cho ga/ cher gcod phan 'dogs pa la mkhas// de ni rdo rje 'cha nga du bshad// dad cing bla ma la yang gus// rtag tu dge ba'i las
219b6(rgyud): la gnas// gnyis med sgyu yang med pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs// lung ni mang du thos pa dang // gsod pa dang ni 'tshe ba spangs// sems can rnams ni 'don pa'i blos// kun tu brtson dang yang dag
219b7(rgyud): ldan// de la sogs pa'i yang dag ldan// dad pa chen po'i slob ma bzang // stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// gang la de nyid nges shes bya// gong na med pa'i spyod rab mchog/ sngags dang rnal 'byor rib sog
219b8(rgyud): ye shes lnga ni rnam dag dang // sangs rgyas lnga ni rang bzhin nyid// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang // chos dang po spyod sprul pa dang // sku gsum rnam par sgom pa dang // bde chen pon
220a1(rgyud): tan mtshan nyid ni// dga' ba la sogs dbye ba dang // de bzhin sgeg sogs nyams dang ni// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang // shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// dang po sbyor ba mdo/ 
220a2(rgyud): bsdus pas// de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ las kyi rgyal po rnal 'byor mchog/ 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba ni// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor dang // bde gnyis dbugs 'byung gnyis
220a3(rgyud): la sogs// gang la rgyas bshad de nyid rgyud// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du brjod// yon tan ji lta bu yi rgyud// thos sogs yon tan mchog gi ni// rten dang snod ces bya bar gsungs// mtshan
220a4(rgyud): rnams kun gyis rgyan pa dang // ji ltar seng ge'i 'o ma ni// sa yi slad du bzhag mi bya// de bzhin rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud// / snod min dag la sbyin mi bya// slob ma skad cig de la 'chi// 'di dang
220a5(rgyud): pha rol du ni phung // snod min man ngag rab bshad na// slob dpon dngos grub nyams par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las sangs rgyas dang dam
220a6(rgyud): pa'i chos dang dge 'dun la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs// slob ma'i bya ba'i spyod pa
220a7(rgyud): nizhi ba la sogs bya ba yang // sngags dang rnal 'byor rim pa yi// lham dang gdugs dang gtsug tor dang // so rtsi la sogs myang ba dang // snabs kyi gong bu mchil ma sogs// 'dor shing rkang
220a8(rgyud): bskyong ba dang // gzhan du blta dang spyi gtol smra// nor gyis snyems dang ngar 'dzin dang // rgyan la sogs pa blta ba dang // bag med par ni smra ba dang // bla ma'i grib ma 'gom pa dang // de la sogs pa
220b1(rgyud): skyon gyi tshogs// bla ma'i mdun du rnam par spangs// 'jigs pas thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyi bor phyag rgya bka' lung nod// rab bdog kun gtong dam bcas pas// ngo mtshar bcas shing gdong smad pa/ 
220b2(rgyud): slob mas bla ma'i mdun gnas bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// bla ma'i mdun du slob ma rnams// de lta bu sogs spyod zhes bya// dam tshig sdom pa sngar bshad pa// de rnams slob ma'i spyod pa'o// 
220b3(rgyud): de yi zhi sogs bya ba ni// bla mas bstan par bya ba'i rigs// de la mdor bsdus bshad par bya// thun mong cho ga'i mtshan nyid ni// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa gnyis// zla ba yar gyi ngo la bya// dbang dang mngon spyod kyi
220b4(rgyud): ni las// zla ba mar gyi ngol brtsams// byang du kha bltas zhi ba la// / de bzhin rgyas pa shar du blta// drag po'i las la lho phyog sa su// dbang gis las la nub du blta// gsod pa nyid la me yi
220b5(rgyud): phyogs// sdang bar bya la bden bral du// gnas nas bskrad/ la rlung gi phyogs// rengs pa la ni dbang ldan phyogs// zhi ba'i kha dog dkar po ste// rgyas pa la ni ser po bya// dbang dang
220b6(rgyud): dgug pa la ni dmar// kha dog nag po gsod pa la'o// byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la// dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa la// chags pa'i sems kyis dbang dag la// khro ba'i sems kyis gsod
220b7(rgyud): pa'o// zhi la phal cher tho rangs bya// de bzhin rgyas par snga dro bya// dbang dang mngon spyod dag gi las// nyi ma gung dang mtshan phyed la'o// de ltar rigs par yang dag bshad// sngags kyi rgyud gsungs
220b8(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyis// zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad// blo ldan cho ga bzhin du sgrub// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las slob ma'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang zhis
221a1(rgyud): la sogs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bstan pa ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad kyis nyon// khro bo bzlas pa'i
221a2(rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// gang gis rnal 'byor dngos grub bshad// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// khro ba'i sems kyi bzlas pa ni// khro bo'i bzlas pa zhes ni brjod// yang na khro bo'i rgyal po rnams// sngags
221a3(rgyud): bzlas pa yi sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i bzlas pa de shes bya// dngos grub brgyad kyi 'bras bu stsol// 'jigs su rung ba'i dur khrod du// 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i gnas// skyes bu thod pa khrag
221a4(rgyud): gis gos// rma med pa yi mtshan nyid blangs// skyes bu'i khu ba zla mtshan dang // bsres nas bri bar bya ba ni// de na bsgrub bya'i rnam pa dang // gsol dang 'jigs pa skrag pa dang / 
221a5(rgyud): g.yon brkyang pa yis mnan nas ni// zhag bdun bar du dus gsum du// gshin rje gshed kyi sngags 'dis ni// dngos grub rgyur ni bzlas par bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAg tsit+ta
221a6(rgyud): badz+ra NAM/ oM kha ga khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sa twad ma ka/ a si mu sa la ba ra shu bA sha hasta/ kha Da ga bA ma ta ra tsa ni hany+dza/ tsa tu ra mu kha/ tsa tu ra b+hu dza/ Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ a gan+d+he A gats+tsha
221a7(rgyud): sarba duSh+pa pra NA a pa hA ri Ne/ ma hA big+h+nAM g+ha ha ka/ bi kri ta A na/ sar+b+ba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ aT Ta aT Ta hA sa nA di ni byA g+hA tsar+m+ma ni bA sa na ku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ sar+b+ba man tAM/ 
221a8(rgyud): b+hin+da b+hir+thi/ bir mu dA ne/ A kaR+Sha le e ke rI ma/ sar+b+ba b+hU tAM/ mtham po/ ni ma tha ni rlaH/ sar+b+ba duny+dzan/ br-i the sha ma bre tho shas/ ma li ma d+h+ye/ bai ba shwa te/ dzI bi te ir+tha kar/ ku ru
221b1(rgyud): han tan/ da ha daha/ bcab tsa/ mA bi la m+ba mA bi la ba/ sa ma sa ma nu smar/ tsAhU/ tardza la/ be gan/ phaT phaT/ s+phoT la s+pho Ta ya/ kA rak+ShaShAr/ sar+b+ba A nan bI yU rA ya/ hi ha~M thA ga hA/ 
221b2(rgyud): rul se na/ na maHsar+b+ba at+ma na sa twA ya hU phaT swAhA// thog mar khro ba'i bzlas pa 'di// dbang du bya dang dgug pa mchog/ bskrad par rab tu bshad par bya// khro bo gnyis pa'i bzlas pa sa/ 
221b3(rgyud): skye tshe lan tshwa yungs mar dang // dug deng da dr-i rA khu be// bsdigs mdzub khrag dang bsres nas su// dur khrod ras dang bya ba ni// zla ba byed pa lta bu mchog/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// 
221b4(rgyud): logs gnyis rdo rjes mtshan par bya// de dbus sgrub pa'i me dang bris la// g.yon brkyang bar ni gnas nas ni// sdugadas ni yongs su bzla bar bya// sngar bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming bkus
221b5(rgyud): nas/ mtshan phyed kyi ni dus su ni// kun nas zhag bdun par du bya// bskrad par yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// namaHsa man+ta ka ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ na mo badz+ra kr-i d+hA ya/ ma hA
221b6(rgyud): daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+he ra ba ya/ a si mu sa laM/ ba ra shu pA sha has+thA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiny+dza tiSh+Tha/ bran+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+b+he gar+dz+dza/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ bi s+phoT/ 
221b7(rgyud): ya bi s+pho Ta ya// sar+b+ba big+h+nAM bi na ya kA na/ ma hA ga Na ba ti/ dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra ya hUM phaT swA hA// sngags 'dis gdug pa'i sems can ni// bskrad pa'i don du byas pa yin// zhi ba'i las ni
221b8(rgyud): bshad bya ba// gzhan gyis mi thub ming dang ni// khro bo gsum pa bzlas nas ni// me dang sbrul sogs zhi bar byed// lag pa gnyis la nyi ma gnyis// de la hUM gnyis bsgom par bya// bsgrub bya'i/ 
222a1(rgyud): mgo la lag gnyis kyis// brabs la de la zhugs nas ni// bsgrub pa'i snying la de gnyis kyis// 'byung po sreg par bsam par bya// me dang 'byung po 'jigs byed pa'i
222a2(rgyud): 'di yi sngags ni bshad par bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA kA tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM a pa rA dzI ro ti r-i ti rI dzi hUM phaT/ che ge mo 'byung po'i gdon las grol bar mdzod cig/ d+hIHdug sel ba'i
222a3(rgyud): sngags kyis ni// bzhi pa bshad kyis de nyon cig/ khro bo rta mgrin bzlas pas ni// yang dag mi mtshungs pa yi mchog/ bsgrub bya sems dpa' sum rtsig sgom// snying khar zla gnas ye shes
222a4(rgyud): sems// de yi 'od zer gyis rab gang // bsgrub bya'i lus la mchog tu bsam// rab tu 'bar ba de yis drug/ de nas lag g.yas bsam pa ni// zla ba haM gis rnam par rgyan/ 
222a5(rgyud): kha dog dkar por sor mor dgod// de ltar sgrub pa po la bya// hU d+d+hi k+ShaM sA dA dgod// las rnams kun ni 'grub par bye da// bsgrub bya'i mgo bo nas brtsams te// rkang pa'i mtha'
222a6(rgyud): yi bar du sgom// chu rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa ni// dug ni 'og btang rim pa yis// 'dir ni sngags 'di bzlas bya ste// rta mgrin du ni mngon par brjod// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM
222a7(rgyud): hAM hA hUM/ ta ru la bi ru la/ sar+b+ba bi Sha g+hA ta ka ta ka dzA li ti bi s+phu li ka/ aT Ta hA sa nA da sa hi tA/ ka sa ri sa ho pa ta adad badz+ra khu ra g+hA ta na/ tsa ta pa su d+ha ta la ni shA sa ma ru ta u ta k+Ship+ta
222a8(rgyud): d+ha ro No d+hi ra// bi Sha na an+na hA sa a ba ra mi ta wa la ba re k+Sha ma Ar+ya ga b+hi ti/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ ha ya grI ba kha kha tsI nad ts+tshi nad/ A be sha ya/ sar+b+ba gra he lu/ a pra ti ha ho b+ha wa/ badz+ra ngas
222b1(rgyud): Sh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si i daM duSh+pa gra haM daM Sh+Ta/ sar+b+ba bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ mar da mar da/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma ra d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+ha a nu dz+nyA na kar+yaM ku ru swAhA// che ga mo'i dug la sogs pa sel bar mdzod
222b2(rgyud): cig hUM zhes bya ba dang sngags spel lo// rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs te// lhag ma rgyas par shes par bya// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las khro bo'i bzlas
222b3(rgyud): pa dang zhi ba la sogs dngos grub brgyad kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni/ 
222b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/ dngos grub la sog/ sa mtshan nyid ni// sa snying phyag na rdo rje dang // 'jam dpal sgrib pa sel ba dang // byams pa lnga po 'di dag dang // yi ge
222b5(rgyud): gsum dang rnam par sprul// mig dang rna ba yid dang lus// rtsa'i 'khor lo byin gyis brlab// mtshan gsum nyi/ mo da dang 'dra// mngon shes lnga nyid thob par byed// bzhipa
222b6(rgyud): yis ni dbang bskur bas// blo ldan de nyid mthong bar 'gyur// stong ba mtshan mo'i cha ru 'gyur// nyin mo snang ba mched pa'o// mtshams ni snang ba thob pa'o// de ltar snang la sogs mtshan nyid
222b7(rgyud): mtshan min mtshams dang nyin mo min// kun rtog rlung ni spong bar byed// de ni skad cig mngon byang chub// mtshan nyid skad cig mar ni brjod// tha mar 'byung dang thog mar 'byung ba'am// dbus
222b8(rgyud): min 'byung ba'ang dbus su 'byung ba 'am// mtha' man 'byung ba'ang mthar ni 'byung ba'am// de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// gang du 'gro ba dang ni 'ong med cing // zad med
223a1(rgyud): 'phel med dngos med min// ngo mtshar gzugs can yin zhing ngo mtshar min// gnas par 'gyur min myur du 'gro ba min// gang zhig yod dang med pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral// 
223a2(rgyud): bsod nams gzugs min sdig pa'i gzugs ma yin// bsod nams sdig gi bdag min mchog gyur pa// de ni thams cad stong pa'i skad cig gcig tu gsungs// skad cig gcig la mngon
223a3(rgyud): byang chub// mtshan nyid 'di ni skad cig mchog/ rdo rje rtse mo byang sems ni// 'dzin pas lus kyi brtan pa nyid// de yis de nyid byang sems ni// rlung gi de nyid rab sbyor bas// rigs pas steng du byed pa ni/ 
223a4(rgyud): rgas pa med par the tsom med// hU hUM rim bzhin shes pa ni// 'dzin pa steng du rnam par spel// sngar bshad pa yi bod dad rtsi lnga// 'di ni bcud kyis len du brjod// 'di nyid kyis na
223a5(rgyud): grub par byed// lcags kyi gsera'i myur byas nas ni// phyag rgya dngos grub che// zung du 'jug pas thob par 'gyu 2// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dang // de bzhin rdzogs pa'i
223a6(rgyud): rim pa yang // gang la de gnyis gcig 'gyur ba// de ni zug du 'jug par bshad// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// rtog pa gnyis po spangs pas ni// gang du dngos po gcig 'gyur ba// zung du
223a7(rgyud): 'dug ces de la bshad// kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag/ rtog pa gnyis dang rnam par bral// gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa// de ni zung du 'jug par bshad// rdo rje bzlas pa'i rab sbyor bas// rlung gi
223a8(rgyud): mtshan nyid shes nas ni// rnam rtog rlung rnams rnam par gcod// sems la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur// bdag la byin rlabs rim pas kyang // dngos grub brgyad ni thob par 'gyur// snga
223b1(rgyud): la sogs dbye ba shes// mngon par byang chub rim pa thob// zung 'jug rim pa la gnas pa// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yis the tsom
223b2(rgyud): med// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub cher// zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog meng bar zhugs nas ni// thob pa 'di la the tsom med// lus ni gzhal yas khang du 'gyur// sangs rgyas
223b3(rgyud): kun gyis yang dag brten// zur bzhi pa ni mdun rgya ba dang // g.yas dang g.yon gyi dbye bas so// stong 'og sgo yi dbye ba yis// sgo bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// sna rtse bzhi yi dbyibs kyis ni/ 
223b4(rgyud): rta babs bzhi ni brjod par bya// dra ba rgyu mar yang dag bshadad// rgyus par gyur pa dra ba phyeng // cha ni zla ba phyod pa dang // bum pa lto bar yang dag shas// rje ngar brlo dpung lag ngar
223b5(rgyud): ni// ka ba brgyad du yang dag bshad// mig gi rnam shes long sogs// sgra yi rnam shes rol mo dang // sna yi rnam shes me tog phreng // rin chen pha gu lce rnams shes// lus
223b6(rgyud): kyi rnam shes ras 'phen dang // yid kyi rnam shes ri dgas so// mig ni 'khor lo'i mtshon ma dang // rna ba kun nas rdo rje rnams// sna ni ba dan du ni bshad// lce ni dril bu ru ni gsungs// rnga yab la
223b7(rgyud): sogs rnam dag pa// lus kyi tshogs zhes bya bar bshad// yid ni dbus kyi pad+mar gsungs// rnam rtog rlung ni yang dag brten// ye shes lnga ni rnam dag pa// re khA sngar ni yang dgra brjod// phung po
223b8(rgyud): lnga ni rnam dag lnga// rnam dag kha dog lnga ni dbye// de dag gzhal yas khang du sgom// dang po sbyor bar shes par bya// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// rigs kyi dbye ba rang ngo bo// de nyid phyi rol gan+da/ 
224a1(rgyud): par brjod// dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'o// khams bzhi'i rang bzhin bdag nyid ni// gzugs kyi phung po mdor sdus na// gzugs kyi phung po rnams dang ni// mig gi rnam
224a2(rgyud): sa snying po// phyi rol gzugs kyi rdo rjer bshad// khams partsa rgyas dbus na bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// shar dang lho yi mtshams su ni// me long ye shes su ni bshad// rna
224a3(rgyud): par snang mdzod rnam dag nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal 'jigs dang skye// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid du ni 'dod// tshor ba chu yi khams dang ni// phyi rol sgra ni rdo rje dang // rna ba phyag na rdo rjer bshad// rigs ni
224a4(rgyud): gnyis po 'dres pa nyid// dri yi rdo rje phyi rol 'gyur// sna yi rnam de shes mkha' snying po// khro bo gnyis po rnam par shes// mnyam nyid rin chen 'byung ba dang // dngos dang dngos med sogs
224a5(rgyud): 'du shes// snga ma rjes dran mtshan nyid can// 'du shes phung po me khams dang // phyi rol dri yi rdo rje dang // lce yi rnam shes 'a jig rten mgon// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// de ni so sor/ 
224a6(rgyud): rtogs ye shes// 'od dpag med kyi rigs las byung // dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyis// bag chags 'du shes mtshan nyid ni// 'du shes phung po rlung gi khams// phyi rol ro yi rdo rje dang // lus kyi rnam
224a7(rgyud): shes sgrib rnam sel// kun bzang tshigs kyi mtshams dbus bzhugs// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// bya ba nan tan grub ye shes// don yod grub pa'i rigs las byung // dngos po kun gyi rang
224a8(rgyud): bzhin nino// ye shes mtshan nyid rnam shes brjod// rnam par shes pa na mkha'i khams// yid kyi rnam shes 'jam rdo rje// de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis// shin tu rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// mi
224b1(rgyud): bskyod pa yi rigs las byung // mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// gzhal yas khang na 'di dag bzhugs// de nyid khams kyi dbye ba yis// rim pa ji bzhin bshad par bya// sgra rus phyi sa mchil
224b2(rgyud): ma snying // so ni rnam snang bdag nyid do// spu dang gnag dang nye ba'i snying // sen mo chu yi khams su shes// rin chen 'byung ldan bdag nyid kyi// rigs kyi rten du shes par bya// so dang lpags pa sha
224b3(rgyud): dang snying // me yi khams shes bya bar brjod// 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin dang // rigs kyi dbye bar shes par bya// rgyus pa sha dang rtsibs logs snying // rlung ni don yod grub pa'o// dri ma rgyus pa
224b4(rgyud): mkhris pa snying // de ni na mkha'i khams su grags// mi bskyod dpa yi rang bzhin dang // snying ni rnam shes lnga zhes bya// re re la'ang so sor ni// rnam pa lnga ni spro ba shes// de bzhin gsheg/ 
224b5(rgyud): pa'i phung po lnga// nang gi bdag nyid rdzas phye ba// sha rtsa rgyus pa sha kham tshad// klad pa dang ni klad rgyas dang // rus pa rkang dang snya ma dang // mkhal ma snying dang lto ba dang // glo ba mcher pa
224b6(rgyud): gcin dang ni// bshang ba pho ba long ka dang // zhag dang chu ser gnag dang ni// khrag dang mkhris pa bad kan dang // ngar snabs skra dang kha spu dang // sen mo spu dang lpags pa dang // lag pa rkang mig yan lag
224b7(rgyud): sogs// mtshogs ma dpung pa zhes ni brjod// de dag rim par shes par bya// gzhal yas khang ni rnam dag pas// de la gnas kyi dbye ba ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// pu lI ra ni mgo
224b8(rgyud): bor shes// spyi gtsug dz+wa lan d+ha ra dang // rna ba g.yas pa u r+yan dang // spyi bo'i rgyab ni a rbung // go dA ba ri rna ba g.yon// rA me shwa ri smin mo'i dbus// mig gnyis de bi ko Ta dang // mA la wa ni dpung pa'i
225a1(rgyud): kA ma rUb mchan khung gnyis// o dr-i nu ma gnyis su grags// ko sa la ni lte bar shes// tris ku ni rna ba'i rtsa// kha yi pad+ma ka ling ka/ mgrin pa la bkar ni brjod// snying ni kan ci
225a2(rgyud): shes par bya// hi ma la ya mi ngoms su shes// mtshan ma gr-i ha daM ba dang // pre ta bu ri bshang ba'i lam// brla gnyis su wa rnA de pa// sau raSh+Ta ni byin pa gnyis// rkang pa'i bol ni sin du'i yul// sor mo rnams
225a3(rgyud): la na ga ra// mthe bong gnyis ni ma rur zhes// ku lu t+yA ni rkang pa'i mthil// de ltar gnas kyi rnam dag dang // sa bcu rnam par dag pa nyid// de nyid dang ldan shes par bya// thim dang longs spyod bdag po nyi
225a4(rgyud): 'jug pa la sogs bye brag gis// rims kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rlung rnams kyini mtshan nyid mchog/ srog gau rlung ni snying khar gnas// mi bskyod
225a5(rgyud): bye brag rigs las skyes// mdoms na gnas pa'i thur sel ni / rin chen 'byung ldan bye brag skyes// stod du rgyus palkog mthar gnas// 'od dpag med pa'i rang bzhin no// me dang mnyam gnas
225a6(rgyud): lte bar gnas// don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin no// khyab byed yan lag kun la gnas// rnam snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs// dbang po'i sgo yi rgyun las ni// srog dang rtsol ba rgyun 'di dang // dus kun du
225a7(rgyud): ni rgyu ba ni// srog ces bya ba yin par bshad// srog dang rlung dang phyi sa dang // de bzhin du ni khu ba sogs// 'og 'dren 'di ni thur sa la rlung // rtag tu rnal 'byor pas shes bya// rgod dang za dang ldag pa dang // 
225a8(rgyud): kun tu 'thung dang 'jib pa dang // gang zhig rtag tu mnyam gnas pa// mnyam du gnas pa zhes byar brjod// gyen du 'gro zhing sdud pa dang // bza' dang myang ba la sogs pa// shes dang lhan cig 'byor pa
225b1(rgyud): dag gyen rgyu'i las su shes par bya// khyab dang 'dzin pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin 'gro dang ldog pa sogs// tshigs kun du ni khyab pa'i phyir// khyab byed zhes ni bya bar bshad // rlung gi mtshan nyid
225b2(rgyud): bshad pa ni// de nas de yi 'jigs par brjod// snga ma bzhin du btang bzung sogs// phan tshun du ni gnod par byed// gzhan ni gzhan la 'che ba yin// stobs ni thob pa'i rang bzhin gyis// gcig ni
225b3(rgyud): gcig la thim par 'gro// ji ltar zla ba bzas bzung la// rlung rnams rim gyis nyams 'gyur ba// snga ma bzhin du gong nas gong // rang gi bdag nyid la thim par// btang bzung slar yang 'gro bar byed// 
225b4(rgyud): lhar mes bsregs dngas mad dang // rgyu med par ni thima'agro// slar yang srog gi rdzu shar ba// las kyi rlung nisadagus pa// de ni lhan cig rnam shes dang // slar sang 'jig rten ga
225b5(rgyud): du gnas// de las las dang de las spyos// de las chags sogs bag chags dang // de las slar yang 'tsho da s+t+wa~M// de ltar 'khor lo bskor ba 'dra// sngon bzhin rdo zlas la sa sra/ 
225b6(rgyud): rim gyis de yi dbye bar 'gyur// de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// de nyid mig sman thur ma yis// thams cad 'khrul pa'i long ba bsal// yang dag dngos po nyid ni mthong // de nas yang yang / 
225b7(rgyud): phyag byas te// mtsho bcas mig gis bcom ldan la// lan gsum du ni bskor byas nas// rdo rje 'chang la yang dag bstod// e ma ho kun 'gro kun dbang phyug/ na mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa brnyes// 
225b8(rgyud): e ma 'od ma tshig de nyid gsum// mchog tu rmad byung ston par mdzad// khams gsum las ni rnam par grol// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid// 'dod pa rnams kyis ma gos pa// dmigs med khyod la
226a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// phung po rnams dang khams rnams dang // skye mched rnams la mi brten cing // srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de
226a2(rgyud): ltar na mkha' gnas med cing // spros pa med cing gos pa med// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// dmigs med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku// 'jig rten
226a3(rgyud): gsum las rgyal gyur pa// 'jig rten gsum 'di rnam par g.yos// bdud rnams bcom par mdzad nas ni// 'jig rten gsum gnas lha las rgyal// khro bo bcu ni kun nas ni// 'jig rten
226a4(rgyud): gsum rgyal gtso bo yis// 'di ltar bka' ni bsgo bar 'gyur// sa yi cha ni gang na 'di// rdo rje phreng bar mngon brjod pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig rgyud// dus kun tu ni spyod 'gyu
226a5(rgyud): zhing // rgyun du de nyid rang nyid kyis// khro bo bcu yis de las ni// rtag tu phur bus bgegs kun la// srung ba'i don du mu la 'khor der// rang rang phreng ba'i sngags kyis ni// de rnam
226a6(rgyud): la ni ga tor ma dbul// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// sna tshogs sprul pa bstan nas ni// rdo rje sems dpe' dus kun tu// nyin dang mtshan du bzhugs par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
226a7(rgyud): dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i mngon par rtogs pa las dngos grub thams cad bsdus po'i le ru ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng
226a8(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa las rgyud thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling snying po dpal dpe med rkun
226b1(rgyud): gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po su dza na shri dz+nyA na dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po bod kyi lta ba tsan po bla ma dge slong zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
226b2(rgyud): la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu ra did bi ti ba ra brits+tsha/ bod skad du/ lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// lha mo ba
226b3(rgyud): dang mnyam ldan zhing // sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer rgyan pa// shin tu dga' ba'i sbyor chen la// rdo rje sems dpa' cher bzhug so// 'od zer 'chang zhing 'khrigs pa yi// gsang chen chos kyi 'byung
226b4(rgyud): gnas la// byang chub sems ni 'phros nas su// chos kyi dbyings gnas zhu mdzad// zhu ba'i dngos po de mthong nas// lha mo/ spyan mas yongs zhus pa// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la/ 
226b5(rgyud): tshig 'di dag ni gsol pa ste// chos kyi dbyings rnams 'phro ba ni// gang las skye bar 'gyur ba lags// dang po ji ltar 'ong ba yin// de bzhin phyir 'gro ji ltar lags// yan lag med pa
226b6(rgyud): gang de ni// yan lag dang bcas 'gyur nas su// lus dngos 'gyur ba ji ltar lags// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// de bzhin lce dang lus dang yid// dbang po phung po'i dngos rnams dang // khams rnams
226b7(rgyud): ni 'jug pa yang // ma rig bag chags sred pa yis// bcings pa'i nyon mongs 'dod chags sogs// rnam par shes pa sna tshogs pa// ji ltar dngos su 'dus pa lags// dngos po med pa sgom pa'i
226b8(rgyud): gzugs// gzugs sogs spyod yul mtshan nyid rnams// rang bzhin med cing dmigs med la// dmigs pa dang bcas ji ltar lags// de dag ngo mtshar chen po ni// bdag gi the tshom lhas bka'
227a1(rgyud): stsol// de ltar zhus ma thag tu ni// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// shes rab zab pa zad med ni// nyon cig spyan ma bshad par bya// dpyad du med cing shes bya min// 
227a2(rgyud): de bzhin dpyad mkhan gyis shes dka'// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni// na mkha' na mkha'i spyod yulo// mi shes mun pas bsgribs pas na// nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa min// spyod yul
