227a3(rgyud): bag chags shes mkhan ni// rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa ste// de dag kun gyis kyang mi shes// shes med so so'i skye gnas dang // ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum la// 
227a4(rgyud): byol song bag chags las byung ba'i// dud 'gro yi dges skye ba rnams// de kun gyis kyang mi shes te// sangs rgyas spyod yul gsang chen no// snying po shin tu snying po'i mchog/ gang de
227a5(rgyud): kun bdag la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang tshe/ na ni// lha mo khyod la bshad par bya// byang chub sems ngag 'od gsal ba// zla ba shel dang mnyam pa'i 'od// de nyid ya
227a6(rgyud): lnga yi dngos// yungs kar che ba'i tshad tsam mo// de yi dbus su bzhugs pa'i lha// mi gsal gsal ba'i gzugs can te// phyed tshad tsam gyi phra mo'i mchog/ yid kyi dngos po'i thig le'i gzug/ 
227a7(rgyud): rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa// 'od zer chen po 'bar ba can// ji snyed dgu pa'i bar du ni// dpral ba la gnas rkang mthil bar// thig le de kho nar bsdu te// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas// cha
227a8(rgyud): lnga pa can yin te// bcu gnyis kyi ni tha ma la// cha shas drug gis mtshan pa nyid// nga ro thig les rgyan byed pa// rdo rje khong nas phyung nas su// sa bon skye gnas dbus bzhag ste// chos kyi dbyings ni
227b1(rgyud): zhu bar byed// de ni rim par bskyed byed na// sgo dgu la ni kun tu 'gro// khyab cing khyab gnas 'gro kun la// mi g.yo la sogs g.yo dang bcas// tshangs sogs lha dang lha min gyi// gzhi ni de las
227b2(rgyud): gyur pa'o// gang la gtso bor skyed byed la// sa dang na mkha'i de zhes gsungs// ji snyed lus la gnas pa'i bar// de yis lus dang las min byed// dge dang mi dge bsam pa yang // bya ba'i las
227b3(rgyud): kun byed pa yin// sbyor ba rtag tu de gsungs te// mchod pa bsgom par gsungs pa yin// gang tsha las kyi lus zhig na// de tshe de yi rang mthu yin// de 'dra'i lus su de 'gyur te// gang gis g.yo dang mi
227b4(rgyud): g.yo khyab// na mkha' mnyam pa nyid 'dra ba// de ni gnas par shes par bya// bcu yi gnyis mtha' tshig gi don// ga/ dang gis rtag tu sgom byas na// des ni dngos grub rgyas pa yi// 
227b5(rgyud): 'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur// so dang mchu dang dkan dang lce// ma gul gnas gang la yod pa ni// gang la de ni yig 'bru nyid// de ni zad dang gnas phyir ro// brjod pa med cing the tshom med// sgra
227b6(rgyud): yig rnam par spangs pa ni// rang gi phyi nang de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems ni 'dir gsung so// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo spyan mas yongs su zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
227b7(rgyud): de nas lha mo mA ma ki/ rdo rje can la 'di zhus te// byang chub sems kyi rim pa yis// kha snying lte ba gsang ba la// 'gro dang phyir 'ong bstan pa ni// rdo rje chen mos bka' stsal 'tshal// cha shas rnam pa du
227b8(rgyud): zhig gsungs// gnas kyi rnam pa bsgyur ba du// kha dog rnam pa du zhig gsungs// de bzhin gdan yang ji ltar 'tshal// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// cha shas bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing // pad+ma ba ni/ 
228a1(rgyud): la yang dag gnas// snying ka'i pad+ma la gnas gnag/ kha yi pad+ma la gnas dkar// nga ro lte ba'i pad+mar gnas// gsang ba'i pad+ma nga ro mtha'// stobs kyi mtha' ru 'gro byed pa// 
228a2(rgyud): thig le'i sbyor bar rab tu gnas// bsnam byed pa dang thos byed pa// de tshe mthong byed za byed pa// reg par byed kyang de kho nas// bde dang sdug bsngal tshor byed pa'o// gang las gzhad byed bzla/ 
228a3(rgyud): byed pa// de bzhin cho nge dang ngu ba// 'byed pa gcod pa de kho nas// cho ga rnam pa mang po shos// rgyal po don yang byed par 'gyur// dbang phyug don yang byed par 'gyur// bram ze rgyal po rje'u
228a4(rgyud): rigs dang // dmangs rigs smad pa'i rigs rnams dang // bud med du ma sprul par byed// dud 'gro yi dgas skye ba dang // gzugs can rnams dang gzugs med dang // de bzhin 'dod
228a5(rgyud): pa'i srid rnams las// 'byung ba thams cad skyed byed pa// de nyid/ kho na rdzu 'phrul gnas// mo gzugs dang ni pho ma gzugs// bde ba chen po go 'phang gnas// de ltar de bzhin
228a6(rgyud): nyid shes pa// dam pa'i yig 'bru shes pa gang // des ni gsang chen shes pa ste// gang des bdag nyid kun gnas pa// kha dog med cing kha dog dmar// kha dog dkar dang ser ba yi// theg le'i
228a7(rgyud): gzugs su bsgyur ba 'dis// 'gro dang phyir 'ong ba rnam par bstan// gang de rig pa rdzu 'phrul che// mtha' yas bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs// skye dang bsdus dang 'jig pa la// theg pa'i gzug
228a8(rgyud): su rab gnas so// gang gis brgyad khri rtsa bzhi'i chos// stong phrag brgya ru shes na yang // de yis de nyid mi shes te// de dag kun kyang 'bras medo// bcu gnyis lnga yi lnga pa yang // brgyad kyi mahA/ 
228b1(rgyud): ru 'byung ba 'dis// sgra yig dang po yig a// lnga pa yis ni yang dag rgyan// snying rje chen po las byung ba// khamar bltas pa'i drug pas btags// gdod ma mtha' ma med pa'i lha// de ni spyi bor ba
228b2(rgyud): pa yin// de dag gsang chen dam pa yin// lha mo bdag gis rab bstan no// lha mo bzhis yongs su zhus pa las lha mo mA me kis zhus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// 
228b3(rgyud): de nas lha mo gos dkar mos// yan lag kun gyis btud nas su// thal mo snying khar sbyar byas te// rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi bsdus pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi rnga/ 
228b4(rgyud): rje yi// rang bzhin nyid ni ji ltar lags// lha yi dbang phyug khyod/ la zhus// gang gis 'od kyi gong bur bsdu// rdo rje se mas dpa' ji ltar lags// gsungs shig de nyid yig 'bru'i
228b5(rgyud): tshig/ 'dus pa gsungs pa ji ltar lags// chu khams dang ni mi yi khams// ji ltar ro ni mnyam par 'gyur// ma las skye ba gsum tsam dang // de bzhin pa las skye ba gsum// de dge
228b6(rgyud): dradrug sogs gong bu las// ji ltar mi rnams skye ba lags// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bdag mi 'tshal// thub pa chen pos bka' stsal mdzod// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba shin tu
228b7(rgyud): gsang gyur pa// nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yon dang de bzhin g.yas pa ste// g.yon du byang chub sems shes bya// g.yas su de bzhin rak+ta'o// de gnyis/ 
228b8(rgyud): phrad nas gcig 'gyur ba// chos kyi dbyings ni 'dus pa yin// mun pa sku ste rdul gsung gzugs// thugs kyi rang bzhin snying stobs te// rdul ni rak+ta byang chub sems// mun pa de bzhin bskyed pa yin/ 
229a1(rgyud): rdo bad mnyam s+thA nas// nga bzhin mnyam pa ra 'gyur// dri chen chub shel me tog/ de bzhin lnga pa byang chub sems// bdud rtsi ldang dngos gong bur bsdus// de las dzam/ 
229a2(rgyud): gsungs so// cha shas gnyis padong ldan pa// de bzhin dgu bdag yin no// de skad gsungs pa bcu dang ni// de bzhin lnga pa'i sa bon te// cha shas gnyis pa lnga yi ni// drug gis btags pa des byung ba
229a3(rgyud): de ni thig ler gsungs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge blo// skye gnas pad+ma la gnas pa// de nyid sa bon swA hA// 'dus pa la ni shes par bya// chu khams pa las skyes shes bya// me yi khams ni ma las
229a4(rgyud): skyes// sha dang khrag dang lpags pa yang // ma las skyes pa zhes bshad do// tshil dang rkang dang khu ba ni// pha las skyes zhes bshad pa yin// gong bur yang dag 'dus pa ni// de dag tsam du
229a5(rgyud): bshad pa yin// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnam shes rnams// sangs rgyas dngos po lnga ni gzugs// phung po zhes byar bshad pa'o// lha mo bzhis so// 
229a6(rgyud): su zhus pa las lha mo gos dkar mos zhus pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhad pa'i zhal gyur te// lha mo sgrol ma bcom ldan mas// rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus
229a7(rgyud): ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa ni// gsungs shig rdo rje can chen po// rdzas rnams sgrub pa bka' stsal 'tshal// de bzhin rigs pa'i sngags rnams kyang // dkyil 'khor rnams ni btags pa dang // sbyin
229a8(rgyud): sreg so sor bya ba dang // de bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga yang // khyad par du yang bka' stsal 'tshal// de ltar lha mos zhus ma thag/ rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sbubs thabs ni// 
229b1(rgyud): nyon cig lha mo bshad par bya// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// de bzhin ro dang reg la sogs// khams bco brgyad po de dag kyang // chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba'o// de dag nyid las byung ba ni// byang
229b2(rgyud): chub sems zhes shes par bya// byang chub sems las gong bu skye// gong bu las kyang yid bskyed do// yid las na mkha'i khams kyang ni// khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams// dbang po phung po
229b3(rgyud): 'byung ba rnams// de ltar dbyings su bsdu ba ste// bsdu ba da ni bstan byas pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgrub pa yin// de bas nan tan thams cad kyi// sgrub pa yang dag spyod par bya'o// 'di ltar gal po
229b4(rgyud): zhes dngos kyis// bsgrub par bya ba rab tu bstan// chos dbyings sgrub pa bshad nas su// rdzas brgyad yan lag sgrub pa shad// ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang // sa 'og ral gri'i
229b5(rgyud): dngos grub dang // na mkhar 'phur dang mig sman dang // 'chi ba med da nga nad 'joms dang // mig dang glang po che dang rta// glang dang khyi dang bong bu dang // rnga mo ma he spyang ki rnams// cha ni mnyam por bya
229b6(rgyud): ba'o// mthe bong tshigs ched tsam du ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas sbyar// dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang // byang chub sems nas tshad tsam ni// sngags bzlas nas ni sbyor byas te// byin gyis brlabs
229b7(rgyud): kyang bya ba'o// phyag 'tshal dang ni yi ge A// dbus su de bzhin hA byas te// 'bar ba'i hU~M yig 'bar byed pa// dgu po de ni rab tu sgrub// lan ni nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// sngags bzlas nas ni phye mar
229b8(rgyud): btag/ yungs dkar lnga yi tshad tsam du// lnga dang lnga ni 'byor par bya// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// ril bu rnams ni byas nas su// pad+ma'i snod la bzhag byas te// stong phrag brgyar ni bzla bar bya/ 
230a1(rgyud): sems can lan snyom byas nas/ na na da' ba nga // don basprul sa ba sa // sa zlab rgyas pas slob ste// gzi rdu ma sa
230a2(rgyud): brtson 'grus// lnga ba la na smo mam sang // mngon par shes pa lnga thob po// rim bu chen pa zas phyir ro// rdzas kyi sgrub pa rnams rdzogs nas// rig pa'i sngags rnams bdag la stsal/ 
230a3(rgyud): me dang pra log dang // ma log dbus su yang dag gnas// dang po'i mdog ni dmar po ste// gnyis pa yi ni mdog dkor ba// gsum pa kha dog ser ba rnams// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par
230a4(rgyud): 'khor lo ltar ni bskor ba ni// nyin byed dang ni mtshan gyi// rig 'di ni rang 'gyur na// de ni skad cig khon sgrub// lha mo lnga min bu mo dang // mi mi bu mo rnam pa bzhi/ 
230a5(rgyud): ming kyil 'khor kun tu ni// sngags kyis bkug nas snad par bya// sgom pa de bzhin rigs pa'i sngags// bad / gos bshad pa zin byas te// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bshad/ 
230a6(rgyud): bar bya// dga' ma sems kyis rtse gcig nyon// dkyil 'khor lus shos gsungs pa ste// dkyil 'khor bA gar bstan pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dang ni// dkyil 'khor
230a7(rgyud): gsum du brtags pa ni// brtags pa rnams kyang 'dus pa ste// gang du ga tso ba bskyed par byed// phung po rnams ni sangs rgyas gsungs// 'byung ba rig mar brtags pa'o// chags bsngags
230a8(rgyud): yin s+t+wa~M/ gas pa pad+mar dung byed pa// ba phrang ba ni skrag min pade// sgra bsgrags pa ni dril bu ba shid // tsun na dri chen zhes gsus te// me tog pa zhes nga // mar me shanas/ 
230b1(rgyud): kho na yin// dri ni byang chub sems zhes 'dod// sgeg mo ling gar bstan pa ste// phreng ba b+ha ga kho na yin// dbyangs ma dbugs su bstan pa dang // gar mkhan ma ni rnal 'byor te// bcom ldan/ 
230b2(rgyud): 'das kyis bzang por gsungs// de rtogs pa ni skal bzang yin// rtogs pa de rnams byams pa sogs// de ltar nang gi bdag nyid gsungs// dkyil 'khor gzhan ni sngon bshad zin// sbyin
230b3(rgyud): sreg las ni bshad par bya// nyon cig sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi// sbyin sreg phyi dang nang gsungs te// phyi ni sngon du bstan pa yin// nyon cig khyod kyis nang gi ni// pad+ma bzhi rnams 'byor pa ni// lus
230b4(rgyud): kyi dbus su nye bar gnas// me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni// dang dang chen dang ni chu de bzhin// rlung gis mo na 'bar byas te// chu yis yongs su smin par byed// dbang chen dkyil 'khro/ 
230b5(rgyud): las byung ba// gang du ma ni bskyed pa'o// ra yi ge mngon spyod yi ge ste// ya yig dbang gi las kho na// la yig rgyu sa par 'gyur ba ste// bzhig zhi ba zhes gsungs so// gang zhig
230b6(rgyud): zas dang btung ba ni// de dag thams cad tshul ste// pad+mar k+Sha yig kha mar lta// snying gi pad+mar btsud par bya// lte ba'i pad+mar 'gro phyi rol// kha sbyor tshul gyis sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i
230b7(rgyud): pad+mar 'gro ma thag/ thal bar mtha' ru rnam par bstan// de ltar sbyin sreg bdag bshad pa// nyin dang nyin du bya ba ste// rtag par rgyun tu zas zos na// tshe 'di kho nar 'grub par 'gyur// 
230b8(rgyud): rgas pa med cing nad kyang med// 'chi ba med cing 'bras rnams med// de ni blo bur 'chi ba med// 'tshe ba thams cad zad 'gyur zhing // rmi lam ngan yang zhi bar 'gyur// bzang po skal bar gson pa ste/ 
231a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad dga' bar smra// mthong ba tsam gyis bskul byed do// sbyin sreg las rnams bshad byas nas// lha mo mchod pa bstan par bya// dri dang phreng sogs gos
231a2(rgyud): rnams dang // spos me zas dang lha bshos kyis// dbang po gnyis ni rab 'byor nas// bdag la mchod pa rnams ni bya// bdag ni thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin te// de
231a3(rgyud): bas nan tan thams cad kyis// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod// gang zhig 'ga' yang bya ba'i las// rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par sgom// zas dang btung ba de bzhin gos// de bzhin dri dang phrang
231a4(rgyud): kho nas// rig ma bzhi yis rnam rgyan pa'i// bdag nyid lha/ nyid bsam par bya// de ltar bshad nas rdo rje de// cang mi gsung ba'i dngos por bzhugs// de nas lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// 
231a5(rgyud): phyag gis thal mo sbyar gyur te// dgyes pas rab tu zhal ba zhad nas// rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// rnam par mi rto/ pa thob ste// cang mi gsungs par bzhugs gyur to// lha mo bzhis
231a6(rgyud): yongs su zhus pa las lha mo sgrol mas nus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mchog dam pa gsang chen zhes bya ba'i rgyud lhamo bzhis yongasu
231a7(rgyud): zhus pa dpal u r+yan gyi yul nas byung ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i de kho na nyid rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po smrig ti dz+nyA na ka nyid kyis bsgyur cing nus te bshad nas gtan
231a8(rgyud): phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra dz+nyA nas mu ts+tshal nam tan+ta/ bod skad du/ ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
231b1(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tsha lo// ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud las ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa'o// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug stong gis ba
231b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa dang / sems las byung ba dang / sems zhes bgyi ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ 
231b3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ ye shes gsum rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba de'i phyir ye shes gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes gsum
231b4(rgyud): ngo bo ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa de'i rkyen gyis ma rig pa ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / sna ba
231b5(rgyud): nye bar thob pa dang / stong pa chen po'o// de yang rtogs par da/ ka' ba'o// 'on kyang snang ba dang bcas par brjod par bya'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis sems las byung ba ste/ de ni snang ba
231b6(rgyud): mched pa dang / shin tu stong pa zhes gsungs so// sems las byung ba'i rkyen gyis sems te/ de ni sna ba dang / stong pa ste/ sems dang sems las byung ba dang / ma rig pa'i rang bzhin bdag med pa'o// 
231b7(rgyud): gsum po de dang de 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin no// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
231b8(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams cad mi smra bar 'dug pa mthong nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mo'i phyen
232a1(rgyud): / cang mi smra bar gyur pas 'dug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag brtsal te gtugs nas gzhan yang zhus pa/ e ma'o ston/ 
232a2(rgyud): pa rtogs par dka' ba rnam par shes pa gsum gyi dbye ba mchog tu zab pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang
232a3(rgyud): 'od gsal ba las byung ba rnam par shes pa de nyid sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya la/ da ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i bdag nyid de/ 
232a4(rgyud): las rtogs pa gnyis su gyur te bdag dang / gzhan dag tu'o// / rnam par shes pa de'i gzhon pa rlung ngo // rlung las me'o// dme las chu'o// chu las sa'o// de rnams las phung po lnga dang / 
232a5(rgyud): skye mched drug dang / yul lnga ste/ de dag thams cad ni rnam pa ra shes pa rlung dang 'dres pa'o// de nas rnam par shes pa ga/ sum gyi rang bzhin gyi snang ba rab tu gsal bar spyod pa rjes
232a6(rgyud): myong bar byed de/ snang ba'i rgyus rang bzhin rnams yang dag par 'byung ngo // de las 'od gsal ba gnas pa med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ skye ba med pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de
232a7(rgyud): las byung ba'i mun pa'i snang ba ni ma rig pa'o// de'i rang bzhin lta ba dang / 'khrul pa dang / rnam par g.yeng ba dang / brjed ngas pa dang / le lo dang / mi smra ba dang / mi gsal ba'o// ma rig pa las sems
232a8(rgyud): las byung ba ste/ nyi ma'i snang ba lta bu dang / shin tu gsal ba'i smig rgyu ba lta bu'o// de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / kun rdzob
232b1(rgyud): du mngon sum du skyes pa'i gzugs dang / lha'i tshogs dang / mtshan ma dang / rdo rje'i brda'o// sems las byung ba las sems te/ zla ba'i snang ba dang / shin tu gsal ba'i chu'i zla
232b2(rgyud): ba lta bu'o// rang bzhin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa'o// kun rdzob du ni mngon sum gyi bud med dang / b+ha ga dang / pad+ma dang / lha mo'i tshogs kyi brda'o// rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba
232b3(rgyud): las shes rab kyi ye shes byung ba las rang gi rdo rje'i 'bad pa las me'o// me las chu ste/ nur nur po'i rnam pa dang / de las mer mar po dang / nar nar bor dang / gor gor po dag go// de nas 'dod chags
232b4(rgyud): dang bral ba'i snang ba la khrag gi gong bu ma khrang gyur rnams so// // de khu ba dang khrag dag gis bskyed pa'o// de nas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags so// 'dod
232b5(rgyud): chags las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / bar ma'i 'dod chags rab tu shes par bya ste// de'i phyir lus te/ lus las byung ba'i skyi l-i krung bcing ba la sogs pa dang / 
232b6(rgyud): gsung gi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa/ a li ka li las yang dag par byung ba'i sngags dang / sems kyi phyag rgya'i thabs su gyur pa sa bon dang mtshan ma las lhar dmigs pa'o// gzug
232b7(rgyud): la sogs pa'i yul ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i thabs su gyur pa'o// rdo rje dang pad+ma yang dag par sbyor ba ni sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi thabs su gyur pa'o// sems
232b8(rgyud): dang sems las byung ba mnyam par sbyar ba ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi thabs su gyur pa'o// de rgyu ma'i dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
233a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / mig 'phrul dang / dbang ba/ 
233a2(rgyud): gzhu dang / glog dang / chu bur dang / me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin nye bar mtshon par byed po yin no// ji ltar 'o ma bsrubs pa l+la
233a3(rgyud): mar dang / ji ltar til las til mar te/ de bzhin du rdo rjes ni thabs kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir dang / pad+mas ni shes rab kyi ye shes nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'o ma dang til
233a4(rgyud): yang dag par mngon par 'dus byas pa med par mar dang til dmar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/ sngags dang phyag rgyadas mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyar ba med
233a5(rgyud): par rnam par shes pa gsum nye bar mtshon par mi nus so// gang gis b+ha ga dang ling ga yang dag par sbyor bar mi/ nus pa des ni bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin mi rnyed do// bde ba chen
233a6(rgyud): pobo'o ting nge 'dzin 'ba' zhig la lhag par mos pa tsam gyis ni las dang po pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa la yang slob par 'gyur ro// gang rdo rje dang pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba'i
233a7(rgyud): bde bas rang bzhin snang ba yang dag par nye bar mtshon par byed pa de ni bde ba chen po'i go 'phang la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di ni sbas pa'i bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ni
233a8(rgyud): bo rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i don ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ nyan thos la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos spyod pa rnamapa
233b1(rgyud): rtog pa'i bag chags las ma grol ba rnams rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dag tu btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dod chags kyi chos gsal bar byed pa ngo mtshar can gyi
233b2(rgyud): tshig thos nas spod par byed pa de rnams dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo nas bri shad ba deni spro'i don du bshad pa gsungs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa bcom
233b3(rgyud): ldan 'das 'dod chags la spyod pa'i chos kyi tshul du mthar thug pa bshad pa ji ltar lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams legs so lagaso// 
233b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje mchog dang ldan pa rnams nyon cig/ mtha' ni mu ste/ 'od gsal ba yang dag pa'i tshul zhes bya ba mthar thug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
233b5(rgyud): dpa' chen pos/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thabs gang gis mthar thug pa thob pa lags brtso/ ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ phung po dang khams dang skye
233b6(rgyud): mched la sogs pa'i mtha' stong pa gsum// stong pa gsum gyi mtha' 'od gsal ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa gsum 'od gsal
233b7(rgyud): ba'i mtha' ji ltar 'gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar mas shing bsregs te thal bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od gsal bar shes rab kyi ye shes yun ring pos rnam par
233b8(rgyud): sbyor bar byed do// ji ltar ta la'i lo ma thal bar byed pa de bzhin du thabs kyi ye shes rnam par sbyong bar byed do// ji ltar ras bal gyi mdab ma bsregs pa de bzhin du snang ba thob pa'i ye shes mchog/ 
234a1(rgyud): tu myur bas rnam par sbyong bar byed do// de bas na rim pa 'dis shing ta la'i lo ma dang / ras bal gyi mdab ma thal bar gyur pa de bzhin du spong ba dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa chen
234a2(rgyud): po rnams mthar 'od gsal bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni mthar thug pa'i bshad pa gsungs pa'o// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
234a3(rgyud): mtha' drug gis bshad pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang sgra ji
234a4(rgyud): bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar ban dag ste tshig re re'i bshad pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom
234a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang mthar thug pa bshad pa de nyid dgongs pas bshad pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod na/ gas ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa dang
234a6(rgyud): bar ma nye bar mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o// lus dang ngag dang yid med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / thams cad stong pa dang / dag pa dang 'od
234a7(rgyud): gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig ni dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o// ga pur dang / khrag chen po dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa
234a8(rgyud): tshig rnams ni drang ba'i don ste/ gapur ni khu ba dang / khrag chen po ni zla mtshan gyi khrag dang / tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba dang bsres pa ni can dan dmar po'o// rdo rje ni mtshan ma ste thobs so// pad+ma ni thA/ 
234b1(rgyud): ga ste shes rab dang / phyag rgya dang / btsun mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni nges pa'i don to// gnyi ga dang / spyod pa dang / bya ba'i rgyud rnams su don gsal bar gsungs pa 'di lta/ 
234b2(rgyud): ste/ dkyil 'khor dang / mchod sbyin dang / gtor ma dang / sman dang / zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs rnams dang / de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub chen po brgyad gsungs pa rnams ni
234b3(rgyud): sgra ji bzhin pa ste/ de ni yi ge'i don gyi bshad pa'o// ko Ta khyA ko TA ba/ ko Ta ko TA ba sh+tsa/ ko Ta rA ga/ ko la khya/ ko la wa/ ko la/ ko la ba sh+tsa/ ko la sta tha/ 'dis dbang po dang / yul gsungs te/ 
234b4(rgyud): de lta bu la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams ni sgra ji bzhin pa ma yi ngan pas bshad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen pos ga sol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dang / 
234b5(rgyud): gnyis ka'i rgyud dang / spyod pa'i rgyud dang / bya ba'i rgyud dang / rtog pa'i rgyud rnams kyi tshad ji ltar lags/ bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
234b6(rgyud): kyi ming stong phrag bcu gnyis zhes bya ste/ rgyas par bya na grangs med do// gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug/ spyod pa'i rgyud stong phrag brgyad do// bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o// rtog pa'i rgyud
234b7(rgyud): stong phrag bzhi'o// de dag ni stong phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi ste/ rgyud dang rtog pa'i ming gi mtha' ma'i yi ge ji snyed pa ni ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ Ta thaM Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da dA na/ ba pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ 
234b8(rgyud): shaM Sha sa ha/ 'di dag ni ming gi yi ge'i mtha' ma rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi byed pa dang / cho ga dang / bsgrub bya dang / sgrub pa
235a1(rgyud): de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa las bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim gyis langs te 'dod chags byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas pa
235a2(rgyud): tu bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbus su 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gzugs kyis bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btsun mo'i b+ha ga la yang dag par bzhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi spyod par
235a3(rgyud): 'gal ba rmad du byung ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi mtha' drug gang gis rab tu dbyed de sgrub par byed pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud la bzhugs so// rig pa'i lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
235a4(rgyud): lo la dgod pa dang / de las byung ba'i byed pa dang las dang sgrub pa/ ril sogs pa de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu rab tu dpyad de sgrub ra byed pa gnyi ga'i rgyud la zhugs so// las kyi bya ba sna chog
235a5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bya ba'i rgyud kyi phyag rgya dmigs pa'i mtshan / da rab tu dpyad pas bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa/ no spyod pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so// 'jigs par dmigs
235a6(rgyud): shing shin tu gtsang sbra byed pa dang / ye shes sems dpa'i bde ba dam pa med pa dang / bdag nyid lha'i snyems pa med pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa dang / skyon gyi rgyu'i rtogs pas ra/ 
235a7(rgyud): tu spyod pas sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba'i rgyud la bzhug so// sngags dang sman dang / sbyin sreg dang / phye ma dang / mig sman dang / rkang mgyogs la sogs pa dngos grub chen po brgya rab tu dpyad pa sgrub pa
235a8(rgyud): byed pa ni rtog pa'i rgyud la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ 
235b1(rgyud): gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang / mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang / rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang / bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang / dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang / gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa dang // 
235b2(rgyud): bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa rnams so// gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga ni 'di lta ste/ ming dang / gang gis don du byas pa dang / byed pa po dang / tshad dang / dgos pa rnams so// mtha' drug du
235b3(rgyud): bshad pa ni 'di lta ste/ dgongs pas bshad pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa dang / drang ba'i don dang / nges pa'i don dang / sgra ji bzhin pa dang / sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa rnams so// rigs pa
235b4(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi ni rgyud dang / glang bzhi dang / nges tshig dang / rgyu rnam das so// bshad pa rnam pa bzhi ni yi ge'i don dang / spyi'i don dang / spras pa dang / mthar thug pa rnams so// dbye ba rna
235b5(rgyud): pa gnyis ni 'di lta ste/ tshogs la bshad pa dang / slob ma la ba shad pa'o// gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma brtag pa na 'de lta ste/ rin po che dang / tsan dan dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dka/ 
235b6(rgyud): po dang / ud pa la rnams so// bden pa rnam pa gnyis kyi dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa'o// rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g.yo ba'o// de'i bden
235b7(rgyud): ni chu zla lta bu'o// don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa chen po bco brgyad do// de'i mtha' ni gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ don dam pa'i bden pa la rab gnas pa'i rnal 'byor
235b8(rgyud): chen po pas las kyis rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten nas sems can gyi don ji ltar rab tu spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji srid du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las/ 
236a1(rgyud): kyis sems can gyi don mi byed pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang du sems can gyi don bya bar mthong ba de'i tshe bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i
236a2(rgyud): pas yang dag par mtha' las langs te sems can gyi don byas nas yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid du 'jug par byed do// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dga' zhing mgul
236a3(rgyud): yi rangs te dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i le'u ste rim par bye ba gnyis pa'i rdzogaso// 
236a4(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ka ra'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi la ts+tsha ba khu ston dngos grub kyis bsgyur/ slad nas bla ma de nyid dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus shing gtan la/ 
236a5(rgyud): phab pa'o// / ye shes rdo rje kun la sa btus// rnal 'byor chen po'i gsal byed yin// ye na/ sa rang bzhin 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das pa'i ngo bo'o// de gzhi
236a6(rgyud): dbyer med rdo rje ste// kun 'dir 'dus pas kun las btus// de ston pa la der brtags nas// gzhung la'ang ming don 'tsham pa yin / rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra hrid ya a laM kar
236a7(rgyud): tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
236a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po bud med bcu'i dkyil na cha shas lnga pa'i tshul du bzhug so// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'khor rdo rje dang pad+mar sbyor ba la bzhugs pa 'di sa
236b1(rgyud): ste dam tshig yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / ye shes kyi lus yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / sgra brnyan lta bur rdo rje'i gsung 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkhwa/ 
236b2(rgyud): 'gro dang / gzhan gyis shes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rtse gcig tu 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro dang / gzhan las 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro dang / rten par byed
236b3(rgyud): bzhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro dang / rlan par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro dang / smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' gro dang / bskyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / go 'byed par
236b4(rgyud): byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro dang / hA rA na pU ra la sogs pa sa mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha'agro dang / gi ta mgrin la/ sogs pa'i glu mkhan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha'agro dang / sbrul
236b5(rgyud): gyi snying po la sogs pa'i dri ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'grong tshod ma sna tshogs za ba'i ro ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro dang / rtsen pa sna tshogs kyis 'khyud mkhan ma zhes
236b6(rgyud): bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / gsum rig par byed pa dngos med ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro ma la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje mkha 'gro thams cad dang / rdo rje mkha'agro chen mo
236b7(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid zhu ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro chen po dang / tshor ba'i mtshan nyid sim pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du shes kyi
236b8(rgyud): mtshan nyid nub pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje mkha 'gro chen po dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje/ 
237a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro chen po la sogs pa na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di til gyi gang bu lta bur gang bar snang ngo // de nas rdo rje mkha' gra de dag/ 
237a2(rgyud): thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ mkha'agro chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la mchod pa'i sprin spros pa du ma yid las byung ba lha dang / mi'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas mchod nas phyag
237a3(rgyud): 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs rnams thams cad kyi// gsang gsum bsdus pa'i spyod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud// 'dren pa mchog gis bshad du gsol/ 
237a4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas mkha' 'gro thams cad la rnam par bltas te cang mi gsung ngas par bzhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i mkha' gro de
237a5(rgyud): dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// brgyam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dang phyug gis yon tan khyad bor du 'phags pa'i rdo rje mkha'agro
237a6(rgyud): chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor du 'chad du mi bzhed pa de bdag cag la mi dgyes su ma mdzad cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la
237a7(rgyud): rnam par bltas te tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa/ sems dpa' chen pos zhus pa legs// sa 'og ma yi sangs rgyas kyang // 'di yi gzhung gis sems rmongs na// sems dpa' gzhan ni/ 
237a8(rgyud): smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di// byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs phyir// byin gyis brlabs nas 'chad pa ni// ston pa rnams kyis chos nyid do// de nas rdo rje mkha' gro de dag
237b1(rgyud): thams cad rab tu dga' nas yang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
237b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis bdag cag byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang bathun mong ma yin pa bstan cing rnam pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis bdag
237b3(rgyud): cag byin gyis brlabs par mdzad du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang phyug gis rdo rje mkha 'gro de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ sems dpa' thams cad / 
237b4(rgyud): gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / sung dang thugs kyi gsang ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di ra
237b5(rgyud): gi thugs kha las byung // oM AHhUM sa ma ya badz+ra/ den sa byung ma thag tu de'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje mkha' gro'okhor de dag thams cad bsdus nas rang gi snying kar btsud nas
237b6(rgyud): bud med kyi dkyil na thams cad brgyal ba ltar gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de bslang ba'i phyir mkha' 'gro thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba ti nge 'dzin
237b7(rgyud): la snyoms par zhug so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de dag dran pa slar thob cing ji lta bzhin du gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gos 'khor lo rnam par
237b8(rgyud): dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rdo rje mkha' gro de dag thams cad rang rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod par gyur to// de'i che ba ci
238a1(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings na gnas pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar gyur to// de nas bcom
238a2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad mnyam pa/ 
238a3(rgyud): nyid du dmigs te/ dbugs rngub par mi mdzad/ 'byung bar mi mdzad/ lus 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad/ lus gnas par yang mi mdzad/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi
238a4(rgyud): gzigs mi dgongs nye bar mi 'jog go/ thabs dang shes rab da stong par yang mi mdzad/ shin tu 'gal ba can yang dag par 'dzud par mi mdzad/ mtho ris la yang mi 'jog
238a5(rgyud): ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ mdul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags pa rnams 'gags par yang mi mdzad// 
238a6(rgyud): ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa rnams rmongs pa sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa rnams mi dga' bar
238a7(rgyud): yang mi mdzad/ mi dga' ba rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ ma khros pa rnams khros pa yang mi mdzad/ mi sdug pa rnams sdug par yang mi mdzad/ drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po
238a8(rgyud): chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa'i dug chen po dang / che ba'i gdon
238b1(rgyud): dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad do// rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin de las
238b2(rgyud): bzhengs te/ brjid pa dang bcas par gar mdzad cing zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dor ba dang / bskum pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / spyan mdzes pas sprin rings bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad+ma'i phyag gi/ 
238b3(rgyud): sor mo g.yas g.yon gar gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang / 'dor zhing bskul ba dang / 'jog cing 'jigs pa'i rnam par gnon pas na mkha'i dbyings
238b4(rgyud): 'di thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad/ dedal khyab nas me'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ de
238b5(rgyud): nas chu'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de nas/ sa'i khams chen por kun tu khyab par mdzad// / de yang kun tu khyab nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
238b6(rgyud): la kun tu khyab par mdzad do// ring dang sems can thams cad dang / sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang / bud med gzhon nu rgan pa dang / skyes pa dang ni ma ning dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / 
238b7(rgyud): gdon dang skar ma gshin rje dang / chu bdag brgya byin la sogs dang // 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur thams cad la// bcom ldan 'das ni bde chen po// kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin// kun tu khyab par
238b8(rgyud): byas te gnas// dpal rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud las rdo rje mkha' 'gro byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// las kyi mchog
239a1(rgyud): rnams 'grub byed du'i// gsung sngags rnams ni bshad par bya// rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan par bya'o// oM a kA ro ma khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NA ad+ya nuta ba nan tAta/ gtor ma'i snga
239a2(rgyud): so// a A/ i I/ u U/ a ai/ o au/ aM a/ bud med do// r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ ma ning ngo // ka kha ga g+hang / tsa tshaM dza dz+nyAnya/ Ta dza Da D+he Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ be pha be b+ha ma/ skyes pa'i/ ya ra la wa/ 
239a3(rgyud): 'byung ba'i'o// sha Sha sa ha/ 'dzegs pa la sogs pa'o// k+Sha/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sa bon no// badz+ra d+h+rika hUM/ dzi na dzi ka b+h+yAM/ rat+na d+h+r-i ka a/ A ro l-i ka dzA/ pradz+nyA d+h+rika khaM/ mkha 'gro chen po lnga'i'o// 
239a4(rgyud): Shar ti mAM/ mo ha ra ti lAM/ rA ga ra ti bAM/ badz+ra ra tit+ta/ rdo rje mkha' gro rten par byed pa la sogs pa'i'o// k+Shi ti gar+b+ho kli/ pA Ni dzI/ ga ga na gar+b+he khaM/ lo ke shwa rA ya gaM/ ni ba ra Na ShiSh+Ta
239a5(rgyud): m+b+hi ni kaM/ sa man+ta b+hadras/ rdo rje mkha 'gro dam tshig spyod pa las/ gas pa'i'o// rub badz+ra dza/ shab+da badz+ra hUM/ gan d+ha badz+ra khaM/ ras badz+ra hoHsA ra sha badz+ra khaM/ d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra ra/ 
239a6(rgyud): mkha 'gro mdzes par byed pa la sogs pa'i'o// ya mAn+ta krita/ pradz+nyAn+ta krita/ pat+san+ta krita/ big+h+nAM ta kr-i ta/ Tak+ki radz+r-i/ ni la daN+Tha/ ma hA ba la/ a tsa la ka na hUM/ suM b+ha ni hUM/ tsakra brti ni b+h+yAM/ rdo rje mkhwa
239a7(rgyud): 'gro gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i 'o// wa ri dzi na b+hU/ te dzo skan+na b+h+yAM/ man+t+ri tsakra b+h+yAM/ ba rad+ha na b+h+yAM/ bi sa ra Na b+h+yAM/ bi ra dzi na b+h+yAM/ ka ro b+ha ba b+h+yAM/ rdo rje mkha 'gro gtsug tor rgyal ba la sogs pa'i
239a8(rgyud): hUM hrIHkha rdo rje mkha 'gro'i'o// oM me de ne badz+ri b+ha ba badz+ra bon d+ha nAM/ sa 'o'o// oM badz+ra prA ka ra Na d+hU ba~M hUM/ ra ba'i'o// oM badz+ra pany+tsi ra hUM yaM hUM/ dro ba'i'o// oM badz+ra bi tA na hUM/ gur gyi'o// oM badz+ra
239b1(rgyud): rata sa tAM satAM/ mda'i'o// oM badz+ra dz+wa lArka hU hUM hUM/ 'od kyi'o// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ stong pa nyid kyi sngag so// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba at+ma ko ho/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sngag so// oM
239b2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta~M ka ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba oMSh+Ti ke ho/ sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab po'i'o// badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM/ mA tri kra ma hUM/ thig gdab pa'i// badz+ri tsi tra sa ma sa n+du/ tshon dgye ba'o'o// \u0f7f/ 
239b3(rgyud): ar+d+heHdbab pa'i'o// badz+ra ki la ya mu gar A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ phur bus brdung ba'i'o// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i// sngags kyi tshogs rnams ji srid pa// 
239b4(rgyud): de kun sngon du rgyas pa ru// gsang ba dang ni 'jigs byed dang // bde mchog sogs la nga yis ni// las dang bcas pararab bshad pa// rnal 'byor rtogs pas shes bya'o// dpal rdo rje
239b5(rgyud): snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas mkha' gro grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// las kyi cho ga shes pa sri
239b6(rgyud): tsa rigs par ni las rnams bya// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i srad bu ni// sems med las byung byas nas su// byin rlabs mi bskyod rtag pa ru// byas te thig ni gdab pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// tA ra na bzhis
239b7(rgyud): rgyan pa ste// dar dang me tog phreng bas klubs// srad bu bzhi dang rab ldan pa// zur gyi cha ni thams cad du// zla ba rin chen rdo rje dgod// las kyi bye brag shes pa yis// blo dang ldan pas phyag rgya dgod// in+d+ra
239b8(rgyud): ni la lta bu yi// 'jigs byed rdo rje dbus su bri// shar du lha brgyad 'khor lo dkar// lho ru rin chen zur dgu ldang // nub du ma dab brgyad pad+mo dmar// byang dural gri sngon po bri// me yi mtsham su 'khor/ 
240a1(rgyud): lo sngon// bden bral ud pal dmar po dang // rlung gi mtshams su pad+ma dkar// dbang ldan ud pal ser po ste// rdo rje thob shar gyi sgo// lho yi sgo ru rdo rje byug/ pad+ma'i sdong bu nub
240a2(rgyud): kyi sgo// byang sgo rdo rje kha bye ba// sbyor ba ldan pas dgod par bya// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lngar ni// tshon ci dag kyang bsgom bya ste// rdul tshon lnga la sogs pa rnams// rim pa bzhin du gdab par bya// de nas bum pa/ 
240a3(rgyud): bzung bar bya// rtsa ba nag nog med pa yi// zhabs brtan mgron ring mchu 'phyang ba// lha yi grangs tsam sta gon gnas// mgul bar ras kyis yang dag dkris// ldum bu yis ni kha mdzes pa// rin chen
240a4(rgyud): sman 'bru sna lnga dang // spos chu yis ni rab bkang nas// bum pa mdo na par bsngags par bya// rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi// bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi// lha rnams kyi ni bum pa ba
240a5(rgyud): sgra yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni// las kun byed pas bzlas byas te// ku sha'i chun pos sems can che// 'jug pa kun lag/ rab bya// yon dang gtor ma mchod phul nas// de dag phyig
240a6(rgyud): bkod de// g.yas su rgyal ba spyan dang ngo // de nas lha rnams rab gnas pa'i// bsam pa'i sbyor bas bsam bya ste// phyag rgya bral ba'i sbyor ba ni// lus can byin gyis mi rlob pas// bu mo gzugs bzang
240a7(rgyud): lang chos rgyan// dbang thob lus rgyas thob pa mo// g.yon ma rgyan gyis rab brgyan te// de yis 'khor lo sprul par bya// de la mar me brgya sogs pa'i// mchod pa phul nas bstod pa ste// bshang gci
240a8(rgyud): / khu ba khrag rnams ni// dung chen po ru bzhag bya ste// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas mkha' gro glong mchog tu// slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya ste// rdo rje ye shes rab thob pa'i'o// de bzhin gshegs
240b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas slob ma de yis kyang // me tog sngags 'di gtor ba'o// pra tits+tsha badz+ra hoHzhes bya// de nas
240b2(rgyud): tshig 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol// de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor de 'dir lta bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs su khyod skyes so// sngags dang phyag rgyas khyod byin rlab// dngos grub
240b3(rgyud): thams cad phun sum tshogs// dam tshig mchog tu 'grub par byed// rdo rje pad+mo rol pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi bdag nyid shes par bya// ba sh+ya badz+ra// gang dag me tog gsang ba ste// de de de yi lha
240b4(rgyud): yang dag/ de yi sbyor ba rab sbyin te// de yi nan tan du sgrub po// // dung chen bdud rtsi lnga blud de// dmyal ba'i chu yis khyo da la ni// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsru
240b5(rgyud): na dngos grub pa'i// 'thung shig rdo rje bdud rtsi chu// badz+ra u dka/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig dang ni sdom pa rnams// bla mas slob ma sdig bral la// ci lta ba/ 
240b6(rgyud): bzhin bsgrags par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dbang
240b7(rgyud): bskur ba yi cho ga'i mchog/ gang gis legs par byed 'gyur na// de ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa// de nyid bcu la sogs
240b8(rgyud): pa yi// gsang rig cho ga shes pa pos// bsgrims te slob ma yang dag gzung // bla ma la gus dang ba'o// dge sgom lha rnams mchod byed pa// gtong phod yon tan ldan pa'o// de nas slob ma da yis
241a1(rgyud): kyang sa langs te zhabs la mgos gtugs nas// rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// gos dang rgyan gyis legs par bgos// steng du bla re bri bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
241a2(rgyud): ba dan dang // lham dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // gdu bu dag dang rga rags dang // bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis// slob ma sdig dang bral ba la// slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro// dang po rnam
241a3(rgyud): rgyal bum pa dang // de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang // lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po bzhis// bkra shis tshigs bcad glu sgra dang // rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// skyob pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du// til/ 
241a4(rgyud): gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal bas bum pa gzungs nas ni // de nyid gi dbang bskur bar// dkyil 'khor de nyid rig pa ru bsam// de lta bu ni bsams nas kyang // chos kyi mtshan nyid
241a5(rgyud): bstan par bya// de nas yid 'ong bu mo ni// legs par goms ba dbang thob pa// rgyan gyis rab brgyan rab mdzes pa// / ba tsal te bla ma la phul nas// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de
241a6(rgyud): nang ni sbas pa btus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yi// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad+mo las dang ba// sbom po mtha' ltag rtse sbyar nas// rkan tu rdo rje bzhag par bya// kye ma'o/ 
241a7(rgyud): bde ba bde ba che// kye ma'o dam tshig bde brjod cing // kye ma'o bde ba blang bar bya'o// 'di ni bsang ba zhes bya ba'i// de dbang bskur ba'i thabs mchog go/ yang na shin tu dang ba dang // gzugs
241a8(rgyud): bzang sgrub la dga' ba dang // sbyor gos bla ma la ni dbul// bla mas byin rlabs lha mo dang // sgrub pa de la sbyin par bya// de yis blangs nas brtson pa'i tshogs// ji skad gsungs bzhin rab byas nas
241b1(rgyud): rang gi lha dang sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kun// mnyes byed tshogs sems brtags te// mngon sum bde ba rang 'byung ba// gzhan gyis gang du bsgrag mi nus// 
241b2(rgyud): go ba'i yul de bde ba che// bla ma do la dbul bar bya// bla ma gzhan la de bzhin du// ci dga' bar yi yon yang dbul// slob dpon cung zad ci 'dod pa// yid la bsams pa dbul bar bya// dam/ 
241b3(rgyud): tshig 'da' bas 'jigs pa'i phyir// bsgrims te de bzhin dbul bar bya// slob dpon gyi ni yul gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga// bum pa'i dbang sogs dbye ba yis// yang na gsum
241b4(rgyud): du 'gyur ba yin// rang gi ma dang seng ge gdan// yon gyi mtsho dag ste sangs rgyas rigs// gser dang glang po rin chend dang // sring mo bla ma la dbul ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs
241b5(rgyud): yin te// yon te yon gyi mchog yin no// shing rta rta ni shin tu rgyan// rang gi chung ma dbul bya ste// rin chen sna chog sa rnam dag pa// yon te rin po che yi rigs// mu tig phreng ba
241b6(rgyud): shin tu mdzes// bu mo rin chen dra ba yis// rgyan te bla ma la dbul ba// yon de pad+ma'i rigs yin no// rgyal po dang ni dbang phyug dang // chung ma 'phrul gyi bzhon pa sogs// glang po rtani shin tu rgyan// 
241b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje// nan tan bla ma dbul bya ba// sna tshogs rdo rje'i rigs yin no// de rnams bzhi dang 'gyur ba dang // mi 'gyur ba yi bye brag gis// gsum du shes bya bla ma la// blo
241b8(rgyud): ldan rdo rje slob ma yis// ci ste bde bkun 'dod pa// dad mos sems kyis dbul bar bya// yid la gang bsams ma phul lam// khas blangs de ni ma yul na// yi dag sa dmyal ba rnam gnyis
242a1(rgyud): nges par skyes te brlag par 'gyur// de bas de rnams rab phul nas// gsol ba dag ni rab tu gad ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugs so// sbyor/ 
242a2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhug so// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor bdag gi de ring mthong // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor
242a3(rgyud): du ni bdag dbang bskur// de nas bla ma de yis kyang // de la dbang bskur sbyin bya ste// dri dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// bsgribs te yang dag brtags par bya// dang po la ni bum pa'i dbang // gnyis pa la ni
242a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// bzhi pa de yi ye shes te// bla ma las ni thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las phan yon dang bcas par dbang bskur ba'i la
242a5(rgyud): ste bzhi pa'o// / gang gis thabs kyis rigs lnga'i don// rang gi don gyur/ kun tu bzang // 'di dag gzhan la rab bde'i phyir// rdo rje sems
242a6(rgyud): dpa'i sgrub thabs bshad// yid 'ong dben pa'i sa phyogs su// ci bder gnas la na mkha' kun// sems kyis khyab par byas nas su// rnam brtag e ma'o 'jig rten kun// sdug bsngal chos kyi/ 
242a7(rgyud): kun nas bcos// byang chub sems nyams sems can rnams// kun las 'byung zhes dam bcas pa'i// sngags pas spyi bor bzhag pa ni// AHsems kyi rdul phran cha drug rnams// phyogs bcu
242a8(rgyud): dag tu phye nas su// chos kyi don rnams des bsal nas// shin tu dri med sems dag pa// 'das dang ma 'ongs pa'i sems// de ltar yang ni dmigs su med// gnyis med de la gnyis med med// namakha
242b1(rgyud): zhes pa'ang gnas pa med// de ltar kun tu brtags nas su// 'gro ba thams cad shin tu stong // dri med rnal 'byor nyid kyi yin// dngos po med par rang sems pasam// 'gro ba 'di ni de lta bu'i// dngos pa
242b2(rgyud): gang dag yod min na// sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang dag lags// sems nyams sems can 'byung bar sgom// 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam shugs// dbyangs yig spel ba'i glu ldan pa// rin chen sems
242b3(rgyud): ni rmugs pa ldan// bde gshegs rnams kyis bskul bar snang // shU n+ya ta ti yo ga pA daM swA hA// pra b+ha bI A kA sha ta mA pa ga ta sa ma ya// ud ba ta pa yan+ti su ga ta su ga ta su ga gau ti ta shri badz+ra swAhA/ 
242b4(rgyud): pUpU swA hUM// rnam rtog kun spangs dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog/ sgom pa'i sems// sngags kyi de nyid bskyod byas la// hUM shes pa yi gzugs su brtag ting 'dzin gyis dbang 'gyur ni// 
242b5(rgyud): gang phyir de ni bsgom pas thob// dam pa na mkha'i dbyings la gnas// byang chub sems tshogs der bcas la// rnol 'byor ro/ da kyis kun bsam nas// rgyas par rnam par brtag par bya/ 
242b6(rgyud): yi ge bruM gyis lha yi gnas// rdo rje rin chen gyis ni rgyan// sgo khyud rta babs ka ba dag/ dar gyis phreng bas rnam par klubs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dril bu'i dra bdag gis rgyan// rtag par do shol me
242b7(rgyud): long dang // me tog phreng bas rgyan rnams bres// de yi dbus su seng ge'i gdan// sang ge brgyad kyis rnam par rgyan// smon lam dbang gis de dag kun// byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che// shar phyogs
242b8(rgyud): ba glang shin tu rgyas// lho phyogs rta yi gdan bzang ste// nub phyogs su ni rma bya bshad// de bzhin byang phyogs na mkha' lding // mi bskyod khro bo bsam pa ni// mthing ka dkar po dmar po'i zhal// rdo
243a1(rgyud): phyag rgya thugs ka na// mthing ka kha dog gsal la bzang // g.yas na rin chen 'khor lo so// ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na// 'jig rten khams ni kun 'khrug pa'o// brtul zhugs can hU~M/ 
243a2(rgyud): zhal gsum bsam// dang po yi ni stong pa nyid// gnyis pa de bzhin mtshan ma med// gsum pa smon pa med pa yi// zhal du mkhas pas rig par bya// phyag drug rtag tu 'bar bar sgom// mtshan ma sna tsho
243a3(rgyud): rnams dang ldan// pad+ma la ni mnyam bzhag nas// ye shes phyag rgya snying kha nang // dbus kyi gnas su bsam pa ni// rdo rje skyil mo krung du gnas// shar gyi gnas su bsam pa ni// sngags pas rnam sna
243a4(rgyud): thub pa ste// dkar dang mthing ka dmar ba'i zhal// 'khor lo dag rgya snying ka na// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od gsal ba// rin/ da chen rdo rje g.yas pa na// ral gri pad+ma g.yon pa na// rnal 'byor can
243a5(rgyud): gyis rtag par bsam// thor tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis ba rgyan// rin chen mgon po lho phyogs na// ser dang mthing ka/ dkar ba'i zhal// rin chen phyag rgya snying kha na// mar gad lta bur
243a6(rgyud): snang ba'o// g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri ste// rdo rje pad+ma g.yon na'o// rtag par rnal 'byor pas bsam pa// rin chen char du 'bebs pa'o// nub phyogs gnas su dgod bya ba// snang ba mtha' yas bsam pa
243a7(rgyud): ni dmar dang mthing ka dkar ba'i zhal// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog lta bu// pad+ma'i phyag rgya snying kha na// rdo rje rin chen g.yas pa na// 'khor lo ral gri g.yon pa na// pad+ma lo ni mnyam gzhag bsam// byang
243a8(rgyud): phyogs gnas su don grub ni// ljang ku mthing ka dkar ba'i zhal// ral gri phyag rgya snying ka na// 'bar ba'i phreng bas mnyam pa'o// pad+ma rdo rje g.yas pa na// 'khor lo rin chen g.yon pa na// zla ba'i
243b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// byang gi gnas su bsam par bya// sngags pas phyag drug bsam pa ni// spyan de zhal gsum dkar mo yi// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya bzhin// de yi don du rnam par
243b2(rgyud): sgom/ mA ma ki yang bsam pa ni// ud pa la dang ni mthing 'dra ba// zhal gsum phyag drug chags pa ste// mi bskyod phyag rgya mchog 'dzin pa'o// chags bso chags pa rigs kyi sngags// zhal
243b3(rgyud): gsum phyag drug dge ba ste// sbyor ba'i sa ni dkar mo bsam// pad+ma rA ga'i phyag rgya'o// sgrol ma kha dog ser mo ste// 'khril bag rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug rab tu bsaM
243b4(rgyud): thogs med rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// sgo bzhi sgo srung dgod pa deb// sgo rnams su ni khro bo bsam// khro bo chen po ga da shin rje gshed// gzhan gyis mi thub de bzhin te// thub par
243b5(rgyud): dka' ba rta mgrin dang // khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsam// de dag kun kyang zhal gsum pa// drag cing drag por gnon pa'o// mthing ka ser po de bzhin dmar// ljang ku dag ni kha dog
243b6(rgyud): tu'o/  mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i phreng thogs de bzhin no// gdon rnams thams cad skrag byed pa// gnod sbyin srin po phra men ma// ma he seng ge stag rnams dang // ba lang zhon pa rnam
243b7(rgyud): bzhi'o// rnam par 'gyur ba'i khro gnyer can// khro bo spyan ni kun nas bsdus// sngags 'di rnams kyis bsam pa ni// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'o// sngags kyi de nyid rjes 'thun par// sngags
243b8(rgyud): bas dkyil 'khor bsgrubs nas su// sa yi snying po la sogs pa// sems dpa' rnams ni der gnas pas ma// lus dang ngag dang sems de nyid// hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog/ sems ni de ru zhug
244a1(rgyud): par bsam// mi bskyod pa ni bdag nyid che// dbang po'i lam du byung nas su// dang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis ni rgyan// bdag nyid gcig cing gcig 'gyur bar// skad cig gi/ 
244a2(rgyud): ni brtag par bya// khyod ni rdo rje sems zhes bya// de la sogs pas bstod par byed// de nas rnam snang mdzad la sogs// rang gi snying kar rab tu bzung // gzugs rnams kyi ni rang bzhin du// rnam
244a3(rgyud): par snang mdzad thub pa bzhugs// tshor ba rin chen mgon po yin// mtha' yas 'od ni 'du shes su'o// 'du byed kun tu gdon mi za// mi bskyod pa ni phung po lngar// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
244a4(rgyud): rnams ni// sngags 'di rnams kyis bzhugs par bsam// sa yi khams kyi rang bzhin du// de nas spun ni bzhugs bya ste// rnal 'byor yid kyis bsam pa ni// de yang spro bar gan
244a5(rgyud): bar bas// mA ma ki yang chu yi khams// brlan zhing khrag/ ni rgyu ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni yid kyis bsam/ de yi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur// me yi khams kyi rang bzhin du/ 
244a6(rgyud): gos dkar mo yang bzhugs par bya// kun tu khyab par zhugs pa yi// 'od rnams su ni der 'gyur// sgrol ma rlung gi rang bzhin du// bzhugs par de ni bsam par bya// rlung ni rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur
244a7(rgyud): de bzhin yid mgyogs rdzu 'phrul 'grub// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// nam mkha'i rang bzhin dag tu 'jug/ de lus khong stong nyid la ni// rang sems yon tan sgom pa'i sems// nam mkha'i
244a8(rgyud): dbyings kyi rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i sbyor bas su// dag pa'i bdag nyid cing 'dod par// de nas ri rab phul nas 'gro// sa yi snying po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas spyan ni bdag
244b1(rgyud): nyid de// mig gi phyogs su zhugs nas ni// 'phrul gyi mig tu rtag tu 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// rna ba'i rnam shes sbyor bas na// sgra rnams thams cad shes pa de// rna ba'i rnam
244b2(rgyud): shes de bzhin 'gyur// na mkha'i snying po bdag nyid che// sna yi rnam shes sbyor bas na// sangs rgyas shangs ni bdag nyid shes// de yang de yi ngo bor 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por rab chags
244b3(rgyud): pa// rdo rje lce yi sbyor bas su// ro yi dbang po myong ba des// skad cig gcig la de ru 'gyur// blo ldan sgrib pa thams cad ni// rnam par sel ba'i ming dang ldan// nyon mongs thams cad rnam/ 
244b4(rgyud): par sel// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'jig/ me long gi/ ni rnam pa ltar// rten pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba ni// gar+b+hags brnyan gyis ni sbyor bas su// skad cig gis ni de ru 'gyur/ 
244b5(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// rnam pa bcu dang dra ga tu yang // sbyor ba de ni byin rlabs nas// sngags pas de ni sems la gzhug/ khro bo lcags kyu dpung pa yis// zhags
244b6(rgyud): pa lta bu gnyis pa'o// lu gu rgyud kyi kha sprad gsum// rgyal mtshan gzhug par khyab par bzhag/ de ltar don rnams rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor bdag/ rdo rje phyag rgya dang ldan pa// 
244b7(rgyud): g.yon pa dril bsnams sta zur brten// rdo rje sems dpa' de gnas 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po dkar ba'i gzugs// dkar dang mthing ka dmar po'i dbu// stong nyid la sogs bdag sbyor ba// rdo
244b8(rgyud): sems dpa' zhes su smra// rdo rje phyag rgya rjes su chags pa la// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ra gra Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko taM/ sangs rgyas mchod pa la/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ak+ko he/ 
245a1(rgyud): rang gi dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// mdun du bsams nas na mkha' la// khyab pa'i sbyor bas gcig byas te// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams bzlas// bcom ldan ma
245a2(rgyud): mnyam gzhug pacing bzhugs// rdo rje phyag rgya thugs dkar bsnams// g.yas par 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri g.yon pa'o// de nyid gsum gyi tshul gyis ni// ci tsam nus par bzlas
245a3(rgyud): pa bya// skyon yid kyis drangs nas ni// de dag thams cad snying kar gzhug/ mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas 'dug na// lus kyis ci tsam bskyod pa dang // tshig tu rab tu 'phro ba'i rnams// de dag sngags
245a4(rgyud): dang phyag rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu sgom pa'i sbyor bas ni// de la/ sems dpa'i gzhan ma yin// rnal 'byor ngo bo gzu gas can la// lha mo rnams kyang de la 'dzin// dbang po lam
245a5(rgyud): du gang gyur pa// de dang de yi ngo bo dag/ shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor bas su// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bya'o// dpal de rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las lha'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// 
245a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ 
245a7(rgyud): tshig 'thun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gces pa dri med pa// byang chub sems ni rin po che// bla na med pa bshad du
245a8(rgyud): gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugasu chud nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems
245b1(rgyud): ni lus kyi rnam pa yin la// lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin zhing sems kyang tshig gis rab tu brjod pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
245b2(rgyud): cad sku dang gsung dang thugs sbyor ba thob nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjed do// kye ma kun tu bzang po 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// g.yo ba med ci
245b3(rgyud): gnas med pa// rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pa yin// bskyed pa bya zhes rab tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs spros pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
245b4(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'dog/ sung ngo // dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te// chos can med cing chos nyid med// na mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i
245b5(rgyud): byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das na bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi 'khrugs pas gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
245b6(rgyud): 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigasu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung ngo // dngos po 'di dag dngos med de// 
245b7(rgyud): chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'o// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog gis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan
245b8(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// dngos po skye ba med pa ste// dngos po bo yong
246a1(rgyud): min pas// na mkha'i go'aphang thob bo zhes// ngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
246a2(rgyud): pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bla ma'i yang bla ma'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsung so// chos rnams rang bzhin/ 
246a3(rgyud): 'od gsal ba// bzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can med cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// zhes
246a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das don yod grub kyis gsungs so// de nas yA dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/ la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
246a5(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi se mas rnam par dag pa thob nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te tshe da du brjod do// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o dag/ kye ma'i chos
246a6(rgyud): ni bstan pa rnams// bdag med chos las legs byung ba// byang chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems kyi sgom pa yi// mi g.yo yi ge las byung zhing // rmi lam la sogs ma skyes pa// byang
246a7(rgyud): chub sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te// sems dpa'i skyil mo kru bcas nas// dang por rang bzhin dag go zhes// dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas// yid kyis hUM byas
246a8(rgyud): rdo rje can// rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlab// rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya// lag pa stong de bskor ba ni// lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang dang // byin nas drang por phyogs bcing ste// dam tshig mchog
246b1(rgyud): kyang dbul bar bya// gdan rnams so sor phul nas su// mchod yon 'bul ba'i sbyor ba bya// dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha sogs// sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya// rnam pa kun gyis mnyen
246b2(rgyud): bya ba/ rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis bdag/ rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste// byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang // gzugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dag/ rnal 'byor yin zhe
246b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags kyi byin rlabs nga rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin rlabs yin par gsungs// byang chub sems ni dag pa dang // gsang sngags sa bon skye ba che// phyag rgya tshogs su brtag pa
246b4(rgyud): yis// rim gyis gzugs kyi rdzogs bya ba// de ni brtags pa ngas brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs// bsdu dang spro bar bya ba las// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dang / 
246b5(rgyud): skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor na/ sa brjod do// dang por dam tshig byin rlabs par// rnam 'byor rig pa dag gis brtags// rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag
246b6(rgyud): 'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad// nyon mongs dri mar bcas pa'i sems// byang chub sems kyis dag bya ste// de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes// brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyar// dag gyur de nas blo/ 
246b7(rgyud): yis ni// sems la so sor brtag par bya// sems la so sor brtags nas kyang // phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya// sems tsam la ni gnas nas su// byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des// 
246b8(rgyud): bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag/ zla 'i gzugs su rnam par brtags// dag pa'i pad+ma pa gnas pa// oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yi// yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs// rdo rje sku ni bsgom par bya/ 
247a1(rgyud): AHzhes bya ba'i sgros med gsung // sems ni hUM zhes bya bar sprul// yi ge gsum gyis byin rlabs lus// snying la gnas pazla ba'i gzugs// de la rang gi yi ge ni// mdog gzug
247a2(rgyud): 'od ni byed bsams te// nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag nyid brjod// rgyal kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan pa// cha shas kyi ni dra ba can// ye shes
247a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdzogs par brtag/ de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga dbang bskur te// con pan phreng ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs
247a4(rgyud): rgyas kyis// sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma 'phro// yan lag bzhi dpa dpung lnga pa'i// phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang // ba snyams ma dang ni tog ldan ma// mtshon cha ma dang rtse mo can// 
247a5(rgyud): sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam pa'o// rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis brlab / kun la khyab par byed pa yi// sna tshogs dbus su bzha gnas ni// de nyid chen po bdag nyis lngas// phyogs bzhi 'khru/ 
247a6(rgyud): la khyab bya ste// dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang spro// ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la// 'os par byed pa'i sngags pa yi/ 'khor lo dang ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni// 'khor lo kun la
247a7(rgyud): pad+ma yi// ngo bo yis ni rol pa dang // e zhes bya ba 'phro ba las// mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya// mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams kun ldan pa'i// nyid kyi gdan la bzhugs par lta// sgeg dang klu dang
247a8(rgyud): gari rnams dang // rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye dang // sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs rnams kyi mchod pa bya// rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni// bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas/ 
247b1(rgyud): myur ches bya ba bul ba dang // mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam par spangs// de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod pa// bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas kyis// bsgrims nas
247b2(rgyud): rdo rje gsar nas su// g.yon pas dril bu la gsol zhing // rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang // bdan tshul du byas pas mchod// bzlas pa yis ni 'jug brtul nas// gshegs su gsol dang ra
247b3(rgyud): nyid 'grub// lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te// brtan por ci ba der 'gro bar bya// bar chad du ni gyur nas yang // yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab// de ltar bsgoms pas sgom byed pa// rdo rje theg
247b4(rgyud): pas rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub de ni myur thob nas// bla nyid ni/ la 'khor lto bur snang // sna tshogs las kyi thog 'dren no/ dang // rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rgyal byed bad+ma
247b5(rgyud): gdung rgyud can// gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur// dpal ldan rigs sngags kun gyi gso// dga' chen 'dod dgur lcags gyur 'gyur// sgyu ma bzhin du kun shes shing // 
247b6(rgyud): dregs pa 'joms byed khro bor 'gyur// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
247b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i// me ni lha yi zhal yin pas// sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'o// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad// sbyin sreg las ni lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur na dngos grub ste/ 
247b8(rgyud): gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa// thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis bskongs// de phyir sku gsung chos mchog gis// sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad// rtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me// dge ba
248a1(rgyud): / yi ni las rnams byed// gdol pa'am dur khrod byung ba yi// me ni las rnams rab tu sgrub// thab khung zlum po gru ba ni dang // zla gam dang ni zur gsum dang // dkyil 'khor gyi na
248a2(rgyud): kha khyer la// rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis rgyan// sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rigs pas// thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni// pad+ma'i steng gnas gtsug tor dang // rdo rje rin chen pad+ma bzhag/ ji ltar dmigs
248a3(rgyud): pas bdugs nas su// lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste// dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni// blug gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg/ sbyin sreg la dgos g.ya su bzhag/ g.yon du chu mi/ 
248a4(rgyud): snod dgang ngo // las kun byed pas bzlas nas su// bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya// ku sha rtse mo rnon po yis// thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya// me ni 'bar bar shes
248a5(rgyud): pa dang // g.yas pa mi 'jigs thob spyod cing // gsang sngag sa 'dis ni cho ga bzhin// me yi lho ni spyan dang ngo // chur ste na chur spyon 'byung po che// lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog/ 
248a6(rgyud): sreg blugs zhal zas zhes nas kyang // 'di nyid ni bzhugs su gsol// oM a g+na ye A di pya A bi she A ba~M sho ma hA shri ya~M ha bya ka bya bA ha na ya swAhA// phyag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te// mcho
248a7(rgyud): yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul// me yi phyogs nas bod pa yin// gsus po tsha la mig gsum pa// gdong bzhi pa lag bzhir ldan// mdog dmar ril pa'i thur tshugs can// me yi dkyil 'alnga/ 
248a8(rgyud): la gnas shing // las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis rgyan// lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la// gnyis pa na ni sngags nor phreng // g.yon pa rol pa spyi brug ste// gnyis pa na ni be con nyid// mdog dmar
248b1(rgyud): rgyan ni med pa la// drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang // thab kyi dbus su gzhugs su gsol// de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa// kun la lan gsu
248b2(rgyud): sreg blugs dbul// de nas mthor 'thung byas nas su// 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya// legs par tshim byas
248b3(rgyud): bzod gsol te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab// bum pa rgyan mtshan rdo rje gdugs// pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang // me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang // 'khyil pa'i mtshan mas
248b4(rgyud): mkha' las brtag/ des ni myur du 'byung 'gyur ba// sgom da dang bzlas la 'bad par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni// oM zhes pa dang swA hA mthar// dbyangs kyi rgyud ni sringad pa ni// 
248b5(rgyud): bar chad med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar// zhi ba'i sems ni zhi ba la/ 'byor pas rgyu ba mngon par spel// dregs bde skabs hUM la bcas pa dang // dbang du gyur pas dbang du bya'o// 
248b6(rgyud): drag shul spyod tshulo lags pa// hUM zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas// lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang // 'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas// bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi// gsang sngags yi/ 
248b7(rgyud): ge nges par sbyor// sngags grub cho ga shes pa yis// sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la// sna tshogs las dang ldan pa yi// yang dag yin pa mchod par bya// sbyin sreg de nyid la bskul zhing // dang po
248b8(rgyud): dgang blugs sreg cing dbul// phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la// dge ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya// bshang gtso khrag rkang rus pa dang // sha chen dag
249a1(rgyud): / sbyin bsreg bya// ci ste ye shes sems dpa'inal// mi gtsang ba yis bkang nago// ci ltar sdig pa skye mi 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang // sems can mi shes
249a2(rgyud): rmongs pa// / thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs shing // phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam rtog dra bas blugs byas gang // de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/ phung po gnyis su rnam par brtags// chos 'di
249a3(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis dag ste// skye ba med cing gnas med kyang // sems can shes pa spel ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thabs su bstan// dam pa'i don du dge spangs nas// bsod nams min// 
249a4(rgyud): ci zhig smos// dper ni mi gang chu klung gi/ pha rol 'gro ba'i se dmas can dag/ rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus nas// chu ral rgal ba'i gzings byas te// de las 'jug te legasarga
249a5(rgyud): nas 'khor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar// de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyis// chos kyi lam ni skyed byas kyang // chos dang cho sa min rnam spangs nas// byang chub bde ba thob pa ni// de phyir
249a6(rgyud): rnam rtog rnam spangs la// zab mo yi ni chos spel te// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs rnams la// sngags rigs rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor
249a7(rgyud): ltung byed pas// nam mkha' lta bur dri med pa'i// rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gnas// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas// nga'o snyam pas gzi bskyed lus// 
249a8(rgyud): rnam pa kun gyis rnam rgyan na// rnal 'byor ldan pas tshe 'di la// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur// las las byung bar bstan pa yi// skyes pa bud med gzugs mang la// mnyes pa nyid du mi bya/ 
249b1(rgyud): 'di// rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin// ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yi// sems kyis sems can rnams la ni// sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi 'byung // rdo rje dang ldan dam tshig yin// sreng bas
249b2(rgyud): bskyed rngub phra ma yi// tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing // mnyan na bde ba byed pa 'di// rdo rje dag can dam tshig yin// rnam par snang mdzad chen 'khrug mchog/ sha yi khams la gnas pa yin// 
249b3(rgyud): la mi 'khrugs rgyas pa ste// khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso// sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ rus gong la ni 'od dpag med// rtsa yi tshogs rnams rnam 'brel la// thub pa skyes mchog don
249b4(rgyud): yod la 'dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni// gsang chen pa yis bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje rnams kyis ni// rtag tu bsten dang bsgom par bya// 'dod chags de bzhin gti mug rmongs// sred
249b5(rgyud): dang 'du byed rnam sel ba'i// chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// bshang gci dru chu mchil mo khrag/ 'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa// 
249b6(rgyud): pa'i blo gros rtogs pa yis// dam tshig brtan par bya ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing sbyin par bya// dpal rdo rje snying po brgyan gyi rgyud las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// 
249b7(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'gro ba mi shes mun bsal phyir// ye shes nyi ma shar ba las// dgeg pu mun pa bsal tshul gsangs// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa yi// mdog dang phyag
249b8(rgyud): mtshan la sogs pa// de kun mngon tu rgyas pa ru// bye brag gis ni rgyas par bstan// de ni las kyi khyad par gyi// dbang du byas pa khro bo tshogs// gzhan du ma gsungs gang yin pa// de dag 'dir
250a1(rgyud): bshad par bya// bruM gi ye shes las byung ba// gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po ste// zhal gsum ser po mdangs dang ldan// phyag drug nyi ma la sogs pa// 'dzin cing skyil mo kla/ 
250a2(rgyud): bcas pa// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan cing // 'jig rten khams kun 'khrug byed pa'i// gzugs kyi spros pas na mkha'i gar// rig mas sku la rab 'khyud pas// chags phyir spro ba'i rtsa'i/ 
250a3(rgyud): ba can// 'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la// bgags kyis gnod pa yong mi dgos// skyon med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// yang ni bruM gi ye shes las// byung ba sngags kyi 'khor lo can// zhal
250a4(rgyud): gsum gser 'dra mdangs po che// phyag drug 'khor lo la sogs pa// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// 'dzin cing stag gi smad g.yogs te// thod pa'i phreng bas sku la rgyan// rig
250a5(rgyud): ma dang ldan chags pa po// 'jol sgeg nyams kyi sbyor ba mdzad// 'di sgom spro bar byed pa la// nyin dang mtshan du rdo rje/ sems// 'khor bcas gnas su byon nas su// rtag tu srung / 
250a6(rgyud): ba nyid du byed// bka' bzhin byed pas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de bzhin bruM gi ye shes las// byung ba'i khro bo gcu gtor rgyal// zhal gsum ser po mdangs dang ldan// phyag drug
250a7(rgyud): lcags kyu la sogs pa// 'dzin cing sbrul gyis yang dag rgyan// 'og tu bgegs kyi gtso mnan nas// gad mo'i sgras ni 'debs par byed// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// khro bo 'odi
250a8(rgyud): 'dra sgom byed pa'i// rnal 'byor gang la sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa'i bgegs kyang brlag byed na// gzhan ma rnams ni smos ci dgos// snying 'gags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// bruM las
250b1(rgyud): yang ni byung ba yi// gtsug tor dam tshig spyod pa can// zhal gsum gser zhun mdangs ldan pa// phyag drug ka pa la sogs pa// 'dzin cing sna tshogs rab tu 'bar// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis
250b2(rgyud): rgyan ga/ zhabs rnams bskur shing rnam par 'phen// spro dang bsdu ba'i blo gros can// 'di 'dre gang shig sgom pa la// bi na sa ka la sogs pa'i// dgegs kyis skabs ni mi rnyed par// ji bzhin pa
250b3(rgyud): bsgom par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// bruM gi ye shes las kyang byung // ming gi gtsug tor rnam par 'thor// zhal gsum gser ni bcom 'dra// phyag drug ti shUl
250b4(rgyud): sogs pa// 'dzin cing srog song steng na gnas// rol pa'i sto sa kyis bgegs mchub cings// ral pa'i gtsug to// ra gyis rgyan pa// sangs rgyas sprin ni spro ba'o// gang zhig de 'dra
250b5(rgyud): sgom byed pa'i// rnal 'byor de yis go cha bgos// sra ba'i tshul can yin pas// bgregs lus gang gis mig yi'o// bgegs las rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// 
250b6(rgyud): bruM gi ye shes mthu las byung // gtsug tor rnam par 'joms pa'i mchog/ zhal gsum gser 'dra'i nyi 'od mtshungs// phyag drug rdo rje la sogs pa// 'dzin cing tshems kyis sgos mnan te/ 
250b7(rgyud): chags ldan rig mas mkhyud pa'o// ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// khrag can ljags kyang 'dril ba ste// bla med byang chub thob 'dod pa// 'di 'dra sgom par byed pa la// bskal pa brgyad cu
250b8(rgyud): bar dusang // bgegs kyis gnod pa yong mi 'ong // bgegs kyis stong pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// yang ni bruM gi ye shes las// yang dge byung ba'i skabs dkar po// zhal gsum
251a1(rgyud): gser zhun lta bur gnas// phyag drug gdugs la sogs 'dzin cing // sbubs med phongs pa'i skyabs mdzad cing // ma ning rnams dang za ma la// bu ni sbyin par byed pa'o// 
251a2(rgyud): ral pa'i gtsug tor gyis rgyan pa// rig ma dang ldan sku chen 'di// rnal 'byor gang gis sgrom byed cing // bzlas pa rtse gcig tu byed na// bgegs kyi gnod pas de mi rje// rin chen gyi skabs
251a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// rnal 'byor khyad par can gyis ni// 'di rnams byang chub srung ba'i phyir// 'khor lo gtso bor rab bsgoms na// rang gi bgegs kyis yong mi tshugs// byang chub snying po
251a4(rgyud): don gnyer bar// 'di 'dra'i 'khor lo can bsgoms na// ba sgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// ring po mi thog 'dod pa 'thob// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las byang
251a5(rgyud): chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gtsug tor 'byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad 'o// / de nas ya rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa
251a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'di yi dpal ni gang zhig lags// rdo rje dang ni snying po dang // de bzhin rgyan gyi don ni ci// kye he mchog de bstan
251a7(rgyud): du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i// gsang ba'i rgyud du rab sbas pa// ji bzhin
251a8(rgyud): gnas pa'i de kho na// yang dag bstan gyis rtse gcig nyon// lus ngag yid gsum bde dam las// lha mo las ni bskyod pa ste// byang chub chen po bde ba yis// tshul bzhin du ni sngags pas bya/ 
251b1(rgyud): bskul ba'i snying pos 'di smra ste// dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig du// rang gi gnas na gnas pa yis// de nyid lha nyid bskyed par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan// zla ba gsang ba'i thig
251b2(rgyud): le le/ me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gi phul bas bskyod par bya// de bzhin bskyod pas bsgrub par bya// de bzhin du yang bskul bya ba// rgyud kyi phreng ni 'od gsal bzhin// steng dang mdun
251b3(rgyud): du rtsa gnyis las// bcu drug gnas su yang dag gnas// de las snying dbus rab zhugs te// rlung gi sbyor bas phul byas pas// snying dang mdog rab mdzes rdzogs sku// bdag gi dpal du
251b4(rgyud): shes par bya// de las byung ba'i dngos grub che// nor bu la ga/ nas rtog bral ba// thig le yig med bsdus pa'i sku// lhan cig skyes par shes par bya// de la de yi gzugs kyi sku
251b5(rgyud): namamakha'i khams kun gang ba yi// bral ba'i shes pas don/ byed pa// gzhan gyi dpal du shes par bya// de rnams rgyu las byung ba yi// ye shes shes rab shin tu gsang // gaste
