387a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab sa mi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// skad cig ma yi lda
387a7(rgyud): bsams nas// snying khar nyi ma'i rig pahUM// 'od kyis rang gzhin snod bcung rnams// sbyangs te sangs rgyas sa la gzhan// 'od zer gnyis pas sangs rgyas dang // byang sems dkyil 'khor dgug bya ste// 
387a8(rgyud): phyag bskulas snyam bosas/ me tog la sogs pas mchod la// mded pa sa mchod pa tshe// de 'od dpag med lha ma mas// reg bya ba me dad pas mchod// sdig pa shags rjes su yid rang dang / gso shing sa
387b1(rgyud): 'gro bdag lus dbul// sems bskyed dge ba bsngo bar bya// de rjes dang po byams pa ste// gnyis pa snying rje gsum pa dga'// kun gyi mtha' la btang snyom so// spyang gzhi sngags kyi phyi nang kun// stong par byas te/ 
387b2(rgyud): rang lus kyang // dbang po'i gzhu 'dra srid 'dzin gyi// gnas su hUM bsam de 'od bcas// tsam las byung ba'i 'khor lo ste// rtsibs bsul ni nyi ma bsam// dbus su hUM las gnod mdzes bskyed// de las hUM 'dro/ 
387b3(rgyud): khro bcu yang // rang rang sa la gsal bar bskyed// sngags pas bgegs med gyis shig par// de la bka' lung bsgo bar bya// zhal bzhi gsang sngags dran pa yis// mthe bong bsdigs mdzub sbyar nas ni// 
387b4(rgyud): phyogs bcur brda ni bstan pA/ oM r+d+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na / dahwA hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wa~M byid+yA rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po'/ 
387b5(rgyud): brjod pas// lus ngag sems las byung ba yi// bgegs kun gyi na mgo stongs su// rdo rje phur pa gzugs par bya// oM g+he/ g+ha gA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sar+b+ba dul+lI big+h+nAn hUM hUM phaT/ ki la ya ki la
387b6(rgyud): ya/ sar+b+ba pA paM A dz+nyA ba ya ti/ ka ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra ki la ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje tho bas brdung bya ste// oM badz+ra mud ga ra badz+ra ki la ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ spro bor bteb pas nges pa ri brlig/ slar 'dus phyogs mtshan
387b7(rgyud): ma lus bar// sa bezhir badra ba dang // gur bcing baM dang bla re dang // mda' dang me yi 'od 'bar sgom// oM badz+ra me di ni badz+ra b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra pra ka ra hUM baM hUM oM badz+ra baM dza ra hA laM hUM/ oM badz+ra bi tA
387b8(rgyud): na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sha ra dz+wa la traM sa traM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM/ rims pas brjod la snying rje yi// bdag nyid gzhan la phan 'dod pa// smon lam las byung rdzu 'phrul mchog/ saM las byung ba gzhu 'dra ba// sngon
388a1(rgyud): bo bdan ldan pa bsam// de steng ra byung rgod ma'i kha// glu gsum dmar po 'od 'bar ba// baM las skyes pa zlum po ste// dkar po 'khyil ba'i tshul du bsam// de las skyes pa dbang chen te// 
388a2(rgyud): skyes sar po rdo rje'i rgyu// gru bzhi 'od zer 'bar ba bsam// de stang tsam las chos kyi 'khor// lte bar bruM las gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgo dang rta babra bcas// da ba phyed dang dra bas rgyan// phreng ba rin chen
388a3(rgyud): / rdo rje dang // mdzes bo'i ba dan bcas pa bsam// de nang baM las chu skyes ni// ge sar 'dab mar bcas pa'i steng // nyi ma ka li 'od 'bar tshe// steng du zla ba a li bsil// kha sbyar bar du hAM dang a// gnag cing dam
388a4(rgyud): ba'i rnam pa la// de las pad+ma rdo rje bsam// slar yang yi ge 'gro ba spyang // hA gis mi bskyong thugs rnams bsdu// a yis 'o/ dad dpag gsung bsdus la// gnyis med zhu bas sprul pa bsdu// rdo rje
388a5(rgyud): las ni khro bo ste// pad+mas khro mo'i rnam par bskyed// khro bo mthing ka zhal gi cig pa// rang 'od las byung phyag gnyis 'khyud/ rdo rje dril bu thabs shes rab// g.yas dang g.yon du bsam par bya/ 
388a6(rgyud): dbu rgyan la sogs rin chen ldan// dbu skra khams ser gyen du 'bar// nag po sprul lus klu chen brgyad// sku smad stag gi lpags pas dkris// chos gos sngon pos sku stod dkris// mche ba gtsigs shing spu/ 
388a7(rgyud): gsum dmar// 'dod dgur bsgyur zhing brkyang bskam zhabs// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i steng du bzhugs// de yum rdo rje bde ma khro// dmar ljang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas pa gi grag yab la 'khyud
388a8(rgyud): g.yon bzod pa bde ba ste// gnyis med g.yon gyi phyogs nas 'khril// rdo rjes sbyor ba'i sgras bskur te// shar phyogs pad+mar nyi zla las// hUM las khams gsum rnam par rgyal// dkar po zhal gcig phyag ngan/ 
388b1(rgyud): ba g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu be son te// khro bo rgyan ldan bsams nas kyang // 'byung po'i nus pa 'joms par byed// lho phyogs nyi ma ro stengs su// hUM las byung ba'i legs ldan gnag/ 
388b2(rgyud): g.yas pa gri gug g.yon thod pa// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum thod phreng ldan// dgra bo gsod pa'i las la brtson// nub tu klu 'dul bdud rtsi khyil// ljang ku zhal gcig phyag bzhi khro// g.yas pa rdo rje 'khru
388b3(rgyud): dang // g.yon pa dbyug to phur bu bsnams// sa 'og klu sogs zas su gsol// byang du k+Sha las rnam thos bu// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bum stengs su// mdog ser g.yas pa rgyal mtshan bsnams// g.yon pa
388b4(rgyud): nor 'dzin bzung ba ste// dbul ba sel ba'i don la brtson// sgom datshams lha yi rang bzhin la// ye shes spyan dngas mchod la gzhug/ de ni yi ge bzhi sbyor yin// lus ngag sems la yi ge yi// 
388b5(rgyud): lha yi mtshan ma gdab par bya// skye mched lhar byas ting 'dzin gyi// nus pa mi shigs lhar bltas la// ye shes lnga 'dra/ sa yig bsam// de yi 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i// rigs lnga snyom
388b6(rgyud): 'jug byin rlabs kyis// mi bskyed rdo rjes dbang bskur te// gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi// rgyas btab rigs la bzhi pa yi// phyag rgya che la rigs med do// 'di ni gsang chen sku sgrub pa// rim gyis gas/ 
388b7(rgyud): zhing rnam par dag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku thob pa// tshe gcig nyid la 'gyur ba yin// rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa sogs 'jig rten ma lus kun// skad cig nyid la dbang du 'gyur// gtsug
388b8(rgyud): na rin chen la sogs pa'i// gdug pa can rnams snying yang 'byin// dga' bo la sogs klu chen rnams// rtag tu de la 'dud par 'gyur// nad kyi rigs kun ma lus 'joms// gnod sbyin ma lus
389a1(rgyud): bka' nyan cing // lha srin ma lus bran du 'gyur// 'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste// mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi
389a2(rgyud): rgyal po las dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi don ji lta bu
389a3(rgyud): lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// gas
389a4(rgyud): ba mchog gi gsang ba ste// phrin las thams cad rdzogs byed ci dang // sdug bsngal kun las skyob byed pa'i// a li ka li mnyam sbyor las// thabs dang shes rab mnyam med pa'i// sngags
389a5(rgyud): kyi don ni rnam pa lnga// sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa dang // phrin la/ sa sna tshogs rig pa dang // 'khor gyi las kyi rig pa dang // 'byung po dgug dang bsad pa dang // gtor ma btang ba'i
389a6(rgyud): / rig pa'o// oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ni lAM ba ra dA ra badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT swA ha/ tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho ban+d+ha ga a dI pa ta ye/ i daM ni lAM ba ra dA ra sha ri ra Ni/ badz+ra
389a7(rgyud): bA Ni hr-i da yaM/ yaHsa mA ti kra ma tha/ mA ku la/ u ta sA da ni/ b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bu d+d+ha/ bi bu d+hA bi bu d+h+ya ma ti kra ma tha/ hi ra ha ra na ga naM/ pra ha ra pra ha ra na ga naM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da na ga haM da yA ni/ b+hon+da b+hin+danA
389a8(rgyud): ga marma Ni/ bi shi r+yan+t+ra na ga sha rI ra/ bi s+pho Ta ya na ga na ya ne ni/ tad+ya thA/ oM AHhUM phaT/ na ga bi da ra Na ya hUM phaT/ na go ta sA da na ya hUM phaT/ ni la ba sa na ya hUM pheTe/ a pra ti ha te be le ba rak+Sha mA ya hA phaT/ 
389b1(rgyud): kr-itAn tA rU bA sa phaT/ ro' nA sa phaT/ trAs na sa phaT/ kuSh+ma N+Do ta sA da na ya phaT/ pre ta bi sha tsa bi na sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a basmA ra bi nu sha ka rA sa phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ da dar/ mA ra sa mA ra ma/ na/ 
389b2(rgyud): sha ya nA sha ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+na bi nI sha ka ra ye phaT/ sar+b+ba sha tAM saM g+ha bi na sha ke rA ya phaT/ nI lA~M ba ra dA re badz+ra pA Ni ra dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ oM badz+ra trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra trai lo kya bi dza ya b+hismai swA hA/ 
389b3(rgyud): mA ra ya tsit+tarba darba da/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA lA gu Na hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ tsit+ta kro d+hi duny+dza dzaHoM badz+ra kro d+hi a mr-i ta na ga hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuM Da li si khaM ku ru hUM phaT/ mA ra ye
389b4(rgyud): rak+ta rngubs rngubs/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ku be ra rA dza ya hUM phaT/ oM a r+ya dzaM b+ha la dza laM dra ya hUM phaT/ mA re ya ke chom chom/ me hA di ba mA ra ya sod song / ma hA na ga mA ra ya dza dza/ ma hA de hi
389b5(rgyud): mA ra ya ha na ha na/ ma hA ma nu mA ra ya gtubs gtubs/ mahA/ grub pa mA ra ya tiShAM tiSh+Ta/ ma hA sak+Sha mA ra sa b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ma hA gan+d+harba mA ra sa khos khos/ ma hA ma ri Ni mA ra ya nAM/ ma hA ni/ 
389b6(rgyud): lA ba ra dA ra badz+ra pA Ni sak+kha hAM/ mu ru ta mu ru ta hUM phaT/ mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na myos bying / mA ra Na Tu me riHdzaM/ 
389b7(rgyud): dzaH/ ka ka rak+Sha hUM hUM staM b+ho dza kha bAM/ te she rak+Sha hI hAM staM b+ho dzA kha khA/ tsa pa rAk+Sha hUM hwA staM b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ tsa ka rAk+Sha hUM hUM s+t+waM b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ mun du rak+Sha hUM hUM staM b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ kaka rak+Sha sa ma ya bu d+hA ya s+phu ta re/ 
389b8(rgyud): taM sha rAk+Sha sa ma yau bud+d+ha sa s+phu ta ra/ tsa ba rak+Sha sa ma yi bu d+d+ha ya s+phu tar/ tsa ka rak+Sha sa ma ya bu d+hA sa s+phu ta ra/ muM du rak+Sha sa ma ya~M bu d+hA ya s+phu ta ra/ hI hI hri la hri la/ di ma dim/ phob phob/ shar shar/ di ri do ra rbad rbang
390a1(rgyud): / kha maM kha thaM/ khrus thus/ dzi dzer b+h+yo/ ha sa ha sa/ te bte ba/ kri tata kri ta ta/ kri khrag kri khrug/ tshal ba tshal ba/ rbad ling zad ying / srog tshig nan rbad/ lus dul ma ra sa rbad/ rats+tsha
390a2(rgyud): la dz+wal shi she/ rdul phun rbad song/ nag mA ra ma hU~M phaT/ dzaHhUM ba hoHd+har+m+ma ka ka ki ri/ d+har+m+ma te shas muny+dza/ d+har+m+ma te sha kar/ d+har+m+ma te sha sa ma sa/ bud+d+ha pu tar/ tab teg kha khA ra/ te ba te ba ka
390a3(rgyud): te ba te ba mun du ri/ te pa te ba pustaM ha re/ te pa te ba sa mu dza/ tsaka ra muM du ri khe/ badz+ra tsa maM rin dzA dzA/ te sha ra/ mun du na/ badz+ra dzu ru dzu ru ru/ dzu ru dzu ru sa mu dza dza hA/ badz+ra g+he ne khe dza/ badz+ra pU ra
390a4(rgyud): Ni khe dza/ badz+ra muN+Da re khe dza/ kha dza ra dza mu du ra khe/ dar dzA mu du ra sa mu khe/ pad+ma ra Ni kha dza rA dza muM dur dzA khaM/ kha dza ra dza suM du ra sa muny+dza ra khe dzu dz+re dz+ra dza kha hi dza/ oM ka ya bA ka/ 
390a5(rgyud): tsit+ta I da ba le/ b+huny+dza dzig pul+la/ d+hu ba mAM sa sau/ sa khan+ti/ khur+t+ti de De ga da/ oM a mr-i ta pra ti dza ka sa ka ru bI r+thahi/ re/ bi bi ta/ ka saM ru pU dza khA hi/ d+hupe/ puSh+pe/ A l-i
390a6(rgyud): gan+d+he/ nai bi d+ye/ ka sa ka ru pU dza khA hi/ oM a ka ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+harmA NaM/ a d+ya nuta ban na twAta/ oM AHhUM// 'di ni rin chen sngags kyis mchog/ ma lus dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i dpal// gzugs
390a7(rgyud): ma khyod la nyer bshad pas// 'do ni mi 'da'i dam tshig yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u sgo drug pa'o// 
390a8(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// 
390b1(rgyud): bdag med she sa mi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga yi 'khor ni bsam mi khyab// 'di tsam grangs ni sangs rgyas kyis// bskal par bgrangs kyang shes mi 'gyur// de bas namakha'i
390b2(rgyud): tshad dang mtshungs// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// sku yi 'khor ni khro bo bcu// rigs lnga'i ngo bo sku gsung thugs// mi 'gyur gdugs pa 'dul ba yin// thugs kyi 'khor ni rigs brgya ste// mdo
390b3(rgyud): bsdus sprul pa'i khro bo bzhi// gsung gi 'khor ni dpag med kyang // rigs drug 'dul ba'i khyung chen yin// sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab bo// gdul bya'i 'khor ni klu chen brgyad// gsung gis de rig
390b4(rgyud): 'dul ba yin// gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i tshogs// lnga brgya rigs bsdus sku yi 'dul// thugs kyis lha srin gdug pa 'dul// byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dul// 'di la 'dis 'dul sprul pa'i
390b5(rgyud): tshogs// smon lam dbang gis byung ba ste// bsam gyis mi khyab de sa 'dul po// rigs la brjod par ga le nus// mdor bsdu sa mdzes ma khyod la bstan// bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rje gas
390b6(rgyud): ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las 'khor nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje 'dems gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi wa
390b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad
390b8(rgyud): kyis legs par nyon// gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'dod pas// rdo rje khyung chen stobs chen 'dul// nga yi gsung gi sprul pa ste// mche ba rno dpal drag po gtsigs// baM las rgya mtshor rab steng / 
391a1(rgyud): yi ge hUM las byung ba yi// dpa' bo klu 'dul bsgom par bya// sku mdog nag po zhal dgur ldan// rtsa zhal mthing nag g.yas pa dkar// g.yon pa dmar po de steng du// dbus dmar
391a2(rgyud): g.yas pa ldang ba ste// g.yon pa bcom gser dang 'dra// da steng dbus dkar g.yas pa gnag/ g.yon pa bai DUR+Ya ltar sngo// thams cad spyan gsum rdo rje'i mchu// spyi gtsug rin chen rdo rje'i rA/ 
391a3(rgyud): phyag ni bco brgyad g.yas pa na// rdo rje ral gri dgra sta zhags// mdung dang lcags kyu mda' dang ni// rtse gsum las kyi bya khyung bsnams// rim bzhin chu bdag mtha' yas dang // nor rgyas stobs
391a4(rgyud): rgyu dung skyong dang // pad+ma pad chen rigs ldan dang // 'jog pok+Sha/ de dgu ro stod lha// thal sbyar gtsol rin chen stob// mthugu ma phyag la dkris mdzad de// kun kyang rang rang kha dog
391a5(rgyud): 'dzin// sbrul mgo bdun pa sprin bzhin btibs// g.yon pa di khu ba con dang // 'khor lo brgya gram thod dbyug che// sprul gyi rgyal mtshan gzhu dang ni// gtum chung phur dang khyung phu/ 
391a6(rgyud): rims bzhin rlung 'byin dga' ma dang // mdzes ldan dpa' mo 'od byed ma// grub ma brtan ma dge ma dang // gsal byed rim bzhin yob dang 'dra// thal sbyar gtso la pad+ma dbul// gdengs ka gsum gyis
391a7(rgyud): 'dud byed ma// g.yon du rim bzhin bsam par bya// zhabs bzhi chu srin rus sbal dang // phag dang lto 'phye'o steng na bzhugs// gshog pa rigs bzhi'i rdo rje ste// mjug ma ral gri rigs bzhir ldan// 
391a8(rgyud): sder chen lpags la me 'bar bas// rab tu gtum zhings bdag dang // klu rigs ma lus brlag mdzad pa// 'og mi gnas su sgrib par bsam// de rjes gnas gsum yi ges rgyan// oM AHhU~Md// 
391b1(rgyud): dmar gnag/ sprul pa go cha'i sngags bsam pa// oM hU~M tA hI A// spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha dang // lte ba gsang gnas bsam par bya// e baM ma yA dpung ba dang // dpyi'i stengs su bsam par bya// hA/ 
391b2(rgyud): sa hri a brang dang ni// sog dpag ltong mo lte lkog bsam// dzeHhUM bAM hoHsgo bzhir bsam// s+t+waM dza ya a sprul pa dang // yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab bsam// de nas gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa/ 
391b3(rgyud): las kyi khrung chen drag po'i sngags// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu bsdus pa// oM badz+ra khyung ka ra badz+ra ga ru Da tsi la tsa le hUM phaT// sku yi gsang ba'i sngags su bstan// oM badz+ra ga ru De hUM sog tshig naM
391b4(rgyud): rbad// lus dul nag mA ra ya phaT// ra ra dza la dza la zhi zhi rdul buHrbad phaT// gsung gi rig pa dam pa'o// oM badz+ri tsaN+Da ga/ ru Da hUM mA ra ya// s+pho Ta sa s+pho Ta ya/ badz+ra bi ti ga ru Da baM
391b5(rgyud): ge hUM dza dza ri dza dr-i dza hUM phaT/ thugs gsang rdo rje gtum po'i snga gas// drag byed thams cad brlag par byed// klu rnams snying khrag 'thig pa yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig 'di/ 
391b6(rgyud): rin chen bzhin du rnyed dka' bas// 'di la rtag tu 'bad par bya// 'thun pa'i rdzas kyi gtor ma sbyin// de yi nang du gnod pa dgug/ oM badz+ra shri ma ma na ga sa bi ta cho ga khug maM l-i d+h+r-i swA hA// 'dis ni
391b7(rgyud): bkug la lha la dbul// gal te bsad par 'dod pa na// sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa las// phur bu gnyis pa'i drag sngags dang // gsad pa spyi'i shem bur gdags// gzugs brnyan phur bus gdas
391b8(rgyud): par bya// tshangs pa yin yang nges par brlag/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra ki la ya sar+b+ba big+h+nAn mud ga ra ki la ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ga ru Da ko li kI la ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+nAM mud ga raH
392a1(rgyud): la ya a ko Ta ya hUM phaT// gtum chung phur bus gdub pa'i sngags// de rjes gzugs brnyan ma lus pa// drag po'i thabs tu bsreg par bya// tsher ma can gyi me sba ra la
392a2(rgyud): khyung chen gtum po'i nga rgyal gyis// na ga b+hu mi pa ti sar+b+ba ka ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra dz+wa la na lArka hA/ ci rigs sngags kyis sreg pa dang // thal ba dkar gsum sbyar bya ste// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu/ 
392a3(rgyud): la dor/ de ltar las kyi sbyor ba de// lan bdun byas par gyur na ni// klu che ni dug gis snying la zin// nges par sos par 'gyur ba yin// gal te ma gtong klu chen gyi// lus dang khang par bcas
392a4(rgyud): pa la// me dang rdo rje'i char ba yis// skad cig nyid la 'tshig pa ru 'gyur// de bas dam tshig mi 'da' bas// las 'di mya ra bar mi bya'o// las kyi gtum po khyung sgrub pa// mdzes ma khyod
392a5(rgyud): la bstan pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba ma/ ngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las las sgrub pa 'i lha rdo rje gtum po khyung gi sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad
392a6(rgyud): pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi sku sprul pa/ pho nya gnod sbyin nag po'i sgrub pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
392a7(rgyud): pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// nga nyid gnod sbyin nag po 'di// bya ba'i las
392a8(rgyud): kun thogs pa med// khyad par dag po'i phrin las 'grub// dur khrod brag rdzong nags phug tu// nag po'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas// mthing nag gru gsum me 'od ldan
392b1(rgyud): saM las ri rab steng du hUM// 'od zer 'gro 'dus rdo rdor rabasam// de las gnod sbyin nag pon// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gsum ldan// g.yas pa 'jigs pa stag ginal// g.yon pa stobs chen
392b2(rgyud): seng ge ste// phyag g.yos dang po rdo rje 'dzin// gnyis brtse gsum gsum pa phur// g.yon pa dril chen ljags kyu dang // thod pa khrag gis bkang ba yin// g.yas pa gtum pas bdud mdzes// gsan
392b3(rgyud): pas bdud po nyi gdong mnan// phur zhabs dmar po me 'bar bas// gnod byed bgegs kyi mgo la btab// thod phreng mi yi lpags pa gyon// dur khrod rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan// dbu skra dmar po thur du 'byung
392b4(rgyud): spyan gsum mche ba rab tu gtsigs// ha ha ra dgod cing gdug dpa 'dul// sprul pa'i gnod sbyin stong dang bcas// rdo rje chang gi bka' bzhin sgrub// de yis rigs pa phul ba ni// oM badz+ra
392b5(rgyud): yak+Sha ka la tsaN+Da ni lAM ba ra d+har sha ri ra hUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas// grub par gyur nas gang dmigs la/ rjes su tsha ba'i 'bru dang ni// tshwa las ling gar 'khor lo gzhug// dmig
392b6(rgyud): pa bstims la 'grib gnas gzhug/ de stengs yungs kar zir dang // dug gi rigs kyis brab par bya// bsad pa drag po'i sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra yak+Sha kA la tsa nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sar+b+ba sha tAM bi da ra ya phaT/ ha ra
392b7(rgyud): ha ra phaT/ pra ha ra pra ha ra phaT/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da phaT/ b+hin+da b+hin+da phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya phaT/ sarba sha tAM ka ya bAka tsit+ta bi na sha ka ra sa phaT/ ji srid ma shi'i bar du brab// grub nas rigs med thod par gzhug/ 
392b8(rgyud): tse ti chen po'i 'og tu sa// steng du ri rab rdo rje mis// mnan pa byas pas nges par brlag/ yang na gnod sbyin chen pod// dur khrod ras la bri byas la// de yi snying khar sngags 'di bri// e yi nang du chud par na/ 
393a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra sakA ka la tsaN+Da sa ma sa ma nu s+pha ra sid+d+hi hU~M/ phyag la sak+Sha ba ta li// zhabs la kau maM b+ha ra br-i// de nyid gtor ma chen po la// bcug ste sngon po 'dar gyis dgapa// de steng ras sam
393a2(rgyud): shing lo la// gnod sbyin srog gi 'khor lo ni// lte ba rtsibs bcu mu khyud bcas// yang rtsibs bcu dang mu khyud ldan// me 'od ldan pa bris byas te// sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bkod nas kyang // las
393a3(rgyud): kyi ming dang spel ba bri// 'di ni gnod sbyin srog yin te// mi 'da' bka' yi dam tshig yin// las rnams gang bcol sku yis byed// yang na rgyal rigs thod pa la// gnod sbyin bris la tsha ba'i mar// chang
393a4(rgyud): dang bsres la byug bya ste// nyin re gang 'dod las dang sbyar// me to gra kha dog 'thun pas brab// bsgo ba'i phrin las 'grub par 'a/ gyur// chu dar sngon po'i gzhi ma la// gser gyi 'khor lo bri bar
393a5(rgyud): bya// lte ba rtsibs brgyad mu khyud ldan// phyi ma re mig bcu dru/ ga par// sa bon sngags dang spel bya ste// kun gyi mtha'/ ru phrin las sngags// bris pa mgul du btags pa yis// mi
393a6(rgyud): mthun phyogs rnams srung 'gyur te// bung ba me la bya ba bzhin// khyo sha btags pa'i rol bu'i nang // dag yi gzugs bris sngags dang spel// nyi nub bya rog la byin te// sngags bzlas byir zhing
393a7(rgyud): lan grangs ni// brgya'am stong du byas gyur na// gang yin gnas nas bskrad par 'gyur// khyi 'brel spu la srad bu byas// mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te// sngags re zhing yang gnod sbyin re// 'bras
393a8(rgyud): kyi nang du bsgyur ba na// phub ma 'bral bar mi 'gyur// de bzhin khyim du bcangs pa na// mi phrugs la sogs 'khrug pa na// khyi dang 'dra bar 'brel bar 'gyur// khyi nag snying du gnod sbyin gyi/ 
393b1(rgyud): snying dang sku dang sngags bcug nas// bcangs pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin nyid// lus dang grib mar 'dra bar 'gyur// skad cig tsam yang sgrubapa po// de yis gtong bar mi byed do// de la sogs pa'i las
393b2(rgyud): kyi rim// mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gnod sbyin nag po sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// 
393b3(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rnal 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes
393b4(rgyud): khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// bsam gyis mi khyab rdzogs pa che// lha mi
393b5(rgyud): bya ba sngon song ste// bskyed la dmigs pa thob nas ni// snying ra ye shes sems dpa' bsam// de yi rang bzhin snying na dadu// pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i thig les rgyan// nyi zla'i bar du rgyu
393b6(rgyud): sran chad// de yi nang du gnas pa'i srog/ a shad mar me'i rtse ltar sgom// de la dmigs pa brtan pa dang // ci yang bsam par mi bya ste// bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na// de las ye shes skye bar
393b7(rgyud): 'gyur// gsal zhing mi rtog rig pa'i sku// ye shes zhes ni de la bya// rten med rnam dag gsal ba yin// rtog pa rten can sgom 'dod pas// sku yi gnas su 'khor lo ni// dkar po rtsa 'dab sum/ 
393b8(rgyud): cu gnyis// mtshan gyis thabs kyi chas rgyan pa// gsung gi gnas su rtse 'dab ni// bcu drug dmar po shes rab ste// de la thabs kyis nges par rgyan// thugs kyi gnas su dus sbyor brgyad/ 
394a1(rgyud): gtso bo'i yi ge brgyad gnas pa// phrin las bya ba'i gnas dag tu// dbyu gu'i grangs kyi rtsa gnas pa// shes rab gnyis 'gyur kha dog dmar// de dbus gnyis med g.yas dang / 
394a2(rgyud): g.yon// thabs dang shes rab rnam par dbye// rtog pa sad pa'i 'khor lo ni// thabs la drug dang shes rab drug/ tha ma bde ba 'dzin pa'i sa// me tog dpa' bo gnas pa yin// yi ge bzhi yis rgyan mdzas
394a3(rgyud): de bde 'dzin 'khor lor yi ge med// brjod pa thams cad spangs pa ste// 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin mchog/ khu ba khrag dang chu ser gnas// 'di ni lam gsum 'joms byed pa'o// skad cig
394a4(rgyud): rlung gi rta yis ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis bskul nas// ga/ nyis med ye shes skye bar 'gyur// ye shes kyis ni rtog/ bu sreg/ thal ba'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur bas// rtags lnga rim
394a5(rgyud): pas 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas dpal gyi yon tan te// yang nas yang du goms par bya// sde pa bzhi yi longs spyod ni// gnas su yang dag skye bar 'gyur// gnyis med bde ba'i gnas
394a6(rgyud): thob nas// skye 'chi la sogs rgyud chad de// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i gnas// thob par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// 'di ltar rnam par dag pa ni// nyin mtshan cha yis dbye ba yis// dbyu gu chu tshod dus
394a7(rgyud): sbyor sogs// brtsibs rnal 'byor ngal ba'i rgyu// thams cad gcig tu bsdoms gyur na// mi rtog mnyam nyid na mkhar dag/ 'bad med ye shes lhun gyis grub// dngo bo'i sangs rgyas ye shes che// 
394a8(rgyud): khams gsum thams cad sgrol mdzad ma// shes rab sum la phyag 'tsha lo// mi gnas spros bral 'dus ma byas// legs rtogs bla ma mchog la bdud// brjod par dka' ba'i rnal 'byor 'di// mdzes
394b1(rgyud): ma khyod la bshad pa yin// dpa' bo brtan par ma gyur na// yi ge hUM gi sbyor ba yin// 'jig rten khams kun 'jig par 'gyur// me yis bud shing sreg mdzad de// shing med me yang ji ltar gnas/ 
394b2(rgyud): brtan g.yo nyams par gyur pa na// mi shigs yi ge rnam par dag/ 'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste// gsang ba bla na med pa 'di// bdag med rtogs pa khyod la bshad// gzhan du gang+gA'i bye ma dang // mnyam pa'i
394b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang // brjod par nus pag la yod// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las bsam gyis mi khyab pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i
394b4(rgyud): le'u ste bcu pa'o// / dpa' ma rje bdems gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gri rigs dag pa la dbang bskur ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
394b5(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis nus pa legs zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma/ yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// dang por
394b6(rgyud): slob dpon mtshan nyid kyang // mdzes shing dral ba byams sems ldan// sngags dang rgyud kyi de nyid mkhas// snyan par smra zhing gtong ba dga'// brtan zhing bden smra byams sems ldan// bsam pa shes
394b7(rgyud): shing gsong por smra// dam tshig ldan zhing sngags tshul mkhas// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor brda rnams mkhas// de nyid bcu shes snying rjer ldan// 'jig rten pa yi rnam spangs pa// mkhas pas de nyid shes nas kya
394b8(rgyud): de ni sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// byang chub sems dang dag bcom dang // nyan thos rang rgyal gang na med// de ltara'i bla ma srog ltar bsten// gal te slob dpon smod pa la// dngos grub rmi lam du yang med
395a1(rgyud): de bas bla ma mnyes byas la// bla gos phrag pa la g.yogs te// dbus gtsugs thal sbyar me tog thogs// dkyil 'khor bri bar gsol bar bya// grong dang tshong 'dus dur khrod dang
395a2(rgyud): tshal dang lha khang grong khyer te// byang shar dngos grub gzhan gnyis spangs// ro hi ta sogs zla ba yi// lto 'phye'o lto bar shes pa yin// gzhan du nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur// mkhas pas nyes pa med par
395a3(rgyud): byaHsa bslang ba dang brtag pa ni// rim bzhin gtsug lag khang pa dang // tshal dang rdo leb khang bzang te// kun la brtag pa spang bar bya// slob dpon smin pas slob ma rnams// phung po lnga po dag par bya// sa
395a4(rgyud): yi nyes pa kun gsal nas// lam las byung ba'i lha mo ni// rgyan lha nga na bum pa phyag na bsnams// de la mchod cing gsol bar bya// oM e h+ye hi ma hA de bI pr-i thi bI lo ka/ mA ti sar+b+ba rat+na saM pU ra ni/ 
395a5(rgyud): de bA a la kar b+hA Shi te/ ha ru Na pU ra nir g+ho Sha/ badz+ra sa twa pra/ pU dzi ta gr-i hi tA/ idaM arga asmin san+ni hi to b+ha ba/ hi 'i hi hi sra hA// gnang bas sa la slar thim bsam// slar spyang srung shing
395a6(rgyud): gotso bo la// dri yi gdan chen gru bzhi ste// 'khor la sum cha dor bas zlum// me tog sngon po'i gdan la bsam// rin po che 'am sa yang rung // bum pa nag pa'i skyon spangs te// byA g+hi seng g+he dbyig
395a7(rgyud): ba yi// u t+pal gzhan gyis mi thub pa// ha sa de bas nad rnams sbyong // dngul dang mu tig mu men dang // byi ru gser gyis ye shes 'phel// nas gro til dang sran ma dang // sud ka yis ni lam lnga dag/ 
395a8(rgyud): ga bur gur gum dza ti dang // tsan dan a ga ru yis ni// gzhan don phrin las lnga 'grub bo// chu dang snying po lnga yis ni// rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs 'gyur bas// mgrin pa gos kyis dkris pa dang // 'bras
395b1(rgyud): ldan shing gis kha yang rgyan// ku sha la 'dug mtshan ma can// rang rang phyogs su bzhag par bya// bdug spos thogs la gsol ba gdab// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal// bdag la dgongs nas
395b2(rgyud): gzigasu gsol// slob ma rnams kyi don phyir dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa yi// bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal// rin po che yi mthu bzhin du// bka' drin rjes su gnang ba yis// sa
395b3(rgyud): ni byon par mdzad du gsol// lan gsum par du gsol bar bya// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// sdom gzung gsol zhing srang ba dang // slob dpon rdo rje can dmigs la// gang yang gsang sngags
395b4(rgyud): lha kun dang // 'jig rten skyong ba ma lus pa// rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs dang // sangs rgyas bstan dga'i 'byung podra// gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan rnams// rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khro
395b5(rgyud): mchog/ dang bdag 'dri bar 'gyur ba la// bdag dang skal lnga na slob ma la// byin gyis brlab phyir srung bar mdzod// srad bu ye shes lnga yi dngos// re re'ang rigs lnga rnam dag ste/ 
395b6(rgyud): chos kun ngo bo nyid med pas// phan tshun sngags bzlas bsgril bar bya// dkyus su 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur la// sboms su sgo yi bcu gnyis tshad// hUM brjod bdud rtsi lngas byugs la// dzaM dza'i bzlas
395b7(rgyud): brjod lte bar gzung // slar yang de bzhin ye shes kyi// thig chen na mkhar gdab par bya// de bzhin cha ldan gnyis pa yis// gtsang zhing rdo rje 'dzin bsams te// tshangs pa'i thig chen gdab par bya// gnyis pa/ 
395b8(rgyud): zur thig la sogs pa// nub dang lhor ni slob dpon la// byang shar slob ma'i gnas sa te// g.yas kyis bskor ba ma gtogs pa// g.yon du nam yang ma yin no// de ltar cha yis rnam par dbye// thig skud chad
396a1(rgyud): na bla ma 'chi/ dman dang lhag pas nad du 'gyur// phyogs 'khrul na ni slob ma rmongs// de bas mkhas pas skyon med pa// rin chen lnga 'am 'bru yi phyed// yang na 'byung khungs las byung ba
396a2(rgyud): yig bcu yis byin rlabs te// rigs lnga rnam par dag pa las// dkar ser dmar ljang nag po nang // dbang ldan phyogs nas bri bar bya// gal te tshon rtsi mi mnyam zhing // yo dang dma' bar gyur na ni// dngos
396a3(rgyud): grub med cing rtsod la gdung // sbom pas nad 'byung phra bas ni// nor nyams gal te chad pas ni// 'chi 'gyur g.yas bskor ma bris na// phur bus btab pa yin zhes bya// shar phyogs dkar la lho nub bya/ 
396a4(rgyud): ser dmar ljang kur bri bar bya// dbus ni bai DUR+Ya lta bu// pad+ma phyogs kyi rnam pa ste// mtshams ni mdzes tshon bum pas rgya na// sgo la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams dang // dur khrod ra ba'i nang du bri
396a5(rgyud): gtum dag la sogs phyogs mtshams dgod// dbus mtho sha ra dang byang gzhol zhing // mtho zhing ma 'dres dang bar bri// de na sa rdo rje 'dzin dmigs la// gus pas me tog dang bcas nas
396a6(rgyud): gsol ba 'di ltar gdab par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol// byang chub sems mchog bdag la
396a7(rgyud): gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i gong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod// ces pa lan gsum par du bya// 
396a8(rgyud): bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga mchog/ khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje mi phyed mthu yis ni// mnyam med pa yi ye shes 'thob// de bas kun
396b1(rgyud): mkhyen thob 'dod pas// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ bla ma sangs rgyas kun mchod cing // rtsa ba yan lag nyes pa spong // ma grol 'khor ba'i sems can la// snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas// bsgral zhing
396b2(rgyud): grol ba'i lam la dgod// bde bar dbugs ni dbyung bar bya// de dag rim dang rim min pa// slob ma'i rim par rnam par brtag/ khrus bya so shing sbyin par bya// phrin las phyogs dang dngos grub kyi// rim pa rnam
396b3(rgyud): bar brtag par bya// srung skud gdags dang ku sha sbyin// rmi lam btags la ngan pa na// zhi ba'i me yis bzlog par bya// gdong g.yogs bcings la ye shes dbab// dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug pa'i
396b4(rgyud): phyir/ sngon bsags sdig pa ma lus las// dkyil 'khor ma thong ba tsam gyis 'byung // bu khyod su yin ci dga' ba/ dag ni skal bzang rigs yin pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa khyed la dag
396b5(rgyud): mig dbye dkyil 'khor lha yang bstan// dam tshig chu sbyin ma na' yang bsgag/ me tog dor la lha ngo bstan// gang dang gang du bab gyur pa'i// rigs kyis de la spro bar bya// chu dang cod
396b6(rgyud): ban rdo rje // dril bu ming gi dbang bskur te// rigs lnga'i bdag nyid ye shes lnga// brtul zhugs lung bstan rjes gnang sbyin// dbugs dbyung rdo rje slob dpon sgrub// gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang / 
396b7(rgyud): bzhi pa brjod med dbang bskur ba// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// mchog tu rab zhugs mthong bas na// deng khyod sdig pa ma lus las// rnam grol rigs su skyes pas na// sangs rgyas
396b8(rgyud): kun dang mnyam gsungs pa'i// rjes su gnang bas dbugs phyin 'gyur// dngos grub rgyu yi dam tshig ni// bu yis rtag tu srung bar gyis// slob mas bla ma la gtud nas// gtso bos ji ltar bka'
397a1(rgyud): stsal pa/ de ltar bdag gis sgrub par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ltar// rgyan dang na bza' rin chen dang // rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang // rang gi lus kyang bla ma la// bsnye
397a2(rgyud): bkur tshim pa med par bya// deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod// bdag ni gson pa 'bras bu che// di ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes// sangs rgyas sras su bdag gyur pas// sems can don ni mnyam med
397a3(rgyud): bya// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dngos grub grogs// tshogs kyi 'khor lo dge 'dun mchod// nad pa 'am mgon med phongs pa kun// kha zas kyis ni tshim par bya// zhing skyong gtor mas mnyes byas la// rang
397a4(rgyud): 'dod 'bras bu gsol ba gdab// rjes su dam tshig spyod pa dang // bskyed pa la sogs rgyun mi 'chad// rnal 'byor pas ni bsam par bya// 'di ni rigs mchog dbang bskur bla na med// mdzes
397a5(rgyud): ma khyod la skal ldan sgrub phyir bstan// gzhan du rigs med dug la de yis slar zhing gnod// de phyir 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje'i rnam par bkod pa yin// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjegs
397a6(rgyud): ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bci
397a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor klu sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma
