397b1(rgyud): dag sgrub par 'dod pas ni// mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam lngas byug// pad+ma lha rnam sgo dang bcas// sgo rgyan ltos 'gros rab tu mdzes// lte bar rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam// mdun du las kyi bka' nyan bskyed
397b2(rgyud): pad+ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad// gdengs ka bdun ldan thal sbyar bsam// lha rnam rigs bzhi'i sa bdag ste// sgo dang gru chad rigs kyi rim// mchod rjes klu si rtsi sman pasam// de rjes rdo rje 'dzin bsams / 
397b3(rgyud): klu chen gnas nas spyan drangs te// e h+ye hi na ga rA dzes pa ri wA ra sa ma ya dzaHdzaHrang rang stan la bzhugs par bya// pad+ma'i lte bar chu bdag dang // dam tshig sog med dkar dang ser// thal sbyar sbrul gyis
397b4(rgyud): zhabs su 'khyil// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang la 'dud// shar phyog/ sa mtha' yas sngon po ste// lho phyogs nor rgyas ser po na// nub phyogs 'jog po kha dog dmar// byang phyogs stobs rgyu
397b5(rgyud): nag po ste// shar lhor pad+ma dung dang 'dra// lho nub pad chen ser ba ste// nub byang dung skyong rtsod dang 'dra// byang shar rigs ldan dur ba'i dog/ mjug ma 'khyil bas gtso la 'dud
397b6(rgyud): sna tshogs gzugs ni rigs bzhi dang // sa bdag sna tshogs gzugs kyis bskor// de dag sngags kyi rim pa ni// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra pA Ni hr-i da yaM/ nA ga ya sa mA ti kra ma tha/ ud sA da na
397b7(rgyud): b+ha bi Sh+ya ti swA hA/ rdo rje 'chang gis klu dam tshig la bzhag pa'o// oM ba ru Na ya hUM phu swA hA/ oM s+phu Ta s+phu Ta ma hA nA ga ra dzA kro d+ha hUM/ sid+d+hi sid+d+hi s+pho Ta ya hUM phu swA hA/ oM a nan ta hUM phu swA hA/ oM bA su kaM hU~M phu
397b8(rgyud): swA hA/ oM takle ke hUM phu swA hA/ oM kar ko Ta hUM pu swA hA/ oM pad+ma hUM phu swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+ma hUM phu swA hA/ oM shaM kha bA la hUM phu swA hA/ oM ku li ka hAM phu swA hA/ 'di dag klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi sngagaso// rim pas mchod cing
398a1(rgyud): gsob bya// mdzes pa'i rgya mtsho'i gtor ma yis// klu rnams tshim pas gdug sems ni// de rjes bstod pa brjod par bya// chubadag sprul pa'i dam tshig can// mtha' yas nor rgyan
398a2(rgyud): la sogs klu dbang rnams// rgya mtsho chu gter zab pa'i 'jing chen gnas// rin chen sna tshogs yid 'ong spras pa yin// gzhal yas 'byor pa phun sum gnas na bzhugs// sbrul mgo'i gdengs kar
398a3(rgyud): 'bar rin chen gsal// yid 'ong nor bu 'dod pa kun sgrub pa// rang gzhan phun tshogs don rnams ster ba'i dpal// 'od 'bar sa 'og mun pa ma lus sel// du ma'i bskal par yon tan sbyangs pa yis// klu
398a4(rgyud): rgyal 'byor pa mchog la mnga' brnyes pa// bsam gyis mi khya dab rdzu 'phrul mchog brnyes pa'i// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab khyed la bstod// sangs rgyas bka' thob dad pa'i stobs
398a5(rgyud): 'phel ba sangs rgyas sar gnas sgrub la nan tan byed// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pas gzhan don mdzad// bdag gan na don sgrub khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// bde gshegs spyan sngar khas
398a6(rgyud): blangs dam bcas te// bstan pa srung zhing 'gro rnams bskyang ba'i phyir// khas blangs mna' phul dam tshig dran gyis la// phrin las don gyis bdag gzhan don sgrub mdzod// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams la/ 
398a7(rgyud): oM/ mtha' yas dang ni 'jog po dang // stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang // nor rgyas bu dang drang skyong dang // pad+ma dang ni chu lnga dang // rgya mtsho rgya mtsho chen po dang // dpal gyi 'od dang 'od po che// gzugs che lto 'phye/ 
398a8(rgyud): sbrul chen po// klu chen 'khor dang bcas pa la// 'thun pa'i dam rdzas yid 'ong ba// dkar gsum mngar gsum gso bo'i sman// rin chen dar dang za 'og dang // dpag bsam shing dang 'dod 'jo'i ba// sna / 
398b1(rgyud): khyed la phul ba yi// klu yi nad rnams med par mdzod// phyis kyang mi byed dam chos la// so so'i gnas su 'gro bar gyis// 'di ni rdo rje 'chang gi bka'// 'di las 'das na klu rgyal rnams// snying 'tshig
398b2(rgyud): mgo bo 'gas 'gyur te// lus la bskal pa'i me 'bar nas// sdug bsngal gyur nam legs pas// dam las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ na ga ra dza sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na badz+ra pA Ni hUM phaT
398b3(rgyud): klu rnams dam tshig sgrub pa'o// de bzhin byas na klu nad rnams// skad cig nyid la byang 'gyur te// sgrub po bde bar 'gyur ba yin// de bas 'di la brtson par gyis// mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa bzhin// 
398b4(rgyud): gtan la phab pas rab tu bshad// bcom ldan 'das phyag narje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las kluHdab pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 
398b5(rgyud): dpa' bo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'am gi 'khor klu gdug pa can rnams kyi nad 'byung ba'i rtags ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes
398b6(rgyud): ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis lags par rton// klu la rigs drug la sogs pa// sna tshogs rigs su yod gyur kyang // 
398b7(rgyud): 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin te// nor rgyas dung skyong rgyal rigs yin te mthong ba'i dug/ ser po sa la dbang ste lci 'thibs lus po spro// sha babs rab bzhi la khyad par na ba yin// bco lnga nyin gung rgyu bar
398b8(rgyud): dus lan// nad kyi gnas ni spyi bo rings par 'bab// rlung rtsa babs la sha rus bar du ni// skra 'byi blang thabs na sterna ba blo ba la// 'brel pas sha ro glo lu yin// dga' bo rigs ldan bram ze yin te bsems na
399a1(rgyud): / dug/ dmar po me la dbang ste tsha zhing gdung // lus dmar spyi chung thang la mig rtsa lus po skam// 'bring po babs sa nyi nub dgongs mon// gnam stong bco lnga rgyu ba'i dus te de la na// snying
399a2(rgyud): khar babs pas snying mi dga' zhing dran pa nyams// mjug tu mgo dang lus la bab ten che che// sha ro snying la 'ongs pas lce yis ro mi tsher// pad+ma 'jog pa rje rigs yin te kha rlangs dug/ dkar po chu la dang
399a3(rgyud): bas drang zhing bsil bar na// lus mdog dkar la lpags pa'i spris ma 'chags// tha chungs babs pa yin te tshes brgyad bco brgyad na// snga dro tho rangs mi bad ske dang dpung pa g.yas// brang na tha ma mchin
399a4(rgyud): ba babs pa'i sa yin no// pho bas zas mi 'ju zhing mig gis ga/ zugs mi 'dzin// sha sbrul tshor ba med de cung zad sha lpags dam// pad chen stobs rgyu dmangs rigs rig pa'i dug/ nag po
399a5(rgyud): rlung la dbang bas yang zhing g.yo// lus 'dar sems rgod sha 'pha ra phu shus 'debs// yan lag tshigs bzhin zhing phol dang ba da kan skye// sgregs dang ro stod na zhing sna khrag 'byung // 'byang zhing
399a6(rgyud): lus ngal dgongs dang srod la na// tha chungs zhag la 'bab ste tshes sum cu gsum ni// 'di ni 'gong rigs rtsub pas spro 'bogs pa tsan thabs gsod// tha ma 'khal mar bab ste rna bas sgra mi thos// khu chu nyam
399a7(rgyud): pas chu sri sor mo phra// chu lha dam tshig na mkha' yin pas kun la khyab// gong ma rigs 'byung zhing dus med shes pa zhum// lus kyi shed nyams bral te sna tshogs ston// 'di ni bcos par dka' ste gtan la bcwa
399a8(rgyud): par bya// khyad par mcher ba na zhing gdong la sme ba 'byung // lus la shig mang bko dri ro gzhob gnam// thur sel rlung la rul ba'i dri ma bro// 'di ni mcher bar 'bab ste tshul khrag kyang 'byung // so so'i rtags su
399b1(rgyud): mkhas pas shes par gyis// spyir na lnga po gang shugs kyang // rim pas 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// me dang drog po phugs rdugs dang // ri dug dog pa'i sgo dang dong // lha khang 'angam rngub mi sdug gzugs// 
399b2(rgyud): dud 'gro'i tshigs dang mtsho ri gzar// snying mi dga' zhing 'tshig pa ni// dang po 'byung bar shes par bya// glu len nub mon dang shes pa lci// yan lag mi bde shu pa g.yan pa dang // bas ldogs 'brum chung dmar sib
399b3(rgyud): 'o 'khrug cing za 'a khrug sha mdog nyams// me ris chu grang glugs ltar grang // grang sib cha thig sha bkra che chung byed// sha 'phrig bem dang sbrid cing 'khol// mig zlum tsha shing smin ma 'byi// lag sor/ 
399b4(rgyud): sen mo nyams pas phra// lus la dring chu bur dang // nya skangs gnag chu rul dri gnam// stong gzer spang du 'khru bar byed// phyi yi sha skams mdog nyams dri ma bral// bug pa'i sgo yo bdu
399b5(rgyud): dus meng pa// yang cig mdor bsdus bshad pa ni// dbang po ga/ sal ba'i 'bras bu ni// mchin pa'i sgo yin mig la brtag/ rgya la mo 'khor lo g.yang ra yin// gnas pa rus pa'i 'bras bu ni// 
399b6(rgyud): mdzes pa so yi mkhar yin pas// kha dog rkang bu nus pa blta// nus pa chu ba'i 'bras bu ni// zangs mdog sen mo'i tshogs yin pas// skye lugs kha dog rtsa ba brtag/ mdangs dang sha yi 'bras bu ni// khyab pa drag pa yi
399b7(rgyud): pas na// chags lugs kha dog 'gyur ba blta// dod rten khrag gi 'bras bu ni// bud med gsang sgo'i chu yin pas// kha dog ku ya gzugs la brtag/ rkang mar bcud kyi 'bras bu ni// rtsa ba gnas lugs skyes
399b8(rgyud): brtag/ de rnams thams cad rtags ldan na// ngas kyang gso bar ga la nus// gsum bzhi lnga la sogs pa yi// rim pa rnams dang ldan pa na// sngags dang sman gyis gso bar bya// phyi nang 'brel pa'i babs sa
400a1(rgyud): yis/ 'alegs par brtags te gso bar bya// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las klu'i nad zhugs pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// 
400a2(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bdems gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi klu nad gso ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhes pa legs// zag med bde ba
400a3(rgyud): rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// byol song klu yis zin pa la// 'tsho dang mi 'tsho gnyis yin te// nges pa'i rtags chen drug tshang na// de la mkhas pas
400a4(rgyud): byar yod// rnam smin las las byung ba yin// gzhan rnams ga/ so bar 'dod pa la// dka' dang sla ba gnyis yi ni// dang po snga gas kyi rim pa yin// gnyis pa rdzas dang 'brel pa yin// dang po
400a5(rgyud): sngags kyi sbyor ba ni// dbang bskur tshogs gsag rgyud sbyangs la// rig pa gsum gyis bsnyen pa bya// kha cig de tsam gyis kyang zhi// gal te nus pa che ba na// bsad pa drag po'i sham bu gdag
400a6(rgyud): kha cig de yis 'tsho ba yin// gal te gnod chabs che ba na// klu yi rang gshed bzlas pa tsam// na mkha'i klu yis snying nas gzir// rig pa gnyis pa gsham du sprul// rdo rje lte bar 'khor lo bri// de la dmig
400a7(rgyud): te bsgrub par bya// dug rigs gsal bar gyur na ni// sa dag ngos zin rdo rje'i nang // dga' bo rigs ldan me yi sngags// bram ze'i 'khrul 'khor shis pa yin// ma la chu yi 'khrul 'khor te// da yi sngags
400a8(rgyud): kyis bsad par bya// pad chen stobs rgyu rlung yin pas// saM yi 'khrul 'khor lte bar bca'// pad+ma 'jog po chu yin pas// rlung gi 'khor los bsad par bya// rang rang kha dog gshed du sbyar// bzhi snying sngags rnam
400b1(rgyud): dril la bzlas// gnyen po mi mthun rdzas dang sbyar// gnyen po gang yin lha yi gshed// man ngag bzhin du shes par bya// 'khrul 'khor chad nas ma bden// rgyal po'i sdong zla dbye bar bya// dus chod zhag
400b2(rgyud): grangs rim pa ni// rtags dang sbyar la shes par bya// rtags rjes rjes su log pa na// sbyin sreg ci rigs mkhas pas bya// phyi rjes drag pos bcad pa dang // lha dang rdzas kyis gags kyis bcad// mnan pas rba
400b3(rgyud): mtha' brtul bar bya// ni bdag po'i rim pa ni// mkhas pas brtags la brten par bya// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las klu'i nad bsal ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// 
400b4(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang gi gtor ma bya ba'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung
400b5(rgyud): ma/ bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// dkyil 'khor bri dang sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa thun mtshams rab gnas dang // dbang bskur bskad ci
400b6(rgyud): bsad pa dang // 'byung po khyung dang gnod sbyin dang // klu dang gnas skyong mchod pa na// gtor ma med par gang spyad pa// las de 'bras bu med pa 'am// bar chad nye bar skye 'gyur bas// gtor ma'i cho ga bstan par bya/ 
400b7(rgyud): min la 'byom ldan pa yis// phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byor ba bsog/ gtor ma'i 'og tu rlung lha mi// so bon las skyes kha dog s+ho// gso ba'i rlung yab dang bcas pa// dastengs rgod ma'i khabs mas te/ 
400b8(rgyud): dmar po chung mas skyes pabasas// grugasum du las rdo rnga gsus// sku gsung thugs kyis brtan por bya// de ste sa alas brjen/ yangs la dag shing srung ba dmar// chos dbus snod kyi/ 
401a1(rgyud): gzhal yas yin// de nas sbyang ba'i sa bon las// buM oM dz+r-IM khaM hUM bsam// slar yang sha lnga sbyangs pa las// ma la ba ta ba bsams te// yum lnga'i ye shes rnam par dag/ bdud rtsi ye shes
401a2(rgyud): rnam dag 'di// sbyang dang spar rtogs sbyor ba yi// yi ge gsum gyi sgra ldan pa// bde ba'i ri chor nyi mar gsal// 'char ba'i kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje las byung dngul chu'i mdog/ gnyis med thabs dang
401a3(rgyud): rab yin// sa bon las byung bad+ma'i gdan// yangs par rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // phyogs skyong la sogs bkug la bstis// mdzub mdud gung mo rtse mo sbyor// mthe bong rdo rje brtan par gnas// rang 'dod dngos grub
401a4(rgyud): sar bzhag la// hUM sgra ldan pas sngags 'dis sbyin// oM ai dan+da/ sa ma dza la/ dzak+Sha b+hud ba hAM/ bA u/ rak+Sha/ tsan+da sA dza/ dmA da bap+pa/ ta la bA tA li/ aT+Ta sap+pa swA hA/ i da ba liM b+h+r-i dza dzaM gI pulA/ 
401a5(rgyud): dA pa/ mAM si baM ga/ am+b+ha kaSh+TaM/ sarba sA d+ha khiN+Da khu Ni phe Da gad swa hA/ oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+har+m+ma NaM/ A d+ya nuta bi na twata oM AHhUM phaT swAhA// 'khor rnams rtogs par bya ba'o// 
401a6(rgyud): lhag par khyud chen mchod pa na// nya sha b+heng gi la du dang // 'o ma sbrul gyi sha yis mchod// gnod sbyin dag li sha rlon dang // chang ni med du mi rung ngo // ra khrig shing thogs rnams kyiso// klu la dkar gsuM
401a7(rgyud): mngar gsum dang // rtsi sman dar zab sna tshogs mchod// rang gi rig pa phul byas la// bstod cing gsol ba gang yin bya// hUM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su 'thun pa'i dngos grub stsal// 
401a8(rgyud): rang gi gnas su gshegs nas kyang // slar yang spyan dngas tshen spyon// oM badz+ra sa ma ya muHzhes brjod// mchod sbyin 'di dang me bral na// ni sogs grub pa brgyad gang yin// mchog gi 'bras bu thob par
401b1(rgyud): 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rdzogasang pa mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba las gtor ma chog bstan pa'i le'u skye bco lnga pa'o// dpa' ma rdo ba de bas gsol/ 
401b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang gi zhu ba gsol ba bdag gi cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi ma/ 
401b3(rgyud): khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i ma// rdo rje bde chen stong pa nyid// khyod kyis sgrub pa bzang po ni// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad// da ltar byung ba
401b4(rgyud): de 'chad de// ma 'ongs rnams kyang 'chad 'gyur la// nga yis kyang ni 'dir bshad de// byang chub sems ldan gang zag gis/ rab dben pa yis yi char// mchod cing bstan dga' bsnyen pa
401b5(rgyud): byas// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod pa// rim pas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sgom// oM swa b+hA ba~M shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+hA haM/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa sgom// oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA
401b6(rgyud): ba At+ma ko haM/ brjod med ye shes dog par sgom// srung zhing gzhal yas khang pa der// mdzes pa'i pad+ma la gnas pa// chos 'byung rnam dag pho brang du// nyi ma zla ba rnam dag dpal// baM las byung po'i lha mo ni// sku
401b7(rgyud): mdog dmar ljang zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis gri grag thod pa 'dzin// gar thabs rgyan gyis mdzes ma ste// thod pa skam po'i phreng bas rgyan// shar du mA ma ki bsam ste// sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma
401b8(rgyud): g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon thod pa// g.yas su sangs rgyas spyan ser te// zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas pa na// rin chen g.yon bzod pa 'dzin// g.yon du dam tshig sgrol ma ldang // g.yas pa ut+pal thod pa
402a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa rgyab du gos dkar dmar ser te// pad+ma mthong ba bsnams pa'i phyag/ kun kyang khro zhing gar thabs bzhugs// rus pa rin chen rgyan dang ldan// mchog sgrub nad rnams sbyang ba dang // 
402a2(rgyud): srung zhing 'dod bzhi rgyas dang // rang gi srog 'dzin phrin las dbang // rtag tu ye shes pa yang mchod// rig pa nges par bstan pa ni// oM badz+re su bu d+d+ha sar+b+ba ba shi ku ru su ra ka hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shaM ka re na/ 
402a3(rgyud): ti ka re/ g+hu Ta g+hu Ta/ ti ni g+hA ta ya/ g+hu Ti ni swAhA/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ oM a ka Ta bi ka Te ni ka Ta/ ka Ti ka Te ka ro TaM bIr+ya swAhA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re ma ma A
402a4(rgyud): yu She swA hA/ rang rang las dang 'brel pa ni// 'bum 'gyur sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur// las gzhan dngos grub ma sgrubs par // lha mo khyod kyis byed pa yin// 'di ni gseng ba dam pa ste/ 
402a5(rgyud): ches gsang bas kyang mchog yin no// de bas mdzes ma khyod la bsha da// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bsta na pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las yum sgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i la'u
402a6(rgyud): ste bcu drug pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi las sna tshogs pa sgrub pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod
402a7(rgyud): kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// sgrub po phun sum tshogs 'dod pas// nga nyid thog mar mnyes bya ste/ 
402a8(rgyud): 'dod pa'i rdzas la 'khor lo bri// de yi nang du chud pa yi// longs spyod ming dang spel bris nas// bkug la bcug la sngags 'di bzlas// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa la pra tsa la/ la lA lu te mA/ 
402b1(rgyud): bka ma hA kA la/ a na sa ras bi si swA hA/ khri bzlas pas rang ci 'dod pa 'ong bar 'gyur te// gong bu dgug pa'o// rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin pasams la// ta la'i lom la ri rab kyi 'khor lo byas te// bur du phyu
402b2(rgyud): tri'i bar de bsgrub bya'i ming bri'o// lte ba sngags bri/ rtsibs la yang sngags bris te/ rkang pa g.yon pos mnan cing / oM tsir+Na ma hA rol Na sa muN+Di d+hum ke shi hri/ han ha na/ hri/ bcab tsa hI/ di ba
402b3(rgyud): che ge mo me bi shau ra swA hA/ zhes khri bzlas pas rkang pa dgug pa'o// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro/ dacag ga a rigag pi ta ri swAhA/ sngags 'di bzlas la kha bkrus la/ khyu mchog gi lAM ba dang ldong ros bsres pa / 
402b4(rgyud): rje'i gzugs byas te/ lte bar 'khrul 'khor bcug la dag skor sbas na 'chi bar 'gyuraro// bklags pas 'grub 'gyuranus pa 'di/ rdo rje 'dzin par rab zhugs nas/ rdza mkhan la/ 
402b5(rgyud): pa'i 'dag pa la/ rdo rje'i rnam par 'khrul 'khor bca'/ oM \u0f7f/ ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo mu kha ti thA ti sa/ g+ha san taM/  ti/ laM gAM la~M g+haM/ mu tra mu ri/ She Ni che ge mo ban+d+ha mi swAtwA/ 
402b6(rgyud): sngags 'di khri bzlas khang par mnan/ nges par shags las rgyal bar 'gyur/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na na ma ni kha ba rA ya/ tsi ri tsi ri/ ka ta ru tu ba na mu Shi/ ti ta bad+ma si ri kha li swA hA/ rdo rje la ni
402b7(rgyud): khrag gis bri// gang gi phyogs mtshams sbas pa na// byi ba kha ni 'ching ba yin/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na na tu na te/ si ri si ri/ khi li khi li swA hA/ stag gi lpags pa la bris te gang la btags pa'i spyang gi srung
402b8(rgyud): oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma rak+Sha to// na sha ka ra sa swA hA/ shing thog la bzlas ra bar sbas/ spre'u gnod pa bzlog par 'gyur/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sar+b+ba staM b+ha ya dI b+he swA hA/ sbrang rtsi bu ram khu ba la/ 'od bzlas/ 
403a1(rgyud): / blugs pas dos 'bros so// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na bA rA hA d+hi na drA drA d+ye swA hA/ drug dang lan tshwa ska tshe dang // yungs kar la phugs bon dang // dngur dang gal bi dang // ma he phagadang lce spyang khrag
403a2(rgyud): spras la rdo rje brgyad byas la// phyogs mtshams spras na gnod pa zhi// mtshams bcad y-i dam pa yin// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na b+hi ng+ga hi ni kaM b+he swAhA/ sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// srung ba 'dis
403a3(rgyud): mtshams bcad yin// oM bau ti bi ne hri b+h+r-i bi Ta bi Ta hUM dz+dza swA hA/ sngags 'di gang yin lci ba la// bzlas te ma he 'thung ba'i chu// nad bcug zho rnams brlag par 'gyur// gser me la ma reg pa/ g.yu
403a4(rgyud): mig ma phug pa/ mu tig/ mu men/ gser gyi bris be'i khram/ ba bla/ mu zi/ ba tsan dug/ gu gul/ gi bang spre'u'i spus patums la/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ga ru Da tsa le ba dud tra mA
403a5(rgyud): ra ya/ badz+ra b+ha ti ga ru Da be ga hA ri dza pri dza nA ga rA dza mA ra ya hUM/ phaT/ sngags khri bzlas te lus la bcangs na klu thams cad 'gros par 'gyuraro// oM pad+ma k+Sha pad+ma k+Sha ba ru Ne hU~M phaT sa
403a6(rgyud): chu ga tsang ma la bzlas te mig bkrus na mig na de thams cad 'byung bar 'gyu ro// sug smel dang / dza ti dang / nA ga ge sar dang / a sho ta ka'i 'bras bu rnams la sngags 'di bzlas te dpral bar shu kA sa/ 
403a7(rgyud): thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyuraro// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na dzaM b+he ha hri swA hA/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// byis pa gsar ba tsas srung ba na// kham por nang du rdo rgyas kyis// rdo rje rgya gam lta ba'i
403a8(rgyud): nang // oM badz+ra tsiN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha sA hA/ hUM ba tsu bris te lha bstims le// mchod sbyin gtor ma sbyin byas te// de yi steng du sbyang bar bya// lus la gur gum chus bris pa'i// 'khor log nyi/ 
403b1(rgyud): pas bsrung bar bya// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ba sa ha do lA yI swA hA/ me do yA sA ba tsin mo ha li swA hA/ e sa ba dzi hA yi na ma ta yi swA hA/ sngags 'di me tog dang gos dang // zas dang rgyan la mngon
403b2(rgyud): par bsngags te byin na dbang du 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro She Na na ma sa ra na mA/ tad+ya thA/ d+hi ra ma hA d+ha d+ha d+ha Te du Te de swA hA/ bye ma dang thal chen la bsngags te zhing la gtor na srog chags kyi
403b3(rgyud): za bar mi 'gyuraro// oM badz+ra su khaM de bi shud+d+ha al+li ba ba ra tsu la tse ra sa ga gan+d+ha sA ba mi ha ban+d+ha li swA hA/ sngags 'di rdo rje'i shing dang / da lis dang / arga gsum la lan bdun bdun bzlas te/ rna ba'i 'og
403b4(rgyud): tu bcug na sngar thams cad kyis gnod par bya bar mi nus so// da mi rus la byas pur bu ni// bgegs kyi lus can zhal ga/ cig pa// phyag bzhi tho ba zhags pa dang // dag ste rtse gsum
403b5(rgyud): bsnams pa ste// dug khrag lan tshwa ske tsha dang // rgya tshwa mar naganang da ba co// stobs chen sngags bris ras mas btums// khyim sgor sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA bal
403b6(rgyud): ha na da ha ba tsa/ bid+hi na sa ya ud sA da ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i thod par khyi smon pa'i lce la dga'i ling gi bris te rta'i dag pa'i 'og tu bcug la sngags 'di bzlas nas gang gi
403b7(rgyud): sgor sbas na bskrad pa'am spro bar 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo mup+ta ya phaT ces khri bzlas so// shing li dang rtag pa la rdo rje'i rnam par byas la lte bar las kyi reg pa bcug
403b8(rgyud): dpa' bo g.yul du shi ba'i sgo'i the gus rked par btags la kled la bskor na bgegs 'bros par 'gyur ro// gro ga'i 'dab ma la rdo rje'i nang du chud pa'i lte bar sku gsung thugs kyi sngags dang
404a1(rgyud): bsrung bya bri// de'i mtha' mar rab 'byam bri// de'i nye bar bstan pa'i 'khor gyi sngags bri// de'i mtha' mar shes rab kyi sngags bri// de'i mtha' mar me'i tshogs bris te dril la lus
404a2(rgyud): la bcangs na gdon thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do// byi khung shar bltas sa dang ni// 'ug chung rus pa lang ka'i rwa// sgo lcags khung bur blugs byas te// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na kA ra ti san
404a3(rgyud): karti chums dang phuT phuT swA hA/ sngags de brgya dang brgyad bzlas na// smug mas yang yang daklog pa ni// sgo lcags 'bye bar the tshom med// dur khrod sol bas bsregs pas ni// slar yang snga ma dag
404a4(rgyud): tu 'gyur// rgya gram nang du chud pa yi// dmag gi gtso bo bri bya ste/ sngags dang spel nas snying kha ru// seng ljang phur pa btab pa ni// nges par de nyid rengs par 'gyur// byi ba nag po'i rtug pa dang / 
404a5(rgyud): sha tsan ra yi rA dang ni// khyi nag spu dag bsregs gyur na// 'o/ khru yi rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// de sogs las kyi ri/ ma pa ni// bsam gyis mi khyab ji snyed pa// khyod la bstan par
404a6(rgyud): mi nus pas// sngags grub de yis rtogs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// 
404a7(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi char dbab pa'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhes pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung
404a8(rgyud): mabadag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// chu bdag gnas pa'i sa yi char// dkyil 'khor pad+ma brgyad pa la// sgo dang rta babs sbrul gyis brgyan// ma
404b1(rgyud): tog mchod pas mnyes bya ba// bram ze'i thod pa gtsang ma gnyis// chu bdag dam tshig klu yi gzugs// gur gum bzang pos bri bar bya// kha sbyar bar du rdo rje 'dzin// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgya
404b2(rgyud): ba/ bai DUR+Ya ltar gnas pa ni// chu dar yang na ras la bri// rtsa ba khro bo g.yas g.yon rgyab// dkar dmar de bzhini ldeng ku ste// rtsa ba khyud chen zil gyis gnon// g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa ltar/ 
404b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang // lcags kyu rigs ldan pad+ma dang // pad chen drang skyong yum dang bcas// g.yon pa dril bu rtse gsum dang // phur bu smin gyi zhags pa ste// mtha' yas nor rgyas 'jog
404b4(rgyud): po dang / stobs rgyu yum gyis bcings pa ni// thams cad gtso la thal sbyar te// sbrul mgo sprin chen bzhin du ga datibs// 'dam mar klu chen brgyad bskyed la// spyan drangs
404b5(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas kyang // char gyi rgyun chen 'bab pa rabs/ ma// klu chen rtsa ba'i sngags rnams la// b+ha ri sha ya bta/ sa te bzlas// nges par char rgyun 'bab par 'gyur// gal te/ 
404b6(rgyud): 'bab pa ram gyur na// gu gul dud pas gzir byas nas// phrin las sngags kyis srog kyang g.yo// gal te ma bab na rdo rje 'dzin pa phyung la tsha ba'i mar nag gis blugs la sngags bzlas na 'bab par
404b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yang na kham phor la sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i khrag dang shas sngar ltar byas la skyer ba'i sol ba'i me la sngar ltar bsro bar bya ste/ des nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro// yang na gtum
404b8(rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu la// sngags kyis btab te klu yi khyim// sbyin sreg byas pas 'bab par 'gyur// des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na// yungs kar skye tshe sbrang rgod dang // bra ma'i me tog phye mar byas
405a1(rgyud): ra yi 'o mas ril bu sbyar// sngags bzlas mtsho'am chu mig tu// brgya dang brgyad du bskur na 'bab// des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na// rta ru'i khu bas ril bu byas// mtsho
405a2(rgyud): bsgyur ngas par 'bab pa yin// gal te des kyang ma 'bab pa na// pad+ma ut+pal sngon po dang // yungs kar zangs phye ba bla dang // dbang po lag pa rgya skyegs shing // bu ram ra yi 'o mas bsdus// rgya shug
405a3(rgyud): 'bru tsam ril bu la// lan bdun bsngags te mtshor bsgyur na// char rgyun mtshungs par med par 'bab// mi 'bebs klu rnams mgogs te// lus ni bskams te 'tshigs par 'gyur// nga yi bka'
405a4(rgyud): las gang 'da' ba// skad cig nyid la brlag par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud da kyi rgyal po las char dbab pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// 
405a5(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bdems gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'astsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag
405a6(rgyud): med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// thab dang rdzas dang lha dang ni// sngags kyi rim pa phan yon rnams// rim pas mdzes ma khyod la brtan
405a7(rgyud): sbyang ba'i las ni sngon 'gro bas// sor ni nyi shu brgyad pa dang // bcu drug bcu bzhi bcu gnyis dang // bcu dang brgyad las chung ba spang // rim bzhin nad rnams zhi zhing nor 'phel dang // rims rnams ni
405a8(rgyud): zhing shing las 'grub// dbang du bsdu dang rgyas pa dang // gsod pa'i thabs su shes par bya// zur brko sum gnyis kha khyer brgyad cha mtho// rim bzhin phyed byed rdo rjes mtshan// dkar ser dmar nag ljang gu ste
405b1(rgyud): las dang 'brel par shes par bya// mchod pa'i rdzas dang yam shing dang // dur ba la sogs sregs pa'i rdzas// g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pa yin// rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bskyed// rgyas la dga' dang
405b2(rgyud): zhi la ni/ dbang la chags pa khro la bsad// gzhan rtsub bskrad pa la sogs yin// dmar ba me phyogs gdung ba'i las// bskrad pa rlung ste mnan pa ni// 'den bral dbang dang dgug pa yang // lho yi
405b3(rgyud): phyogs su blta ba yin// bsad dang dbye ba'ang de bzhin te// shar zhi byang phyogs rgyas pa yin// hUM las bskyed pa kha dog dmar// mdzes pa'i zhal gdangs cung zad gnag/ dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs
405b4(rgyud): dang / bgrang phreng g.yon dang g.yas su bsam// ral pa'i cod pa/ na gsus pa che// rgyan dang ldan pa bsams la bstim/ da bsang gtong thor 'thung mchod yon dang // zhabs bsil la
405b5(rgyud): sogs dbul bar bya// me tog la sogs rim pa ste// gzar bu ga nyis kyi dgang blugs dbul// oM ag+na ye swA hA/ de rjes me yi mtshan ma brtag/ mdog dang sgra dang dri dang ro// dbyibs
405b6(rgyud): dang kha dog blta bar bya// me ni rtse gcig 'bar gyur na// bsam pa thams cad 'grub par ston// gnyis 'bar rtse gsum mi g.yon// 'bar ba'i 'bras bu thams cad 'dzin// rtse bzhi mnyam nyid brtan
405b7(rgyud): ba ste/ rgyas pa'i lbal 'bras bu yod// zla 'dra snum la dri ma med// du ba med cing bai DUR+Yar 'dra// nad med rigs rnams rgyas par byed// chu shel nor bu spungs pa dang // pad+ma rag gsal ba ni// sdig pa
405b8(rgyud): ma lus zad par 'gyur// dmar ser puN+Da riki dang // ban du kha dog gsal ba ni// rgyal sred dpal rnams 'byor pa yin// ut+pal ma li u shi dro// tsam pa ka dang si ga kar dri// ga pur ag
406a1(rgyud): dus dris pa dge zhing tshe nga dpal gyis gnas// zab pa'i ga dang rlung dang ni// rdu lnga pi wad nam ru// des smras ni bde pa 'phel// dbul ze byakra shes gzugs su 'ar/ 
406a2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan rnga yab phyag mtshan rnams// rin chen gzugs kyi dbyibs su 'char// dge ba ma yi dbyibs su bstan// ngan pa de las ci rigs bzlog/ de rjes rdzas kyis rim pa ni// oM ag+na sa
406a3(rgyud): a mu ka s+ya shan+ti ku ru swA hA/ sreg blug so// oM bo d+hi br-ik+ShA ya swA hA/ a shwad za'i'o// oM badz+ra lA tA ya~M swA hA/ blag sha'i'o// oM badz+ra ku be rA sa swA hA/ 'o ma can gyi shing gi'o// oM badz+ra shaM dz+wa las
406a4(rgyud): swA hA/ u dusaM bai rere re// oM sar+b+ba pA pa da ha na badz+ra swA hUM/ til gyi'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swAhA/ 'bras so ba'i'o/ oM badz+ras pa de swA hA/ no dang zan gyi'o// oM badz+ra A mu She swAhA
406a5(rgyud): dur ba'i'o// oM badz+ra pra ti ha ta badz+ra \u0f7fAr+tha/ ku sha'i'o// rjes rnams rang sngags ci rigs dbul// bstod cing gson kha'i las bya ste// me yi snying khar dkyil 'khor mchod/ 
406a6(rgyud): gsang la sogs pa rim pa bzhin// sngar bstan pa las shes par bya// de rjes lhags mas ci rigs mchod// zhu ba la sogs rjes rnams ni// lha yi zhal du mchod par bya// yam shing ku sha la sog/ 
406a7(rgyud): pa// 'od la mchod par bya ba yin// phyag tu zhal zas 'thor 'thung dbul// me tog bdug pa dbu dang 'od// thig le snying kha gsang gtor yang // sku la phul te zhabs bsil zhabs// mar me la sog
406a8(rgyud): rim bzhin gnas// dkyil 'khor bsdu gshegs rim pa rnams// mkhas pas nye bar brtags te bya// dkyil 'khor lhas ni mchog ster la// ma yis 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed// lag pan gyis
406b1(rgyud): ni bde ba 'byin// 'o ma snang rtsis rig pa 'phel// gro dang sran mas nad kun sel// dur bas srog ni 'dzin par byed// nas kyis brtson 'grus la dbang ste// stobs 'phel ma sha ka yin no// bru
406b2(rgyud): 'phel so ba'i las yin te// sdig pa 'dag pa til yin no// 'bras kyi nus pa 'phel byed pa// zhi la yungs kar ku shas srung // dpal bskyed pa ni bud shing ste// yam shing gzi byin ster bar byed/ 
406b3(rgyud): 'byor pa 'phel ba mar yin no// sbyin bdag bkra shis thab yin te// dngos grub kun ster mchod pa'i rdzas// thabs dang shes rab gzar bu ste// bdud rtsi mar gyis tshim byed pa// mchod pa gzhan
406b4(rgyud): gyis ci zhig bya// 'di ni mdzes ma'i yul yin gyis// gnan gyis rtags par gal 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das bya dag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyin
406b5(rgyud): sreg gi cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang khyod kyi gsang ba'i mtshan nyi shu gcig gi bstod pa
406b6(rgyud): ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis
406b7(rgyud): legs par nyon// nga yi ming ni nyi shu gcig/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsang // mi 'gyur g.yung drung dbang bskur te// 'di dag mdzes ma khyod la bstan// na mo nai lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni
406b8(rgyud): tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo g+ha dza kaR+Shan+ta tsaN+Da badz+ran maHsu b+huSha nis b+h+yo tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo rat+na kuR+ShA ka ra si sar+b+ba badz+ra/ na mo b+hakra bid+d+ha b+ha si ra tsiN+Da badz+ra/ namaHAr+ya g+ho Sha san+de tsir+tha badz+ra/ namaHpras ram/ 
407a1(rgyud): to swa tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo 'brel ar ci shi sI tsaN+Da badz+ra/ namaHsa rU no la tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo dur dan tad maklam paraHtsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo b+hai ra ba bi bA tas rU pa~MSh+Tha
407a2(rgyud): na mo gro mo kro d+ha bi gra ha rU pi b+hiHtsaN+Da badz+ra na maHtsa tu rasma ra r-i Shi sin+da tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo ma hA ba la ba rak+Sha ma tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo nai rAt+ma si ha ni rA da tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo a mo g+ha dzi ga dar+tha kr-ita tsaH
407a3(rgyud): badz+ra na mo da sha ki bi shA ni ra mA NaM tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo ha hA sa twa so ni rag+ho Sha tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na ma e tsa lo hi ka dzad to tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na maHpany+tsa bud+d+he ta ma mu ku Ta tsaN+Da badz+ra/ na mo badz+ra ma hA be
407a4(rgyud): yud dA rod tsaN+De badz+ra/ rdo rje gtum po'i mtshan nyi shu gcig/ nga po 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / glegs bam
407a5(rgyud): byas te/ 'chang ba la ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams/ cad kyis rjes su skyong ba chu'o/ srung bar gyu'o// sbed par 'gyur ro// / skyob par 'gyur ro// mtshan 'di rnams 'dzin pa de mchim
407a6(rgyud): med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro// lan cig tsam brjod pas kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu ba su'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye'o// ngan 'gro gzhan yang spangs pa
407a7(rgyud): yin no// tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'chang lnga brgya yang rtag tu mtshan 'di 'dzin pa'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang ngo // gdug pa can gyi klu rnams kyis mi 'tshe zhing slar longs
407a8(rgyud): spyod sna tshogs sbyin no// 'chi ba'i dus su yang bai DUR+Ya lta bu'i sku lus bstan te rang gi gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro// mtshan 'di gnas pa'i sa de ni lung lo can dang mtshungs pa yin no// mi ma yin
407b1(rgyud): ba gdug pa can rnams kyis nam yang gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro// grub pa brgyad dang sangs rgyas kyang ster bar byed na/ gzhan lta yang ci smos te/ mtshan 'di dag rin po che dang dra
407b2(rgyud): bar blta bar bya'o// 'di ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// ched du brjod pa rin po che// gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed// dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel ba yin// 'phrin las sgo nam
407b3(rgyud): thogs pa med// 'di ni rdo rje 'chang yin pas// nyin mtshan dus gsum klog pa yin// phyi bzhini rtag tu srung bar byed// nad dang gdon rnams kun las thar// sman chen nyes pa thams cad
407b4(rgyud): 'joms// 'byung po kun gyis bskur ba ste// mdzes mad la bstan pa yin// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lamasu 'chang lag na dpal gnas te// rtag tu mtshan 'di
407b5(rgyud): brjod par gyis// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang / ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las mtshan nyin rtsa gcig gis bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// 
407b6(rgyud): dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol ba/ rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud 'di bshad pa dang / sba ba dang / ji ltar gzung ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
407b7(rgyud): mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs// zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma// bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog/ khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon// phyi ma'i dus su nga yi rgyud// gsang
407b8(rgyud): ba sku gsung thugs kyi gter// bla med rgyud rgyal rin chen 'di// byang chub sems ldan snying rje che// thos mang shes rab mchog tu gsal// dad pa che zhing lha la gus// bla ma bsnyen cing
408a1(rgyud): dbang bskur thob// dam tshig sdom la lus ldan// brtson 'grus che ba gzhan don dpal// 'jig rten bde la ma chags pas// rgyud 'di mnyan dang bshad par bya// 
408a2(rgyud): des las bzlog pa'i gang zag la// ming tsam bstan par mi bya'o// gal te bstan par gyur pa na// sngags pa dam tshig nyams gyur te// nad gdon 'byung po ma lus pas// nye bar gces
408a3(rgyud): te 'chi bar 'gyur// de nas mnar med sdug bsngal ni// grangs med 'das kyang thar mi 'gyur// de bas gsang ba sku gsung thugs// snying po dam pa 'di dag la// rgya yis btab ste mchod pa dang
408a4(rgyud): bstod cing sba ba byas gyur na// yid la re ba kun rdzogs shing // 'jig rten thams cad bde bar 'gyur// glegs pa ma sor ni bcu drug la// rims bdun rgya yi btab nas kyang / 
408a5(rgyud): rtag tu spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzung // 'di dang bral bar ma gyur na// bsten pa de yin sgrub pa de// sgrub pa chen po de yin/ te// sngags kyang de yin lha yang de// bla ma de yin slob dpon
408a6(rgyud): yang / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun yang // de yin bskyed dang rdzogs bde// ma lus dbang yang de yin te// 'jig rten bya ba kun spangs nas// 'di la mchod par gyur pa ni// tshogs gzhan
408a7(rgyud): ci yod rmongs pa'i rgyu// ci phyir 'di la 'bad mi byed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te// yum la rjes su gtad pa'i don bstan pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// 
408a8(rgyud): rdo rje bde ma bde ster ma// rtog pa gcod mdzad yum khyod la// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // gzungs ma yid 'ong rgyal ba'i sa// rnam dag mchod cing sdug bsngal 'joms/ 
408b1(rgyud): ma lus 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal// rdo rje bde ma phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod nas rgyud btang ngo do// de nas yum gyis rjes bzung ste// dus gsum bde gshegs ma lus pa'i// thugs kyi
408b2(rgyud): sras po sde dpon che// 'jig rten thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gtum po dpa' bo 'jigs par byed// klu 'dul gzhan gyis mi thub pa// drag po 'jigs pa
408b3(rgyud): byed pa'i lha// rdo rje gtum po khyad 'tshal zhes bstod nas phyag dang bskor bas mnyes par byas nas slar yab kyi thugs kha'i rdo rje'i lte bar thim par gyur to// de nas 'khor thams cad
408b4(rgyud): kyis mchod pas mchod cing bstod pas bstod de/ gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gsungs de pa legs so legs so zhes mngon par mgrin gcig tu ched
408b5(rgyud): du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas yi rangs te mngon par bstod par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje/ 
408b6(rgyud): gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las rgyud ji ltar bstan cing sra ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// 
408b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsan+d+ra gu chen po dang
408b8(rgyud): bod kyi li ts+tsha ba glan rlung dar ma tshul khrims kyis byang phyogs shas b+ha la'i dpe dang bsnun te bsgyur ba'o// slad kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang kha phye nas byung ba dang bstun nas
409a1(rgyud): bod skad du/ rdo rje bde khros rgyud kyi rgyal po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos 'dus gcig na/ bcom
409a2(rgyud): ldan 'das bdud las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'og min gyi gan sa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi pho brang na bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'dus pa rnams kyi sa dang po sems dpa' chen po yid cher
409a3(rgyud): g.yos te/ gus pas bkur sti dang / rim grod / bud du dang / sti stang du byas te/ e dma'o byams mgon thugs rje can 'gro ba'i
409a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad kun// me yis tshig cing mtshon gyis phog/ mun par 'khyams nas ri yis non rlung gis khyer ba snying re rje// skyabs kyi dam pa bka'
409a5(rgyud): stsal 'tshal// zhes zhus pas der ni mgon pos sku bstan te// zhal gyi pad+ma rab phye nas// spyan gyi gzi mdangs kun la gzigs// ljags kyi dkyil nas bka' stsal pa// 
409a6(rgyud): skyob pa'i dam pa 'di yin gyis// rdo rje bde dang khros pa yis// dum bu gsum pa ngas bshad kyis// legs par nyon la yid lazung // zhes gsungs so// rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las
409a7(rgyud): gtam rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// bkra shis maN+Dal legs byas la// tshul dang 'dun
409b1(rgyud): 'i brim pa dgong // des ga sa bdun drugs// kuzhan pa ga tog 'grus bad+ha// sang nas pa dang / dri rnas pa dang / na g+sa dang / 'bru byi brag dang / 
409b2(rgyud): sman rnams thugs so// bum pa de'i mgrin pa der sngon pos bkris te/ steng du bla re phub la bzhag go// rdo rje ba de ba'i rgyud las sgrub rdzas kyi le'u skye gnyis pa'o// 
409b3(rgyud): de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// sgrub byed rang rgyud dag pa yis// bskyed tshul rgyas sa mi bsdus kyang rung // hUM las phyag na rdo rje ni// dbu gsum mthong nag phyag bzhi mdzes// sku ni tshen
409b4(rgyud): mtshungs pa med// zhabs kyis rgya mtsho'i nang du yang // chus na sbal ba'i steng du brdzis// g.yas g.yon dang po'i phywa dge gnyis kyis// rdo rje gsor zhing dril chen brdung / 
409b5(rgyud): mtha' gnyis drug pa zhal du 'dren// dbu gsum g.yas da kar rigs lngas rgyan// dbu g.yon dmar po sbrul rgya sa mdzes// zhal dbus mthing nag lcags mchu can/ 
409b6(rgyud): steng du ma khar ljing tshangs pa spros// dpa' bo gdug pa dpung ba'i rgyun// rin chen lhun por rim la// spangs bcas zhum pa med par bzhugs// de ltar lha dang rab sbyar nas// de nyid bstan
409b7(rgyud): pa'i yan lag gis// rang lus chags su gzhug par gyis// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las lha sgom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas
409b8(rgyud): mngon par bshad bya ba// sgo gsum sbya ba gos pa yis// gsang ba'i snying po'i bum du bzlas// oM badz+ra tsaN+Das rba du Sh+ya ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa hU phaT/ bco brgyad sngags kyi rgyal po
410a1(rgyud): ma byung mi 'brung 'byung mi 'gyur// 'di bzlas sngon du grub par 'gyur// rtag tu mtshan ma bzang po 'thung // gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'ong mi 'ong // rang la nges
410a2(rgyud): ston par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i rim pas thub mi thub// 'bad pas legs par brtag par bya// de nas gtor ma sbyin pa ni// oM AHhUM zhes rgyun tu gtong ngo // rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las
410a3(rgyud): ga sang ba'i snying po dang mtshan lngas bstan pa'i le'u skye bzhi pa'o// de nas mngon par bshad bya'o// rtenan rdorje'i 'od du 'bar// bden pa
410a4(rgyud): 'phro tshad sna du 'bar// 'bar ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro// 2ngag rten ma lus sbyangs nas kyang // slar la thig le nyid la 'dus// sgra dang bcas te rang gsal 'bar// brtan par
410a5(rgyud): gyur na spro bsdu bya// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las mi'i bsam / tan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// mthong gi shog pu
410a6(rgyud): sngon po la// gser gyi 'khor lo bris pa'i steng // srung ba'i snying po legs bkod ste// gang mang rag sha sbyar bar gyis// de yang nyi las yongs bsgos te// sangs rgyas sems can nyid
410a7(rgyud): bsgoms// de nyid bum par legs bzhugs pa// mi chad cing bzlas brjod gsal pa gad ga// de nas mes pa'i dus bzang ba// re dam gzhan la btags gyur na// bar cad thams cad
410a8(rgyud): nyer zhi nas// tshe dpal bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las srung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas mngon
410b1(rgyud): par bshad bya ba// 'gro bdug gis gdungs pa la// gdugs pa'i dbang chen la sogs pa// 'tshe ba 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// mi dga' sems 'byo 'gro snying 'dod// nyam nung
410b2(rgyud): 'thibs dang ltas kyang ngan// yang yang na zhing bstams snol 'ong // de ni klu yi gnod pa ste// tshor nas legs par bcos na zlogs// sa srin mi la 'di ltar gnod// lus sprod
410b3(rgyud): 'phrig sha ro 'byung // sha bkra thor bu nga yang 'gyur// de nis tshor nas bcos na zlogs// sa bdag gnod na 'di ltar 'gyur// gdong yang shin tu ldog 'gyur che// na tsha'i zug rngu
410b4(rgyud): drag por 'gyur// res 'ga' bde ba ltar yang byed// dbas su thig le kho nar na// de yang bcos dkabazlogs// gnyen gyi gnod pa 'di yin te// shin tu/ 
410b5(rgyud): na cha'i tshabs kyang che// rkang lag na'akhums dri ma ldon/ sha khrag lud nas mig kyang sleng // kha yo sA mo chu ser za// kha yang mi thub gnod pa za// chu bur byung na/ 
410b6(rgyud): mtshang yang che// tshor bas mi chog sgrim pa gces// gdon tshogs gzhan yang sun mi rtag/ phra mo tsam la sogs pa zlogs// kun la bsgrims te bcos na 'tsho// rdo rje bde ba'i/ 
410b7(rgyud): rgyud las gzhan gyi gnod pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// dbang chen la sogs tham
410b8(rgyud): cad la// mchod dang gtor mas mgu bar bya// ci 'dod pa yi rdzas rnams sbyin// rten yod gnas su legs par swa// snyan pa'i tshig gis bsgo byas la// bum par nor bu rin chen
411a1(rgyud): gzhug mdzes pa 'dir sna 'bru yi mdzod// gang gi rten la sbas gyur na// gnod pa rags pa zhi bar 'gyur// rdo rje bde ba khros pa'i rgyud las zhi byed
411a2(rgyud): mchod thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// ba can dug gu gul gla rtsi dang // shu dag shing kun su zi drug/ 
411a3(rgyud): gsang sngags btab te lus la byug/ gu gul nya mkhris gla rtsi dang // sgrog pa shu dag dri chen rnams// bdug pa byas te yang na bkru// gser gsu byi ru mig ma phug/ ba tsan dug rma byar
411a4(rgyud): mkhris par bcas// bcangs na srung ba'o mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las rten 'brel rdzas kyi le'u ste dgu pa 'o// // rdo rje bde ba'i
411a5(rgyud): rgyud las dum bu dang po bstan pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir// drag sngags 'di dag brjod par
411a6(rgyud): bya'o/ oM mA ra Na sod song / mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na dun du na/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na myos bying thum ri la dza/ mi tshogs
411a7(rgyud): spangs te dag sngags 'di// dbugs ma shor bar sgrub mas drangs// bum par bstims nas rtags thob nas// 'thung sam bkras na dngos grub thog sngags la gang ming sbyar byas nas/ 
411a8(rgyud): yungs kar gdug pa'i phur ba la// brjod de las la sbyar gyur na// gang la bzlas pa bzlog par 'gyur// ma bsgrubs lan cig brjod pas kyang // dngos grub thams cad thob par/ 
411b1(rgyud): 'gyur ma byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur// rdo rje bde ba'i rgyud las drag sngags khros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// 
411b2(rgyud): de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas bsags lta bskyed drag sngags bzlas// dgos pa tshang ba'i bum pa ste// mi dmigs pa las rin po che'i// bum pa tshul dang 'thun par bsam/ 
411b3(rgyud): de nas baM dngalaM las ni// chu dang sa yi dkyil 'khor bsam// lha bsgoms khyad par bum pa 'dzin// mchun rdo rje'i sbu gu ste// de nas sngags kyi 'od zer 'bros// phyir 'bros
411b4(rgyud): gdug pa ma lus sreg/ 'od zer lcags kyi sbubs mar dang / bum par khro mu khol mar 'gyur// de 'thungs da krus pas gang gnod pa// rdul du brlag te dag par bsam/ 
411b5(rgyud): brtsams pa'i las la the tsom med// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las bum pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ 
411b6(rgyud): rdzas bsag lha sgom 'khor lo bskor// ro ras byi dag bya rog sgros// khru gang tsam gyi mtshan nyid la// 'chi bar byed pa'i snag tshol// ltogs pa'i sgro tsa g.yas pa yi// drag sngags maH
411b7(rgyud): pa'i re mig bri// de nas mtshan mar gang dmigs gzugs// kha dog rigs bzhi nyid du bya// de snying dag sngags re re dgod// maN+Dal gtsang mi dris byugs te// dkar dang dmar dang
411b8(rgyud): ser dang ldang // rma bya'i sgo yis rgyan byas te// lha sgom khyad par 'khor lo 'dzin// 'khor lo bskor ba'i rim pa ni// drag sngags mnyam pa'i 'khor lo bskor// sngags ni/ nAg
412a1(rgyud): kra mA ra Na hU~M phaT/ gang bsams 'di la the tshom med// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo khros pa'i le'u skye bcu gnyis pa'o// 
412a2(rgyud): de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas bsags lha bsgoms phur pa gdab// lcags sam seng ldeng drug shing la// sngags grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham// 'khor lo'i mtha' ma bskor
412a3(rgyud): dgod// lha sgom khyad par phur ba 'dzin// drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni// nA ga badz+ra ki la ya mA ra Na hUM phaT/ sngags grags mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham// brtsams pa'i las la the tso
412a4(rgyud): med// rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las phur ba khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas bsag lnga sgom
412a5(rgyud): sbyin bsregs bya// gdug pa'i shing bu khru gang tshad// sdug sa kyi grangs kyang mnyam par bya// sngon dmar skud pas rim gsum dkri// bar bde 'khor lo'i srog rtsa bcang
412a6(rgyud): log tu gri thogs drag sngags brjod// ni ga tik+Sh+Na cha ga ma mA ras hU~M phaT/ rim par bgrangs te g.yeng gni khrod// byang shar mtshams su rnam par bzhag/ de nas maN+Dal dbus
412a7(rgyud): nyid du// hom khung brus te drug khrag drug/ nang du hom bu gzugs par bya// 'khor lo gris gtub thogs nas ni// grangs dang mnyam par bsreg par bya// me de lugs sa'i khyim
412a8(rgyud): nas bslang // lha sgom khyad par me dadung 'dzin// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa 'di// nAg tsi Sh+Ta dz+wa la raM/ mA ra ya phaT/ bsregs nas las brtsams 'grub par 'gyur/ 
412b1(rgyud): rdo rje bde khros pa'i rgyud las me pung khros pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas mngon par bshad bya ba// rdzas
412b2(rgyud): bsags lha sgom mnan sngags bzlas// chu srin sram mam be ba'i mgor// bsregs pa'i thal ba bsdus byas la// gang yin nyid kyi sbyor ba bcas// lnga sgom khyad par ri rab
412b3(rgyud): 'dzin drag bsngags bzlas pa'i rim pa no// nag stam b+ha ya nan/ mnan byas chu srin kha ru skam// 'di byas gang la bzlas pa brlag/ 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// 
412b4(rgyud): khros pa'i rgyud las ri rab khros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'i// / rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las dum bu gnyis pa'o// 
412b5(rgyud): de nas mngon par bshad pa ba// glang po'i lpags pa 'brug bris nas// gang ming bcug ste drag snga gas bzlas// gnam lcags bab par bzlog
412b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// 'bru so pad+ma 'dub brgyad la// klu yi gzugs rnams bris pa la// bstims nas drag sngags rgya bgyur na/ gnam chu dus su phebs
412b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// thod par e bris sngags kyis bskor// gang yin bcug la bstims pa la// drag sngags gang yin bzlas byas na// myur du 'grub
412b8(rgyud): bar gdan miza// srog chags 'jigs par gyur ba la/ 'chi ba'i chu yis drag sngags dri// 'jigs byed bkug ste de la mchod// ji
